verse_text: Caicunami Jesucristopac ñaupacuna; pai Davidmanta Abraanmantapash mirai carca.
Abran Isaacpac yaya carca, Isaacca Jacobpac yaya, Jacobca Judapac paipac huauquicunapacpash yaya carca.
Judaca Faresta Zaratapas Tamarmanta charirca. Faresca Esronpac yaya carca, Esronca Aranpac yaya carca.
Aranca Aminadadpac yaya, Aminadadca Naansonpac yaya carca, Naasonca Salmonpac yaya carca.
Salmonca paipac huarmi Rahabmanta Boozta charirca; Boozca Obedta charirca Rutmanta. Obedca Isaipac yaya carca.
Isaica Apu Davidpac yaya carca; Apu David Uriaspac huarmimanta Salomonta charirca.
Salomonca Roboanpac yaya carca, Roboanca Abiaspac yaya carca, Josafatca Joranpac yayacarca.
Azaca Josafatpac yaya carca, Josafatca Joranpac yaya, Joranca Uciaspac yaya carca.
Uciasca Jotanpac yaya carca, Jotanca Acazpac yaya, Acazca Ecequiaspac yaya carca.
Ecequiasca Manasespac yaya carca, Manasesca Amonpac yaya, Amonca Josiaspac yaya carca.
Josiasca Jeconiaspac paipac huauquicunapacpash yaya carca Israel runacuna, japi tucushpa, Babilonia lactaman pushai tucushcapi.
Chai huasha Jeconias Salatielpac yaya carca, Salatielca Zorobabelpac yaya carca.
Zorobabelca Abiudpac yaya carca, Abiudca Eliaquinpac yaya, Eliaquinca Azorpac yaya carca.
Azorca Sadocpac yaya carca, Sadocca Aquinpac yaya, Aquinca Eludpac yaya carca.
Eliudca Eleazarpac yaya carca, Eleazarca Matanpac yaya, Matanca Jacobpac yaya.
Jacobca Josepac yaya carca; Joseca Mariapac cari carca: Mariami Jesus "Cristo" nishcapac mama.

Chashna cacpi, Abraanmanta Davidcama chunca chuscu miraicuna canurca; chashnallata, Davidmanta pacha israelitacuna Babiloniaman pushai tucushcacama chunca chuscu miraicuna canurca; chaimanta Cristo pacarishcacama chunca chuscu miraicuna.
Jesucristo pacarina cashnami carca: Paipac mama Maria, Josehuan maqui japichishca cashpa, paihuan mana llutarishcapi, santo Samaipac ushaihuan huicsayuc tucurca.
Paipac cari Jose alli runami carca. Mariapi tucushcata apucunaman mana huillasha nishpa, pacalla paita saquinata yuyarca.
Chashna yuyacucpi, shuc angel paiman ricurimurca, cashna nishpa: —Jose, Davidpac churi, Mariata canpac huarmi japincapac ama manchaichu: paipac huicsapi tiyac huahua Santo Samaimantami.
Shuc cari huahuata charinca, paita "Jesus" shutichinqui, runacunata juchacunamanta quishpichinca mari.
Chai tucui chasna tucurca Dios rimashca pactarincapac, profeta cashna mari quillcashca carca:
Shuc malta huarmi huicsayuc tucunca, cari huahuata pacarichinca; chai huahuata Emanuel shutichinunca. (Emanuel nishpa "Dios ñucanchihuanmi" nin).
Jose riccharishpa, angel rimashcata uyashpa, Mariata paipac huarmita japirca.
llutarishcapica, Maria shuc huahuata aparca; Joseca paita Jesus shutichirca.
Jesus Belen llactapi, Juda allpapi pacarirca, Herodes apu cashcapi. Shuc puncha, shuc yachac runacuna inti llucshishcamanta Jerusalen llactaman shamunurca,
tapushpa nishpa: —¿Maipi tiyan cunanlla pacarishca Judiocunapac jatun apu? Paipac estrellata ricurcanchic inti lluchishcapi; paita chacchancapac shamunchic.
Herodes, chaita uyashpa, yapa mancharirca; Jerusalenpi causaccunapash mancharinurca.
Herodes, pacricunata quillcata yachaccunatapash shamuchishpa, paicunata tapurca nishpa: —¿Maipi pacarina can Mesias nishca Apu?
Cutipanurca nishpa: —Judamanta Belenpi; cashna mari profeta quillarca:
Canca, Belen llacta, Juda allpapi, mana tucui llactacunamanta yialli uchillachu canqui, canmanta mari ñuca runacunata pushac apu llucshinca.
Caita uyashpa, Herodes chai yachaccunata pacalla cayashpa, imura chai estrella ricurishcata paicunata huillachirca.
Chai huasha, Belen llactaman paicunata cacharca nishpa: —Huahuata mascacrichic; paita tupashpaca, ñucata huillahuanquichic, ñucapash paita chacchacrincapac.
Rimacpi uyashpa, yachaccuna rinurca. Paicuna ricushca estrella cutillata ricurirca; paicunata ñaupashpa, huahua tiyashca huasicama rirca: chaipi shayarirca.
Paicuna, estrellata ricushpa, yapa cushiyanurca.
Huasiman yaicushpa, huahuata mamantin tupanurca; cuncurishpaca, paita chacchanurca; huasha, malacunata pascashpa, curita, sumiriuta, mirrata paiman cuyanurca.
Chai huasha, paicuna nuspaipi uyashcapi "Herodespacman ama ticraichichu" nishcata, shuc ñanpita paicunapac llactaman ticranurca.

Yachaccuna rishca huasha, Diospac angei Joseman nuspaipi ricurimurca nishpa: —Jatari, huahuata mamantin pushashpa, Egipto allpaman miticui. Chaillapita saquirinqui ñuca canta rimanacama, Herodes huahuata mashcanca mari huañuchincapac.
Jose jatarishpa, huahuata mamantin pushashpa, tuta ucupi Egipto allpaman rirca.
Chaipi saquirinurca Herodes huañushcacama. Chashnami Dios profetapac shimihuan rimashca pactarirca: Egiptomanta ñuca churita cayarcani.

Yachaccuna mana ticramunucpi, Herodes sinchi piñarirca, "umachi tucushcani" nishpa; yachaccuna huahuamanta rimashcata yuyarishpa, tucui cari huahuacunata ishcai huatayuccama huañuchincapac cacharca, Belen llactapi, mayanlla huasicunapipash tiyaccuna.
Chashnami Jeremias profeta quillcashca pactarirca; cashna mari quillcashca carca:
Rama llactapi sinchi caparina uyarirca; jatun huacai, jatun ñacarina uyarirca: Raquelmi carca paipac huahuacunamanta huacashpa; paicuna ña huañushcata yachashpa, mana munarca cushiyachi tucuncapac.
Herodes huañushca huasha, Egiptopi Diospac angel Joseman nuspaipi ricurimurca, paita nishpa:
—Jatari, huahuata mamantin pushashpa, Israel allpaman ticrai, huahuata huañuchishun nishcacuna ña huañunurca.
Chaita uyashpa, Jose jatarishpa, huahuata mamantin pushashpa, Israel allpaman shamurca.

Judea allpaman rinata mancharcami, chaipi Arquelao paipac yaya Herodes rantimanta apu tucushcata uyashpa; chairaicu, Dios nuspaipi paita rimacpi, Galileaman rirca, Nazaret llactaman, chaipi causancapac. Chashnami Profetacuna rimashca pactarirca; cashna rimanushca carca: Paita nazareno runa ninunca.
Shuc puncha, bautisac Juan Judeapi tiyac chunlla allpaman shamurca, cashna camachishpa:
—Diosman ticraichic, Diospac pacha mayanyaran.
Juanmanta rimashca carca profeta Isaias cashna nishcapi: Chunlla allpapi shuc shimi uyarirca cashna nishpa: "Diospac ñanpita allichichic, Diospac ñanpita cuscachichic".
Juan camello nishca huilmahuan ahuashca churanata churarishca carca, huacra carahuan chunpillishpa.
Judea allpamanta, Jordan yacu patamanta achca runa paipacman shamuccuna carca;
paicuna juchacunata huillanucpi, Juan Jordan yacupi paicunata bautisac carca.
Achca fariseocuna saduceocunantin paipacman shamunucpi bautisanata mañancapa, paicunata nirca: —Machacui miraicuna; ¿pitac cancunata rimarca "Diospac ñacachinata quishpinquichic" nishpa?
Cancuna Diosman yuyaita ticrachishcata rashcacunahuan ricuchichic.
Ama pantaichichu, shuncupi yuyarishpa nishpa: "Abraan ñucanchic yayami". Cancunata nini: Dios cai rumicunamanta huahuacunata Abraanman surcunata ushan.
Yura siquipi tumi churashcami can; alli muyuta mana aparic yura cuchushcami canca yantancapac.

Ñuca yacullahuan cancunata bautisani, cancuna Diosman ticrancapac juchacunata saquishpa; ñuca huashata shamuc runa santo Samaipac ninahuan cancunata bautisanca, pai ñucata yallin mari; paipac ushutata apancapacpash mana allichu cani.
Paipac maquipi huairachinata charin, trigo muyuta quihuamanta anchuchincapac; trigo muyuta huacaichincami, quihuata mana tucuric ninapi rupachinca.
Shuc puncha, Jesus Galileamanta Jordan yacuman shamurca, Juanpacman, bautisai tucuncapac.
Juan mana mutiarcachu paita bautisancapac, nishpa: —Canmi ñucata bautisana canqui; ¿imaraicu "bautisahuai" nihuanqui?
Jesus cutipashpa ñirca: —Ñuca rimashcata railla; ñucanchic Dios munashcata pactachina alli canca. Chaita uyashpa, Juan Jesusta bautisarca.
Yacumanta llucshicucpi, jahua pacha pascarirca; Diospac Samai ricurimurca, urpi shina uraicucushpa, Jesuspac jahuapi shayarishpa.
Chaillapita, shuc shimi uyarirca cashna nishpa: —Caimi ñuca llaquishca churi; paipi cushiyani.
Jesus bautisai tucucpi, Santo Samai chunlla allpaman paita purichirca, supai paita camancapac.
Chuscu chunca puncha tutantin mana micushpa causashcapi, Jesus yarcachirca.
Supai paipacman shamushpa nirca: —Can Diospa churi cashpa, cai rumicunata tantata rurai.
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Diospac shimi cashna nin: "Runa mana tantallahuanchu causan; Dios rimashcatapash mutsunmi"
Chashna rimacpi, supai Jerusalen llactaman paita pusharca. Diospac huasijahuapi shayachirca.

Huasha nirca: —Can Diospac churi cashpa, caimanta allpaman shitari, quillcara mari tiyan: "Dios paipac angelcunata cachanca canta ricuncapac; paicuna maquihuan japishpa canta pushanunca, can ama rumicunapi chucrincapac".
Rimacpi uyashpa, Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Diospac shimi caitapash nin: "Canpac apu Diosta ama camaichu".
Cutillata supai Jesusta shuc jahua urcuman pusharca; chaimanta tucui cai pacha llactacunata chaicunapi tiyac sumaccunatapash ricuchishpa,
nirca: —Cai tucuita cushcanqui, cuncurishpa ñucata chacchahuacpi.
Jesus uyashpa paita nirca: —Ñucamanta anchuri, supai; quillcarapash tiyan: "Cancapac Apu Diosta chacchanqui, paillatata sirbinqui".
Supai chaita uyashpa, Jesusta saquishpa rirca; angelcuna shamushpa, Jesusta caranuica.
Shuc puncha, bautisac Juanta chunta curralpi huichcanurca. Jesus chaita yachashpa, Galileaman rirca.
Nazaret llactata jichushpa, Cafarnaun llactaman rirca chaipi causancapac. Cafarnaunca jatun cucha patapi tiyarca, Zabulon-Neftali allpacunapi.
Chashnami profeta Isaias rimashca pactarirca pai nishcapi:
Zabulon-Neftali panpa, jatun cucha ñanpipi Jordan yacu chinpaman Diosta mana ricsiccunapac allpa.
Tutapi puricushca runacuna shuc jatun achicta ricunurca.
Chaimanta pacha, Jesus yachachincapac callarirca nishpa: —Diosman ticraichic, Dios apu cana pacha ña pactamuran.

Shuc puncha, Galilea cucha patata puricushpa, Jesus ishcai runata tuparca, huauquipura; shuc Simon Pedro carca, shuc paipac huauqui Andres; llicata cuchapi shitaranurca, yacu aichata japiccama canurca mari.
Jesus paicunata nirca: —Ñucahuan shamuichic; runacunata japiccamanta cancunata rasha
Paicuna, chai shimita uyashpa, llicata saquishpa, Jesusta catinurca.
Astanipi, shuc ishcai runata tuparca, huauquipura; shuc Santiago carca, shuc Juan shutiyuc, Cebedeopac churicuna; yaya canuapi llicata allichiranurca. Jesus paicunata nirca: —Ñucahuan shamuichic.
Paicunaca, yayata canuatapash saquishpa, Jesusta catinurca.
Jesus Galilea llactacunapi puricurca, tantarina huasicunapi yachachishpa, Diospac alli shimita camachishpa, tucui laya uncushcacunata alliyachishpa.

Paipac shuti tucui Siria nishca allpapi uyarirca. Tucui laya uncuihuan, nanaihuan llaquirishcacunata paipacman pushanuxca: supai japishcacuna, epilepticocuna, suchu runacuna. Tucuicunata alliyachirca.
Achca runacuna paita catinurca Galileamanta, Decapolis nishca llactacunamanta, Jerusalenmanta, Judeamanta, Jordan yacu chinpamanta.
Jesus, achca runacuna paita caticpi ricushpa, shuc urcuman sicarca; tiyaricpi, pai yachachishcacuna mayanyanurca.
Mayanyanucpi Jesus yachachincapac callarirca nishpa:
—Cushiyaichic Diosta mutsunchic niccuna, jahua pacha cancunapacmi.
Cushiyaichic cai causaipi huacaccuna, cushiyachishca canquichic.
Cushiyaichic casi shuncuyuccuna, cai pachata cui tucunquichic.
Cushiyaichic Dios munashcata rurasha niccuna, chaita rurancapac Dios cancunata yanapancami.
Cushiyaichic shuccunata llaquirishpa yanapaccuna, Dios cancunata llaquirishpa yanapancami.
Cushiyaichic chuya shuncuyuccuna, Diosta ricunquichicmi.
Cushiyaichic piñanacunata jarcaccuna, Diospac churicuna canquichicmi,
Cushiyaichic allita rashcamanta ñacachi tucuccuna, jahua pacha cancunapacmi canca,
Cushicuna canquichc ñucaraicu cancunata chicninucpi, piñanucpi, manallita cancunamanta llullashpa rimanucpi.
Chashna tucucpi, cushiyanquichic; jahua pachapi cancuna cui tucuna yapa jatunmi canca. Ñaupa causashca profetacunata chai layallata llaquichinurca.
Cancuna cai pachapi cachi shina canquichic. Cachi paipac mishquita chincachicpi, ¿imahuan cutillata cachiyanca? Mana imapac balin; jichununlla, runacunaca jaitanun.
Cancuna inti shina canquichic runacunapac. Shuc urcu jahuapi tiyac llacta mana pacaipacchu.
Shuc chinpusuta mana japichinchic mala ucupi churancapac; jahuapi churancapac japichinchic, huasipi tiyaccunata ricuchincapac.
Cancunapac achic runacuna ñaupacpi punchaclla ricurichun, shuccuna cancuna alli rashcata ricushpa, jahua pachapi tiyac Yayata sumacyachincapac.
Ñuca mana shamurcanichu camachic quillca rimashcata, profetacuna rimashcatapash anchuchincapac; chaicunata pactachincapac shamurcani.
Shuti cancunata nini: Jahua pachahuan cai pachahuan tucuricpipash, camachic quillcapi tiyac illacta pactarinca.

Chashna cacpi, maicanpash camachic quillcapi tiyashcata mana pactachicpi uchillapipash, chashna rancapac shuccunata yachachicpi, jahua pachapi puchucai canca; ranti, maicanpash chaicunata pactachicpi, chaicunata pactachincapac yachachicpi, jahua pachapi cui tucuna yapa jatunmi canca.
Cancunata nini: Cancuna camachic quillcata yachaccunamanta, fariseocunamanta yaili allicuna mana cashpa, jahua pachaman mana yaicunquichic.
Ñaupacunaman cashna rimanurca —cancuna chaita yachanquichic—: "Ama huañuchinquichu; huanuchic runa cautsayachi tucunca".

Ranti, ñuca cancunata nini: Shuccunata yanca piñac runa, cautsayachi tucunca. Maicanpash shucta asishpa paita "Upa" nicpi, tucui taripac bula paita taripanunca. Maicanpash shucta piñashpa paita "millai" nicpi, ucupachapi urmanalla tucunca.
Can, canpac camarita Diosman apashpa rishpa, shuc runahuan imatapash charishcata yuyarishpa,
camarita chaillapita saquishpa, paihuan allichinqui; chai huasha camarita Diosman ricuchina ushanqui.

Can shuc runahuan ima llaquitapash charishpa, utcalla paihuan allichinqui, chaira apupacman mana pactashpallata. Mana chashna ruracpica, apu canta polisia nishcaman cunca, polisiaca chunta curralpi canta huichcanca.
Chaimanta mana llucshinqui can dibishcata illacta paganacama.
"Ama juchallinquichu" ñaupacunaman rimanurca —chaita alli yachanquichic.
Ñuca cancunata nini: Maicanpash shuc huarmita mana alli yuyaihuan ricushpa, paipac shuncupi ña juchallirca chai huarmihuan.
Chairaicu, canpac ñahui canta juchallichicpi, chaita surcushpa jichunqui. Canpac aichamanta shuc aichashitu chincaricpi yalli alli canca ama tucui aicha ucupachaman shitai tucuncapac.
Canpac maqui canta juchallichicpi, pitishpa jichunqui. Canpac aichamanta shuc aichashitu chincaricpi yalli alli canca ama tucui aicha ucupachapi shitai tucuncapac.
Ñaupacunaman caitapash rimanuica: "Shuc runa paipac huarmita jichusha nishpa, maqui llushpichina quillcata paiman cuna can".

Ranti, ñuca cancunata nini: Maicanpash paipac huarmita jichushpa, —mana yanca llutarishca cacpi—, paita juchallichin, chai runaca jatun juchata ran; chai huarmihuan casarac runapash jatun juchata aparin,
Chashnallata, ñaupacunaman rimanurca nishpa: "Ama llullashpa Diospac shutita rimanquichu; Diospac shutita rimashpai paiman cusha nishcata pactachina can".
Ñucaca cancunata nini: Ama imura jurashpa rimanquichichu; mana jahua pacha shutipi, jahua pacha Diospac tiyarina mari can
Mana cai pacha shutipi, cai pacha Diospac chaqui samanami can; mana Jerusalen shutipi, Jerusalen jatun Apupac llacta mari can.
Ama canpac uma shutipi juraichu; canpac acchata yanayachincapac, yuracyachincapac mana ushanqui.
Cancuna rimacushpa, "ari" ninquichic "ari" nmana cacpi; "mana" ninquichic "mana" rimana cacpi. Cancuna yapashca manallimanta shamun.
Caitapash quillcara tiyan —ña yachanquichic—: "Maicanpash canpac ñahuita huacllichicpi, canpash paipac ñahuita huacllichinqui; pipash canpac quiruta paquicpi, canpash paipac quiruta paquinqui".
Ranti, ñuca cancunata nini: Manallicunata ama jarcaichichu. Shuc ñahuipi canta macanucpi, shuctapash ricuchinqui.
Canta apupacman pushanucpi canpac camisata quichuncapac, calsuntapash cunqui.
Maicanpash canta nicpi: "Caita apashpa ri chaicama", astalla caruman apashpa rinqui.
Maicanpash canta imatapash mañacpi, paiman cunqui, "mañachihuai" nishpa nicpi, ama mitsaichu.
Caitapash quillcara tiyan: "Canpac llactamanta caccunata llaquinqui, canta chicniccunata chicninqui".
Ranti, ñuca cancunata nini: Cancunata chicniccunata llaquinquichic, cancunata ñacachiccunamanta Diosta mañanquichic.
Chashna rashpa, cancunapacjahua pachapi tiyac Yayapac churicuna canquichic. Pai allicuna jahuapi, manallicuna jahuapipash intita llucshichin; allicuna jahuapi manallicuna jahuapipash tamiachin.
Cancunata llaquiccunallata llaquishpa, ¿imata cuyai tucunquichic? ¿Manachu chaillata manallicuna ranacun?
Cancunapac aillucunallata salurashpa, ¿ima allita ranquichic? Diosta mana ricsiccunapash chaita ranacun.
Allicuna caichic, cancunapac jahua pachapi tiyac Yaya alli cashca shina.
Dios rimashcata ama ruranquichichu runacuna ricuncapaclla. Chashna racpi, cancunapac jahua pachapi tiyac Yaya mana imata cuyanca.

Can imatapash cushpa shucta yanapancapac, ama caparichu nishpa: "Ñuca rashcata ricuichic"; chashna ranacun llullacamacuna tantarina huasicunapi, callecunapipash, runacunapacpi yupachai tucuncapac. Shuti cancunata nini: Cuyanata ña chasquinurca.
Can, ranti, imatapash shucta yanapancapac cucpi, manapi can rashcata yachachun;
can alli rashca pacalla saquirichun; canpac pacallapi ricuc Yaya canta cuyanca.

Cancuna Dios—huan rimarishpa, ama llullacamacuna shina raichichu. Paicuna shayarishpa, tucuicunapac ñaupacpi, tantarina huasicunapi, callecunapi Dios-huan rimac canacun, runacuna paicunata ricuncapac. Shuti cancunata nini: Cuyanata ña chasquinurca.
Can Dios-huan rimarishpa, huasi ucuman yaicunqui: puncuta huichcashpa, pacallapi tiyac canpac Yaya Dios—huan rimanqui. Pacallapi ricuc canpac Yaya Dios canta cuyancami.
Can Dios—huan rimarishpa, ama achca shimicunata rimanquichu; Diosta mana ricsiccuna achca yanca shimicunata rimanun "Dios uyahuancami" nishpa yuyarishpa.
Ama paicuna shina ruraichichu; Dios cancuna mutsushcata yachanmi, cancuna chaira mana mañacpi.

Chairaicu cashna rimanquichic: Ñucanchic jahua pachapi tiyac Yaya, tucuicuna canta ricsinuchun. Can Apu tucuncapac shamui. Canpac munai rurarichun cai allpapi jahua pachapi rurarishca shina. Ñucanchic mutsushca tantata cunan puncha ñucanchicman cui. Ñucanchic manalli rashcata perdonapai, ñucanchicpash shuccuna ñucanchicman manalli rashcata perdonanchic. Juchanayaipi urmancapac ñucanchicta ama saquichu; manallimanta ñucanchicta quishpichi.
Cancuna perdonacpi shuccuna cancunaman manalli rashcata, jahua pachapi tiyac Yayapash cancunata perdonanca;
ranti, cancuna shuccunata mana perdonacpi, cancunapac Yaya mana perdonancachu cancunapac juchacunata.
Cancuna sasina puncha, ama llullacamacuna shina raichichu; paicuna llaquirishcalla purinun, runacunaman paicuna sasirashcata ricuchincapac. Shuti cancunata nini: Cuyanata ña chasquinurca.
Can sasicushpa, canpac ñahuita maillanqui, asnac yacuhuan canpac acchata armarinqui,
can sasirashcata shuccuna ama yachancapac; pacalli tiyac canpac Yaya Dios yachancami, canta cuyancami.
Ama cai pacha imacunata tantachichichu; cai pachapi susu micun, tucui huacllirin; shuhuacuna huasipi yaicunun shuhuancapac.
Ashtahuan alli canca jahua pacha imacunata tantachina; chaipi susu mana micunchu: manaima huacllirin; mana shuhuanun.
Canpac imacuna tiyashcapi, chaillapita canpac yuyai tiyanca.
Canpac ñahuicuna achic shinami canpac aichapac; canpac ñahuicuna alli cacpi, tucui aicha punchayanca;
canpac ñahuicuna manalli cacpi, tucui aicha tutapi tiyanca. Can charishca achic tuta capi, ¿ima sami yana chai tuta canca?
Shuc runa ishcai patronta sirbina mana ushanchu; shucta llaquishpa, shucta chicninca; shucta uyashpa, shucta mana uyancachu. Diosta cullquitapash sirbinata mana ushanquichichu.
Chairaicu cancunata nini: Ama llaquirichichu "causancapac imata micushun, imata churarishun" nishpa. ¿Manachu causana micunamanta yalli balin? ¿Manachu aicha churanamanta yalli balin?
Pishcucunata ricuichic. Mana tarpunun, mana pallanun huasipi huacaichincapac; chashnapash, jahua pachapi tiyac Yaya paicunata caran. ¿Manachu cancuna pishcucunamanta yalli balinquichic?
¿Cancunamanta maican, imatapash rashpa, causaita unayachinca?
¿Churanamanta imaraicu llaquirinquichic? Sacha sisacunata ricuichic; mana llancanucpipash, mana ahuanucpipash, sumac huiñanun.
Shuti cancunata nini: Salomonpash, tucui laya churanacunata charishpa, mana sisacuna shina churaricchu carca.
Dios, mana unaichu causac sacha sisacunata chashna churachicpi, ¿manachu ashtahuan allita cancunahuan ruranca, ansalla inic runacuna?
Chairaicu, ama llaquirichicu: Imata micushun, imata upiashun, imata churarishun nishpa.
Diosta mana ricsiccuna chaicunamanta llaquirinun; cancunapac jahua pachapi tiyac Yaya Dios cancuna chai tucui mutsushcata yachanmi.
Chashna cacpi, ñaupacta Diosta mascaichic, pai rimashcata raichic; causancapac mutsushca mana pishiyancachu.
Caya punchatapash ama yuyaranquichichu; caya punchapash quiquin llaquicunata apamunca. Caran punchapac llaquicunahuan pacta can.
Shuccunata ama taripanquichichu: Diosca cancunata mana taripancachu.
Cancuna shuccunata taripashca shinallata, Dios cancunata taripanca.
¿Imaraicu canpac huauquipac ñahui ucupi tiya mapashituta ricunqui, canpac quiquin ñahui ucupi tiyac caspita mana ricushpa?
Shuc caspita charishpa canpac ñahui ucupi, ¿imaraicu canpac huauquita ninqui: "Huauqui, canpac ñahuipi tiyac mapashituta anchuchihuapai"?
Llullacama runa: ñaupacta canpac ñahuimanta caspita surcunqui; chai huasha canpac huauquipac ñahuimanta mapashituta surcuncapac allimi ricunqui.

Sumac cashcacunata ama allcucunaman cunquichichu; allcucuna piñarishpa shitarishpa, cancunata chucrichinunman. Perla nishca muyucunata ama cuchicunaman shitanquichichu; cuchicuna chaicunata jaitanunman.
Cancuna mañacpi, Dios cuncami; cancuna mascashpa tupanquichic; huasi puncuta tacacpi, pascanuncami.
Tucui mañac chasquin; mascac tupan; puncuta tacac runaman pascanunca.
¿Cancunamanta maican runa paipac churi "tantata carahuai" nishpa nicpi, rumita cunca?
¿"Yacu aichata carahuai" nishpa mañacpi, machacuita cuncachu?
Cancuna, manalli cashpallata, cancunapac churicunaman allicunata cuyanata yachanquichic; ¿manachu cancunapac jahua pachapi tiyac Yaya allicunata cunca paita mañaccunaman?
Chashna cacpi, tucui cancuna munashcata shuccuna cancunahuan rancapac, chaillatata ranquichic paicunahuan. Chaitami rurai nin Moisespac camachic quillca, profetacuna nishca quillcapash.
Quichqui puncuta yaicuichic. Jatun puncuta yaicushpa, jatun ñanpita rishpa, chincarinaman rinqui; chaita achca runa purinun;
ranti, causanaman rincapac, quichqui puncuta yaicunami; uchilla ñanpita rinami; chai puncuta, chai ñanpita ansa runacuna tarinun.
"Diospacmanta rimani" nishpa rimac llullacamacunata yuyanquichic. Paicuna jahuata ricurishpa, allicuna shina ricurinun; ranti paicunapac shuncu manalli can.
Paicuna rashcamanta paicunata ricsinquichic. Chinimanta ubillasta mana pallanchichu, capironamanta naranjata mana pallanchichu.
Alli yura alli muyucunata aparin; mana balic yura mana balic muyucunata aparin.
Alli yura mana balic muyucunata mana aparinchu; chashnallata, mana balic yura alli muyucunata mana aparinchu.
Mana balic muyucunata aparic yura cuchui tucunca rupachincapac.
Chashna cacpi, shuc runa alli cashcata yachancapac, pai rashcacunata ricunquichic.
Manapi "Apunchic, Apunchic" nishcamanta jahua pachaman yaicuncachu: ñuca Yaya Dios munashcata pactachic runa, paimi jahua pachaman yaicuna.

Chai punchapi achca runa ñucata rimanunca nishpa: "Apunchic, Apunchic, ¿manachu canpac shutipi yachachircanchic, canpac shutipi supaicunata jichurcanchic, canpac shutipi achca mana raipaccunata rarcanchic?".
Ñuca paicunata rimasha: "Mana imurapi cancunata ricsircanichu; ñucamanta anchurichic, manallita ruraccuna".
Ñuca cunan rimashca shimicunata pactachic shuc yuyayuc runa shinami, rumi jahuapi huasita shayachic.
Sinchi tamia shamurca, yacucuna juntarinurca, sinchita huairarca huasita cuyuchishpa; chashnapash, huasi mana tularishcachu, rumi jahuapi shayachishca cacpi.
Ranti, ñuca cunan rimashca shimicunata uyashpa mana pactachic, shuc yuyai illac runa shinami, tiyu jahuapi shayachic.
Tamia shamurca, yacucuna juntarinurca, sinchi huaira huasita cuyuchishpa urmachirca; chai huasi chincarirca.
Jesus rimanata tucuchishcapi, runacuna pai yacha chishcamanta mancharinurca;
pai yachachina shuc laya mari carca, ushaihuan yachachicurca, mana judio yachaccuna shina.
Jesus urcumanta uraicushcapi, achca runacuna paita catinurca.
Shuc sisu runa shamushpa, Jesuspac ñaupacpi cuncurirca, cashna nishpa: —Apulla, can munashpa, ñucata alliyachinata ushanqui
Rimacpi, Jesus maquihuan paita llancarca nishpa: —Munanimi, alliyashca saquiri. Chai ucu, sisu runa alliyashca saquirirca.
Jesus paita nirca: —Uyai, ama pitapash rimaichu; pacricunapacman rishpa, Moises rimashca camarita cunqui, tucuicuna yachancapac can ña alliyachi tucushcata.
Jesus Cafarnaun llactaman yaicucpi, shuc suldaru apu shamushpa, Jesusta mañarca nishpa:
—Apulla, ñucata sirbic runa huasipi sirin, mana puric ushan; yapa ñacarin nanaihuan.
Rimacpi uyashpa Jesus nirca: —Paita janpicrisha.
Suldaru apu chaita uyashpa nirca: —Apulla, ñuca mana balicchu cani can ñuca huasipi yaicuncapac. Rimailla, ñucata sirbic runa alliyancami.
Ñucaca, shuccunata sirbic runa cashpa, suldarucunapac apu cani. Shucta "ri" nicpi, pai rinmi. Shucta "shamui" nicpi, pai shamunmi. Ñucata sirbic runata "caita rurai" nicpi, pai ruranmi.
Chaita uyashpa, Jesus mancharirca; paita caticcunata nirca: —Shuti cancunata nini: Israel llactacunapi cai runa shina inishcata mana tuparcanichu.
Achca runacuna shamununca Abraanhuan, Isaac—huan, Jacobhuan pacta mesaman tiyarishpa jahua pachapi micuncapac.
Ranti, jahua pachapi yaicuna caccuna canchaman, tuta ucuman shitashcami canunca; chaipi huacanunca, ñacarinunca.
Huasha, Jesus suldaru aputa nirca: —Canpac huasiman ri, can inishca shina tucuchun. Chai ucu chai sirbic runa alliyashcami.
Chaimanta, Jesus Pedropac huasiman rirca; Pedropac huarmi mama uncushpa siricurca.
Jesus paipac maquita llancacpi, uncui samarirca; huarmi shayarishpa, paicunata sirbincapac callarirca.
Tutayacucpi, achca jirus supai japishca runacunata Jesuspacman pushamunurca; shuc shimillahuan supaicunata callpachirca, tucui uncuccunata alliyachirca.
Chashna tucurca Isaias profeta ñaupa uras rimashca pactarincapac; cashna mari quillcara tiyarca: Pai ñucanchic uncuicunata japirca, ñucanchic nanaicunata aparca.
Jesus achca runa pai muyucta tantaricpi ricushpa nirca: —Chinpaman jacuichic.
Rimacpi, shuc camachic quillcata yachac shamushpa, Jesusta nirca: —Yachachic, maimanpash can ricpi, canta catina munani.
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Chajacuna puñuna jutcuta charinun, pishcucunapash huasita charinun; ranti, cai RUNA maipi puñunata mana charinchu.
Shuc Jesus yachachishca runapash paita nirca: —Apulla, ñaupacta ñuca yayata panpachihuapai.
Jesu cutipashpa nirca: —Catihuai. Ñucata mana quiriccuna huañushcacunata panpanuchun.
Chai huasha, Jesus canuapi yaicurca; yachachishcacunapash paihuan yaicunurca.
Cuncaimanta cuchapi sinchi huaira jatarirca; yacu piñaricpi, bacucuna canuata ñalla panpanurca. Jesus puñucurca.
Yachachishcacuna Jesusta licchachishpa ninurca: —Apulla, ñucanchicta quishpichipai. Panpariranchicmi.
Jesus liccharishpa nirca: —¿Imaraicu mancharinquichic? Ansashitulla ininquichic. Jatarishpaca, yacuta huairatapash piñashpa rimarca; rimacpi tucui casilla saquirirca.
Runacuna mancharishpa ninurca: —¡Mana pacha! ¿Ima laya runa can cai? uairapash yacupash paita uyanun.

Jesus chinpaman pactashcapi, Gadara nishca llactamanta ishcai runa aya jutcucunamanta llucshishpa, Jesuspacman shamunuica. Chai runacunata millai supai japishca carca; chaita purincapac manapi usharca.
Jesusta ricushpa, caparinurca ñishpa: —¿Imapac ñucanchihuan satirinqui, Diospac Churi Jesus? ¿Ñucanchicta ñacachincapacchu shamunqui, pacha manara pactarishcapi?
Chainiman achca cuchi micucunurca;
supaicuna Jesusta mañanurca nishpa: —Runacunamanta ñucanchicta llucshichishpa, ñucanchicta chai cuchicunapi yaicuchipai.

Chashna rimanucpi, Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Allimi, yaicuichiclla. Chashna nicpi uyashpa, chai millai supaicuna runacunamanta llucshishpa, cuchicunapi yaicunurca; yaicunucpi, cuchicuna shuc huaicuta cuchaman urmanurca; yacupi chucallishpa huañunurca.
Cuchi ricuccuna, chaita ricushpa, mancharishpa, callpashpa rinurca; llactaman pactashpa, chai tucuita huillanurca; supai japishca runacunaman tucushcatapash rimanurca.
Llacta runacuna, chaita uyashpa, Jesus tiyashcaman rinurca; paita ricushpa, mañanurca nishpa: —Sucanchic allpamanta llucshipai.
Rimanucpi uyashpa, Jesus canuapi yaicushpa, cuchata chinpashpa, paipac quiquin llactaman pactarca.
Pactacpi, shuc suchu runata cahuitupi sirishcata Jesuspacman pushanurca. Jesus, uncushcata huantuccuna inishcata ricushpa, suchu runata nirca: —Churi, cariyanqui; canpac juchacuna pichashca canun.
Rimacpi, huaquin camachic quillcata yachaccuna uyashpa, shuncupi yuyanurcanishpa: —Cai runa Diosta camicun pai rimashcahuan.
Jesus, paicuna shuncupi yuyashcata yachashpa nirca:
—¿Imaraicu manallita yuyacunquichic shuncu ucupi? ¿Imata ashtahuan rimanalla can: "Canpac juchacuna pichai tucunun" nishpa rimanachu? ¿''Jatari, canpac huasiman ri" nishpa rimanachu?
¿Manachu cutipahuanquichic? Ñuca cai pachapi juchacunata pichana ushashcata ricuchinca rani. Huasha suchu runata nirca: —Jatari, canpac cahuituta apashpa huasiman ri.
Rimacpi, suchu runa jatarishpa, huasiman rirca.
Runacuna, chaita ricushpa, mancharinurca; mancharishpa, Diosta chacchanurca, chashna ushanata runaman cushcaraicu.

Jesus chaimanta rishpa, Mateo shutiyuc runata ricurca; chai runa gubirnu cullquita pallac cashpa, gubimu huasipi tiyarca. Jesus paita ricushpa nirca: —Ñucahuan shamui. Mateo, jatarishpa, Jesusta catirca.
Chai huasha, shuc puncha, Jesus Mateo huasipi micucucpi, achca gubirnu cullquita pallaccuna juchayuccunapash Jesus-huan pai yachachishcacunantin micuncapac shamunurca.
Fariseocuna, chaita ricushpa, Jesus yachachishcacunata ninurca: —Imaraicu cancunata yachachic gubirnu cullquita pallacu nahuan, juchayuccunahuanpash micuc can?
Jesus chaita uyashpa nirca: —Alli causaccuna janpicamata mana mutsunun; uncushcacuna janpicamata mutsunun.
Quillcapi quillcarata atipaichic: Huañuchishca huacracunamanta yalli llaquic shuncuta munani. Allicunata mascancapac mana shamurcanichu; manallicu nata mascancapac shamurcani.
Shuc puncha, Bautisac Juanta caticcuna, Jesus-huan tuparishpa, tapunurca cashna nishpa: —¿Imaraicu ñucanchihuan fariseocunahuan achca cuti sasinchic, canpaccunaca mana sasicchu canacun?
Tapunucpi, Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —¿Buraman cayashcacuna sasicchu canun, cari paicunahuan tiyacucpi? Mana. Shuc puncha cari pushai tucunca; chai huasha sasinunca.
Manapi rucu churanata mushu churana pitihuan llachapanchu; chashna ranucpi, mushu churana curuyacpi, rucu churanata aisashpa, ashtahuan lliquichinca.

Chashnallata, manapi mushu binota rucu cara purupi churan; chashna ranucpi, cara puru tucyacpi, bino tallirinca, cara puru huacllirinca. Chairaicu, mushu bino mushu cara purupi huacaichina can, ama huacllirincapac.
Jesus chashna rimacucpi, shuc judiocunapac apu shamushpa, Jesuspac ñaupacpi tuhuaman urmashpa, nirca: —Ñuca ushushi cunanshitu huañurca; can rishpa maquita paipacjahuapichuracpi, causarincami.
Rimacpi, Jesus shayarishpa, chai runahuan rirca; Jesus yachachishcacunapash rinurca.
Riranucpi, shuc uncushca huarmi shamurca: chunca ishcai huatata yahuar tallirishpa causarca; chai huarmi Jesusman huashamanta mayanyashpa, paipac churanata llancarca,
shuncu ucupi yuyarishpa: —Paipac churanata llancashpallahuan alliyashami.
Llancacpi, Jesus ticrarishpa, huarmita ricushpa nirca: —Ama manchaichu; can inishcamanta alliyachi tucushcanqui. Chai ucu huarmi alliyarca.
Jesus, apu huasiman pactashpa, pinculluccunata ricushpa, runacuna caparishcahuan huacacunucpi uyashpa, paicunata nirca:
—Llucshichic caimanta; huahua mana huañushcachu, puñuranlla. Chaita uyashpa, runacuna Jesusta asinurca.
Jesus, runacunata llucshichishpa, huahua tiyashcaman yaicurca; maquimanta paita japicpi, huahua jatarirca,
Tucui chai suyuta Jesus rashcata rimanurca.
Jesus chaimanta llucshicpi, ishcai ñausa runa paita catinurca, cashna nishpa: —Davidpac churi, ñucanchicmanta llaquiripai.
Jesus, huasiman yaicushpa, ñausacunapash catishpa yaicunucpi, paicunata tapushpa nirca: —¿Ñuca cancunata janpina ushashcata ininquichichu? —Ari, Apulla-ninurca.
Rimanucpi uyashpa, Jesus paicunapac ñahuicunata llancashpa, nirca: —Cancuna inishca shina tucuchun.
Chai ucullapi, paicunapac ñahuicuna alliyachi tucunurca. Jesus paicunata nirca: —Yuyanquchic; manapi ñuca rashcata yachachun.
Paicuna rishpaca, Jesus rashcata tucui chai llactacunapi rimanurca.
Ñausacuna rishca huashalla, shuc runacuna shuc upa shimi runata Jesuspacman pushanurca; chai upa shimi runata supai japishca carca.
Jesus supaita chai runamanta jichucpi, runa rimancapac callarirca. Chaita ricuccuna mancharishpa ninurca: —¡Mana pacha! Chashna rashcata Israel llactacunapi mana imura ricurcanchic.
Ranti, fariseocuna ninurca: —Cai runa supaimanta japishca ushaihuan supaicunata jichun.
Jesus tucui llactacunata puric carca, tantarina huasicunapi yachachishpa. Diospac cushi shimita camachicurca, tucui laya uncuicunata nanaicunatapash alliyachishpa.
Achca runacunata ricushpa, paicunamanta llaquirirca, sanpayashca canurca mari, jichushca shina, michic illac obejacuna shina.
Jesus pai yachachishcacunata nirca: —Pallana chacra achcami, pallaccuna ansallami.
Chacra amuta mañaichic pallaccunata paipac pallana chacraman cachachun nishpa.
Shuc puncha, Jesus yachachishcacunata cayashpa, supaicunata jichuna ushanata paicunaman curca; chashnallata, tucui laya uncuita, tucui laya nanaita janpina ushanata paicunaman curca.
Caicunami chunca ishcai apostolcunapac shuticuna: Ñaupac Simon (huasha "Pedro" shutichishca) paipac huauqui Andres; Cebedeopac churi Santiago paipac huauqui Juanpash;
Felipe, Bartolome, Tomas, Mateo (gubirnu cullquita pallac), Alfeopac churi Santiago, Tadeo, cananeo nishca Simon,
Judas Iscariote, Jesusta japichic runa.
Jesus chai chunca ishcaita cacharca cashna nishpa: —Aucacunapacman ama rinquichichu; Samaria llactacunaman ama yaicunquichichu.
Israelmanta chincarishca obeja cunapacman rinquichic.
Paicunapacman pactashpa, cashna rimanquichic: "Diospac pacha mayanllami".
Uncushcacunata janpinquichic, huañushcacunata causarichinquichic, sisu runacunata alliyachinquichic, supaicunata jichunquichic; chashna rana ushanata yanca chasquircanquichic, yancapash cunquichic.
Curita, cullquita, malata ama apaichichu.
Shuc camisallata apanquichic, ushutata tahunatapash ama apanquichichu. Llancac runaman pai llancashcamanta cunata cuna can.
Shuc llactaman pactashpa, shuc alli shuncu runata mascanquichic, paipac huasipi saquirincapac llactamanta llucshinacama.
Huasiman yaicushpa, saluranquichic "ganaslla causaichic" nishpa.
Huasipi tiyaccuna baliccuna canucpi, cancuna mañashca ganas causai chaillapi saquirichun; mana baliccuna canucpi, cancunamanllata ticrachun.
Cancunata mana chasquinucpi, mana uyanucpi, chai huasimanta chai llactamantapash llucshishpa, chaquimanta allpata chausinquichic.
Shuti cancunata nini: Chashna runacuna Sodomapi Gomorrapi causashcacunamanta yalli sinchi ñacachi tucununca.
Uyahuaichic: Cancunata obejacuna shina pumacuna ucupi cachani. Machacui shina yuyayuc caichic, urpicuna shina alli shuncuyuc caichic.
Yuyanquichic: Runacuna cancunata japishpa, apucunapacman pushanunca; tantarina huasicunapi cancunata llipachinunca.
Jatun apucuna ñau pacman ñucaraicu pushai tucunquichic; chaipi paicunaman mana judio caccunamanpash ñucamanta rimanquichic.
Cancuna apucunaman cui tucushpa, ama llaquirinquichichu imata rimashun nishpa, imashnata rimashun nishpa; chai pacha pactamucpi, Dios cancunata yanapanca rimana ushancapac.
Mana cancunachu rimanquichic, Dios Yayapac samai cancunapac shimihuan rimanca.
Shuc runa paipac quiquin huauquicunata japichinca huañuchinuchun nishpa; yayacuna paicunapac churicunata japichinunca; churicuna yayacunata chicnishpa jatarinunca, paicunata huañuchinuchun nishpa.
Tucui runacuna cancunata chicninunca ñucaraicu; mana sanpayashpa ñucata catic runa quishpichi tucunca.
Shuc llactapi cancunata chicnishpa ñacachinucpi shuc llactaman miticunquichic; shuti pacha cancunata nini: Cancuna tucui Israel llactacunata chaira mana purishcapi, cai RUNA shamunca.
Shuc yachachishca runa paita yachachicmanta yalli balic mana tiyanchu; shuc sirbic runa paipac amumanta yalli balic mana tiyanchu.
Shuc yachachishca runa paita yachachie shina tucucpi, alli can; shuc sirbic runa paipac amu shina tucucpi, alli can. Huasi amuta "Belcebu" nishpa ninucpi, ¿paipac aillucunamanta imata ninunca?.
Chashna cacpi, runacunata ama manchanquichichu. Imapash pacashca cashpa, pacllaman llucshichishca canca; pacalla rimashca yachai tucunca.
Ñuca cancunaman tutapi rimashcata punchapi huillanquichic; ñuca pacalla cancunaman rimashcata huasi jahuamanta caparinquichic.
Aichata huañuchiccunata ama manchanquichichu; almata huañuchincapac mana ushanun. Almata aichantin ucupachapi tucuchina ushacta manchana canquichic.
¿Manachu ishcai pishcucunata ansa cullquipi catunun? Chashna cacpipash, chaicunamanta shucllapash allpaman mana urman, cancunapac Yaya mana munacpi.
Cancunapac uma acchacunapash yupashca canun.
Chashna cacpi, ama mancharinquichichu; cancuna achca pishcucunamanta yalli balinquichic.
Maicanpash allita rimacpi ñucamañta runacuna ñaupacpi, ñucapash paimanta allita rimasha ñuca jahua pachapi tiyac Yaya ñaupacpi.
Ranti maicanpash ñucamanta rimashpa "paita mana ricsinichu" nishpa rimacpi runacuna ñaupacpi, ñucapash "paita mana ricsinichu" ñishpa rimasha ñuca jahua pachapi tiyac Yaya ñaupacpi.
Ama yuyaichichu ñuca cai pachaman ganas causanata apamuncapac shamushcata; mana shamurcanichu ganas causanata apamuncapac; piñanacunata apamurcani.
Ñuca shamurcani piñanacuna tiyanuchun nishpa churi paipac yayahuan, ushushi paipac mamahuan, cachun paipac cari mamahuan.
Caran runa quiquin aillucunapi chicni tucunca.
Maicanpash yayata mamata ñucamanta yalli llaquishpa, ñucata cati cancapac mana balicchu can. Maicanpash churi ta ushushita ñucamanta yalli llaquishpa, ñucata catic cancapac mana balinchu.
Maicanpash quiquinpac crusta mana aparishpa, ñucataca mana catishpa, ñucata catic cancapac mana balin chu.
Causaita taric runa chaita chincachincami; ranti, quinquipac causaita chincachic ñucaraicu, causaita tarinca.
Cancunata chasquic runa ñucata chasquin; ñucata chasquicca ñucata cachashcata chasquin.
Profetata chasquic runa profeta cashcaraicu, profeta shina cuyai tucunca; alli runata chasquic alli cashcaraicu, alli runa shina cuyai tucunca.
Maicanpash shuc cai huahuacunaman chiri yacuta upiachicpi, pai ñucata catic cashcaraicu, shuti pacha nini: Chai runa allita cuyai tucunca.
Jesus, paipac chunca ishcai runacunata yachachishca huasha, chaimanta rirca shuc liactacunapi yachachincapac, camachincapac.
Juan, chunta curraipi huichcara cashpa, Jesucristo rashcacunata uyashpa, ishcai yachachishcacunata Jesuspacman cacharca tapuncapac, cashna nishpa:
—¿Can shamuna cacchu canqui, shuctachu chapana canchi?
Jesus paicunata cutipashpa nirca: —Juanpacman ticraichic; cancuna ricushcata uyashcatapash huillanquichic:
Ñahui illaccuna ricunun, jancacuna purinun, sisu runacuna pichashcami canun, upa rinricuna uyanun, huañushcacuna causarinun, cushi shimi imapash illac runacunaman rimashcami can.
Cushiyucmi ñucahuan tuparic runa ñucamanta mana piñarishpa anchuricpi.
Juan yachachishcacuna rishca huasha, Jesus paimanta rimancapac callarirca nishpa: —¿Imata ricuncapac chunlla allpaman rircanquichic? ¿Huairahuan cuyurishca pintutachu ricuncapac?
¿Sumac churanata churarishca runatachu ricuncapac? Sumac churanata churarishcacuna cullquiyuccunapac huasicunapi tiyanun.
¿Imata ricuncapac rircanquichic? ¿Shuc profetachu? Ari, Juan tucui profetacunata yallinmi.
Paimanta mari quillcapi quillcashca tiyan: Riqui, ñuca shimita apac runata cachacuni, canta ñaupashpa ñanpita ailichincapac.
Shuti cancunata nini: Bautisac Juan tucui cunan punchacama causashca runacunamanta yallimi can. Chashna cacpipash, Diospac pachapi mai uchilla cac runa paimanta yalli jatunmi.
Bautisac Juan shamushca punchamanta cai pachacama, Diospac pacha cariyashpa ñaupacman rin; chaipi yaicunata munaccuna sinchi maquita rashpa yaicunun."
Tucui profetacuna camachic quillcapash chai pachamanta huillanurca Juan shamushca punchacama;
Juanmi shamuna cac profeta Elias; munashpa inichic.
Yuyayuc runa yuyachun.
Huasha Jesus nirca: —¿Imata rimasha curian causaccunamanta? ¿Ima shina canun? Huahuacuna shina canun pulasacunapi pucllancapac tiyarishpa, ñahuipura tiyaecuriamari capannun, cashna nishpa:
"Piricullurcanchic, cancunaca mana tushurcariquichic; llaquilla taquircanchic, cancunaca mana huacarcahquichic". Chaita cairaicu rimani:
Bautisac Juan mana micushpa, mana upiashpa causarca; cancunaca "jirus supaita charin" nishpa ninquichic:

Paipac huasha cai RUNA shamurca; pai micuc can, upiac can; cancunaca paimanta rimashpa ninquichic: "Cai runa micuisiqui, upiasiqui can; manallita ruraccunahuan gubirnu cullquita pallacunahuan llaquicpura can. Ranti, Dios "chashna tucuchun" nishpa, yachac shina rarca.
Chashna rimashca huasha, Jesus huaquin llactacunata piñarca, paicuna Diosman mana ticrashcaraicu, achca mana raipaccunata ricushpallata.

Cashna nirca: —Corozain llacta, Betsaida llacta, cancunapac manchaipae canca. Ñuca, cancunapacpi rashcacunata Sidon llactapi, Tiro llactapi ranushcapi, unaimanta pacha chai llactacunapi tiyaccuna Diosman ticranunman carca; chaita ricuchincapac, tsuntsu churanata churarinunman carca, ushpatapash umapi churanunman carca.
Chairaicu cancunata nini: Taripana puncha cancuna Tiro llactamanta, Sidon llactamanta yalli sinchi ñacachi tucunquichic.
¿Canca, Cafarnaun llacta, puyucunacama jatachi tucusha yuyanquichu? Ucupachacama urayachi tucunqui. Ñuca canpacpi rashcacunata Sodoma llactapi ranushcapi, cunancama chai llacta tiyanman carca.
Chairaicu nini: Taripana puncha cancuna Sodoma llactapi causaccuna manta yalli sinchi ñacachi tucunquichic.
Shuc puncha, Jesus Dios—huan rimarishpa nirca: —Canta pacrachuni, Yaya, cai pachapac jahua pachapacpash amu; yachaccunaman cai tucuita pacarcanqui, mana yachac ranacunaman ricsichircanqui.
Ari, Yayallap chashnami munarcanqui.
Ñuca Yaya tucuita ñuca maquipi churarca; manapi Diospac Churita ricsin, Yayalla paita ricsin; chashnallata, manapi Yayata ricsin, Churilla paita ricsin. Churi munashcapash Dios Yayata ricsin.
Ñucaman shamuichic, sanpayashcacuna, llaquirishcacuna: ñuca cancunata samachishami.
Ñuca yachachishcata aparichic, ñucata catichic, ñuca casi shuncuyuc, llaqui shuncuyuc cani; cancunaca ganas causanata ñucapi tupanquichic.
Ñuca yachachishca aparipac cañ, pancalla can.
Shuc samana puncha, Jesus shuc tarpushca ucuta puricurca; paihuan puriccuna, yarcashpa, trigo huancucunata aisashpa, muyucunata micucunurca.
Fariseocuna, chaita ricushpa, Jesusta ninurca: —Riqui, can yachachishcacuna samana punchapi mana ranatarañacun.
Rimanucpi uyashpa Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —¿Manachu David rashcata liircanquichic, pai paihuan tiyaccunantin yarcashcapi?
Diospac huasiman yaicushpa, camari tantacunata micunurca; chai laya tantata manapi micunata ushan, pacricunalla mieunun.
Moisespac camachic quillcapi ¿manachu liircanquichic pacricuna Diospac huasipi samana punchapipash llancashcata?; chashna rashpa, juchata mana ranacun.
Ñuca Diospac huasimanta yalli balicmi cani.

Cancuna mana atiparcanquichic quilica ricuchishcata, cashna nicpi: Shuccunamanta llaquirichic; chaitami munani. Huacra camaricunata mana munanichu. Cancuna chaita atipashpa, jucha illaccunata mana cautsayachinquichicman.
Cai RUNA samana punchapac amumi can.
Chaimanta rishpa, Jesus tantarina huasipi yaicurca.
Chaipi shuc huacllishca maquiyuc runa tiyarca; fariseocuna "imata rashpa Jesusta cautsayachishun" nishpa paita tapunuxca: —¿Samana punchapi shuc uncuc runata alliyachina balinchu?
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Cancuna shuc huihuata charishpa, chai huihua samana puncha shuc jutcupi urmacpi, ¿manachu surcunquichic?
Runa huihuamanta yalli balicmi. Chashna cacpi, samana puncha allita rurana usharin.
Chai huasha, huacllishca maquiyucta nirca: —Canpac maquita chutachi. Chutachicpi, huacllishca maqui chai shuc maqui shina alliyashca saquirirca.
Fariseocuna, chaimanta llucshishpa, paicunapura rimarinurca imashnata Jesusta huañuchishun nishpa.
Chaita yachashpa, Jesus chaimanta rirca; achca runa paita catinurca. Jesus tucui laya uncushcacunata alliyachirca;
paicunata alliyachishpa nirca: —Ama imatapash ñucamanta huillanquichichu.
Chashna tucurca profeta Isaias ñaupa quillcashca pactarincapac; cashna mari quillcashca carca:
Caimi ñucata sirbic runa, ñuca acllashca. Paita llaquini, paipi cushiyani. Ñuca samaita paipac jahuapi churasha. Pai tucui runacunata allita rashpa causancapac yachachinca.
Shuccunahuan piñashpa mana rimancachu; paipac shimita callecunapi mana uyachincachu.
Paquirinalla pintuta mana paquincachu; huañucuc chinpusuta mana huañuchiccachu, tucui pachapi paipac shimita uyachinacama.
Tucui llactacuna paita chapashpa causanunca.
Shuc puncha, shuc supai japishca runata Jesuspacman pushanurca; chai runa mana ricuc, mana rimac carca. Jesus paita alliyachicpi, chai runa ricuncapac, rimancapac callarirca.
Chaita ricushpa, tucui runacuna mancharinurca nishpa: —Davidpac churichu cai runa?
Ranti, fariseocuna chaita uyashpa ninurca: —Cai runa Belcebu nishca supaicuna apupac shutihuan supaicunatajichun.
Jesus, paicuna yuyacushcata yachashpa, nirca: —Shuc llactapi causaccuna chican chican chaupiricpi, chai llacta tucurincami. Shuc huasipi causac aillucuna, paicunapura piñanacushpa, tucurinuncami.
Chashanallata, supai apu, supaicunata jichushpa, pai quiquinllata chicnin; quiquinllata chicnicpi, paipac ushai tucurincami.
Cancuna ninquichic: "Can supai apupac ushaihuan supaicunatajiehunqui". Chashna cacpi, ¿cancunata caticcuna pipac ushaihuan supaicunata jichunun? Paicuna rurashcahuan cancuna pantashcata ricuchinun.
Ñucaca Dios Samaipac ushaihuan supaicunata jichuni; chashna rashcahuan Diospac pacha cancunaman ña pactamushcata ricuchini.
¿Maican shuc sinchi runapac huasiman yaicunca shuhuancapac, ñaupacta paita mana huatashpa? Paita huatashca huasha, shuhuanata ushanca.
Maicanpash ñucahuan mana tiyashpa, ñucata chicnin; ñucahuan mana pallac runa chausichin.
Chashna cacpi, cancunata nini: Tucui laya juchacunata, tucui jirus shimicunata runacunaman pichana usharin; ranti maicanpash Santo Samaita piñashpa rimacpi, mana usharin perdonai tucuncapac.
Chashnallata, maicanpash cai RUNATA piñashpa rimacpi, perdonai tucunca; ranti, Santo Samaita piñashpa rimac runa mana perdonai tucunca cai pachapi shamuna pachapipash.
Caitapash nirca Jesus: —Alli yura alli muyucunata aparin; mana balic yura mana balic muyucunata aparin; shuc yura paipac muyumanta ricsirin.
Machacui miraicuna, ¿cancuna manallicuna cashpa, imashna allita rimana ushanquichic? Runa shuncupi charishcata riman mari.
Alli runa allita riman paipac shuncu alli cashcaraicu; manalli runa manallita riman, paipac shuncu manalli cashcaraicu.
Taripana punchapica, runa yanca rimash camanta taripai tucunca.
Can rimashcacunamanta jucha illacmi tucunqui; can rimashcacunamanta cautsayachi tucunqui.
Shuc puncha, huaquin fariseocunahuan quillcata yachaccunahuan Jesusta ninurca: —Yachachiccama, shuc mana raipacta rurapai ñucanchic ricuncapac.
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Cai manalli runacuna, Diosta mana uyac runacuna shuc mana raipacta ricuna munanun; shuc mana raipacta mana ricununcachu; profeta Jonas—huan tucuscata yuyarichisha.
Jonas quimsa puncha tutantin chai jatun yacu aicha ucupi tiyashca shina, chashnallata cai RUNA quimsa puncha tutantin allpa ucupi tiyancami.
Ninive llactapi tiyashcacuna cunan causaccunata cautsayachinunca taripana puncha; paicuna Diosman ticranurca mari, Jonas huillashcata uyashpa: cancunapacpica shuc Jonasmanta yalli balic tiyanmi.
Sur nishcamanta jatun apu huarmi cunan causaccunata cautsayachinca; pai carumanta shamurca mari Salomon yachashcata uyancapac; cancunapacpica shuc Salomonmanta yalli balic tiyanmi.
Shuc millai supai shuc runa ucumanta llucshishpa, chunlla allpapi puricachan, samasha nishpa; maipi samanata mana tupashpa, paipac shuncupi nin: "Ñuca llucshishca runa ucuman ticrasha".
Chaiman ticrashpa, chai runata tarin chushac huasi shinata, allichishcata, pichashcata.

Chaita ricushpa, chaimanta rishpa, shuc canchis supaicunata pushamun, paimanta yalli millaicuna; tucuicunaca chai runapi causancapac yaicunun. Yaicunucpi, chai runa ashtahuan manalli saquirin. Chai layallata tucunca cai manalli runacunahuan.
Jesus chaira rimacucpi, paipac mamahuan, paipac huauquicunahuan shamunurca; huasi canchapi saquirinurca, "paihuan rimarinata munanchic" nishpa.
Shuc runa Jesusta nirca: —Uyai, canpac mama ailiucunantin canchapi tiyanun, canhuan rimarinata munanun.
Chaita rimashca runata nirca Jesus: —¿Pitac can ñuca mama?, ¿picuna canun ñuca huauquicuna?
Huasha, pai yachachishcacunata ricuchishpa nirca: —Caicunami ñuca mama, ñuca huauquicuna. Ñuca jahua pachapi tiyac Yaya munashcata pactachic runa paimi ñuca huauqui, ñuca pani, ñuca mama.
Jesus huasimanta llucshishpa, cucha pataman rishpa tiyarirca.
Achca runa tantaricpi, shuc canua ucuman yaicushpa, tiyarirca; runacunaca yacu patapi saquirinurca.
Unaita Jesus paicunata yachachirca cashna rimashpa: —Shuc runa chacraman tarpuncapac rirca.
Tarpucpi, hua quin muyucuna ñanpipi urmanurca. Pishcucuna shamushpa micunurca.
Huaquin muyucuna rumi panpapi urmanurca; mana achca allpa tiyashcapi; utcalla huiñarirca, allpa mana yapa ucuta cacpi.
Inti llucshicpi, huiñashca muyu ruparirca; sapi illac cashcaraicu chaquirirca.
Huaquin muyucuna huita ucupi urmanurca; huitaca alli. muyuta mana huiñachirca.
uaquin muyucuna alli allpapi urmanurca; sumac huiñarinurca, achcata aparinurca: huaquin muyumanta shuc patsac muyu llucshirca, huaquinmanta sucta chunca muyu, huaquinmanta quimsa chunca muyu.
Rinriyuc runa alli uyachun.
Rimacpi, yachachishcacuna Jesusm tapunurca nishpa: —¿Imaraicu runacunata chashna shimicunahuan yacha chinqui?
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Dios paipac pacashca shimita cancunaman ricuchin; ranti, shuccuna mana atipana ushanun.
Charic runa ashtahuan cui tucunca, ashtahuan charincapac; ranti, mana charicmanta pai charishcashituta quichununca.
Chairaicu, paicuhaman chai iaya shimicunahuan rimani; paicuna ricushpapash, mana ricushca shina saquirinun; uyancapac, uyanun; ranti, mana atipanun, mana uyashca shina saquirinun.
Chashna cacpi, profeta Isaias rimashca paicunapi pactarin; cashna rimashca carca: Cancuna shuti pacha uyanquichic; ranti, mana atipanquichic. Shuti pacha ricunquichic, ranti mana ricushca shina.

Cai runacunapac uma yapa sinchi tucurca; mana alli uyanun; ñahuicunata quillpashcata charinun, ama ñahuicunahuan ricuncapac, ama rinricunahuan uyancapac, ama yuyaihuan atipancapac, ama ñucaman ticrancapac "ñucanchicta janpipai" nishpa.
Ranti, cancuna cushiyucmi canquichic, cancuna uyanquichic mari, ricunquichic mari.
Shuti cancunata nini, achca profetacuna, achca alli runacuna cancuna ricurashcata ricunata munashpallata, mana ricunushcachu; cancuna uyarashcata uyanata munashpallata, mana uyanurcachu.
Huasha, Jesus nirca: —Uyahuaichic imata yachachin tarpucmanta rimashca:
Ñanpipi urmashca muyucuna Diospac shimita yanca uyacta ricuchinun; supai shamushpa, quichun chai runa shuncupi Dios tarpushcata.
Rumi allpapi tarpushca, shimita uyac runata, chaita cushihuan chasquic runata ricuchin:
mana sapiyuc tucushpa mana sinchicun; llaquicuna shamucpi Diospac shimiraicu, chai runa ininata saquin.

Huita ucupi urmashca muyu, shimita chasquic runami; chai runa cai pacha imacunapi, cai pacha cushicunapi shuncuta churan; chaicuna alli shimita huañuchinun; chai muyu alli huiñacpipash, mana aparinchu.

Alli allpapi tarpushca, shimita uyac, shimita chasquic runata ricuchin; chai shimi paipac shuncupi alli huiñan, sumac aparin; caran muyu shuc patsata aparin, huaquin muyu sucta chunca muyuta aparin; huaquin muyu quimsa chunca muyuta aparin.
Jesus shuctapash rimarca cashna nishpa: —Diospac pachapi shuc cullquiyuc runahuan tucushca shina tucun: Shuc runa alli trigo muyuta paipac chacrapi tarpuchirca.
Paipac runacuna puñucunucpi, shuc paita chicnic runa shamushpa, mana balic muyuta chaillapi shitashpa, rirca.
Trigo ña tuctucucpi, chai shuc mana balic quihuapash ricurirca.
Chaita ricushpa, sirbiccuna amuta huillacrinurca nishpa: —Amu, ¿manachu alli muyuta canpac chacrapi tarpuchircanqui? ¿Maimanta chai mana balic quihua huiñarca?
Amu nirca: —Ñucata chicnic runa chaita rarca. Sirbiccuna ninurca: —Can munacpi, chai quihuata surcucrishun.
Amu nirca: —Mana; quihuata pilashpa, trigotapash pilanquichicman.
Pucunacama saquichic; pallana pacha, yanca quihuata ñaupacta pallanquichic rupachincapac; huasha alli trigota pallanquichic, huasipi huacaichincapac.
Jesus shuctapash rimarca nishpa: —Diospac pacha shuc mostaza nishca muyu shinami.
Tarpushcapi, tucui muyumanta yalli uchilla can; huasha huiñan, tucui quihuamanta yalli jatun tucun, shuc yura shina tucun; huairapi huanpuric pishcucuna shamushpa, paipac pallcacunapi huasinun.
Cai shuctapash rimarca: —Diospac pacha levadura nishca shinami; shuc huarmi ansashituta japishpa, quimsa tupu harinahuan masan, tucui punquirinacama.
Chashna shimicunahuan Jesus runacunata yachachicurca; shuc laya shimicunahuan, mana.
Chashna tucurca profeta rimashca pactarincapac, cashna mari quillcashca carca: Yachachina shimicunahuan rimasha; Dios cai pachata rurashcamanta pacalla tiyashcata huillasha.
Chai shimicunta rimashca huasha, Jesus runacunata cachashpa, huasiman yaicurca; yachachishcacuna shamushpa, paita ninurca: —Mana balic quihuamanta rimashcata ñucanchicta yachachipai.
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Alli muyuta tarpuc runa cai RUNAMI.
Chacra cai pachami; alli muyu jahuapacha churicunata ricuchin; mana balic muyu supaita caticcunata ricuchin;
mana balic muyuta tarpuc supaimi; paliana, cai pacha tucurinami; pallaccuna angelcunami canun.
"Mana balic quihuata pallanushca shina rupachincapac, chashnallata tucunca cai pacha tucuricpi.
Cai RUNA paipac angelcunata cachanca paipac pachamanta tucui manallita ruraccunata anchuchincapac;
paicunata jatun nina ucupi shitanunca; chaipi huacai, tucui sami nanaicuna tiyanca,
Ranti, allicuna inti shina tucushpa, puchaclla ricurinunca Yaya huasipi.
"Diospac pacha allpa ucupi pacashca jatun curimuyu shinami; chai curimuyuta tupac runa, cutillata chai allpallapi pacan; cushiyashpa, pai charishcacunata catun chai allpata rantincapac.
"Diospac pacha shuc rantic catuc runa shinami, yapa balic perla nishca rumicunata mashcac.
Shuc yapa balicta tarishpa, tucui pai charishcata catun chai rumita rantincapac.
"Diospa pacha shuc llica shinami. Yacu aichacunata japiccamacuna llicata cuchapi shitanun, tucui laya aichacunata japinpapac.
Llica ña juntaricpi, allpaman aisanun; tiyarishpaca, alli aichacunata ashancapi churanun, mana baliccunata jichunun.
Chashnami tucunca, cai pacha tucuricpi. Angelcuna shamununca; manallicunata, allicunamanta chicanyachishpa,
nina ucupi shitanunca. Chaipi jatun huacai, tucui sami nanai tiyanca.
Jesus rimashca huasha tapurca: —Chai tucuita atiparcanquichichu? Cutipashpa ninurca: —Ari.
Jesus yapashpa nirca: —Tucui camahic quillcata yachac, Diospac shimipi yachachishca cashpa, shuc huasi amu shinami; paipac malacunamanta mushuta maucatapash llucshichin.
Jesus chaicunata rimashca huasca, chaimanta rishpa,

paipac quiquin llactaman pactarca. Chai llactapi tiyac tantarina huasipi yachachincapac callarirca; uyaccuna mancharishpa ninurca: —Pai yachashcata maimanta yachan? Mana raipaccunata ranata maimanta charin?
Cai runa carpintero churimi, paipac mama Mariami. Santiago, Jose, Simon, Judas paipac huauquicuna canun;
paipac panicunapash ñucanchihuan causanun. Cahshna cacpi, maimanta chai tucuita charin?
Chashna nishpa, Jesusta mana uyanurcachu. Jesus paicunata nirca: —Maipipash profetata llaquinun; paipac llactamanta caccuna, quiquin aillucuna paita mana llaquinunchu.
Chai llactapica ansa mana raipaccunata rurarea, paicuna Jesusta mana ininucpi.
Herodes Galipeapi jatun apu cashpa,; Jesusmanta rimarishcata uyarca;
paihuan tiyaccunata nirca: —Chai runa bautisac Juanmi, huañushcacunamanta causarishca. Chairaicu mana raipaccunata rurana ushan.

Shuc puncha Herodes Juanta japichishpa huatashpa, chunta curralpi huichcashca carca. Chaita rurarca Herodias shutiyuc huarmiraicu; chai huarmi Herodespac huauqui Felipepac huarmi carca; Herodes paita japishca carca.
Juan paita camachic carca nishpa: —Shucpac huarmita japircanqui; mana allichu.
Herodes Juanta huañuchinata munarca; ranti, runacunata mancharca, tucuicuna Juan Diospacmanta rimac cashcata yuyarinurca mari.
Herodes pacarishca punchata raiminucpi, Herodiaspac ushushi micuraccuna ñaupacpi tushurca; Herodes munaihuan ricurca,
chairaicu paita nirca: —Imatapash mañahuacpi cushcanqui.
Chai malta huarmi, chaita uyashpa, paipac mamata tapushca huasha, Herodesta nirca: —Bautisac Juanpac umata shuc callanapi cuhuanqui,
Rimacpi uyashpa Jerodes yapa llaquirirca; chashnapash, chaipi tiyaccuna ñaupacpi cusha nishcamanta "can mañahuanata cushcanqui" nishpa, umata cunuchun rimarca.
Chai ucu, Juanta chunta curralpi huañuchincapac shuc suldaruta cacharca;
huañuchishpa, paipac umata shuc callanapi Herodiaspac ushushiman apamurca; paica mamaman curca.
Juanta caticcuna chaita uyashpa, paipac ayata apashpa rishpa panpanurca; chai huasha Jesusta huillacrinurca.
Bautisac Juanta huañuchinushcata uyashpa, Jesus canuapi chaimanta rirca runa illashcaman. Runacuna chaita yachashpa, ñanpita paita catinurca.
Jesus canuamanta llucshishpa, achca runacunata ricushpa, paicunamanta llaquirirca, paicuna pushamushca uncuccunata janpirca.
Ña tutayacucpi, yachachishcacuna Jesusta ninurca: —Cai panpapi runa huasi ilian, puncha ña tucuriran; runacunata cachari mayan llactacunapi micunata rantinuchun.
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Mana mutsun paicuna rincapac, cancunallata paicunata caraichic.
Chaita uyashpa ninurca: —Pichca tantallata ishcai challuantin charinchic.
Rimanucpi uyashpa Jesus nirca: —Caiman apamuichic.

Huasha, runacunata allpapi quihuajahuapi tiyarichirca; pichca tantata, ishcai chaliuata japirca; jahuaman ricushpa, Diosta pacrachurca; huasha, tantata paquishpa, yachachishcacunaman curca, paicuna runacunata carancapac.
Tucuicuna sacsacta micunurca; puchushcacunata pallashpa, chunca ishcai ashancata juntachinurca. Micuc caricunalla pichca huarancashi canurca, huarmicunata huahuacunatapash mana yupashca.
Runacunata carashca huasha, Jesus yachachiscacunata canuapi yaicuhirca nishpa: —Ñucata ñaupashpa, cuchata chinpaichic ñuca runacunata cacharinacama.
Runacunata cacharishpa, Jesus urcuman sapalla sicarca Dios-huan rimarincapac. Tutayashcapi, chaillapi tiyarca.
Canuapi riccuna cucha chaupiman tiyanurca; bacu japi tucunurca, huaira ñahuipuramanta shamucpi.
Ña punchayacpi, Jesus paicunapacman shamurca, yacu jahuata purishpa.
Canuapi tiyac runacuna, Jesus yacu jahuata puricucpi ricushpa, yapa mancharinurea, Caparinurca nishpa: —Ayami can.
Jesus paicunata nirca: —Cariyaichic, ama mancharichichu, ñucami cani.
Pedro chaita uyashpa nirca: —Apunchic, can cashpa, ñucata canpacman shamuchipai yacujahuata.
Jesus "shamui" nicpi, Pedro canuamanta llucshishpa, yacu jahuata puricurca Jesus tiyashcaman.
Yapa sinchi huairacuepi mancharca; manchashpa, panparincapac callarirca. Panparicucpi, caparirca nishpa: —¡Apunchic, quishpichihuapai!
Jesus maquihuan paita japishpa nirca: —Ansalla inic runa, ¿imaraicu mancharircanqui?
Paicuna canuapi yaicushcallahuan huaira aisarirca.
Canuapi tiyaccuna, Jesuspac ñaupacpi cuncurishpa, ninurca: —¡Shuti pacha, can Diospac churi canqui!
Cuchata chinpashpa, Genesaretman pactashpa, llutarinurca.
Chaipi causac runacuna, Jesusta ricsishpa, tucui llactacunaman shimita cachanurca "Jesus shamushcami" nishpa; chaita uyashpa, uncuccunata pai tiyashcaman pushanurca.
Uncuccunaca Jesusta mañanurca nishpa: —Canpac churanallata llancachipai. Llancaccunaca alliyanurca.
Huaquin fariseocuna Jerusalenmanta shamushca ya chaccunantin Jesuspacman shamushpa tapunurca:
—¿Imaraicu canpac runacuna ñucanchic ñaupacuna yachachishcata mana pactachinun? Maquicunata mana maillanun micuncapac.
Chaita uyashpa, Jesus tapurca nishpa: —Cacunaca ¿imaraicu Dios camachishcata mana uyan quichic, cancunapac yachaita catincapac?
Dios cashna mari rimarca: "Canpac yayata canpac mamatapash uyana canqui. Quiquin yayata, quiquin mamata maldisiac runa huañuchun".
Ranti, cancuna ninquichic: "Shuc runa paipac yayata, paipac mamata rimashpa nicpi: Ñuca tucui charishcata Diosman chasquichircani, mana ima tiyahuan cancunata yanapancapac";
chashna nishpa, yayata, mamata mana yanapanachu. Chashna rurashpa, Dios rimashcata mana pactachinquichic, cancunapac yachaita catincapac.
¡Llullacamacuna! Allimi Isaias cancunamanta rimashpa, cashna quillcarca:
Cai runacuna shimillahuan ñucata llaquinun; paicunapac yuyai ñucamanta carumi can.
Yancamanta ñucata chacchanun; paicuna yachachishca runapac shimillami.
Chai huasha, runacunata cayashpa, rimarca nishpa: —¡Uyahuaichic, atipaichic:
Imapash runa ucuman yaicushpa mana mapayachin; runapac yuyaimanta llucshic, chaimi runata mapayachin.
Rimacpi Jesus, yachachishcacuna paita ninurca: —Can rimashcata uyashpa, fariseocuna yapa piñarinurca.
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Ñuca jahua pachapi tiyac Yaya mana tarpushca yura sapintin surcushca canca.
Ama paicunata uyaichichu; ñausacuna cashpa, ñausacunata pushanun. Shuc ñausa shuc ñausa runata pushacpi, ishcaintin jutcupi urmanunca.
Rimacpi, Pedro paita nirca: —¿Imata yachachin can rimashca?
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Cancunapash manachu atipanquichic?
Shimi ucupi yaicuc huicsaman rin, huasha canchaman llucshin; ¿chaita manachu atipanquichic?
Ranti, shimimanta llucshic shuncumanta shamun; chaimi runata mapayachin.
Runa shuncumanta llucshinun manalli yuyaicuna, runata huañuchinacuna, shucpac huarmita japinacuna, yumashpa juchallinacuna, shuhuanacuna, llullanacuna, caminacuna;
chaicunami runata juchayucta ruranun; ranti, maquita mana maillashpa micuna mana runata mapayachin.
Jesus runacunata yachachishca huasha, Sidon llacta, Tiro llacta tiyac suyuman rirca.
Shuc cananea huarmi, Jesusta caticcunahuan tuparishpa, caparishpa nirca: —Apunchic, Davidpac churi, ñucamanta llaquiripai; shuc millai supai ñuca ushushita yapa llaquichin.
Jesus mana imata cutiparca. Yachachishcacuna paita ninurca: —Chai huarmita uyapai, caparishpalla ñucanchicta caticun.
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Ñuca Israelmanta chincarishca huihuacunamanlla cachashca cani.
Huarmi, Jesuspacman shamushpa, tuhuaman urmashpa nirca: —¡Apunchic, yanapahuai!
Jesus paita nirca: —Churicunapac micunata allcucunaman shitana mana allichu.
Huarmi nirca: —Ari, Apunchic, chashnami can; chashna cacpipash, allcucuna mesamanta urmac puchucunata micuc canun.
Chaita uyashpa, Jesus nirca: —uarmi, yapa sinchita ininqui; can munashca shina tucuchun. Chaita rimashca shina, paipac ushushi alliyashca saquirirca.
Jesus chaimanta rishpa, Galilea cucha pataman pactarca; huasha, shuc urcuman sicashpa, tiyarirca.

Achca runa pai tiyashcaman shamunurca, tucui sami uncuccunata pushamushpa: jancacuna, ñausacuna, shimi illaccuna, pullu maquicuna. Jesuspac ñaupacpi paicunata saquinucpi, pai tucuicunata alliyachirca.

Jesus rashcacunata ricushpa runacuna mancharinurca, shimi illaccuna rimai callarinurca mari; pullu maquicuna allichi tucunurca; jancacuna purinurca; ñausacuna ricunurca. Tucuicunaca Diosta chacchancapac callarinurca.

Chai huasha, Jesus yachachishcacunata cayashpa nirca: —Cai runacunamanta llaquirini; ña quimsa punchata ñucahuan tiyanun; micunata mana charinun. Mana carashpa paicunata caphana mana alli yachihuan; ñanpipi sanpayashpa purincapac mana ushanunman.
Yachachishcacuna ninurca: —Cai runa illac panpapi maimanta paicunata cararinca, chashna achcacuna canucpi?
Rimanucpi, Jesus paicunata tapurca: —¿Mashna tantata charinquichic? Cutipanurca: —Canchis tantata charinchic; ansa yacu aichapash tiyan.
Chaita uyashpa, Jesus nirca: —Runacunata allpapi tiyarichichic.
Tiyarinucpi, Jesus tantacunata yacu aichacunapash maquipi charishpa, Diosta pacrachurca. Huasha, tantacunata paquishpa, yachachishcacunaman curca; yachachishcacuna runacunata caranurca.
Tucuicuna sacsacta micunurca; puchushcata pallashpa, canchis ashancata juntachinurca.
Micuccuna caricunalla chuscu huaranca canurca, huarmicunata huahuacunatapash mana yupashca.
Fariseocuna saduceocunantin Jesuspacman rinurca paita camancapac; paita tupashpa ninurca: —Jahua pachapi shuc mana raipata rurai ñucanchic ricuneapac.
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Chishiyacucpi ninquichic: "Caya puncha alli puncha canca, puyucuna pucaclla ricurinun mari".

Tutamanta ninquichic: "Cunan tamiancami, yapa yana ricurin mari". Llullacamacuna: Tamia punchata, rupai punchata ricsinquichic jahua pachata ricushpa; ranti, cai punchacunapi tucushcata mana atipanquichic.

Cai manalli runacuna, Diosta mana uyac runacuna, shuc mana raipacta mañanun; shuc mana raipacta mana ricununcachu, profeta Jonas-huan tucushcata yuyarichisha. Chaita rimashpa, paicunata saquishpa, rirca.
Yachachishcacuna cucha chinpaman rinushcapi, tantata apana cuncarinushca carca.
Jesus paicunata nirca: —Uyahuaichic: fariseocunapac saduceocunapacpash levadurata yuyanquichic.
Yachachishcacuna chaita uyashpa, paicunapura rimarinurca nishpa: —Chaita nin ñucanchic tantata mana apamushcaraicu.
Jesus chaita yachashpa nirca: —¿Imaraicu "tantata mana charinchic "nishpa rimaricunquichic? Ansalla ininquichic.
Chaira manachu atipanquichic? ¿Manachu yuyarinquichic ñuca pichca huaranca runacunata pichca tantallahuan carashcapi mashna ashanca puchushcata?
¿Manachu yuyarinquichic puchushcahuan mashna ashanca juntarishcata, ñuca chuscu huaranca runacunata canchis tanta huan carashcapi?
Chashna cacpi, ¿manachu atipanquichic mana tantamanta rimashcata ñuca cancunata rimashcapi "Fariseocunapac, saduceocunapac levadurata yuyanquichic" nishpa?
Chaita uyashpa, allita yachanurca "paicunapac levadura ta yuyanquichic" nishpa rimashcapi, mana tanta rurana levaduramanta rimashcata, ranti fariseocuna saduceocuna yachachishcamanta rimashcata.
Jesus Filipo Cesarea nishca suyuman pactashpa, yachaehishcacunata tapurca: —Imata ninun runacuna cai RUNamanta?
Cutipashpa ninurca: —Huaquincuna "Bautisac Juanmi" ninun; shuccuna "Eliasmi" ninun; shuccuna "Jeremiasmi" ninun, "jatun profeta chari" ninun.
Jesus cutillata tapurca: —¿Cancúnaca pimi nishpata yuyanquichic ñucata?
Simon Pedro cutipashpa nirca: —Can Mesiasmi canqui, causac Diospac Churimi canqui.
Rimacpi uyashpa Jesus nirca: —Cushiyucmi canqui, Jonaspac churi Simon. Can rimashca shimita manapí runa canta yachachirca; ñuca jahua pachapi tiyac Yayalla chaita rimachirca.
Ñúcaca canta nini: "Can Pedromi canqui (Pedro nishpa "rumi" nin). Cai rumi jahuapi ñuca iglesiata shayachisha. Ucupacha supaicuna paita mana atununcachu.
Jahua pacha llavicunata cushcanqui; cai pachapi imatapash can huatacpi, jahua pachapi huatashcami canca. Cai pachapi imatapash can pascacpi, jahua pachapi pascara saquirinca.
Chaipac huasha Jesus paicunata nirca: —Ñuca Mesias cashcata ama pitapash rimaichichu.

Huasha yachachishcacunata nirca: —Ñuca Jerusalenman rina cani; chaipi rucucuna, pacriyaya apucuna, camachic quillcata yachaccuna ñucata llaquichinunca, ñucata huañuchinunca; chashnapash, quimsa punchapi causarisha.
Chaita uyashpa, Pedro Jesusta chicanman pushashpa, paita camachincapac callarirca nishpa: —Apunchic, chaita Dios ama munachun; canhuan ama chashna tucuchun.
Jesus ticrashpa paita nirca: —Ñuca ñahuimanta anchuri, supai. Ñuca rina ñanpimanta anchuchinata munahuanqui. Can runa shina yuyanqui, Dios munashcata mana atipanquichu.
Huasha yachachishcacunata nirca: —Maicanpash ñucata catinayashpa, quiquin munaita saquichun; crusta aparishpa, ñucahuan shamuchun.
Maicanpash causaita tarishpa, chaita chincachincami; ranti quiquin causaita chincachic ñucamanta, causaita tarincami.
¿Imata yapachin shuc runa cai pachata yapachishpa, causaita chincachicpi? ¿Imata cunca shuc runa paipac causai rantimanta?
Shuc puncha, cai RUNA paipac Yayapi apu tucushpa, shamunca an gelcunahuan pacta; caran runa chashquinca amu rurashca tuputa.
Shuti cancunata nini: Caipi tiyaccuna-manta huaquincuna chaira mana huañushpa, cai RUNA apu tucushpa shamushcata ricununca.
Sucta puncha huasha, Jesus Pedrota, Jacobota, paipac huauqui Juanta chicanman cayashpa, shuc jahua urcuman paicunata pusharca.
Paicuna ricuranucpi, Jesus shuc laya tucurca; paipac ñahui punchaclla inti shina ricurirca; paipac churana chiuclla ricurirca.
Chaipi, Moises-huan Elias-huan ricurimunurca Jesus-huan rimarishpa.
Pedro chaita ricushpa nirca: —Apunchic, allimi caipi saquirincapac. Can munacpi, quimsa tanputa rurashun: canpac shuc, Moisespac shuc, Eliaspac shuc.
Chaira rimacucpi, shuc puyu paicunata quillparca; puyumanta shuc shimi uyarirca cashna nishpa: —Caimi ñuca llaquishca Churi, paita uyana canquichic.
Yachachishcacuna, chaita uyashpa, yapa mancharishpa, tuhuaman urmanurca.
Jesus mayanyashpa, paicunata llancarcanishpa: —Shayarichic, ama manchaichichu.
Ricushpaca, Jesusllata ricunurca; shuccuna illanurca.
Urcumanta uraicucunucpi, Jesus paicunata nirca: —Ama pitapash cancuna ricushcata rimaichichu cai RUNA huañushcacunamanta causarinacama.
Chaita uyashpa yachachishcacuna Jesusta tapushpa ninurca: —¿Imaraicu quillcata yachaccuna "Elias ñaupacta shamuna can" nishpa ninun?
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Shuti, Elias ñaupacta shamunca tucuita allichincapac.
Cuti, ñuca cancunata nini: Elias ña shamurca, paitaca mana ricsinurcachu, paicuna munashcata paihuan ruranurca. Cai RUNApash paicunapi llaquichi tucunca.
Rimacpi uyashpa, Jesus Bautisac Juanmanta rimashcata yachachishcacuna atipanurca.
Runacuna tiyashcaman pactanucpi, shuc runa Jesuspacman shamushpa, tuhuaman urmashpa, nirca: —
Apunchic, ñuca churimanta llaquiripai; achca cuti millai uncui paita japin; ninapi, yacupi urman; yapa ñacarin.
Can yachachishcacunapacman pushamurcani; paita allichincapac mana ushanurca.
Jesus nirca: —¡Mana inic runacuna, manallita ruraccuna! ¿Imuracama cancunahuan tiyasha? ¿Imuracama cancunata aparisha? Huanprata pushamuichic.
Pushamunucpi, Jesus supaita piñarca, chai huanpramanta llucshichirca; chai ucu alliyarca.
Huasha, yachachishcacuna Jesus-huan pacalla rimarishpa, tapunurca: —¿Imaraicu supaita llucshichinata mana usharcanchic?

Jesus paicunata nirca: —Cancuna ansalla inishcaraicu. Cancuna inishca shuc ichilla tarpuna muyu tupu cacpi, chai urcuta ninquichic: "Chaimanta anchuri, shucman ri", urcuca anchurincami. Cancuna sinchita inishpa tucuita ushanquichic.
Chashnapash, chai sami supaicuna Diosta mañashcallahuan, sasishcallahuan jichurin.
Galilea suyuta puricunucpi, Jesus paicunata nirca: —Cai RUNA japishcami canca, runacuna paita huañuchinunca; chashnapash quimsa punchapi causarinca.
Cafarnaun llactaman pactanucpi, tenplo inpuesto cullquita mañaccuna Pedropacman rishpa tapunurca: —¿Cancunata yachachic tenplo inpuesto cullquita manachu cun?

Pedro cutipashpa nirca: —Ari, cunmi. Huasiman pactanucpi, Jesus Pedrota nirca: —Simon, ¿cai pacha apucuna picunamanta inpuesto nishca cullquita japinun: paipaccunamantachu? ¿chicancunamantachu? ¿Imata yuyanqui?
Pedro cutipashpa nirca: —Chicancunamantami. Jesus nirca: —Chashna cacpi, paipaccuna mana cuna canun.

Chashnapash, paicuna ama piñarincapac, cuchaman rishpa, ansiluta shitanqui; ñaupac micuc aichata japishpa, paipac shimi ucupi shuc cullquita tarinqui; chai cullqui pactancami canmanta ñucamantapash pagancapac; chai cullquita paicuna man cunqui.
Chai punchallapi, yachachishcacuna Jesusta tapunurca: —¿Diospac pachapi maican runa ashtahuan jatun canca?
Tapunucpi, Jesus shuc huahuata cayashpa, paicuna ucupi shayachirca, nishpa: —
Shuti nini, cancuna mana turcarishpa huahua shina tucuncapac, Diospac pachapi mana yaicunquichic.
Chashna cacpi, quiquinllata uchillayashpa cai huahua shina tucuc, paimi Diospac pachapi mai jatun canca.
Maicanpash ñuca shutipi cashna huahuata chasquishpa, ñucallatata chasquin.
"Maicanpash cai ñucata inic mana imayuc runacunata juchaman aisacpi, alli canman chai runapac cuncapi shuc jatun rumita huatashpa, nucñu yacuman shitanucpi.
Mana allichu cai pachapi shuccunata juchaman aisac runacuna tiyanuchun; chai laya runacuna huiñai tiyanuncai ailla paicunamanta.

"Chairaicu, canpac maqui, canpac chaqui canta juchapi urmachicpi, chaicunata pitishpa caruman shitanqui; jahua pachapi pullu maqui, pullu chaqui yaicuna ashtahuan alli canca ishcai maquiyuc, ishcai chaquiyuc ucupachaman rinamanta.
Canpac ñahui canta juchaman aisacpi, chaita surcushpa caruman shitanqui. Jahua pachaman shuclla ñahuiyuc rina ashtahuan alli canca ishcai ñahuiyuc ucu pachaman rinamanta.
"Cai yanca runacunata ama millanquichichu; paicunapac angelcuna ñuca jahua pachapi tiyac Yaya ñaupacpi huiñai tiyanun.
Cai RUNA huacllishcata allichincapac shamurca.
Uyahuaichic: Shuc patsac objetata charic runa, shuc chincaricpi, manachu shuccunata potreropi saquishpa, chincarishcata mashcacrin?
Taricpica, shuti pacha nini: Chai tarishca obeja mana chicarishcacunamanta yalli amuta cushichinca.
Chashnallata, cancunapac jahua pachapi tiyac Yaya mana munanchu cai uchillacunamanta shucllapash chincarichun.
"Canpac huauqui canta manallita ruracpi, paita chicanman pushashpa camachinqui. Canta uyacpi, paita Diospac yapachishcanqui.
Mana uyácpica, canhuan pacta shuc runata, ishcai runata pushanqui; ishcaipura, quimsapura allichinquichic imapash tucushcata.
Pai cancunata mana uyacpi, tantarishca iniccunaman huillanquichic; iniccunata mana uyacpi, paiman Diosta mana ricsic shina ricunquichic.
Shuti nini; Cancuna cai pachapi imatapash pascacpi, jahua pachapi pascara saquirinca; cancuna cai pachapi imatapash huatacpi, jahua pachapi huatara saquirinca.
"Caitapash nini: Cancunamanta ishcai runa shuc yuyaillahuan imatapash Diosman mañacpi, ñuca jahua pachapi tiyac Yaya cancuna mañashcata uyancami.
Maipipash ishcai runapura cashpa, quimsa runapura cashpa, ñuca shutipi tantaricpi, paicuna chaupi shuncupi tiyashami.
Rimacpi, Pedro paita tapurca: —¿Ñuca huauqui ñucata llaquichihuacpi, mashna cuti quishpichina cani? Canchis cuti camachu?
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —¿Canchis cuticamalla ninquichu? Canchis chunca cuti canchis cuti quishpichina canqui,
Uyahuaichic: "Diosta caticcunaman shuc patronman tucushca shina tucun; chai patron paipac peoncuna dibishcata allichisha nirca.
Allichincapac callaricpi, shuc peon shamurca achca huaranca cullquita dibiyuc.
Imahuan paganata mana charicpi, patron quiquin peonta huarmintin huahuacunantin tucui chariscacunantin catuncapac rimarca, chai cullquita japincapac dibimanta;
Chai peon uyashpa, patron ñaupacpi tuhuaman urmashpa, mañacurca nishpa: —Patron, ama chashna rurahuaichu; ansalla chapanqui, ansa ansa illacta pagashcanqui.
Chashna rimacpi, patron chai peonmanta llaquirishpa, dibishcata illacta quishpichirca, paita cacharirca.
Peonca chaimanta llucshishpa, paiman shuc patsallata dibic runahuan tuparirca; paita cuncamanta japishpa sipicurca caparishpa: —Can dibihuashcata pagahuai.
Chai runa tuhuaman urmashpa, mañacurca nishpa: —Ansalla chapanqui, tucuita pagashcanqui.
Paica mana uyarcachu; dibiyucta japishpa, chunta curralpi huichcachirca dibishcata paganacama.
Shuc peoncuna, tucushcata ricushpa, yapa llaquirishpa patronpacman rimacrinurca.
Patron, chai runata cayashpa, nirca: —Shuncu illac runa, can dibihuashcata illacta quishpichircani can mañahuashcaraicu.
¿Canpash manachu canta dibicmanta llaquirina carcanqui, ñuca canmanta llaquirishca shina?
Shinchi piñarishpaca, chai peonta ñacachirca dibishcata illacta paganacama.
Chasnallata ruranca cancunahuan ñuca jahua pachapi tiyac Yaya, shuccuna cancunaman manalli rashcata cancuna tucui shuncuhuan mana quishpichicpi.
Jesus, chaicunata rimashca huasha, Galileamanta rishpa, Judeaman pactarca, Jordan yacu chinpaman.
Achca runa paita catinurca; chaipi uncushcacunata alliyachirca.
Huaquin fariseocuna Jesuspacman shamunurca; paita camancapac tapunurca: —Shuc runa paipac huarmita yancamanta jichucpi, ¿allichu?
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Manachu yachanquichic tucuita rurashca Dios, ñaupa runata rashcapi, "Cari huarmi rashcata".
Caitapash nirca: "Chairaicu, runa yayata mamatapash saquishpa, paipac huarmihuan llutarinca, ishcaintin shuc aichalla tucuncapac".
Chashna cacpi, cari huarmi mana ishcaichu, shuc aichallami; Dios huatashcataca runa ama pascachun.
Chashna rimacpi uyashpa, cutillata tapunurca: —Chashna cacpi, ¿imaraicu Moises rimarca "maqui llushpirina quillcata huarmiman cushpa, paita jichuna usharin" nishpa?
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Cancuna manalli runa cashcamanta Moises chaita rimarca; ranti, cai pacha callarishcapi, mana chashnachu carca.
Ñúcaca caita nini: Maicanpash quiquin huarmita jichushpa (mana yanca llutarishca cacpi), shuc-huan sahuaricpi; jatun juchata ran; jichushca huarmihuan sahuaric runa jatun juchata ran.
Chaita uyashpa, yachachishcacuna Jesusta ninurca: —Chashna huatashca cacpi cari huarmihuan, sahuarina mana allichu.
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Chaita ranata mana tucuicuna ushanun; Dios yanapashcahuan usharin.

Huaquin runacuna mana ushanun sahuarincapac, runtu illac pacarishcaraicu; huaqumcuna mana ushanun runtu illac tucushcaraicu, chaicunata surcunucpi; huaquincuna mana sahuarinun Diosllatata catincapacraicu. Chashna rurana ushac chashna rurachun.
Shuc puncha, shuc huahuacunata Jesuspacman pushanurca, "cahpac maquita paicunapac jahuapi churapai paicunamanta mañashpa" nishpa; ranti, yachachishcacuna paicunata piñanurca.
Chaita ricushpa Jesus nirca: —Casilla saquichic huahuacunata, ñucapacman shamuncapac ama jarcaichichu; Diospac pacha paicuna shina caccunapac mari can.
Chashna nishpa, huahuacunapac jahuapi maquicunata churarca; chaipac huasha, shucman rirca.
Riracpi, shuc malta runa Jesus-huan tuparishpa nirca: —Alli yachachic, ¿imata rurana cani mana tucuric causaiman pactancapac?
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —¿Imaraicu ñucata "alli'' nishpa nihuanqui? Shucllami alli, Dios. Canca mana tucuric causaiman yaicusha nishpa, Dios rurai nishcacunata pactachinqui.
Huanpra tapurca: —¿Ima rurai nishcacuna? Jesus nirca: —Ama huañuchinquichu. Shucpac huarmihuan ama llutarinquiehu. Ama shuhuanquichu; ama shucmanta llullashpa rimanquichu,
Canpac yayata, canpac mamata llaquina canqui; shuccunata can quiquinliata shina llaquina canqui.
Chaita uyashpa, chai huanpra nirca: —Chai tucuita huahua cashcamanta pactaehircani; ¿ima pishihuañ?
Jesus paita nirca: —Can ashtahuan alli tucusha nishpa, can charishcacunata catushpa, tsuntsu runacunaman curiqui; chashna rurashpa, jahua pachapi cullquiyuc tueunqui; chaihuasha, ñucahuan shamunqui.
Rimacpi uyashpa, chai malta runa llaquirishpa rirca, achca cullquiyuc mari carca.
Pai riracpi, Jesus yachachishcacunata nkca: —Cuilquiyuc runa mana yaicunallachu can Diospac paehapi,
Shuc camello nishca huibua tupulli jutcuta ashtahuan yaicunalla cahca cullquiyuc runa Diospac pachaman yaicunamanta,
Chaita uyashpa, yachachishcacuna yapa mancharishpa, paicunapura rimarinurca nishpa: —Chashna cacpi, ¿pitac quishpina ushanca?
Jesus paicunaman ricushpa nirca: —Runacunapac mana ushaipac can; ranti, Dios tutuita ushan.
Chaita uyashpa, Pedro nirca: —Ñucanchic tucuita canta catincapac saquircanchic: ¿imata cui tucushun?

Jesus cutiparca: —Shuti cancunata nini, tucui mushuyana punchapi, cai RUNA apu tucushpa paipac tiyarinapi tiyaricpi, cancunapash ñucata catishcaraicu, chunca ishcai tiyarinacunapi tiyarinquichic chunca ishcai Israel runa bulata taripancapac.

Maicanpash huasita cacpi, huauquicunata cacpi, panicunata cacpi, yayata mamata cacpi, churicunata cacpi, allpacunata cacpi ñucaraicu saquishpa, shuc patsac yalli cui tucunca, mana tucuric causaitapash chasquinca.
Achca runa cunan ñaupacuna cashpa, puchucaicuna tucununca; cunan puchucaicuna cashpa, ñaupacuna tucununca.
Shuc puncha Jesus cashna rimarca: —Diosta caticcunaman shuc cullquiyuc runaman tucushca shina tucun. Chai runa tutamantashitu llancaccunata japincapac rirca, paipac chacrapi Hancachincapac.
Shuc runacunata tupashpa, paicunahuan rimarirca ishai chunca cullquita yapachincapac caran puncha; paicuna "ari" ninucpi, chacraman paicunata cacharca.
Jahuanaya intipi, shuccunata tuparca, pulasapi rimaricunurca mana imata rurashpa; paicunata nirca: —Ñuca chacraman richic; paganata pagashcanquichic.
Chaita uyashpa, chacraman rinurca.
