Chaupi punchapi chishi intipipash cutillata llucshirca llancaccunata mashcancapac; tupashcacunata paipac chacraman cancharca.
Chishita, chaira inti mana yaicushcaillapita, shuc runacunata quillashcata tuparca; paicunata nirca: —¿Imaraicu llanpu puncha mana imata rashpa caipi tiyacunquichic?
Cutipanurca: —Manapí ñucanchicta llancachirca. Pai nirca: —Ñuca chacraman richic llancancapac.
Puncha tucurishcapi amu llancaccamata nirca: —Runacunata paganqui, huasha shamushcacunamanta callarishpa.
Chishita llancancapac yaicuccunata cayashpa, ishcai chunca chullquita paicunaman curca.
Inti pacarishcamanta llancaccuna, chaita ricushpa, "ñucarichicman ashtahuan cunca" yuyarinurca; ranti, paicunapash ishcai chuncata japinurca.
Cullquita japishpa, piñarishpa amu huashapi rimancapac callarinurca nishpa: —
Chishita shamuccuna shuc pacha tuputa llancanurca; ñucanchic llanpu puncha llancarcanchic rupaihuan, junpihuan ñacarishpa; chashnapash, paicuna japishca tupullata japircanchic.
Amu, chaita uyashpa, paicunamanta shucta nirca: —Mashi, ima manallita canta mana ruracunichu. ¿Manachu ishcai chunca cullquita yapachiriqui nircani?
Canpacta japishpa ri; cai huasha shamushcacuriaman canman cushca tuputa cuyana munani.
¿Manachu ñucapac-huan ñuca munashcata ruranata ushani? ¿Ñucata mana alli ñahuihuan ricuhuanqui ñuca alli cashcamanta?
Chashna, ñaupacuna puchucaicuna tucununca; puchucaicuna ñaupacuna cacunca.
Shuc puncha, Jesus Jerusalen llactaman riracpi, paipac chunca ishcai runata chicanman cayashpa, nirca: —
Ña yachanquichic, Jerusalenman riranchic. Chaipi cai RUNA japi tucunca, pacriyaya apucunaman, camachic quillcata yachaccunaman chasquichi tucunca;
paicuna paita taripa nunca, paita asinunca, llipachinunca, cruspi chacatanunca; chashnapash, quimsa punchapi causarinca.
Cebedeo churicunapac mama, Jesuspacman paicunantin rishpa, paipac ñaupapi cuncurirca mañancapac.
Jesus paita tapurca: —¿Imatata munanqui? Pai nirca: —Cai ishcai ñuca churicunata canpac pachapi tiyarichipanqui shucta canpac alli maquiman, shucta canpac lluqui maquiman.

Rimacpi uyashpa, Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Cancuna mañahuashcata mana yachanquichic. ¿Ñuca apana llaquicunata apana ushanquichichu? ¿Ñuca huañuna huañuihuan huañunata munanquichichu? Cutipashpa ninurca: —Ushanchicmi, munanchicmi.

Chaita uyashpa, Jesus nirca: —Shuti can; ñuca llaquicunata apanquichic, ñuca huañuna huañuihuan huañunquichic; ranti, ñuca alli maquipi, lluqui maquipi tiyarinata mana cuipachu cani; ñuca Yaya acllashcacunaman chaita cunca.
Shuc yachachishcacuna chaita uyashpa, chai ishcai runahuan piñarinurca.
Jesus paicunata cayashpa nirca: —Cai pacha apucuna runacunata llaquichinun; piñashcahuan paicunata rimanun.
Cancunapura mana chashnachu canca; ranti, maicanpash shuccunamanta yalli canata munac paicunata sirbichun;
ñaupac canata munac tucui shuccunata sirbichun.
Cai RUNApash mana "sirbihuaichic" nishpa shamurcachu; shuccunata sirbincapac shamurca; tucuicunapac dibita pagancapac shamushpa, huañushcahuan pagarca.
Jerico llactamanta llucshinucpi, achca runa Jesusta catishpa rinurca.
Ishcai ñausa runa ñanpi mayanpi tiyacunurca; Jesus chaita rirashcata uyashpa, caparinurca: —¡Apunchic, Davidpac Churi, ñucanchicmanta llaquiripai!
Runacuna paicunata piñanurca nishpa: —Upallaichic. Paicunaca ashtahuan caparinurca nishpa: —¡Apunchic, Davidpac churi, ñucanchicmnta ilaquiripai!
Jesus caparishcata uyashpa shayarirca; ñausacunata cayashpa, paicunata tapurca nishpa: —¿Imata munanquichic ñuca cancunaman rancapac?
Cutipanurca: —Apunchic, ricuna ushanata munanchic.
Jesus, llaquirishpa, paicunapac ñahuicunata llancarca. Llancacpi, ricuncapac cailarinurca; Jesusta catishpa rinurca.
Jerusalen mayanman pactanushcapi, Betfage nishca uchilla llactaman Olivos nishca urcu mayanpi, Jesus ishcai yachachishcacunata cacharca nishpa: —
Cancuna ñahuipura tiyac uchilla llactaman richic. Chaiman pactashpa, shuc burra nishca huihuata huatashcata tupanquichic; pascashpa caiman apamunquichic.
Maicanpash cancunata rimacpi, ninquichic: "Apu chaita mutsunmi, utcalla cutichinca".
Chashna tucurca, profeta rimashcata pactarincapac, cashna mari rimashca carca:
Sion llactapi causaccunaman rimaichic: Ricuichic, cancunapac jatun apu shamuran, manso shuncuyuc, llashacta aparic burro jahuapi tiyarishpa shamun.
Yachachishcacuna rinurca, Jesus nishcata ranurca:
burrata huahuantin pushamunurca; chai jahuapi churanata mantashpa, Jesusta tiyarichinurca.
Achca runa churanacunata allpapi mantanurca; huaquincuna yura pallcacunata cuchushpa, Jesus rina ñanpipi mantanurca.
Ñaupac riraceuna huasha shamuccunapash caparinurca nishpa: —¡Yupaichashca cachun Davidpac churi! ¡Diospac shutipi shamuc bendisiashca cachun!
Jesus Jerusalenman yaicucpi, llactapi causaccuna cushihuan tulupunurca tapushpa: —¿Pitac can cai?
Runacuna capariranurca nishpa: —Caimi profeta Jesus, Galileapi tiyac Nazaretmanta.

Chaipac huasha, Jesus Diospac huasiman yaicurca; chaipi catucuccunata, ranticuccunata canchaman llucshichirca. Cullquita turcaccunapac mesacunata ticraehirca; urpita catuccunapac mesacunatapash ticrachirca nishpa: —
Cashna quillcara tiyan: "Ñuca huasi Dios-huan rimarina huasimi"; cancunaca shuhua huasita rarcanquichic.
Diospac huasipi tiyacpi, huaquin ñausa runacuna jancacunapash Jesuspacman rinucpi, paicunata alliyachirca.
Pacriyaya apucunahuan quillcata yachaccunahuan Jesus mana raipaccunata ruracpi ricushpa, huahuacuna "Caimi Curaca Davidpac churi" nishpa caparishcata uyashpa, piñarinurca.

Jesusta ninurca: —¿Caicuna caparicushcata uyacunquichu? Jesus cutiparca: —Ari, uyacunimi. ¿Cancunaca manachu yachanquichic quillcacuna nishcata? Cashna ninun: Llullu huahuacuna chaira chuchuccunapash sumac taquishcahuan ñucata chacchanunca.
Chashnapi paicunata saquishpa, Betania llactaman rirca puñuncapac.
Cayantin puncha tutamanta, Jerusalenman ticracucpi, Jesus yarcachirca.

Ñanpi mayanpi shuc higuera nishca yurata ricushpa, chaiman rirca; mana imata tuparca chai yurapi, pancacunalla tiyarca, Jesus chai yurata nirca: —Mana imura muyuta aparichu. Rimacpi chai yura chaquirirca.
Chaita ricushpa, yachachishcacuna mancharishpa, Jesusta ninurca: —¿Imaraicu chashna urastalla chai yura chaquirirca?

Jesus cutiparca: —Shuti cancunata nini: Cancuna sinchi inishcahuan inishpa, ñuca higuera yurahuan rashcata ranquichic; mana chaillatachu, ashtahuan ushanquichic: Cancuna cai urcuman "anchuri caimanta, ñucñu yacuman shitari" nicpi, urcu cancunata uyancami.
Cancuna imatapash Diosman mañacpi sinchi inishcahuan, cui tucunquichic.

Chai huasha, Jesus Diospac huasipi yaicurca; chaipi yachachicucpi, pacriyaya apucuna judio apucunapash paipacman mayanyarishpa tapunurca nishpa: —¿Ima ushaihuan chaicunata ruranqui? ¿Pimi chaita rancapac canta rimarca?
Tapunucpi, Jesus cutiparca: —Ñucapash cancunata shuc shimita tapunca rani. Cancuna cutipahuacpi, ñucapash ima, ushaihuan chaicunata rashcata rimasha.

Caita tapuni: ¿Pimi Juanta cacharca bautisancapac? ¿Dioschu paita cacharca? ¿runacunachu paita cachanurca? Cutipahuaichic. Rimacpi, paicunapura rimarincapac callarinurca. Ñucanchic "Dios paita cacharca" nicpi, pai ninca: Chashna cacpi, ¿imaraicu paita mana uyarcanquichic?
Ñucanchic "runacuna paita cachanurca" nicpi, ¿imata runacuna ñucanchicta ranunca?; tucuicuna mari Juan Diospacmanta shamushcata ininun.
Chairaicu Jesusta ninurca: —Mana yachanchichu. Chaita uyashpa, Jesus nirca: —Ñucapash ima ushaihuan chaicunata reshcata mana rimashachu.
Chai huasha, chaillapita yachachishpa, cashna rimarca Jesus: —Shuc runa ishcai churita charirca. Ñaupac churita nirca: "Churi, cunan puncha chacraman llancancapac rina canqui".
Churi nirca: "Mana munanichu". Ranti, unailla "mana munanichu" nishcamanta llaquirishpa, rircami.
Yaya, quipa churipacman rishpa, chashnallata rimarca. Churi nirca: "Ariu, yaya, cunanshitu rinca rani". Ranti mana rishcachu.

Chai ishcai chuximanta maican paipac yaya munashcata pactachirca? —Ñaupac churi— cutipanuica. Jesus paicunata nirca: —Shuti pacha cancunata nini: Gubirnu cullquita pallaccuna, mana alli causac huarmicunapash cancunata ñaupashpa Diospac pachaman yaicununca.

Cancunapacman shamurca mari Bautisac Juan, Dios munashca shina causanata yachachishpa; paitaca mana inircanquichic; ranti, gubirnu cullquita pallaccuna juchallic huarmicunapash paita ininurca. Cancuna, chaita ricushpapash, Diosman mana ticrarcanquichic paita inishpa.

Huasha Jesus nirca: —Cai shuctapash uyaichic: Shuc runami carca, yapa allpayuc; uva nishca chacrata rurarca. Chai chacrata jarcahuan jarcashca. Uva muyucunata chahuancapac allpata allashpa, shuc jutcuta rurarca. Shuc tanputa shayachirca. Chai huasha, shuc runacunaman chacrata saquirca, pallana pachapi pallashcahuan pagancapac. Huasha caruman rirca.
"Muyuta pallana pacha pactaricpi, peoncunata cacharca chacrata mañachishca runacunapacman paipacta japincapac.
Chai runacuna, peoncunata japishpa, shucta macanurca, shucta huañuchinurca, shucta rumihuan shitanurca.
Cutillata shuc peoncunata cacharca, ñaupa cachashcacunamanta yalli achca; paicunahuan chashnailata ranurca.
"Puchucaipi, paipac churita cacharca, "ñuca churita manchanunca chari" yuyarishpa.
Chai runacunaca, churita rucushpa, rimanacunurca: "Caimi chacra amupac churi, amu charishcata japina cac. Paita huañuchishunchic, pai japinca rashcata amuyashun".
Paita japishpaca huañuchinurca.
Chacra amu shamushpa, ¿imata ruranca chai runacunahuan?
Cutipanurca: —Chai millai runacunata achcata llaquichishpa tucuchinca; paipac chacrata shuc runacunaman saquinca, pagana cashcata pagaccunaman.
Huasha Jesus nirca: —¿Manachu cashna quillcara tiyan?: Huasita shayachiccuna jichushca rumi huasi siqui rumi tucurca, Chaitaca apu Dios rarca; ñucanchic ñahuipi munanayacta ricurin.
Chairaicu cancunata nini: Diospac pachata quichui tucunquichic; chaita shuc runacunaman cununca, Diospac pacha aparishcata pallashpa pagaccunaman.
Chai rumi jahuapi urmac runa paqui paqui tucunca; chai rumi runa jahuapi urmashpa paita ñitinca.
Pacriyaya apucucunahuan, fariseocunahuan Jesus rimashcacunata uyashpa, paicunamarita rimashcata atipanurca.
Chairaicu, "paita japishun" nishpa yuyarinurca; ranti, runacunata, manchashpa mana ushanurcachu, Jesus Diospacmarita rimashcata ininurca mari.
Jesus shuc rimanatapash yachachincapac rimarca, cashna nishpa: —
Diospa pachapi shuc jatun apuman tucushca shina tucun. Shuc jatun apu paipac churipac sahuarinata allichirca.
Tucuita allichishca huasha, peoncunata cacharca shamuna caccunata cayancapac; paicuna "mana shamushun" ninurca.
Cutillata shuc peoncunata cacharca nishpa: "Shamuna caccunata ninquichic: Ña micuna allichirami; huira huacrata huañuchircani, tucuita allichircani; sahuarinaman shamuichic".
Cayasticacuna paicunata mana uyanurcachu; huaquincuna chacraman rinurca, huaquincuna imatapash rancapac rinurca.
Huaquincuna, peoncunata japishpa, yuyaita huactashpa huañuchinurca.
Jatun apri, chaita uyashpa, sinchi piñarirca; paipac suldarucunata cachashpa, chai millai; runacunata huañuchirca, paicunapac llactata rupachirca.
Chai huasha, paipac peoncunata nirca: "Sahuarina allichishcami can, cayashcacuna mana munanurca.
Ñanpicunata rishpa, tupaccunata pushamuichic".
Paicuna rishpa, tucui tupashcacunata japinurca; micuna huasi juntarirca.
Jatun apu micucuccunata ricuncapac yaicushpa, shuc sahuarina churana illac runata ricushpa,
paita nirca: "Mashi, ¿imashnata sahuarina churana iliac caiman yaicurcanqui?". Pai chunlla saquirirca.
Jatun apu peoncunata nirca: "Paipac iriaqui chaqui huatashpa, canchaman shitaichic, tuta ucuman, huacai, tucui sami nanai tiyashcaman".
Acha runa cayashcami can, ansa runa acllashcami can.
Chai shimicunata uyashpa, fariseocuna rinurca paicunapura rimarincapac Jesusta ima shimipipash japincapac nishpa.

Chashna cacpi, paicuna yachachishcacunata herodianos nishcacunantin Jesusta tapuncapac cachanurc, cashna nishpa: —Yachachic, can mana llulla cashcata yachanchic; Diosman ric ñanpita yachachinqui pitapash mana manchashpa, runacuna canmanta rimashcata mana uyashpa,
Canta tapunchic: ¿Inpuesto nishca cullquita jatun apuman pagana allichu? ¿manachu alli? ¿Imata ninqui?
Tapunucpi, Jesus paicunapac manalli yuyaita ricsishpa nirca: —Llullacamacuna, ¿imaraicu ñuca nishcapi japinayahuanquichic?
Inpuesto pagana cullquita ricuchihuaichic. Paicunaca shuc denario nishca cullquita ricuchinurca.
Chaita ricushpa, Jesus tapurca: —¿Pipacta can cai ñahui, caipi quillcashca shutipash?
Tapucpi, cutipashpa ninurca: —Jaturi apupacta. Jesus nirca: —Jatun apupacta. jatun apuman cuichic, Diospacta Diosmari cuichic.
Chaita uyashpa, mancharinurea; Jesusta saquishpa rinurca.
Chai punchallapi, rimarincapac rinurca. Saduseocuna "huañushcacuna mana causarinuncachu" ninun; chashna cacpi, Jesusta cashna rimariurca: —
Yachachic, Moises nirca: "Shuc huarmiyuc runa huahua illac huañucpi, paipac huauqui chai huarmihuan sahuarichun paicuna tupashca huahua huañushcapac shutita apanca". Chashna nin Moises.

Cunan allita uyanqui: Ñucanchicpacpi carichis huauquipura tiyanurca. Rucu huauqui shuc huarmita japirca; shuc punchacuna huasha, huahua illac huañurca. Huahua illac huañucpi, paipac huauqui chai huarmihuan sahuarirca;
paipash huahua illac huañurca. Tucui canchis huauquipura chai huarmillahuan huasha huasha sahuarishpa, huahua illac huañunurca.
Tucuicuna huañushca huasha huarmipash huañurca.
Causarina punchapi ¿chai huarmi pipac huarmi canca, canchis huauquipura paihuan sahuarishca cacpi?
Jesus chaita uyashpa cutiparca nishpa: —Cancuna pantacunquichic quillcashcacunata mana yachashpa, Diospac ushaita mana ricsishpa.
Huañushcacuna causarishca huasha, caricunapash huarmicunapash sahuarinuncachu, jahua pachapi tiyac angelcuna shina canunca.
Huañushcacuna causarinamantaca, ¿manachu yachanquichic quiquin Dios rimashcata?Cashna nirca:
Ñuca Abraanpac, Jacobpac, Isaacpac Diosmi cani. Dios mana huañushcacunapac Dioschu, causaccunapac Diosmi.
Chaita uyashpa, runacuna: mancharinurca pai yachachisheamanta.
Fariseocuna, Jesus saduseocunata pincachiscata uyashpa, tantarinurca.
Paicunamanta shuc, Jesusta pantachisha nishpa, paita tapuica: —
Yachachic, ¿camachic quillcapi Dios rurai nishcacunamanta maican yalli jatunmi?
Jesus cutiparca: —"Canpac apu Diosta tucui shuncuhuan, tucui almahuan, tucui yuyaihuan llaquina canqui''.
Chaimi ñaupac Dios rurai nishca.
Chaita catic chai shinallata can. Caimi: "Shuccunata can quiquinta shina llaquina eanqui".
Tucui camachic quillca nishca profetacuna nishca quillcapash chai ishcai Dios rurai nishcapi yaicun.
Fariseocuna chaira taritarishca canucpi, Jesus paicunata tapurca: —
¿Imata yuyanquichic Mesiasmanta? ¿Pipac churi can? Cutipanurca: —Davidpac churi can.
Chaita uyashpa Jesus nirca: —Davidpac churi cacpi, imaraicu Davidllata, Diospac samai rimachicpi, paita "Apu" nishpa riman. Cashna mari David quillcashpk saquirca:
Apu ñuca aputa rimarca nishpa: Ñuca alli maquiman tiyari ñuca canta chicniccunata atinacama.
Davidllata Mesiasta "Apu" nishpa rimacpi, imashna Mesias Davidpac churi canca?
Manapi paita cutipana usharca; chai punchamanta pacha, Jesusta imatapash tapunata manchanurca.
Jesus runacunata pai yachachishcacunatapash yachachishpa, cashna nirca: —

Cannachic quillcata yachaccuna fariseocunantin Moi sespac camachic quillcata yachachinun. Tucui paicuna yachachishcata pactachichic; ranti, paicuna rashcata ama raichichu; paicuna rimaisiqui canun; cuti paicuna rimashcata mana pactachinun.
Mana marcaipaccunata runacunata apachinun, ranti, paicuna uchilla rucahuanpash mana yanapanun apancapac.
"Tucui paicuna rurashcata runacuna ricuncapaella ruranun; chairaicu, camachic quillcata uma ñaupacpi maqui mucupipash quillcashcata ricuchinun; churana manñacunata anchuyachinun.
"Paicunata micuncapac cayanucpi, ñaupac tiyarinacunata munanun.
Pulasacunapi salurai tucunata munanun; "Yachachic" nii tucunata munanun.
Cancuna ama "yachachic" nii tucuichichu; shuclla mari cancunata yachachic, tucui cancunaca huauquipura canquichic.
Ama pitapash "Yaya" nishpa ninquichichu, shuclla mari cancunapac yaya, jahua pachapi tiyac.
Chashnallata, ama "apu" nii ticuichichu, shucllami cancunapac apu, paica Cristomi.
Shuccunata sirbic runa paimi cancunapura mai jatun can.
Maicanpash quiquinllata jatunyachishpa, pincachishcami canca; maicanpash quiquinllata uchillayachicpi, tucuicuna paita jahuayachinunca.

¡"Ayailla, cancuna, camachic quillcata yachaccuna fariseocunapash! ¡LIullacunacuna! Diospac pacha puncuta huichcanquichic shuccuna ama yaicunuchun nishpa. Cancunallata mana yaicunquichic; yaicushun niccunata mana yaicuchinquichic.

¡"AyailIa, cancuna, camachic quillcata yachaccuna fariseocunapash! ¡Llullacamacuna! Maitapash purinquichic runacunata "ñucanchihuan tucuichic" nishpa; shuc runa cancuna inishcata japicpi, paita huacllichinquichic, cancunamanta yalli manalli paita ranquichic.

¡"Ayailla, cancuna, ñausa pushaccamacuna! Cancuna ninquichic: 'Shuc runa Diospac huasi shutipi shimita cucpi, pai cushca shimita mana pactachicpi, mana imananchu; ranti, Diospac huasipi tiyac curi shutipi rimashpa, pai rimashcata pactachina can!
¡Upacuna, ñausacuna! Ima yalli halin: ¿Curichu? ¿curita balichic Diospac huasichu?

"Caitapash ninquichic: 'Shuc runa altar shutipi shimita cucpi, pai cushca shimita mana pactachicpipash, mana imananchu; ranti, altar jahuapi tiyac camari shutipi shimita cucpi, cushca shimita pactachina can.
¡Upacuna, ñausacuna! ¿Ima yalli balin: Camarichu? ¿camarita balichic altarchu?
Altar shutipi rimac runa, altarmanta altar jahuapi tiyacmantapash riman.
Diospac huasi shutipi rimac runa, huasimanta huasi ucupi tiyacmantapash riman.
"Chashnallata, jahua pacha shutipi rimac runa Diospac tiyarinamanta quiquin Diosmantapash riman, Dios chai tiyarinapi tiyarishca mari can.

¡Ayailla, cancuna, camachic quillcata yachaccuna fariseocunapash! Llullacamacuna! Cancuna tucui charishcacunamanta chunca raquita Diosman cunquichic, menta nishca, anis nishca, comino nishca muyucunamanta; ranti, camachic quillcapi mai jatuncunata mana ruranquichic: alli cana, cusca shuncuyuc cana, Diosta inina; chaicunami pactachina carca, chai shuccunata mana saquishpa.
¡Ñausa pushaccamacuna, chuspita shushunquichic, ranti camello nishca huihuata millpunquichic!

¡"Ayailla, cancuna, camachic quillcata yachaccuna fariseocunapash! ¡Llullaeumacuna! Canchamanta mucahua cunata pilchicunatapash maillanquichic, ranti, ucuta shuhuashcacunahuan tucuita japinayashcacunahuan juntashca canquichic.
Ñausa fariseo runa, ñaupacta mucahuacuriata pilchicunatapsh ucuta maillanqui, canchatapash pichashca saquirinca.

¡"Ayailla, cancuna, camachic quillcata yachaccuna fariseo cunapash! ¡Llullacamacuna! Cancuna yuracyachishca pantioricuna shina canquichic: canchata sumac ricurinun; ranti, ucuta tullucunata; tucui laya a ismushcata charinun.
Pantioncuria shina canquichic: canchata alli runacuna yachinquichic; ranti, ucuta manalli yuyaihuan manalli rurashcacunahuan juntashca canquichic.
¡"Ayailla, camachic quillcata yachaccuna fariseocunapash! ¡Llullacamacuna! Profetacunapac pantioncunata shayachiriquichic, santo runacunapac pantioncunapi; sisacunata churanquichic, cashna nishpa:
'Ñucanchic ñaupacunapac punchacunapi causashca cacpi, mana yanapanchicman carca
Chashna nishpa, cancuna profetacunata huañuchiscacunamanta miraicuna cashcata ricuchinquichic.
Cancunapac ñaupacuna callarishcata tucuchichic cuti.
¡Machacuicuna, millai machacuimanta mirashcacuna!. ¿Imata rashpa ucupachapi urmanata quishpinquichic?

Cancunapacman profetacunata, yachaccunata, camachiccamacunata cachanca rani. Cancunaca huaquincunata huañuchinquichic, chacatanquichic; huaquincunata tantarina huasicunapi llipachinquichic, shuc llactamanta shuc llactaman ñacachishpa cachanquichic.
Chashna, tucui huañuchi tucushca alli runacunamanta ñacachi tucunquichic, jucha illac Abelmarita pacha Baraquiaspac churi Zacariascama; paita Diospac huasipi tiyac altar jahuapi huañuchircanquichic.
Shuti cancunata nini: chai tucuimanta cunan causaccuna ñacachi tucununca.

¡"Jerusalen, Jerusalen!. Diospac profetacunata huañuchinqui, Dios cachascacunata rumihuan shitanqui. Achca cuti canpac churicunata tantachisha nircani, shuc atallpa mama paipac huahuacunata ricra ucupi ucllashca shina, canca mana munarcanquichu.
Ricuichic cuti, cancunapac huasi jichushca saquirinca; ña mana ricuhuanquichic cancuna cashna rimanacama: "Diospac shutipi shamuc bendisiashca cachun".
Jesus Diospac huasimanta lluscshishpa riracpi, pai yachachishcacuna ninurca: —Diospac huasita ricuilla.
Jesus paicunata nirca: —¿Chai tucuita ricunquichichu?. Shuti cancunata nini, cai huasimanta shuc rumi shuc rumi jahuapi mana saquirincachu. Illacta tulachishcami canca.

Rimacpi, Olivos nishca urcuman rinurca; Jesus tiyaricpi, yachachishcacuna pacalla paita tapunurca: —Imura chai tucunca ñucanchicta huillapai. ¿Ima laya ricurina ricurinca can shamuna puncha cai pacha tucurina punchapash?
Tapunucpi, Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Yuyanquichic ama umachi tucuncapac.
Achca runacuna ñuca shutipi shamununca mari, "ñuca Cristomi cani" nishpa; achcacunata umachinunca.
Macanacui tiyan uyaricpi, ama mancharinquichichu; ñaupacta chai tucuna can, ranti, chaira mana tucurina pachachu.
Llacta shuc llactahuan macanacununca; shuc runacuna shuc runacunahuan huañuchinacununca; achca suyucunapi uncuicuna, yaricaicuna, allpa cuyurinacuna tiyanca.
Chai tucui callarincapacllami can, huasha shamuna llaquicunata ricuchic.
"Ñacachi tucuncapac japishcami canquichic; cancunata huañuchinunca; tucuicunapacpi chicni tucunquichic ñucaraicu.
Chai punchacunapi, achca runa inishcata saquinunca; runapura chicninacununca, shuccuna shuccunata umachinunca,
Achca llulla profetacuna ricurinunca, achcacunata umachinunca.
Manallita rana miraricpi, llaquinacushpa causana pishiyancami.
Mana sanpayashpa Diosta inishpa causac runa quishpichi tucunca.
Diospac cushi shimita tucui suyucunapi uyachina can tucui runacuna chaita ricsincapac; chaipac huasha, cai pacha tucurina pactamunca.
"Profeta Daniel mapayachicmanta huacllichicmantapash quillcashpa saquirca; chai mapayachic Diospac huasipi tiyacpi (caita liisshpa yuyanquichic),
Judeapi causaccuna urcucunaman miticunuchun.
Huasi jahua patapi tiyaccuna ama uraicunuchun ucumanta imatapash apancapac.
Chacrapi tiyaccuna ama huasiman ticranuchun churanata apancapacllapash.
Huicsayuc huarmicuna chuchuchic huarmicunapash, cancunapac yapa manchaipac canca.
Chai miticuna pacha ama tamia punchapi, ama samana punchapi tucuchun Diosta mañaichic.
Chai punchacunaca llaqui punchacuna canunca mari; chashna llaqui cai pacha callarishcamanta mana tiyaicachu, mana imuraspi tiyancachu.
Dios chai punchacunata mana ucta tucuchicpi, mana pipash quishpirinman; ranti, Dios acllashcacunata llaquishcaraicu, chai punchacunata curuyachinca.
"Chashnapi, maicanpash shamushpa nicpi "ricuichic, caipimi Cristo", "chaipimi Cristo", paicunata ama uyanquichichu.
Llulla cristocuna ricurinunca mari; llulla profetacuna jatarinunca, mana raipaccunata rurashpa runacunata umachinunca; usharicpi aellashcacunatapash umachinunman.
Yuyanquichic, ñaupacta cancunaman huillani.
Chairaicu, cancunata ninucpi "ricuichic, chaipimi chunlla allpapi" ama chaiman rinquichichu; "caipimi, huasi ucupi" ninucpi, ama uyanquichichu,
Shuc rayo llinpiyashca ricurin inti llucshishcamanta inti yaicushcaman; chai layallata canca cai RUNA shamuna.
Ismushca aicha tiyashcapi ullahuancacuna tantarinunca.
"Chai llaqui punchacuna huasha, inti yana tucunca; quilla Hahtuyanca, estrellacuna urmahunca, tucui jahua pacha tularinca.
Chaipac huasha cai RUNAta ricuchic ricurinca; chaita ricushpa, tucui runacuna huacancapac callarinunca; huasha cai RUNA sinchi ushaihuan puyucuna jahuapi shamurashcata ricununca.
Pai angelcunata cachanca "sinchita caparishpa tucui suyucunamanta ñuca acllashcacunata tantarichichic" nishpa.
Higuera nishca yurapi tucushcata yuyarichic; paipac pallcacuna llulluyacpi "rupai pacha pactamuran" ninquichic.
Chashnallata, ñuca cunan huillashca pactaricpi ricushpa, tucurina pactamurashcata yachanquichic.
Shuti cancunata nini: Cunan causaccuna chaira mana huañunucpi, ñuca rimashca pactarincami.
Jahua pachahuan cai pachahuan tucurinunca, ñuca rimashca shimi mana chmcarincachu.
"Ima puncha, ima pacha chai tucunea manapi yachanchu; angelcunapash Diospac Churipash mana yachanunchu; Dios Yayalla yachan.
Cai RUNA shamuha punchapi Noe causashca punchacunapi tucushca shina tucurica.
Chai jatun tamia unnashca punchacunapi runacuna micucunurca, upiacunurca, sahuaricunurca, Noe jatun canuapi yaicushca punchacama.
Cuncaimanta jatun yacu shamushpa, tucuicuna japi tucunurca; chashnallata canca cai RUNA shamuna punchapi.
"Chai punchapi ishcai runa chacrapi tiyanunca; shuc apai tucunca, shuc saquishca canca.
Ishcai huarmi cutana rumihuan trigota cutacununca; shuc apai tucunca, shucta saquinunca.
Chairaicu, ricuralla causaichic, mana mari yachanquichic apu shamuna punchata.
Huasi amu shuhua runa shamunata ricsishpa, chapanman shuhua ama husiman yaicuncapa.
Chashna cacpi, cancunapash allichishpa chaparanquichic, cancuna mana ricsishca pacha apu shamunca mari.
"Maican alli yuyayuc runa canca, paipac patron luncucunata micuna pachapi carancapac churashca?
Patron shamushcapi chashna ruracuc cushiyucmi can.
Shuti cancunata nini; patron charishcacunata chai runaman cunca ricuncapac. Ranti, chai runa manalli runa cashpa, "ñuca patron unayancami" yuyashpa,
shuc luncucunata quillachincapac callaricpi; micushpalla, machashpalla causacpi,
pai mana yachashca punchapi, mana yuyashca pachapi patron shamunca;
paitaca sinchi ñacachinca, llullacamacunahuan shina paihuan ruranunca; ñacachi tucushpa, piñarincami quirupash uyaricta.
"Diosta caticcunaman shuc sahuarinapi tucushca shina tucunca. Chunca malta huarmicuna chinpusucunata apashpa, cusa-canata tupancapac rinurca.
Chai chunca huarmicuna, pichca yuyayue canurca, pichca yuyai illaccuna.
Yuyai illaccuna chipusullata apanurca, sindina yacu butita cuncarishpa.
Yuyayuccuna, ranti, chinpusuta sindina yacu butintin apashpa rinurca.
Cusa-cana unayacpi, puñunayashpa puñunurca.
Chaupi tutapi shuc caparirca: —Cusa-cana shamuran, paita tupancapac llucshichic.
Chai shimita uyashpa, tucui malta huarmicuna riccharishpa, chinpusucunata japichinurca.
Yuyai illaccuna yuyayuccunata ninurca: —Ansa sindina yacuta ñucanchicman cuyaichic, ñucanchic chinpusucuna huañurinun mari.
Yuyayuccuna cutipanurca; —Ñucanchic apamushca sindina yacu mana pactancachu; tiendaman ranticrichic.
Tiendaman riranucpi, cusa-cana shamurca. Pai shamucpi, paihuan pacta yuyayuc maltacuna sahuarinata rancapac huasiman yaicunurca. Yaicushpa, puncuta huichcanurca.
Yuyai illaccuna shamushpa cayanurca nishpa: —Puncuta pascapai.
Cusa-cana cutiparca: —Cancunata mana ricsinichu.
Chairaicu "ricuralla causaichic" nirca Jesus; "pai shamuna punchata, pai shamuna pachata mana yachanquichic".
"Diosta caticcunaman shuc runaman tucushca shina tucunca. Chai runa, caruman rinca rashpa, llancaccunata cayashpa, charishcacunata paicunaman mincashpa saquirca.
Shucman pichca huaranca cullquita curca, shucman ishcai huaranca, shucman shuc huaranca, caran amu ushashca tuputa curca. Chaipac huasha, caruman rirca.
Pichca huarancata japishcaruna, chai cullquihuan rantishpa catushpa, shuc pichca huarancata yapachirca.
Ishcai huarancata japishca runa, shuc ishcai huarancata yapachirca.
Shuc huarancata japishca runa, allpapi jutcuta rashpa, patron cushca cullquita pacarca.
Unai huasha, chai runacunapac patron ticramurca paicunahuan allichincapac.
Pichca huarancata japishca runa shuc pichca huarancata apamurca cashna nishpa: —Patron, pichca huaranca cuhuarcanqui, chaicunahuan shuc pichca huarancata yapachircani.
Patron paita nirca: —Allimi, can umayuc canqui. Ansallahuan allita rarcanqui, achcata canta mincasha. Caipi saquiri ñucahuan cushiyancapac.
Huasha ishcai huarancata japishca runa shamushpa nirca: —Patron, ishcai huarancata cuhuarcanqui, chaicunahuan ishcai huarancata yapachircani.
Patron paita nirca: —Allimi, canpash umayuc canqui. Ansallahuan allita rarcanqui; achcata canta mincasha. Caipi saquiri ñucahuan cushiyancapac.
Puchucaipi, shuc huarancata japishca runa shamushpa nirca: —Patron, canta ricsini; can millai shuncuyuc canqui; can mana tarpushcamanta pallanayanqui, can mana tarpushca yuramanta pallasha ninqui;
chairaicu manchashpa, can cuhuashca cullquita allpa ucupi pacarcani, Caica canpac cullqui.
Rimacpi, patron uyashpa nirca: —Manalli runa, quilla runa. Ñuca mana tarpushcamanta pallashcata yacharcanqui, mana tarpushca yuramanta muyucunata pallashcata yacharcanqui.
Chairaiculla ñuca cullquita bancopi churana carcanqui; ñuca ticramucpi, ñucapacta cuhuanunman carca chai cullqui yapashcantin.
Cullquita quichuichic paimanta; chunca huarancata charicman cuichic.
Charic runa ashtahuan cui tucunca, yallicta charincapac; ranti, mana charic pai charishcatapash quichui tucunca.
Chai quilla runata canchaman shitaichic tuta ucuman, tucui lava llaaui tiyashcaman.
"Cai RUNA, jatun apu tucushpa, angelcunahuan pacta shamushpa, paipac tiyarinapi tiyarinca.
Paipac ñaupacpi tucui runacuna tantarinunca. Shuc michic runa obejacunata chitacunamanta chicanyachishca shina, paipash chaillatata ruranca.
Shuccunata shuccunamanta chicanyachinca; allicunata paipac allimaquiman churanca, manallicunata lluqui maquiman.
Huasha, jatun apu alli maquipi tiyaccunata ninca: —Shamuichic, ñuca Yaya llaquishcacuna, callarimanta cancunapac allichishca cushi causaita chasquincapac.
Ñuea yarcashcapi, carahuarcanquichic; upianayashcapi, upiachihuarcanquichic; ñuca huasi illac cashcapi, cancunapac huasipi puñuchihuarcanquichic.
Ñuca llatan cashcapi, churanata cuhuarcanquichic. Ñuca uncushca cashcapi, ñucapacman shamurcanquichic. Chunta curralpi tiyashcapi, ñucata ricuncapac shamurcanquichic;
Chaita uyashpa, allicuna ninunca: —Apunchic, ¿imura canta yaricashcata ricushpa cararcanchic, canta upianayashcata ricushpa upiachircanchic?
¿Imura canta huasi illacta ricushpa ñucanchic huasipi puñuchircanchic; canta llatanta ricushpa, churanata cuyarcanchic?
¿Imura canta uncushcata ricushpa, chunta curralpi ricushpa, canpaman ricanchie canta yanapancapac?
Jatun apu cutipanca: —Shuti cancunata nini: Cancuna cai ñuca runacunahuan chashna rurashpa, ñucahuan rarcanquichic.
Chai huasha, lluqui maquipi tiyaccunata ninca: —Maldisiashcacuna, ñucamanta anchurichic mana tucuric ninaman, supaipac paita caticcunantin allichishca ninaman.
Ñuca yaricashcapi, mana carahuarcanquichic; upianayashcapi, mana upiachihuarcanquichic.

Huasi illac cashcapi, cancunapac huasipi mana puñuchihuarcanquichic; uncushca cashcapi, chunta curralpi tiyashcapi, mana shamurcanquichic ñucata ricuncapac. Llatan cashcapi, churanata mana cuyahuarcanquichic.
Chaita uyashpa, paicunapash tapununca: —¿Imura canta yarcashcata, upianayashcata, llatan cashcata ricushpa; uncushcata, chunta curralpi tiyashcata ricushpa, mana yanaparcanchic?
Jatun Apu cutipanca: —Shuti cancunata nini: Cancuna cai ñuca runacunaman mana yanapashpa, ucata mana yanaparcanquichic.
Chaicuna mana tucuric ninaman rinunca, allicunaca mana tucuric causanaman.
Jesus tucui chaicunata rimashca huasha, yachachishcacunata nirca: —
Ishcai punchalla pishin pascua nishca punchapac, ña yachanquichic; cai RUNAta japinuncami paita chacatancapac.
Chai pachallapi, pacriyaya apucunahuan, camachic quillcata yachaccunahuan, judio apucunahuan Caifaspac huasipi tantarinurca; Caifas pacriyayacuna jatun apu carca.
Tantariccuna Jesusta umachishpa japincapac yuyanurca.
Raimi punchapi chaita rana mana allichu —ninurca—, ama runacuna jatarinuchun nishpa.
Shuc puncha, Jesus Betania llactapi tiyarca, Simon shutiyuc sisu runapac huasipi;
shuc huarmi shamurca yapa balic asnac yacu butita apamushpa. Jesus micucucpi, chai huarmi asnac. yacuta Jesuspac uma jahuapi tallirca.
Yachachishcacuna, chaita ricushpa, yapa piñarishpa, ninurca: Imaraicu chashna jichunun chai yapa balic asnac yacuta?
Chaita rantichishpa, achca cullqui Hucshinmari, tsuntsu runacunaman cuncapac.
Rimanucpi uyashpa, Jesus nirca: —¿Imaraicu cai huarmita piñanquichic? Chashna ñucahuan rurashpa, allita rurarca,
Tsuntsu runacuna cancunahuan huiñai tiyanunca; ranti, ñuca mana huiñai cancunahuan tiyashaehu.
Cai huarmi ñuca aichata asnac yacuhuan armachishpa, ñucata panpancapac allichishpa rurarca.
Shuti cancunata nini: Maitapash cushi shimita huillanucpi, cai huarmi rashcatapash huillanunca, paimanta yuyarinuchun nishpa.
Rimacpi, "chunca ishcaicuriamanta shuc, Judas shutiyuc, pacriyaya apucunapacman rishpa, nirca:
Mashnata cuhuanquichic ñuca Jesusta j apichishpa carcunaman cucpi? Chaita uyashpa, quimsa chunca cullquita paiman cunurca.
Chaimanta pacha Jesusta japincapacima puncha alli carica Judas yuyaricurca.

Mana punquichishca tantata micuna ñaupac punchapi, yachachishcacuna Jesuspacman rishpa, tapunurca: —¿Maipi pascua micunata allichincapac munanqui? —Llactaman richic shuc runapac huasiman; chaiman yaicushpa ninquichic: "Yachactic caita nin: Ñuca pacha ña pactamuran; canpac huasipi pascua micunata micunca rani ñuca runacunantin".
Yachachiscacuna Jesus rimashcata ranurca; pascua micunata allichinurca.
Tutayashcapi, Jesus paipac chunca ishcai runacunahuan shamurca micuncapac.
Micucunucpi, Jesus paicunata nirca: —Shuti nini, cancunamanta shuc ñucata japichinca ran huañuchincapac.
Chaita uyashpa yapa Haquirinurca; huasha huasha paita tapunurca: —¿Ñucachu cani?
Jesus cutiparca: —Ñuca callanamantallata micucuc runa ñucata japichinca ran.
Cai RUNA huañunca ran, quillcacuna rimashca shina; paita japichic runa mana pacarishcapi alli canman.
Rimacpi uyashpa, Jesusta japichinca rac runa, Judas shutiyuc, tapushpa nirca: —¿Yachachic, ñucachu cani? Jesus paita nirca: —Ari.
Micucunucpi, Jesus shuc tantata japirca; Diosta pacrachushpa, tantata paquishpa, yachachishcacunaman curca nishpa: —Micuichic,cai ñuca aichami can.
Huasha, stiuc basota japirca; Diosta pacrachushpa, chaita yachachishcacunaman curca nishpa: —
Cai basomanta tucuicuna upiaichic, cai ñuca yahuar mari can, Dios runacunahuan mushu cushca shimita ricuchic yahuar; cai yahuar tucui runacunamanta tallishca canca juchacunata pichancapac.
Cunanmanta binota mana upiashachu, ñuca Yaya huasipi mushu binota upianacama.
Taquishca huasha Olivos nishca urcuman rinuxca.
Riranucpi, Jesus paicunata nirca: —Tucui cancuna "yancamanta paita catinchic" nishpa rimanquichic cunan tuta, quillcara mari tiyan: Michicta huañuchishami, obejacunaca chausirinunca.
Chashna cacpipash, ñuca causarishami, cancunata ñaupashpa Galileaman risha.
Pedro chaita uyashpa nirca: —Tucuicuna canta jichunucpipash, ñuca canta catishami.
Jesus paita nirca: —Shuti pacha canta nini: Cunan tuta cari atallpa chaira mana caparicpi, can quimsa cuti ñucamanta "paita mana ricsinichu" ninqui.
Pedro cutiparca: —Canhua pacta huañuna cacpipash, chaita mana rimashachu. Shuccunapash chaillatata rimanurca.
Chashna rimarishpa, Jesus paipaccunantin Getsemani nishca panpaman pactarca; chaiman pactac, yachachishcacunata nirca: —Caipi tiyarichic ñuca chainiman Dios-huan rimarinca rani.
Pedrota, ishcai Cebedeo churicunata pushashpa, yapa llaquirincapac callarirca.
Ñacarishpa nirca: —Llaquirishpalla huañunayahuan; caipi saquirichic, ñucahuan Diosman mañaichic.
Chainiman purishpa, tuhuaman urmarca nishpa: —Ñuca Yayalla, usharicpi cai jatun llaquita ñucamanta anchuchipai; ranti, maña ñuca munashca shina tucuchun, canpac munai rurarichun.
Yachachishcacuna tiyashcaman ticrashpa, puñurashcata tuparca; Pedrota nirca: —¿Shuc pachallapash ñucahuan Diosta mañana manachu usharcanquichic?
Mañaraichic juchanayaipi ama urmañcapac; cancunapac yuyai allimi can, ranti aicha sanpa can.
Chaita rimashpa, cutillata Dios-huan rimacrirca. —Yayalla, —nirca—, ñuca cai jatun llaquita apana cacpi, can munashca shina rurarichun.
Yachachiscacuna tiyashcaman ticrashpa, puñurashcata tuparca, yapa puñunayanucpi.
Paicunata saquishpa, cutillata Dios-huan rimacrirca, ñaupa shinata nishpa mañarca.
Chai huasha, yachachishcacuna tiyashcaman ticrashpa nirca: —Chairachu puñuranquichic? Ñuca pacha ña pactamurca. Juchayuccuna cai RUNAta japinca ranun.
Shayarichic, jacuichic, ñucata chasquichinca rac runa shamuran.

Rimacucpi, chunca ishcaicunamanta shuc, Judas shutiyuc, shamurca; paihuan pacta achca runacuna shamunurca mircanucunata, caspicunahuan; pacriyaya apucuna llacta apucunapash paicunata cachashca canurca.
Judas paicunata rimashca carca: —Ñuca muchashca runata japinquichic, paimi Jesus.
Chashnapi, Jesuspacman mayanyashpa, paita mucharcanishpa: —Allillachu canqui, Yachachic?
Jesus paita nirca: —Mashi, can ruranca rashcata rurailla. Chai ucu, Judas-huan shamuccuna Jesusman shitarishpa japinurca.
Chaita ricushpa, shuc Jesus yachachishca runa, mircanuta japishpa, apupac luncuta huactarca, paipac rinrita pitirca,
Jesus nirca: —Mircanuta cara ucupi cutillata ehurai; mircanuhuan huañuchic runa mircanullahuan huañuchi tucunca.
Ñuca munashpa, ¿manachu ñuca Yayata mañaiman, pai chunca huaranca angelta cachahuanman, ñucata quishpichincapac?
Ranti, ¿imashna quillcacuna rimashca pactarinca "chashna tucuna can" nishca?
Huasha runacunata nirca: —Shuhua runata japincapac shina ñucata japincapac shamurcanquichic mircanucunahuan, caspicunahuan. Caran puncha Diospac huasipi yachachic carcani; mana japihuarcanquichic.
Chashna tucun quillcacuna rimashca pactarincapac. Chaita uyashpa, yachachishcacuna Jesusta jichushpa miticunurca.
Jesusta japiccuna apu Caifaspacman pushanurca; chaipi camachic quillcata yachaccuna apucunantin tantarinushca carca.
Pedro carunayamanta apupac huasiman Jesusta catirca; huasi ucumari yaicushpa, luncucunahuan tiyarirca imata Jesusta ranunca ricuncapac.
Pacriyaya apucuna tucui taripaccunantin llulla shimita mashcacunurca Jesusta cautsayachishpa huañuchincapac.
Achca llullashpa rimaccuna shamucpipash, imapash mana tuparishcachu Jesusta cautsayachincapac. Taripanata tucuchincapac, ishcai runa shamushpa, rimanurca nishpa: —Cai runa nirca:
Ñuca Diospac huasita tulachina ushani, quimsa punchapi chaita jatachina ushani.
Chaita uyashpa, pacriyaya jatun apu shayarishpa nirca: —¿Manachu imatapash rimanqui? ¿Imata nishpa caicuna rimashcata rimarcanqui?
Jesus upallarca. Pacriyaya jatun apu cutillata rimarca: —Causac Diospac shutipi canta tapuni: ¿Mesiaschu canqui? ¿Diospac churichu canqui?
Jesus cutiparca nishpa: —Ari, chashnami can; caitapash nini: Shuc puncha tucuita ushac Diospac alli maquiman tiyarishcata ricuhuanquichic; puyu jahuapi shamucucta ricuhuanquichic.
Chaita uyashpa, jatun apu churanata lliquishpa nirca: —Diosta piñashpa rimarca. ¿Imapac ricuyaccunata mutsunchic? Pai rimashcata uyarcanquichic.
¿Imata paita rurashun? Tucuilla caparinurca: —Paita huañuchina can.
Chai huasha, Jesusta ñahuipi tiucanurca, maqui palahuan huactanurca nishpa: —
Mesias, rimai, ¿pimi canta macan?
Chaicama Pedro patiopi tiyarca, allpapi tiyacushpa. Shuc yanapac huarmi paiman mayanyashpa nirca: —Canpash Galileo Jesus-huan puric carcanqui.
Pedro, tucuicunapac ñaupacpi, nirca: —Mana, can rimacushcata mana yachanichu.
Puncuman ricpi chaimanta llucshincapac, shuc yanapac huarmi paita ricushpa, chaipi tiyaccunata nirca: —Caipash Jesus-huan tiyarca.
Pedro rimarca nishpa: —Mana, chai runata mana ricsinichu.
Astanipi, chaipi tiyaccuna Pedrota ninurca: —Shuti, paicunamanta canqui, paicuna shinallata mari rimanqui.
Pedro mana alli shimicunata rimancapac cailarirca nishpa: —Chai runata mana ricsinichu. Chai ucu cari atallpa caparirca.
Pedro Jesus rimashcata yuyarirca pai nishcapi: "Chaira cari atallpa mana caparicpi, paita mana ricsinichu quimsa cuti ninqui". Chaita yuyarishpa, chaimanta llucshispa, yapa huacacurca.
Cayantin puncha inti pacaricpi, pacriyaya apucunahuan llacta apucunahuan imata rana canca nishpa yuyanurca Jesusta huañuchincapac;
maqui huatashpa, apu Pilatopacman pushanurca.
Jesusta japichic Judas, Jesusta huañuchinca ranushcata yachashpa, manallita rarcani nishpa, quimsa chunca cullquita apucunaman cutichirca nishpa: —

Jatun juchata rarcani, alli runata japichircani cancunaman cuncapac. Paicuna ninurca: —Ñucanchicta mana imananchu. ¡Amu yachan! Rimanucpi uyashpa, Diospac huasiman cullquita shitashpa, rirca, huatarishpa huañurca.
Apucuna, cullquita japishpa, ninurca: —Cai cullqui Diosman camari cullqui shina huacaichincapac mana allichu, yahuar cullqui mari can.
Paicunapura rimarishpa, chai cullquihuan mancata ahuac runapac allpata rantinurca, mana judio caccunata chincachincapac.
Chairaicu chai panpa "yahuar panpa" ninun cunancama.
Chashnami Jeremias nishca pactarirca: Quimsa chunca cullquita japircani; chai tupu cullquipi judiocuna ñucata balichinurca;
mancata ahuacpac allpata rantircani Dios rimahuashca shina.
Jesus jatun apu pilato ñaupacpi tiyarca; chai apu Jesusta tapurca: —¿Judiocunapac jatun curacachu canqui? Jesus cutiparca: —Ari, can nishca shina can.
Pacriyaya apucuna rucucunapash juchachinucpi uyashpa, Jesus mana rimarcachu.
Mana rimacpi, Pilato paita nirca: —¿Manachu uyanqui caicuna rimacushcata?
Jesus shuc shimillatapash mana rimarcachu; chairaicu Pilato yapa mancharirca.
Judiocunapac yachai, jatun raimi puncha gubirnu apu shuc chunta curralpi huichcara runata cacharic carca, runacuna acllashcata.

Chai pacha shuc millai runa chunta curralpi huichcara tiyarca; paipac shuti Barrabas. Pilato chaipi tiyac runacunata tapuica: —¿Maicanta ñuca cacharincapac munanquichic? ¿Barrabastachu cacharisha? ¿Jesustachu cacharisha?
Pilato allimi yacharca Jesusta chicnishcamanta japichinushcata.
Pilato taripana tiyarinapi tiyarishca cacpi, paipac huarmi shimita cacharca nishpa: "Ama imata raichu chai alli runata; pairaicu nuspashpa yapa mancharircani".
Pacriyaya apucuna rucunapash "Barrabasta cachari, Jesusta huañuchi" nishpa caparina canquichic runacunaman rimanurca.
Pilato tapushcapi: —¿Maicanta cacharisha?—nishpa, runacuna caparinurca: —Barrabasta cachari,
Pilato cutillata tapurca: —Imata rasha cai Mesias nishca runata? Paicuna cutipanurca nishpa: —Chacatashca cachun.
Pilato tapurca: —¿Ima manallita rurarca? Paicuna ashtahuan caparinurca nishpa: —¡Chacatashca cachun!

Pilato manaimata rana ushani yuyarishpa, judiocuna ashtahuan caparishcata uyashpa, tucuicunapac ñaupacpi maquicunata maillarca nishpa: —Mana imata charinichu cai alli runahuan; cancunallata ricunquichic.
Paicuna caparinurca nishpa: —¡Paipac yahuar ñucanchic jahuapi, ñucanchic churicunapac jahuapi tallirichun!
Chaita uyashpa, Pilato Barrabasta cacharirca; Jesusta llipachishpa, paicunaman curca chacatashca cancapac.
Suldarucuna, Jesusta japishpa, patio ucuman pushanurca; pai muyucta tucui suldarucunata tantachinurca.
Jesuspac churanata surcushpa, shuc puca churanata churachinurca;

chai huasha, paipac umapi shuc cashahuan ahuashca llaututa, Jatun Curacacunapac llautu shina churanurca; paipac maquipi shuc pintuta apu bara shina churanurca. Paipac ñaupacpi cuncurishpa, paita asinurca nishpa: —¡Ricuichic judiocunapac jatun apu!
Paipac ñahuipi tiucashpa, pintuhuan umata huactacunurca.
Paita asishca huasha, puca churanata surcushpa, paipac churanata churachishpa, chacatashca cancapac pushanurca.
Llactamanta llucshishpa, shuc Cirenemanta runata tarinurca, Simon shutiyuc; paita crusta marcachinurca.
Gólgota nishca urcuman pactashpa,
jayac-huan masashca binota upiachinurca; Jesus, chaita camashpa, mana upiarcachu.
Paita chacatashca huasha, paipac churanacunata lichayuccuna japinurca;
huasha, tiyarishpa, chaparanurca.
Crus umapi shuc quillcata churanurca; "imaraicu paita huañuchinun" nishpa quillca nin. Cashna quillcara carca: "Cai judiocunapac Jatun Curaca Jesusmi".
Paihuan pacta ishcai shuhua runata chacatanurca, shuc Jesuspac alli maquipi, shuc lluqui maquipi.
Chaita puriccuna Jesusta asinurca; umata cuyuchishpa,
ninurca: —Can "Diospac huasita tulachina ushani, quimsa punchapi chaita jatachina ushani" nishpa nircanqui; can quiquinta quishpichi; Diospac churi cashpa, crusmanta uraicui.
Pacriyaya apucunapash rucucunantin fariseocunantin paita asinurca nishpa: —
Shuccunata quishpichirca, pai quiquinta mana quishpichina ushan. Judiocunapac apu cashpa, crusmanta uraicuchun, ñucanchic paita inincapac.
Diospi inirca, Dios-pacchuri cani nishpa nirca; Dios paita llaquishpa, cunan paita quishpichichun.
Jesus-huan pacta chacatashca shuhuacunapash paita asinuica.
Chaupi punchamanta chaupi chishicama puncha yana tucurca.
Chaira jahuanaya intipi, Jesus sinchi shimihuan nirca: —Eli, Eli, lacma sabactani (runa shimipi: Ñuca Dioslla, ñuca Dioslla, imaraicu ñucata jichushcanqui).
Huauquin chaipi tiyaccuna, chaita uyashpa, ninurca: —Eliasta cayaran.
Shuc suldaru, esponjata japishpa, jayac binopi jucuchishpa, pintupi huatashpa, Jesusta upiachirca.
Shuccuna ninurca: —Saqui, Elias shamunca chari paita quishpichincapac.
Jesus sinchita caparishpa huañurca.
Chai ucu, Diospac huasipi huarcurashca cortina lliquirirca jahuamanta uracama; allpa cuyurirca, rumicuna raquirinurca.
Aya jutcucuna pascarinurca, achca alli runacuna causarinurca,
Jerusalen llactapi ricurinurca Jesus causarishca huasha.
Suldaru apu suldarucunapash, tucui tucushcata ricushpa, yapa mancharishpa, ninurca: -¡Shuti pacha, cai runa Diospac Churimi carca!
Achca huarmicuna carumanta tucuita ricuranurca; paicuna Jesusta Galileamanta catimushca carca, paita yanapashpa.
Shuc Maria Magdalena carca, shuc Jacobopac Josepac mama Maria, shuc Cebedeo churicunapac mama.
Tutayacucpi, shuc cullquiyuc runa shamurca, Jose shutiyuc, Arimateamanta runa; paipash. Jesusta catic runa carca.
Pilatopacman rishpa, Jesuspac ayata mañarca. Mañacpi, Pilato ayata paiman cuncapac rimarca.
Jose, ayata japishpa, mushu churanahuan pillushpa,
pai quiquinpac aya panpana jutcupi churarca; chai aya panpana jutcu mushu carca, rumipi allashca. Shuc jatun rumihuan chai jutcuta huichcashca huasha, rirca.
Chaipi tiyacunurca Maria Magdalena, shuc Mariapash, panpana jutcu ñahuipura;

Gayantin puncha, parasceve nishca puncha huasha, pacriyaya apucunahuanfariseocunahuan Pilatopacman rinurca. Chaiman pactashpa, cashna ninurca: —Apu, cunan yuyarinchic chai umachic runa, chaira causacushpaj nishcata: "Quimsa puncha huasha causarishami".

Chairaicu panpashcata ricunuchun quimsa punchacama, ama: pai yachachiscacuna tutapi shamushpa, ayata shuhuanuchun; shuhuashpa, runacunata rimanunca nishpa: "Causarishcami". Chashna tucucpi, chai umachishca tucui pai umachishcacunamanta yalli canca.
Chashna ninucpi, Pilato nirca: —Suldarucunata charinquichic; aya jutcuta allita ricunuchun.
Chaitauyashpa, ayata panpanushcaman rinurca; jutcuta huichcac rumita selloyachishpa, suldarucunata chaipi saquinurca ricuncapac.
Samana puncha huasha, semana ñaupac puncha ña pacaricucpi, ishcai huarmi: Maria Magdalena shuc, Maria shuc, panparata ricuncapac rinurca.
Cuncaimanta, allpa sinchi cuyurirca. Shuc angel uraicushpa, rumita anchuchishpa, rumi jahuapi tiyarirca.
Paipac ñahui chiuclla ricurirca, paipac churana rasu shina yurac carca.
Ayata ricuc suldarucuna, manchaimanta chucchushpa, huañushca shina saquirinurca.
Angel huarmicunata nirca: —Ama manchaichichu. Chacatashca Jesusta mashcaranquichic;
mana capichu; causarircami pai nishca shina. Pai sirirashcata ricuichic.
Huasha, utcalla rinquichic pai yachachishcacunaman huillancapac. "Causarishcami" ninquichic. Cancunata ñaupashpa Galileaman rinca; chaipi paita ricunquichic. Chaita huillancapac shamurcani.
Huarmicuna, chaita uyashpa, yapa cushiyashpa, yachachishcacunaman huillacrinurca.
Riranucpi, Jesus paicunahuan tuparishpa nirca: —¡Cushiyaichic! Paicuna mayanyarishpa, tuhuaman urmashpa, Jesuspac chaquita ucllarishpa paita chacchanurca.
Jesus paicunata nirca: —Ama manchaichichu; ñuca huauquicunaman huillacrichic: Galileaman rinuchun, chaipi ricuhuanquichic.
Huarmicuna riranucpi, ayata ricuc suldarucuna llactaman rishpa, pacriyaya apucunaman tucui tucushcata huillanurca.
Pacriyaya apucuna, chaita uyashpa, rucucunahuan rimarincapac rinurca; chai huasha, suldarucunaman achca cullquita cuyanurca nishpa: —
Cancuna caita ninquichic: "Tutapi, ñucanchic puñurashcapi, pai yachachishcacuna shamushpa, ayata shuhuanurca".
Apu chaita uyacpi, ñucanchic paihuan rimashun cancunata quishpichincapac.
Chaita uyashpa, suldarucuna cullquita japishpa, paicunaman rimanushcata rimanurca. Chai llullashcata cunan punchacama judiocuna ininun.
Chunca shuc yachachishcacuna Galileaman rinurca, Jesus nishca urcuman. Chaipi Jesus paicunaman ricurirca;
paita ricushpa chacchanurca; huaquincuna shuncullapi ninurca: "Paichu mana paichu imata".
Jesus paicunaman mayanyashpa nirca: —Ñuca tucuita ushani cai pachapi jahua pachapipash.
Richic, tucui runacunata yachachichic; paicunata Yayapac Churipac Santo Samaipac shutipi bautisanquichic; ñuca rimashcata rancapac paicunata yachachinquichic.
Uyaichic: Ñuca huiñai cancunahuan tiyasha cai pacha tucurinacama.
Diospac Churi Jesucristomanta alli shimi cashnami callarirca.
Profeta Isaias quillcashca carca nishpa: "Ñuca shimita apac runata ñanpita allichincapac cachani:
Chunlla allpapi shuc shimi uyarin cashna nishpa: Ñanpita Diospac allichichic, cuscachichic".

Chashna cacpi, Juan chunlla allpapi runacunata bautisac carca, cashna camachishpa: —Juchamanta llushpirincapac, shuncupi llaquirishpa, manalli causanata saquishpa, Diosman ticrana canquichic, bautisai tucuna canquichic.
Judeamanta Jerusalenmantapash tucui runa Juanpacman shamuccuna carca. Juchacunata rimanucpi, Juan Jordan yacupi paicunata bautisac carca.
Juan camello nishca huihua huillmahuan ahuashca churanata churarishca carca, huacra carahuan chunpillishca; sacha mishquita jijitapash micushpa causacurca.
Cashna rimashpa camachic carca: —Ñuca huashalla ñucamanta yalli ushac shamuncami; ñuca paipac ushutapac huascata pascancapac mana allichu cani.
Ñuca cancunata yacuhuan bautisani, ranti pai Santo Samaihuan cancunata bautisanca.
Chai punchacuna, Jesus Galileapi tiyac Nazaret llactamanta shamushcapi. Juan paita Jordan yacupi bautisarca.
Yacumanta llucshishca shina, Jesus jahua pachata pascarishcata ricurca, santo Samai paipac jahuapi urpi shina uraicucucta ricurca.
Jahua pachamanta shuc shimi uyarirca, cashna nishpa: —Can ñuca llaquishca Churimi canqui. Canhuan cushiyani.
Chai huasha, Santo Samai Jesusta chunlla allpaman purichirca.
Chuscu chunca puncha chaipi sacha aichacunahuan tiyarca; supai paita camarca. Huasha angelcuna paita caranurca.
Juanta japishpa chunta curralpi huichcanushcapi, Jesus Galilea suyuman rirca; chaipi Diospac shimita uyachic carca,
cashna nishpa: —Pactana pacha pactamurcami; Diospac pacha mayanlla can. Manalli causanata saquishpa, Diosman ticraichic, cushi shimita uyaichic.
Galilea cucha patata puricushpa, Jesus Simonta ricurca; paipac huauqui Andres-huan tiyarca. Paicuna yacu aichata japiccuna cashpa, llicata cuchapi shitaranurca.
Jesus paicunata nirca: —Ñucahuan shamuichic, runacunata japiccamata cancunata rasha.
Chai ucullapi, llicata saquishpa, Jesusta catinurca.
Astanipi, Jesus Galileapi puricushpa, Cebedeopac churi Santiagota ricurca paipac huauqui Juantin; canuapi llicata allichiranurca.
Jesus paicunata cayarca; paicunaca, yayata llancaccunantin canuapi saquishpa, Jesus-huan rinurca.
Chashna rishpa, Cafarnaun nishca llactaman pactanurca. Samana punchapi Jesus tantarina huasiman rirca runacunata yachachincapac.
Pai rimashcata uyaccuna mancharinurca, paipac yachachina shuc laya mari carca, ushaihuan yachachic carca, mana camachic quillcata yachaccuna shina.
Chai tantarina huasipi, shuc supai japishca runa tiyarca; caparincapac callarirca nishpa: —
Nazaretmanta Jesus, ¿imatata ñucanchicmanta munanqui? ¿Ñucanchicta tucuchincapacchu shamunqui? Canta ricsinimi, Dios acllashca runa canqui.
Jesus paita rimarca: —¡Upallai, cai runamanta llucshi!
Supaica, chai runata cushpachishpa, shinchita caparishpa, paimanta llucshirca.
Tucui chaita ricuccuna yapa mancharishpa, rimanacunurca nishpa: —¿Imami cai? ¡Shuc laya yachachin; supaicunata rimacpi, supaicuna paita uyanun!
Tucui Galilea llactacunapi Jesusmanta rimarirca.
Chai tantarina huasimanta llucshishpa, Jesus Santiagontin Juantin Simonpac Andrespac huasiman rirca.
Simonpac huarmi mama uncushpa siricurca; Jesusta paimanta rimanurca.
Jesus pai tiyashcaman yaicushpa, paita maquinanta japishpa jatarichirca. Chai ucullapi uncui samarirca. Ña alliyashpa paicunata sirbicurca.
Chishita, inti ña yaicucucpi, tucui uncushcacunata supai japishcacunatapash Jesuspacman pushanurca.
Tucui runacuna huasi puncupi munturinurca.
Jesus tucui laya uncushcacunata alliyachirca, supai japishcacunamanta supaita callpachirca. Supaicuna paita ricsinucpica, Jesus paicunata mana rimachircachu.
Cayantiman, tuta ucuta jatarishpa, huasimanta llucshirca, chunlla allpaman rirca Dios-huan rimarincapac.
Simon paihuan tiyaccunantin Jesusta mashcancapac rinurca.
Paita tupashpaca ninurca: —Tucuilla canta mashcaranun.
Jesus paicunata nirca: —Jacuichic shucman, mayan llactacunapi cushi shimita uyachincapac; chaipacmi shamurcani mari.
Chaimanta tucui Galilea suyuta purirarca, tantarina huasicunapi camachishpa, supaita supai japishcacunamanta jichushpa.
Shuc puncha, shuc sisu runa Jesuspacman shamurca. Cuncurishpa, paita mañarca nishpa: —Can munashpa, ñucata janpinata ushanqui.
Jesus paimanta llaquirishpa, maquihuan paita llancarca nishpa: —¡Munanimi, alliyashca saquiri!
Chai ucullapi chai runa pichara saquirirca.
Huasha paita cacharca nishpa: —
Ama pitapash rimaichu; ranti, pacriyayapacman rishpa, picharishcamanta Moises rimashcata cunqui, tucuicuna yachancapac can ña janpi tucushcata. ¿

Pai rishpa, tucuicunaman huillancapac callarirca. Chairaicu, Jesus llactacunaman runacuna ucupi mana yaicunata munarcachu. Runa illashcapi saquiric carca; chashnapash, achca runa tucui llactacunamanta paipacman shamuccuna carca.
Ansa punchacuna huasha, Jesus Cafarnaun llactaman ticrarca; huasipi tiyashcata uyarirca.
Achca runacuna paipacman shamunurca, huasi puncuta huichcacta. Pai Diospac shimita uyachicurca.
Rimacucpi, chuscu runapura shuc suchu runata huantushpa shamunurca.
Jesus tiyashcaman mana pactana ushashpa, huasi jahuamanta shuc jutcuta rashpa, Jesuspac ñaupacman uncushcata uraicuchinurca.
Jesus paicuna inishcata ricushpa, uncushca runata nirca: —Churi, canpac juchacuna maillai tucunun.
Huaquin yachaccuna chaipi tiyanurca. Jesus rimashcata uyashpa, paicunapac shuncupi yuyanurca nishpa:
¿"Imaraicu chashna riman? Diosta camicun. ¿Pitac juchacunata maillana ushan mana Dios cashpa?"
Jesus paicuna yuyacushcata yachashpa, nirca: —¿Imaraicu chashna yuyanquichic?
¿Imata ashtahuan rimanalla can: Cai uncushca runaman "canpac juchacuna maillai tucunun" nishpa rimanachu? "Jatari, cahuituta apashpa ri" nishpa rimanachu? ¿Manachu cutipahuanquichic?
Ñuca cai pachapi juchacunata maillana ushashcata ricuchinca rani. Huasha suchu runata nirca: —Uyai, jatari, canpac cahuituta japishpa huasiman ri.
Chai ucullapi jatarirca, cahuituta japishpa, tucuicuna ricuranucpi llucshirca. Chaita ricuccuna mancharinurca; Diosta chacchanurca nishpa: —¡Manapacha! ¡Mana imura chashna ricushcanchic!
Jesus chaimanta llucshishpa, yacu pataman cutillata rirca. Achca runacuna paipacman shamunurca; Jesus paicunata yachachicurca.
Purirashpa, Alfeopae churi Levi shutiyuc runata ricurca, gubirnu cullquita pallana huasipi tiyacurca. Jesus paita nirca: —Ñucahuan shamui. Chai runa uyashpa, jatarishpa, Jesusta catishpa rirca.

Huasha, Jesus Levi huasipi micucucpi, achca gubirnu cullquita pallaccuna achca juchayuccunapash Jesus-huan pacta, pai yachachishcacunahuan pacta micuncapac shamunurca, achca runacuna mari Jesusta catishpa puriccuna carca.

Camachic quillcata yachaccuna fariseocunantin, Jesus gubirnu cullquita pallaccunahuan juchayuccunahuanpash micurashcata ricushpa, pai yachachishcacunata tapunurca: —¿Imaraicu cancunata yachachic gubirnu cullquita pallaccunahuan juchayuccunahuanpash micushpa upiashpa purin?
Jesus paicunata uyashpa nirca: —Alli causaccuna janpiccamata mana mutsunun; uncushcacuna janpiccamata mutsunun. Ñucaca mana shamurcanichu allicunata cayancapac; manallicunata mashcancapac shamurcani.

Bautisac Juan yachachishcacunahuan fariseocunahuan sasicushca punchapi, huaquin runacuna Jesuspacman shamunurca paita tapushpa: —Juan yachachishcacunahuan fariseocunahuan sasiccuna can; ¿imaraicu canpaccuna mana sasinun?
Tapunucpi, Jesus cutiparca: —Sahuarinaman cayashcacuna sasicchu canun, cari paicunahuan tiyacpi? Mana, cari paicunahuan tiyacpi mana sasinunchu.
Cari pushai tucuna puncha pactamucpi, sasinunca.
Manapí runa rucu churanata mushu churana pitihuan llachapanchu; chashna racpi, mushu churana curuyacpi, rucu churanata aisashpa, ashtahuan lliquichinca.
Chashnallata, manapí mushu binota rucu cara purupi churan; chashna racpi, mushu bino rucu cara puruta tucyachicpi, bino tallirinca, ishcaintin huacllirin. Mushu bino mushu cara purupi churana can.
Shuc samana puncha Jesus shuc tarpushca ucuta purirarca. Pai yachachishcacuna chaita purishpa, trigo huancuta aisashpa japinurca.
Fariseocuna, chaita ricushpa, Jesusta ninurca: —Riqui, samana puncha chashna rana mana allichu.
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —¿Manachu yachanquichic David rurashcata micuna illac yaricashcapi paihuan tiyaccunantin?
Abiatar pacriyaya apu cashcapi, David Diospac huasiman yaicushpa, camari tantacunata micurca. (Chai laya tantata pacriyayacunalla micunun). Paihuan tiyaccunatapash cararca.
Huasha nirca: —Samana puncha runaraicu rurashca can, mana runa samana puncharaicu.
Chairaicu, cai RUNA samana punchapacpash amumi can.
Cutillata Jesus tantarina huasiman yaicurca. Chaipi shuc huacllishca maquiyuc runa tiyarca.
Fariseocuna Jesusta chapacunurca, chai runata samana punchapi allichincachu ima chari, paita cautsayachincapac.
Jesus chai huacllishca maquiyuc runata nirca: —Jatarishpa, chaupi shuncupi shayari.

Jesus chaipi tiyaccunata tapurca: —¿Samana puncha imata ruraipac can? ¿Allita rurana usharinchu? ¿Manallita rurana usharinchu? ¿Shuc runata huañunamanta quishpichina allichu? ¿Huañuncapac saquinachu? ¿Imata ninquichic? Paicuna chunlla saquirinurca.
Jesus piñarishpa, muyucta ricushpa, paicuna manalli shuncuyuc cashcamanta llaquirishpa, runata nirca: —Canpac maquita chutachi. Chutachicpi alliyarca.
Fariseocuna, chaimanta llucshishpa, Herodesta caticcunahuan rimarinurca imashnata Jesusta huañuchishun nishpa.
Jesus pai yachachishcacunantin Galilea cucha pataman rirca. Galileamanta, Judeamanta,
Jerusalenmanta, Idumeamanta, Jordan chinpamanta, Tiro Sidon llactacunamantapash achca runacuna paipacman shamunurca, paimanta rimarishcata uyashpa.
Chashna cacpi, Jesus pai yachachishcacunata nirca: —Shuc canuata allichichic runacunata ama jaitahuancapac.
Achca uncushcacunata alliyachicpi, tucui laya uncuccuna paipacman shitarinurca, paita llancancapac.
Supaicuna, paita ricushpa, cuncurishpa, capariranurca nishpa: —Can Diospac Churimi canqui.
Ranti, Jesus sinchita paicunata rimarca nishpa: —Ñuca pi cashcata ama huillaichichu.
Jesus shuc urcuman sicashpa, pai munashcacunata "ñucaman shamuichic" nirca.
Shamunucpi, paicunamanta chunca ishcaita acllarca paihuan tiyancapac, paicunata camachincapac cachancapacpash,
supaicunata jichuna ushaita paicunaman cushpa.
Caimi paicunapac shuticuna: Simon (paita "Pedro" shutichirca),
Cebedeopac churicuna Santiago, paipac huauqui Juan (paicunata "Boanarges" shutichirca; runa shimipi "Tulun churicuna"),
Andres, Felipe, Bartolome, Mateo, Tomas, Alfeopac churi Santiago, Tadeo, Simon "cananeo" nishca,
Judas Iscariote (pai Jesusta japichirca).
Chai huasha, Jesus paipac huasiman ticrarca. Achca runa cuti tantaricpi, micuncapapash mana ushanurcachu.
Paipac aillucuna Jesus huasipi tiyashcata yachashpa, paita pushancapac shamunurca runacuna rimacpi nishpa "Yuyai illac tucurca".
Jerusalenmanta shamushca yachaccuna ninurca: —Cai runa Belcebú supai aputa ucupi charin, paipac ushaihuan supaicunata jichun.
Chashna rimanucpi, Jesus paicunata cayashpa, cashna nishpa yachachirca: —¿Imashna supai apu, Satanás nishca, Satanasllata jichunca?
Shuc llactapi causaecuna, chican chican chaupiricpi, chai llacta tucurincami.
Chashnallata, shuc huasipi causac aillucuna, paicunapura macanacushpa, tucurinuncami.
Satanashpash pai quiquinllata piñashpa, tucurincami.
Manapí shuc sinchi runapac huasiman yaicuna ushan shuhuancapac, ñaupacta mana paita huatashpa. Paita huatashca huasha, shuhuana ushancami.
Huasha, Jesus yapashpa nirca: —Runa tucui laya juchallishcata, tucui rimashca manalli shimita quishpichina usharin.
Ranti, Santo Samaita piñashpa manallita rimac runa mana imura quishpichi tucunca, chicapac juchata aparinca.
Chashna nirca Jesus, paicuna "millai supaita ucupi charin" nishpa rimashcamanta.
Jesus rimacucpi, paipac mama paipac huauquicunantin shamushpa, canchamanta paita cayachinurca.
Jesus muyucta tiyarishcacuna paita ninurca: —Uyai, canpac mama canpac huauquicunantin canchapi tiyanun, canta mashcanun.
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —¿Pitac can ñuca mama, maican ñuca huauqui?
Huasha, pai muyucta tiyaccunaman ricushpa nirca: —Caicunami ñuca mama, ñuca aillucuna,
Dios rimashcata pactachic runa paimi ñuca huauqui, ñuca pani, ñuca mama.
Cutillata Jesus cucha patapi yachachincapac callarirca. Achca runa tantarinucpi, Jesus shuc canua ucuman yaicushpa, tiyarirca; runacuna yacu patapi saquirinurca.
Jesus unaita paicunata yachachirca; cashna rimacurca: —Uyaichic: Shuc runa chacraman tarpuncapac rirca.
Tarpucpica, huaquin muyucuna ñanpipi urmanurca; pishcucuna shamushpa micunurca,
Huaquin muyucuna rumi panpapi urmanurca, mana achca allpa tiyashcapi; utcalla huiñarirca, allpa mana yapa ucuta cacpi;
inti llucshicpi, huiñashca muyu sapi illac cashpa, chaquirishpa huañurca;
shuc muyucuna huita ucupi urmanurca; huitaca chai muyuta mana huiñachirca; chai muyuca mana aparirca.
Shuc muyucuna alli allpapi urmanurca. Sumac huiñanurca, achcata aparinurca: huaquin muyumanta quimsa chunca muyu llucshirca, huaquinmanta sucta chunca muyu, huaquinmanta shuc patsac.
Huasha Jesus nirca: —Yuyayuc runa yuyachun.
Jesus sapalla saquiricpi, paita caticcuna pai yachachishcacunahuan pacta paita tapunurca: —¿Can rimashca imata ricuchin?
Jesus nirca: —Dios paipac manapí yachashca shimita cancunaman ricuchirca, paipac pachata ricsichincapac. Ranti, shuccunaman, canchapi tiyaccunaman mana atipaipac tucun,
Diospac quillca nin: "Paicuna ricurashpapash, mana ricununcachu; allita uyashpapash, mana atipanuncachu, ama Diosman ticrashpa quispichi tucuncapac".
Huasha nirca: —¿Tarpucmanta rimashcata manachu atiparcanquichic? ¿Imashnata shuc rimanacunata atipanquichic?
Tarpuc runa Diospac shimita tarpun.
Huaquin runacuna ñanpipi urmashca muyucuna shinami: Diospac shimita uyanun; uyashca shinalla supai apu shamushpa, chai shimita paicunapac shuncumanta apan.
Huaquin runacuna rumi panpapi urmashca muyucuna shinami: Diospac shimita cushiyashcahuan uyanun;
ranti, paicunapac shuncupi mana ucuman yaicun, mana sinchicunun; chai shimita inishcamanta llaqui shamucpi, ñacachi tucunucpi, chaita jichunun.
Huaquin runacuna huita ucupi urmashca muyucuna shinami: Diospac shimita uyanun;
ranti, cai causaipaccunata yapa yuyanun, cullquiyuc tucunata yapa munanun, cai pacha cushicunapi shuncuta churanun; chai tucui alli shimita huañuchinun, chai shimica mana aparinchu.

Huaquin runacuna alli allpapi tarpushca muyucuna shina canun. Diospac shimita uyanun, uyashcata huacaichinun; sumac aparinun; huaquincuna quimsa chunca tupu, huaquincuna sucta chunca tupu, huaquincuna shuc patsac tupu aparinun.
Shuctapash rimarca cashna nishpa: —Cancuna chinpusuta japichishpa, ¿chaita mala ucupi churanquichichu? ¿Cahuitu ucupi churanquichichu? Mana, jahuapi churanquichic ricuchincapac.
Imapash pacashca cashpa, pacllaman llucshichishca canca, pacalla rimashcátaca tucuicuna yachanunca.
Yuyayuc runa yurarichun.
Shuctapash rimarca nishpa: —Cancuna tupushca tupullahuan tupui tucunquichic, yapashpa cushcanquichic.
Charic runa ashtahuan cui tucunca. Mana charic runa pai charishcashituta quichui tucunca.
Shuctapash nirca: —Diospac pacha shuc tarpuc runahuan tucushca shina tucun. Chai runa allpapi tarpun.
Pai tutapi puñun, punchapi jatarin. Chai muyu llucshin, huiñan, runa mana yuraricpipash.
Allpa pai quiquinmanta aparichin. Ñaupacta panca llucshin, huasha tuctun, huasha muyuyan;
muyu pucucpi, pallanun.
Shuctapash nirca: —¿Diospac pacha imashnata ricurin? ¿Imahuan chinpapurachishun?
Shuc mostaza nishca muyu shinami. Tarpushcapi, tucui muyucunamanta yalli uchilla can.
Huasha huiñan, tucui quihuacunamanta yalli jatun tucun. Huairapi huanpuric pishcucuna paipac llantupi samanun.
Chai laya shimicunahuan Jesus paicunata yachachicurca, paicuna japina ushancapac.

Chai laya rimanacunahuan tucuita nic carca. Pai yachachishcacunata tucuita chicanpi sumacta atipachirca. Chai punchallapita, ña tutayacpi, Jesus pai yachachishcacunata nirca: —Jacuichic cucha chinpaman.
Paicuna runacunata saquishpa, Jesusta pushanurca pai tiyashca canuallapi. Paihuan pacta shuc canuacuna rinurca.
Sinchi huaira jataricpi, bacucuna canuaman yaicuracpi, ñalla panparirarca.
Jesus canua siquipi, shuc saunapi puñurarca. Paita ricchachishpa ninurca: —¡Panparicunchicmi! ¿Canta manachu Uaquinayan?
Pai riccharishpa, huairata piñashpa, yacuta nirca: —¡Upallai, samari! Rimacpi, huaira samarirca, tucui chunlla tucurca.
Huasha paicunata nirca: —¿Imaraicuta manchanquichic? ¿Chaira manachu ininquichic?
Paicuna, yapa mancharishpa, rimanacunurca nishpa: —¡Manapacha! ¿Pitac can cai runa? ¡Huairapash yacupash paita uyanun!
Cucha chinpaman pactanurca, Gadara nishca panpa– man.
Jesus canuamanta llucshishca shina, shuc supai japishca runa paipacman shamurca.
Chai runa aya jutcucunapi causac carca. Manapí paita japinata usharca jillai huascacunahuanpash.
Achca cuti paita jillai huascacunahuan huatanushca carca. Pai tucuita paquic carca; manapí paihuan usharca.
Tutantin punchantin aya jutcu panpapi urcucuna— pipash caparishpa puricachac carca, rumicunahuan huacta– rishpa.
Jesusta ricushpa, paipacman callparca. Cuncurishpa,
sinchita caparirca nishpa: —¿Imaraicu ñucahuan satirinqui, Jesus jatun Diospac Churi? Diosmanta mañani ama ñucata ñacachichu.
(Jesus paita nishcarca: "Mapa supai, cai runamanta llucshi" nishpa)
Jesus paita tapurca: —¿Ima shuti canqui? Pai cutipashpa nirca: —Ñuca shuti "jatun bulami", achcapura mari canchic.
Jesusta achcata mañacurca nishpa: —Cai allpamanta ama shitahuaichu.
Urcu chaquipi achca cuchicuna micuranurca.
Supaicuna Jesusta nicurca: —Ñucanchicta cuchicunapi yaicuchipai.
Jesus "allimi" nicpi, supaicuna runamanta llucshishpa, cuchicunapi yaicunurca. Cuchicunaca, ishcai huaranca tupu, yacuman urmashpa, chucallishpa huañunurca.
Cuchi ricuccamacuna miticunurca. Tucushcata tucuicunaman huillanurca. Uyaccuna ricuncapac shamunurca.
Jesuspacman pactashpa, supai japishca runata tupanurca. Tiyarishcata, churanata churarishcata, yuyayucta ricushpa, mancharinurca.
Ricuccuna chai runaman tucushcata cuchicunaman tucushcatapash huillanurca.
Uyaccuna Jesusta mañanurca nishpa: —Caimanta llucshipai.
Rimanucpi uyashpa, Jesus canuaman ticrarca. Yaicuracpi, chai supai japishca cashca runa "canhuan pushahuai" nishpa mañarca. Ranti,
Jesus mana munarcachu; paita nirca: —Canpac huasiman ri, canpac aillucunapacman. Dios llaquirishpa canhuan rashcata tucuicunaman huillanqui.
Chashna nicpi Jesus, chai runa rishpa, Decapoli nishca llactacunapi Jesus paihuan rashcata rimarca. Rimacpi uyashpa, tucuicuna mancharinurca.
Jesus chinpaman cutillata rirca. Achca runacuna pai muyucta tantarinucpi, cucha patapi saquirirca.
Chaipi, shuc tantarina huasi apu Jairo shutiyuc shamurca. Jesusta ricushpa, paipac ñaupacpi tuhuaman urmashpa, mañarca nishpa: —
Ñuca ushushi huañuran, shamupai. Canpac maqui paipac jahuapi churacpi alliyashpa causancami.
Rimacpi, Jesus paihuan rirca. Achca runacuna paita catishpa, tancashpa, tancashpa puricunurca.
Chai runacuna ucupi shuc uncushca huarmi tiyarca; chunca ishcai huatata yahuar tallirishpa causarca.
Achca janpiccama janpisha nishpa, paita nanachishca canurca, paipac cullquita tucuchishpa. Ranti, paita alliyachina mana ushanurcachu.
Chai huarmi Jesusmanta rimarishcata uyashpa, runacuna ucupi Jesusman mayanyashpa, huashata paipac churanata llancarca,
stuncupi yuyarishpa nishpa: "Paipac churanata llancashpallahuan alliyashami".
Llancacpi, paipac yahuar saquirirca, paipac aicha alliyashcata yacharca.
Chai ucullapi Jesus, paimanta shuc ushai llucshishcata yachashpa, huashaman ricushpa nirca: —Pitac ñuca churanata llancarca?
Yachachishcacuna cutipanurca: —Manachu carita quichquiyachishcata ricunqui? Canca: "Pitac llancahuarca" ninqui?
Ranti, Jesus muyucta ricurashpa saquirirca, paita llancashcata ricuncapac.
Chashna ricuracpi, chai huarmi, manchashpa, Jesuspac ñaupacpi cuncurishpa, tucuita huillarca.
Jesus paita nirca: —Ushushi, ama manchaichu. Can inishca canta quishpichirca. Ganaslla ri, alliyashca saquiri.
Jesus chaira rimacucpi, apupac huasimanta shamunurca nishpa: —Canpac ushushi ña huañurca. ¿Imapacta Jesusta quillachinqui?
Jesus chaita uyashpa, chai apu runata nirca: —Ama manchaichu, inilla.
Manapita munarca paihuan rincapac. Pedro, Santiago paipac huauqui Juan paicunalla Jesus—huan rinurca.
Apu huasiman pactashcapi, jatun tulupuna uyarirca, huacashpa, caparishpa.
Jesus nirca: —¿Imami cai tulupuna? Huahua mana huañushcachu, puñuranlla.
Chashna rimacpi, runacuna paita asinurca. Ranti, Jesus tucuicunata llucshichishpa, huahua tiyashcaman yaicurca paihuan shamushcacunantin. Huahuapac yayata mamatapash pusharca.
Huahuata maquimanta japishpa nirca: —Talita cumi (runa shimipi: "Ushushi, jatari nini")
Chai ucullapi huahua shayarishpa, purincapac callarir— ca (chunca ishcai huatayuc mari carca). Tucuicuna cushiyashpa yapa mancharinurca.
Jesus paicunata nirca: —Ama pitapash rimaichichu. Huahuata caraichic.
Jesus pai yachachishcacunantin paipac llactaman shamurca.

Samana puncha tantarina huasipi yachachicurca. Paita uyaccuna, mancharishpa, rimanacunurca nishpa: —¿Chai tucuita maipi yacharca? ¿Pai yachashcata maimanta yachan? ¿Mana raipacta rana ushanata maimanta chasquirca?

Shuti pacha, pai tucuicuna ricsishca carpintero runami, Mariapac churi. Santiago, Jose, Judas, Simon paipac huauquicuna canun. Paipac panicuna ñucanchihuan tiyanun. Chashna nishpa, paita mana uyanurcachu.
Jesus paicunata nirca: —Tucui pachapi profetata llaquinun. Paipac llactamanta caccuna, paipac quiquin aillucuna paita mana yupaichanunchu.
Chai llactapica ima mana raipacta mana rarcachu. Huaquin uncuccunata janpirca, maquita umapi churashpa.
Jesus paicuna mana inishcamanta mancharirca. Chaimanta rishpa, mayan llactacunata yachachishpa purirarca.
Chai huasha, chunca ishcai acllashcacunata cayashpa, ishcai ishcaita paicunata cacharca. Supaicunata jichuna ushanata paicunaman curca.
Paicunata nirca: —Ama imatapash apanquichichu. Shicrata, tantata, cullquita ama apanquichichu. Purina caspillata,
ushutatapash apanquichic. Ishcai churanata ama apanquichichu.
Huasha, yapashpa nirca: —Shuc llataman yaicushpa, puñuncapac shuc huasita mashcanquiehic, Chaillapita saquirinquichic llactamantarinacama.
Maipipash cancunata mana chasquinucpi, mana uyanucpi, chaimanta llucshishpa, chaquimanta allpata chausinquichic, paicuna manalli rashcata ricuchincapac.
Chashna rimacpi Jesus, yachachishcacuna camachincapac rinurca, "Diosman ticraichic" nishpa.
Achca uncushcacunata supai japishcacunatapash alliyachinurca, huirahuan uncuccunata cacushpa.
Tucui llactacunapi Jesusmanta rimaricpi, Herodespash paimanta uyarca. Herodes nirca: —Cai runa Bautisac Juanmi, huañushcacunamanta causarishca. Chairaicu mana raipaccunata rana ushan.
Huaquincuna ninurca: —Cai runa Profeta Eliasmi. Shuccuna ninurca: —Shuc profetami, ñaupa profetacuna shina.
Herodes, runacuna rimashcata uyashpa, nirca: —Cai runa Juanmi, ñuca huañuchishca. Pai causarishcami.

Herodesllata Juanta japichishca carca. Paita jillai huascahuan huatashpa, chunta curralpi huichcashca carca, Herodias chashna munashcaraicu. Chai huarmi Herodespac huauqui Felipepac huarmi cacpi, Herodes paita japishca carca.
Juanca paita camachishcarca nishpa: —Canpac huauquipac huarmita japircanqui, mana allichu.
Chairaicu Herodias Juanta yapa chicnirca, paita huañuchisha nishpa. Ranti, mana usharcachu,
Herodes Juanta mancharca mari, "pai alli runa, Diosta uyac runa" can nishpa. Paita quishpichic carca. Pai camachishcata uyashpa yapa mancharishpallata, munaihuan paita uyac carca.
Herodes, pai pacarishca puncha pactaricpi, shuc jatun raimita rarca. Gubirnu apucunata, suldaru apucunata, Galileamarita jatun runacunata cayarca micuncapac.
Micucunucpi, Herodiaspac ushushi tushurca. Pai tushushcata Herodes paihuan tiyaccunantin munaihuan ricunurca. Herodes paita nirca: —Can imatapash mañahuacpi cushcanqui.
Jurashpa paita nirca: —Ñuca charishcacunamanta chaupita mañahuacpipash cushcanqui.
Rimacpi uyashpa Herodiaspac ushushi llucshishpa, mamapacman rishpa tapurca: —¿Imata mañasha? Paipac mama nirca: —Bautisac Juanpac umata mañanqui.
Pai urastalla Herodespacman rishpa nirca: —Cunanllata Bautisac Juanpac umata shuc callanapi cuhuanqui; chaita munani.
Herodes, chaita uyashpa, yapa llaquirirca. Ranti, chaipi tiyaccuna ñaupacpi jurashpa rimashcamanta, mitsancapac mana usharcachu.
Chashnapi shuc suldaruta cacharca, "Juanpac umata apacri" nishpa. Pai chunta curralman rishpa, Juanpac umata pitishpa,
shuc callanapi Herodias ushushipacman apamurca. Paica paipac mamaman curca.
Juan yachachishcacuna, chaita yachashpa, paipac ayata apashpa rishpa panpanurca.
Jesus camachincapac cachashcacuna ticramushpa paihuan tantarinurca. Paicuna rashcata yachachishcatapash rimanurca.
Jesus paicunata nirca: —Runa illashcaman shamuichic samancapac. Achca runa chaita puricucpi, micuncapacpash mana ushanurcachu.
Chairaicu shuc canuapi yaicushpa, runa illashcaman rinurca.
Runacuna paicuna rishcata ricushpa, picuna cashcata ricsinurca. Tucui llactacunamanta ñanpita callpashpa rishpa, Jesusta ñaupashpa pactanurca.
Jesus canuamanta llucshish— pa, achca runacunata ricushpa, paicunamanta llaquirirca, michic illac obejacuna shina canucpi. Paicunata unaita yachachicurca.
Ña tutayaracpi, yachachishcacuna paita ninurca: —Cai panpa huasi illac can.
Runacunata cacharinqui mayan huasicunapi micunata rantincapac.
Jesus paicunata nirca: —Cancunallata paicunata caranquichic. Paicuna cutipanurca: —Can munacpi, tantata ranticrishun ishcai patsac cullqui tupu tucuicunata carancapac,
Jesus tapurca: —¿Mashna tantata charinquichic? Rucucrichic. Ricunucpi, ninurca: —Pichca tanta ishcai challuapash tiyan.
Chaita uyashpa, Jesus nirca: —Runacunata allpapi tìyarichichic.
Rimacpi, runacuna quihua jahuapi tiyarinurca, shuc patsac bula tucushpa, pichca chunca bula tucushpa.

Huasha, Jesus tantacunata challuacunatapash japishpa, jahuaman ricushpa, Diosta pacrachurca. Tantacunata paquishpa, yachachiscacunaman curca, paicuna runacunata carancapac. Chashnallata ishcai challuata tucuicunata caranurca.
Sacsacta micunurca.
Puchushcata pallashpa, chunca ishcai ashancata juntachinurca.
Micuccuna caricunalla pichca huaranca canurca.
Chaipac huasha, Jesus yachachishcacunata nirca: —Ñucata ñaupashpa, canuapi chinpaman, Betsaida nishcaman richic, ñuca runacunata cacharinacama.
Paicunata cacharishpa, Jesus urcuman rirca Dios-huan rimarincapac.
Tutayashcapi, canua chaupi cuchapi tiyarca. Jesus allpapi sapalla shayarca.
Ñahuipuramanta huairacpi, sinchita cahuinurca. Chaira mana punchayacpi, Jesus yacu jahuapi paicunapacman rirca. Pactashpa, ric tucushpa, ashtahuan caruman ric shina tucurca.
Canuapi riccuna, paita yacu jahuata purirashcata ricushpa, "ayami" nishpa caparinurca.
Tucuilla paita ricunurca. Ricushpa mancharinurca. Pai utcalla paicunata nirca: —Ñucami cani. ¡Cariyaichic, ama manchaichichu!
Jesus canua ucuman yaicucpi, huaira aisarirca. Chaita ricushpa, ashtahuan mancharinurca. Paicunapac yuyai quillpara cacpi, mirachishca tanta ricuchishcata mana atipanurcachu.
Cuchata chinpashpa, Genesaretman pactashpa llutarinurca.
Allpaman llucshishca shina, runacuna Jesusta ricsinurca. Tucui suyuta rimacrinurca.
Uncushcacunata huantushpa pai tiyashcaman pushamunurca.
Jesus yaicushca llactacunapi, uncuccunata pai rina ñanpipi saquinurca. Paicunaca "canpac churanallata llancachipai" nishpa mañanurca. Tucui paita llancaccuna alliyanurca.
Fariseocuna huaquin Jerusalenmanta shamushca yachaccunantin Jesus-huan tiyanurca.
Paicunaca Jesus yachachishcacuna maquita mana maillashpa micucushcata ricunurca.
Fariseocuna judiocunapash, chaira maquicunata mana maillashpa, mana micuc canun, rucucuna yachachishcata catishpa.
Chashnallata, maimanpash rishpa, huasiman ticrashpa, mana maillarishpa mana micuc canun. Shucpash achca tiyan paicuna rashca paicunapac yachai: mucahuacunata, mancacunata, pilchicunata maillac canun.
Chashna cacpi, fariseocuna yachaccunantin Jesusta tapunurca: —¿Imaraicu can yachachishcacuna ñaupacuna yachachishcata mana ruranun, maquicunata mana maillashpa micuccuna can?
Jesus cutiparca: —¡Llullacamacuna! Allimi cancunamanta Isaias rimarca, cashna quillcashpa: "Cai runacuna shimillahuan ñucata llaquinun, paicunapac shuncu ñucamanta carumi can.
Yancamanta ñucata chacchanun; paicuna yachachishca runapac shimillami".
Dios camachishcata jichushpa, runa camachishcata catinquichic.
Huasha Jesus nirca: —Cancunapae yachaita catincapac, Dios camachishcata ñahuilla ricunquichic.
Moises rimarca mari: "Canpac yayata, eanpac mamata uyana canqui. Yayata mamata piñashpa rimac runa shuc rai huañunca".
Ranti, cancuna ninquichic: "Shuc runa paipac yayata paipac mamatapash nicpi: 'Ñuca tucui charishcata Diosman chasquichircani, cancunata yanapancapac mana ima tiyahuan',
chashna nishpa, paicunata ña mana yanapanachu".
Chashna rurashpa, cancunapac yachaita pactachincapac Diospac shimita ñahuilla ricunquichic. Shuc achcacuna chai layallata charinquichic.
Chai huasha, runacunata cayashpa, nirca: —Uyahuaichic tucuicuna, atipaichic:
imapash canchamanta runa ucuman yaicushpa, mana mapayachin; runapac yuyaimanta llucshic, chaimi runata mapayachin.
Yuyayuc runa yuyarichun.
Chashna nishpa Jesus, runacunata saquishpa, huasi– man yaicurca. Yachachishcacuna paita tapunurca: —¿Imata yachachishpa chai shimicunata rimarcanqui?
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —¿Cancunapash yuyai illacchu canquichic? ¿Canchamanta runa ucupi yaicuc paita mana mapayachishcata manachu atipanquichic?
Canchamanta shamuc mana shuncupi yaicun; huicsapi yaicun, ismashpa llucshin. Chashna nishpa, tucui laya micuna alli cashcata ricuchirca.
Huasha nirca: —Runa shuncumanta llucshic chaimi runata mapayachin.
Runa shuncumanta manalliyuyaicuna llucshinun. Chashnallata yumashpa juchallinacuna, shuhuanacuna, runata huañuchinacuna,
shucpac huarmita japinacuna, shucpac imacunata japinayana, manallita rashcacuna,shuccunata umachiña, mana pincarishpa causana, caminacuna,
chiqui-cuicuna, yapa yalli canayana, nuspa shina causana. Chai tucuicuna shuncu ucumanta llucshinun, runata juchayucta ruranun.
Chaimanta llucshishpa, Jesus Tiro nishca suyuman nrcá. Shuc huasiman "manapí ñuca caipi tiyashcata yachachun" nishpa. Ranti, paillatata pacana mana usharcachu.

Shuc huarmi, Jesus shamushcata yachashpa, paipacman rishpa," cuncurishpa, Jesusta mañarca paipac ushushimanta. Chai huarmi mana judiochu carca, sirofenisiamanta huarmi carca. Shuc supai paipac ushushita japishca carca. "Supaita ñuca ushushimanta jichupai" nishpa mañarca.
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Ñaupacta churicunata carana cani. Paicunapac tantata allcushitucunaman shitana mana allichu.
Huarmi cutipashpa nirca: —Shuti, chashnami can, Apunchic. Chashnapash, allcushitucuna mesa ucupi mesamanta urmac puchuchishcata mcuccuna can.
Rimacpi uyashpa Jesus ñirca: —Rilla, can chashna rimashcamarita, canpac ushushimanta supai ña llucshircami.
Huarmi rishpa, huasiman pactashpa, ushushi cahuitupi sirirashcata tuparca; supai paimanta llucshishca carca.
Tiro llactamanta llucshishpa, Jesus Galilea cuchaman rirca, Sidon llactata Decapolis nishca llactacuriata purishpa.
Shuc upa rinri, upa shimi runa pushamunurca. "Canpac maquita paipac jahuapi churapai" nishpa mananurca.
Jesus paita chicanman pushashpa, maqui rucata rinri ucupi satirca, tiucahuan paipac, calluta cacurca.
Chai huasha, jahuaman ricushpa, "ai" nishpa, sinchi shimihuan nirca: —Effata (runa shimipi: "Pascari").
Chai ucullapi, paipac rinri pascarirca, paipac callu alliyarca, alli rimai callarirca.
Jesus paita nirca: —Ama pitapash rimaichu. Paica tucuicunaman huillarca, Jesus "ama pitapash rimaichu" nishpa nicpipash.
Yapa maneharishpa runacuna ninurca: —Tucuita ailita rurarca. Upa rinricunata uyachin, upa shimicunata rimachin.
