Shuc puncha, achca runacuna Jesusta catishpa tantarinucpi, micuna illacpi, Jesus yachachishcacunata cayashpa nirca:
Cai runacunamanta llaquirinimi. Ña quimsa punchata ñucahuan tiyanun; micunata mana charinun.
Mana carashpa paicunata cachacpi, ñanpipi sanpayashpa, mana puri ushanunca. Huaquincuna carumanta shamunurca mari.
Yachachishcacuna ninurca: —Cai runa illac panpapi, ¿maimanta paicunata cararinca?
Jesus paicunata tapurca: —¿Mashna tantata charinquichic? —Canchislla— ninurca,

Chashna ninucpi uyashpa, Jesus runacunata allpapi tiyarichirca. Huasha, tantacunata japishpa, Diosta pacrachurca. Chai huasha, tantacunata paquishpa, yachachishcacunaman curca, paicuna runacunata carancapac.
Ansa yacu aichatapash charinurca. Diosta pacrachushpa, yachachishcacunaman curca "runacunata caraichic" nishpa.
Sacsacta micunurca. Puchushcata pallashpa, canchis ashancata juntachinurca. Micuccuna chuscu huarancashi canurca. Jesus paicunata huasiman cacharca.
Huasha, yachachishcacunantin canuapi Dalmanuta nishca llactaman rirca.
Fariseocuna Jesus-huan piñarishpa rimarincapac shamunurca. Paita camashpa ninurca: —Jahua pachapi mana raipacta rurai ñucanchic ricuncapac.
Rimanucpi, Jesus jahuaman ricushpa, "ai" nishpa, paicunata nirca: —Imaraicu cai runacuna shuc mana raipacta mañanun? Shuc mana raipacta mana cui tucununca.
Paicunata saquishpa, canuapi cutillata yaicushpa, chinpaman rirca.
Yachachishcacuna tantata apanata cuncarinushca carca. Shucllata canuapi charinurca.
Jesus paicunata nirca: —Fariseocunapac levadurata yuyanquichic; Herodespac levadurata yuyanquichic.
Jesus chashna nicpi, yachachishcacuna paicunapura rimarinurca nishpa: —Chaita nin ñucanchic tantata mana apamushcaraicu.
Chaita uyashpa Jesus nirca: —¿Imaraicu "tantata mana charinchic" nishpa rimaranquichic? ¿Chaira manachu atipanquichic, manachu yachanquichic?
¿Rinriyuc cashpallata manachu uyanquichic? ¿Ñahuiyuc cashpallata manachu ricunquichic? ¿Yuyai illacchu canquichic!
Ñuca pichca tantallahuan pichca huaranca runacunata carashcapi, mashna ashancata puchuscacunahuan juntachircanquichic? —Chunca ishcai— ninurca. —
Canchis tantahuan chuscu huaranca runacunata carashcapi, mashna ashancata puchushcahuan juntachircanquichic? —Canchis— ninurca.
Chaita uyashpa, Jesus nirca: —¿Chaira manachu atipanquichic?
Betsaida nishca llactaman pactanushcapi, shuc ñausa runata Jesupacman pushamunurca, "paita llancapai" nishpa.
Jesus paita maquimanta aisashpa, llacta canchaman pusharca. Paipac ñahuicunata tiucahuari jucuchishpa, paipac jahuapi maquita churashpa, paita tapurca: —
¿Imatapash ricunquichu? Ñausa runa ansata ricuncapac callarishpa, nirca: —Runacunata puricuc yuracuna shina ricucuni.
Chashna nicpi, Jesus cutillata maquita paipac ñahuipi churarca. Ñausa runaca alli ricurca, alliyachishca saquirirca, carumanta tucuita allita ricucurca.
Jesus paita huasiman cacharca nishpa: —Amallapash llactaman yaicuichu.
Chaimanta llucshishpa, Jesus yachachishcacunantin Cesarea Filipo llactacunaman rirca. Ñanpita paicunata tapurca: —¿Imata runacuna ñacàmanta rimanun?
Cutipanurca: —Huaquincuna "Bautisac Juanmi" ninun; huaquincuna "Eliasmi" ninun; shuccuna "shuc profetami" ninun.
Chashria ninucpi, Jesus cutillata tapurca: —Cancunaca pimi nishpata yuyanquichic ñucata? Pedro cutipashpa nirca: —Can Mesiasmi canqui.
Jesus paicunata sinchita rimarca nishpa: —Chaita pitapash ama rimaichichu.
Chai huasha nirca: —Ñuca llaquichi tucuna cani. Rucucuna, pacriyaya apucuna yachaccunantin ñucata chicninunca, ñucata huañuchinunca. Chashnapash, quimsa punchapi causarishami.
Chai tucunamanta pasacta rimarca. Chashnapi, Pedro chicanman Jesusta pushashpa, paita piñashpa rimai callarirca.
Jesus ticrashpa, yachachishcacunaman ricushpa, Pedrota piñarca nishpa: —Ñucamanta anchuri, supai, Canpac yuyaicuna mana Diospacchu, runapacmi.
Tucui chaipi tiyaccunata cayashpa, Jesus rimarca nishpa: —Maicanpash ñucata catinata munacpi, quiquinpac munaita saquichun; crusta aparishpa, ñucata catichun.
Maicanpash causaita tarinayashpa, chaita chincachincami. Ranti, quiquinpac causaita ñucamanta nuca rimashcamantapash chincachishpa, causaita tarincami.
¿Imata yapachin shuc runa cai pachata yapachishpa, causaita chincachicpi?
¿Imatata cunca shuc runa paipac causai rantimanta?
Maicanpash ñucamanta ñuca rimashcamantapash pincaricpi cai mana inic juchasapa runacuna ñaupacpi, cai RUNApash paimanta piricarinca, paipac Yayapacpi sumacyachi tucushpa angelcunahuan shamuna puncha.
"Caipi tiyaccunamanta huaquincuna chaira mana huañushpa, Diospac pachata jatun ushaihua shamushcata ricununca.
Sucta puncha huasha, Jesus Pedrota, Juanta, Jacobota pushashpa, paicunahuanlla shuc jahua urcuman sicarca. Paicuna ricuranucpi, Jesus shuc laya tucurca.
Paipac churana chiuclla ricurirca, yuraclla tucurca. Manapí cai pachapi chashna yuracyachina ushan.
Chaipi Moises-huan Elias-huan ricurimunurca Jesus-huan rimarishpa.
Pedro chaita ricushpa nirca: —Yachachic, allimi caipi saquirincapac. Quimsa tanputa rurashun: canpac shuc, Moisespac shuc, Eliaspac shuc.
Yapa mancharishpa, ima rimacushcata mana yacharcachu.
Cuncaimanta shuc puyu paicunata quillparca. Puyumanta shuc shimi uyarirca cashna nishpa: —Caimi ñuca llaquishca churi, paita uyana canquichic.
Huasha, muyuilla ricunucpi, Jesus sapalla shayararca; shuccuna illanurca.

Urcumanta uraicucunucpi, Jesus paicunata nirca: —Ama pitapash cunan ricushcata rimaichichu cai RUNA huañushcacunamanta causarinacama. Chai shimita allita yuyaipi huacaichinurca. Paicunapura tapurinurca: —¿Ima chari canca "Huañushcacunamanta causarina" nishca?
Chashnapi Jesusta tapunurca: —¿Imaraicu quillcata yachaccuna "Elias ñaupacta shamuna can" nishpa ninun?
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Shuti, Elias ñaupacta shamunca tucuita allichincapac. ¿Quillcashcacuna imata cai RUNAmanta ninun? "Cai RUNA yapa llaquirínca, millashcami canca" nishpa ninun.
Ñucaca cancunata nini: Elias ña shamurca, runacunaca paicuna munashcata paihuan ruranurca. Chashnami quillcashcacunapi quillcara tìyarca.
Yachachishcacuna tiyashcamah ticranucpi, achca runa paicuna muyucta tiyanurca. Huaquin quillcata yachaccunapash paicunahuan piñarishpa rimariranurca.
Jesusta ricushpa runacuna mancharishpa, paita tupancapac callpanurca.
Jesus paicunata tapurca: —¿Imatata rimarishcanquichic?
Chaicunamanta shuc runa hirca: —Yachachic, ñuca churita pushamurcani; shuc millai supai paita japishca; mana rimana ushan.

Chai supai paita allpapi urmachin, shimimanta putscuta llucshichin, quiruta mucuri– chin, huañushca shina saquichin. Can yachachishcacunaman mañarcani supaita llucshichincapac, rantimana ushanurcachu.
Rimacpi uyashpa Jesus nirca: –¡Mana inic runacuna! ¿Imuracama cancunahuan tiyasha? ¿Imuracama cancunata apmsha? Huanprata pushamuichic.
Nicpi, pushamunurca. Jesusta ricushcallapita supai huanprata japishpa, sinchita cushpachishpa, paita allpapi ñahuihuan rumachirca. Huanpraca putscuta shitashpa, allpapi cushparishpa siricurca.
Jesus yayata tapurca: —¿Imuramanta chashna tucurca? Painirca: —Huahua cashcamanta.
Huaquin cuti ninapi yacupipash paita shitan huañuchincapac. Can imatapash rurana ushashpa, ñucamanta llaquiripai, ñucanchicta yanapai.
Rimaepi uyashpa Jesus nirca: —¿Imaraicu "can imatapash rurana ushacpi" nishpa ninqui? Inic runa tucuita ushan,
Chaita uyashpa, chai runa caparishpa nirca: —Ininimi, ñuca inishcata sinchicuchipai.
Jesus runacuna tantaricushcata ricushpa, supaita nirca: —Shimi illac, upa rinri supai, canta nini: Cai huanpramanta llucshi, ama cuti paipi yaicunquichu.
Supaica, runata sinchita cushpachishpa, caparishpa llucshirca. Huanpra huañushca shina saquirirca. Huañushca shina ricuricpi, "huañushcami" huaquincuna ninurca.
Jesus paita maquimanta japishpa jatarichicpi, shayarirca.
Huasiman pactanucpi, yachachishcacuna Jesusta pacalla tapunurca: —¿Imaraicu paita shitana mana usharcanchic?
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Cai sami supaicuria Diosta mañashcallahuan jichurin.
Chaimanta llucshishpa, Galilea llactacunapi mana llutarishpa rinurca. Jesus "pipash ama yachachun" nishpa rirca,
paihuan tiyaccunata yachachirarca mari cashna nishpa: —Cai RUNA paita chicniccunapi japi tucunca. Paita huañuchinunca. Quimsa punchapi causarinca.
Paicuna chai shimicunata mana atipanushcachu. Mana atipashpapash, tapunata manchanurca.
Cafarnaun llactaman pactanushcapi, huasipi tiyacushpa Jesus paicunata nirca: —¿Imata ñanpipi rimaricurcanquichic?
Paicuna chunlla tucunurca, Ñanpipi maican ñaupac canca rimarinushcarca mari.
Chashna cacpi, Jesus tiyarishpa, chunca ishcaicunata rimarca nishpa: —Ñaupac tucunata munac runa tucuicunamanta ura tucuchun, tucuicunata yanapac cachun.

Shuc huahuata cayashpa, paicunapac ñaupacpi shayachirca. Huasha, huahuata ucllashpa, paicunata rimarca: —Ñuca shutipi cashna huahuata chasquic runa ñucallatata chasquin. Ñucata chásquicca ñucata cachamushca Yaya Diosta chasquin.
Juan Jesusta nirca: —Yachachic, shuc runata tuparcanchic, canpac shutipi supaicunata jichurarca. Paita "ama chashna raichu" nircanchic, pai mana mari ñucanchic bulamanta earca,
Jesus paita nirca: —Ama jarcaichichu. Ñuca shutipi mana raipacta rurac runa, ñucata mana chicnincachu.
Ñucanchicta mana chicnicca ñucanchihuan can.
Maicanpash ñuca shutipi shuc yacu basota cancunata upiachicpi, cancuna Cristota catic cashcamanta, cuyana illac mana saquirincachu. ¡Shuti nini!
Huasha nirca: —Maicanpash cai ñucata huahua shina inic runacunata juchaman aisacpi, alli canman paipac cuncapi shuc jatun rumita huatashpa ñucñu yacuman shitai tucuchun.

Canpac maqui canta juchapi urmachicpi, chai maquita piti. Jahua pachaman pullu maqui yaicuna ashtahuan alli canca, ishcai maquiyuc ucupachaman rinamanta. Chaipi nina mana tucurinchu. Canpac chaqui canta juchaman aisacpi, chaita piti. Jahua pachaman pullu chaqui yaicuna ashtahuan alli canca ishcai chaquihuan ucupachaman rinamanta. Canpac ñahui canta juchaman aisacpi, chaita surcui. Jahuá pachaman shuclla ñahuiyuc rina ashtahuan alli canca ishcai ñahuiyuc ucupachaman rinamanta.
Chaipi runapac aichata micuc curu mana huañun, ninapash mana tucurinchu.
Tucuicuña ninahuan pichai tucununca.
Cachi alli can. Cachi upayacpi, ¿imahuan chaita mishquiyachinunca? Cachita cancunapi charichic, cancunapura ganaslla causaichic.
Chaimanta rishpa, Jesus Judea suyuman pactarca, Jordan chinpaman. Achca runa cutillata ñanpipi tantarinucpi, paicunata yachachicurcar paipac yachai.
Fariseocuna Jesusta camashpa tapunurca: —Shuc runa paipac huarmita jichucpi allichu?
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —¿Moises imata cancunata rimarca?
Cutipanurca: —Moises nirca: "Apucuna ñaupacpi maqui llushpirina quillcata quillcashpa, huarmita jichuna usharin".
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Cancuna manalli runa cashcaraicu Moises chaita rimarca.
Ranti, cai pacha callarishcapi, Dios mnata cari-huarmi rurarca.
Chairaicu, cari paipac yaya-mamata saquishpa, paipac huarmihuan llutarinami.
Ishcaintin shuclla tucununca. Ña mana ishcaichu, shuclla tucunun.
Chashna cacpi, Dios huatashcata runa ama pascachun.
Ña huasiman rishpa, yachachishcacuna pai rimashcamanta cutittata tapunurca.
Jesus paicunata nirca; —Maicanpash quiquin huarmita jichushpa shuc-huan llutaricpi, juchata ran.
Chashnallata, huarmipash quiquin carita jichushpa shuc-huan llutaricpi, juchata aparin.
Chai huasha, shuc huahuacunata Jesuspacman pushanurca, "canpac maquita paicunapac jahuapi churapai" nishpa. Ranti, yachachishcacuna paicunata piñanurca.
Chaita ricushpa, Jesus piñarishpa nirca: —Huahuacunata ñueapacman shamunata ama jatcaichichu. Jahua pacha paicuna shina caccunapac mari can.
Shuti cancunata nini: Diospac alli shimita huahua shina mana chasquic runa Diospac pachaman mana imura yaicuncachu.
Huasha, Jesus huahuacunata cayashpa, paicuna jahuapi maquita churashpa, paicunata bendisiarca.
Huasimanta llucshishcapi, shuc runa callpashpa shamurca. Jesus ñaupacpi cunacurishpa, paita tapurca: —Alli yachachic, ¿imata rana cani mana tucuric causaita charincapac?
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Imaraicu ñucata "alli" nishpa nihuanqui? Shucllami alli, Dios.

Canca Dios rurai nishcacunata yachanqui: "Runata ama huañuchinquichu. Ama juchallinquichu. Ama shuhuanquichu. Ama shucmanta llullashpa rimanquichu. Ama shuccunata umachinquichu. Canpac yayata mamatapash yupaichanqui".
Rimacpi uyashpa chai runa nirca: —Yachachic, chai tucuita huanpra cashcamanta pactachircani.

Jesus, chaita uyashpa, llaquishcahuan paiman ricurca. Huasha nirca: —Chaira shuc canta pishin: Tucui can charishcacunata catucri tsuntsu runacunaman cuyancapac. Chashna rashpa, jahua pachapi cullquiyuc tucunqui. Chai huasha, ñucahuan shamunqui.
Chai shimita uyashpa, chai runa llaquirirca. Llaquirishpa rircami, yapa cullquiyuc mari carca.
Pai riracpi, Jesus muyucta ricushpa, yachachishcacunata rimarca nishpa: —Cullquiyuccuna mana yaicunallachu canun Diospac pachapi.
Chai shimicunata uyashpa, yachachishcacuna yapa mancharinurca. Jesus cutillata nirca: —Churicuna, cullquita yuyaccuna yapa mana yaicunallachu canun Diospac pachapi.
Shuc camello nishca huihua tupulli jutcuta ashtahuan pasanalla canca, cullquiyuc runa Diospac pachaman yaicunamanta.
Paicuna, chaita uyashpa, ashtahuan mancharishpa, tapunurca nishpa: —¿Pitac quishpina ushanca?
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Runacunapac mana ushaipac can: ranti Dios tucuita ushan.
Chaita uyashpa Pedro nirca: —Ñucanchic tucui charishcata canta catincapac saquircanchic.
Jesus cutiparca: —Shuti cancunata nini: Maicanpash ñucaraicu, Dios rimashca cushi shimiraicupash quiquin huasita, huauquicunata, panicunata, mamata, yayata, churicunata, allpacunata saquishpa,

cai pachallapita shuc patsac pai saquishcamanta ashtahuan cui tucunca: huasicuna, panicuna, yayacuna, mamacuna, churicuna, allpacuna. Chai tucuita cunan punchacunapi llaquicunahuan pacta japinca, huasha punchacunapi mana tucuric causaita chasquinca.
Chashnapash, achcacuna cunan ñaupaccuna cashpa, puchucaicuna tucununca; cunan puchucaicuna cashpa, ñaupaccuna tucununca.

Jerusalenman sicashpa puricunucpi, Jesus yachachishcacunata ñaupashpa rirarca. Paicuna yapa mancharishpa catinurca; paicunahuan shamuccunapash mancharinurca. Jesus chunca ishcaicunata chicanman cayashpa, paiman tucunca rashcata huillarca,

nishpa: —Uyahuaichic: Jerusalenman riranchic. Cai RUNA pacriyaya apucunaman, camachic quillcata yachaccunaman cui tueunca. Paita huañuchina can nishpa ninunca; mana judio caccunaman paita chasquichinunca.
Paita asinunca, tiucanunca, llipachinunca, huañuchinunca. Chashnapash, quimsa punchapi causarinca.
Cebedeopac ishcai churicuria Santiagohuan Juanhuan Jesusta ninurca: —Yachachic, ñucanchic mañanca rashcata rurapai.
Jesus tapurca: —¿Imatata munanquichic?
Ninurca: —Ñucanchicta canhuan jahua pachapi shucta alli maquiman, shucta lluqui maquiman tiyarichipanqui.
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Cancuna mañahuashcata mana yachanquichic. ¿Ñuca apana llaquicunata apanata ushanquichichu? ¿Ñuca huañuna huañuihuan huañunata munanquichichu?
Cutipashpa ninurca: —Ushanchicmi, munanchicmi. Chaita uyashpa Jesus nirca: —Shuti pacha, ñuca apana llaquicunata apanquichic; ñuca huañuna, huañuillahuan huañunquichic.
Ranti, ñuca alli maquiman tiyarinata, ñuca lluqui maquiman tiyarinata mana cuipacchu cani, ñuca Yaya acllashcacunaman chaita cunca.
Shuc yachachishcacuna, chaita uyashpa, Santiagota Juanta piñanurca.
Jesus paicunata cayashpa nirca; —Cai pacha apucuna runacunata llaquichinun, piñashcahuan paicunata rimaccuna can,
Cancunagura mana chashnachu canca. Ranti, maicanpash shuccunamantayalli canata munac paicunata sirichun.
Chashnallata, ñaupac canata munac tucuicunata sirbichun.
Cai RUNApash mana "sirbihuaichic" nishpa shamurca; shuccunata sirbincapac shamurca; tucuicunapac dibita pagancapac shamurca.

Chaimanta rishpa, Jerico llactaman pactanurca. Jesus chai llactamanta llucshicucpi yachachisheacunantìn yanca shamushcacunantin, shuc ñausa runa Bartimeo shutiyuc, Timeopac churi: —Imatapash cuyahuaichic" nishpa tiyacurca.
Chai ñausa runa, Jesus shamucucta uyashpa, caparirca: —Davidpac churi, ñucamanta llaquiripai.
Jesus, caparishcata uyashpa, shayarishpa, nirca: —Ñausa runata pus hamuichic. Paita cayashpa ninurca: —Cariyanqui, shayari, Jesus canta cayarani
Ñausa runa, chaita uyashpa, jahua churanata shitashpa, Jesuspacman shamurca.
Jesus paita tapurca: —¿Imatata munanqui? Ñausa runa cutipashpa nirca: —Ñuca ñahuita allichipai, ñuca ricunata munani
Jesus paita nin: —Rilla, can inishcamanta alliyashca canqui. Chai ucullapi ricuncapac callarirca; Jesusta catishpa rirca.
Jerusalen llacta mayanman rirashcapi, Betfage Betania llactacuna mayanpi, Olivos urcu chaquipi, Jesus ishcai yachachishcacunata cacharca nishpa: —
Cancuna ñahuipura tiyac uchilla llactaman richic. Chaiman pactashpa, shuc burro nishca huihuata huatashcata tarinquichic. Pai jahuapi chaira manapí sicarcachu. Pascashpa apamunquichic.
Maicanpash cancunata nicpi: "Imaraicu chashna ruranquichic" nishpa, cutipanquichic: "Apu paita mutsunmi, huasha cutichinca".
Paicuna rishpa, burrota shuc puncupi huatashcata tarinurca callepi.
Pascaranucpi, chaipi tiyaccuna ninurca: —¿Imaraicu burrota pascanquichic?
Yachachishcacuna Jesus rimashca shina cutipanurca. Chaita uyashpa: —Apaichiclla-ninurca.
Jesuspacman burrota pushanurca. Paicunaca churanacunata burro jahuapi mantashpa, Jesusta sicachinurca.
Huaquincuna pai rina ñanpipi churanacunata mantanurca; huaquincuna, yura pallcata cuchushpa, ñanpipi mantanurca.
Ñaupac riccuna huashapi shamuccunapash Jesusta catishpa caparinurca nishpa: —Apu Dios shutipi shamuc bendisiashca cachun.
Ñucanchic yaya David apu tucuna pacha pactamuran; bendisiashca cachun. Apu Dios yapaichashca cachun.
Jesus Jerusalenman yaicushpa, Diospac huasiman rirca. Tucuita ricushca huasha, ña chishiyacpi, yachachishcacunantin Betania llactaman rirca.
Cayantiman, Betaniamanta llucshishpa, yarcachirca.
Carupi shuc pancayuc higuera nishca yurata ricushpa, chaicama rirca muyuyucchu chari canca yuyashpa. Ricúcpica, pancalla tiyarca, mana muyu aparina pachachu carca.
Jesus yurata nirca: —Manapí canmanta muyuta micuchun. Yachachishcacuna chai rimashcata uyanurca.
Jerusalenman pactanurca; Jesus Diospac huasiman rirca. Chaipi catucuccunata ranticuccunata chaimanta callpachirca. Culquita turcaccunapac mesacunata urmachirca. Urpita catuccunatapash jichurca.
Chai huasi ucuta imatapash apashpa rincapac mana saquircachu.
Paicunata camachishpa nirca: —¿Manachu quillacara tiyan: "Ñuca huasi Diospac huasi canca tucui runacunapac? Ranti, cancuna shuhua huasita chaita rarcanquichic.

Pacriyaya apucuna camachic quillcata yachaccunapash, chaita uyashpa, imata rashpa paita huañuchishun nishpa rimarinurca. Ranti, paita manchanurca, tucui runacuna pai yachachishcata cushiyashcahuan uyanurca mari.
Tutayacpi, Jesus yachachishcacunantin llactamanta rirca.
Cayantiman, tutamanta, ñanpita rishpa, higuera yurata chaquirishcata ricunurca.
Pedro yuyarishpa nirca: —Yachachic, riqui, can piñashpa rimashca yura chaquirishcami.
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Diosta inichic.
Maicanpash cai urcuta nicpi: "Chaimanta anchuri, ñucñu yacuman shitari" nishpa, paipac shuncupi chashna tucunca rashcata shinchita inicpi, pai inishca shina tucunca.
Shuti pacha cancunata nini: Tucui cancuna Dios-man mañashcata "ña chasquircanchie" yuyashpa, chasquinquichic.
Cancuna Dios-huan rimarishpa, shuccunahuan imatapash charishpa, ñaupacta quishpichichic. Chashna racpi, cancunapac Yaya Dios cancuna juchallishcata quishpichinca.
Ranti, cancuna shuccunata mana quishpichicpi, cancunapac jahua pachapi tiyac Yaya mana quishpichincachu caricunapac juchacunata.
Jerusalenman ticranurca. Jesus Diospac huasipi puricucpi, pacriyaya apucuna, camachic quillcata yachaccuna judio apucunapash paipacman shamushpa, tapunurca nishpa: –
¿Ima ushaihuan can rashcata ranqui? ¿Pimi canta chaita rancapac rimarca?
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Ñucapash cancunata shuc shimita tapunca rani. Cancuna cutipahuacpi, ñucapash ima ushaihuan chaita rashcata cancunata rimasha.
Rimahuaichic: ¿Pimi Juanta cacharca bautisancàpac? ¿Dioschu paita cácharca? ¿Runacunachu paita cachanurca? Cutipahuaichic.
Chashna tàpucpi Jesus, paicunapura rimanacunurca nishpa: —Ñucanchic "Dios paita cacharca" nicpi, pai ninca: "Imaràicu paita mana inircanquichic".
"Runacuna paita cachaniurca" nishpa rimashün ima chari. Chashna cutipancapac manchanurca, Juan Diospacmanta shamushcata tucui runacuna yachanurca mari.
Chashna cacpi, Jesusta ninurca: —Mana yachanchichu. Jesus nirca: —Ñucapash ima ushaihuan chaicunata rurashcata mana rimashachu.

Chai huasha, Jesus yachachina shimicunata rimai callarirca cashna nishpa: —Shuc runa uva nishca chacrata rurarca. Chaita quinchahuan jarcashca. Uva muyucunata chahuancapac, allpata allashpa, shuc jutcuta rurarca. Chapana huasita shayachirca. Shuc runacunaman chacrata saquirca pallana pacha pallashcahuan pagancapac. Chaipac huasha caruman rirca.
Pallana pacha pactaricpi, chacra amu shuc luncuta cacharca mañachishcacunapacman, paipacta niañancapac.
Paicuna, chai luncuta japishpa, llipachishpa, maquillahuan cachanurca.
Shuc luncutapash cacharca. Paita umapi huactashpa, piñashpa rimanurca.
Shuctapash cacharca; paita huañuchinurca. Chaipac huasha, shuc achcacunata cacharca; paicunamanta huaquincunata huactanurca; huaquincunata huañuchinurca.
Chaira shuc tiyarca, paipac churi. Paitapash cacharca, "ñuca llaquishca churita uyanuncami: nishpa yuyarishpa.
Chai runacuna paicunapura rimanacunurca nishpa: —Chaimi chacra amupac churi, amu charishcacunata japina cac. Paita huañuchishunchic, pai japinca rashcacunata amuyancapac.
Paita japishpa, huañuchishpa, paipac ayata canchaman shitanurca. Rimahuaichic:
¿Imata ruranca chacra amu? Pai shamucpi, chai llancaccunata huañuchinca, chacrataca shuccunaman saquinca.
¿Manachu quillcacuna nishcata uyarcanquichic? Cashna ninun: "Huasita shayachiccuna jichushca rumi huasi pata chaqui tucurca.
Chaita apu Dios rurarca; sumac ricurin".
Apucuna, Jesus rimashcata uyashpa, "ñucanchiraicu chashna rimarca" nishpa, paita huañuchinata munanurca; ranti, runacunata manchashpa mana ushanurca. Jesusta saquishpa rinurca.

Chai huasha, huaquin fariseocunata Herodesta caticcunantin Jesuspacman cachanurca, paita ima panta shimipipash rimachishpa cautsayachincapac. Jesuspacman shamushpa ninurca: —Yachachic, can shutita rimac cashcata yachanchic. Manapita manchanqui. Jahuata ricuricllahuan runata mana taripanquichu. Diospac ñanpita yachachinqui. Rimai: ¿Gubirnu cullquita Roma llactapi causac incaman pagana allichu? ¿Manachu alli? ¿Paganachu? ¿Manachu pagana? ¿Imata ninqui?
Jesus paicunapac manalli yuyaita ricsishpa nirca: —¿Imaraicu ñuca nishcapi japinayahuanquichic? Shuc cullquita ricuchihuaichic ñuca ricuncapac.
Cullquita ricuchinurca. Jesus chaita ricushpa tapurca: —¿Pipacta can cai ñahui? ¿Caipi tiyac shuti pipacta can? Tapucpi uyashpa cutipanurca: —Roma llactapi causac incapac.
Jesus nirca: —Incapacta incaman cuichic; Diospacta Diosman cuichic. Mancharishpa pai cutipashcata uyanurca.
Chai huasha, huaquin saduceos nishcacuna (paicuna "huañushcacuna mana causarinuncachu" ninun) Jesusta tapunurca:
Yachachic, Moises quillcashcacunapi cashna quillcara tiyan: "Shuc huarmiyuc runa huahua illac, huañucpi, paipac huauqui chai huarmihuan sahuarichun. Paicunapac huahua huañushcapac shutita apanca",
Cunan allita uyanqui: Canchis huauquipura tiyanurca. Rucu huauqui shuc huarmita japirca: huahua illac huañurca.
Huasha paipac quipa chai huarmillahuan sahuarirca, huahua illac huañushpa.
Tucui canchis huauquipura chai huarmillahuan huasha huasha sahuarinurca, huahua illac huañushpa. Puchucaipi huarmipash huañurca.
Causarina punchapi chai huarmi pipac huarmi canca tucui canchis paihuan sahuarishca cacpi?
Chashna ninucpi, Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Pantäcunquichic quillcashcacunata mana yachashpa, Diospac ushaita maña ricsishpa.
Huañushcacuna causarishca huasha, caricuna huarmicunapash mana sahuarinuncachu." Jahua pachapi tiyac angelcuna shina canuñca.
¿Huañushcacuna causarinamantaca: manachu ricurcanquichic Moises quillcashcacunapi? Ruparashcai yuramanta Dios Moisesta rimashpa nkca: "Ñuca Abranpac Dios; Isaacpac Dios, Jacobpac Diosmi cani".
Mana huañushcacunapac Dioschu; causaccunapac Diosmi. Cancunaca pantacunquichic.
Shuc camachic quillcata yachac, Jesus rimashcata uyashpa, alli cutipashcata, uyashpa, paita tapurca nishpa: —Tucui rurai nishcacunamanta maican ñaupac can?
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Ñaupac rurai nishca caimi: "Uyaichic, Israel runacuna: Apunchic Dios shuclla Diosmi.
Canpac Apu Diosta tucui shuncuhuan, tucui almahuan, tucui yuyaihuan, tucui ushaihuan llaquina canqui". Chaimi ñaupac rurai nishca.
Chaita catic chai shinallata can, caimi: "Shuccunata can quiquinta shina llaquina canqui". Chaicunamanta yalli jatun rurai nishca mana tiyanchu.
Chai runa Jesus rimashcata uyashpa nirca: —Allimi, yachachic, shutita rimarcanqui: Shuclla Dios tiyan.

Diosta tucui shuncuhuan, tucui yuyaihuan, tucui almahuan, tucui ushaihuan llaquinami; shuccunataca quiquinta shina llaquinami. Chaimi huañuchishca huacramanta yalli alli, tucui camaricunamanta yalli alli.
Jesus, chai quillcata yachac alli yuyaihuan rimashcata uyashpa, paita nirca: —Diospac pachamanta mana caruchu canqui. Chai huasha mancharishpa manapí imatapash Jesusta tapunata yuyarca.
Jesus Diospac huasipi yachachishpa nirca: —¿Imaraicu camachic quillcata yachaccuna Mesias Davidpac churi cashcata ninun?
Davidllata, santo Samai paita rimachicpi, nirca: "Apu ñuca aputa rimarca nishpa: Ñuca alli maquiman tiyari, ñuca canta chicniccunata atinacama".
Davidllata Mesiasta apu nicpi, imashna Davidpac churi canca? Runacunaca munaihuan paita uyaranurca.
Huasha, Jesus yachachishpa nirca: —Camachic quillcata yachaccunata yuyanquichic. Paicuna suñi churanata churarina munanun. Callecunapi salurai tucunatamunanun.
Tantarina huasicunapi ñaupac tiyarinata mashcanun. Chashnallata raimi micunapi ñaupac tiyarinata mesapi mashcanun.
Huaccha huarmicunapac imacunata shuhuanun, paicunata umachishpa "cancunamanta Diosta mañashun" nishpa. Paicuna sinchi ñacachi tucununca.
Shuc puncha, Jesus Diospac huasipi tiyarca, Diosman cushca cullquita huacaichina mala mayanpi. Chaipi tiyarishpa, runacuna chai malapi cullquita churacushcata ricurarca.
Cullquiyuccuna achcata churaccuna carca. Shuc huaccha huarmi shamushpa, mana imayuc cashpa, ishcai cullquishituta churarca.
Chaita ricushpa, Jesus yachachishcacunata nirca: —Shuti cancunata nini: Cai huaccha huarmi tucuicunamanta yalli churarca.
Paicuna puchushcamanta mari cunurca; ranti, cai huaccha huarmi pai charishcata illacta curca.
Jesus Diospac huasimanta llueshicucpi, shuc pai yachachishca runa nirca: —¡Yachachic, riqui, ima jatun rumicuna, ima sumac ricuric huasicuna!
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —¿Cai jatun sumac ricuric huasita ricunquichic? Shuc rumi shuc rumi jahuapi mana saquirincachu, illacta tulachishcami canca.
Puricushpa, Diospac huasi ñahuipura tiyac Olivos urcuman pactanurca. Jesus chaipi shayarirca. Pedro, Jacobo, Juan, Andres paipacman mayanyarishpa, pacalla tapunurca nishpa: —
¿Imura chai tucunca? ¿Ima laya ricurina ricurinca chai tucunca racucpi?
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Yuyanquichic ama umachi tucuncapac.
Achca runacuna ñuca shutipi shamununca mari, "ñuca Cristomi cani" nishpa. Achcacunata umachinunca.
Macanacui tiyan uyaric– pi, ama mancharinquichichu. Ñaupacta chai tucunami can, ranti chaira mana tucurina pachachu.

Llacta shuc llactahuan macanacununca. Shuc laya runacuna shuc laya runacunahuan huañuchinacununca. Huaquin suyucunapi allpa cuyurinacuna tiyanca; jatun yaricaipash tiyanca. Chaicunahuan llaquicuna callarinuncami.
"Allichirishca caichic. Taripai tucuncapac japishca canquichic. Ñucaraicu jatun apucunapacman pushai tucunqui— chic paicuna ñaupacpi ñucamanta rimancapac.
Chaira tucurina mana pactaricpi, Diospac cushi shimita tucui llactacunapi uyachina can.
Cancunata apucunapacman pushanucpi, cancuna rimanca rashcata ama yuyanquichichu. Chai ucullapi Dios cancunaman rimachishcata rimanquichic. Mana cancunallata rimanquichic, santo Samai rimanca.
"Shuc runa paipac huauquita huañuchincapac japichinca. Shuc yaya paipac churita japichinca huañuchinuchun nishpa. Chashnallata churicuna yayacunata chicnishpa jatarinunca, paicunata huañuchincapac.
Cancunaca tucuicunapi chicni tucunquichic ñucaraicu. Maicanpash ñucata catishpa mana sanpayacpi quishpincami.
"Mapayachic ricurinca mana tiyana cashcapi. (Cai quillcata catishpa yuyanquichic). Chai tucucpi, Judeapi tiyaccuna urcucunaman miticunuchun.
Huasi jahua patapi tiyaccuna ama uraicunuchun imatapash apancapac.
Chacrapi tiyaccuna ama huasiman ticranuchun churanacunata apancapac.
¡Ailla huicsayuc huarmicuna, chuchuchic huarmicunapash!
Chai miticuna ama tamia pachapi tucuchun Diosta mañaichic.
Chai punchacuna llaqui punchacuna canunca mari. Chashna llaqui cai pacha callarishcamanta mana tiyarcachu, manapash tiyancachu.
Dios chai punchacunata mana curullachicpi, mana pipash quishpirinman. Chashnapash, Dios, pai acllashcacunata llaquishcaraicu, chai punchacunata curullachinca.
"Chashnapi, maicanpash shamushpa nicpi: "Riqui, caipimi Cristo, chaipimi Cristo", ama paita uyanquichichu.
Llulla cristocuna ricurimununca, Diospacmanta shamuni nishpa llullashpa rimaccuna jatarinunca; mana raipaccunata rurashpa, runacunata umachinunca. Usharicpi, acliashcacunatapash umaphinunman.
¡Yuyanqüietíic!. Ñaupacta chai tucuita huillashcani.
"Chai llaqui punchacuna huasha, inti yana tucunca, Quilla llantuyanca.
Estrellacuna jahua pachamañta urmanunca. Jahua pachapash chucchurinca.
Chaipi, Jesucristo sinchi ushaihuan puyucunapi shamurac ricurinca.
Pai angelcunata cachanca tucui acllashcacunata tantachincapac.
Higuera yurapi tucushcamanta yachaichic. Paipac pallca llulluyacpi, mushu panca tucyacpi, "rupai pacha pactamuran" ninquichic.
Chashnallata, cancuna cunan ñuca rimashca tucushcata ricushpa, pai pactamurashcata yachanquichic.
Shuti cancunata nini: Cunan causaccuna chaira mana huañunucpi, ñuca rimashca pactarincami.
Jahuapacha cai pachapash tucurinuncami; ranti, ñupa rimashca shimi mana chincarincachu.
"Chashnapash ima puncha, ima pacha chai tucunca, manapí yachan. Angelcunapash, Dios Churipash mana yachanchu, Dios Yayallami yachan.
"Shuc caruman ric runahuan shina tucunca. Chai runa huasita ricuncapac luncucunata mincan. Caranman quiquin ruranata cun. Puncuta ricuccamata nin: "Chaparanqui".
Chashnallata cancunapash chaparaichic, huasi amu pactana pachata mana yachashpa. Chishita pactamunca chari; chaupi tuta chari; cari atallpa caparicpi chari; tutamanta chari.
Pai cuncaimanta shamushpa puñurashcata cancunata tupanman.
Cancunaman rimacushcata tucuicunaman huillani: Ricuralla causaichic.

Pascua raimipac, mana punquichishca tanta micuna punchapac ishcai puncha pishirca. Pacriyaya apucuna camachic quillcata yachaccunahuan rimaricunurca imashnata Jesusta umachishpa japincapac; japishpa huañuchincapac.
Huaquin-cuna ninurca: —Raimi Puncha japincapac mana allichu, ama runacuna piñarishpa jatarincapac.

Shuc puncha, Jesus Simon shutiyuc sisu runapac huasipi micurarca. Micuracpi, shuc huarmi shamurca yapa balic asnac yacu butita apamushpa. Jesus tiyashcaman yaicushpa, butita paquishpa, asnac yacuta Jesuspac jahuapi tallirca.
Huaquincuna, chaita ricushpa, yapa piñarishpa, paicunapura ninurca: —¿Imaraicu chashna jichunun yapa balic asnac yacuta?
Rantichinucpi, quimsa patsacmanta yalli surcununman, tsunsu runacunaman cuncapac. Huarmitaca piñanurca.
Jesus nirca: —Ama quillachichichu cai huarmita. Casilla saquichic, allita rurarca mari.
Tsuntsucuna huiñai cancunahuan tiyanunca; cancuna munashcapi, paicunata yanapana ushanquichic; ranti, ñuca mana huiñai cancunahuan tiyashachu.
Cai huarmi pai ushashca tuputa rurarca. Ñuca aichata asnac yacuhuan armachirca panpancapac shina ñauparishpa.
Shuti cancunata nini: Maipipash cushi shimita huillanucpi, pai rashcatapash huillanunca paimanta yuyarishpa.
Chunca ishcaicunamantä shuc, Judas shutiyuc, pacriyaya apucunapacman rishpa, paicunahuan rimarishpa Jesusta japichincapac, "paita japichisha" nirca."
Paipac shimita uyashpa, pacriyaya apucuna cushiyanurca. "Cullquita cushcanqui" ninurca. Chai pachamanta, ima puncha alli canca Jesusta japichincapac Judas yuyaricurca.
Mana punquichishca tantata micuna raimi ñaupac punchapi, cordero huañuchina pacha, Jesus yachachishcacuna paita tapunurca: —¿Maiprpascua micunata allichincapac munanqui?
Tapunucpi uyashpa, Jesus ishcai yachachishcacunata cacharca cashna nishpa: —Llactaman richic. Shuc yacu mancata apac runata tarinquichic; paita catishpa richic.
Pai yaicushca huasi amuta ninquichic: "Yachachic nin: ¿Maipitac can micuna huasi ñuca yachachishcacunahuan pascuata micuncapae?".
Pai jahua patapi shuc jatun ucuta ricuchinca tucui ñucanchic mutsushcahuan. Chaipi micunata allichinquichic.
Rimacpi, yachachishcacuna rinurca. Llactaman pactashpa, Jesus rimashca shina tarinurca. Pascua micunata allichinurca.
Tutayacpi, Jesus paipac chunca ishcai runacunahuan shamurca.
Micucushpa nirca: —Shuti cancunata nini: Shuc ñucahuan micuc, ñucata japichinca ran huañuchincapac.
Chaita uyashpa, yapa llaquirinurca. Huasha huasha tapunurca: —¿Ñucachu cani?
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Cancunamanta shucmi can, ñuca callanamantallata micurac.
Cai RUNA rinca ran, quillcashcacuna paimanta rimashca pactarincapac. ¡Chai ñucata japichic runa mana pacarishca cashcapi alli canman!
Micucunucpi, Jesus tantata japirca; Diosta pacrachushpa, chaita paquirca, paicunaman curca nishpa: —Japichic, cai ñuca aichami can.
Huasha, shuc basota japishpa Diosta pacrachushpa, paicunaman curca, tucuicuna upianurca.
Paicunata nirca: —Cai ñuca yahuarmi, Dios-huan runacunahuan mushu cunacushca shimita ricuchic yahuar. Cai yahuar runacunamanta tallishcami canca.
Shuti cancunata nini: Binota ña mana upiashachu, ñuca Yaya huasipi mushu binota upianacama.
Taquishca huasha, Olivos urcuman rinurca.
Riranucpi, Jesus paicunata nirca: —Tucui cancuna "yancamanta paita catinchic" nishpa rimanquichic cunan tuta. Quillcara mari tiyan: "Michicta huañuchishami, obejacuna chausiriñunca"
Chashnapash, ñuca causarishami; causarishpa, cancunata ñaupashpa, Galileaman risha.
Pedro chaita uyashpa nirca: —Tucuicuna canta jichunucpipash, ñuca canta catishami.
Rimacpi uyashpa Jesus nirca: —Shuti pacha canta nini: Cunan tuta cari atallpa chaira mana ishcai cuti caparicpi, can quimsa cuti ñucamanta "paita mana ricsinichu" nishpa ninqui.
Pedro cutipashpa nirca: —Canhuan pacta huañuna cacpipash canta mana jichushachu. Tucui shuccunaca chaillatata rimanurca.
Chashna rimarishpa, Getsemani nishca panpaman pactanurca. Jesus yachachishcacunata nirca: —Caipi tiyacuichic, ñuca Dios-huan rimarincapac racuni.
Chashna nishpa, Pedrota, Santiagota, Juanta pushashpa, yapa llaquirishcalla, mancharishcalla tucurca.
Chashna tucushpa, nirca: —Llaquirishpa huañunayahuan. Caipi saquirichic, ama puñuichichu.
Jesus chainiman purishpa, tuhuaman urmashpa, Diosta mañarca chai tuta tucunca rashcata paimanta anchuchincapac usharicpi.
Cashnami rimarca: —Yaya, can tucuita ushanqui, cai sinchi ñacarinata ñucamanta anchuchipai; ranti, ama ñuca munashca shina rurarichun, can munashca shina tucuchun.
Yachachishcacunapacman ticrashpa, puñurashcata paicunata tuparca, Pedrota nirca: —Simon, ¿puñuranquichu? ¿Shuc pachallapash manachu chapana usharcanqui?
Ama puñuichichu; chaparaichic, Diosta mañaichic juchanayai shamucpi ama juchallincapac. Shuti pacha, cancunapac yuyai sinchimi, ranti cancunapac aicha sanpami.
Chashna nishpa, cutillata Dios-huan rimarincapac rirca; ñaupa rimashca shimicunata rimarca.
Quimsa yachachishcacuna tiyashcaman ticrashpa, paicunata puñurashcata tuparca. Yapa puñunasyashpa, imata rimana mana yachanurcachu.
Quimsaniqui cuti rishpa, yachachishcacunata nirca: —¿Chaira puñuranquichic?
Shayarichic, jacuichic; ñucata japinca rac runa caipimi can.

Jesusí rimacucpi, Judas shamurca (pai chunca ishcaicu— namanta carca). Paihuan pacta shuc—runacuna shamunurca caspicunahuan, mircanucunahuan. Pacriyaya apucuha, camachic quilcata yachaccuna judio apucunapash chai runacunata cachamushca carca.
Judas paicuhata rimashcarca nishpa: —Ñuca muchashca runa paimi. Japishpa, sinchita huatashpa pushanquichic.
Chashna cacpi, Judas Jésüsman mayahyáshpa, paita mücharca nishpa: —¡Yachachiccama!
Paicuna Jesusta japishpa huatanurca.
Jesus-huan tiyaccunamanta shuc, mircanuta japishpa, jatun pacriyaya apupac luncuta huactashpa, paipac rinrita pitirca.
Jesus runcunata nirca: —¿Shuhua runachu cani, cancuna caspicunahuan mircanucunahuan ñucata japincapac shamunquichic?
Caran puncha Diospa (huasipi cancunahuan tiyarcani yachachishpa; mana japihuarcanquichic. Chashna tucun quillcara pactarincapac.
Chashna rimacpi, yachachishcacuna Jesusta saquishpa miticuhurca.
Shuc huanpra catanahuan pillurishpa, Jesusta catishpa rirarca. Paitapash japinurca.
Paica, catanata saquishpa, llushti llushpirirca.
Jesusta jatun pacriyaya apupacman pushanurca. Chaipi pacriyaya apucuna, judio apucuna camachic quillcata yachaccunapash tantarishpa chapanurca.
Pedro carumanta catishpa rirca huasi patio ucuman. Chaipi suldarucunahuan nina mayanpi tiyarirca rupayancapac.
Pacriyaya apucuna tucui taripaccunantin, Jesusta huañuchinata munashpa, shuc paita juchachishpa rimacta mashcanurca; ranti mana tupanurcachu,
achca runa llullashpa Jesusmanta rimanucpipash. Paicuna rimashca caran laya carca.
Puchucaipi, huaquin runacuna llullashpa paimanta cashna rimanurca: —Ñucanchic paita uyarcanchic cashna nishcapi:
"Ñucacai runa rashca Diospac huasita tulashami, quimsa punchapi shuc mana runa rashcata shayachishami".
Paicuna rimashcapipash mana shuc yuyaillahuan canurca.
Chashna cacpi, pacriyaya jatun apu, tucuicuna ñaupacpi shayarishpa, Jesusta nirca: —¿Mana imata rimanquichu? ¿Imata nishpa chai shimicunata rimarcanqui?
Jesus upallarca. Pacriyaya apu cutillata paita tapurca: —¿Can Mesiaschu canqui? ¿Diospac Churichu canqui?
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Ari, Mesiasmi cani. Shuc puncha cai RUNAta ushac Diospac alli maquiman tiyacucta ricunquichic, puyucuna jahuapi shamucucta ricunquichic.
Chaita uyashpa, pacriyaya. apu piñarishpa, paipac churanata lliquishpa, nirca: —¿Imapac shuc ricuyaccunata mutsunchic?
Cancunallatacpai rimashcata uyarcanquichic. ¿Imata ninquichic? Tucuicuna shuclla shina ninurca: —Paita huañuchina can.
Huaquin runacuna paita tiucancapac callarinurca. Paipac ñahuita quillpashpa paita macancapac ninurca: —¿Rimai, maican canta macan? Suldarucunapash paita macaranurca.
Pedro patiopi tiyarca. Shuc pacriyaya aputa yanapac huarmi shamushpa,
Pedroman nina mayanpi ricushpa saquirirca. Huasha paita nirca: —Canpash Nazaretmanta Jesus-huan puric carcanqui.
Pedro nirca: —Chai runata mana ricsinichu; can rimashcata mana atipanichu. Chashna nishpa, canchaman llucshirca. Llucshicucpi, cari atallpa caparirca.
Chai huarmi, Pedroman ricushpa, chaipi tiyaccunata nirca: —Cai runa paipaccunamantami.
Pedro nirca: —Mana paipaccunamantachu cani. Manapash unaipi, chaipi tiyaccuna Pedrota ninurca: —Shuti pacha, can Jesuspac bulamanta canqui, Galilea— manta runa mari canqui.
Pedro manalli shimicunata piñashpa rimai callarirca, nishpa: —Mana ricsinichu cancuna rimacushca runata.

Chai ucullapi, cari atallpa cutillata caparirca. Pedro uyashpa, Jesus rimashcata yuyarirca: "Cari atallpa chaira mana ishcai cuti caparicpi, can quimsa cuti 'paita mana ricsinichu' nishpa rimanqui. Chaita yuyarishpa, yapa huacancapac callarirca.
Punchayaracpi, pacriyaya apucuna rucucunantin yachaccunantin tucui gubirnu apucunantin paicuna ranata rimarinurca. Chai huasha, Jesusta huatashpa, Pilatoman pushanurca.
Pilato Jesusta tapurca nishpa: —¿Can judiocunapac Jatum Curacachu canqui? Jesus nirca: —Ari, Jatun Curacami cani.
Pacriyaya apucuna achcacunata juchachinuccpi,
Pilato cutillata Jesusta nirca: —¿Imatapash manachu cutipanqui? Uyai, achcacunata canta juchachinun,
Jesus shuc shimillatapash mana rimarcachu. Chairaicu Pilato yapa mancharirca.
Raimi punchacunapi, Pilato shuc chunta curralpi huichcara runata cacharic carca, paicuna mañashca runata.
Chai pacha shuc Barrabas shutiyuc runa tiyarca, shuccuna— huan pacia huichcai tucushcarca, runata huañuchishcamanta piñanacushpa.
Runacuna Pilatopacman rinurea, paicunapac yachai mañancapac, "shuc runata cachari" rishpa.
Pilato paicunata tapurca: —¿Ñuca judiocunapac Jatun Curacata cacharincapac munanquichichu?
Pacriyaya apucuna Jesusta chicnishcamanta paipacman pushanushcata Pilato yacharca.
Pacriyaya apucuna "Barrabasta cachari" nishpa runacunata rimachinurca.
Pilato tapucpi nishpa: —¿Imata rasha judiocunapac Jatun Curaca nishcata?
caparishpa ninurca: —¡Paita chacatai!
¡Pilato tapurca: —¿Ima manallita rurarca? Paicuna ashtahuan sinchita caparishpa ninurca: —¡Paita chacatai!
Pilato runacunata cushiyachisha nishpa, Barrabasta cacharirca. Jesusta llipachishca huasha, suldarucunaman curca "paita chacataichic" nishpa.
Suldarucuna, Jesusta japishpa, huasi patioman pusha– nurca. Tucui suldarucuna tantarishpa,
shuc puca churanata Jesusta churachinurca. Cashahuan ahuashca llaututa paipac umapi churanurca.
Huasha, caparishpa ninurca: —¡Caimi judiocunapac Jatun Curaca!
Chashna nishpa, paipac umapi caspihuan huactaranurca, paita tiucaranurca. Paipac ñaupacpi cuncurishpa, paita apu shina saluranurca.
Paita asishca huasha, puca churanata surcushpa, quiquin churanata churachinurca. Chai huasha, paita chacatancapac pushanurca.
Pushanucpi, shuc Cirene llactamanta Simon shutiyuc runata tupanurca. Chai runa (Alejandropac, Rufopac yaya carca) chacramanta shamurarca Paita Jesuspac crusta apachinurca.
Jesusta Gólgota nishcaman pushanurca (Gólgota runa shimipi "aya uma tullu urcu" nin).
Mirra nishcahuan masashca binota Jesusta upiachinurca; Jesus mana upiarcachu.
Chashnapi Jesusta chacatanurca. Huasha paipac churanacunata japihurca caran lichayucpac shuc churana.
Jesusta chacatanushcapi, tutamanta carca,— iscun pacha tujpu.
Shuc quillcata churanurca imaraicu huañuchinun nishpa. Cashna quillcara tiyarca: "Judiocunapac Jatun Curaca".
Paihuan pacta ishcai shuhuacunata chacatanurca, shucta paipac alli maquiman, shucta lluqui maquiman.
Chashna ranucpi, quillca ñaupa nishca pactarirca; cashna quillcara tiyarca: "Paita juchayuc shinak ranurca".
Chaita puriccuna Jesusta asinurca. Umata cuyuchishpa ninurca: —¡Can Diospac huasita urmachic, chaita quimsa punchapi shayachic,
can quiquinta quishpichi, crusmanta uraicui!
Pacriyaya apucuna yachaccunantin Jesusta asishpa, paicunapura rimanurca: —Shuccunata quishpichirca; paillatata maria quistipichina ushah,
Pai quiquinta quishpichichun ñucanchic ricuncapac, ricushpa inincapac. Jesus-huan pacta chacatashcacuhapash paita piñanurca.
Chaupi pun chamanta chaupi chishicama tucui allpapi yanayarca.
Chaupi chishipi Jesus sinchita caparirca nishpa: —Eli, Eli, lama sabactaní (runa shimi: "Ñuca Dioslla, ñuca Dioslla, imaracu ñucata jichushcanqui").
Huaquin chaipi tiyaccuna ninurca: —Eliasta cayaran.
Shuc callpashpa rishpa, shuc esponjata jayac binopi jucuchishpa, pintupi churashpa, Jesusta upiachirca nishpa: —Elias shamunca ima chari paita quishpichincapac.
Jesus sinchita caparishpa huañurca.
Chai ucullapi, Diospac huasipi huarcushca cortina jahuamanta uracama lliquirirca.
Chaipi shayarac suldaru apu; imashna huañushcata ricushpa, nircà: –Shuti pacha, cai runa Diospac Churimi carca.
Huaquin huarmicuna caramahta tucuita ricurañurca. Shuc Maria Magdalena carca; shuc quipa Jacobopac Josepac— pash mama Maria; shuc Salomé.
Paicuna Jesusta Galileamanta catinurca paita siñbincapac, Chai huarmicunahuan shuccunapash tiyanurca, Jesus-huan pacta Jerusalenman shamushcacuna.
Chishiyacpi, cayantin puncha samana puncha cacpi,
shuc runa Pilatopacman rishpa, mana manchashpa Jesuspac ayata mañarca. Chai runa Jose shutiyuc carca, Arimatea nishca llactamanta, judio apu bulamanta. Paipash Diospac pachata chapacurca.
Pilato Jesus ña huañushcata mana inishpa uyarca.
Suldaru aputa cayashpa, paita tapurca nishpa: —¿Jesus huañushcachu? Pai "ari" nicpi, Pilato Joseta nirca: —Jesuspac ayata apaila,

Jose rishpa, shuc alli churanata rantirca; huasha, ayata crusmanta uraicuchishpa, chai churanahuan pillushpa, panipana jutcupi churarca. Chai jutcu rumi quinraipi allashca carca. Puncuta jatun rumihuan quillparca.
Maria Magdalenahuan Josepac mama Mariahuan maipi churanushcata ricunurca.
Samana puncha huasha, Maria Magdalenahuan, Santiagopac mama Mariahuan Salomehuan asnaccunata rantinurca Jesuspac ayata armachincapac,
Semana ñaupac punchapi, tutamantashitu, inti llucshicucpi, aya jutcuman rinurca.
Puricushpa rimanacunurca nishpa: —¿Aya jutcumanta pimi rumita anchuchinca?
Chaiman pactashpa ricunucpi, rumi jatun cashpallata, anchuchishcami carca.
Aya jutcuman yaicushpa, alli maquiman shuc huanprata ricunurca, yurac churanata churarishca. Paita ricushpa mancharinurca.
Chai huanpra nirca: —Ama manchaichichu. Nazaretmanta Jesusta mashcanquichic, cruspi huañuscata. Mana caipichu; causarircami. Paita churanushcata ricuichic.
Pedrota shuc yachachishcacunatapash huillacrichic: "Jesus Galileaman rinca ran cancunata ñaupashpa, pai nishca shina. Chaipi paita ricunquichic".
Chaita uyashpa, huarmicuna callpashpa aya jutcumanta llucshinurca; Manchaimanta chucchushpa, pitapash mana imata huillanurcachu.
Jesus semana ñaupac puncha pacaricushcapi causarirca. Causarishpa, ñaupacta Maria Magdalenaman ricurirca; paimanta canchis supaicunata jichushca carca.
Pai Jesus-huan purishcacunaman huillacrirca; paicuna llaquirishpa Jesusta huacaranurca.
Paicuna, chai huarmi rimashcata uyashpa, "Jesus causan, ñuca paita ricurcani" nishpa, mana ininurcachu.
Chai huasha; Jesus shuc laya tucushpa, ishcai yachachishcacunaman ricurirca, paicuna Jerusalenmanta huasiman riranucpi.
Shuccunaman huillancäpac ticranurca; shuccunaca mana ininurcachu.
Puchucaipi, Jesus chunca shuc runacunaman ricurirca, paicuna micuranucpi. Jesus paicunata piñashpa rimarca paita mana inishcamanta, pai causarishcata ricuccunatapash mana uyashcamanta.
Huasha paicunata nirca: —Tucui pachata richic; alli shimita tucui runacunaman huillanquichic,
Inic ruria, bautisai tucuc runa quishpichishcami canca. Mana inishachu nic runa cautsayachishcami canca.
Iniccuna mana raipaccunata rurana ushanunca. Ñuca shutipi supaicunata jichununca. Mana yachashca shimipi rimanunca.
Machacuicunata maquihuan japinunca; huañunalla janpita upiashpallata, mana ima tucununca. Uncuccuna jahuapi maquita churanucpi, uncuccuna alliyanunca.
Chaita rimashca huasha, Apunchic Jesus jahua pachaman pushai tucurca, Diospac alli maquiman tiyarirca.
Paicuna rishpa, maipipash Diospac alli shimita camachinurca. Dios paicunata yanaparca. Paicuna rimashca shuti cashcata mana raipaccunata rurashpa ricuchinurca.
Acha runa ñucanchipacpi callarimanta tucushcata quillcanurca,
quiquin ñahuihuan ricushcacuna alli shimita uyachincapac yanapashcacunapash rimashcata catishpa.
Tapushpa, tapushpa tucuita yachashca huasha, ñuca uyashcata canman quillcanata munani, alli Teófilo.
Caita catishpa, canta yachachishcacuna rimashcata shuti cashcata yachanqui.
Herodes shutiyuc runa Judea allpapi apu cashcapi, shuc pacriyaya tiyarca, Zacarias shutiyuc, Abias bulamanta. Paipac huarmi Elisabet carca, Aaron miraicunamanta.
Ishcaintin Diospac ñaupacpi alli causaccuna carca, Dios rurai nishcacunata pactachishpa; runacunapac ñahuipi jucha illac puriccuna carca.
Elisabet huahuata mana tupac cashcaraicu, huahua illac canurca; ishcaintin rucu canurca.
Shuc puncha, Diospac huasipi Zacariaspac bula tiyana punchacunacacpi,
pacriyayacuna yachaita catishpa, maican lichayuc canca altar jahuapi sumiriuta rupachincapac acllanucpi, Zacarias lichayuc tucurca.
Sumiriuta rupachincapac acllatucui runacuna canchapi tantarishpa Diosman mañaranurca.
Cuncaimanta shuc Diospac angel Zacariaspacpi ricurimurca, altarpac alli maquipi shayarishpa.
Paita ricushpa, Zacarias yapa mancharirca.
Angel paita nirca: —Ama manchaichu. Dios can mañashcata uyarca; canpac huarmi Elisabet shuc cari huahuata charinca; paita Juan shutichinqui.
Can yapa cushiyanqui; achca runacuna cushiyarinunca, chai huahua pacarishcaraicu.
Canpac churi Diospac ñaupacpi jatunmi canca. Binota machachic yacutapash mana upiancachu; chaira mana pacarishpa, Diospac Samaihuan juntashca canca.
Pai camachishcahuan Israelmanta achca runa Diospacman ticranunca.

Pai Jesucristota ñaupashpa rinca, profeta Eliaspac samaita ushaitapash charinca, churicunata yayacunahuan allichincapac, mana iniccunapac yuyaita turcachincapac. Pai rimashcahuan runacunata allichinca paicuna Diosta chasquincapac.
Rimacpi uyashpa, Zacarias angelta tapurca: —¿Can rimashca tucunca rashcata maimanta yachasha? Ñuca ña yapa rucu cani, ñuca huarmipash yapa rucu can.
Angel cutipashpa nirca: —Ñuca Gabriel cani, Diosta yanapashpa causac; pai canpacman cachamuhuarca canhuan rimarincapac, chai cushi shimita huillancapac.
Can mana inishcaraicu; upa shimi tucunqui; canpac churi pacarinacama mana rimana ushanquichu. Ñuca rimashcaca pactarina puncha pactarinca.
Diospac huasi ucupi chai tucui tucunacama, runacuna canchapi Zacariasta chaparanurca, shincapac unayan" nishpa mancharishpa.
Zacarias llucshishpaca mana rimana usharcachu; chaimanta atipanurca Diospac huasipi ricurinata ricushcata. Shimi illac tucushpa, maquihuan ricuchishpaila rimarca.
Zacarias, Diospac huasipi yanapana punchacuna tucurishcapi, huasiman ticrarca.
Shuc punchacuna huasha, paipac huarmi Elisabet huicsayuc tucurca; huicsayuc cashpa, pichca quilia tupu: huasipi saquirirca, mana maimanpash rishpa, shuncupi yuyarishpa:
"Dios ñucapi yapa allita rahuarca; ñuca llaquirishcata ricushpa, huahuata tupachihuarca, runacuna ama pincachihuanuchun" nishpa.
Sucta quilla huasha, Dios Gabriel nishca angelta Galileapi tiyac Nazaret llactaman cacharca,
Maria shutiyuc maltapacman.Maria shuc runahuan maqui japichishca carca; paipac shuti Jose, Davidpac aillumanta runa.
Angel chai maltapacman pactashpa, nirca: —Allillachu canqui, Maria? Cushiyai, Dios canta yapa llaquishpa, canhuan tiyan.
Chai shimicunata uyashpa Maria mancharirca; "imaraicu chashna rimahuan" yuyarishpa saquirirca.
Angel paita nirca: —Ama mancharichu, Maria; Dios llaquishcahuan canta ricun.
Huicsayuc tucunqui; shuc cari huahuata charinqui, paita Jesus shutichinqui.
Paica yuyaita jatunmi canca, Diospac churi canca, Diosca yaya Davidpac pachata paiman cunca,
Israel runa bulata pushancapac; paipac apu-cana pacha mana tucurincachu.
Rimacpi uyashpa Maria tapurca: —¿Imashna chai tucunca ñuca carihuan mana llutarishcapi?
Angel cutiparca: —Diospac Samai canpacman uraicunca, Diospac ushai canta llantunca puyu shina; chairaicu canmanta pacarina huahua Diosman chicanyachishca canca, Diospac Churi paita ninunca.
Caitapash yachana canqui: Canpac aillu Elisabet, rucu cashpa huicsayuc can; paica cunancama huahua illac cashpa, sucta quillamanta, huicsapi shuc huahuata charin,
Dios tucuita ushan mari.
Chai shimicunata uyashpa Maria nirca: —Ñuca Apunchicta uyac huarmi cani; can rimashca shina ñucapi Dios rurachun. Rimacpi, angel chaimanta anchurirca.
Shuc puncha, Maria paipac aillucunapacman rirca shuc Judea llactaman.
Zacariaspac huasiman pactashpa, paipac huarmi Elisabeta salurarca.
Elisabetca, Mariapac shimita uyacpi, paipac huahua huicsapi cuyurirca.
Elisabet, Diospac samaihuan juntashca, sinchi shimihuan nirca: —Tucui huarmicunamanta yalli bendisiashca canqui; can huicsapi charishca huahua achca benidisiashca can.
Ñuca mana imapash cani can ñucapacman shamuncapac.
Canpac shimita uyashca ucullapi, huahua ñuca huicsapi cushihuan cuyurirca,
Cushiyucmi canqui inishcamanta, Apunchic canta rimashca pactarinca mari.
Chai shimicunata yashpa, Maria cashna nirca: —Ñuca Apunchicta yupaichani,
ñucata quishpichic Diospi cushiyani;
pai ñucata alli ñahuihuan ricuhuarca, ñuca yanca huarmi cacpipash; cunanmanta tucui runacuna "cushiyucmi canqui" nishpa rimahuanunca;
tucuita ushac Dios sumaccunata ñucahuan rurarca. Pai yapa alli can.
"Paita uyaccunamanta huiñai llaquirincami.
Pai tucuita ushashcata ricuchirca. "Yapa cani" nishpa niccunata pincachirca.
Ushayuccunata urayachirca; yanca runacunata jahuayachirca.
"Yaricac runacunaman tucui laya imacunata cuyarca; cullquiyuccunata imapash illac cacharca.
Llaqui shuncu cashpa, paita uyac Israel runacunata yanaparca; paicunamanta llaquirirca,
ñucanchic ñaupacuna Abraanman paimanta mirashcacunamanpash rimashcata huiñai pactachisha nishpa".
Maria Elisabetpacpi quimsa quilla saquirirca; chai huasha, huasiman ticrarca.
Elisabet huahuata pacarichina puncha pactashcapi, shuc cari huahuata charirca.
Paita ricsiccuna, paipac aillucunapash yapa cushiyanurca, Dios paita chashna rurashcaraicu.
Pusac puncha huasha, huahuapac pincaishitu carata pitincapac rinurca, paita shutichincapac; paita "Zacarias shutichishun" ninurca, paipac yaya shina.
Ranti paipac mama nirca: —Mana. Paipac shuti Juan cana can.
Cutipanurca: —¿Imaraicu? Canpac aillucunapi mana tiyan chai laya shutiyuc.
Yayatami tapushun. Maquihuan ricuchishpa tapunucpi,
pai shuc quillcata mañashpa, "Juanmi paipac shuti" quillcarca. Chaita ricuccuna mancharinurca.
Chai ucullapi, Zacarias rimai callarirca Diosta yupaichashpa.
Tucui uyaccuna yapa mancharinurca; chai tucushcata tucui Judea suyupi huillanurca.
Chaita uyaccuna paicunapura rimarishpa ninurca: —¿Imatac canca cai huahua? Dios paipac ushaita chai huahuapi ricuchirca mari.
Paipac yaya Zacarias, Diospac Samaihuan juntashca cashpa, Dios paita rimachicpi, nirca:
—Israel runacunapac Apunchic Dios yupaichashca cachun, pai ñucanchicpacman shamurca, nucanchicta paipac runa bulata quishpichincapac.
Paita uyac runa Davidpac churicunamanta shuc ushayuc quishpichicta ñucanchicman curca,
pai cusha nishcata pactachishpa. Cashna mari naupa punchacuna causashca profetacuna rimanushcarca nishpa:
Shuc puncha, chicniccunamanta cancunata quishpichisha.
"Chashna rashpa, ñucanchic ñaupacunamanta llaquirirca, paicunaman cushca shimita mana cuncarishcachu.
"Dios ñucanchic yaya Abraanman shimita curca, cashna nishpa:
Cancunata chicniccunamanta quishpichisha, cancuna mana manchashpa, Diosta uyashpa causancapac; paipac ñaupacpi alli yuyaihun, cusca shuncuhuan tiyancapac causaicama.
Canca, ñuca churi, Jatun Diospac profeta rimai tucunqui; Apunchicta ñaupashpa, pai rina ñanpita allichinqui.
''Diospac runa bulata camachniqui juchacunata pichai tucunquichic nishpa, quishpichinata chasquinquichic nishpa.
"Ñucanchic Dios, alli cashpa, ñucanchicmanta llaquirishpa, shuc mushu, intita pacarichin.
Chai inti huañui tutapi causaccunata achicyachin, ñucanchicta ganas causana ñanpita pushan".
Chai huahua aichapi yuyaipipash huiñararca; chunlla allpacunapi causarca Israel runacunata camachincapac callari nacama.
Chai punchacunapi, Cesar Augusto shutiyuc Inca tucui llactacunapi tiyashca runacunata; yupanata munarca.
Cirino shutiyuc, runa Siriapi apu cashcapi, chai ñaupac yupanata —censo nishca— ruranurca.
Tucui runacuna shutita quillcarincapac rinurca quiquin llactaman.
Jose huarmintin, Davidpac aillu cashpa, Galileapi tiyac Nazaret llactamanta Judeaman sicanurca, Belen llactaman; chai llactapi mari David pacarishca carca. Josepac huarmi Maria huicsayuc carca.
Llactaman pactanucpi, Maria pacarichina puncha pactarirca; chaipi, shuc cari huahuata pacarichirca, paipac ñaupac pacaric huahua.
Paita churanahuan pillushpa, huacra carana batiapi sirichirca huacra huasipi, chushac huasi mana tiyashcaraicu.
Chai mayanpi, shuc michic runacuna obejacunata ricuranurca.
Cuncaimanta shuc angel paicunapacpi ricurimurca; tuta punchaclla tucurca; chaita ricushpa michiccuna yapa mancharinurca.
Angel paicunata nirca: —Ama manchaichichu; cushi shimita huillancapac shamuni; tucui runacuna cushiyarinunca.
Cunanshitu Belen llactapi cancunata quishpichina huahua pacarirca; paimi Mesias, Apunchic.
Paita ricucrichic; shuc huahuata, churanahuan pillushcata, huacra carana batiapi sirishcata tarinquichic.
Rimacpi, shuc achca angelcuna jahua pachapi ricurimunurca, Diosta chacchashpa, cashna: taquishpa: —
¡Jahua pachapi Dios chacchashca cachun! ¡cai allpapi Dios llaquishca runacuna ganas causanata charinuchun!
Angelcuna jahua pachaman ticrashca huasha, michiccuna rimanacunurca nishpa: —Jacuichic Belen llactaman; angel huillashcata ricucrishun.
Callpashpa rishpa, Mariata Josentin tarinurca, huahuata batiapi sirishcata tupanurca,
Huahuata ricushpa, angelcuna chai huahuamanta huillashcata tucuicunaman uyachinurca;
michiccuna huillashcata uyaccuna mancharinurca.
Mariaca shuncu ucupi chai tucuita huacaichirca, huiñai chaita yuyarashpa.
Michiccuna ticranurca Diosta yupaichashpa, chacchashpa tucui paicuna uyashcamanta ricushcamantapash; angel rimashca shina tucushca carca.
Pusac puncha huasha, huahuapac pincaishitu carata pitina puncha pactashcapi, paita "Jesus" nishpa shutichinurca; chai shutita angel rimashca carca Maria chaira huicsayashcapi,
Jesuspac mama Maria maillarina puncha pactashcapi, Moisespac quillcata pactachincapac, Jesusta Jerusalenman pushanurca Apunchicman cuncapac.
Chashna ruranurca camachic quillcapi cashna quillcara tiyashcaraicu: "Ñaupac cari huahua Diosman chicanyachishcami canca"
Chashna cacpi, camachic quillcai nicpi, "camarita cunquichic ishcai urpita, mana tiyacpi, ishcai paloma huahuata cunquichic" nishpa, chaita pactachinurca.
Chai pacha Jerusalenpi shuc Simeon shutiyuc runa causarca; chai runa alli carca, Diosta llaquic runa; Diospac Samai paihuan tiyarca.
Israel runa bula quishpichi tucuna punchata chaparashpa causarca. Diospac Samai paita nishcarca: "Can chaira mana huañushpa, Dios acllashcata ricunqui".
Diospac Samai paita pushaccpi, Diospac huasiman rirca. Chaipi tiyacpi, Jesuspac yayacuna yaicunurca, huahuata pushashpa camachic quillcata pactachincapac.
Simeon, huahuata marcashpa, Diosta yupaicharca cashna nishpa: —
Apunchic Dios, cunan ganaslla huañushami: can rimahuashca pactarishca mari.
Can cachashca quishpichicta ñuca quiquin ñahuihuan ricushcani.
Paita tucui runacuna ñaupacpi churarcanqui,
tucui allpapi causac runacunata achicyachincapac, Israel runacunata sumacyachincapac.
José Jesuspac mamantin, Simeon, huahuamanta rimashcata uyashpa, mancharinurca.

Simeon huahuata bendisiarca; huasha, paipac mama Mariata nirca: —Uyai, cai huahuaraicu huaquin judiocuna chincarinunca, huaquincuna quishpinunca. Unancha shina churashca cacpi, achca runa paita chicninunca.
Chashna rashpa, caran amu shuncupi yuyashca ricurinca. Chai tucuiraicu, shuc huachihuan canpac shuncupi tucsishca shina tucunqui.

Chai Diospac huasillapi shuc yapa rucu huarmi causac carca, Ana shutiyuc Fanuelpac ushushi, Aser aillucunamanta; pai Diospacmanta rimac huarmi carca. Chai huarmi, malta cashpa, paipac carihuan canchis huata causashca huasha,
huaccha saquirirca; pusac chunca chuscu huatayuc cashpallata, tutantin punchantin Diospac huasipi tiyac carca, sasishpa, Dios-huan rimarishpa.
Chai huarmi chai ucullapi shamushpa, Diosta yupaicharca; Jerusalenta, quishpichicta; chaparac runacunamanta huahua Jesusmanta rimai callarirca.
Camachic quillca rimashcata pactachishca, huasha, Galileaman ticranurca, paicunapac quiquin llacta Nazaretman.
Huahuaca huiñararca, jatunyararca, yachararca; Dios paihuan tiyarca.
Jesuspac yayacuna tucui huata Jerusalenman puriccuna carca Pascua raimita rancapac.
Jesus chunca ishcai huatayuc tucucpi, yayacunantin Jerusalenman sicarca, judiocunapac yachaita catishpa.
Raimi tucuricpi, ticrana puncha, Jesus chaillapi saquirirca, paipac yayacuna mana yachacpi.
Paicuna, "shuc aillucunahuan shamuranca" yuyashpa, shuc puncha tupu purinurca; aillucunapura huahuata mashcashpa,
mana tupashpa, Jerusalenman ticranurca chaipi paita mashcancapac.
Quinsa puncha huashta, Diospac huasipi paita tupanurca, yachaccuna ucupi tiyacushcata, paicunahuan rimarishpa.
Tucui paita uyaccuna pai rimashcamanta tapushcamanta mancharinurca, yapa umayuc can nishpa.
Yayacuna, Jesusta ricushpa, yapa cushiyanurca; mámaca paita nirca: —Churi, ¿imaraicu ñucanchihuan chashna rurarcanqui? Yapa llaquirishpa canta mashcacurcanchic.
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Imaraicuta mashcahuarcanquichic? ¿Nuca Yayapaccunata rana cashcata manachu yachanquichic?
Chashna nicpi, rimashcata mana atipanurcachu.
Chaipac huasha, Jesus Nazareti llactaman paicunahuan ticrarca; chaipi paicunata uyashpa causarca. Paipac mama chai tucushcata shuncupi huacaichirca.
Jesusca yuyaipi aichapipash huiñararca; Diospac ñaupacpi runacuna ñaupacpipash sumacta causac carca.
Ña chunca pichca huata Tiberio Inca carca. Poncio Pilato Judeapi apu carca; Herodes Galileapi apu carca; paipac huauqui Felipe Itureapi Traconitidepipash apu carca; Lisanias Abilenepi apu carca.
Anas-huan Caifas-huan pacriyayacunapac jatun apu canurca. Chai huatapi Dios Zacariaspac churi Juanta rimarca, pai chunlla allpapi tiyashcapi.
Juan Jordan nishca yacu patapi tiyac llactacunata puric carca, runacunata cashna camachishpa: —Diosman ticrashpa, bautisai tucuichic cancunapac juchacuna pichai tucuncapac.
Chashna tucurca Isaias quillcashca pactarincapac; cashna mari quillcashcarca: Chunlla allpapi shuc shimi uyarin cashna nishpa: "Apunchic rina ñanpita allichchic, cuscachichic"
Urcucunata panpayachina can; pucrucunata parijana can; Huishtu ñanpicunata cushcactona can; pucru ñanpita allichina can
Chashna tucui runacuna Dios cachashca quishpichinata ricununca.
Achca runacuna Juanpacman bautisai tucuncapac shamunucpi, paicunata nirca: —Machacui miraicuna, pitac cancunata rimarca "jatun shamuna ñacachinata quishpinquichic" nishpa?

Cancuna Diosman yuyaita ticrachishcata cancuna rurashcacunahuan ricuchichic. Ama pantaichichu "Abraan ñucanchic yayami" nishpa. Cancunata nini: Dios cai rumicunamanta huahuacunata Abraanman surcuna ushan.
Tumi ña allichishca can yuracunata cuchuncapac; alli muyucunata mana aparic yura cuchushcami canca ninapi shitai tucuncapac.
Rimacpi, runacuna uyashpa paita tapunurca: —¿Imata rana canchic cuti?
Juan cutiparca: —Maicanpash ishcai churanata charishpa, mana charicman shucta cuyachun; micunata charic runa mana charicta carachun.
Gubirnu cullquita pallaccunapash Juanpacman shamunurca bautisai tucuncapac; paita tapunurca: —Yachachic, ¿ñucánchica imata rana canchic?
Juan cutiparca: —Caran amu paganallata mañanquichic.
Suldarucunapash paita tapunurca: —¿Nucánchica imata rana canchic? Juan nirca: —Ama imatapash runacunamanta quichunquichichu; ama llulla shimita rimanquichic; cancuna yapachishcahuan cushiyanquichic.
Tucui runacuna Mesias shamunata chaparanucpi, Juanta ricushpa tapurinurca: —¿Cai runa Mesiaschu canca? ¿manachu Mesias canca?

Chashna cacpi, Juan nirca: —Ñuca cancunata yacuhuan bautisani; ranti, shuc ñucamanta yalli cac shamunca; paipac ushutapac huascata pascancapac mara allichu cani; pai Diospac Samaihuan ninahuanpash cancunata bautisanca?
Palata maquipi charin pallashca trigota huairachincapac: trigo muyuta huasipi huacaichinca, trigo quihuata ninapi rupachinca.
Chai sami shimicunahuan Juan runacunata camachic carca, cushi shimita paicunaman uyachic carca
Apu Herodestapash Juan piñashpa rimarca, paipac huauqui Felipiepac huarmita japishcaraicu, shuc manalli rashcacunatapash rurashcaraicu.
Herodes Juanta uyana rantimanta, shuc jatun juchata rarca paita chunta curralpi huichcachishpa.
Juanta chunta curralpi chaira mana huichcanucpi, pai runacunata bautisacucpi, Jesustapash bautisarca; pai Dios-huan rimaricucpi, jahua pacha pascarirca;
Diospac Samai, urpi shina ricurishpa, Jesuspac jahuapi uraicurca; shuc shimi uyarirca cashna nishpa: —Can ñuca llaquishca Churimi canqui; canhuan achca cushiyani.

Jesus runacunata yachachincapac callarishcapi, quimsa chuncashi huatayuc carca. Runacuna yuyanucpi, Josepac churi carca. Joseca Elipac churi, cai Matatpac churi, cai Levipac churi, cai Melquipac churi, cai Janapac churi, cai Josepac churi, cai Matatiaspac churi, cai;Ampspac churi, cai Naumpac churi, cai Eslipac churi, cai Nagaipac, churi, cai Maatpac churi, cai Matatiaspac churi, cai Semeipac churi, cai Josepac churi, cai Judapac churi, cai Jonapac churi, cai Resapac churi, cai Zorobabelpac churi, cai Salatielpac churi, cai Neripac churi, cai Melquipac churi, cai Adipac churi, cai Cosampac churi, cai Elmodampac churi, cai Erpac churi, cai Josuepac churi, cai Eliecerpac churi, cai Jorimpac churi, cai Matatpac churi, cai Levipac churi, cai Simeonpac churi, cai Judapac churi, cai Josepac. churi, cai Jonampac churi, cai Eliaquinpac churi, cai Meleapac churi, cai Mainampac churi, cai Matatapac churi, cai Natanpac churi, cai Davidpac churi, cai Isaipac churi, cai Obedpac churi, cai Boozpac churi, cai Salmonpac churi, cai Naasompac churi, cai Aminadatpac churi, cai Aranpac churi, cai Esrompac churi, cai Farespac churi, cai Judapac churi, cai Jacobpac churi, cai Isaacpac churi, cai Abraanpac churi, cai Tarepac churi, cai Nacorpac churi, cai Serugpac churi, cai Ragaupac churi, cai Felegpac churi; cai Heberpac churi, cai Salapac churi, cai Cainampac churi, cai Arfaxadpac churi, cai Sempac churi, cai Noepac churi; cai Lamecpac churi, cai Matusalenpac churi, cai Enocpac churi, cai Jaredpac churi, cai Malaleelpac churi, cai Cainampac churi, cai Enospac churi, cai Serpac churi, cai Adanpac churi, cai Diospac churi.
Jesus, Diospac Samaihuan juntashca, Jordan yacumanta ticrarca; Samai paita pushacpi, chunlla allpapi causarca chuscu chunca puncha.
Chaipi supai paita camarca, Micuna illacpi, mana imata micushpa causarca," chairaicu yarcachirca;
Yarcacpi, supai paita nirca: Can Diospac churi cashpa, cai rumita "tanta tucui" nishpa rimai.
Jesus cutiparca: —Quillcara tiyan: "Runa mana tantallahuanchu causan".
Huasha, supai shuc jatun urcuman paita pusharca; paiman tucui llactacunata ñahuipilla ricuchishpa,
nirca: —Cai llactacunapi apu canata cushcanqui; ñucapac mari canun; ñuca munashcaman chaicunata cusha.
Can ñucata yapaichacpi, cai tucui canpacmi canca.
Rimacpi uyashpa, Jesus nirca: —Quillcara tiyan: "Canpac Apu Diosta yupaichanqui, paillatata uyanqui.
Chai huasha, supai Jerusalen llactaman paita pusharca; Diospac huasi jahuapi paita shayachishpa nirca: —Can Diospac churi cashpa, caimanta uraman shitari;
quillcara mari tiyan: "Paipac angelcunata cachanca canta ricuncapac.
Angelcuna canta maquipi japinunca, ama rumipi susurincapac"
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Quillcarapash tiyan: "Canpac Apu Diosta ama camaichu".
Supai Jesusta camashca huasha, "shuc punchacama" nishpa chincarirca.
Jesus, Diospac Samaipac ushaihuan juntashca cashpa, Galileaman ticrarca; tucui llactacunapi paimanta rimarirca.
Tantarina huasicunapi yachachic carca; tucui uyaccuna paita chacchanurca.
Shuc puncha, Jesus Nazaret llactaman rirca; chai llactapi huiñashca carca. Samana puncha cacpi, tantarina huasiman rirca; yaicushpa, quillcata ricuncapac shayarirca.
Profeta Isaias quillcashcata paimah cunurca. Quillcata pascashpa, cashna quillcashcata tuparca:

Apu Diospac Samai ñucapimi; pai ñucata jahuirca. Tsuntsu runacunaman cushi shimita uyachincapac cachahuarca; shuncu llaquirishcacunaman quishpina puncha shamunca rashcata huillancapac; ñausa runacunapac ñahuicunata pascancapac cachahurca; aitai tucushpa causaccunman "quishpichishcami canquichic" nishpa rimancapac.
Diospac huatami cai huata nishpa tucuicunaman rimancapac.
Chaita uyachishpa, quillcata pillushpa yanapacman cushpa, tiyarirca; tantarina huasipi tiyaccuna paiman ricurashpa saquirinurca.
Paica rimai callarirca cashna nishpa. —Cunan puncha cancuna uyashca shimi pactarirca,
Tucuicuha "yapa alli riman" nishpa rimaranurca; pai rimashca shimicunamanta mancharinurca; mancharishpa ninurca: —Manachu Josepac churi can cai?
Jesus paicuna rimarashcata uyashpa nirca: —Cai shimicunata rimanquichic ima chari: "Yachac, can quiquinta janpiri". "Can Cafamaunpi rashcata quiquin llactapi rurai".
Huasha nirca: —Shuti cancunata nini: Manapí profeta quiquin llactapi llaquishcami can.
Uyahuaichic: Achca huaccha huarmi Israel llactacunapi tiyanurca Elias causashcapi, quimsa huata sucta quilla tupu mana tamiashcapi, tucui allpapi jatun yaricai tiyashcapi.
Chai llactacunamanta mana pipacman Dios Eliasta cacharca; shuc chican llactapi causac huaccha huarmipacman paita cacharca, Sidonmanta Sarepta nishca llactapi.

Chashnallata, Israel llactacunapi achca sisu runa tiyarca Eliseo profeta causashcapi; paicunamanta mana shucllapash pichai tucurca; ranti, Naaman shutiyuc runa, Siriamanta cashpallata, pichara saquirirca.
Chai shimicunata uyashpa, tantarina huasipi tiyaccuna yapa piñarinurca.
Jesusta japishpa, llacta canchaman pushanurca urcu uma jahuaman, chaimanta huaicuman shitancapac; chai urcu jahuapi Nazaret llacta tiyarca.
Chashnapash, Jesus Ilushpirishpa paicunapacmanta rirca.
Chaimanta rishpa, Galileapi tiyac Cafamaun llactaman pactarca; chaiman pactac, samana puncha runacunata yachachicurca.
Uyaccuna pai yachachishcamanta mancharinurca, ushaihuan yachachirca mari.
Pai rimarashca tantarina huasipi, shuc supai japishca runa tiyarca; chai runa, Jesusta ricushpa, caparishpa nirca: —
¡Caimanta llucshi! ¿Imaraicu ñucanchihuan satirinqui, Nazaretmanta Jesus? ¿Ñucanchicta tucuchincapacchu shamunqui? Canta ricsini, can Diosmanta shamuc santo runami canqui.
Rimacpi uyashpa, Jesus supaita piñashpa nirca: —¡Upallai! ¡Cai runamanta llucshi! Supai uyashpa, runata allpaman urmachishpa tucuicunapac ñaupacpi, paimanta llucshirca, paita mana huacllichicshpa.
Chaita ricuccuna mancharishpa, paicunapura rimanacunurcanishpa: —¡Manapacha! ¡Cai runa supaicunata rimacpi, supaicuna paita uyanun!
Tucui chai suyupac llactacunapi Jesusmanta rimarirca.
Tantarina huasimanta llucshishpa, Jesus Simonpac huasiman rirca. Simonpac huarmi mama sinchi uncushpa siricurca; Jesusta "paita alliyachipai" nishpa mananurca.
Jesus paiman cumurishpa, uncuita pinashpa rimarca; rimacpi, uncui saquirirca. Chai ucullapi jatarishpa, huarmi paicunahuan rimaricurca, paicunata sirbicurca.

Inti yaicushcapi, tucui sami uncushcacunata Jesuspacman pushamunurca; Jesusca caranpi maquicunata churashpa, tucuicunata alliyachirca. Huaquin uncushcacunamanta supaicuna llucshinurca caparishpa: —¡Can Diospac Churimi canqui! Ranti Jesus supaicunata piñarca, mana paicunata rimachirca, yachanurca mari Jesus Mesias cashcata.

Cayantiman tutamantashitu, Jesus chai llactamanta llucshishpa, shucman rirca, runa illashcaman. Runacuna, paita mashcashpa rishpa, pai tiyashcaman pactanurca. Paita jarcanayashpa, "ama richu" ninurca.
Jesus paicunata nirca: —Shuc llactacunapipash cushi shimita uyachina cani; chaipac mari shamurcani.
Chashna cacpi, Galilea llactacunapi tiyac tantarina huasicunapi camachishpa puricurca.
Shuc puncha, Genesaret nishca cucha patapi tiyashcapi, achca runa Jesuspacman tantarinurca Diospac shimita uyancapac.
Yacu patapi ishcai canua tiyarca; amucuna canuamanta llucshishpa, llicata maillaranurca.
Shuc canua Simonpac carca. Jesus chai canuaman yaicushpa, amuta nirca: —Chaupiman ansa tancaichic. Huasha, canuapi tiyarishpa, runacunata yachachirca.
Rimanata tucuchishcapi, Simonta nirca: —Cucha chaupiman rishunchic llicata shitancapac, yacu aichacunata japincapac.
Pedro nirca: —Yachachic, tuta pacaricta llicata shitashpallata, mana imata japircanchic; chashnapash, can rimacpi, cutillata camasha.
Llicata shitashpaca, achca yacu aichacunata japinurca; ñalla llica lliquirirca.
Shuc canuapi tiyaccunata cayanurca "yanapac shamuichic" nishpa, Shamunucpi, ishcaintin canuata juntachinurca, ñalla panparicta.
Simon Pedro, chaita ricushpa, Jesuspac ñaupacpi cuncurishpa, nirca: —Apunchic, ñucamanta anchuri, ñuca juchayuc runa cani.
Chashna achca yacu aichacunata japishcaraicu, pai paihuan tiyaccunantin mancharinurca.
Chashnallata, Cebedeopac churicuna Jacobo Juantin, Simonhuan llancaccuna mancharinurca. Jesus Simonta nirca: —Ama manchaichu; cunanmanta runacunata japiccama canqui.
Paicuna, canuacunata huatashpa, tucuita saquishpa, Jesus-huan rinurca.
Shuc puncha, Jesus shuc llactapi tiyacpi, shuc sisu runa shamurca; Jesusta ricushpa, paipac ñaupacpi tuhuaman urmashpa, paita mañarca nishpa: —Apunchic, can munashpa, ñucata janpina ushanqui.
Rimacpi, Jesus maquihuan paita llancarca nishpa: —¡Munanimi, pichashca saquiri! Chai ucullapi, chai runa alliyarca;
Jesus paita nirca: —Ama pitapash huillaichu. Pacriyayapacman rilla; Moises rimashcata paiman cunqui camari shina can alliyachi tucushcamanta, can ña alliyashcata tucuicuna yachancapac.
Jesus "ama huillaichu" nishpa nicpipash, caran puncha ashtahuan paimanta rimarirca; achca runacuna paipacman tantariccuna carca paita uyancapac, uncuicunamanta allichi tucuncapac.
Ranti, Jesus runa illashcaman ric carca Dios-huan rimarincapac.

Shuc puncha Jesus yachachicucpi, huaquin fariseocuna camachic quillcata yachaccunapash paita uyaranurca; paicuna Galilea llactacunamanta, Judeamanta, Jerusalenmanta shamunushca carca; paicunapac nahuipi Jesus, Diospac ushaihuan uncuccunata alliyachicurca.
Huaquin runacuna, shuc suchu runata cahuitupi huantushpa, shamunurca "Jesus tiyashca huasiman yaicunata munanchic —nishpa—, paipac ñaupacpi uncushcata saquincapac".
Ranti, achca runa tiyashcaraicu, mana yaicuna ushanurcachu; chashna cacpi, huasi jahuaman sicanurca: shuc jutcuta rurashpa, uncucta cahuitupi uraicuchinurca.
Jesus chai runacuna inishcata yachashpa, suchu runata nirca: —Canpac juchacuna pichara saquirinun.
Chashna nicpi, chai fariseocunahuan yachaccunahuan uyashpa, shuncu ucupi ninurca: —¿Pitac can cai runa? Chashna rimashcahuan Diosta camicun. Diosllami juchacunata pichana ushan.
Jesus paicuna yuyarashcata yachashpa nirca: —¿Imaraicu chashna yuyaranquichic?
¿Imata ashtahuan rimanalla can: "Canpac juchacuna pichai tucunun" nishpa rimanachu? ¿"jatarishpa puri" nishpa rimanachu? ¿Imata ninquichic? ¿Manachu cutipahuanquichic? Allimi.
Cai RUNA cai pachapi juchacunata pichana ushashcata cunan ricuchinca rani. Chashna rimashpa, chai suchu runata nirca: —Jatari, canpac cahuituta apashpa ri.
Chai ucullapi, suchu runa, tucuicuna ricuranucpi, jatarishpa, cahuituta apashpa rirca, Diosta yupaichashpa.
Chaita ricushpa, tucuilla Diosta yupaichanurca mancharishpa nishpa: —¡Manapacha! Cunan puncha munanayactami ricurcanchic.
Jesus chaimanta llucshishpa, shuc gubirnu cullquita pallac runata ricurca; paipac shuti Levi carca; gubirnu cullquita pagana huasipi tiyacurca. Jesus paita nirca: —¡Ñucahuan shamui!
Chai runa uyashpa, jatarishpa, tucuita saquishpa, Jesusta catishpa rirca.
Huasha, shuc puncha Levi jatun raimita paipac huasipi rurarca Jesusta pacrachuncapac; achca gubirnu cullquita pallaccuna shuc runacunapash micuncapac shamunurca.

Fariseocunahuan camachic quillcata yachaccunahuan chaita ricushpa, Jesus yachachishcacunata piñanurca nishpa: —¿Imaraicu gubirnu cullquita pallaccunahuan juchayuccunahuanpash micushpa upiashpa purinquichic?
Rimanucpi uyashp Jesus paicunata nirca: —Alli causaccuna janpiccamata mana mutsunun; uncuccuna janpiccamata mutsunun.
Ñúcaca mana shamurcanichu allicuhata cayancapac; juchayuccunata mashcancapac shamurcani, Diosman ticranuchun nishpa.
Chashna nicpi uyashpa paicuna Jesusta tapunurca: —Juanta caticcunahuan fariseocunata caticcunahuanpash sasishpa, Dios-huan rimarishpa causanun; imaraicu canpaccuna micushpalla, upiashpalia causanun?
Jesus cutiparca: —¿Shuc sahuarinaman cayashcacunata sasichina allichu, cari paicunahuan tiyacucpi? Mana.
Shuc puncha cari pushai tucunca, sahuarina raimi tucurinca; chai huasha sasinunca.

Yachachishpa caitapash nirca: —Manapí rucu churanata llachapancapac mushu churanamanta shuc pitita pitinchu. Chashna ruracpi, mushu churanata huacllichin; mushu churana piti mana alli ricurin rucu churanapi.
Chashnallata, manapí mushu binota rucu cara purupi churan; chashna ruracpi, mushu bino cara puruta tucyachin, binontin cara puruntin huacllirin.
Chairaicu mushu binota mushu cara purupi huacaichina can.
Rucu binota upiac runa mushuta mana munanchu; rucu bino ashtahuan alli mari can.
Shuc samana puncha, Jesus shuc tarpushca ucuta puricucpi, yachachishcacuna trigo huancuta aisashpa, maquihuan ishcushpa, muyucunata micuranurca.
Chaita ricushpa, huaquin farisepcuna paicunata ninurca: —¿Imaraicu samana puncha mana ranata ruracunquichic?
Jesus cutiparca: —¿Manachu yachanquichic shuc cuti David rashcata, pai paipaccunantin yaricachicpi?
Diospac huasiman yaicushpa, camari tantacunata japishpa micurca; paihuan tiyaccunatapash cararca; chai laya tantacunata pacriyayacunalla micuna ushanun.
Huasha nirca: —Cai RUNA samana punchapi pai munashcata rurana ushan.
Shuc samana punchapash, Jesus tantarina huasiman yaicushpa, yachachincapac callarirca. Chaipi shuc alli maqui huacllishca runa tiyarca.
Camachic quillcata yachaccuna fariseocunantin Jesusta chaparanurca, "samana puncha chai runata allichincachu" yuyashpa, paita juchachincapac.
Jesus paicuna yuyarishcata ricsishpa, chai maqui huacllishca runata nirca: —Uyai, jatarishpa chaupi shuncupi shayari.

Shayaricpi, Jesus chaipi tiyaccunata nirca: —Cancunata tapuni: ¿Samana puncha imata rana usharin? ¿manallita rana usharinchu? ¿shuc runata huañunamanta quishpichina usharinchu? ¿huañuncapac saquinachu? ¿Imata ninquichic?
Huasha, chaipi tiyaccunaman ricushpa, maqui chaquishca runata nirca: —Maquita chutachi. Chutachicpi, paipac maqui alliyashca saquirirca.
Chaita ricushpa, Jesusta chicniccuna yapa pinarinurca; paicunapura rimarishpa, "imata Jesusta rurashun" tapuriranurca.
Shuc puncha, Jesus shuc urcuman sicashpa, tuta pacaricta Dios-huan rimaricurca.
Puncha pacaricpi, yachachishcacunata cayashpa, paicunamanta chunca ishcaita acllarca apostolcuna tucuncapac.
Caicunami paicunapac shuticuna: Simon (huasha "Pedro" nishpa shutichirca), paipac huauqui Andres, Jacobo, Juan, Felipe, Bartolome,
Mateo, Tomas, Alfeopac churi Jacobo, Simon "celotes" nishca,
Jacobopac huauqui Judas, Judas Iscariote (cai runa puchucaipi Jesusmanta anchurishpa paita japichirca).

Jesus paipaccunantin urcumanta uraicushpa, shuc panpapi shayarirca; chaiman yachachishcacuna tantarinurca; shuc achca runacunapash tiyanurca Judeamanta, Jerusalenmanta, ñuchu yacu mayanpi tiyac Sidon Tiro llactacunamanta; paicuna Jesusta uyahcapac, uncuicunamanta allichi tucuncapac shamunushca carca.
Supai japishcacunapash alliyachi tucunurca.
Tucui runacuna Jesusta llancanata munanurca, tucuicunata mari paipac ushaihuan alliyachic carca.
Jesus paicunata ricushpa nirca: —Cushiyaichic, mana imayuccuna, Diospac pacha cancunapacmi.
Cushiyaichic cai allpapi yaricaccuna, sacsai tucunquichic mari. Cushiyaichic cunan huacaccuna, shuc puncha asinquichicmi.
Cushiyaichic runacuna cancunata chicninucpi, cancunata piñanucpi cancuna cai RUNATA llaquishcamanta.
Chashna tucucpi cushiyanquichic: jahua pachapi cancuna cui tucuna yapa alli canca. Paicunapac ñaupacuna chaillatata ranurca Dios cachashcacuhahuan.
Ranti, ¡cancuna achcata chariccuna!: Ña caipi cushita charircanquichic. ¡Cancuna sacsashca causaccuna!: Huasha yaricanquichic. ¡Cunan asiccuna!: Huasha huacanquichic.
Ayailla, tucui runacuna cancttnamanta allita rimanucpi. Cancunapac ñaupacuna chaillatata ranurca llulla profetacunahuan.
"Ñucata uyacuccunata nini: Cancunata chicniccunata llaquinquichic, cancunata pinaccunaman allita ruranquichic.
Cancunata manallita rimaccunata bendisianquichic; cancunata piñaccunamanta Diosta mañanquichic.
"Shuc ñahui aichapi canta macanucpi, shuctapash ricuchinqui; camisata quichunucpi, calsuntapash ama mitsaichu,
Canta imatapash mañanucpi cunqui; canpacta shuhuanucpi, "cai ñucapacmi" nishpa ama nichu.
"Shuccuna cancunahuan ruranuchun muhashca shina, paicunahuan rurahquichic.
"Cancunata llaquiccunallata llaquishpa, ¿ima allita ruranquichic? Juchayuccunapash paicunata llaquiccunata llaquinun.
Cancunata yanapaccunamanlla yanapashpa, ¿ima jatunta ranquichic? Juchayuccunapash chaita rurac canun.
"Cancuna imatapash cushpa manachiccunaman, "ñuca mutsuna pacha cuhuancami" yuyashpa, ima jatunta ranquichic? Juchayuccunapash juchayuccunaman cunun, cushca tuputa japincapac.

Cancuna ama chashna raichichu. Cancunata chiniccunata llaquinquichic, allita paicunata ruranquichic; mañachiccunaman cunquichic, imatapash mana chapashpa rantimanta. Cancuna chashna ruracpi, canbuna cui tucuna yapa alli canca, jatun Diospac churicuna canquichic; pai juchayuccunahuan mana pacrachuccunahuanpash alli shuncu can.
Alli shuncuyuc caichic cancunapac Yaya Dios shina.
"Ama taripaichichu, ama taripai tucuncapac. Ama cautsayachichu, ama cautsayachi tucuncapac. Quishpichichic, Diosca cancunata quishpichinca.
Cancuna cushpa cushcanquichic. Dios cancuna cushcamanta yalli cancunaman cunca. Cancuna tupushca tupullahuan tupui tucunquichic.
"¿Shuc ñausa runa shuc ñausa runata pushana ushancachu? ¿Manachu ishcaintin shuc jutcupi urmanunca?
