Yachachishca runa paita yachachicmanta mana yallichu; maicanpash alli yachachishca cashpa, paita yachachic shina tucunca.
"¿Imaraicu canpac huauquipac ñahuipi tiyac mapashituta ricunqui, canpac quiquin ñahuipi tiyac caspita mana ricushpa?

¿Imaraicu canpac huauquita ninqui: "Huauqui, canpa ñahuimanta mapashituta anchuchihuapai" nishpa, canpac ñahuipi tiyac caspita mana ricushpa? ¡Llullacama! Ñaupacta canpac ñahuimanta caspita surcunqui, chai huasha canpac huauquipac ñahuimanta mapashituta surcuncapac alli ricunqui.
Alli yura alli muyucunata aparin, manalli yura manalli muyucunata aparin,
Caran yura pai aparishca muyumanta ricsirin. Chinimanta higo nishca muyucunata mana pallanchichu; pilchimanta ubillasta mana japinchichu.
Alli runa paipac shuncupi charishca allimanta allita llucshichin; manalli runa, manalli yuyaita charishpa, paipac shuncumanta manallita llucshichin. Runa shuncupi charishcamanta shimihuan riman.
¿Imaraicu ñucata, "Apulla, Apulla" nishpa cayahuanquichic, ñuca camachishcataca mana pactachinquichic?.
Shuc yachachina rimanata rimanca rani, uyahuaichic; Ñucapacman shamuc runa, ñuca camachishcata uyashpa pactachicpi,

shuc huasita rurashca shinami; ñaupacta ucuta allarca sinchi allpa tupanacama; chai jutcupi istanticunata shayachirca. Shuc puncha, yacu juntarirca, huasita urmachinayarca; huasica mana cuyurishcachu, sinchi allpa jahuapi shayachishca cashpa.

Ranti, ñuca camachishcata uyashpa mana pactachic runa, allpa jahuapi huasita shayachishca shinami; mana ucuta allacpi, yacu juntarishpa, huasita cuyuchishpa urmachirca; chai runa huasi illac saquirirca.
Jesus runacunaman rimanata tucuchishpa, Cafarnaun llactaman yaicurca.
Chaipi shuc suldaru apu tiyarca, paipac luncu yapa uncushca carca; ña huañunca ran; chai suldaru apu paita yapa llaquirca.
Chai suldaru apu, Jesusmanta uyashpa, judio runacunata paipacman cacharca rimancapac nishpa: —Shamupai ñuca luncuta alliyachincapac.
Paicuna Jesuspacman pactashpa, achcata mañanurca nishpa: —Cai suldaru apu alli can, pai mañashcata rurapanqui.
Pai ñucanchicta llaquin, ñucanchicpac shuc tantarina huasita rurarca.
Jesus chaita uyashpa paicunahuan rirca. Ña huasiman pactanca racucpi, suldaru apu mashicunata cacharca Jesusta rimancapac nishpa: —Apulla, ñuca mana imapash cani can ñuca huasiman yaicuncapac.
Chairaicu. ñuca quiquinllata mana shamurcanichu canhuan rimancapac. Can shimillahuan rimacpi, ñuca luncu alliyancami.
Ñúcaca, shuccunata uyac runa cashpa, suldarucuna apu cani. Shuc suldarata "ri" nicpi, pai rinmi. Shucta "shamui" nicpi, pai shamun. Ñuca luncuta "caita rurai" nicpi, pai ruranmi.
Jesus chaita uyashpa yapa mancharirca; paita caticcunata nirca: —Israelpipash chashna inishcata mana tuparcanichu.
Chai suldau apu cachashcacuna huasiman ticrashpa, uncuc luncuta alliyashcata tupanurca.
Shuc puncha, Jesus Naim nishca llactaman riracpi, pai yachachishcacuna achca runacunapash paihuan riranurca.
Llactaman pactacushcallapita, shuc huanushca runata panpancapac huantuccunahuan tuparirca; huañúshcaca huaccha huarmipac shuclla churi carca. Achca runa huarmita catiranurca.
Jesus paita ricushpa, llaquirishpa, nirca: —Huarmi, ama huacaichu.
Huañushcata huantuccunaman mayanyashpa, aya cajonta llancarca; llancacpi, shayarinurca. Jesus huañushcata nirca: —Huanpra, jatari nini.
Chai ucullapi huañushca runa causarirca, rimancapac callarirca. Jesus paita mamaman curca.
Tucui runacuna, chaita ricushpa, mancharishpa, Diosta yupaichanurca nishpa: —¡Jatun profeta nucanchipacpi jatarirca! ¡Dios paipac runacunamanta yuyarircami!
Bautisac Juanpash chai tucuita uyarca, paito caticcuna huillanucpi. Chashna cacpi paicunamanta ishcaita cayashpa,
Jesuspacman cacharca tapuncapac paichu shmuna cac, shuctachu chapana.
Chai runacuna Jesuspacman pactashpa, ninurca: —Bautisac Juan ñucanchicta cachamurca canta tapuncapac: ¿Canchu shamuna cac? ¿shuctachu chapana canchic?
Chai ucullapi, achca uncushcacunata alliyachirca; supai japishcacunamanta supaita jichurca; mana ricuc ñausacuna ricuncapac callarinurca.

Chashna rurashpa, Jesus paicunata nirca: —Juanpacman ticraichic; cancuna ricushcata uyashcatapash huillanquichic. Paita rimanquichic nishpa: Ñausa runacuna ricunun; jancacuna alli purinun; sisu runacuna pichara saquirinun; upa rinricuna uyanun; huañushcacuna causachi tucunun; cushi shimita tsuntsu runacunaman huillanun.
¡Ñucahuan tuparic runa cushiyucmi can, ñucamanta mana piñarishpa anchuricpi!
Juanpaccuna rishca huasha, Jesus Juanmanta rimancapac callaritca cashna nishpa: —¿Imata ricuncapac chunlla allpaman rircanquichic? ¿Huaira cuyuchishca pintutachu ricuncapac?
Chai mana cacpi, ¿imata ricucrircanquichic? ¿Sumac churanata churarishca runatachu?. Chashna churarishcacuna, raimishpalla causaccuna apucunanapac huasicunapi tiyanun.
Shinacpi, ¿imata ricucrircanquichic? ¿Shuc profetachu?. Ari; ashtahuanpash, profetamanta yalli cacta ricurcanquichic.
Juanmanta mari quillcara tiyan: Riqui, ñuca shimita apac runata cacharani, canta ñaupashpa ñanpita allichincapac.
"Shuti nini: Bautisac Juan cunan punchacama causashca runacunamanta yallimi can; chashna cacpipash, Diospac pachapi ura cac runa Juanmanta yalli jatunmi can.
"Achca runacuna gubirnu cullquita pallaccunapash Juanta inishpa bautisai tucushpa, Diosta chacchanurca;
ranti fariseocuna camachic quillcata yachaccunapash, Juanpacpi mana baudsai tucushpa, Diosta mana chacchanurcachu.
Huasha Jesus nirca; —¿Cunan causaccunamanta imata rimasha? ¿Imashina ricurinun?.
Huahuacuna shinacanun; pulasacunapi pucllashpa, shuccuna shuccunata ninun: "Pincullurcanchic, cancunaca mana tushurcanquichic; llaquilla taquircanchic, cancunaca mana huarcanquichic"
Cairaicu nini: Bautisac Juan tantata mana micushpa, binota mana upiashpa causarca; cancunaca "supaita charin" nircanquichic.
Huasha, cai RUNA shamurca; pai micuc can, upiac can; cancunaca ninquichic: Cai runa micuisiqui, upiaisiqui can: manallicunahuan gubirnu cullquita pallaccunahuan llaquicpura can.
Ranti, Diospac yachai pai rurashcacunapi ricurin.
Shuc puncha, shuc fariseo runa Jesusta cayarca paihuan micuncapac; Jesus fariseo huasiman yaicushpa, mesapi micuncapac tiyarirca.
Shuc chai llactamanta manalli huarmi, Jesus fariseo huasipi micuracpi uyashpa, shuc asnac yacu butita apashpa paipacman rirca; huasiman yaicushpa,

Jesuspac chaquipi cuncurirca huacashpa; paipac ñahui huiquihuan Jesuspac chaquita jucuchirca, paipac acchahuan chaquichishpa; huasha, Jesuspac chaquicunata muchashpa, asnac yacuhuan chaicunata armachirca.
Fariseo runa, chai tucuita ricushpa, paipac shuncupi nirirca: "Cai runa profeta cashpa, yachanman ima laya cashcata paita llancac huarmi; juchayuc huarmi cashcata ricsinman".
Chashna yuyaracpi, Jesus paita nirca: —Simon, shuc shimita canta rimachihuapai. Simon nirca: —Rimailla, Yachachiccama.
Jesus nirca: —Shuc dibiyachic runa ishcai dibiyucta charirca. Shuc pichca patsac dibirca, shuc pichca chunca.
Chai ishcai dibiyuccuna mana imahuan paganata charinucpi, dibiyachic paicunata quishpichirca. Chai ishcaimanta maicantac ashtahuan llaquinca?.
Simon cutipashpa rirca: —Yalli dibiyuc yalli llaquinca yachin. Chashna nicpi uyashpa Jesus paita nirca: —Chashnami can, alli yuyarcanqui.

Huasha huarmiman ricushpa, Simonta nirca: —¿Cai huarmita ricuranquichu? Ñuca canpac huasiman yaicushcapi, ñuca chaquita mana maillahuarcanqui; ranti, cai huarmi ñuca chaquita paipac ñahui huiquihuan maillarca, paipac acchahuan chaquichirca.
Can ñucata mana mucharcanquichu, ranti, cai huarmi caiman yaicushcamanta pacha, ñuca chaquita mana saquishpa muchan.
Can ñuca umapi asnac huirata mana tallircanquichu; cai huarmi ñuca chaquicunata asnac yacuhuan armachirca.
Chairaicu canta nini: Paipac juchacuna, achca cashpallata, pichashca saquirinun, cai huarmi achca llaquishcaraicumanta. Maicanpash ansalla perdonashca cashpa, ansalla llaquin.
Huasha huarmita rimarca nishpa: —Canpac juchacuna pichara saquirinun.

Chai shimicunata uyashpa, Jesus-huan micuraccuna paicunapura rimai callarinurca nishpa: ¿Pitac can cai runa juchacunatapash pichancapac? Jesus huarmita nirca: —Can inishca canta quishpichirca; casilla ri.
Chaimanta rishpa, Jesus achca llactacunata purirca, camachishpa, Diospac pachamanta yachachishpa. Chunca ishcai apostolcuna paihuan rinurca.
Shuc huarmicunapash paita catinurca; Jesus paicunata supaimanta uncuimantapash quishpichishca carca. Shuc Maria Magdalena carca; paimanta canchis supaicunata jichushca carca.
Shuc Juana shutiyuc carca, Chuzapac huarmi; pai Herodespac imacunata ricuccama carca; shuc Susana shutiyuc carca; achca shuccunapash Jesus-huan puriccuna carca, cullquihuan paita yanapashpa.
Camachishpa Jesus puriracpi, achca runa paita ricuncapac llactacunamanta shamunurca; chai runacunata ricushpa, Jesus yachachishpa nirca: —
Shuc runa chacraman rirca tarpuncapac. Tarpucpi, huaquin muyucuna ñahpipi urmanurca; ñanpita puriccuna chaita jaitanurca, pishcucuna micunurca.
Huaquin muyucuna rumiyuc allpapi urmanurca; huiñashpalla chaquirinurca, yacu illacpi.
Huaquin muyucuna huita ucupi urmanurca; huítaca alli muyucunata mana huiñachirca.
Huaquin muyucuna alli allpapi urmanurca; sumac huiñanurca, achcata aparinurca, caran muyu shuc patsac muyuta aparirca. Chashna rimarca Jesus; huasha, sinchi shimihuan nirca: ¡"Rinriyuc runa uyachun"!
Yachachishcacuna, Jesus rimashcata uyashpa, tapunurca: —¿Can rimashca imata yachachin?

Jesus nirca: —Dios paipac pachamanta pacashca shimicunata candunaman ricsichin; ranti, shuccunaman yachaehina shimicunahuan yachachini; paicuna ricushpallata, mana ricushca shina saquirinun; uyashpallata, mana atipanun.
Tarpucmanta rimashca caita yachachin.: "Tarpushca muyu Dios rimashca shimi can.
Ñanpipi urmashca muyucuna runata ricuchinun, Diospac shimita uyac runata; supai chai runapac yuyaimanta chai Diospac shimita quichun, ama inishpa quishpichi tucuchun nishpa.

"Rumiyuc allpapi urmashca muyucuna, shimita uyac runata, chaita cushihuan chasquic runata ricuchin; chaicuna mana unaichu ininun; mana sinchi inishcahuan inishpa, juchanayai shamucpi, juchapi urmanun.
"Huita ucupi urmashca muyucuna, Diospac shimita uyac runata ricuchin; chai laya runacuna cullquita, cushicunallata yuyanun; chairaicu mana aparinun.
"Alli ailpapi urmashca muyucuna, munaihuan, alli yuyaihuan Diospac shimita chasquic runata ricuchin; huiñai inishpa catinun, achcata aparinun.
"Manapí chinpusuta japichin imahuanpash chaita quillpancapac, cahuitu ucupi churancapac. Chaita jahuapi churanun, huasiman yaicuccuna ricunuchun nishpa.
Imatapash pacashca cashpa, pacllaman llucshichishcami canca; pacalla rimashcataca tucuicuna yachanunca.
Chashna cacpi, allita uyanquichic: Charic runa ashtahuan cui tucunca; mana charic runata pai charishcashitutapash quichununca".
Jesus rimacucpi, paipac mama, paipac huauquicuna shamunurca; achca runa tantarinucpi, Jesus tiyashcaman mana pactana ushanurcachu.
Shuc runa Jesusta nirca: —Uyai, canpac mama canpac huauquicunapash canchapi tiyanun, canta salurana munanun.
Rimacpi uyashpa Jesus nirca: —Dios rimashca shimita uyashpa pactachic runacuna, paicunami ñuca mama, ñuca huauquicuna.
Shuc puncha, Jesus paipaccunantin shuc canuapi yaicushpa nirca: —Jacuichic chinpaman
Riranucpi Jesus puñuncapac siririrca. Cuncaimanta sinchi huaira jatarirca; bacucuna canuata jaitanucpi, ñalla panparirarca.

Jesusta ricchachishpa ninurca: —¡Yachachic, Yachachic, panparicunchicmi! Jesus riccharishpa, jatarirca; huairata bacucunatapash piñashpa rimarca; rimacpi, bacucuna samarinurca, tucui casilla saquirirca.

Chashna tucucpi, Jesus yachachishcacunata nirca: —¿Cancuna inishca ima tucurca? Paicunaca, mancharishpa rimanacunurca nishpa: —¡Mana pacha! ¿Pitac can cai runa? Yacuta huairatapash rimacpi, paita uyanun.
Cahuishpa cahuishpa Gadara nishca allpaman pactanurca, cucha chinpaman.
Jesus canuamanta llucshicpi, chai llactamanta shuc runa Jesuspacman shamurca. Chai runa unaimanta supai japishca carca. Llushti puric carca; mana huasipi causac carca; aya jutcu panpapi causac carca.
Jesusta ricushpa, paipac ñaupacpi tuhuaman urmashpa, caparirca nishpa: —¿Imaraicu ñucanchihuan satiringui, Jesus, jatun Diospac churi? Ama ñucata ñacachipaichu.

Chashna rimarca, Jesus supaita "chai runamanta llucshi" nishpa rimashcaraicu. Achca cuti supai paita japishca carca; runacuna jillai huascacunahuan huatanucpi, pai huascacunata pitishpa, chunlla allpacunaman miticuc carca, supai purichishcaman.
Jesus paita tapurca: —Ima shuti canqui? Pai cutiparca: —Nuca shuti "jatunbula". Achca supaicuna paipac ucupi yaicunushca carca mari.
Chai supaicuna Jesusta mañanurca ama paicuna causashca jutcuman cachachun.
Shuc urcupi achca cuchicuna micuranurca; supaicuna Jesusta mañanurca nishpa: —Chai cuchicunapi ñucanchicta yaicuchipai.
Jesus "yaicuichiclla" rimacpi, chai supaicuna runamanta llucshishpa, cuchicunapi yaicunurca; yaicushpaca shuc huaicuta cuchaman shitarinurca; yacupi chucallishpa huañunurca.
Cuchicunata ricuccuna, chaita ricushpa, mancharishpa callpanurca tucuicunaman huillacrincapac.

Paicuna rimashcata uyaccuna, ima tucushcata ricushun nishpa, Jesus tiyashcaman rinurca; chaiman pactashpa ricunucpi, chai supai japishca runa ña alliyashpa, churanata churarishpa Jesus-huan rimaricurca; paita ricushpa, mancharinurca.
Chai runahuan tucushcata ricushcacuna imashnata supaimanta quishpichishca cashcata paicunaman rimanurca.
Chashna cacpi, Gadara suyupi causac runacuna Jesusta mahanurca "caimanta ripai" nishpa, yapa mancharishca canurca mari. Chairaicu, Jesus canuapi yaicushpa rirca.
Supaicunamanta quishpichi tucushca runa Jesusta mañarca nishpa: —Canhuan pushahuapai. Jesus paita nirca: —
Saquinlla; canpac huasiman ticrashpa, Dios canhuan rashcata tucuicunaman huillanqui. Chashna nicpi, chai runa nshpa, tucui llactapi tiyaccunaman Jesus paihuan rurashcata huillarca.
Jesus cuchata chinpashpa ticracpi, runacuna paita chaparanucpi, cushihuan paita chasquinurca.
Paicunahuan nmanshcapi, shuc runa shamurca, Jairo shutiyuc, tantanna huasipi camachiccama. Jesuspac ñaupacpi tuhuaman urmashpa, paita mañarca nishpa: —Ñuca huasiman shamupai.
Shuc ushushillata chanrca, chunca ishcai huatayuc; paica uncushpa huañurarca. Jesus nshcapi, achca runacuna paita catishpa, tancashpa tancashpa punranurca.
Chai runacuna ucupi shuc uncushca huarmi tiyarca. Chunca ishcai huatata yahuar tallinshpa causarca; janjpiccunahuan paipac cullquita tucuchishca cacpi, paita mana janpina ushanurcachu.
Chai huarmi Jesusman huashamata mayanyashpa, paipac churanata llacarca; llancashpallahuan paipac yahuar saquinrca.

Chashna tucucpi, Jesus nirca: —¿Pitac llancahuarca? Tucuicuna "ñuca mana" nishpa nmanucpi, Pedro nirca: —Yachachiccama, achca runacuna canta ñitinun, tancashpa tancashpa quichquiyachinun; ¿canca "pitac llancahuarca" ninqui?
Jesus cutillata nirca: —Huaquin runa llancahuarca; ñuca ushaihuan shuc runata alliyachishcata yacharcani man.

Huarmi, chaita uyashpa, "Jesus yachanmi" yuyashpa, chucchushpa Jesuspac ñaupacpi cuncunrca. Tucui runacuna uyanucpi, imaraicu Jesusta llancashcata nmarca; "llancashpallahuan alliyachi tucurcani" nirca.
Jesus paita nirca: —Ushushi, can inishcaraicu alliyachi tucurcanqui. ¡Casilla n!
Jesus chaira nmacucpi, shuc runa Jairopac huasimanta shamushpa, paita nirca: —Canpac ushushi ña huañurca; ama Jesusta quillachichu.
Jesus chaita uyashpa Jairota nirca: —Ama llaquinchu; inilla, canpac ushushi alliyancami.
Huasiman pactanucpi, manapita saquirca paihuan yaicuncapac: Pedrohuan, Jacobohuan, Juanhuan huahuapac yayacunahuan yaicunurca.
Chaipi tiyaccuna huahuamanta huacaranurca capanshpa. Jesus paicunata nirca: —Ama huacaichichu, huahua mana huañushcachu, puñuranlla.
Chashna nicpi, uyaccuna paita asiranurca, huahua huañushcata yachashpa.
Jesus huahuata maquimanta japishpa, sinchi shimihuan nirca: —Huahua, jatan!
Chai ucullapi huahua causanshpa jatanrca. Jesus nirca: —Paita caraichic.
Huahuapac yayacuna manchannurca; Jesus paicunata nirca: —Cai tucushcata ama pitapash huillaichichu.
Shuc puncha, Jesus paipac shunca ishcai runacunata tantachishpa, tucui laya supaicunata jichuna ushanata, uncuccunata janpina ushanatapash paicunaman curca.
Chai huasha, Diospac shimita uyachincapac, uncuccunata janpincapac paicunata cacharca cashna nishpa: —
Ama imatapash apanquichichu; punna caspita, shicrata, tantata cullquitapash ama apanquichichu; shuc churanallata apanquichic.
Shuc huasipi yaicushpa, chaillapi saquinnquichic llactamanta llucshinacama.
Shuc llactapi cancunata mana chasquinucpi, chaimanta llucshishpa, chaquimanta allpata chausinquichic, paicuna mana alli rashcata ncuchincapac.
Chashna nicpi, paicuna tucui uchilla llactacunata nnurca, Diospac alli shimita camachishpa, uncuccunata janpishpa.
Jatun apu Herodes Jesus rashcacunata uyarca; uyashpami ninrca: "Pi chan canca cai runa, huaquincuna "Juanmi" ninun man, huañushca cashpa causanshcami.
Shuccuna "profeta Eliasmi" ninun; shuccuna "ñaupa tiyashca profetami causanshca"; chashna nmanun.
Ranti, Jerodes nirca: —Ñucallata Juanta huañuchichircani; pi chan canca cai runa; paimanta achcata nmahuanun. Chashna nishpa Jerodes Jesusta ncunata munarca.
Jesus camachincapac cachashcacuna ticramushpa, tucui rashcata Jesusta huillanurca. Jesus uyashpa, paicunahuan runa illashcaman nrca, Betsaida nishca llacta mayanpi.
Runacuna, chaita yachashpa, Jesusta catishpa nnurca; pai tiyashcaman pactanucpi, Jesus paicunata Diospac pachamanta yachachirca, uncuccunata alliyachirca.
Ña tutayaracpi, apostolcuna Jesusta ninurca: —Runacunata cachannqui; mayan huasicunapi micuncapac, puñuncapac nnuchun, cai panpapi manaima tiyan.
Jesus cutiparca: —Cancuna paicunata caranquichic. —¿Imahuan? —ninurca—; pichca tantata, ishcai yacu aichata channchic. Ñucanchillata micuna rantishpa, paicunata carashun imachai.
Pichca huarancashi canurca cancunalla. Jesus nirca: —Runacunata pichca chunca pichca chunca tiyanchichic.
Tucuicuna tiyannurca.
Tiyannucpi, Jesus tantacunata yacu aichacunatapash japirca. Huasha, jahuaman ncushpa, Diosta pacrachushpa, chaicunata paquishpa apostolcunaman curca, paicuna runacunata carancapac.
Tucuicuna sacsacta micunurca; puchushcata pallashpa, chunca ishcai ashancata juntachinurca.
Shuc puncha Jesus chunlla allpaman nrca Dios-huan nmanncapac; yachachishcacuna paihuan tiyanurca. Jesus paicunata tapurca: —Runacuna pimi ninun ñucata?
Cutipanurca: —Huaquincuna "Bautisac Juanmi" ninun; huaquincuna "Eliasmi" ninun; huaquincuna "Shuc ñaupa profetacunamanta causanshca" ninun.
Jesus cutillata tapurca: —Cancunaca pimi nishpata nihuanquichic nucata? Pedro nirca: —Can Dios jahuishca runami canqui.
Chashna nicpi, Jesus paicunata nirca: —Ama pitapash huillaichichu.
Huasha nirca: —Cai RUNA achcata llaquichi; tucunca; rucucuna, pacnyaya apucuna, yachaccuna paita chicninunca, paita huanuchinunca; chashnapash, quimsa punchapi causanncami.
Huasha, Jesus tucui runacunata nmarca nishpa:' —Maicanpash ñucata catinayashpa, quiquinpac munaita saquichun, crusta apanshpa ñucata catichun.
Maicanpash causaita quishpichinayashpa, chaita chincachincami; causaita chincachic ñucaraicu, causaita tupanca.
¿Imata yapachin shuc runa tucui cai pachapi tiyashcata yapachishpa, pai quiquinllata chincachicpi?.
"Maicanpash ñucamanta ñuca yachachishcamantapash pincancpi, cai RUNApash paimanta pincanncami, pai apu tucushpa, paipac Yayahuan angelcunahuanpash shamuna punchapi.
Shuti pacha cancunata nini: Caipi tiyaccunamanta huaquincuna chaira mana huañushpa, Diospac pacha shamushcata ncununca.
Pusac puncha huasha, Jesus shuc urcuman sicarca Dios-huan nmanncapac; Pedro, Jacobo, Juan paihuan nnurca.
Dios-huan nmacucpi, paipac" ñahui shuc laya tucurca; paipac churana yuraclla, punchaclla inti shina ncunrca.
Cuncaimanta, ishcai runa ncunmunurca Jesus-huan nmanshpa: shuc Moises carca, shuc Elias carca;
paicunapash yuraclla ncunranurca; Jesus Jerusalen llactapi huañunca rashcata nmanranurca.
Pedro paihuan tiyaccunantin, yapa puñunayashpallata mana puñunurca,

Chai ishcai runa ña Jesusmanta anchunranucpi, Pedro Jesusta nirca: —Yachachic, alli tiyaranchic caipi. Can munacpi, quimsa tanputa rurashun: canpac shuc, Moisespac shuc, Eliaspac shuc. Mana yachashpa chashna nmarca.
Chaira nmacucpi, shuc puyu paicunata quillparca; puyu ucupi yapa manchannurca.
Chai puyumanta shuc shimi uyanrca cashna nishpa: —Caimi ñuca llaquishca Chun. Paita uyana canquichic.
Huasha, shimi upallarca, mana uyanrca; Jesus sapalla tiyarca. Yachachishcacuna manapita paicuna ncushcata huillanurca.
Cayantin puncha, urcumanta uraicunucpi, achca runa paicunahuan tupanncapac nnurca.
Paicunamanta shuc sinchi shimihuan Jesusta nirca: —Yachachic, ñuca chunmanta imatapash rurapai, ñuca shuclla chunmi.
Shuc supai paita japic can; paita capanchin; shimimanta putscuta llucshichin, paita yapa ñacachin, paimanta mana llucshinata munan.
Can yachachishcacunata mañarcani supaita llucshichincapac; mana ushanurcachu.
Rimacpi uyashpa Jesus nirca: —¡Mana iniccuna, manallita ruraccuna! ¿Imuracama cancunahuan tiyasha?¿Imuracama cancunata apansha? Canpac chunta pushamui.
Huanpra mayayamucpi, supai paita allpaman urmachirca, sinchita capanshpa, quihuinshpa. Chashna tucucpi, Jesus supaita piñashcahuan nmashpa, huanprata alliyachirca.
Chaita ncuccuna Diosta chacchanurca. Jesus rashcacunamanta tucuicuna manchannucpi, pai yachachishcacunata nirca: —
Uyahuaichic, ñuca nmanca rashcata ama cuncanchichu: Juchayuccuna cai RUNAta japinunca.
Yachachishcacuna, Jesus nmashcata mana atipanurcachu; paicunapac mana japipac carca; "can nmashcata ñucanchicta atipachipai" nishpa nmancapac manchanurca.
Shuc puncha, Jesus yachachishcacuna paicunapura nmanshpa, tapunacunurca "ñucanchicmanta maican yalli can" nishpa.
Jesus, paicuna shuncu ucupi yuyarashcata yachashpa, shuc huahuata cayashpa, paipac ñaupacpi shayachishpa, paicunata nirca: —
Nuca shutipi cai huahuata chasquic ñucata chasquin; hucata chasquicca ñucata cachamushcata chasquin. Cancunamanta ura cac runa, mai jatun canca.
Chai huasha Juan nirca: —Yachachiccama, shuc runata canpac shutipi supaicunata jichushcata tuparcanchic; mana ñucanchic bulamanta cacpi, paita "ama chashna ruraichu" nircanchic.
Jesus nirca: —¿Imapac jarcachishcanquichic?. Ñucanchicta mana chicnic runa ñucanchihuan tucun.
Jesus cai pachamanta nna pacha pactamucpi, pitapash mana manchashpa, Jerusalenman nna yuyaita japirca.
Ñaupacta huaquincunata cacharca shuc Samana llactapi micunata puñunatapash allichincapac.
Chai llactapi causaccuna Jesusta mana chasquinurcachu, pai Jerusalenman nrashcaraicu.
Santiagohuan Juanhuan chaita yachashpa, Jesusta ninurca: —Apunchic, jahua pachamanta ninata urmachishun paicunata rupachincapac: ¿munanquichu?
Jesus paicunata piñarca;
chaimanta shuc llactaman rirca.
Riranucpi, shuc runa ñanpipi Jesusta nirca: —Maimanpash can ricpi, canta catishami.
Jesus paita nirca: —Chaccacuna puñuna jutcuta charinun, pishcucunapash huasita charinun; ranti, cai RUNA maipi puñunata mana charinchu.
Astanipi, Jesus shuc-huan tuparishpa, paita nirca: —Ñucahuan shamui. Pai cutiparca: —Ñaupacta huca yayata panpacrisha.
Jesus paita nirca: —Ñucapi mana iniccuna huañushcacunata panpanuchun; can Diospac pachamanta rimacrinqui.
Shucca Jesusta nirca; —Apunchic, canta catinata munani; ñaupacta ñuca aillucunata "rinimi, samashun" rimachihuapai.
Jesus paita nirca: —Maicanpash tacllata japishpa huashaman ricucpi, Diospac pachaman yaicuncapac mana allichu can.
Chai huasha, shuc puncha Jesus canchis chunca ishcai runacunata acllashpa, paicunata ishcaipura pai rinca rashca llactacunaman cacharca; paicuna Jesusta ñaupashpa rinurca.
Jesus paicunata nirca: —Pallana chacra achcami, pallaccuna ansallami. Chacra amuta mañaichic pallaccunata paipac chacraman cachachun.
Richic. Cancunata manso huihuacuna shina cachani pumacuna ucupi.
Cullquita huacaichina carata, shicrata ushutatapash ama apaichichu. Ñanpipi manapihuan rimarinquichic.
Shuc huasiman yaicushpa, cashna ninquichic: "Caipi tiyaccunaman ganas causai shamuchun".
Alli shuncu runa chaipi tiyacpi, cancuna apashca ganas causaita chasquincami; mana tiyacpi, cancunapacman ticranca.
Chai huasillapi saquirinquichic; imatapash cancunata caranucpi, micunquichic, upianquichic. Llancac runaman pai yapachishcata cuna can, "Runk huasita ama puricachaichichu.
Shuc llactaman pactashpa, runacuna cancunata chasquinucpi, imatapash cancunaman carashcata micunquichic.
Chaipi tiyac uncuccunata janpinquichic. Runacunata rimanquichic: Diospac pacha mayanllami.
"Cancunata shuc llactapi mana chasquinucpi, callecunapi rimanquichic:
"Cai llactamanta ñucanchic chaquipi llutarishca allpatapash chausinchic, cancunahuan saquirinun. Chashnapash, caita uyaichic: Diospac pacha mayanyaran".
Cancunata nini: Sodoma llactamanta runacuna chai llactapi tiyaccunamanta ura ñacachi tucununca.

¡"Corosain llacta, Betsaida llacta, cancunapac yapa manchaipac canca! Nuca cancunapacpi rashcacunata Tiro llactapi Sidon llactapi ruranushca cacpi, unaimanta chai llactacunapi tiyaccuna Diosman ticranunman carca; chaita ricuchincapac tsuntsu churanata churarinunman carca, ushpatapash uma jahuapi churanunman carca.
Chairaicu nini: Taripana puncha cancuna chai llactacunamanta yalli sinchi nacachi tucunquichic.
"Canca, Cafarnaun llacta, caran puncha yalli casha ninquichu? Tucuimanta yalli pincachishcami canqui.
"Cancunata uyac runa nucata uyahuan. Cancunata mana chasquic runa ñucatapash mana chasquin; ñucata mana chásquicca ñucata cachamushcata mana chasquin.
Chai canchis chunca ishcai runacuna achca cushiyashcahuan ticranurca; Jesusta ninurca: —Apunchic, supaicunapash ñucanchicta uyanurca canpac shutimanta.
Jesus nirca: —Supaita shuc rayo shina jahuamanta urmarashcata ricurcani.
Cancunaman ushaita curcani machacuicunata, upitinticunata jaitancapac, cancunata chicniccunata atincapac; cancunaman mana ima tucunca.
Chashna cacpipash, ama cushiyaichichu supaicuna cancunata uyashcamanta; cancunapac shuticuna jahua pachapi quillcara cashcamanta cushiyanquichic.

Chashnapi, Jesus achca cushiyashpa Diospac Samai paita cushichicpi, nirca: —Canta chacchani, Yayalla; can jahua pacha amu canqui, cai pacha amu canqui; can yachaccunaman pacashcata mana yachac runacunaman ricsichinqui. Ari, Yaya, can chashna munarcanqui.

Ñuca Yaya tucuita ñuca maquipi churarca. Manapí Diospac Churita ricsin, Yayalla paita ricsin. Chashnallata, manapí Yayata ricsin, churilla paita ricsin; churi munashcacunapash Dios Yayata ricsinun.
Chai huasha, yachachishcacunaman ricushpa, pacalla paicunata nirca: —Cushiyuccunami cancuna ricurashcata ricuccuna.
Achca profetacuna jatun apucunapash cancuna ricurashcata ricunayashpa, mana ricunurcachu; cancuna uyarashcata uyanayashpa, mana uyanurcachu.
Shuc puncha, shuc camachic quillcata yachac, Jesusta camasha nishpa, paita tapurca: —¿Chicapac causanata japincapac imata rurana cani?
Jesus cutiparca nishpa: —¿Imata quillcara tiyan camachic quillcapi?
Pai nirca: —Canpac Apu Diosta tucui shuncuhuan, tucui almahuan, tucui ushaihuan, tucui yuyaihuan llaquina canqui. Shuccunataca can quiquinta shina llaquina canqui.
Jesus paita nirca: —Alli rimarcanqui; chaita rurashpa, huiñai causanata charinqui.
Chai runa, mana yanca tapushcata ricuchincapac, cutillata tapurca: —¿Pitac can chai "shuccuna" nishca ("projimo" nishca)?

Jesus cutipashpa, cashna rimarca: —Shuc runa Jerusalenmanta Jericoman riracpi, shuhuacuna paita japinurca; paita llipachishca huasha, tucui pai charishcata quichushpa, miticunurca, chai runata nalla huañushcata saquishpa.
"Chai ñanpillata shuc pacriyaya rirarca; chucrishca runata ricushpallata, paita mana yanaparca.
Shuc huasha shamushca levita nishca runapash, chucrishcata ricushpallata, mana yanapashpa rirca,
Ranti, shuc samaritano runa, chaillatatac rishpa, chucrishca runata ricushpa, llaquirirca;
paipacman mayanyashpa, chucricunata huirahuan, binohuan janpirca, churanahuan pillurca; huasha paipac caballopi sicachishpa, samana huasiman paita pusharca; chaipi paita cuirarca.
Cayantin puncha, pai rinca rashpa, ishcai cullquita huasi amuta curca nishpa: "Allita ricunqui cai runata; ashtahuan mutsuricpi paita janpincapac, ñuca ticramucpi cushcanqui".
Chashna rimarca Jesus; huasha tapurca: —Chai quimsa runamanta maican chucrichishca runata pai quiquinta shina llaquirca?.
Yachac runa cutiparca: —Chucrishcata yanapashca runami yachin. Jesus paita nirca: —Canpash chasnallata ruranqui.
Jesus purishpa, shuc uchilla llactaman pactarca. Shuc Marta shutiyuc huarmi huasipi paita chasquirca.
Chai huarmi shuc ñañata charirca, Maria shutiyuc; pai Jesuspac chaqui mayanpi tiyarishpa, paipac shimita uyararca.
Marta micunata, puñunata imatapash allichirarca. Jesuspacman rishpa nirca: —Yachachic, ¿manachu ricunqui ñuca ñaña sapalla saquihuashcata tucuita allichincapac?. Paita rimai ñucata yanapachun.
Jesus cutiparca nishpa: —Marta, Marta, caiman chaiman purishpa, achcacunata rurashpa llaquirinqui.
Shuclla mutsurin. Maria mai allita acllarca, chaita paimanta mana quichununcachu.
Shuc puncha Jesus Dios-huan rimaricurca; tucuchitpi, shuc pai yachachishca runa nirca: —Apunchic, Juan paita caticcunaman Dios-huan rimanata yachachishca shina, ñucanchicta yachachipai
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Cancuna Dioshuan rimarishpa, cashna rimanquichic: Yaya, tucuicuna canta ricsinuchun. Can Apu tucuncapac shamui.

Caran puncha ñucanchic mutsushca tantata cunqui. Ñucanchic manallita rashcata quishpichipai, ñucanchicpash quishpichinchic shuccuna ñucanchicman manalli rashcata. Juchanayaipi urmancapac ñucanchicta ama saquichu.
Huasha Jesus nirca: —Cancunamanta shuc runa paipac mashipacman rishpa chaupi tuta, paita nin: "Mashi, quimsa tantata mañachihuai;
shuc mashi shamuhuarca mari, ñucaca mana imata charinichu paita carancapac".
Chai runa huasi ucumanta cutipan nishpa: "Ama quillachihuaichu; puncu ña huichcara can, huahuacuna ñucahuan sirinun; mana ushanichu jatarishpa tantata cuncapac".
Chai runa tacashpa cayaracpi, ¿manachu paipac mashi jatarinca tantata cuncapac?. Mashi cashcaraicu mana jatarishpaca, ama ashtahuan quillachi tucuncapac jatarinca, tucui mutsushcata paiman cunca.
"Chashna cacpi cancunata nini: Mañaichic, cushcanquichic. Mashcaichic, tarinquichic. Puncuta tacaichic, pascanuncami.
Tucui manac chasquin; mashcac tarin; puncuta tacac runaman pascanun.
"¿Cancunamanta maican yaya, paipac churi, "tantata cuhuapai" nicpi, shuc rumita paiman cunca? ¿Aichata mañacpi, yaya machacuita cuncachu?
¿Lulunta mañacpi, upitintita cuncachu?
Chashna cacpi, cancuna, manallicuna cashpallata, alli imacunata churicunaman cunquichic, ¿manachu cancunapac jahua pachapi tiyac Yaya Diospac Samaita paita mañaccunaman cunca?
Shuc puncha, Jesus shuc runamanta supaita llucshichicurca; chai runa supairaicu mana rimac carca, upa shimi carca; supai llucshicpi, runa rimai callarirca. Runacuna, chaita ricushpa, mancharinurca;
ranti, huaquincuna ninurca: —Cai runa Belcebú nishca supaicuna apupac ushaihuan supaita jichun.
Shuccuna "mana raipacta rurai jahua pachapi" nishpa Jesusta camashpa ninurca.

Jesus, paicuna yuyarashcata ricsishpa, nirca: —Shuc llactapi causaccuna chican chican chaupirishpa, paicunapura piñarinucpi, chai llacta tucurincami; chashnallata, shuc huasipi causac aillucuna, paicunapura piñanacushpa, tucurinuncami.
Supaicunapash chican chican tucushpa, ¿manachu tucurinunca? Caita nini "supai apupac ushaihuan supaicunata jichunqui" ninquichic mari.
Ñuca supai apupac ushaihuan supaicunata jichucpi, ¿cancunata caticcuna pipac ushaihuan supaicunata jichunun?. Paicuna rurashcahuan cancuna pantashcata ricuchinun.
Shuti pacha, ñuca Diospac ushaihuan supaicunata jichuni; chashna rashpa, Diospac pacha cancunapacman pactamushcata ricuchini.
"Shuc sinchi runa huasita ricucpi, huasipi causaccuna casilla tiyanun.
Ranti, shuc ashtahuan sinchi runa shamushpa paita aticpi, huasipi tiyashcacunata japishpa, apashpa rinca.
Maicanpash ñucahuan mana tiyashpa, ñucata chicnin; ñucahuan mana pallac manaimata japin.
"Shuc millai supai runamanta llucshishpa, chunlla allpacunapi puricachan, samasha nishpa; maipi samanata mana tarishpa, paipac shuncupi nirin: "Ñuca llucshishca runa ucuman ticrasha".
Ticrashpaca, chai runata tupan chushac huasi shina pichashcata, allichishcata.
Chaita ricushpa, chaimanta rishpa, shuc canchis supaicunata pushamun ashtahuan millaicunata; tucuicuna chai runapi causancapac yaicunun; yaicunucpi, chai runa ashtahuan manalli tucun.
Jesus chashna rimacucpi, shuc chaipi shayac huarmi, runa ucumanta caparishpa, nirca: —¡Cushiyucmi canta pacarichishca huarmi, canta chuchuchishca huarmi!.
Jesus cutiparca: —Ashtahuan cushiyuccuna canun Dios rimashcata uyaccuna, chaita pactachiccuna.

Achca runa Jesuspacman tantarimunucpi, Jesus paicunata nirca: —Cunan causaccuna manalli canun, shuc mana raipacta mañanun; shuc mana raipacta mana ricununcachu; profeta Jonas-huan tucushcata yuyarichisha.
Ninive llactapi causaccunaman Jonas ricurina shina carca; chashnallata cunan causaccunaman cai RUNA unancha shina canca.

"Taripana puncha, sur nishcamanta jatun apu huarmi, cunan causaccunata taripashpa, cautsayachinca, pai carumanta shamurca mari Salomonpac shimicunata uyancapac; cancunapacpica shuc Salomonmanta ashtahuan jatun tiyanmi.

Ninive llactapi causashcacuna cunan causaccunata cautsayachinunca taripana punchapi, paicuna Diosman ticranurca mari Jonas paicunaman Diospacmanta rimashcapi; cáipica shuc Jonasmanta astahuan jatun tiyanmi.
"Manapí shuc chinpusuta japichin pacashcapi churancapac, mana mala ucupi churancapacpash; jahuapi churan, huasipi tiyaccunata ricuchincapac.
Ñahuicuna achic shinami canun aichapac; canpac ñahuicuna alli cacpi, tucui aicha punchayanca; canpac ñahuicuna manalli cacpi, tucui aicha tutapi tiyanca.
Yuyanqui canpac achic ama tuta tucuchun.
Canpac aicha punchayashca cacpi ima yanapash illac, tucuita punchaclla ricunqui, shuc chinpusu paipac achic-huan ricuchishca shina.
Jesus rimanata tucuchishcapi, shuc fariseo runa micuncapac huasiman cayarca. Jesus shamushpa mesaman tiyarirca.
Micuncapac maquita mana maillacpi ricushpa fariseo runa mancharirca.
Jesus paita nirca: —Cancuna, fariseocuna, canchamanta callanacunata mucahuacunatapash maillanquichic; ranti, cancunapac shuncu shuhuashcacuhahuan manallita rashcacunahuan juntashca can.
¡Upacuna! ¿Canchapacta rurac ucupactapash rurashcata manachu yachanquichic?
Tsuntsu runacunaman cancuna charishcata cuyaichic; cancuna chashna ruracpi, tucui chuya saquirinca.

"¡Ayailla cancuna, fariseocuna! Cancuna menta nishcamanta, ruda nishcamanta, tucui sami micuna pancamantapash chunca raquita Diosman cunquichic; ranti, cusca causanata, Diosta llaquinata ñahuilla ricunquichic. Caicunata pactachina can, chai shuccunata mana saquishpa.
"¡Ayailla, cancuna, fariseocuna! Tantarina huasicunapi ñaupac tiyarinacunata munanquichic; callecunapi salurai tucunata munanquichic.
"¡Ayailla, cancuna! Mana ricuric aya jutcucuna shina canquichic, runacuna chaicuna jahuapi mana yachashpa purinun:
Chashna rimacpi, shuc camachic quillcata yachac Jesusta nirca: —Yachachiccama, can rimashcahuan ñucanchictapash caminqui.
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —¡Ayailla cancunapash, camachic quillcata yachaccuna! Mana marcaipaccunata shuccunata apachinquichic, cancunaca shuc rucallahuanpash mana llancanquichic.
"¡Ayailla cancuna! Cancunapac ñaupacuna huañuchishca profetacunapac pantioncunata shayachinquichic.
Chashna rurashpa, cancunapac ñaupacuna alli rashcata ricuchinquichic, paicuna profetacunata huañuchinurca mari, cancunaca paicunapac pantioncunata shayachinquichic.
"Chairaicu, Dios tucuita yachac cashpa, nirca: Profetacunata apostolcunatapash paicunapacman cachanca rani; paicunaca huaquincunata huañuchinunca, huaquincunata ñacachinunca.
Cunan causac runacuna ñacachishca mi canunca cai pacha callarishcamanta huañuchi tucushca profetacunapac yahuarmanta,
Abelmanta Zacariascama; paita Diospac huasipi tiyac altar mayanpi huañuchinurca. Cutillata nini: Cunan causaccuna chai tucuicunamanta ñacachi tucununca.
"¡Ayailla cancuna, camachic quillcata yachaccuna! Yachana llaveta japircanquichic; cancunallatac mana yaicunquichic, yaicushun niccunataca jarcanquichic".
Jesus chai shimicunata rimashcapi, camachic quillcata yachaccuna fariseocunapash paihuan yapa piñarinurca; paita quillachincapac achcata tapunurca,
pai nishcapi urmachishun nishpa, paita cautsayachincapac.
Shuc puncha, achca huaranca runacuna tantarinurca, paicunapura ñitirishpa. Jesus rimancapac callarishpa, ñaupac pai yachachishcacunata yachachishpa nirca: —Llullacama fariseocunata yuyanquichic.
Imapash pacashca cashpa, pacllaman llucshichishca canca; pacalla rimashca yachai tucunca.
Shinacpi, cancuna tutapi rimashcata punchapi uyachinunca; cancuna huasi ucupi pacalla nishcata, huasi jahuamanta caparishpa huillanunca.
"Nuca mashicuna, cancunata nini: Aichata huañuchiccunata mana manchanachu; chaipac huasha ña mana ushanun imatapash rancapac.
Maicanta manchanata ricuchisha: Huañushca huasha cancunata ucupachaman shitana ushacta manchana canquichic. Ari, paitami manchana canquichic.
¿Manachu pichca pishcushituta ishcai cullquipi catunun? Chashna cacpipash, Dios chaicunamanta shucllatapash mana cuncarinchu.
Cancunapac uma acchacunapash yupashca canun. Ama manchaichichu cuti; cancuna achca pishcunamanta yalli canquichic.
"Shuti cancunata nini: Maicanpash runacuna ñaupacpi ñucamanta alli rimacpi, cai RUNApash paimanta alli rimanca Diospac angelcuna ñaupacpi;
ranti, maicanpash ñucamanta rimashpa "paita mana ricsinichu" nicpi runacunapac ñaupacpi, "paita mana ricsinichu" ninunca Diospac angelcuna ñaupacpi.
"Maicanpash cai RUNAta camishpa rimacpi, quishpichi tucunca; ranti, Diospac Samaita camishpa rimacpi, mana quishpichi tucuncachu.

"Tantarina huasicunaman, taripaccunapacman, apucunapacman cancunata pushanucpi, ama llaquirinquichichu imata rimashun nishpa, imashnata rimashun nishpa. Rimana pacha pactaricpi, Diospac Samai cancunata rimanata yachachinca.
Shuc puncha, shuc runa Jesusta nirca: —Yachachiccama, ñuca huauquita rimai ñucanchic yayamanta japishcata ñucahuan chaupichichun.
Jesus cutipashpa, paita nirca: —Runahuan, ¿pimi ñucata churarca cancunata taripancapac, cancunapacta allichincapac?
Huasha nirca: —Cullquita yapacta munanata yuyanquichic. Shuc runa tucuita charicpipash, pai charishcacunahuan mana causaita rantina ushanca.
Chashnapi cai yachachina rimanata rimarca nishpa: —Shuc cullquiyuc runami carca; paipac chacracunamanta yapa achcata pallarca.
¿Imatata rasha? yuyarirca. ¿Maipi huca pallashcata huacaichisha? Ñuca huacaichina huasicuna yapa uchilla canun.
Ajá, caita rasha: chai uchilla huasicunata urmachisha ashtahuan jatuncunata shayachincapac.
Achcata charishpa, achca huatata mana ima pishihuanca. Chaicunahuan micusha, upiasha, cushi causasha, samasha.
Chashna yuyaracpi, Dios paita nirca: Upa runa, cunan tuta canpac almata apancapac shamununca. ¿Can tantachishcata pitac japinca?
Chashna tucun quiquinpacllata tantachic runa, Diospacpi mana cullquiyuc tucucpi.
Chai huasha, Jesus yactiachishcacunata nirca: —Ama llaquirichichu "causancapac imata micushun, imata upiashun" nishpa.
Causana micunamanta yalli can; aicha churanamanta yalli can.
Pishcucunata yuyarichic: mana tarpunun, mana pallanun huasipi huacaichincapac; chashnapash, Dios paicunata caran. Cancuna pishcunamanta yalli cahquichic.
"Cancunamanta maican imatapash rashpa, causaita unayachinca?.
Uchillacunatapash mana rurana ushashpa, ¿imapac jatuncunamanta llaquirinquichic?.
"Sisacunata ricuichic: maha llancanun, mana puchcanun; chashnapash, cancunata nini: Salomon tucui laya churanacunata charicpipash, sisacuna pai churarishcamanta yalli sumac ricurinun:
"Dios mana unaichu causac sisacunata chashna churachicpi, ¿manachu ashtahuan allita cancunata churachinca, ansalla iniccuna?
Chairaicu, ama llaquirichichu imata micushun, imata upiashun nishpa.
Diosta mana iniccuna chaicunamanta llaquirinun; cancuna Yayata charinquichic, pai yachan cancuna chai tucuita mutsushcata.
Diospaccunata mashcaichic, chai shuccunataca cui tucunquichic.
"Uchilla runabula, ama manchaichichu; cancunapac Yaya paipac pachata cancunaman cuncami.

Charisticacunata catushpa, imapash illaccunaman cuyaichic. Mana ismuric shicracunata cancunapacta ruraichic, mana tucuriccunata tantachichic jahua pachapac; chaipi shuhuacuna mana yaicunun, susu mana micun.
Can yapa munashca tiyashcapi, chaipi canpac shuncu tiyanca.
"Allichirishca caichic, chinpusuta japichishpa chaparaichic.
Patron shuc raimimanta ticramunata chaparac luncu shina caichic, pai shamushpa cayacpi urastalla pascancapac.
Cushiyucmi chai luncucuna, patron shamunata chaparaccuna. Shuti nini, patron paicunata. tiyarichinca, paicunata caranca.
Patron unai tuta shamushpa, tutamantashitu shamushpa, luncucunata chaparashcata taricpi, cushiyucmi chai luncucuna.
Caita yachaichic: Huasi amu shuhua shamunca rashca pachata ricsishpa, chapanman shuhua ama huasiman yaicuncapac.
Chashnailata cancuna allichirishca caichic, cancuna mana yuyashcapi cai RUNA shamunca mari.
Pedro chaita uyashpa, Jesusta tapurca: —Apunchic, ¿chai can rimashea ñucanchipacllachu rimarcanqui? ¿tucui runacunapacchu rimarcanqui?
Jesus nirca: —¿Maican alli yuyayuc, runa canca, patron, huasipi tiyacunata carancapac mincashpa saquishca?
Chashna ruracuc luncu patron shamuna pachapi, ¿manachu? Cushiyucmi chai luncu.
Shuti cancunata nini: patron charishcacunata ricuncapac chai luncuta churanca.
"Ranti, chai luncu "patron unayancami" yuyashpa, shuc luncucunata quiliachincapac callaricpi, ashtahuanpash micuncapac, upiancapac, machancapac cailaricpi,
pai mana yuyashcapi, mana yachashcapi, paipac patron shamunca, paita ñacachinca, manalli runacunata shina cautsayachinca.
"Shuc luncu paitac patron munashcata yachashpallata chaita mana allichishpa charicpi, patron munashcata mana pactachicpi, yuyaita llipachishcami canca;

ranti, shuc luncu, paipac patron munashcata mana yachashpa, mana ruranata ruracpi, ansallami llipachishca canca. Shue runaman achcata cunucpi, achcata paimanta mañanunca; shuc runaman achcata mincanucpi, ashtahuan paimanta mañanunca.
"Ñuca cai pachaman ninata japichincapac shamurcani; na japiricpi, alli canman.
Shuc bautisanahuan bautisai tucuna cani; chai pactarinacama yapa llaquirini.
"¿Ñuca cai pachaman ganas causanata apamuncapac shmushcata yuyanquichichu? Mana, piñanacunata apamuni.
Cunanmanta pacha shuc huasipi pichca runa tiyacpi, quimsa iscaihuan piñanacushpa causanunca.
Yaya churihuan piñashpa causanca, churica yayahuan; chashnallata mama ushushihuan pinanacunca, ushushi mamahuan. Cari mama cachun-huan macarinunca, cachunca paipac cari mamahuan.
Jesus caitapash nirca runacunata yachachispa: —Cancuna, inti yaicushcamanta puyucuna jataricpi ricushpa, ninquichic: "Tamianca ran" Chashna tucun.
Uramanta huairacpi ninquichic: "Rupai puncha tucunca ran"; cancuna nishca shina tucun.
¡Llullacamacuna! Tamia punchata, rupai punchata ricsinquichic jahuaman ricushpa; ¿imaraicu cai punchacunapi tucucushcata mana japinquichic?.
"¿Imaraicu alli cashcata yachancapac cancunallata mana yuyanquichic?
Can shuc runahuan ima llaquitapash charishpa, urastalla paihuan allichinqui, chaira apupacman mana pactashpa. Mana chashna racpi, apu canta chapaman cunca, chapaca chunta curralqui canta huichcanca.
Chaimanta mana llucshinqui tucuita allichinacama.
Shuc puncha, huaquin runacuna Jesusta huillancapac shamunurca shuc galileo runacunaman tucushcata; Pilato paicunata huañuchishca carca, paicuna Diosman huacra yahuarta chasquichishcapi.
Jesus paicunata nirca: —¿Chai galileo runacuna chashna huañushcaraicu, shuccunamanta ashtahuan juchayuc cashcata yuyanquichichu?
Mana, shuti nini; cancunaca paicuna shinalla huañunquichic, Diosman mana ticrashpa.
"Jerusalen llactapi shuc huasi tularishcapi (torre de Siloe nishca huasi), chunca pusac runa chai ucupi huañunurca; ¿chashna huañushcacuna shuccunamanta ashtahuan juchayuc cashcata yuyanquichichu?.
Mana, nini; tucuicunaca paicuna shinalla huañunquichic, Diosman mana ticrashpa.
Huasha shuc yachachinata rimarca cashna nishpa: —Shuc runa shuc higuera nishca yurata charirca chacrapi. Muyucunata pallasha nishpa ricpi, shucllapash mana tiyarca.
Chacra ricuccamata cayashpa nirca: Ña quimsa huata shamuni muyucunata cai yuramanta pallancapac, mana aparinchu. Cuchui, ¿imapac yanca shayan caipi?
Ricuccama paita nirca: —Apulla, ama cuchushun, saquilla shuc huatata; ñuca yura muyucta allashpa, alli allpata churasha; aparinca ima chari. Mana aparicpi, chai shuti cuchunquimi.
Shuc cuti, samana puncha cacpi, Jesus tantarina huasipi yachichicurca.
Chaipi shuc huarmi tiyarca, chunca pusac huatata uncushca; shuc supai paita cumuyachishca carca; allita shayarishpa purincapac mana usharcachu.
Jesus paita ricushpa nirca: —Huarmi, canpac uncuimanta llushpichishca canqui.
Chashna nishpa maquita paipac jahuapi churacpi, chai huarmi allita shayarirca; shayarishpa, Diosta chacchancapac callarirca.

Tantarina huasi apu, Jesus samana punchapi huarmita allichishcaraicu piñarishpa, chaipi tiyaccunata nirca: —Sucta puncha tiyan llancancapac; chai punchacunapi shamunquichic allichi tucuncapac; samana punchapi mana allichu.
Rimacpi uyashpa Jesus nirca: —¡Llullacamacuna! ¿Manachu samana punchapi cancunapac huacrata pascashpa yacuman apanquichic upiachincapac?
Cai huarmica, Abraanpac ushushi cacpi, supai paita huatashcata charicpi chunca pusac huatamanta, ¿manachu paita uncuimanta llushpichina carca samana punchapi?
Jesus chaita rimacpi, tucui paita chicniccuna pincarishpa saquirinurca; ranti, runacuna Jesus sumac rashcacunata ricushpa cushiyanurca.
Shuc cuti, Jesus cashna nishpa yachachirca: —¿Imahuan Diospac pachata chinpapurachisha? ¿Imashnata ricurin?
Shuc mostaza nishca muyu shinami; tarpunucpi, huiñan, yura tupu tucun; huairapi huanpuric pishcucuna paipac pallcacunapi huasinun.
Cai shuctapash rimarca: —¿Imata nishpa Diospac pachata atipachisha?
Leyadura nishca shinami; shuc huarmi ansashituta japishpa, quimsa tupu harinahuan masan, chai ansashituca tucuita punquichin.
Jesus Jerusalenman rirashpa, pai purishca llactacunapi runacunata yactiachirca.
Shuc runa paita tapushpa nirca: —Apunchic, ¿manachu ansalla runacuna quishpinunca?
Jesus cutiparca: —Cariyaichic quichqui puncuta yaicuncapac; achca runa yaicunata munashpa, mana ushanuncachu.
Huasi amu puncuta huichcacpi, canchamanta caparishpa cayanquichic nishpa: "Apulla, apulla, puncuta pascai". Paica cutipanca: "Cancunata mana ricsinichu".
Cancuna ninquichic: "Canhuan micuc carcanchic, upiac carcanchic; can ñucanchic llactacunapi yachachic carcanqui".
Pai cutipanca: "Cancunata mana ricsinichu. Ñucamanta anchurichic, manallita ruraccuna".
Cancunaca huacanquichic, ñacarishpa caparinquichic Abraanta, Jacobta, Isaacta tucui profetacunantin Diospac huasiman yaicushcata ricushpa, cancuna canchaman jichushca cashpa.
Tucui suyucunamanta shamununca, raimincapac Diospac huasiman yaicununca.
Cunan puchucai caccuna ñaupaccuna canunca; cunan haupac caccuna puchucaicuna tucununca.
Chai punchallapi, huaquin fariseocuna Jesuspacman shamushpa ninurca: —Caimanta shucman ri; Herodes canta huañuchinata munan.
Jesus cutiparca: —Chai huacllic runapacman richic; paita cashna ninquichic. "Cunan puncha caya punchapash supaicunata jichusha, uncuccunata alliyachisha; caya puncha huasha, ñuca ruranata tucuchisha.
Chai puncha pactamunacama, ñuca ñanpita rirani, shuc profeta Jerusalen llactapi mari huañuna

"Jerusalen, Jerusalen: Profetacunata huañuchic canqui, Dios cachashcacunata rumihuan shitac canqui. Achca cuti canpac churicunata tantachinata munarcani, shuc atallpa mama paipac huahuacunata ricra ucupi ucllashca shina, canca mana munarcanquichu.
Uyaichic cuti: cancunapac huasi jichushca saquirinca; ña mana ricuhuanquichic, cancuna cashna rimanacama: "Diospac shutipi shamuc yupaichashca cachun".
Shuc samana puncha, Jesus shuc fariseo runapac huasiman yaicucpi micuncapac, shuc fariseocuna chaparanurca paita juchachincapac.
Chaipi shuc uncushca runa tiyarca, huicsa punquirishca.
Jesus paita ricushpa, camachic quillcata yachaccunata fariseocunatapash tapurca nishpa: —¿Samana puncha uncushca runata alliyachipacchu? ¿manachu alliyachina?
Tapucpi uyashpa chunlla saquirinurca. Upallanucpi Jesus uncushcata maquimanta japishpa alliyachirca; huasha, huasiman paita cacharca.
Fariseocunata nirca: —Cancunapac huacra shuc jutcuman urmacpi, manachu urastalla surcunquichic samana puncha cacpipash?
Chaita uyashpa mana imata cutipana ushanurcachu.
Huaquincuna mesapi ñaupac tiyarinata japinucpi ricushpa Jesus cashna camachirca: —
Can shuc sahuarina raimiman cayashca cashpa, ama ñaupac tiyarinapi tiyarichu; canmanta ashtahuan jatun cayashca tiyanman ima chari;
pai shamucpi huasi amu canta rimanca: "Anchuripai cai runa can tiyarishcapi tiyarincapac". Canca pincarishpa, puchucai tiyarinapi tiyarinami canqui.

Ranti, can shuc sahuarina raimiman cayashca cashpa, puchucai tiyarinapi tiyaricpi, alli canca; chashna racpi, huasi amu canta ninca: J "Mashi, ñaupacman tiyaric shamui". Canca canhuan pacta cayashcacuna ñaupacpi jahuayachishcami canqui.
Maicanpash jaiunyashpa pincachishca mari canca; maicanpash uchillayashpa jahuayachishcami canca.

Huasha, Jesus paita micuncapac cayashcata nirca: —Can shuc raimita rurashpa, ama cayanquichu canpac mashicumata, canpac huauquicunata, canpac aillucunata, canpac mayanpi causac cullquiyuccunata; paicunapash canta shuc puncha micunapac cayanunca, chaihuan pagai tucurcanqui.
Ranti, can shuc raimita rurashpa, tsuntsu runacunata, suchucunata, janca chaquicunata, ñausacunata cayanqui,
Chashna rurashpa, cushiyanqui Paicuna mana imata mari charinun canta pagancapac; allicuna causarina puncha pagai tucunqui.
Chai shimicunata uyashpa, chaipi micuraccunamanta shuc nirca: —¡Cushiyucmi Diospac pachapi micuncapac tiyaric runa!
Nicpi uyashpa Jesus nirca: —Shuc runa jatun raimi micunata allichirca; achea runacunata cayarca.
Micuna puncha pactacpi, shuc luncuta cacharca cayashcacunata rimancapac: "Shamuichic, ña tucui allichira can".
Cayashcacuna "mana shamushun ima chari" nii callarinurca. Shuc nirca: "Shuc allpata rantircani, cunanshitu ricucrini; quishpichihuai, mana ri ushanichu".
Shuc nirca: "Chunca huacrata rantircani chaicunahuan allpata yapuncapac, chaicunata camancapac racuni; quishpichihuai, mana ri ushanichu".
Shuc nirca: "Cunan puncha sahuarircani, chairaicu mana ri ushanichu".

Chai luncu huasiman ticrashpa, amuta: tucuita: huillarca. Amu uyashpa, piñarishpa, luncuta nirca: —Ucta llactaman ri; callecunapi, pulasacunapi can tupashca tsuntsucunata, suchucunata, jancacunata, ñausacunata caiman pushamunqui".
Chai luncu rishpa, cutillata ticrashpa nirca: —Apu, can rimahuashcata pactachircani; cuti, chaira chushac tiyan micuna ucupi
Amu nirca: —Cutillata ri, ñanpicunapi maipipash tupashcacunata shamuchinqui micuna ucu juntarinacama.
Ranti, chai ñaupac cayashcacuna mana pipash ñuca micunata camanunca.
Achca runacuna Jesus-huan purinucpi, paicunata nirca:
—Shuc runa ñucahuan samushpa, paipac yaya-mamata, paipac huarmita, paipac huauquicunata, paipac aillucunata, pai quiquinllatata ñucamanta yalli llaquishpa, ñuca yachachishca tucuncapac mana allichu.
Ñucata catic runa crusta mana aparishpa, ñuca yachachishca tucuncapac mana allichu.
"Shuc runa, huasita" rurasha nishpa, manachu ñaupacta pai charishca cullquita yupan, pactancachu manachu pactanca ima chari, huasita tucuchincapac nishpa?.
Mana chashna rurashpa, istanticunata shayachishca huasha, mana tucuchi ushanman, cullqui illacpi; chaita ricuccuna paita asinunca nishpa:
"Cai runa huasincapac callarishpa mana tucuchina usharcachu.
"Chashnallata,:shuc suldaru apu macanacuncapac risha nishpa, manachu ñaupacta paipac shuncupi yuyan: "Ushashachu chunca huaranca suldarucunahuan ishcai chunca huarancahuan shamucta atincapac?.
Mana ushashpaca, paiman shimita cachan nishpa: "Mana macanacunata munanichu, mashipura allichishunchic".
"Cunan cancunata nini: Maicanpash tucui charishcata mana saquishpa, ñuca yachachishca cancapac mana allichu.
Cachi alli can; cachi paipac mishquita chincachicpi, imahuan cutillata cachiyanca.
Mana imapac alli can, jichununlla. Yuyayuc runa atipachun".
Achca gubirnu cullquita pallacunahuan juchayuccunahuan Jesuspacman shamuccuna carca paita uyancapac.
Chaita ricushpa, fariseocuna camachic quillcata yachaccunantin paimanta rimaranurca nishpa: —Cai runa juchayuccunahuan puric can, paicunahuan micuc can.
Jesus chaita uyashpa, paicunata cashna rimarca: —
Shuc patsac obejata charic runa, shuc chincaricpi, ¿manachu shuccunata saquishpa, chincarishcata mashcacrin tarinacama?.
Tarishpaca, chaita ricrapi aparishpa rin cushiyashpa.
Huasiman pactashpa, paipac mashicunata mayanpi causaccunatapash tantarichishpa nin: "Ñucahuan cushiyaichic, chincarishca obejata tarircani mari".
Chashnallata tucun, shuc runa juchata saquishpa Diosman ticracpi; chai runa iscun chunca iscun alli runacunamanta yalli Diosta cushiyachin.
Shuctapash rimarca cashna nishpa: —Chunca cullquita charic huarmi, shuclla chincaricpi, manachu chinpusuta japichishpa cullquita mashcan, huasita pichan tucui cuchucunapi ricun cullquita tarinacama?.
Tarishpaca, paipac aillucunata mayanpi causaccunatapash tantarichishpa nin: "Cushiyaichic ñucahuan, chincarishca cullquita tarircani mari".
Chashnallata tucun, shuc juchayuc runa llaquirishpa Diosman ticracpi; jahua pachapi angelcuna yapa cushiyanun.
Jesus shuctapash rimarca cashna nishpa: —Shuc runami carca, ishcai churiyuc yaya.
Quipa churi yayata nirca: "Yaya, ñucapacta cuhuai". Yayaca, charishcacunata chaupichishpa, churicunaman curca
Manapash unaipi, quipa churi paipaccunata japishpa, caru llactaman rirca; chaipi nuspa shina causashpa, pai apashcacunatai tucuchirca.
Tucuita jichushca huasha, jatun yariciai tucurca chai llactapi.
Yaricashpa, shuc huiracuchapacman llancacapac yaicurca. Huiracucha cuchicunata michincapac paita cacharca.
Cuchicuna micushca sacha muyucunata ihicunayan, manapi mari paita caran.
"Yuyaita japishpa, chai runa nirca: Ñuca yayapacpi achca llancac runa tiyan, achca micunata charinun; ñuca, ranti, caipi yaricashpa huañurani.
Cunanllata rincapac racuni. Yayapacman pactashpa rimasha: Ñuca yayalla, Diosta piñarcani, cantapash piñarcani;
canpac churi cancapac mana allichu cani: llancaccama shinallapash chasquihuapai;
"Chashna nirishpa jatarishpa, yayapacman rirca. Chaira carupi tiyashcapi, yaya paita ricurca; ricushpa shuncupi llaquirirca; paipacman callpashpa rishpa, paita ucllarca, mucharca.
Churi yayata nirca: "Yaya, Diosta piñarcani, cantapash piñarcani; canpac churi cancapac mana allichu cani".
Ranti, yaya luncucunata nirca: "Ucta, alli churanata apacrichic paita churachincapac. Shihuita paipac maquipi churaichic; ushutatapash churachichic.
Huira huacra huahuata apacrichic, huañuchichic. ¡Micushunchic, raimishunchic!
Cai ñuca churi huañushca cashpa, causarircami; chincarishca cacpi, paita tarircani". Chashna nicpi, raimincapac callarinurca.
"Paipac ñaupac churi chacrapi tiyarca. Huasiman ticrashpa, cajashcata, tushushcata uyarca.
Chaita uyashpa, shuc luncuta cayashpa tapurca: ¿"Imatái chai uyarishca"?.
Luncu cutiparca: "Canpac huauqui ticramushcami, canpac yayaca huira huacrata huañuchirca pai alli ticramushcaraicu".
Chaita uyashpa sinchi piñarirca; piñarishpa huasiman mana yaicuna munarca. Paipac yaya canchaman llucshishpa, "yaicuilla, churi" nirca.

Churica yayata nirca: "Yaya, uyahuai; achca huatata canhuan llancarani, can rimashcata tucuita pactachircani; chashnapash, mana shuc atallpatapash cuyahuarcanqui ñuca mashicunahuan micushpa cushiyancapac.
Ranti, chai canpac churi shamucpi, can charishcacunata manalli huarmicunahuan tucuchishca huasha, mai huira huacrata huañuchircanqui".
Yaya paita cutiparca; "Churi, can huiñai ñucahuan tiyanqui, tucui ñuca charishcacuna canpacmi.
Ranti, raimina carca, cushiyarina carca, cai canpac huauqui huañushca cashpa causarirca mari; chincarishca cacpi, paita tarircanchic".

Jesus runacunata yachachishpa caitapash nirca: —Shuc yapa cullquiyuc runami carca. Tucui charishcacunata ricuncapac shuc ricuccamata charirca; chai runa patron charishcacunata mana allita ricuc carca, nalla tucuchirca; chaita patronta huillanurca.
Patron ricuccamata cayashpa nirca: —¿Imata ruracunqui ñuca charishcacunahuan? Quillcacunata allichi, ñucahuan ña mana llancancachu ranqui.
Ricuccama, chaita uyashpa, shuncupi nirirca: —¿Cunanmanta imata rurashpa causasha, ñuca patron jichuhuan mari? ¿Chacrata rashpachu? Mana ushanichu. ¿Mañacushpa puricachashachu? —Pincachihuan
Ajá, ñami yachani imata ranata caimanta llucshicpi, runacuna huasipi chasquihuancapac:
Chashha nirishpa, patronta dibic runacunata huasha huasha cayarca. Shuc shamucpi, paita tapurca: —¿Mashna dibinqui patronta?
Pai nirca: —Huirata dibini shuc huaranca litro tupu. Ricuccama paita nirca: —Caica canpac quillca; tiyarishpa, shucta quillcai "pichca &patsac dibini"

Huasha shucta cayashpa tapurca: —¿Canca mashnata dibinqui? Pai nirca: —Arrosta dibini shuc patsac ashanca tupu. Paita nirca: —Caica canpac quillca; "pusac chunca ashanca" quillcai. Chashnallata shuccunahuan rurarca.

Patron, cuiraccama rashcata uyashpa, paita chaccharca shuhua shina rashcapipash, pai yuyayuc cashcamanta. Cai causaipacta mashcaccuna paicunapura rurashcacunapi Diospaccunata mashcaccunamanta yalli yuyayuc canun. Chashna nirca Jesus; huasha paicunatarcamachkca nishpa: —
Cai mana alli yapachishca cullquihuan mashicunata ruraichic, cullqui tucurishcapi, mashicuna jahua pachapi cancunatachasquincapac.
Ansallata allita ricuc runa. achcatapash allita ricunca; ansallata mana ricuc runa achcatapash mana allita ricunca.
Cai pacha cullquihuan cancuna mana alli ruracpi, ¿pitac mai jatuncunata cancunaman cunca?.
Cancuna shucpaccunata mana alli ricucpi, ¿pitac cancuna quiquinpacta cunca?
"Manapí ishcai, patronhuan tucuna ushan; shucta llaquishpa, shucta chicninca. Shucta uyashpa, shucta mana uyancachu. Dios-huan, cullquihuan mana tucuna usharinchu.
Fariseocuna, cullquita yapa munaccuna cashpa, Jesus rimshcata uyashpa paita asinurca.
Jesus paicunata nirca: —Cancuna, runacuna ñaupacpi allicuna shina ricurishpa causanquichic; ranti, Dios cancunata ucuta ricsin; runacunapacpi "jatun cani" nishpa niccunata Dios chicnin
"Juan shamushcacama Moisespac camachia quillca tiyarca, profetacuna yachachishcatapash pactachina carca. Chaimanti Diospac pacha uyachishcami can; tucuicunaca chaiman yaicusha niccunata ñacachinun;
ranti, cai pachahuan jahua pachahuan tucuricpipash, camachic quillcapi tiyac mana chincarincachu, illacta pactarinca.
"Shuc runa quiquin huarmita jichushpa shuc-huan sahuaricpi, jatun juchata aparin; chashnallata, cari jichushca huarmihuan sahuaric runa jatun juchata aparini:
"Shuc yapa cullquiyuc runami carca; sumac churanata churaric carca; caran puncha raimi punchapi shina micuc carca.
Cullquiyuc runapac huasi puncupi, shuc tsuntsu runa, :Lazaro shutiyuc, allpapi tiyacushpa causac carca; carachalla aparishca carca.
Cullquiyuc runapac mesamanta urmac puchucunata micunayarca; manapí paita cararca; allcucunapash paipac carachacunata llahuac carca.
"Shuc puncha, chai tsuntsu runa huañurca; huañucpi, angelcuna jahua pachaman pushanurca, Abraan tiyashcaman. Cullquiyuc runapash huauñuca; huañucpi, panpanurca.
Ucupachapi tiyashpa, ñacarishpa, caruman Abraanta ricurca; Lázaro paihuan tiyarca.

Paicunata ricushpa caparirca nishpa: —Yaya Abraan, ñucamanta llaquiripai, Lazarota ñucapacman cachamupai, paipac maqui rucata yacupi jucuchishpa, ñuca calluta chirichincapac, cai ninapi yapa ñacarini mari.

Abraan cutiparca nishpa: —Churi, yuyari, can causacushcapi cushilla causarcanqui, mana ima canta pishirca; ranti Lazaro mana imata charirca, nanaipi causarca. Cunan caipi cushilla causan, ranti, can nanachishcami canqui.

Ashtahuan rimasha: Shuc jatun huaicu cancunata ñucanchicmanta anchuchin. Caimanta cancunapacman chinpasha niccuna mana ushanun chinpancapac; chashnallata, cancuna tiyashcamanta ñucanchicpacman mana chinpaipac can.
Cullquiyuc runa chaira nirca: —Chashna cacpi, yaya, canta mañani: Lazarota ñuca yaya huasiman cachapanqui,
pichca huauquicunata charini mari; paicunata rimachun ama cai nanai pachaman shamuncapac.
Abraan nirca: —Moises quillcashcata, profetacuna quillcashecta yachanun, paicunata uyanuchun.
Cullquiyuc runa nirca: —Mana, yaya Abraan; shuc huañushcacunamanta paicunapacman ricpi, Diosman ticranuncami.
Abraan cutiparca: —Moisesta profetacunatapash mana uyanucpi, shuc huañushca runa causaricpipash mana ininuncachu.
Shuc puncha Jesus yachachishcacunata nirca: —Runacunata juchaman aisaccuna huiñai tiyanunca; ayailla chashna ruraccuna.
Alli canman chai runapac cuncapi jatun rumita huatashpa, ñucñu yacuman shitanuchun. Yuyanquichic cuti.
Canpac huauqui canta piñacpi, paita quishpichinqui.
Shuc punchallapi canchis cuti canta mana allita rarashpa, canchis cuti "ñuca rurashcamanta llaquirini" nistipa canpacman shamucpi, paita quishpichina canqui.
Shuc puncha yachachishcacuna Jesusta ninurca: —Ñucanchic inishcata huiñachipai.
Jesus paicunata nirca: —Cancuna inishca shuc uchilla muyu shina cacpi, chaipi shayac yurata ninquichicman "Chaimanta anchuri, ñucñu yacuman shitari" nishpa, paica cancunata uyanman.
"Cancuna shuc luncuta charishpa, pai chacra pichashcamanta, huacracunata michishcamanta ticracpi, ¿paita "tiyari micuncapac" ninquichichu? Mana.
Paita ninquichic: "Ñuca micunata allichishpa carahuanqui; huasha can micunqui"
¿Chai luncuta pacrachunachu ranata rashcamanta? Mana.
Chashnallata, cancuna Dios rurai nishcata rurashca huasha ninquichic: "Llancaccunallami canchic, ruranallatami rurarcanchic".
Jesus Jerusalenman rifashpa,rSamaria mayanta, Galilea mayanta rirca.
Shuc llactaman yaicushcallapita; chunca sisu runacuna paita tupancapac llucshinurca.
Carupi shayarishpa caparinurca nishpa: —Jesus, yachachiccama, ñucanchicmanta llaquiripai.
Jesus paicunata nirca: —Pacriyayacunapacman ricuchiricrichic. Riranucpi, alliyachi tucunurca.
Paicunamanta shuc ña picharishcata ricurishpa, urastalla ticrarca, sinchi shimihuan Diosta chacchashpa.
Jesuspac ñaupacpi tuhuaman urmashpa, paita pacrachurca; chai runa Samariamanta runa carca.
Jesus, paita ricushpa, nirca: —¿Manachu chuncapura canurca picharacuna? ¿Shuccuna maipi tiyanun?
Cai sapalla, mana judio cac runa, Diosta chacchancapac ticramurca.
Huasha paita nirca: —Shayari, canpac huasiman ri; can inishca canta quishpichirca.
Shuc puncha fariseocuna Jesusta tapushpa ninurca: —¿Imura Dios apu tucuncapac shamunca? Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Dios apu tucuncapac shamushpa, mana ricuipacchu canca.
Mana ninuncachu "caipi can", "chaipi can" nishpa; Diospac pacha ña cancunapacpi tiyan.
Huasha yachachishcacunata nirca: —Shuc puncha, cancuna cai RUNA causashca punchacunata ricunayashpa, shucllatapash mana ricunquichic.
Cancunata ninunca: "Caipi can, chaipi can". Chashna niccunata ama uyanquichichu, ama catinquichichu.
Shuc rayu jahua pachapi ricurin shucmanta shuccama llinpiashpa; chai layallata canca cai RUNA shamuna puncha.
Chai puncha pactanacama achcata paita llaquichinunca; cunan causaccuna "paita mana munanchic" nishpa jichununca.
"Cai RUNA shamuna punchapi, Noe causashca punchacunapi shina tucunca,
Runacuna micuranurca, upiaranurca, sahuariranurca Noe jatun canuapi yaicushca punchacama; chai huasha, jatun tamia shamushcapi, tucuilla huañunurca.
"Chashnallata tucurca Lot causashca punchacunapi: runacuna micuranurca, upiaranurca, ranticunurca, catucunurca, tarpucunurca, huasicunata shayachicunurca.
Lot Sodoma llactamanta llucshishcapi, jahua pachamanta nina asufrehuan urmarca, tucuicunataca huañuchirca.
Chashnallata tucunca cai RUNA shamuna punchapi,
Chai puncha, huasi jahuapi tiyaccuna ama uraicunuchun huasi ucumanta charishcacunata apancapac; chacrapi tiyaccuna ama huasiman ticranuchun.
Lotpac huarmiman tucushcata yuyarinquichic.
Maicanpash causaita quishpichisha nishpa, chaita chincachincami; causaita chincachic runa chaita cutillata charinca.
Cancunata nini: chai tutapi, ishcai shuc cahuitupi puñununca: shucta pushanunca, shucta saquinunca.
Ishcai pacta cutacununca: shuc apai tucunca, shuc saquishcami canca.
Ishcai runa chacrapi tiyanunca: shucta pushanunca, shucta saquinunca
Chai shimicunata uyashpa Jesusta tapunurca: —Apunchic, maipi chashna tucunca? Pai cutiparca: —Huañushca aicha tiyashcapi ancacuna tantarinunca.
Shuc puncha, Jesus runacunata yachachincapac imashnata Dios-huan rimana can mana sanpayashpa,
cashna rimarca: —Shuc llactapi shuc taripac runa tiyarca; Diosta mana manchac, runacunata mana llaquic carca.
Chai llactallapita shuc huarmi tiyarca; chai taripac runapacman rirca mañancapac nishpa: "Shuc runa ñucata chicnihuan; ñucanchicpura tucushcata allichipai".
Taripac runa unaita chai huarmita mana uyarcachu. Shuc puncha yuyarirca: "Ñuca Diosta mana manchashpallata, shuccunata mana llaquishpallata,
cai huarmi yallicta quillachihuacpi, paita uyashpa allichisha, casi ricuhuancapac".
Jesus nirca: Chaitami rimarca manalli taripac runa.
Diosca, pai acllashcacuna, punchantin tutantin paiman caparinucpi, ¿manachu paicunata uyanca?. Cúnaca cancunata tapuni: ¿Cai RUNA shamuna puncha chaira inic runa tiyancachu cai pachapi?.
Jesus cai rimahata uyachirca huaquin runacunaraicu, paicuna "ñuca alli runami cani, shuccuna huacllic runa canun" nishpa yuyaccuna carca. Cashna nirca. —
Ishcai runa Diospac huasiman rinurca paihuan rimarincapac. Shuc fariseo runa carca; shuc gubirnu cullquita pallac runa carca.

Fariseo runa shayashpa, cashna nirca: "Dios, ñuca mana shuc runacuna shina cashcaraicu canta pacrachuni: paicuna shuhua canun, manallita ruraccuna, shucpac huarmita japiccuna canun; mana cai gubirnu cullquita pallac runa shinachu cani.
Caran semana ishcai cuti sasic cani; tucui ñuca charishcacunamanta chunca raquita cuc cani".

Ranti, gubirnu cullquita pallac runa, cuchupi tiyashpa, ñahuicuna jahuaman shayachinata manchashpa, maquihuan pai quiquinta huactararca nishpa: "Dioslla, ñucamanta llaquiripai, juchasapa runa mari cani!".

Shuti cancunata nini: Cai runa paipac huasiman ticrashpa, Dioshuan allichishpa rirca; ranti, fariseo runa mana. Maicanpash pai quiquinta jahuayachishpa uchillayachishcami canca; maicanpash pai quiquinta uchillayachishpa, jatunyachishcami canca.
Shuc puhcha llullu huahuacunata Jesuspacman pushamunurca "paicunata llancapai" nishpa; yachachishcacuna, chaita ricushpa, piñarishpa "anchurichic caimanta" ninurca.
Jesus paicunata cayashpa nirca: —Imaraicu huahuacunata quillachinquichic? Paicuna ñucapacman shamunata ama jarcaichichu; Diospac pacha paicuna shina caccunapac mari can.
Shuti cancunata nini; Diospac pachata chasquic runa, huahua shina mana chasquishpa, mana imura jahua pachaman yaicuncachu.
Chaipi tiyaccunamanta shuc apu runa Jesusta tapurca: —Alli yachachiccama, imata rana cani mana tucuric causaiman pactancapac?
Jesus paita nirca: —¿Imaraicu ñucata "Alli" nishpa hihuanqui?. Shucllami alli, Dios.

Canca Dios rurai nishcacunata yactianqui: Shucpac huarmihuan ama llutarinquichu; runata ama huahuchinquichu; ama shuhuanquichu; ama shucmanta llullashpa rimanquichu; canpac yayata, canpac mamata yupaichanqui".
Rimacpi uyashpa, chai runa nirca: —Chai tucuita huahua eashcamanta pactachircani.
Jesus chaita uyashpa nirca: —Chaira shuc canta pishin: Tucui charishcacunata catushpa, tsuntsu runacunaman cunqui; chashha rashpa, jahua pachapi cullquiyuc tucunqui; chai huasha ñucahuan shamunqui.
Chai runa uyashpa yapa llaquirirca, yapa cullquiyuc mari carca.
Jesus paita llaquirishcata ricushpa, nirca: —Cullquiyuccuna mana yaicunallachu canun Diospac pachapi.
Shuc camello nishca huihua tupulli jutcuta ashtahuan pasanalla canca, cullquiyuc runa Diospac pachaman yaicunamanta.
Chaita uyaccuna ninurca: —¿Chashna cacpi, pitac quishpina ushanca?
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Runa mana ushashcata Dios ushan.
Pedro nirca: —Apunchic, ñucanchic tucuita saquircanchic canta catincapac.
Jesus cutiparca: —Shuti cancunata nini: Shuc runa huasita cacpi, yaya mamata cacpi, huauquicunata capi, huarmita cacpi, churicunata cacpi, Diosraicu saquishpa,
cai pachapi pai saquishcamanta yalli cui tucunca; cai pacha tucurishca huasha, mana tucuric causaita japinca.
Jesus chunca ishcaicunata chicanman cayashpa, paicunata nirca: —Jerusalenman riranchic, chaipi, profetacuna cai RUNAmanta quillcashcata pactarinca.
Paita mana judio caccunaman cununca; paita asinunca, caminunca, tiucanunca.
Paita llipachinunca, huañuchinunca; chashnapash quimsa puncha huasha causarincami.
Chashna nicpi uyashpa, yachachishcacuna mana imata atipanurcachu; "imata nin cai runa mana yachanchic" ninurca; Jesus rimashca mana atipaipacchu carca.
Jesus Jerico nishca llacta mayanman pactashcapi, shuc ñausa runa "imatapash cuyahuaichic" nishpa ñanpipi tiyacurca.
Achca runacuna ñanpita purinucpi uyashpa, "imata tucun" nishpa tapurca.
Cutipanurca: —Nazaretmanta Jesus caita riran.
Ñausa runa chaita uyashpa caparirca: —Jesus, Davidpac churi, ñucamanta llaquiripai
Ñaupacpi riraccuna paita piñanurca "Upallai" nishpa; ranti, pai ashtahuan sinchi caparirca: —Davidpac churi, ñucamanta llaquiripai.
Jesus, caparishcata uyashpa, shayarirca; shayarishpa, "paita pushamuichic" nirca. Pushamunucpi, paita tapurca: —
¿Imata munanqui ñuca canta rancapac? Ñausa runa nirca: —Apunchic, ñuca ricunata munani.
Jesus paita nirca: —Ricuilla, can inishcamanta alli tucurcanqui.
Chai ucullapi, ñausa runa ricuncapac callarirca; Diosta chacchashpa, Jesusta catishpa rirca. Chaita ricushcacunapash Diosta chacchanurca.
Jesus Jerico llactaman pactashpa, callecunata purirarca.
Chai llactapi shuc cullquiyuc runa tiyarca, Zaqueo shutiyuc, gubirnu cullquita pallacunapac apu.
Pai Jesusta ricsinata munarca; allpalla runa cashpa, achca runacuna juntarinucpi, paita mana ricuna usharcachu.
Chashna cacpi, ñaupacman callpashpa, shuc yuraman sicarca; chai mayanta Jesus rina carca.
Jesus chaiman pactashpa, Zaqueota yurapi ricushpa nirca: —Zaqueo, utcalla uraicui, canpac huasipi saquirinca rani.
Chaita uyashpa, Zaqueo urastalla yuramanta uraicurca; cushiyashpa, Jesusta huasipi chasquirca.
Chaita ricushpa, tucui runacunai Jesusta huashapi rimai callarinurca "shuc juchayuc runapac huasipi saquirin" nishpa.

Zaqueo manapita manchashpa, Jesusta nirca: —Apulla, ñuca charishcacunamanta chaupita tsuntsu runacunaman cunca rani; pimantapash umachishpa ñuca yallicta japishca cashpa, chuscurcuti yapashpa cutichisha.
Jesus paita nirca: —Cunan puncha cai huasiman quishpichina yaicurca; cai runapash Abraanpac churimi can.
Cai RUNAca chincarishcata mashcancapac, paita quishpichincapac shamurca.
Runacuna chai shimicunata uyaranurca. Jerusalenman pactana mayanpi, Jesus shuc yachachina rimanata rimarca, paicuna "Diospac pacha pactanca ran ima chari" nishpa yuyanucpi.
Cashna rimarca: —Shuc jatun runa caruman rirca, pai quiquinpac llactapi apu tucuna shimita japincapac, apu tucushpa ticrancapac.
Chaira mana rishpa, chunca paihuan llancaccunata cayashpa, caranman cullquita curca nishpa: —Cai cullquihuan rantishpa catushpa llancaichic nuca ticranacama.
Chai llacta runacima paita chicninurea; chairaicu, paipac huashalla shimita cachanurca "mana munanchic cai runa ñucanchic apu tucuchun" nishpa.

Chashnapash, paita chai llactamanta aputa ruranurca; chai huasha ticramurca. Huasiman pactashpa, chai paihuan llancaccunata cayaita, cullquita cushcacunata, "ñuca cushca cullquihuan mashnata yapachinurca" yachancapac.
Ñaupac shamushpa nirca: —Apu, can cuhuashca cullquihuan chunca cullquita yapachircami.
Pai nirca: —Allimi, alli runa, pactachic runa canqui; ansallahuan allita rashcaraicu, chunca llacta apu tucunqui.
Shuc shamushpa nirca: —Apu, can cuhuashca cullquihuan pichca cullquita yapachircani.
Paitapash nirca: —Allimi, can pichca llacta apu tucunqui.
Shuc shamushpa ninca: —Apu, caica canpac cullqui; shuc churanahuan pillushpa huacaichircani,
canta mancharcani mari; can millai shuncuyuc canqui; can mana cushcata mañanqui, mana tarpushcata pallanqui.
Chashna nicpi uyashpa, apu nirca: —Mana alli llancacruna, can rimashcallahuan canta taripani. Ñuca sinchi runa cashcata, mana cushcata mañac cashcata, mana tarpushcata pallac cashcata yacharcanqui;
Chashna cacpi, ¿imaraicu nuca cushca cullquita mana bancopi churarcanqui mirarincapac, ñuca ticramushpa chai cullquita yapashcantin japincapac?
Chaipi tiyaccunata nirca: —Cullquita quichuichic paimanta, chunca cullquita charicman cuichic.
Paicuna ninurca: —Apu, ña chunca cullquita charin.
Apu cutiparca: —Mana imananchu; charic runa ashtahuan cui tucunca; ranti, mana charic runa pai charishcashitutapash quichui tucunca.
Ñucata chicniccunataca caiman pushamuichic, ñuca ñaupacpi paicunata huañuchichic.
Chai shimicunata rimashca huasha, Jesus yachachishcacunata ñaupashpa Jerusalenman rirca.
Betfage llactaman, Betania llactaman pactashpa, Olivos nishca urcu mayanpi, Jesus ishcai yachachishcacunata nirca:
—Ñahuipura tiyac tacsha llactaman richic. Chaiman pactashpa, shuc burro nishca huihuata huatashcata tupanquichic; chai burro jahuapi manapí chaira sicarcachu; pascashpa apamunquichic.
"Imapac pascanquichic" tapunucpi, cutipanquichic: "Apu paita mutsunmi".
Yachachishcacuna rinurca, Jesus nishca shina tupanurca.
Burrota pascanucpi, amucuna shamushpa ninurca: —
¿Imapac cai burrota pascaranquichic? Yachachishcacuna ninurca: —Apu paita mutsunmi.
Pascashpa Jesuspacman burrota apanurca, Churanacunata burro jahuapi mantashpa, Jesusta sicachinurca.
Jesus riracpi, runacuna churanacunata ñanpipi mantanurca.
Olivos nishca urcu uraicuna mayanman pactacpi, Jesusta caticcuna cushiyashcahuan caparishpa, Diosta chacchanurca cashna nishpa: —
¡Apunchicpac shutipi shamuc jatun Curaca bendisiashca cachun!. ¡Jahua pachapi ganas causai yupaichanapash cachun!
Runa ucumanta huaquin fariseocuna Jesusta ninurca: —Yachachiccama, canta caticcunata upallachi.
Jesus paicunata cutiparca: —Paicuna upallanucpi, rumicuna caparinunca.
Jerusalen mayanman pactanucpi, Jesus llactata ricushpa nirca:
—Cai canpac punchapi ima alli cashcata can yachashcapi, alli canman. Ranti, chai canpac pacashca can, canpac ima alli cashcata mana atipanqui.
Llaqui punchacuna pactamununca; canta chicniccuna llacta muyucta quinchata ruranunca; tucui particunamanta canta llaquichinunca, canta urmachinunca.
Ucupi tiyaccunata huañuchinunca; canmanta shuc rumi shuc rumi jahuapi mana saquirincachu, Dios canta quishpichincapac shamushcata can mana atipashcaraicu.
Chai huasha, Jesus Dipspac huasiman yaicurca; chaipi catuccunata, ranticcunata chaimanta llucshichirca nishpa: —
Quillcashcacunapi cashna quillcara tiyan: "Ñuca huasi Dios-huan rimarina huasi canca", cancuhaca shuhua huasita chaita rarcanquichic.
Caran puncha Jesus Diospac huasipi yachachic carca; pacriyaya apucuna camachic quillcata yachaccunantin llacta rucucunantin Jesusta huañuchishun nishpa, imashnata rurashun nishpa yuyaranurca.
Ranti, imashna ranata mana yachanurca, tucui ruhacuna Jesusta munaihuan uyanucpi.
Shuc puncha, Jesus Diospac huasipi runacunata yachachirarca, Diospac alli shimita camachirarca; pacriyaya apucuna, camachic quillcata yachaccuna rucucunantin shamushpa, Jesusta ninurca: —
¿Ima ushaihuan can rurashcata ruranqui? ¿Pimi canta chaita rurancapac rimarca?
Jesus cutiparca nishpa: —Ñucapash cancunata shuc shimita tapunca rani:
¿Pimi Juanta cacharca bautisancapac? ¿Dioschu paita cacharca? ¿Runacunachu paita cachanurca? Cutipahuaichic.
Rimacpi, paicunapura rimarincapac callarinurca: ¿"Imata rimashun? Ñucanchic "Dios paita cacharca" nishpa rimacpi, pai ninca: ¿Imaraicu paita mana inircanquichic?
Ñucanchic "runacuna paita cachanurca" nishpa rimacpi, tucui runacuna rumihuan ñucanchicta huañuchinunca; Juan Diospacmanta rimac cashcata shuti yuyanun mari.
Chairaicu Jesusta ninurca: —Mana yachanchichu.
Chaita uyashpa Jesus nirca: —Ñucapash ima ushaihuan chaicunata rurashcata mana rimashachu.
Chai huasha, Jesus runacunaman cai rimanata rimarca: —Shuc runa uya nishca chacrata rurarca; shuc runacunaman mañachishpa, chaimanta rirca unayasha nishpa.
Pallana pacha pactaricpi, shuc luncuta cacharca chacra amupacta chai runacunaman manancapac; paicuna, chai luncuta huactashpa, imapash illac cachanurca.
Chashna, tucucpi, chacra amu shucta cacharca; paitapashi piñanurca, huactanurca, imapash illac cachanurca.
Chaira shuctapash cacharca; llancaccuna paitapash chucrichishpa callpachinurca.
"Puchucaipi chacra amu nirirca: ¿'Imata rasha? Ñuca llaquishca churita cachasha; paita yupaichanunca ima chari'.
Llancaccuna paita ricushpa rimanacunurca nishpa: Caimi amu charishcacunata japina cac, paita huañuchishunchic pai japinca rashcacunata amuyancapac.
Paita japishpaca, chacramanta llucshichishpa huañuchinurca. ¿Chacra amu imata ruranca chai runacunata?.
Paicunata huañuchinca, chacrata shuc runacunaman mañachinca. Chaita uyashpa ninurca: —¡Mana chashna tucuchun
Ranti, Jesus paicunaman ricushpa nirca: —Shinacpi, imata nishpa nin cai quillcara: "Huasita shayachiccuna jichushca rumi huasi siqui rumi tucurca.
Chai rumi jahuapi urmac runa paqui paqui tucunca; chai rumi runa jahuapi urmashipa, paita ñitinca".
Pacriyaya apucuna, camachic quillcata yachaccunapash Jesus paicunamanta rimashcata atipanurca; chairaicu, chai ucullapi paita japinata munanurca; ranti, runacunata manchanurca.

Jesusta mana japi ushashpa, shuc runacunata paipacman cachanurca, alli runacuna shina ricurishpa Jesusta pantachincapac, paita imatapash rimachishpa cautsayachincapac, gubirnu apuman paita chasquichincapac.
Chai runacuna Jesusta tapunurca: —Yachachiccama, can shutita rimac cashcata yachanchic; runapi ricurishcallahuan mana taripanquichu; Diosman ric ñanpita mana umachishpa ricuchinqui.
Rimai cuti: ¿Roma llactapi causac Incaman cullquitai pagana allichu? ¿manachu alli?
Jesus, paicuna manalli yuyaihuan tapushcata yachashpa, nirca: —¿Imaraicu urmachinayahuanquichic?
Shuc cullquita ricuchihuaichic. ¿Pipacta can cai ñahui, caipi tiyashca shutipash? Cutipanurca: —Incapac.
Jesus paicunata nirca: —Incapacta Incaman cuichic, Diospacta Diosman cuichic.
Chashna cutipacpi, mana ushanurca ima pantashca shimitapash rimachincapac runacuna ñaupacpi; Jesus cutipashcamanta mancharishpa churilla tucunurca.
Shuc puncha, huaquin ranacuna "saduceos" nishcacuna Jesuspacman rinurca; paicuna "huañushcacunai mana causarinuncachu" nishpa yachachinun; chairaicu, Jesusta tapushpa ninurca: —

Yachachiccama, Moises quillcashcacunapi cashna quillcara tiyan: "Shuc huarmiyuc runa huahua illac huañucpi, paipac huauqui chai huarmihuan sahuarichun; paicunapac huahua huñuscapac shutita apanca; chashna nin Moises quillcashca; cunan allita uyanqui:
Canchis huauquipura tiyanurca. Rucu huauqui shuc huarmita japirca, huahua illac huañurca.
Paipac quipa chai huarmillahuan sahuarirca, paipash huahua illac huañurca. Tucui canchis huauquipura huasha huasha chai huarmillahuan sahuarinurca, huahua illac huanunurca.
Puchucaipi huarmipash huanurca.
Causarina puncha, chai huarmi maicanpac canca, tucui canchis paihuan sahuarishca cacpi?
Jesus paicunata cutiparca: —Cai causaipi caricuna huarmicunapash sahuarinun.
Ranti, chai shuc causaiman pactancapac baliccuna, causarincapac baliccuna, mana sahuarinuncachu.
Ña mana huañununca, angelcuna shina tucununca; Diospac churicuna canun, Dios paicunata causachicpi.
Huañushcacuna causarina canata quiquin Moises yachachirca. Ruparashca yurapi Dios paiman ricurishcapi, Moises paimanta rimashpa nin: "Abraanpac Dios, Isaacpac Dios, Jacobpac Dios".
Dios mana huañushcacunapac Dioschu, causaccunapac Diosmi. Diospacpi tucuicuna causayuc canun.
Chaita uyashpa, huaquin camachic quillcata yachaccuna ninurca: —Alli rimashcanqui, Yachachiccama.
Chai pachamanta imatapash tapunata manchanurca.
Chai huasha Jesus nirca: —¿Imaraicu Mesias Davidpac churi cashcata ninun?
Davidllata, Salmos nishca quillcapi, cashna nin: Apu ñuca Aputa rimarca nishpa: Ñuca alli maquiman tiyari
ñuca canta chicniccunata atinacama.
Davidllata Mesiasta "Apu" nishpa rimacpi, ¿imashna paipac churi canca?
Tucui runacuna uyanucpi, Jesus yachachishcacunata. nirca:

Yuyanquichic camachic quillcata yachaccunata; paicuna suñi churanata churarinata munanun; callecunapi salurai tucunayanun; tantarina huasicunapi ñaupac tiyarinacunata munanun; micunacunapipash ñaupac tiyarinata mashcanun.
Huaccha hurmicuna charishcacunata shuhuanun, paiounata umachishpa "cancunamanta Diosta mañacunchic" nishpa. Upata ñacachi tucununca.
Jesus Diospac huasipi tiyacushpa, cullquiyuccuna camari malacunapi cullquita churacushcata ricurarca.
Shuc huaccha huarmi shamushpa, manaimayuc cashpa, ishcai cullquishituta chai malapi churarca.
