Chaita ricushpa, Jesus nirca: —Shuti cancunata nini: Cai huaccha huarmi tucuicunamanta ashtahuan curca;
paicuna puchushcamanta mari cunurca; ranti, cai huarmi causancpac charishcata illacta curca.
Huaquin runacuna Diospac huasimanta rimaranurca nishpa: —Ricuichic chai sumac ricuric huasita, alli sami rumicunahuan rurashca, runacuna cuyashca curihuan sumacyachishca. Jesus paicunata nirca: —
Shuc puncha, cancuna ricurashca huasimanta, shuc rumi shuc rumi jahuapi mana saquirincachu, illacta tulachishcami canca.
Chashna nicpi Jesus, paita tapunurca: —Yachachiccama, imura chashna tucunca? ¿Ima imata ricurinca chai tucui tucunca racucpi?.
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Yuyanquichic ama umachi tucuncapac. Achca runa ñuca shutipi shamununca mari, "ñuca Cristopi cani" nishpa, "caimi Diospac pacha" nishpa. Ama paicunata uyanqujchichu.
"Macanacui tiyan nishpa uyaricpi, ama mancharichichu; chai ñaupacta tucuna can, ranti tucurina mana urastalla shamunca.
Huasha paicunata nirca: —Llacta shuc llactahuan macanacununca. Shuc ninacuna shuc runacunahuan macarinunca.
Allpa sinchi cuyurinca; jahua pachapi manchaipaccuna ricurinunca; huaquin suyucunapi jatun yaricai tiyanca; millai uncuicunapash tiyanunca.
Chaira mana chashna tucushcallapita, japi tucunquichic; cancunata llipachinunca, chunta curralpi huichcanunca, jatun apucunapacman pushai tucunquichic ñucaraicu.
Chashna tucucpi, cancuna ñucata catishcata ricuchincapac alli canca.
Chairaicu, ama llaquirinquichichu imata rimashpa paicunamanta quishpirishun nishpa.
Ñucalla cancunata yachac shimicunata rimachisha; cancunata chicniccuna imatapash cutipana mana ushanuncachu.
"Cancunapac quiquin yayacuna; huarmicuna, aillucuna, mashicuna cancunata japinunca, taripaccunamah cui tucunquichic; huaquincuna huañuchi tucunquichic.
Ñucaraicu tucui runacunapi chicni tucunquichic.
Mana imananchu; cancunapac umamanta shuc acchallapash mana chincarincachu.
Cancuna allita ranapi mana sanpayashpa quishpichi tucunquichic.
"Suldarucuna Jerusalen llactata muyuchishcata cancuna ricucpi, chai llacta tulai tucuna puncha pactamurcami.
Chashnapi, Judeapi tiyaccuna urcucunaman miticunuchun; llactapi tiyaccuna chaimanta llucshinuchun; chacrapi tiyaccuna ama llactaman ticranuchun.
Chai punchacunapi mari Jerusalen ñacachi tucunca, quillcashcacuna paimanta rimashca pactarincapac.
¡Ailla huicsayuc huarmicuna, chuchuchic huarmicunapash! Cai llacta jahuapi jatun llaqui shamunca, runacuna sinchi ñacachi tucununca.

Huaquincuna huañuchishcami canunca, huaquincuna shuc llactacunamah pushai tucununca, huatara tucushpa causancapac; mana judio caccuna Jerusalenpi causanunca paita mapayachishpa Dios munashca punchacama.
"Intipi, quillapi, estrellacunapi manchaipaccuna ricurinunca; allpapi runacuna mancharishcalla causanunca, ñucñu yacu caparishcata uyashpa.
"Ima tucunca ran" yuyashpa, manchaihuan chucchushpa, yuyai illac shina purinunca, tucui jahua, pacha tularinca mari.
Chashnapi, cai RUNAta ricununca; jatun ushaihuan apu tucushpa, puyucuna jahuapi shamurashcata ricununca.
Chai tucui callaricpi, cariyanquichic, umata jatachinquichic, urastalla mari quishpichishcami canquichic.
Caitapash rimarca; —Higuera nishca yurata yuyarichic.
Paipac pancacuna ña tucyacpi, rupai pacha pactashcata yachanquichic.
Chashnallata, ñuca rimashca pactarincapac callaricpi, Diospac pacha pactamurashcata yachanquichic.
Shuti cancunata nini: cunan causaccuna chaira mana huañucpi, ñuca rimashca shimi pactarincami.
Jahua pacha cai pachapash tucurinuncami; ranti, ñuca shimicuna mana chincarinuncachu.

"Yuyanquichic; ama upayachi tucuichichu; yallicta micushcamanta, machashcamanta, cai causaipacta yuyashcamanta cancunapac yuyai ama upayachun, chai punchapi ama japi tucuncapac shuc tuclla urmashca shina;
chashna mari shamunca chai puncha tucui suyucunapi causaccunaman.
Allichirishpa chaparaichic; huiñailla Diosta mañaraichic chai tucuita quishpincapac, cai RUNApacman mana manchashpa rina ushancapac".
Punchapi Jesus Diospac huasipi yachachic carca, tutapi Olivos urcuman ric carca puñuncapac.
Tucui runacuna tutamantashitu Diospac huasiman shamuccuna carca paita uyancapac.
Pascua nishca raimi, mana punquichishca tanta micuna puncha ña pactamurarca.
Pacriyaya apucunahuan yachaccunahuan imashnata Jesusta huañuchincapac mashcaranurca, runacunata manchashpa.
Chashna cacpi, supai Judas Iscariote ucupi yaicurca; Judas chunca ishcai Jesus acllashcacunamanta carca.
Pai pacriyaya apucunaman rishpa, paicunahuan Diospac huasipi tiyac suldaru apucunahuanpash rimarirca imashna Jesusta japishpa paicunaman cuncapac.
Paicuna uyashpa cushiyanurca; "cullquita cushcanqui" paita ninurca;
pai "allimi" nishpa, Jesusta runa illashca pachapi japinata munarca, paita apucunaman chasquichincapac.
Mana punquichishca tanta micuna puncha ña pactarca; chai punchallapita, cordero nishca huihuata huañuchina carca.
Chastina cacpi, Jesus Pedrota, Juanta cashna nistipa cacharca: —Ñucanchic pascua micunata micuncapac tucuita allichicrichic.
Paicuna tapunurca: —Maipitac munanqui ñucanchic allichincapac?
Jesus nirca: —Uyahuaichic: Cancuna llactaman yaicushpa, shuc yacu mancata apac runata tupanquichic. Paita catishpa, pai yaicushca huasiman yaicunquichic.
Yaicushpa huasi amuta ninquichic: "Yachachiccama canta nin: Maipi tiyan micuna ucu, ñuca runacunahuan pascua micunata micuncapac?".
Pai huasi jahua patapi shuc jatun ucuta" ricuchinca tucui ñucanchic mutsushcacunantin; chaipi micunata allichinquichic.
Chashna rimacpi, Pedrohuan Juanhuan llactaman rishpa, Jesus rimashca shina tarinurca; chaipi pascua micunata allichinurca.
Micuna pacha pactashcapi, Jesus paipac apostolcunahuan micuncapac tiyarirca.
Jesus paicunata nirca: —Yapa munarcani cai: pascua micunata cancunahuan micuncapac, ñuca chaira mana huañushpa.
Cancunata nini: Cai raimita mana cuti rashachu, Diospac pacha pactarinacama.
Chashnapi, shuc basuta japishpa, Diosta pacrachushpa, nirca. —Caita japichic, tucuicuna huasha huasha upiaichic;
cancunata nini, Diospac pacha shamunacama binota mana upiashachu.

Huasha, tantata japishpa, Diosta pacrachurca; chaita paquishpa, paicunaman curca nishpa: —Cai ñuca aichami can, cancunata quispichincapac huañuchishca cana aicha. Ñucata yuyarishpa chaillatata ruranquichic.
Micushca huasha, binota japishpa nirca: —Cai bino Dios runacunaman mushu cushca shimita ricuchic yahuarmi; cai yahuar cancunata quishpichincapac tallishcami can.
Ñucata chasquichinca rac runa caipi can ñuca mayanpi.
Cai RUNA paiman ricushishca ñanpita rin; ¡ailla paita japichic runa!.
Rimacpi, paicunapura tapurinurca pi chari canca chashna ruranca rac.
Apostolcuna paicunapura piñarishpa rimariranurca paicunamanta maican mai jatun can.
Jesus paicunata nirca: —Cai pachapi gubirnu apucuna runacunapac amu cashca shina paicunata pushanun; pushaccunataca "allita ruraccuna" nishpa ninun.
Cancuna mana chashnachu cana canquichic; ranti, cancunamanta maicanpash yalli cashpa, puchucai shina causachun; pushac runaca yanapac runa shina causachun.
Maican yalli can: ¿micuncapa tiyaric runachu? ¿paita carac runachu?. ¿Manachu micuncapac tiyaric runa yalli can?. Chasnapash, ñuca cancunapacpi yanapac runa shina tiyani.
Ñucata ñacachinushcapi, cancuna mana jichuhuarcanquichic.
Chairaicu, cancunaman shuc pachata cunca rani, ñuca Yaya cuhuashca shina.
Chai ñuca pachapi ñucahuan micunquichic, upianquichic ñuca mesallapi. Chashnapi cancuna, apucuna tucushpa, Israel chunca ishcai miraita taripanquichic.
Chai huasha Jesus Pedrota nirca: —Simon, Simon, uyahuai: supai apu, cancunata urmachinayashpa, upata quillachinca;
chashnapash, ñuca canmanta mañarcani can inishcata ama saquincapac. Canca ñucaman cuti ticrashpa, canpac huauquicunata cariyachinqui.
Simon Jesusta nirca: —Apunchic, canta chunta curralpi huichcanucpi, canhuan risha; huañuha cacpica, canhuan pacta huañushami.
Jesus cutiparca: —Pedro, canta nini: cunan tuta cari atallpa chaira mana caparicpi, can "paita mana ricsinichu" nishpa quimsa cuti ninqui.
Chai huasha, Jesus paicunata tapurca: —Ñuca cancunata cullqui illac, shicra illac, ushuta illac cachashcapi, ¿imapash cancunata pishircachu? Cutipanurca: —Mana ima ñucanchicta pishircachu.
Chashnapi paicunata nirca: —Ranti, cunan cullquita charic apachun, shicrata charic apachun. Mircanuta mana charic paipac churanata catuchun mircanuta rantincapac.

Cancunata nini: Quillcashcacuna rimashca ñucapi pactarina can. Cashna quillcara tiyan: "Mana. allita rurac runahuan shina paihuan ruranurca". Ñucamanta quillcashcacuna rimashca illacta pactarina can.
Paita ninurca: —Apunchic; caipi ishcai mircanu tiyan. Jesus cutiparca: —Pacta can.
Chai huasimanta llucshishpa, Jesus paipac yachai, Olivos urcuman rirca; yachachishcacuna paita catinurca.
Chaiman pactashpai, paicunata nirca: —Dios-huan rimaricuichic, ama juchanayai shamucpi urmancapac.
Paicunamanta anchurishpa, runa maquihuan rumita shitashca tupu caruman rishpa, Dios-huan rimarca cashna nishpa: —
Yaya, can munashpa, cai llaquita ñucamanta anchuchi; ranti, ama ñuca munashcata ruraichu, can munashcata rurai.
Rimacpi, jahua pachamanta shuc angel shamushpa, paita sinchicuchirca.
Jesus yapa ñacarishpa, ashtahuan sinchita mañarca. Junpirishpa, paipac junpi yahuar tucurca; shutushpa allpacama tallirirca.
Dios-huan rimashca huasha jatarishpa, yachachishcacuna tiyashcaman ticrarca; llaquirishcamanta puñurashcata paicunata tuparca.
Paicumata nirca: —¿Imaraicu puñuranquichic? Shayarichic, Dios-huan rimarichic ama juchanayaipi urmancapac.
Jesus chaira rimacucpi, achca runacuna pactamunurca; paicunata pushac Judasmi carca, chunca ishcaicunamanta runa. Jesusman mayanyashpa, paita mucharca;
Jesus paita nirca: —Judas, ¿shuc muchahuan cai RUNAta japichinquichu?
Jesus-huan tiyaccuna, tucunca rashcata yachashpa, tapunurca: —Apunchic, ¿mircanuhuan huactashunchu?
Paicunamanta shuc, pacriyaya jatun apupac luncuta huactashpa, paipac rinrita pitirca.
Jesus, chaita ricushpa, nirca: —Saqukhic; pacta can. Luncupac rinrita llancashpa alliyachirca.

Huasha, paita japincapac shamushca pacriyaya apucunata, Diospac huasita ricuccamacunata judio apucunatapash rimarca nishpa: —Shuhua runata japincapac shina caspicunahuan, mircanucunahuan shamushcanquichic.
Caran puncha Diospac huasipi cancunahuan tiyarcani; mana japihuarcanquichic. Ranti cunan cancunapac pachami, supai pachami, pai apu-cana pachami.
Chashna rimacpi, paita japishpa, Jatun pacriyaya apupac huasiman pushanurca. Pedro carumanta Jesusta catirarca.
Huasi patiopi ninata japichishpa tiyarinucpi, Pedropash paicunahuan tiyarirca.
Shuc yanapac huarmi, paita nina mayapi tiyacucpi ricushpa, nirca: —Cai runapash Jesus-huan tiyac carca.
Pedro nirca: —Huarmi, paita mana ricsinichu.
Astanipi, shucca paita ricushpa nirca: —Canpash paipaccunamanta canqui. Pedro cutiparca: —Mana paipaccunamantachu cani.
Unai huasha shuc runa nirca: —Shut pacha, cai runa paihuan tiyac carca, galileo runa mari can.
Pedro nirca: —Runahua, can rimashcata mana yachanichu. Chai ucullapi, Pedro chaira rimaracpi, shuc cari atallpa caparirca.
Jesus ticrashpa Pedroman ricurca. Pedroca Jesus rimashcata yuyarirca, pai nishcapi: "Cunan tuta cari atallpa chaira mana caparicpi, can quimsa cuti ñucamanta ninqui "paita mana ricsinichu".
Chaimanta llucshishpa yapa huacancapac callarirca.
Jesusta ricuc runacuna paita asincapac macancapac cailarinurca.
Paipac ñahuicunata quillpashpa, paita huactashpa tapunurca: —¿Rimai, pimi canta huactan?
Tucui sami shimicunata piñashcahuan paita rimaranurca.
Ña punchayacpi, judio apucuna, pacriyaya apucuna camachic quillcata yachaccunapash tantarinurca; Jesusta paicunapacman pushanurca; chaipi paita tapunurca:
—Rimai, ¿Mesiaschu canqui?. Jesus cutiparca: —Ñuca "ari" nicpi, mana inihuanquichic;
imatapash cancunata tapucpi, mana cutipahuanquiehic.
Chashnapash, caita yachaichic: Cunanmanta cai RUNA ushayuc Dios-huan pacta jahua pachapi tiyanca.
Chaita uyashpa, paita tapunurca: —¿Shinacpi Diospac Churichu canqui? Jesus nirca: —Ari, cancunallata rimarcanquichic: Diospac Churi cani.
Chaita uyashpa, ninurca: —Shuc ricuyac runacunata ña mana mutsunchic. Ñucanchicllata paipac shimimanta uyashcanchic.
Judio apucuna Jesusta taripashca huasha, Pilatopacman paita pushanurca.

Chaiman pactashpa, Jesusta juchachiranurcanishpa: —Cai runa ñucanchic llactapi causaccunata huacllichirashcata tuparcanchic. Gubirnuman pagana cullquita ama paganquichic nishpa camachin; "ñuca Mesias Apu cani" nishpa riman.
Pilato Jesusta tapurca: ¿Judiocunapac Jatun Curacachu canqui? Jesus cutiparca: —Ari, chashnami can.
Pilato pacriyaya apucunata, chaipi tiyac runacunatapash nirca: —Cai runa ima manallita rashcata mana tarinichu.
Paicuna cutillata rimanurca nishpa: —Runacunata huacllichin Judea llactacunapi yachachishcahuan; Galileamanta callarishpa, caicama pactamurca.
Chaita uyashpa, Pilato tapurca: —¿Galileamantachu cai runa?
"Ari" ninucpi, Pilato Jesusta Herodespacman cacharca, pai mari Galileapi apu carca; chai punchacunapi Jerusalenpi tiyarca.
Herodes, Jesusta ricushpa, yapa cushiyarca; paita unaimanta ricunayarca; paimanta achcata uyashcarca mari; "shuc mana raipacta ñuca ñaupacpi ruranca" nishpa yuyararca.
Chairaicu paita unaita tapurca; ranti, Jesus mana shuc shimitapash rimarcachuu.
Pacriyaya apucuna camachic quillcata yachaccunapash Jesusta juchachishpa rimaranurca.
Herodes paihuan tiyaccunantin Jesusta millanurca; paita asishpa, chiuclla ricuric churanata churachinurca; chai huasha Pilatopacman cutillata paita cacharca.
Chai punehallapitac Herodes-huan Pilatohuan llaquicpura tucunurea, chai pachacama chicnicpura canurca mari.
Pilato, pacriyaya apucunata judio apucunatapash tantachishpa, nirca: —
Cai runata ñucapacman pushamurcanquichic, "tucui runacunata huacllichin" nishpa. Cancunapac ñaupacpi paita tapurcani; cancuna juchachishcata mana tupanichu paipi;
Herodespash paipi ima mana allita mana tupashpa, ñucapacman cutillata cachamurca. Cai runa mana huañuchipacchu can.
Chairaicu, paita llipachishpa cacharishami.
Raimi punchapi Pilato runacunata cushichincapac shuc chimta curralpi huichcashca runata cacharina carca.
Chaita uyashpa tucui runacuna shuclla shina caparinurca: —¡Cai runata huañuchi, Barrabasta cachari!
Barrabas, shuc runata huañuchishcamanta, runacunata macanacuncapac jatarichishcamanta, chunta curralpi huichcara carca)
Pilato, Jesusta quishpichinata munashpa, paita juchachiccunahuan rimarirca;
paicuna caparinurca: —¡Paita chacatai, paita chacatai!
Quimsaniqui cuti Pilato paicunata nirca: —¿Ima manallita rurarca? Cai runa mana huañchipacchu can; chairaicu, paita llipachishpa cacharishami.
Paicuna ashtahuan sinchi caparinurea, "paita huañuchina can" nishpa.
Pilato uyashpa paicunata nirca: —Cancuna mañashcata rurasha.
Barrabasta cacharishpa, Jesusta paicunaman curca, paihuan paicuna munashcata rancapac.
Jesusta huañuchincapac pushashpa riranucpi, chacramanta shamucuc runata japinurca, Simon shutiyuc Cirene llactamanta runa; crusta marcachinurca Jesuspac huashalla apancapac.
Achca runacuna huarmicunapash huacashpa, llaquirishpa Jesusta catiranurca.
Jesus ticrashpa nirca: —Jerusalen huarmicuna, ñucamanta ama huacaichichu, cancuna quiquinmanta cancunapac huahuacunamanta huacaichic.
Shuc puncha cashna rimarinca: "Huahua illac huarmicuna, cushiyaichic; mana huicsayuc huarmicuna, mana chuchuchic huarmicunapash cushiyanuchun".
Chashnapi, urcucunaman caparinunca nishpa: "Ñucanchic jahuapi urmaichic, ñucachicta quillpaichic".
Chahua caspihuan chashna rurashpa, imata chaquishca yurahuan ruranunca?.
Jesus-huan pacta huañuchincapac ishcai shuhua runata pushanurca.
Calvario urcuman pactanushcapi, Jesusta chacatanurca; paihuan pacta, ishcai shuhua runacunatapash: shucta alli maquipi, shucta lluqui maquipi.
Jesus nirca: —Yaya, paicunata quishpichipailla, paicuna rashcata mana mari yachanun. Suldarucuna paipac churanacunata japinurca lichayuc tucushcacuna.
Runacuna tucui chaipi tucushcata ricuranurca. Judio apucuna Jesusta asinurca cashna nishpa: —Shuccunata quishpichirca; pai quiquinta quishpichichun Diospac Mesias cashpa, Dios acllashca cashpa.
Suldarucunapash asinurca; jayac binota upiachishpa ninurca: —
Can judiocunapac jatun Curaca cashpa, canllatata quishpichi.
Crus umapi quillcashca tiyarca cashna nishpa: "Cai judiocunapac jatun Curacami".
Chacatashca shuhuacunamanta shuc Jesusta pihashpa nirca: —¿Manachu Mesias canqui? Can quiquinta quishpichi, ñucanchitapash quishpichi.
Ranti, shuc shuhua runa paipac mashita piñashpa nirca: —Can paihuan pacta huañurashpa, ¿manachu Diosta manchanqui?
Ñucanchic mana allita rashcaraicu ñacachi tucunchic; ranti, pai imapash mana allita mana rarcachu.
Huasha Jesusta nirca: —Jesus, can apu tucushpa canpac huasiman pactashpa, ñucata yuyaripanqui.
Jesus paita cutiparca: —Shuti pacha nini, cunan punchallapi ñucahuan pacta jahua pachaman yaicunqui.
Chaupi punchapi inti quillparirca, tucui allpapi yanayarca chaupi chishicama.
Diospac huasipi huarcurashca cortina chaupita lliquirirca.
Jesus sinchi shimihuan nirca: —¡Yaya, ñuca samaita canpac maquipi saquini! Chashna nishpa huañurca.
Suldaru apu, tucusheata ricushpa, Diosta chaccharca nishpa: —Shuti pacha, cai runa alli runa carca.
Tucui chaita ricuncapac tantarishca runacuna, tucushcata ricushpa, llaquirishpa huasiman ticranurca.
Jesusta ricsiccuna, Galileamanta paita catishpa huarmicunapash carumanta tucuita ricunurca.
Tiyarca shuc alli runa, Jose shutiyuc, Judeapi tiyac Arimatea llactamanta; pacriyaya apucunamanta carca.
Chai runa Diospac pachata chapararca, chairaicu chai apucuna Jesusta huañuchincapac rurashcata Jose mana munarcachu.
Chashna cacpi, chai runa apu Pilatopacman rishpa, Jesuspac aichata mañarca.
Paita crusmanta uraicuchishpa, churanahuan pillushpa, shuc rumipi allashca jutcupi panparca; chai jutcupi manapí chaira panpai tucushcachu carca.
Pascua allichina punca carca; samana puncha ña callarinca racurca.
Jesus-huan Galileamanta shamushca huarmicuna, Joseta catishpa, aya panpana jutcuta ricunurca; imashna Jesuspac aichata panpanushcata ricunurca.
Huasiman 'ticrashpa, asnac yacuta; asnac huirata allichinurca, Chai huasha, samana puncha cacpi, samanurca Dios rurai nishcata pactachishpa.
Samana naupac puncha, tutamantashitu, huarmicuna asnaccunata apashpa, aya jutcunamn ticranurca.
Chaiman pactashpa, jutcuta quillpac rumita anchuchishcata ricunurca;
jutcuman yaicushpa, Jesuspac aichata mana tupanurcachu.
Mancharishpa, "imata tucurca" nishpa yuyanucpi, ishcai runa yuraclla churarishca ricurimunurca, paicunapac mayanpi shayarinurca.
Huarmicuna, paicunata ricushpa, yapa mancharishpa, urai uma saquirinucpi, chai runacuna ninurca: —¿Imaraicu causacta huañushcacuna ucupi mashcanquichic?
Mana caipichu, ña causarirca. Chaira Galileapi tiyashcapi cancunaman rimashcata yuyarichic; cashna nishcarca:
"Cai RUNA juchayuccunaman cui tucunca, paita cruspi huañuchinunca; chashnapash quimsa puncha huasha causarincami".
Chai shimicunata uyashpa, huarmicuna Jesus rimashcata yuyarinurca;
aya jutcumanta llucshishpa, chunca shuc apostolcunapacman ticranurca; shuccunapash paicunahuan tiyanurca. Tucuita paicunaman huillanurca.
Chai huarmicuna Maria Magdalena, Juana, Santiagopac huarmi Maria canurca shuc huarmicunapash.
Ricushcata apostolcunaman huillanucpi, mana uyanushcachu, "cai huamicuna yanca rimanun, nuspashcallata huillanun" nishpa.
Ranti, Pedro jatarishpa, callpashpa aya jutcuman rirca; pactashpa, ucuman ricushpa, aichata pillunushca churanacunallata ricurca, Ima tucushcata yuyarashpa, mancharishpa huasiman ticrarca.
Chai punchallapi, ishcai Jesus yachachishcacuna Emaus nishca tacsha llactaman riranurca. Chai llacta Jerusalenmanta shuc puncha purina carca.
Paicuna rirashpa, Jerusalenpi tucushcata rimariranurca.
Rimarishpa riranucpi, quiquin Jesus llutarimushpa paicunahuan rirarca.
Paita ricucushpallata, Jesus cashcata mana yachanurca.
Jesus paicunata tapurca: —¿Imata rimariranquichic purirashpa?
Paicuna yapa llaquirishpa shayarinurca. Paicunamanta shuc, Cleofas shutiyuc, cutiparca: —¿Canllachu Jerusalenpi tucushcata mana yachanqui?
Jesus tapurca: —¿Ima tucushca cuti? Ninurca: —Nazaretmanta Jesusman tucushca. Profeta runami carca. Diospac ñaupacpi, runacunapac ñaupacpi yapa ushayuc carca pai rurashcahuan pai rimashcahuanpash.
Chashna cacpipash, pacriyaya apucuna ñucanchic gubirnu apucunapash paita cautsayachishpa huañuchinurca, cruspi chacatanurca.
Pai tucui Israel runacunata quishpichinca rashcata yuyarcanchic; ranti, pai huañushcamanta ha quimsa puncha can.
Huaquin huarmicuna ñucanchicta manchachinurca. Tutamantashitu aya jutcuman rinurca;
ayata mana tupashpa, ticranurca "angelcunata tuparcanchic" nishpa.
Ñucanchicmanta huaquincuna aya jutcuman rinurca, huarmicuna rimashca shina tucuita tupanurca; ranti, Jesusta mana tupanurcachu.
Paicuna rimashcata uyashpa Jesus nirca: —¡Upacunalla, yuyai illac shina canquichic profetacuna rimashcata mana atipashpa!.
¿Manachu Mesias chai llaquicunata aparina carca jahua pachaman yaicuncapac?
Moisesmanta callarishpa, profetacuna quillcashcata catishpa, quillcacuna Mesiasmanta rimashcata yachachirca.
Chashna yachachicucpi, paicunapac llacta mayanman pactanurca; Jesusca nic tucushpa, caruman ric shina tucurca.
Paicuna paita jarcanurca nishpa: —Ñucanchihuan saquiripailla, ña tutayaran, puncha tucuriran.
Chashna rimanucpi, Jesus huasiman yaicurca paicunahuan saquirincapac. Huasha, micuncapae tiyarishpa, tantata japirca; Diosta pacrachushpa, chaita paquishpa paicunaman cureca.
Chai ucullapi, paicunapac ñahuicuna pascarinurca; Jesusea ña chincarishca carca.
Chashna tucucpi, rimanacunurca: —Pai nanpipi rimarishcapi quillcacunata atipachishpa, ¿manachu ñucanchic shuncu cushiyashpa rupararca?
Jatarishpaca; Jerusalenman ticranurca. Chunca shuc apostolcunata tantarishcata tupanurca shuc Jesusta caticcunahuan pacta.
Chaipi tantariccuna paicunaman huillanurca nishpa: —Apunchic causarimushcami, Simon Pedroman ricurimushcami.
Paicunapash ñanpipi tucushcata huillanurca, "Paita tantata paquishcapi ricsircanchic" nishpa.
Chashna rimariranucpi, quiquin Jesus paicunapacpi ricurimurca; paicunata salurashpa nirca: —¿Ganas causaita charichic!
Rimacpi uyashpa, mancharinurca "ayachu imata" nishpa.
Jesus paicunata nirca: —¿Imaraicu mancharinquichic? ¿Imaraicu ñuca aya cashcata yuyacunquichic?
Ñuca maquicunata chaquicunata ricuichic; ñucallami cani. Llancahuaichic, ayaca aichata tullutapash mana charinchu; ñuca aichayuc cani.
Chashna rimashpa, chaquicunata maquicunata paicunaman ricuchirca.
Paicuna cushimanta chaira mana ininucpi, upa shina tiyanucpi, Jesus paicunata nirca: —¿Micunata charinquichichu ñucata carancapac?
Cusashca challuata caranurca.
Jesus chaita japishpa, paicunapac naupacpi micurca,
Huasha nirca: —Ñucapi tucushca ñuca cancunahuan tiyashpa rimashca pactarincapac tucurca, chashna mari Moisespac quillcapi, profetacunapac quillcapi, salmos nishca quillcapi quillcara tiyarca.
Chashnapi, paicunapac yuyaita pascachirca quillcashcacunata atipana ushancapac, cashna nishpa: —
Caimi quillca nishca: Mesias huañuna can, quimsa punchapi causarina can;
paipac shutipi tucui llactacunapi, Jerusalenmanta callarishpa, Diosman ticranuchun juchacuna pichai tucuncapac uyachina can.
Cancuna chai tucuita yachanquichic cancunallata ricushcaraicu.
Uyahuaichic: Ñuca Yaya cusha nishcata cancunaman cachashami; Jerusalen llactapi saquirichic jahuamanta shamuna ushaita chasquinacama.
Chaita rimashca huasha, Jesus paicunata Betaniaman pusharca; chaiman pactac, maquicunata jahuaman rashpa, paicunata bendisiarca.
Bendisiacucpi, paicunamanta anchurishpa, jahua pachaman pushai tucurca
Paicuna, Jesusta yupaichashca huasha, yapa cushiyashpa, Jerusalenman ticranurca;
punchantin Diospac huasipi tiyaccuna carca, Diosta chacchashpa.
Callaripi Dios Rimashca shimi tiyarca; Causac Rimashca Shimica Dios-huan pacta tiyarca, Dios mari carca,
Callari pacha, cai Causac Rimashca Shimi Dios-huan pacta tiyarca.
Pairaicu tucuilla tiyancapac callarirca; cai Causac Rimashca Shimi illac mana ima rurarishcachu.
Paipacpi causai tiyararca, cai causaica runa yuyaita punchayachic carca.
Cai puncha tutapi achicyarca, tutaca punchata mana chasquircachu.
Shuc Dios cachashca Juan shutiyuc runa ricurimurca.
Cai runa punchata ricsichincapac shamurca, pai rimashcamanta tucui runa ininuchun nishpa.
Chai runa mana punchachu carca; punchata ricuchincapac shamurca.
Causac Rimashca Shimi shuti puncha carca; cai pachaman shamurca runapac yuyaita achicyachincapac.
Causac Rimashca Shimi cai pachapi tiyarca; paimanta Dios cai pachata rurashcapipash, cai pacha runacuna paita mana ricsinurcachu.
Paipaccunapacman shamurca, paipaccunaca paita mana chasquinurcachu.
Ranti, paita chasquishcacunaman, paipi inishcacunaman Diospac churi tucuna ushanata curca.
Chai Causac Rimashca Shimi mana runa munaimantachu shamun, mana runa yahuarmantachu shamun, Diosmantallami shamun.
Chai Causac Rimashca Shimi runa tucurca, ñucanchihuan causarca, llaquishcahuan shutihuanpash juntashca. Ñucanchic paita sumacyachishcata ricurcanchic, Dios Yayapac shuclla Churi cashcamanta.
Juan paimanta rimarca nishpa: "Caimi ñuca rimashca runa; ñuca paimanta rimarcani nishpa: Nuca huashalla shamuc ashtahuan jatunmi; ñuca chaira mana pacarishcapi, pai causararca mari".
Pai tucuita charic cashpa, pai charishcamanta tucui laya allita cuti cuti chasquircanchic.
Camachic quillcata Moisesmanta charinchic; imata can llaquina, imata can shuti Jesuscristota ricushpa yachanchic.
Manapí Diosta ricurcachu; paipac shuclla Churi —paipash Dios cashpa, Yayahuan pacta tiyan— Diosta ñucanchicman ricsichirca.
Shuc puncha, Jerusalenmanta judio apucuna pacriyayacunata levitacunatapash Juanpacman cachanurca paita tapuncapac: —¿Can pitac canqui?
Pai pasacta rimarca: —Ñuca mana Mesiaschu cani.
Cutillata tapunurca: —¿Eliaschu canqui? —Mana -nirca. —¿Shamuna cac profetachu canqui? —Mana-nirca.
Chashna nicpi, paicuna cutillata tapunurca: —¿Pitac canqui? ¿Can quiquinmanta imata ninqui? Rimai, ñucachicta cachashcacunaman can imatapash cutipashcata apana canchic.
Juan paicunata cutiparca: —Ñuca chunlla allpamanta shamuc runami cani; cai shimita huillancapac shamuni: "Apunchicraicu shuc cusca ñanipita pascaichic", profeta Isaias rimshca shina.
Huaquincuna fariseo bulamanta canurca.
Paicuna cutillata tapunurca: —Can mana Mesias cashpa, mana Elias cashpa, mana profeta cashpa, ¿imaraicu bautisanqui?
Juan cutiparca: —Nuca yacullahuan bautisani; cancuna ucupi shuc cancuna mana ricsishca runa tiyanmi, ñuca huashalla shamuc runa.
Paipac ushutapac huascata pascancapacpash mana allichu cani.
Chai tucui Betaniapi, Jordan yacu chinpapi tucurca; chaipi Juan bautisac carca.
Cayantin puncha, Juan, Jesusta paipacman shamuracpi ricushpa, nirca: —Caimi Diospac Cordero, cai pacha juchata maillac runa.
Paimantami rimarcani nishpa: Ñuca huashalla shuc runa shamunmi; pai ñucamanta ashtahuan jatunmi; ñuca chaira mana pacarishcapi, pai causararca.
Pai pi cashcata mana yacharcanichu; chashnapash, yacuhuan bautisancapac shamurcani paita judiocunaman ricsichisha nishpa.
Huasha nirca: —Diospac Samaita jahua pachamanta urpi shina uraicushcata ricurcani, Jesuspac jahuapi shayarirca.

Pai pi cashcata chai pacha chaira mana yacharcanichu; chashnapash, yacuhuan bautisancapac ñucata cachamuc Dios nihuarca: "Can, Samai uraicushpa shuc runa jahuapi shayarirashcata ricucpi, paimi Diospac Samaihuan bautisanca".
Ñuca paita ricushca huasha nini: Pai Diospac Churimi can.
Cayantiman, Juan ishcai yachachishcacunahuan chaipi tiyarca.
Jesusta chaita purishcata ricushpa, nirca: —¡Ricuichic, caimi Diospac Cordero!
Yachachishcacuna, chaita uyashpa, Jesusta catishpa rinurca.
Jesus ticrashpa, paita catinucpi ricushpa, paicunata tapurca: —¿Imata mashcanquichic? Cutipanurca: —¿Yachachiccama, maipi causanqui?
Jesus cutiparca: —Ricuc shamuichic. Paicuna Jesus-huan rishpa, maipi causashcata ricunurca; chaipi saquirinurca, chishinaya mari carca.
Chai Juan rimashcata uyashpa Jesusta catishcacuna, shuc Andres carca, Simon Pedropac huauqui.
Andres huauqui Simonta mashcancapac rirca; paita tupashpa nirca: —Uyai, Mesiasta tuparcanchic (Mesias nishpa "Cristo'' nin). Paitaca Jesuspacman pusharca.
Jesus Simonman ricushpa saquirirca; huasha nirca: —Can Juanpac churi Simon canqui; Cefas shutichishcanqui (Cefas nishpa "rami" nin).
Cayantiman, Jesus Galileaman risha nishpa, Felipe-huan tuparirca; paita nirca: —Nucahuan shamui.
Chai runa Betsaida nishca llactamanta carca; chai llactamantallata canurca Andres-huan Pedrohuan.
Felipe, Natanaelhuan tuparishpa, paita nirca: —Uyai, Moises camachic quillcapi rimashca runata tuparcanchic; profetacunapash paimanta rimanurca: paimi Nazaretmanta Jesus, Josepac churi.
Rimacpi uyashpa Natanael nirca: —¿Nazaretmanta ima allipash llucshincachu? Felipe nirca: —Ricuc shamui.
Jesus, Natanael shamuracpi ricushpa, paimanta nirca: —Caimi shuc alli israelita runa, mana umachic runa.
Natanael paita tapurca: —¿Imamanta ricsihuanqui ñucata? Jesus cutiparca: —Chaira Felipe carita maria cayashcapi, can higuera yura llantupi samacucpi, canta ricurcani.
Chaita uyashpa, Natanael nirca: —Yachachiccama, can Dipspac Churi canqui, Israelmanta Jatun Curaca canqui.
Jesus cutiparca: —¿"Can higuera yura llantupi samarashcata ricurcani" nishpa nishcamanta ininquichu? Astahuan jatuncunata ricunqui.
Ari, shuti nini: Shuc puncha, jahua pacha pascarata ricunquichic; Diospac angelcuna cai RUNA jahuapi sicashcata uraicushcatapash ricunquichic.
Ishcai puncha huasha, Galileamanta Cana nishca llactapi shuc sahuarina tiyarca; Jesuspac mama chaipi tiyarca.
Jesuspash yachachishcacunantin sahuarinaman cayashcami carca.
Micuranucpi, bino tucurishca; Jesuspac mama chaita ricushpa, Jesusta nirca: —Churi, bino tucurishcami.
Jesus cutiparca: —Huarmi, ¿imata rimac shamuhuanqui? Ñuca pacha chaira mana pactamurcachu.
Chaita uyashpa, Jesuspac mama yanapaccunaman nirca: —Jesus rimanca rashcata ruranquichic.
Chaipi sucta jatun rumi manca tiyarca, judiocuna maillarincapac; caran manca shuc patsac litro tupushi carca.
Jesus yanapaccunata nirca: —Mancacunata yacuhuan juntachichic. Manñacama juntachinurca;
huasha Jesus nirca: —Cunan mancamanta huishishpa, raimicamata upiachichic. Upiachinurca.
Paica bino tucushca yacuta upiarca, maimanta apamunushcata mana yachaspa (yacuta huishiccuna yachanurca)
Upiacpi, cusa-canata cayashpa nirca: —Tucui raimicunapi ñaupacta alli binota upiachinun; cayashcacuna ña shincayanucpi, upa binota upiachinun. Ranti, can alli binota puchucaicama huacaichircanqui.
Chashnami Jesus Cana llactapi ñaupac mana raipacta rurarca; chaita ricushpa, yachachishcacuna paipi ininurca.
Chai huasha, Jesus paipac mamantin aillucunantin yachachishcacunantin Cafarnaun llactaman rirca; chaipi shuc punchacuna saquirirca.
Judiocunapac pascua nishca raimi pactamuracpi, Jesus Jerusalenman sicarca.
Diospac huasipi achca runa tiyarca; huacracunata, obejacunata, urpicunata caturanurca; cullquita turcaccuna mesa muyucta tiyacunurca.
Jesus, chaita ricushpa, huasca huancuhuan tucuicunata Diospac huasimanta callpachirca huacracunantin obejacunantin; cullquita allpaman jichurca, mesacunata ticrachishpa.
Urpicunata catuccunata nirca: —¡Chaita anchuchichic caimanta! ¡Ñuca Yaya huasita ama catuna huasita raichichu!
Chaita ricushpa, yachachishcacuna ñaupa profetacuna quillcashcata yuyarinurca; cashna quillcara tiyarca: Canpac huasita ricushpa, llaquirishpa huañunayahuan.
Judiocuna paita tapunurca: —¿Can chaita rancapac ushaita charishcata ricuchincapac, ima munanayacta ricurishcata ruranqui?
Jesus cutiparca: —Cai Diospac huasita urmachichic; ñucaca quimsa punchapi shayachisha.
Judiocuna paita ninurca: —Chuscu chunca sucta huatata cai huasita ruranapi llancanurca, canca quimsa punchallapi shayachisha ninquichu?
Jesus "cai huasita" nishpa paipac quiquin aichamanta nishcarca.
Pai huañushcamanta causarishcapi, yachachishcacuna chai Jesus rimashcata yuyarinurca; Dios quillcashcata Jesus rimashca shimicunatapash ininurca.
Jesus Jerusalenpi tiyashcapi pascua punchacuna, achca runacuna pai mana, raipaccunata ruracpi ricushpa, paipi ininurca.
Ranti, Jesus "paicunapi mana inishcachu, tucuicunata ricsirca mari.
Manapita tapushpallata, runapac shuncu ucupi tiyashcata yacharca.
Tiyarca shuc runa fariseo bulamanta, Nicodemo shutiyuc, judiocunapacpi jatun runa.

Chai runa Jesus-huan rimarincapac tuta rishpa, paita nirca: —Yachachiccama, canta Dios cachashcata ñucanchicta yachachincapac yachanchic; manapipash can rashcacunata rana ushanman, Dios mana paihuan tiyashcapi.
Jesus paita nirca: —Shuti pacha canta nini: Maicanpash mana cuti pacarishpa, Diospac pachata mana ricuna ushancachu.
Nicodemo paita tapurca: —¿Imashna shuc runa pacarina ushanca rucu cashpa? ¿Mamapac huicsapi yaicuna ushancachu cutillata pacarincapac?
Jesus cutiparca: —Shuti canta nini: Shuc runa yacumanta Samaimantapash mana pacarishpa, Diospac pachapi mana yaicuna ushancachu.
Aichamanta aichalla pacarin; Samaimanta samai pacarin.
Ama mancharichu "cutillata pacarina canquichic" nishpa nuca nishcamanta.
Huaira maipipash huairan; huairashcata uyanqui; ranti, huaira maimanta shamushcata, maiman rirashcata mana yachaipac can. Chashnallata tucun Samaimanta pacarishcacunata.
Chashha nicpi uyashpa; Nicodemo tapurca: —¿Imashnata can rimashca tucunca?
Jesus paita cutiparca: —Can Israelpi yachachiccama cashpa, ¿manachu chaicunata yachanqui?
Shuti nini, ñucanchic yachashcata rimanchic, ricushcata huillanchic chashnapash, ñucanchic huillashcata mana ininquichic.
Ñuca cai pachamanta rimashcata cancuna mana inishpa, jahuapachamanta rimacpi pishi inihuanquichic.
Manapí jahua pachaman sicarcachu; shuc runalla sicarca, jahua pachamanta uraicushca runa, paimi cai RUNA.
Moises chunlla allpapi shuc machacuita caspipi shayachishca shina, cai RUNApash shayachishcami canca,
paita iniccuna huiñai causaita charincapac.
"Dios runacunata yapa llaquishpa, paipac shuclla churita paicunaman cuyarca, paita iniccuna ama chincarinuchun nishpa, ranti huiñai causaita charinuchun.
Dios paipac Churita mana cachamurcachu cai pachata cautsayachincapac, cai pachata quishpichincapac paita cachamurca.
Diospac churita inic runa mana taripashcachu, canca; ranti, mana iniccuna ña taripashca canun, Diospac shuclla churita mana inishcamanta.
Mana iniccuna cautsayachishca canun cairaicu: Puncha cai pachaman shamurca; runacunaca tutata punchamanta ashtahuan munanurca, paicuna rashcacuna mana alli cashcaraicu.
Mana allita ruraccuna punchata chicninun, punchaman mana shamunun, ama paicuna rurashca ricurincapac.
Ranti, allita ruraccuna punchaman shamunun paicuna rashcacuna Dios munashca shina cashcata ricuchincapac.
Chaipac huasha, Jesus yachachishcacunantin Judea suyuman rirca; chaipi paicunahuan causashpa bautisac carca.
Juanpash Enon nishca panpapi, Salin mayanpi bautisacurca, chaipi yacu achca tiyarca mari, runacunaca chaiman shamuccuna carca bautisai tucuncapac
Chai pacha Juanta chaira mana chunta curralpi huichcanushcarca.
Shuc puncha, Juanta caticcunahuan shuc judiocunahuan paicunapufa piñarishpa, bautisarinamanta rimarincapac callarinurca.
Juanpacman rishpa, paita ninurca: —Yachachiccama, Jordan yacu chinpapi canhuan tiyashca runa, can rimashca runa, cunan paipash bautisaran, tucuicunaca paita catinun.

Juan paicunata nirca: —Runa mana imata amuyana ushan, Dios mana munacpi. Cancunallata uyahuarcanquichic "ñuca mana Mesiaschu cani" nishpa nishcapi, ñuca "paita ñaupashpa cachashca runami cani" nishcapi.
Shuc sahuarinapi, cusa-cana huarmicanata japin; cusa-canapac mashi, paita uyashpa cushiyan paita llaquishcaraicu. Ñucapash cunan yapa cushiyani;
paita mari tucuicuna catina canun; ñucata saquihuanucpi alli canman.
Jahuamanta shamuc tucuicunamanta yalli can; cai pachamanta shamuc cai pachamantami can, cai pachapaccunamanta riman. Ranti, jahua pachamanta shamuc tucuimanta yalli can;
pai uyashcata ricushcatapash riman; chashnapash pai rimashcata manapí uyan.
Pai rimashcata uyac runa Dios shutita rimashcata ricuchin;
Dios cachashca runa Diospac shimicunata riman, Dios paipac samaita mana mitsashpa cuyan.
Yaya Churita llaquin, tucuita Churipacpi mincashpa saquirca;
Churita inic runa huiñai causaita charin; ranti, Churita mana inishachu nic runa causaita mana ricuncachu, Diospac piñaita aparinca.

Jesusta caticcuna pai bautisashcacunapash Juan-paccunamanta yalli achca canurca (quiquin Jesuscristo mana bautisacchu carca; yachachishcacuna bautisaccuna carca). Fariseocuna chaita uyanurca; chairaicu, Jesus Judea suyuta saquishpa, Galileaman ticrarca.
Samaria nishca suyuta rina carca; chaita purishpa,
Jesus Sicar nishca llactaman pactarca; chai llacta mayanpi Jacob paipac churi Joseman cushca allpa tiyarca.
Chaipi tiyan Jacobpac yacu pucru. Jesus purishpa sanpayacpi, yacu pucru mayanpi tiyarirca. Chaupi punchashi carca.
Samariamanta shuc huarmi yacuta huishincapac shamurca. Jesus paita nirca: —Yacuta upiachihuai.
Yachachishcacuna llactaman rinushcarca micunata rantincapac.

Chai huarmi "yacuta upiachihuai" nishcata uyashpa, Jesusta nirca. —¿Can judio runa cashpa, "upiachihuai" nishpa mañahuanquichu, ñuca Samariamanta huarmi cacpipash? (judiocunahuan Samaria runacunahuan mana munarishpa causanun).
Chashna rimacpi Jesus paita nirca: —Can Dios cushcata ricsishpa, yacuta mañaracta ricsishpa, paita mañanquiman, paica causana yacuta canta cuyanman.
Huarmi nirca: —Apulla, imahuan yacuta huishincapac mana charinquichu, yacu pucruca yapa cucha can; ¿maimanta causana yacuta surcunqui?
¿Can ñucanchic yaya Jacobmanta yallichu canqui? Pai cai yacu pucruta ñucanchicman saquirca; cai yacumanta paillata upiarca, paipac churicunapash paipac huacracunapash upianurca.
Chashna nicpi uyashpa Jesus nirca: —Cai yacuta upiac runa cuti upianayancami; ranti, ñuca cunca rashca yacuta. upiac, huiñaipac mana upianayancachu.
Ñuca cushca yacuca runa ucumanta llucshishca pululuc yacu shina canca, mana tucuric causaita cuncapac.
Chaita uyashpa huarmi nirca: —Apulla, chai yacuta upiachihuai ama cuti upianayancapac, ama caiman shamuncapac yacuta huishincapac.
Jesus paita nirca: —Canpac carita mashcacri; tupashpa, caiman shamunquichic.
Huarmi nirca: Cari illac cani. Jesus cutiparca: —Shutita rimanqui cari illac cani nishpa.
Pichca carita charircanqui; cunan charishcaca mana canpac carichu.
Huarmi nirca: —Apulla, ñuca yuyacpi, tucuita yachac canqui.
Ñucanchic ñaupacuna cai urcuman shumuccuna carca Diosta yupaichancapac; cancunaca Jerusalenpi Diosta yupaichana can ninquichic.
Chashna rimacpi, Jesus cutiparca: —Uyahuai, huarmi; shuc puncha mana cai urcupi, mana Jerusalenpi Dios Yayata yupaichanquichic; chai puncha ña pactamuran.
Samariamanta runacuna, mana ricsishcata yupaichanquichic; ñucanchic, judiocuna, pitata yupaichashcata yachanchic, quishpichina judiocunamanta shamun mari.
Chashna cacpipash, cunanmanta pacha shuti yupaichaccuna shuncuhuan, mana shimillahuan Dios Yayata yupaichanunca, Diospac Samai munashca shina. Chai laya yupaichaccunata Dios mashcan.
Dios Samaimi can; Diosta yupaichaccuna yuyaihuan yupaichana canun, Diospac Samai munashca shima.
Chaita uyashpa, huarmi nirca: —Mesias (Cristo shutichishca) shamunca rashcata yachani. Pai shamushpa, tucuita ñucanchicta yachachinca.
Jesus paita nirca: —Canhuan rimacuc Mesiasmi, ñuca Mesiasmi cani.

Chashna rimariranucpi, Jesus yachachishcacuna pactamunurca; pai shuc huarmihuan rimarirashcamanta mancharinurca. Chashnapash, manapí paita tapurca "imatata munanqui", "imatata cai huarmihuan rimaranqui" nishpa.
Huarmi, mancata chaipi saquishpa, llactaman callpashpa rirca, runacunaman huillancapac.
Paicunata nirca: —Ricuc shamuichic shuc runata. Pai nuca rurashcata tucuita rimahuarca. ¿Manachu Mesias canca? Rimacpi uyashpa, achca runacuna llactamanta shamunurca Jesuspacman.
Paicuna shamunacama, yachachishcacuna cuti cuti Jesusta rimanurca nishpa: —Yachachiccama, micuilla.
Jesus paicunata nirca: —Ñuca micunata charini, cancuna mana ricsishca micuna,
Chaita uyashpa, yachachishcacuna paicunapura rimarinurca nishpa: —¿Maicanpash paita carashcachu canca?
Jesus paicunata nirca: —Ñuca micuna caimi: Ñucata cachamuhuashca rimashcata pactachina cani, pai callarishcata tucuchina cani.
¿Manachu ninquichic "pallana pachacama chaira chuscu quilla pishin"? Ranti ñuca cancunata nini: Tarpushcacunata ricuichic, pallancapac tucui ha pucura can.
Pallac runa yapachishcata japin; pai pallashca huiñai causancapac can; chashna, tarpuc runahuan pallac runahuan pacta cushiyanun.
Cai rimashca shuti can: "Shuc tarpun, shuc pallan"
Cancuna mana tarpushcata pallancapac cacharcani; shuc runacuna llancanurca, cancunaca paicuna llancashcata japinquichic.
Achca chai Samaria llactamanta runacuna Jesusta ininurca huarmi huillashcamanta, "ñuca rurashcata tucuita huillahuarca" nishpa nishcapi.
Chairaicu, Samariamanta runacuna Jesuspacman shamushpa, ninurca: —Ñucanchihuan saquiripailla. Chashna mañanucpi, Jesus ishcai puncha chaipi saquirirca.
Jesus nishcata uyashpa, ashtahuan achca runacuna paita ininurca.
Huarmitaca ninurca: —Cunan mana can rimashcamanta ininchic. Ñucanchicllata paita uyashpa, pai cai pachata quishpichic cashcata ininchic.
Ishcai puncha huasha, Jesus Samariamanta llucshishpa, Galileaman rirca.
Jesusllatami nishcarca: Shuc profetata paipac quiquin llactapi mana yupaichanun.

Chashna cacpipash, Galileaman pactashcapi, chaipi causac runacuna cushiyashcahuan paita chasquinurca, pai Jerusalenpi rurashcacunata yuyarishpa, paicunapash chai llactaman rinushcarca pascua raimita rancapac.
Shinacpi, Jesus Cana llactaman shamurca; chai llactapi yacumanta binota rurashcarca. Chaipi shuc aputa yanapac runa tiyarca; paipac churi Cafarnaun llactapi uncushca carca.
Chai runa Jesus Judeamanta Galileaman shamushcata uyashpa, paita ricucrirca; Jesuspacman pactac nirca: —Ñuca churita janpincapac shamupai, huañunalla uncushcacan.
Jesus nirca: —Cancuna, mana raipaccunata munanayacta ricuriccunatapash mana ricushpa, mana ininquichic.
Chai runa cutillata mañarca nishpa: —Apulla, shamupai ñuca churi manara huañucpi.
Rimacpi, Jesus cutiparca: —Rilla, canpac churi alliyashcami can. Chai runa Jesus rimashcata inishpa rirca.
Huasiman riracpi, luncucuna paita tupancapac llucshinurca nishpa: —¡Canpac churi causaran!
Pai tapurca: —¿Imura alliyancapac callarirca? Ninurca: —Caina, chaupi puncha mayanlla, uncui saquirirca.
Ninucpi uyashpa, chai pachallapi Jesus "canpac churi alliyashcami" nishpa rimashcata yuyarirca; chairaicu pai aillucunantin Jesusta ininurca.
Chai mana raipacta Judeamanta Galileaman ticrashpa rurarca; naupa shuc mana raipacta rurashcarca.
Shuc punchacuna huasha, judiocuna shuc raimita ranucpi, Jesus Jerusalenman ticrarca.
Chai llactapi, Obeja nishca puncu mayanpi, shuc uchilla cucha tiyan; hebreo shimipi Betesda ninun; pichca patio tiyan.
Chai patiocunapi achca uncuc runacuna allpapi sirinurca: ñausacuna, janca chaquicuna, suchucuna; tucuicuna yacu cuyurinata chaparanurca.
Maicanpi, shuc angel shamushpa yacuta cuchapi cuyuchic carca. Yacu cuyuricpi yacuman naupac yaicuc runa ima uncuimantapash alliyashca saquiric carca.
Chai uncushcacunapurapi shuc tiyarca, quimsa chunca pusac huatata uncushca.
Jesus paita sirishcata ricushpa, unaimanta uncucushcata yachashpa, paita tpurca: —¿Alliyanata munanquichu?
Chai runa cutiparca: —Apunchic, manapi yacuman pushahuan yacu cuyurishcapi; ñuca yacuman yaicusha nishpa yuyacpi, shuc ñaupashpa rihuan.
Jesus paita nirca: —Shayari, canpac cahuituta apashpa ri.
Chai ucullapi, chai runa allichi tucurca; paipac cahuituta apashpa rirca. Chai puncha samana puncha carca.
Chairaicu, judiocuna paita ninurca: —Cunan puncha samana punchami; cahuituta apana mana allichu.
Pai cutipashpa nirca: —Ñucata alliyachishca runa nihuarca: "Canpac cahuituta apashpa ri".
Paita tapunurca: —¿Pitac can chai runa, canta chashna rimac?
Alliyachi tucushca runa maican paita alliyachishcata mana yacharcachu, Jesus chaipi tiyac ninacuna ucupi chincaricpi.
Astanipi, Jesus Diospac huasipi paita tupashpa nirca: —Uyai, cunan ña alli canqui; ama cuti juchallinquichu, impash yalli sinchi canta tucunman.
Chashna nicpi uyashpa, chai runa judiocunaman huiliacrirca nishpa: —Jesusmi ñucata alliyachihuarca.
Chairaicu judiocuna Jesusta quillachincapac callarinurca, chai laya rashcacunata samana puncha rashcamanta.
Jesus paicunata nirca: —Ñuca Yaya huiñai llancashpa causan, ñucapash llancac cani.
Chaita uyashpa, judiocuna ashtahuan paita huañuchinayanurca, samana puchata mana huacaichishcaraicu; ashtahuanpash, "Dios ñuca yayami" nishpa, paillatata Dios tucun.
Jesus paicunata rimarca nishpa: —Shuti cancunata nini: Churi mana imata pai quiquinmanta rurana ushan; ñaupacta paipac Yaya rurashcata ricun. Yaya rashcata Churipash ruran.
¿Imaraicu? —Yaya Churita llaquishcaraicu, pai rashcata Churiman ricuchin; chaira shuc rashcacuna tiyan yalli jatuncuna; cancuna chaicunata ricushpa mancharinquichic.
Caita uyaichic: Huañushcacunata Yaya causarichin, causaita cutichishpa; chashnallata Churipash causaita cun pai munashcacunaman.
"Yaya manapita taripanchu; taripana ushaita paipac churiman curca,
tucuicuna churita yapaichanuchun nishpa Yayata shina. Churita mana yupaichac runa paita cachashca Yayatapash mana yupaichan.
Shuti cancunata nini: Ñuca rimashcata uyac runa, ñucata cachamushcata inishpa, mana tucuric causaita charin; mana cautsayachi tucunca, huañuimanta causaiman ña chinparca mari.
"Uyahuaichic: Huañushcacuna Dios Churipac shimita uyana pacha ña pactarirca; chai shimita uyaccuna causanuncami.
Yaya tucui causaita charishpa, causaita cuyana ushaita Churiman curca.
Chashnallata, taripana ushaita paiman curca cai RUNA cashcaraicu.
"Ñuca rimarashcamanta ama mancharichichu; tucui huañuscacuna paipac shimita uyana pacha pactamuran mari; chaita uyashpa, pantiocunamanta llucshinunca.
Allita rurashcacuna huiñai causanaman causarinunca; ranti, manallita rurashcacuna cautsayachi tucuncapac causarinunca.
"Ñuca quiquin munaimanta mana imata rana ushani. Ñuca Yaya rimahuacpi taripani, ñuca taripashcaca alli can, cachamunhuashca Yaya munashcata rurac mari cani, mana ñuca munashcata.
Ñuca quiquinpacpi ricuyac cashpa, ñuca rimashca mana imapac canman;
ranti, ñucamanta rimac tiyanmi, pai ñucamanta rimashca shuti can.
"Cancuna runacunata Juanpacman cacharcanquichic ñucamanta tapuncapac, pai rimashcaca shuti can.
Chaita mana rimanichu "ricuyacta mutsuni" nishpa; cancuna quishpichi tucuncapac nishpa rimani.
"Juan achic shina ricuchicurca, cancunaca pai ricuchishcahuan mana unaichu cushiyashun nircanquichic.
Ñuca shuc ñucamanta rimacta charini, Juanmanta yalli cac. Ñuca rurashcacuna Yaya nucata cachamushcata ricuchinun; Yaya mincahuacpi, chai rashcacunata ruracuni.
Cachamuhuashca Yayallata ñucamanta huiñai riman; cancuna mana imura paita uyarcanquichic, mana imura paita ricurcanquichic.
Dios rimashca shimita mana uyanquichic, pai cachamushcata mana inishcamanta.
Dios quillcashcacunata allita ricuc canquichic, chaicunapi huiñai causaita tarishun yuyarishpa; chai quillcashcacunaca ñucamanta rimanun;
ranti, cancuna mashcashca causaita charincapac ñucaman shamunata mana munanquichichu.
"Mana runacunapacpi jahuayachi tucunata munanichu.
Ashtahuanpash, cancunata ricsini, cancuna Diosta mana llaquishcata yachani.
Ñuca Yayapac shutipi shamurcani, cancunaca mana chasquihuanquichic; ranti, shuc paipac quiquin shutipi shamucpi, paita chasquinquichic,
¿Imashna inina ushanquichic cancunapuralla chacchanacushpa causashpa, Diosllapi chacchai tucunata mana munashpa?
Cancunata juchachic Moisesmi, cancuna inishca Moises, "paita ininchic" nishpa ninquichic mari.
Yancamanta chashna rimanquichic. Cancuna Moisesta inishpa, ñucatapash ininquichicman, ñucamanta mari Moises quillcashpa saquirca.
Ranti, cancuna Moises rimashcata mana inishpa, ñuca rimashcata pishi ininquichic.
Shuc punchacuna huasha, Jesus Galipeapi tiyac cucha chinpaman rirca.
Achca runacuna, Jesus uncuccunata janpincapac mana raipaccunata ruracpi ricushpa, paita catinurca.
Jesus shuc urcuman yachachishcacunantin sicashpa, chaipi tiyarirca.
Judiocunapac pascua raimi ña pactamurarca.
Jesus, achca runacuna paita catishpa shamucpi ricushpa, Felipeta nirca: —¿Maipi tantata rantishun caicunata carancapac?
Felipeta camashpalla chashna rimarca, pai ima ranata yacharca mari.
Felipe cutiparca: —Tanta ishcai patsac sucre tupu mana pactancachu, caran shuc ansa micuncapac.
Shuc yachachishca runa, Andres shutiyuc Simon Pedropac huauqui, nirca: —
Caipi tiyan shuc huanpra; pichca cebada tantata ishcai yacu aichantin charin. ¿Pactancachu ima chari tucuicunata carancapac?
Chaita uyashpa Jesus nirca: —Runacunata tiyarichichic. Chai panpa yapa quihuayuc carca; tiyarinucpi, caricunalla pichca huarancashi canurca.
Jesus, tantacunata japishpa, Diosta pacrachushpa, runacunata cararca. Yacu aichatapash cararca, caran shuc munashca tuputa.
Pacta micunucpi, Jesus yachachishcacunata nirca: —Puchushcacunata pallaichic ama imapash huacllirincapac.
Pallanucpi, pichca tantamanta puchuscahuan chunca ishcai ashanca juntarirca.
Runacuna, Jesus chai mana raipacta ruracpi ricushpa, ninurca: -¡Mana pacha! Caimi cai allpaman shamunca rashca profeta.
Chaita. uyashpa, Jesus aputa rancapac paita pushanca rashcata atipashpa, urcu jahuaman sapalla rirca.
Ña tutayaracpi, yachachishcacuna cuchaman uraicunurca;
shuc canuapi yaicushpa, cuchata chinpancapac callarinurca Cafarnaun llactaman pactancapac. Ña unai tuta cacpi, Jesus chaira mana shamushcarca.
Yuyaita huairacpi, yacu piñarirca, jatun bacu jatarinurca.
Cahuishpa cahuishpa paichca kilometro tupu purinucpi, Jesus yacu jahuata purishpa paicunapacman mayanyamushcata ricunurca; mayanyamucpi ricushpa, upata mancharinurca.
Jesus paicunata nirca: —¡Nucami cani, ama manchaichichu!
Paicuna Jesusta canuapi yaicuchishun nishpa, manapash unaipi paicuna rirashca allpaman pactanurca.
Cayantiman, chinpapi saquirishca runacuna shuc canualla tiyashcata ricunurca, chai canuapi yachachishcacunalla rinushcarca. Jesus mana rishcarca paicunahuan.
Tiberiades llactamanta shuc canuacuna shamunurca, Jesus Diosta pacrachushpa runacunata carashca mayanpi llutarishpa.
Chaipi tiyashca runacuna, Jesus yachachishcacunantin illanucpi ricushpa, chai canuacunapi yaicushpa, Jesusta mashcashpa Cafarnaunman rinurca.
Cucha chinpaman pactashpa, yacu patapi Jesusta ricushpa, paita tapunurca: —Yachachiccama, imura caiman pactarcanqui?
Jesus cutiparca: —Shuti pacha nini, cancuna mana mashcahuanquichic mana raipaccunata atipashcamanta, tantata sacsacta micushcamanta mashcahuanquichic.

Tucuric micunamanta ama llancaichichu, shuc sami micunamanta llancaichic, nicpi mana tucuric, huiñai causaita cuc micunamanta; cai RUNA chai micunata cancunata caranca, paita mari Dios Yaya chashna rancapac mincarca.
Chaita uyashpa, tapunurca: —¿Imata rurashpa Dios munashcata rurashun?
Jesus cutiparca: —Caimi Dios munashca: pai cachamushcata inichic.
Chashna nicpi, cuti tapunurca: —¿Ima munanayacta ricuricta ruranqui, ñucanchic chaita ricushpa inincapac?
Ñucanchic ñaupacuna chunlla allpapi "maná" nishca micunata micunurca; cashna mari quillcara tiyan: "Jahua pachamanta tantata paicunata cararca".
Jesus paicunata cutiparca: —Chai jahua pachamanta tantata mana Moiseschu cararca, nuca Yayami quiquin jahua pachamanta tantata caran.
Dios carashca tantaca jahua pachamanta uraicushca runami: paimi runacunata causachic tanta.
Chashna rimacpi, paicuna ninurca: —Apunchic, chai laya tantata huinai ñucanchicta carai.
Jesus cutiparca: —Ñucami cani causaita cuc tanta. Ñucaman shamuc mana imura yarcancachu, nucapi inic mana imura upianayancachu.
Ranti, ña rimarcani, cancuna ñucata ricushpallata mana ininquichic.
Yaya cachashcacuna tucuilla ñucapacman shamunun; ñucapacman shamuc runacunata mana callpachishachu.
Jahua pachamanta mana shamurcanichu ñuca muñashcata rancapac, ñucata cachamuc munashcata rancapac shamurcani.
Ñucata cachamuc Yaya munashca caimi: "Ñuca canman cushcacunata mana shucllatapash chincachinquichu, puchucai puncha tucuicunata causarichinqui", chashna nishpa nihuarca Dios Yaya.
Ñuca Yaya munashca cashna mari can: Diospac Churita ricshispa iniccuna huiñai causaita charinuchun, ñucaca paicunata puchucai puncha causachina cani.
Chairaicu, judiocuna Jesusta huashata rimai callarinurea, pai "ñuca jahuapachamanta uraicushca tantami cani" nishpa nishcamanta.
Paicunapura rimariranurca: —¿Cai Jesus shutiyuc runa manachu Josepac churi can? paipac yayata, paipac mamata ricsinchic. ¿Imaraicu cunan "ñuca jahua pachamanta uraicushcami cani" nin?
Chaslina rimaranucpi, Jesus paicunata nirca: —Ama yanca rimanacuichichu.
Manapí nucaman shamun, ñucala cachamushca Yaya paita mana pushamucpi; ñucaca puchucai puncha paita causarichisha.
"Profetacuna quillcashcacunapi cashna quillcara tiyan: "Dios tucui runacunata yachachinca". Tucui Yayata uyaccuna, paimanta yachacuccunapash ñucaman shamununca.

Manapí Yayata ricurcachu; shucllami paita ricurca: Paimanta shamuc runa, pailla Yayata ricurca. "Shuti pacha cancunata nini: Ñucapi imc mana rucuric causaita charin. Ñuca causaita cuc tantami cani.
Cancunapac ñaupacuna chunlla allpapi "maná" nishca mucunata micunurca, micushpallata huañunurca;
ranti, ñuca jahua pachamanta uraicuc tantamanta rimani; chaita micuc runa mana huañunchu.
Ñuca jahua pachamanta uraicushca causac tantami cani; chai tantata micuc huiñai causanca. Ñuca cunca rashca tantaca ñuca aichami can; chaita cushami runacuna causancapac.
Chashna rimacpi, judiocuna paicunapura piñashpa rimai callarinurca, nishpa: —¿Imashnami cai runa paipac quiquin aichata ñucanchicta caranca?
Jesus paicunata nirca: —Shuti cancunata nini: Cancuna cai RUNApac aichata mana micushpa, paipac yahuarta mana upiashpa, mana causaita charinquichichu.
Ñuca aichata micuc runa, ñuca yahuarta upiac runa huiñai causaita charin; ñucaca puchucai puncha paita causarichisha.
Ñuca aicha shuti pacha micunami; ñuca yahuar shuti pacha upianami.
Ñuca aichata micuc, ñuca yahuarta upiac ñucahuan llutarishcami can, ñuca paihuan llutarishcami cani.
"Ñucata cachamushca Yaya causayuc can, ñucaca paimanta causani; chashnallata, ñucata micuc ñucamanta causanca.
Jahua pachamanta uraicushca tantamanta rimani; chai tanta mana cancunapac ñaupacuna micushca tanta shinachu; paicuna micushpallata huañunurca; ranti, cai tantata micuc huiñaipac causanca.
Jesus chai shimicuna tantarina huasipi rimarca, Cafarnaun llactapi.
Jesus rimashcacunata uyashpa, huaquin yachachishcacuna ninurca: —Pai rimashca shimi mana chasquipacchu; yancamanta paita catinchic.
Jesus, paicuna yuyashcata yachashpa, nirca: —¿Nuca rimashcachu cancunata pihachin?
¿Cai RUNA ñaupa tiashcaman sicaracta ricushpa, imata ninquichicman?
Samai causaita cucmi; aicha mana imapac can, Ñuca cancunaman rimashca shimicunaca samaimi, causaimi canun.

Ranti, cancunamanta huaquincuna chaira mana ininunchu. Chashna rimarca Jesus mana iniccuta callarimanta ricsishcaraicu; chashnallata, paita japichinca rashca runata ricsirca. Huasha nirca: —Chairaicu cancunata rimarcani nishpa: Manapí nucaman shamuna ushan, Yaya mana pushamucpi.
Chai pachamanta, achca yachachishcacuna paita jichunurca, paihuan ña mana puriccunachu carca. Chashnapi Jesus chunca ishcai apostolcunata tapurca: —¿Cancunapash ñucata jichunata munanquichichu?
Simon Pedro cutiparca: —Apunchic, ¿pipacman rishun? Canlla huiñai causaita cuc shimicunata charinqui.
Can Diospac Churi cashcata ña inircanchic yachanchicpash.
Jesus paita cutiparca: —¿Manachu ñuca cancunata chunca ishcaita acllarcani? Chashnapash, cancunamanta shuc supai can.
Chashna nishpa, Simonpac churi Judas Iscariotemanta rimarca, Judas mari Jesusta japichinca racmi, chunca ishcaicunamanta cashpallata.
Shuc, punchacuna huasha, Jesus Galilea suyuta purirarca. Judeapi saquirinata mana munarcachu, judio apucuna paita huañuchincapac masheahurca mari.
"Tanpucuna" nishca raimi pactamuracpi, judiocunapac jatun raimi cacpi,
aillucuna Jesusta ninurca: —Ama caipi saquirichu; Judeaman ri, chaipi tiyac canta caticcuna can rurashcacunata ricunuchun.
Ricsi tucusha nic runaca rashcacunata mana pacalla ruran. Can mana raipaccunata rurashpa, tucuicunapac ñaupacpi chaicunata ruranqui.
Chashna rimanurca paipac aillucunapash mana paipi inishcaraicu.
Jesus paicunata nirca: —Ñuca pacha chaira mana pactamun; cancunapac ima pachapash alli can.
Cai pachamantacuna cancunata mana chicninunchu; ranti, ñucata; chicninun, paicuna rurashca mana alli cashcata ricuchini mari.
Raimiman richic cancuna; ñuca mana rishachu, ñuca puncha chaira mana pactarin.
Chai shimicunata rimashca huasha Jesus Galileapi saquirirca.
Ranti, Jesuspae aillucuna raimiman rishca huasha, paipash Jerusalenman sicarca; mana runacuna ucupi, sapalla rirca.
Judio apucuna raimi punchacunapi paita mashcaranurca nishpa: —¿Maipi tiyan chai runa?
Runacunapura achcata Jesusmanta rimarirarca. Huauquincuna ninurca: "Alli runami"; ranti, shuccuna ninurca: "Manalli can, runacunata umachin mari".
Ranti, manapí paimanta runacuna ucupi rimarca, judio apucunata manchashcamanta.
Chaupi raimi huasha, Jesus Diospac huasiman yaicurca runacunata yachachincapac.
Judiocuna mancharishpa ninurca: —¿Cai runa imashna chashna achcata yachan, mana yachachishca cashpa?
Jesus nirca: —Ñuca yachachishca mana ñucamantachu, ñucata cachamushcamantami.
Dios munashcata pactachisha nic runa, ñuca yachachishca Diosmantachu shamushcata ñuca quiquinmantachu rimarashcata ricsincami.
Quiquinmanta rimac runacunapacpi chacchai tucuncapac riman; ranti, shuc runa paita cachamushcapacpi chacchai tucunata munashpa, chai runa allita rimacmi, paita inina can,
¿Manachu Moises camachic quillcata cancunaman curca? Chashnapash, cancunamanta shucllapash chaita mana pactachinchu. ¿Imaraicu ñucata huañuchinata munanquichic?
Runacuna paita ninurca: —¡Can supaita charinqui! ¿Pimi canta huañuchinata munan?
Jesus cutiparca: —Tucuicuna mancharinquichic, ñuca, samana puncha, shuc mana raipacta rurashcamanta.

Uyahuaichic: Moises "huahuacunapac pincai carata pitina can" nishpa rimacpi (chaita rana mana Moisesmantachu shamun, cancunapac naupacunamanta shamun), cancuna chaita ruranquichic, samana puncha cacpipash.
Chaita samana puncha rana usharicpi Moises rimashcata pactachincapac, ¿imaraicu piñahuanquichic shuc uncuc runata janpishcamanta samana punchapi?
Ama ricurishcamantalla taripaichichu. Cancuna taripana cacpi, cuscata taripanquichic.
Chashna rimacpi Jesus, huaquin Jerusalenpi causaccuna tapunurca: —¿Manachu cai runata mashcaranun huañuchincapac?
Ricuichic: tucuicunapac ñaupacpi rimaran, paita mana imata ninun. ¿Cai runa Mesias cashcata ñucanchic apucuna ininunchu ima chari?
Chashnapash, cai runa maimanta shamushcata yachanchic; ranti, Mesias shamucpi, maimanta shamushcata manapí yachancachu.

Chashna ninucpi uyashpa, Jesus Diospac huasipi yachachishpa, sinchi shimihuan nirca: —"Canta ricsinchic, can maimanta shamushcata yachanchic" nishpa ninquichic: ranti, ñuca mana ñuca munaimanta caipi tiyanichu; shucmi tiyan, pai cusha nishcata pactachicmi; pai ñucata cachamuhuarca, paitaca mana ricsinquichic.
Ñuca paita ricsini, paimanta mari shamuni, paimi ñucata cachamuhuarca.
Chashhapi, "paita japishunchic" ninurca: ranti manapi paita japirca, pai huañuna pacha mana pactashcaraicu.
Achca runacuna paita ininurca; ninurca: —Mesias shamushpa, ¿cai runamanta ashtahuan mana raipaccunata rurancachu?
Fariseocuna, Jesusmanta runacuna rimarashcata uyashpa, pacriyaya apucunapacman rinurca; paicunahuan rimarishpa, Diospac huasita ricuc chapacunata cachanurca "Jesusta japichic" nishpa.
Jesus nirca: —Mana unaita cancunahuan tiyashachu, ñucata cachamushcapacman ticrana cani.
Ñuca ricpi, mashcahuanquichic, ranti mana tupahuanquichic; ñuca tiyanca rashcaman mana rina ushanquichic.

Chaita uyashpa, judiocuna paicunapura rimarinurca: —¿Maiman rinata munanca cai runa, ñucanchic mana paita tupana ushancapac? ¿Griegocunahuan causac judiocunapacman rincachu, paicunata yachachincapac?
¿Imata nishpa chai shimicunata rimarca: "mashcahuanquichic, ranti mana tupahuanquichic; ñuca tiyanca rashcaman man rina ushanquichic"? ¿Imata nishpa chashna nirca?
Raimi puchucai puncha tucui punchacunamanta ashtahuan jatun carea. Jesus, Diospac huasipi shayarishpa, sinchi shimihuan nirca: —Upianayac ñucaman shamuchun, ñucata inic upiachun.
Quilleara tiyan: "Nucata inic runapac shuncumanta causac yacucuna llucshinunca".
Jesus chashna rimashpa, paita iniccuna chasquinca rashca Samaimanta rimarca; chai Samai chaira mana shamushcarca, Jesus chaira mana sumacyachishca cacpi.
Huaquin runacuna, Jesusta uyashpa, ninurca: —Cai runa shamuna cac Profetami.
Shuccuna ninurca: —Cai runa Mesiasmi. Ranti, shuccuna ninurca: —Mana. Mesias mana Galileamantachu canca.
Diospac quillcacuna ninun: "Mesias Davidpac aillucunamanta canca, Belen llactapi pacarinca, chai llactamanta mari carca Curaca David".
Shinacpi, Jesus-raicu runacuna chican chican tucunurca.
Huaquincuna paita japinata munanurca, ranti manapí paita japirca.
Chapacuna ticramushpa, fariseocunapacman pacriyayacunapacman rinurca; paicuna tapunurca: —¿Imaraicu mana pushamurcanquichic chai runata?
Cutipanurca: —¡Mana pacha! ¡Manapi runa pai rimashca shina riman!
Fariseocuna ninurca: —¿Cancunapash umachi tucurcanquichichu?
¿Apucunamanta, fariseocunamantapash shucllapash Jesuspi inishcachu? Mana.
Chai yanca runacunalla, camachic quillcata mana yachaccunalla paita ininun; chai runacuna maldisiashca canun.
Chashna ninucpi, Nicodemo, Jesus-huan rimarincapac shuc tuta rishca runa, fariseo bulamanta cashpa, paicunata nirca:
—¿Shuc runata cautsayachina usharinchu manarac paita uyacpi, pai rurashcata yachancapac?
Fariseocuna paita cutipanurca: —¿Canpash Galileamantachu canqui? Quillcacunata ricunqui yachancapac; chaicunata yachashpa, Galileamanta mana shuc profetallapash shamushcata ricunqui.
Chashna ninucpi, caran runa paipac huasiman rirca.
Jesus Olivos urcuman rirca.
Cayantin puncha, tutamanta, Diospac huasiman ticrarca. Tucui runacuna paipacman shamunurca; pai tiyarishpa, paicunata yachachi callarirca.
Camachic quillcata yachaccuna fariseocunantin shuc manalli huarmita pushamunurca; chai huarmi shuc carihuan juchallishca ucupi japi tucushcarca. Paita chaipi tiyaccuna chaupi shuncupi shayachishpa,
Jesusta ninurca: —Yachachiccama, cai huarmi shuc carihuan juchallishca ucupi japi tucurca.
Chai laya huarmicunata "rumihuan shitashpa huañuchina can" Moisespac camachic quillca nin. ¿Canca imata ninqui?
Jesusta camashpa chaita tapunurca paita cautsayachincapac. Tapunucpi, Jesus jahualla tiyarishpa, allpapi maqui rucahuan quillcai callarirca.
Cutillata tapunucpi, Jesus shayarishpa nirca: —Cancunamanta maicanpash jucha illac cashpa, ñaupac rumita shitachun.
Cutillata jahualla tiyarishpa, allpapi quillcashpa catirca.
Paicuna, Jesus rimashcata uyashpa, shuc shuc llucshinurca; rucucuna ñaupacta llucshinurca; manapi saquirirca; Jesus sapalla tiyarca paipac ñaupacpi shayac huarmintin.
Jesus jatarishpa, huarmita tapurca: —Huarmi, ¿maipi tiyanun canta juchachiccuna? ¿Manapí canta cautsayachircachu?
Huarmi nirca: —Manapí, apulla. Jesus paita nirca: —Ñucapash mana canta cautsayachinichu. Rilla, ama cuti juchallichu.
Chai huasha, Jesus runcunata yachachishpa nirca: —Ñuca cai pacha achicmi cami; ñucahuan puric mana tutapi causanchu, causaita cuc achicta charinca.
Chashna rimacpi, fariseocuna paita ninurca: —Can quiguinpacpi ricuyac canqui; can ricuyae shina rimashca mana imagac can.
Jesus cutiparca: —Ñuca rimashca balinmi, ñuca quiquinpacpi ricuyac shina rimashpallata. Ñuca maimanta shamushcata, maiman rishcata yachani mari, ranti cancuna mana yachanquichic.
Cancuna runa yachai taripanquichic. Ñuca manapi taripanichu;
ñuca shuc runata taripacpi, ñuca taripashca alli canman; mana mari ñucalla taripani; cachamuhuashca Yaya ñacahuan pacta taripan.
Cancunapac camachic quillcapi cashna quillcara tiyan: "Ishcai runa chaipuraila rimanucpi, paicuna rimashca shuti can, paicunata injna can".
Chashna cacpi; ñuca shuc ricuyac cani; ñucata cachamushca Yayapash ricuyac can, ishcaipura canchic.
Chashna rimacpi uyashpa, paita tapunurca: —¿Maipi tiyan canpac Yaya? Jesus cutiparca: —Cancuna mana ñucata ñuca Yayatapash ricsinquichic; ñucata ricsishpa, ñuca Yayatapash ricsinquichicman.
Jesus chai tucuita Diospac huasipi yachachishpa rimarca, camari malacuna mayanpi. Manapí paita japirca, japi tucuna pacha mana mari pactarishca carca.
Jesus judiocunata nirca: —Ñuca rishami; cancuna mashcahuanquichic; ranti, cancunapac juchahuan huahunquichic. Ñuca rinaman mana ushanquichic shamuncapac.
Judiocuna paicunapura rimarinurca: —Pai quiquinllata huañurincachu imata, pai rinaman ñucanchic mana rina ushashcata nin mari.
Jesus paicunata nirca: —Cancuna cai pachamanta canquichic; ñuca jahua pachamanta cani.
Chairaicu nircani: Cancunapac juchahuan huanunquichic. Ari, ñuca cac cashcata cancuna mana inishpa, cancunapac juchahuan huañunquichic.
Chaita uyashpa, paita tapunurca: —¿Pitac canqui? Jesus paicunata cutiparca: —Callarimanta rimarani cunan rimashcallata.

Achcacunata yachani cancunamanta; cancunata cautsayachina ushaiman, ranti mana munanichu; ñuca Yayamanta huillasha, pai mari ñucata cachahuarca, paica shutita riman; ñuca paimanta yachashcata runacunata huillani.
Jesus Yayamanta rimarashcata paicuna mana atipanurcachu.
Chairaicu paicunata nirca: —Cancuna cai RUNAta cruspi jatachishpa ninquichic: Shuti pacha, pai cacmi carca; pai quiquinmanta mana imata rashcachu; Yaya paita yachachishcallata rimarca.
Ñucata cachamuhuashca ñucahuan tiyan; mana imura sapalla saquihuarca, pai munashcata mari huiñai pactachini. Jesus chashna rimashcapi, achca runacuna paipi ininurca.
Jesus paipi inic judiocunata nirca: —Cancuna shuti jinu ñuca yachachishca cancapac, ñuca rimashcata pactachishpa causana canquichic;
chashna causashpa, shuti cashcata yachanquichic; shuti cáshcaca cancunata quishpinca.
Cutipanurca: —Ñucanchic Abranmanta mirashcacuna canchic, manapi ñucanchicta huatara charirca, ¿Imaraicu ninqui "quishpira canquichic" nishpa?
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Shuti cancunata nini: juchayuc runata jucha huatashcata charin.
Huatara rúnaca mana huiñaipac aillu can; ranti, churi huiñaipac aillu can.
Shinacpi, churi cancunata quishpichicpi, shuti pacha quishpira canquichic.
Cancuna Abraanmanta mirashcacuna cashcata yachani; chashnapash, ñucata huañuchinata munanquichic, ñuca rimashcata mana pactachinayashpa.
Ñuca Yaya ricuchihuashcata huillani, cancunaca cancunapac yaya nishcata rurac canquichic.
Chaita uyashpa ninurca: —¡Ñucanchic yaya Abraanmi! Jesus paicunata cutiparca: —Cancuna shuti pacha Abraanpac churicuna cashpa, pai rurashcata ruranquichicman.
Ranti, cancuna ñucata huahuchinata munanquichic, Dios yachachihuashca shutita rimacpipash. ¡Abraan mana imura chashna rurarcachu!
Cancunapac yaya rurashca shinallata ruranquichic. Chaita uyashpa ninurca: —¡Ñucanchic mana huaira huahuacuna canquic, shuc yayallata charinchi: Dios!

Jesus paicunata cutiparca: —Dios cancunapac yaya cacpi, ñucata llaquinquichicman, Diosmanta mari shamurcani, Diospac shutipi tiyani caipi. Mana ñuca quiquin munaimanta shamurcanichu, Dios ñucata cachamuhuarca.
¿Imaraicu ñuca rimarashcata mana atipana ushanquichic? Cancuna mana munashcaraicu ñuca shimita uyana.

Cancunapac yaya supai apumi; cancuna paipaccuna canquichic, pai munashcata rurana munanquichic. Callari pachamanta pai huañuchisiqui can. Mana imura shutita rimarcachu, paipi shuti illan mari. Pai llullashcapi, pai cashca shina riman; pai llullaisiqui mari can, llullanapac yaya can.
"Ranti, ñuca shutita rimacpi, cancuna mana inihuanquichic.
Ricushun: ¿Cancunamanta maican ñuca shuc juchallatapash charishcata ricuchinca? Shutita rimacpica, ¿imaraicu mana inihuanquichic?
Diosmanta cac runa Dios rimashcata uyan; ranti, cancuna mana Diosmanta cashpa, ñucata mana uyahuanquichic.
Chashnapi, Judiocuna paita ninurca: —Can Samariamanta runa canqui, supai japishca runa canqui nishpa shutita rimanchic.
Jesus paicunata cutiparca: —Ñuca mana supai japishca runachu cani, ñuca Yayata yupaichani; ranti, cancuna ñucata millahuanquichic.
Ñucata yupachihuaichic nishpa mana purinichu, ñucata yupaichac tiyanmi, paimi taripanca.
Shuti cancunata nini: Ñuca rimashcata uyac runa mana huañuncachu.

Chaita uyashpa ninurca: —Cunan shuti pacha yachanchic can supai japishca runa cashcata. Abraan huañurca, tucui profetacunapash huañunurca; canca ninqui: Ñuca rimashcata uyac runa mana huañuncachu.
¿Ñucanchic yaya Abraanmanta yallichu canqui? Pai huañurca profetacunapash huañunurea. ¿Pimi canqui nishpata yuyanqui?
Jesus cutiparca: —Ñucallatata yupaichacpi, mana imapac can. Ranti, ñucata yupaichac ñuca Yayami; cancuna "pai ñucanchic Diosmi" ninquichic,
paita mana ricsishpallata. Ñuca, ranti, paita ricsini "paita mana ricsinichu" nishpa, cancuna shina llullaisiqui caiman. Ranti, shuti pacha paita ricsini, pai rimashcata uyani
Cancunapac yaya Abraan, cai punchata ricunayashpa, cushiyarca; ricushca huasha cushihuan juntarirca. —
Chashna rimacpi uyashpa, judiocuna ninurca: —¿Pichca chunca huatata manarac charishpa, Abraanta ricurcani nishpa ninquichu?
Jesus cutiparca: —Ari, manarac Abraan pacarishcapi, ñuca ña tiyarcani.
Cashna nicpi Jesus, judiocuna paita shitancapac. Jesus miticushpa, Diospac huasinmanta llucshirca.
Shuc puncha, Jesus shuc ñausa pacarishca runahuan tuparirca.
Yachachishcacuna Jesusta tapunurca: —Yachachiccama, ¿pipac juchamanta cai runa ñausa ñahui pacarirca? ¿pai quiquinpac juchamantachu? ¿yayacunapac juchamantachu?
Jesus cutiparca: —Mana paipac juchamantachu, mana yayacunapae juchamantachu. Chashna tucurca cai runapi Diospac ushai ricurincapac.
Chaira puncha cacpi, ñuca Yaya mincahuashcata rurana cani. Tuta mayanyaran, tutapi mana llancaipac can. Ñuca cai pachapi tiyashpa, cai pacha achicmi cani.
Chashna rimashpa, Jesus allpapi tiucarca tiucahuan turuta rarca, turuta ñausa runa ñahuicunapi llutarca.
Huasha paita nirca: —Siloé nishca yacupi maillaricri (Siloé nishpa "Cachashca" nin). Chai runa chaita uyashpa maillaricrirca, ricushpa ticramurca.
Paita ricsiccuna, diosmantata mañarashcata ricushcacunapash ninurca: —¿Cai runa manachu diosmantata mañac tiyacuc carca?
Huaquincuna ninurca: —Shuti, paimi can. Shuccuna ninurca: —Mana, shuc can, pailla yachic shina ricurin. Pai nirca: —Ñucallata cani. Chashnapi, paita tapunurca: —¿Imanata cunan ricuna ushanqui?
Paicunata cutiparca: —Chai Jesus shutiyuc runa turuta rarca, ñuca ñahuicunapi llutarca, Siloé yacuman maillaricri nihuarca. Ñucata rircani, maillarircani, cunan ricuni.
Chashnapi, paita tapunurca: —¿Maipi tiyan chai runa? Pai nirca: —Mana yachanichu.
Ñausa cashca runa fariseocunapacman pushanurca.
Jesus turuta rashcapi hausa runapac ñahuicunata alliyachincapac, samana puncha carca.
Fariseocuna paita tapunurca: —¿Imashnata ricui callarircanqui? Pai cutiparca: —Turuta ñahuicunapi llutahuarca; ñahuicunata maillashpa, ricui callarircani.
Huaquin fariseocuna ninurca: —Chai runa mana Diosmantachu can, samana puncha llancarca mari. Shuccuna ninurca: —¿Juchayuc runa ushancachu chashna rancapac? Chican chican yuyarinurca;
chairaicu ñausa runata tapunurca: —¿Canca imata ninqui canpac ñahuicunata alliyachishca runamanta? Pai cutiparca: —Profeta cashcata nini.
Judiocuna mana ininurcachu chai runa ñaupa ñausa cashcata; chairaicu, paipac yayacunata cayanurca paicunata tapuncapac: —
¿Cancunapac churichu cai runa? ¿ñausachu pacarirca? ¿imashnata cunan ricun?

Cutipanurca: —Cai ñucanchic churi cashcata yachanchic; ñausa pacarishcatapash yachanchic; ranti, imashnata cunan ricushcata mana yachanchichu; pimi paita alliyachishcata mana yachanchichu. Paillatata tapuichic; yuyayuc can, paillata rimanca.
Chashna rimanurca judiocunata manchashcaraicu, judiocuna rimanushcarca mari "tantarina huasimanta jichui tucununca Jesus Mesias cashcata niccuna".
Chairaicu, ñausa runapac yayacuna ninurca "paillatata tapuichic, yuyayuc can" nishpa.
Judiocuna chai ñausa pacarishca runata cutillata cayashpa ninurca: —Diospac ñaupacpi shutita rimai. Chai runa juchayuc cashcata yachanchic.
Pai cutiparca —Juchayucchu canca, mana juchayuc canca ima chari. Ñuca caitami yachani: Ñuca ñausa carcani, cunan ricuna ushani.
Fariseocuna cutillata paita tapunurca: —¿Imata rurashpa canpac ñahuicunata alliyachirca?
Cutiparca: —Ña rimarcani, cancunaca mana inihuanquichic. ¿Imapac cutillata uyana munanquichic? ¿Cancunapash paita catinata munanquichichu?
Chashnapi, paita camishpa ninurca: —Can paita catic canqui; ñucanchic Moisesta catinchic.
Dios Moisesta rimashcata yachanchic; ranti, cai runa maimanta cashcatapash mana yachanchic.
Chai runa nirca: —Cancunata uyashpa mancharinimi; pai maimanta shamushcata mana yachanquichic, paica ñuca ñahuicunata alliyachirca.
Dios juchayucta mana uyashcata tucui runa yachan; Dios alli runata uyan, pai rimashcata pactachicta uyan.
Callarimanta pacha, mana uyarishcachu shuc runa ñausa pacarishcapac ñahuicunata alliyachishcata.
Cai runa mana Diosmanta cashpa, mana pai rashcata rana ushanman.
Chashna nicpi, fariseocuna paita ninurca: —¿Can pacarishcamanta juchalla aparishca canqui, ñucanchítaca yachachinayanquichu? Chashna nishpa, paita tantarina huasimanta jichunurca.
Jesus chai runata shitanushcata uyashpa, paihuan tuparishpa, nirca: —¿Diospac Churita ininquichu?
Runa nirca: —¿Pitac can ñuca paita inincapac?
Jesus paita cutiparca: —Paita ricushcanqui, canhuan rimariran; ñucami cani.
Chaita uyashpa, chai runa Jesuspac ñaupacpi cuncurishpa nirca: —¡Ininimi, Apunchiclla!
Huasha Jesus nirca: —Ñuca cai pachaman shamurcani runacunata shucta shucmanta chicanyachincapac; chaimanta, mana ricuccuna ricununca; ricuccunaca ñausa tucununca.
Chaita uyashpa chaipi tiyac fariseocuna Jesusta ninurca: —¿Ñucanchipash ñausachu canchic?
Jesus paicunata cutiparca: —Cancuna ñausa cashpa, jucha illac canquichicman; ranti, "ricunchicmi" nishpa nicpi, cancunapac jucha ashtahuan saquirin.
"Shuti cancunata nini: Maicanpash obeja curralman puncuta mana yaicushpa, shuhuami.
Obejacunata ricuccama puncuta pascashpa yaicun.
Puncuta ricuccama paiman pascan, obejacuna paipac shimita uyanun; pai obejacunata quiquin shutihuan cayan, canchaman paicunata llucshichin:
Tucui paipac obejacunata llucshichishpaca, paicunata ñaupashpa rin; obejacunaca paita catinun, paipac shimita ricsinun.
Chican runaman mana catinuncachu; ashtahuan, paimanta miticununca, paipac shimita; mana ricsishcaraicu.
Chai laya shimicunahuan Jesus judiocunata rimarca; paicuhaca Jesus rimashcata mana japinurcachu.
Huasha Jesus nirca: —Shuti cancunata nini: Ñuca obejacuna yaicuna puncumi cani.
Tucui ñucamanta ñaupac shamushcacuna shuhua canurca, obejacunaca paicunata mana uyanurcachu.
Ñuca puncumi cani; cai puncuta yaicuc runa quishpichi tucunca; yaicuna, llucshina ushancami pai munashcapi; micunata tarinca.
Shuhua runa shuhuancapaclla shamun; ñucaca obejacuna causaita charinuchun nishpa shamurcani, alli causaita charinuchun nishpa.
"Ñuca alli michic cani. Alli michic obejacunaraicu huañun.
Ranti, cullquiraiculla llancac runa, puma shamucpi ricushpa, obejacunata jichushpa callpan; pumaca obejacunata chausichin, huaquincunata huañuchin.
Chai runa cullquita yapachincapaclla llancac cashpa, mana ansallapash yuyarin obejacunamanta.
Ñuca alli michic cani. Ñuca Yaya ñucata ricshishca shina, ñucapash paita ricsini, obejacunaca ñucata ricsinun. Ñuca causaita obejacunaraicu cuyani.
Shuc obejacunapash tiyanmi ñuca obeja bulamanta chican; chaicunatapash tantachina cani; ñuca shimita uyanuncami; chaimanta, shuc bulalla, shuc michiclla tucunca.
"Yaya ñucata llaquin ñuca causaita cuyashcamanta, causaita cutillata japincapac.
Manapí chai causaita quichuhuancachu, munashpa chaita cuni. Chaita cuncapac ushani huañushpa, chaita cutillata japina ushani causarishpa. Chashna ushanata Yayamanta chasquircani.
Chashna rimacpi Jesus, judiocuna uyashpa, cutillata chican chican tucunurca.
Paicunamanta achcacuna ninurca: —¿Imaraicu paita uyanquichic?; supai japishca runa can, nuspa runa can.
Ranti, shuccuna ninurca: —Supai japishca runa mana pai rimashca shina riman. ¿Shuc supai ushancachu ñausa runata alliyachina?
Invierno pacha carca; Jerusalenpi jatun raimita ruracunurca Diospac huasita paiman ricuchishca punchata. yuyarishpa.
Jesus Diospac huasipi tiyarca, "Salomon portico" nishcata purirashpa.
Judiocuna pai muyucta tantarishpa tapunurca: —¿Imuracama ñucanchita llaquichinqui can pi cashcata mana rimashpa? Can Mesias cashpa, pasacta rimai.
Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Nuca cancunata ña rimarcani, cancunaca mana inihuanquichic. Ñuca Yayapac shutipi rurashcacuna pasacta ricuchinun;
ranti, cancuna mana inihuanquichic mana ñuca obejacuna cashcaraicu.
Ñuca obejacuna ñuca shimita ricsinun; paicunata ricsini, paicuna ñucata catishpa shamunun.
Mana tucuric causaita paicunaman cuyani; mana huiñaipac huañuncachu; ñuca maquimanta manapipash paicunata quichunca.
Ñuca Yayami chai obejacunata cuhuarca; Yayaca tucuita yallinmi. Ñuca Yayapac maquimanta manapí paicunata quichuna ushanca.
Ñucahuan Yayahuan shuclla canchic.
Chashna rimacpi uyashpa, judiocuna rumicunata japinurca Jesusta shitancapac.
Jesus paicunata nirca: —Achca alli rashcacunata cancunapac ñaupacpi rurarcani ñuca Yaya cuhuashca ushaihuan; ¿maican alli rurashcacunaraicu rumihuan shitanata munahuanquichic?
Judiocuna cutipanurca: —Mana can allita rashcaraicu rumihuan shitanca ranchic; can rimashcahuan Diosta piñashcaraicu canta rumihuan shitanata munanchic; can runalla cashpa, canllatata Dios tucunqui.
Jesus paicunata nirca: —¿Cancunapac camachic quillcapi manachu quillcara tiyan: "Cancuna dioscuna cashcata ñuca nircani?
Quillcacuna rimashcata inina can, chaita tucui runa yachan; Diosca paipac shimita rimai tucushcacunata "dioscuna" nishpa nirca.
Chashna cacpi, ¿imaraicu ñuca "Diospac Churi cani" nishcamanta, "can Diosta piñanqui" nihuanquichic? Diosllata ñucata chicayachishpa cai pachaman cachamuhuarca.
Mana ñuca Yaya rurashcallata ruracpica, ama inihuaichichu.
Ranti, ñuca chaicunata ruracpica, cancuna ñucata mana inishpallata, ñuca rurashcacunata inichic; chashna rashpa, Yaya ñucapi tiyashcata, ñucaca Yayapi tiyashcata shuc rai yachanquichic.
Chai shimicunata uyashpa, judiocuna Jesusta japinata yuyanurca; ranti, Jesus paicunapac maquimanta quishpirirca.
Jesus Jordan yacu chinpaman ticrarca, ñaupa pacha Juan bautisarashca allpapi saquirirca.
Achca runacuna paipacman rinurca; paita ricushca huasha ninurca: —Juan mana raipacta mana rurashcapipash, tucui cai runamanta huillashca shuti carca.
Achca chaipi causaccuna Jesusta ininurca.
Shuc puncha, shuc Lazaro shutiyuc runa uncushca carca. Betania llactamanta carca; paipac panicuna, Maria shuc, Marta shuc, chai llactallapi causanurca.
Mariami carca Jesuspac chaquita asnac yacuhuan armachishca, acchahuan chaquichishpa.
Payapura Jesusman shimita cachanurca nishpa: —Can llaquishca runa uncushcami.
Jesus, chaita uyashpa nirca: —Cai uncui mana huañuchincapac can, Diosta sumacyachincapac can, Dios Churipash sumacyachi tucunca chaimanta.
Jesus yapa llaquirca Martata, paipac ñañatapash, paicunapac turi Lazarotapash; chashnapash, Lazaro uncushcata uyashpa, ishcai puncha pai tiyashcallapi saquirirca.
Chaipac huasha, yachachishcacunata nirca: —Jacuichic Judeaman.
Yachachishcacuna cutipanurca: —Yachachiccama, ¿ñacalla judiocuna canta rumihuan shitancapac mashcanurca, canca chaiman ticranata munanquichu?
Jesus paicunata nirca: —¿Manachu puncha ¿chunca, ishcai pachata charin? Punchapi puric mana, tacarinchu punchata ricushpa.
Ranti, tutata puric tacarincami mana ricushpa.
Huasha nirca: —Ñucanchic llaquishca Lazaro puñuran, paita ricchachincapac racuni.
Yachachishcacuna ninurca: —Apunchic, pai puñuracpi alliyancami.
Jesus chashna rimashpa, Lazaro huañushcata rimashcarca; ranti, yachachishcacuna samahcapac puñurashcata yuyanurca.
Chashnapi, Jesus pasacta rimarca nishpa: —Lazaro huañushcami.
Ñuca chaipi mana tiyashcamanta cushiyani cancuna inincapac. Jacuichic, ricucrishun.
Tomas, Dídimo nishca, shuc yachachishcacunata nirca: —Jacuichic paihuan pacta huañuncapac.
Jesus pactashcapi; Lazaro chuscu puncha ña panpara carca.
Betaniamanta Jerusalenman mana caru carca, quimsa kilometro tupushi caru carca.
Jerusalenmanta achca runacuna shamunushca carca Martata, Mariata cushichincapac Lazaro huañushcamanta.
