Marta, Jesus shamuracpi uyashpa, paita tupancapac llucshirca. Maria huasipi saquirirca.
Marta Jesus-huan tuparishpa, paita nirca: —Apunchic, can caipi tiyashca cacpi, ñuca turi mana huañunmanchu carca.
Chashnapash, can imatapash Diosta mañacpi, canta cuncami; chaita shuti yachani.
Jesus paita cutiparca: —Canpac turi causarincami.
Marta nirca: —Huañushcacuna causarinucpi paipash causarinca rashcata yachani.
Chashnapi Jesus paita nirca: —Ñuca causarina cani, ñuca causai cani. Ñucata inic huañushca cashpallata causarincami.
Cai causaipi ñucata inic runa mana huiñaipac huañuncachu. ¿Chaita ininquichu?
Marta nirca: —Ari, Apunchic, can Mesias cashcata inini, can cai pachaman shamuna cac Diospac Churi cashcata ininimi.
Marta chaita rimashpa, paipac ñañata cayacrirca; paita pacalla nirca: —Yachachiccama caipimi, canta cayaran.
Maria chaita uyashca shina, shayarishpa Jesusta ricuncapac rirca.
Jesus chaira mana pactashca carca llactaman; Marta paita tupashcallapita tiyarca.
Huasipi Mariahuan tiyaccuna, paita yanapancapac shamushcacuna, pai shayarishpa uctalla llucshicpi ricushpa, paita catishpa rinurca, "aya jutcuman huacancapac riran" yuyashpa.
Maria, Jesus tiyashcaman pactashpa, paipac chaqui mayanpi cuncurishpa nirca: —Apunchic, can caipi tiyashca cacpi, ñuca turi mana huañunmanchu carca.
Chashna nishpa Maria huacai callarirca; paihuan shamuc judiocunapash huacaranurca; Jesus, chaita ricushpa, shuncupi yapa llaquirirca;
paicunata tapurca: —¿Maipi paita panparcanquichic? Cutipanurca: —Apunchic, ricuc shamui.
Jesus huacai callarirca.
Judiocuna ricushpa ninurca: —¡Mana pacha! ¡Paita yapa llaquirca!
Huaquincuna ninurca: —Pai ñausa runapac ñahuicunata alliyachirca; ¿manachu imatapash rana ushanman carca Lazaro ama huañuncapac?
Jesus upata llaquirishpa, aya jutcuman shamurca; chai jutcu quinraipi tiyarca, rumihuan quillpashca.
Jesus nirca: —Rumita anchuchichic. Marta, huañushcapac pani, nirca: —Apunchic, asnan ña chuscu puncha panparami can.
Jesus cutiparcai: —¿Manachu canta nircani, can inishpa Diospac ushaita ricunca rashcata?
Rimacpi, rumita anchuchinurca. Jesus jahuaman ricushpa nirca: —Pacrachu, Yaya; ñuca shimita uyarcanqui.
Can huiñai uyahuashcata yachani; caita nini caipi tiyaccunamanta, paicuna can cachamuhuashcata inincapac,
Huasha, caparirca: —¡Lazaro, chaimanta llucshi!
Chashna nicpi, huañushca runa llucshircami; chaqui maqui huatara carca, uma churanahuan pillushca. Jesus nirca: —Paita pashcaichic, paipac chaquihuan purichun.
Achca runacuna, Mariata ricuncapae shamushcacuna, Jesus rurashcata ricushpa, ininurca.
Ranti, huaquincuna Fariseocunapacman rishpa, Jesus rurashcata huillanurca.
Chaita uyashpa, fariseocunahuan, pacriyaya apucunahuan rimarincapac tantarishpa, ninurca: ¿Imata rurashun? Cai runa achca mana raipaccunata ruran.
Ñucanchic paita chashnalla saquicpica, tucui runacuna paipi ininunca; romano apucuna shamununca ñucanchic Diospac huasita tulancapac, nucanchic llactacunata tucuchincapac.
Chashna ninucpi, paicunamanta shuc Caifas shutiyuc —chai huatapi pacriyayacunapac jatun apu carca—, nirca: —Cancuna mana imata yachanquichic,
mana atipanquichiq shuc runalla tucui runacunamanta huañuna cashcata, ama tucui llactacuna urmachi tucuncapac.
Caifas chashna rimashpa, mana pai quiquinmantachu rimarca; pacriyayacunapac jatun apu cashpa, Dios paita rimachicpi, Jesus judiocuna rantimanta huañunca rashcatal nirca;
mana judio runacuna rantimantalla, tucui Diospac. chausirishca churicunatapash shucllapi tantachincapac Jesus huañuna cashcata ricuchirca.
Chashna cacpi, chai punchamanta judio apucuna "imata rashpa Jesusta huañuchishun" nishpa yuyaranurca.
Chairaicu; Jesus runacunai ucupi mana puricchu carca; Judeamanta llucshishpa, Efrain nishca llactaman rirca, chunlla allpa mayanpi; chaipi jichurirca yachachishcacunantin.
Pascua raimi puncha ña pactariracpi, achca runa tucui llactacunamanta Jerusalenman rinurca, manarac raimi puncha callaricpi maillarincapac.
Jesusta mashcaranurca Diospac huasipi paicunapura rimarishpa: —¿Raimiman shamuncachu? ¿manachu shamunca ima chari?
Fariseocunahuan pacriyaya apucunahuan rimarinushca carca nishpa: —Maicanpash Jesus maipi tiyashcata yachashpa huillachun, paita japincapac.
Pascua raimipac sucta puncha pishicpi, Jesus Betania llactaman rirca, Lazaropacman; chai runata causachishca carca huañushca cacpi.
Chai huasipi; shuc tuta alli micunata allichinurca Jesusraicu; Marta caracurca; Lazaro Jesus-huan pacta mesapi tiyarishpa micurcra.
Maria asnac yacuta apamurca shuc libra tupu, achca balic; chai yacuhuan Jesuspac chaquicunata armachirca; huasha acchahuan chaquichirca. Llanpu huasipi chai; sumac asnac yacu asnarca.
Chashna tucucpi, Simonpac churi Judas Iscariote nishca —pai Jesuspac runa cashpa paita japichinca racurca—, nirca; ¿Imaraicu chai achca balic asnac yacuta mana catunushca tsuntsucunata yanapancapac?
Chashna rimarca mana tsuntsucunata llaquishcaraicu; ranti, pai shuhua cashcaraicu; cullquita huacaichiccama cashpa, chai cullquimanta quiquinpacta shuhuac carca.
Jesus paita nirca: —Cai huarmita casilla saqui; chai asnac yacuta ñuca panpai tucuna punchapac huacaichishca carca.
Tsuntsucuna huiñai cancunapacpi tiyanunca, ñuca mana huiñaichu cancunahuan tiyashami.
Achca runacuna Jesus Betaniapi tiyashcata yachashpa, chaiman rinurca Jesus-huan rimarincapac, Lazarotapash ricuncapac; pai huañushca cacpi, Jesus paita causachishca carca.
Pacriyaya apucuna Lazarotapash huañuchina yuyaita japinurca,
pairaicu mari achca runacuna Jesusta ininurca, pacriyaya apucunata jichushpa.
Cayantin punchapi, raimiman shamushca runacuna Jesus llactaman pactamunca rascata yachashpa,
ramos pancacunata japishpa, paita tupancapac rinurca, caparishpa: —¡Diospac shutipi shamuc chaccashca cachun! Israelmanta Jatun Curaca yupaichashca cachun!
Jesus shuc burro huihuata tupashpa, paipac jahuapi tiyarirca, cashna mari quillcara tiyarca:
Sion llacta, ama manchaichu; canpac Jatun Curaca shuc burro jahuapi tiyarishca shamuran.
Chai ucu, yachachishcacuna chai tucuita mana japinushcachu; ranti huasha, Jesus sumacyachishca cacpi, chai tucui paimanta quillcara tiyashcata yuyarinurca, chairaicu chashna tucushca carca.
Jesus Lazarota aya jutcumanta cayashpa causachishcapi, paihuan tiyaccuna ricushcata huillanurca.
Chairaicu, runacuna Jesusta tupancapac rinurca, chai mana raipacta rurashcata yachashpa.
Fariseocuna, chaita ricushpa, paicunapura rimarinurca nishpa: —Mana imata rana ushanchichu; tucui runacuna paita catishpa rinun.
Raimiman shamushcacuna huaquincuna mana judio canurca.
Paicuna Felipapaeman rishpa ninurca: —Ayalla, Jesusta ricunata munanchic.
Felipe uyashpa Andresta rimarca; ishcaintin Jesusta huillacrinurca.
Jesus paicunata nirca: —Cai RUNA sumacyachishca cana pacha ña pactamurca.
Shuti cancunata nini: Trigo muyu allpa ucupi mana huañushpa, mana mirarinchu; huañushpaca, achcata aparin.
Quiquin causaita llaquic runa chaita chincachincami; ranti, cai pachapi quiquin causaita chincachic runa huiñai causaipac chaita huacaichin.
Ñucata yanapanata munac catihuachun; ñucata yanapacca ñuca tiyanallapi tiyanca, ñuca Yaya paita llaquinca.
"Cunan ñuca yapa llaquirini. ¿Imata rimasha? —¿Yaya, cai llaquimanta quishpichihuai" nishpa rimashachu? —¡Mana, chaipacmi shamurcani!
Yaya, canpac shutita sumacyachipai. Chashnapi, jahua pachamanta shuc shimi uyarirca nishpa: —Paita sumacyachircani, cutillata sumacyachisha.
Chaipi tiyaccuna, chaita uyashpa, ninurca: —Tulunshi carca. Huaquincuna ninurca: —Shuc angel paita rimarca.
Jesus nirca: —Chai uyarishca shimi mana ñucaraicu, cancunaraicumi rimashca can.
Cunan cai pacha taripai tucunca, cunan cai pachapac amu jichushcami canca.
Ñucaca cruspi shayachishca cashpa, tucui runacunata ñucaman aisasha.
Chashna rimashpa, ima laya huañuihuan huañuna cashcata atipachirca.
Chaita uyashpa, runacuna ninurca: —Mesias huiñaipac causana cashcata yachanchic, quillcashcacuna chashna ninucpi. ¿Imaraicu "cai RUNA shayachishca cana can" nishpa rimanqui? ¿Pitac can chai RUNA?
Jesus paicunata nirca: —Chaira ansa puncha tiyan. Chai puncha tiyanacama purichic, manarac tuta shamucpi; tutapi puric maiman rirashcata mana yachanchu.
Puncha tiyanacama, punchata inichic, puncha churicuna tucuncapac. Chai shimicunata rimashca huasha Jesus miticurca.
Jesus achca mana raipaccunata judiocunapac ñaupacpi rurashcapipash, paicuna mana ininurcachu;
chashna, profeta Isaias quillcashca pactarirca, cashna mari quillcashcarca: Apulla, ¿pitac ñucanchic rimashcata inirca? ¿Piman Dios paipac ushaita ricuchirca?
Chashnallata, mana inina ushanurcachu, Isaiasllata shucpi cashna quillcashpa saquishcamanta:
Paicunapac ñahuhicunata ñausachirca, paicunapac yuyaita upayachirca. ama ñahuicunahuan ricunuchun, ama yuyaihuan japinuchun, hucaman ama ticranuchun ñucapi alliyachi tucuncapac.
Isaias chashna rimarca Jesusta sumacyachishcata ricushcaraicu, Jesusmanta mari rimarca.
Chashnapash, achca judiocuna judio apucunapash Jesusta ininurca; inishpallata, runacuna ucupi mana chaita rimanurca fariseocunata manchashcamanta, tantarina huasicunamanta ama shitai tucuncapac.
Runacunapacpi chacchai tucunata Diospacpi chacchai tucunamanta ashtahuan munanurca mari.
Chai huasha, sinchi shimihuan Jesus nirca: —Ñucata inic runa mana ñucallata inin, ñucata cachamushcatapash inin.
Ñucata ricuc runa ñucata cachamushcatapash ricun.
Ñuca, achic cashpa, cai pachaman shamurcani ñucata iniccuna ama tutapi saquirinuchun nishpa.
Ñuca shimita uyashpa mana pactachic runata mana taripanichu; ñuca mana shamurcani runata taripancapac, paita quispichincapac shamurcani.
Ñucata millashpa, ñuca shimicunata mana chasquic runa taripacta charin; ñuca rimashca shimi paita taripanca puchucai punchapi.
Ñuca mana mari rimarcani ñuca shutipi; ñuca cachamushca Yaya imata huillanata, imata yachachinata rimahuarca.
Ñuca Yaya rimashcaca mana imura huañunaman pushan. Shinacpi, ñuca rimashcata Yaya nihuashca shina rimani.

Cayantin puncha, jatun raimi puncha "pascua" nishca carca. Jesus, cai pachamanta Yayapacman rina puncha pactamushcata yacharca; cai patchapi paihuan tiyaccunata yapa llaquishpa, chai llaquishcata paicunaman ricuchirca.
Tuta micunata micuranurca; supai apu Judas Iscariotepac shuncupi Jesusta japichina yuyaita churashca carca.
Jesus yaeharcami Yaya paipac maquipi tucuita churashcata, chashnallata pai Diosmanta shamushcata, Diosman ticranca rashcata.
Micuranucpi shayarishpa, manto nishca churanata surcushpa, chaquichina churanata chunpillirca.
Huasha, shuc batiapi yacuta tallishpa, apostolcunapac chaquicunata maillai callarirca, chunpillishca churanahuan chaquichishpa.
Simon Pedropacman shamucpi, Pedro paita nirca: —Apunchic, ¿ñuca chaquicunatachu maillanca racunqui?
Jesus paita cutiparca: —Ñuca racushcata cunan mana japinquichu, huasha atipanqui.
Pedro paita nirca; —¡Ñuca chaquicunata mana mahlahuanquichu! Jesus cutiparca: —Canpac chaquicunata mana maillachihuacpi, mana imata ñucahuan charinquichu.
Chaita uyashpa, Pedro Jesusta nirca: —¡Chashna cacpi, mana chaquicunallata, maquicunata umatapash maillahuai!
Jesus paita cutiparca: —Armashca runa chaquicunallata armana mutsun, tucui pichashca cacpi. Cancuna pichashca canquichic, ranti mana tucuilla pichashca canquichic.
Yacharca mari maican paita japichinca rashcata. Chairaicu nirca "mana tucuicuna pichashcachu canquichic".
Chaquicunata maillashca huasha, manto churanata cutillata churarishpa, mesaman tiyarishpa nirca: —¿Ñuca rashcata japircanquichichu?
Cancuna "Yachachiccama", "Apu" nihuanquichic; allita rimanquichic, chashna mari cani.
Ñuca yachachiccama cashpa, apu cashpa, cancunapac chaquicunata maillacpi, cancunapash chaquicunata maillanacuna canquichic.
Ñuca rurashcahuan cancunata yachachircani cancuna chashnallata rancapac.
Shuti cancunata nini: Shuc luncu mana amunanta yallichu; cachashca runa mana paita cachashcamanta yallichu.
¿Chaita atipanquichichu? Ñuca camachishcata pactachichic; chaita pactachishpa cushi causanquichic.
"Ñuca mana tucui cancunamanta rimarani. Ñuca acllashcacunata ricsini; chashnapash, quillcacuna nishca pactarina can; cashna quillcara tiyan: Ñucahuan pacta micuc runa. ñucata chicnic tucurca.
"Chaita huillani manarac pactashcallapita; chai pactarina pacha, ñuca cac cashcata cancuna inincapac.
Shuti cancunata nini: Ñuca cachashcata chasquic runa ñucallata chasquin; ñucata chasquicca ñucata cachamushcata chashquin.
Chaita rimacpi, Jesus upata llaquirishpa nirca: —Uyahuaichic, cancunamanta shuc ñucata japichinca ran.
Chashna nicpi uyashpa, yachachishcacuna paicunapura ricunacushpa saquirinurca, maicanmanta rimarashcata mana yachashpa.
Paicunamanta shuc, Jesus yapa llaquishca, Jesus mayanpi tiyarishpa micurarca;
Simon Pedro maquihuan paita ricuchirca pimanta rimarashcata tapuncapac.
Paica Jesusman ashtahuan mayanyashpa, paita tapurca: —Apunchic, ¿pitac can?
Jesus paita cutiparca: —Ñuca cai tanta paquita paiman cunca rani, allita ricunqui. Chashna nishpa, shuc tanta paquita jucuchishpa, Judas Iscarioteman curca.
Judas chai tantata japishca shinalla, supai paipac ucuman yaicurca. Jesus paita nirca: —Can ruranca rashcata utcalla rurai.
Micuraccuna chai Jesus rimashcata mana atipanurcachu.
Judas cullquita huacaichiccama cacpi, huaquincuna yuyanurca: "Raimipac mutsushcata rantinqui" nishpa chari chaita rimarca; "tsuntsu runacunaman imatapash cuyanqui" nishpa rimarca ima chari.
Judas chai tanta paquita japishca shina, llucshirca. Pai llucshishcapi tuta carca.
Judas rishca huasha Jesus nirca: —Cunan cai RUNA sumacyachishcami canca; chashnallata Dios paipac Churipi sumacyachishcami canca.
Dios paipac Churipi sumacyachishca cashpaca, Diosllata paipac Churita sumacyachinca, cunanllatami paita sumacyachinca.
Ñuca huahuacuna, cancunahuan ña mana unayashachu. Mashcahuanquichic, chashnapash, judiocunaman rimashca shina, cancunata nini: Ñuca rinaman mana ri ushanquichic.
Mushu rurai nishcata cancunaman cuni, caimi: Llaquinacushpa causaichic. Ñuca cancunata llaquishca shina, cancunapash llaquinacuna canquichic;
Cancuna llaquinacushpa causacpi, cancuna ñuca yachachishca runa cashcata tucuicuna yachanunca.

Chashna nicpi Jesus, Pedro paita tapurca: —Apunchic, ¿maimata rinca ranqui? Jesus paita cutiparca: —Ñuca rinaman mana ushanqui cunan ñucata catishpa rincapac; shuc puncha ñucata catishpa rihuanqui.
Pedro paita nirca: —Apunchic, ¿imaraicu cunanllata mana ushani canta catina? Canraicu huañunalla chapacuni.
Jesus paita nirca: —¿Ñucaraicu huañunalla chapacunquichu? Uyahuai: Cari atallpa manarac caparicpi, can quimsa cuti "paita mana ricsinichu" ninqui.
Huasha Jesus rimai callarirca cashna nishpa: —Ama llaquirichichu. Cancuna Diosta ininquichic, ñucatapash inichic.
Ñuca Yayapac huasipi achca ucu tiyan. Mana chashna cacpi; "cancuna tiyanata allichincapac rinca rani" nishcata mana rimaiman carcani.
Ñuca rishpaca, tiyanacunata allichishca huasha, ticramushami, cancunata ñucahuan pushashk; ñuca tiyashcapi cancunapash tiyancapac.
Ñuca rirashcaman yachanquichic, ñanpitaca ricsinquichic.
Tomas Jesusta nirca: —Apunchic, can rirashcaman mana yachahchichu; ¿imashna ñanpita ricsishun?
Jesus paita cutiparca: —Ñuca ñanpi cani shutipash cani, causaipash cani. Manapipash Yayapacman rina ushanun, mana ñucahuan rishpa.
Cancuna ñucata ricsishpaca, ñuca Yayatapash ricsinquichicman; cunan pachamanta ña paita ricsinquichic, paita ricurarcanquichic mari.
Chashnapi Felipe paita nirca: —Apunchic, Yayata ñucanchicman ricuchipai, chailla pactan.
Jesus paita cutiparca: —Felipe, unaimanta cancunahuan tiyani, ¿chairachu mana ricsihuanquichic? Ñucata ricuc Yayatapash ricun; ¿imaraicu ninqui "Yayata ñucanchicman ricuchi?
¿Yaya ñucapi tiyashcata, ñucaca Yayapi tiyashcata manachu ininqui? Ñuca cancunaman rimashca shimicuna mana ñucamantallachu riniani; ñucapi tiyac Yaya Dios tucui ñuca rashcacunata ruran.
Inihuaichic: Yaya ñucapi tiyan, ñucaca Yayapi tiyani, Chaita mana inishpaca, ñuca rashcacunaraicu inihuaichic.
Shuti cancunata nini: ñucata inic runa ñuca rurashcacunallata ruranca; ashtahuanpash, chaicunamanta yalli jatuncunata ruranca, Yayapacman rinca rani mari.
Cancuna imatapash ñuca shutipi mañacpica, ñuca chaita rurashami, Yaya Churipi sumacyachi tucuncapac.
Ari, cancuna imatapash ñuca shutipi mañacpica, chaita rurashami.
"Cancuna ñucata llaquishpa, ñuca rimashca shimicunata pactachinquichic,
ñucaca Yayata mañasha, pai shuc Yanapacta cachanca, huiñaipac cancunahuan tiyancapac.

Chai yanapac shutita rimac Samaimi; cai pacha runacuna paita mana chasquina ushanun, paita mana ricsishcaraicu, mana ricushcaraicu; ranti, cancuna paita ricsinquichic, cancunahuan causan mari, cancunapi tiyancami.

Cancunata mana huacchayashcata saquishachu; cancunapacman ticrashami. "Astanipi, cai pacha runacuna ñucata mana ricununcachu; ranti cancuna ricuhuanquichic, ñuca causashcallahuan mari cancunapash causanquichic.
Chai puncha atipanquichic ñuca Yayapi causashcata, cancuna ñucapi causashcata, ñuca cancunapi causashcata.
Maicanpash ñuca rimashca shimicunata chasquishpa pactachicpi, paimi ñucata llaquin. Ñuca Yayaca ñucata llaquicta llaquinca; ñucapash paita llaquisha, paiman ricuchirisha.
Chashna rimacpi Jesus, Judas (mana Judas Iscariote nishca) paita tapurca: —Apunchic, ¿imaraicu ñucanchicmanlla ricuchirinca ranqui, mana tucui runacunaman?
Jesus paita cutiparca: —Ñucata llaquic runa ñuca yachachishcata pactachinca; ñuca Yayaca paita llaquinca, paipacman shamushun paipac shuncupi tiyancapac.
Ñucata mana llaquic runa ñuca yachachishcata mana uyanchu. Cai cancuna uyarashca shimicuna mana ñucapacchu, ñucata cachamuhuashca Yayapacmi.
"Cancunahuan tiyarashpa cai shimicunata rimani,
Santo Samai, yanapac cashpa, cai shimicunata allita atipachinca, ñuca yachachishcata yuyarichinca; ñuca Yaya ñuca shutipi chai santo Samaita cachanca.
"Ñuca rishpa, ganas causaita cancunaman saquini. Ñuca ganas causanata cancunaman cuni; cai ganas causana mana cai pacha runacuna cushca shinachu. Ama llaquirichichu, ama manchaichichu.

Ñuca cancunaman huillashcata uyarcanquichic; cashna nircani: "Riranimi, mana huiñaipac, ticrancapaclla rirani. Cancuna ñucata llaquishpaca, cushiyanquichicman Yayaman rini nishpa rimashcaraicu, Yaya ñucata yallin mari.
Manarac pactaricpi cai tucuita rimani, chai tucucpi cancuna inincapac.
"Na mana unaita cancunahuan rimarishachu, cai pachapi apu cac shamun mari. Pai ñucahuan mana imata charicpipash,
chashna tucuna can; chashna tucucpi, ñuca Yayata llaquishcata, pai mincahuashcata pactachishcata runacuna yachanunca. Jatarichic, jacuichic".
"Ñuca ubillas yura shinami cani, ñuca Yaya yurata ricuccamami.
Ñuca Yaya muyuta mana aparic pallcata cuchuncami; ranti, muyuta aparic pallcacunata ricunca, yanca pallcashitucunata cuchushpa ashtahuan aparincapac.
Cancuna na pichara canquichic ñuca cancunaman rimashca shimiraicu.

Ñucahuan llutarishpa catichic, ñuca cancunahuan llutarishpa catishca shina. Shuc pallca quiquinmanta mana aparinchu; yuraman mana llutashca cashpa, mana aparinchu; chashnallata, cancuna mana aparinquichic ñucahuan mana llutarishca cashpa.
Ñuca ubillas yurami cani, cancuna yura pallca canquichic. Maicanpash ñucahuan llutarishca catic ñucapash paihuan llutarishca, achca muyuta aparinca. Ñuca illac mana imatapash ushanquichic.
"Ñucahuan mana llutarishca runa jichui tucunca, huacllic pallca shina; chaquirincami; huasha, chai chaquishca pallcacunata tantachinunca rupachincapac.
Cancuna ñucahuan llutarishca cashpa ñuca yachachishcata pactachicpica, cancuna munashcata mañanquichic, mañashcata cushcanquichic.
Cancuna achcata aparishpa ñuca yachachishcacuna tucucpi, ñuca Yaya sumacyachishca can.
Yaya ñucata llaquishca shina, ñuca cancunata llaquircani; ñucata llaquishpa causaichic.
Cancuna, ñuca shimicunata uyashpa, ñucata llaquishpa catinquichic; ñucapash ñuca Yaya rimashca shimicunata uyarcani, paita llaquishpa causani.
"Chashna rimarcani cancuna ñucahuan cushiyancapac, cushiyashcahuan juntarincapac.
Ñuca rurai nishca caimi: Llaquinacuichic, ñuca cancunata llaquishca shina.
Shuc runa quiquin causaita cucpi shuc mashita llaquishpa, chai runata tucuicunamanta yalli llaquishcata ricuchin,
Cancuna ñuca mashicuna canquichic ñuca rimashcata pactachicpi.
Cancunata "luncucuna" nishpa mana rimashachu, luncu mana mari yachanchu amu rurashcata; ranti, cancunata "mashicuna" nini, ñuca Yayamanta uyashcata cancunaman huillarcani mari.
"Cancuna mana ñucata acllahuarcanquichic; ñuca cancuñata acllarcani; caipacta cancunata acllarcani: "Ñuca shimita tarpucrichic nishpa, tarpushca aparichun, aparishca ama chincarichun" nishpa.
Cancuna imatapash ñuca Yayaman mañacpi cushcanquichic. Shinacpi, caita cancunata nini: Llaquinacushpa causaichic.
"Cai pacha runacuna cancunata chicninucpica, paicuna ñaupac ñucata chicnishcata yuyarinquichic.

Cancuna cai pachamanta cacpica, cai pacha runacuna cancunata llaquinunman, paipaccunata llaquishca shina. Ranti, ñuca cancunata cai pachamanta acillarcani; chairaicu, cai pachapaccuna cancunata chicninun, cancuna mana cai pachamanta cacpi.

Cancunaman rimashcata yuyarinquichic; caita nircani: Shuc luncu mana paipac patronmanta yalli can. Ñucata llaquichinurca, cancunatapash llaquichinunca; ñuca yachachishcata caticcuna cancuna yachachishcatapash catinunca.
Ñucaraicu cancunata chicninunca, ñucata cachamushcata mana mari ricsinun.
"Ñuca paicunata camachincapac mana shamushca cacpica, juchata mana aparinunman; ranti, cunan juchata aparinun ñucata chicnishcaraicu;
chaita yachashpa ruranun, ñucata chicnic ñuca Yayatapash chicnin mari.
Ñuca paicunapac ñaupacpi manapí rana ushashcata mana rurashca cacpica, juchata mana aparinunman; ranti, chai mana raipaccunata ricunurca; ricushpallata ñucata ñuca Yayatapash chicninun.
Chashna tucun camachic quillcapi quillcara pactarincapac; cashna nin: Yancamanta, ñucata chicnihuanurca".
"Shuc puncha, Yanapac, shutita rimac Samai shamuncami; ñuca paita Yayapac shutipi cachasha; pai, Yayamanta shamuc cashpa, ñucamanta huillanca.
Cancunapash ñucamanta huillanquichic, callari pachamanta mari ñucahuan tiyarcanquichic.
"Chai tucuita cancunaman rimani cancuna inishca ama pishiyancapac.
Tantarina huasicunamanta cancunata shitanunca; ashtahuanpash, cancunata huañuchinunca; paicuna chashna rurashcahuan Diosta yupaichashcata yuyanunca.
Chaita ruranunca Yayata hucatapash mana ricsishcaraicu.
Chaita cancunata rimani cancuna ñucamanta yuyarincapac chashna tucucpi. Callarimanta mana rimarcanichu cancunahuan tiyashcaraicu.
"Cunaca, ñucata cachamushcahuan tiyancapac rinca rani, ¿imaraicu mana tapuhuanquichic "maimata rinqui" nishpa?
Tapuna rantimanta upata llaquirinquichic ñuca rimashcamanta.
Chashnapash, ñuca ricpica, cancunapac alli canca, shutita rimani, Ñuca mana ricpica, cancunata Yanapac mana shamuncachu; ranti, ñuca rishpa, paita cancunapacman cachasha.
Pai shamushpaca, cai pacha runacuna juchata rashcata ricuchinca, ñuca jucha iliac cashcata ricuchinca, Dios paicunata taripanca rashcata ricuchinca.
Juchallinurca ñucata mana inishcaraicu.
Ñuca jucha illac cashcata ricuchinca, ñupa Diospacman rinca rani mari; shinacpi, ña mana ricuhuanunca.
Dios cai pacha runacunata taripanca rashcata ricuchinca, cai pacha amu ña cautsayachi tucurca mari.
"Chaira achca tiyahuan cancunaman rimancapac; ranti cancuna cunan mana japina ushanquichic.
Shutita rimac Samai shamucpimi, atipana ushanquichic; pai tucuita atipachinca; mana paipac quiquin shutipi rimanca, paiman rimanushcata huillanca, ima tucunatapash ricsichinca.
Pai ñucata yupaichanca, ñucapacmanta japinca mari cancunaman ricsichincapac.
Tucui ñuca Yaya charishcata ñucapash charini; chairaicu nini: "Samai hucapacmanta japinca cancunaman ricuchincapac.
"Unailla mana ricuhuanquichic, astanipi cuti ricuhuanquichic, Yayapacman rinca rani mari.

Chashha nicpi, huaquin yachachishcacuna rimariranurca nishpa: —¿Imata nishpa nin chai shimicunata? "Unailla mana ricuhuanquichic, astanipi cuti ricuhuanquichic" nin; "chashna tucunca Yayapacman rinca rashcamanta" nin.
Imata nishpa nin chai "Unailla, astanipi". Pai rimarashcata mana atipanchichu.
Jesus, paicuna tapunayashcata yachashpa, nirca: —Ricushun: Ñuca caita nircani: "Unailla mana ricuhuanquichic, astanipi ricuhuanquichic cutillata". Manachu chaimanta tapunacunquichic?
Uyahuaichic cuti: Shuc puncha cancuna huacanquichic, ñacarinquichic, cai pachapaccuna cushiyanucpi; ranti, shuc puncha cancuna llaquirishca saquirincami, chaipac huasha cushiyanquichic.
Shuc huarmi pacarichina puncha ñacarin, huahua nanai paita japicpi; huahua pacaricpi, nanashcata cuncarin, shuc huahua pacarishcamanta cushiyashpa.
"Chashnallata, cancunapash cunan llaquirinquichic; ranti, ñuca ticracpi cushiyanquichic; chai cushiyashca pipash cancunata mana quichuncachu.
Chai punchapi mana imata tapuhuanquichic. Uyahuaichic: Cancuna imatapash Yayata mañacpi ñuca shutipi, pai cuncami.
Cunancama mana imata ñuca shutipi mañarcanquichic. Mañashpa cushcanquichic, cancuna cushiyashca pactarincapac.
"Cunancama rimashcata chinpapurachina shimicunahuan rimarcani; chashna shimicunahuan ña mana rimashcachu, pasacta Yayamanta huillasha.
Chai punchapi ñuta shutipi mañanquichic. Ñucaca mana ninichu "cancunamanta Yayata mañasha". Mana mutsurincachu.
Yayallata cancunata llaquin mari, cancuna ñucata llaquishcaraicu, ñuca Yayamanta shamushcata cancuna inishcaraicu.
Ari, Yayapacmanta llucshircani cai pachaman shamuncapac, cunan cai pachata saquishpa, Yayapacman ticranca rani.
Rimacpi uyashpa, yachachishcacuna ninurca: —Cunan pasacta rimaranqui, tucuita atipanchic.
Can tucuita yachashcata cunan ricsinchic, canta imatapash tapuncapac mana mutsurin. Chairaicu can Diosmanta shamushcata ininchic.
Chaita uyashpa, Jesus nirca: —¿Cunanchu ininquichic?
¡Cancuna chausirina pacha pactacpi, caran amu shuc caiman, shuc chaiman miticuncapac, ñucata sapalla saquishpa! Mana imananchu, ñuca mana sapalla tiyani, ñuca Yaya ñucahuan tiyan.
Chai tucuita rimarcani, cancuna ñucahuan llutarishpa ganaslla causancapac." Cai pacha runacunapi llaquichi tucunquichic; mana imananchu, cariyanquichic, ñuca paicunata atircani.
Chashna rimarca Jesus; chai huasha, jahuaman ricushpa nirca: —Yaya, pacha pactamurca. Canpac Churita sumacyachipai, canpac Churi canta sumacyachincapac.
Tucui runacunapac apu canata paiman curcanqui, chai runacunaman huihai causaita cuyachun nishpa.
Caimi huihai causai: Canta shuclla shuti jinu Diosta ricsinuchun, canta llaquinuchun can cachashca Jesucristontin.
Cunaca ñucata sumacyachipai, Yaya, ñuca canhuan tiyashcapi sumacyachi tucushpa causashca shina, manarac cai pacha tiyashcapi;
"Can cuhuashea cai pacha runacunaman canpac shutita ricsichircani. Canpaccuna canurca, can paicunata cuhuarcanqui, paicunaca canpac shimita chasquinurca.
Tucui can cuhuashca canmanta shamushcata cunan ininun.

Can rimahuashca shimicunata paicunaman rimarcani, paicunapa chai shimicunata chasquinurca; ñuca canmanta llucshishcata alli atipanun, can cachamuhuashcatapash ininun. Paicunamanta mañani, can cuhuashca runacunamanta; paicuna canpac canun; shuccunamanta mana mañanichu.
Tucui ñuca charishca canpacmi, chashnallata tucui can charishca ñucapacmi; ñuca paicunapi sumacyachishca cani.

"Ñuca ña mana cai pachapi tiyashachu, paicunaca cai pachapi saquirinun; ñuca canpacman ticranca rani. Sumac Yaya, can ñucaman cushca runacunata canllata canpac ushaihuan ricupanqui paicuna shuclla cancapac, ñucanchic shuclla cashca shina.
Ñuca paicunahuan causashcapi, paicunata pusharcani; paicunata quishpichircani can cuhuashca ushaihuan; Manapí chincarirca; chincarina cashcalla chincarirca, quillca nishca pactarihcapac.
"Cunan canpacman rirani; cai shimicunata cai pachapi tiyashpa rimani, paicuna ñuca cushita shuncupi charincapac.
Canpac shimita paicunaman huillarcani; cai pacha runacuna paicunata chicninun paicuna mana cai pachamanta cashcaraicu, ñucapash mana cai pachamantachu cani.
Can paicunata cai pachamanta llucshichipai nishpa mana mañanichu; ranti, paicunata supai apumanta quishpichipai.
Paicuna mana cai pachamanta canun, ñucapash mana cai pachamantachu cani.
"Paicunata shuti cashcahuan canraicu chicanyachipai; can rimashca shimi shutimi can.
Can ñucata cai pachapaccunaman cachamuhuashca shina, ñuca paicunata cai pachapaccunaman cachani.
Paicunamanta canman camari shina curinimi, paicunapash canman curishpa, can mincashcata rurashpa causancapac.
"Sumac Yaya, mana ¿paicunamantallachu mañani; tucui ñucapi ininacunamantapash mañani, paicuna rimashcamanta ininacuna.

Paicunapura shuclla canuchun. Can, Yaya, ñucapi tiyashca shina, ñuca canpi tiyashca shina paicuna shuclla ñucanchicpi canuchun nishpa mañani. Shucllapi causanuchun, cai pacha runacuna can cachamuhuashcata inincapac.
Can cuhuashcata paicunaman curcani, paicunapura shuclla cancapac, hucanchicpura shuclla cashca shina.

"Ñuca paicunapi tiyasha, can ñucapi tiyanqui; paicuna allipacha shuclla tucunuchun. Chashnami, cai pacha ruhacuna can ñucata cachamushcata atipanunca; chashnallata, can cai pacha runacunata llaquishcata ñucata llaquishca shina yachanunca.
"Yaya, caita munanni: Can mincahuashcacuna ñuca tiyanallapi tiyanuchun, ñucata ña sumacyachishcata ricushpa manarac cai pacha tiyashcapi shina.
Alli Yaya, cai pachamanta caccuna canta mana ricsinun; ranti ñuca canta ricsini, caicunapash yachanun can ñucata cachashcata.
Can pi cashcata paicunaman ricsichircani, canta ashtahuan ricsichisha, can ñucapi churashca llaquinaca paicunapac shuncupi tiyachun, ñuca quiquinllata paicunapi tiyancapac.
Rimanata tucuchishcapi, Jesus yachachishcacunantin Cedrón nishca yacu huahua chinpaman rirca. Chaipi shuc chacra tiyarca; chaiman Jesus yachachishcacunantin yaicurca.
Jesusta japichie Judas chai allpata ricsirca, chaipi mari achca cuti Jesus yachachishcacunantin tantaric carca.

Judas shuc suldaru bulata pushashpa chaiman pactarca nina purucunata, caspicunata, mircanucunata apashpa. Pacriyaya apucuna fariseocunantin chai suldaru bulata paiman cunurca Diospac huasita ricuc chapaeunatapash.
Jesus tucui ima tucunata yachashpa, paicunapacman rishpa tapurca: —¿Pitata mashcanquichic?
Ninurca: —Nazaretmanta Jesusta. Judaspash paicunahuan tiyarca.
Jesus nirca: ¿Ñucami cani. Chaita uyashpa paicuha huashahuan rishpa, allpaman urmanurca.
Jesus cutillata paicunata tapurca: ¿Pitata mashcanquichic? —Nazaretmanta Jesusta — ninurca.
Jesus paicunata nirca: —Ña uyarcanquichic, ñucami cani. Ñucata mashcacpica, caicunata ama quillachichichu.
Chashna tucurca Jesus rimashca pactarincapac, cashna mari rimashcarca: "Can cuhuashcacunamanta shucllapash mana chincarishcachu".
Simon Pedro, mireanuyuc cashpa, chaita surcushpa, shuc apupac luncuta huactarca, paipac rinrita pitirca; chai luncu Malco shutiyuc carca.
Jesus Pedrota nirca: —Mircanuta cara ucupi sati. ¿Manachu cai jatun llaquita apana cani, Yaya chashna munacpi?
Suldarucuna chapacunantin Jesusta japishpa huatanurca.
Ñaupac, Anaspacman paita pushanurca; Anas Caifaspac huarmi yaya carca, pacriyayacunapac jatun apu chai huata.
Caifasllata judiocunata rimashcarca nishpa: "Shuc runallata huañuchina astahuan alli canca ama tucuicuna huañunuchun".
Simon Pedro shuc yachachishca runahuan Jesusta catiranurca. Chai yachachishca runa jatun apuhuan ricsishca carca, chairaicu Jesus-huan pacta huasiman yaicurca.
Pedro canchapi saquirirca, puncullapi. Chai aputa ricsic yachachishca runa puncuta ricuccamahuan rimancapac llucshirca, Pedrota yaicuchincapac.
Puncuta ricuccama —shuc huarmi carca— Pedrota tapurca: —¿Manachu canpash chai runata catic canqui? —Mana- nirca.
Luncucuna chapacunapash, ninata japichishpa, rupayaranurca, yapa chiri mari carca. Pedropash paicunahuan tiyarca.
Pacriyaya jatun apu Jesusta tapurca pai yachachishcacunamanta camachishcamantapash.
Jesus cutiparca: —Ñuca tucuicunapac ñaupacpi rimarcani; ñuca huiñai judiocuna tantarina huasicunapi yachachic carcani; pacalla mana imata yachachircanichu.
¿Imata tapuhuanqui? ¿Ñucata uyashcacunata tapunqui; paicuna ñuca yachachishcata yachanun.
Chashna nicpi, shuc Diospac huasita ricuc runa maqui palahuan Jesusta huactarca nishpa: —¿Chashnachu jatun aputa rimarin?
Jesus paita cutiparca: —Ñuca manallita rimashca cacpica, nihuai imapi manallita rimarcani; alli rimashca cacpica, ¿imaraicu macahuanqui?
Chashnapi, Anas Jesusta jatun apu Caifaspacman cacharca.
Pedro nina mayanpi rupayararea. Chaipi tiyaccuna paita ninurca: —¿Manachu canpash pai yachachishcacunamanta canqui? —Mana- nirca.
Shuc jatun apupac luncu, Pedro rinrita pitishcapac aillu, paita nirca: —Ñuca quiquin ñahuicunahuan canta Jesus-huan chacrapi ricurcani.
Pedro nirca: —Mana Chai ucullapi cari atallpa caparirca.
Caifaspac huasimanta Jesusta gubirnu apupacman pushanurca. Inti ña pacaricpi, judiocuna apupac huasiman mana yaicunurca ama mapayancapac, chai puncha pascua micuna puncha mari carca.
Chairaicu, Pilato paicunapacman llucshirca tapuncapac: —Imamanta cai runata juchachinquichic?
Cutipanurca: —Cai runa mana juchayuc cashcapica mana canpacman pushamunchicman carca.
Pilato picunata nirca: —Cancunallata japichic, cancunapac yachai paita taripaichic. Judiocuna ninurca: —Ñucanchic manapita huañuchina ushanchic,
Chashna rimanucpi, Jesus rimashca pactarirca pai imashna huañuna cashcata huillashcapi.
Pilato ucuman yaicushpa, Jesusta shamuchishpa, paita tapurca: —Juidiocunapac Jatun Curacachu canqui?
Jesus nirca: —¿Can quiquinmantachu chaita ninqui? ¿shuccuna huillashcatachu rimanqui?
Pilato paita cutiparca: —¿Judiochu cani ñuca? Canpac llacta runacuna, pacriyaya apucuna canta ñucaman chasquichinurca. ¿Imatata rurarcanqui?
Jesus paita cutiparca: —Ñuca mana cai pacha apucuna shinachu cani. Paicuna shina cacpica, ñuca runacuna macarinunman judiocuna ñucata ama japincapac; fanti, ñuca shuc laya apumi cani.

Nicpi uyashpa Pilato tapurca: —Jatun Curacachu canqui? Jesus cutipashpa nirca: —Ari, ñuca Jatun Curacami cani. Cai pachaman shamurcani tucuicunaman shuti cashcata ricsichincapac. Shutita catic runacuna ñuca shimita uyanun.
Pilato tapurca: —¿Imaita can shuti? Chashna tapushpa, judiocunahuan rimarincapac llucshirca; paicunata nirca; —Cai runapi ima manallita mana tarinichu.
Caran huata, pascua punchapi, shuc huichcashca runata cacharic cani cancunapac yachai. Judiocunapac jatun Curacata cacharincapac munanquichichu?
Paicuna caparishpa ninurca: —¡Mana paita! ¡Barrabasta cachari! Barrabas shuc millai shuhua runa carca.
Chashnapi, Pilato Jesusta japishpa llipachichirca.
Suldarucuna, Jesusta japishpa, shuc casha llaututa ahuashpa, paipac umapi churanurca; shuc puca churanatapash churachinurca;
huasha, paipacman mayanyarishpa ninurca: —¡Canta saluranchic, judiocunapac Jatun Curaca! Chashna nishpa, maqui palahuan paita huactaranurca.
Pilato cutillata judiocuna tiyashcaman llucshirca. Paicunata nirca: —Uyahuaichic, cai runapi ima juchata mana tupashpa cancunaman cutillata pushamuni.
Chashna nicpi, Jesus llucshirca; casha llaututa paipac umapi charirca, puca churanata churarishca. Pilato, paita ricuchishpa, nirca: —¡Ricuichic cai runata!

Pacriyaya apucuna chapacunapash paita ricushpa, caparinurca nishpa: —¡Paita huañuchi, paita huañuchi! ¡Cruspi chacatashca huañuchun! Pilato paicunata nirca: —Cancunallata japichic, paita huañuchichic, ñuca ima juchata mana tupanichu paipi.
Judiocuna cutipanurca: —Ñucanchic yachai, paita huañuchina can, "Diospac Churi cani" nirca mari.
Chaita uyashpa, Pilato ashtahuan mancharca.
Jesusta huasi ucuman cutillata pushashpa, Pilato paita tapurca: —¿Maimanta canqui? Jesus chunlla saquirirca.
Pilato paita nirca: —¿Imaraicu mana rimahuanqui? ¿Canta huañuchina, canta cacharina ushashcata manachu yachanqui?
Chashnapi, Jesus paita cutiparca: —Ñucata mana imata rana ushanquiman Dios mana munashcapi; chairaicu, ñucata canman chasquichishca runa canmanta yalli juchayuc can.
Chai pachamanta, Pilato Jesusta cacharinata munarca; ranti, judiocuna paita caparinurca: —Paita cacharishpa, Incahuan mana mashichu canqui; pipash jatun Curacami cani nishpa, Incata chicnin.
Chaita uyashpa, Pilato Jesusta canchaman llucshichirca; huasha, taripana tiyarinapi tiyarirca, hebreo shimipi "Gábata" nishcapi (Gabata nishpa, "rumihuan rurashca panpa" nin runa shimipi).
Pascua micunata allichina puncha carca, chaupi puncha mayanlla. Pilato Jesusta ricuchishpa nirca: —Caimi cancunapac Jatun Curaca!
Paicuna caparishpa ninurca: —¡Huañuchun, huañuchun! ¡Cruspi paita huañuchi! Pilato nirca: —¿Cancunapac Jatun Curacata huañuchishachu? Judiocuna ninurca: —¡Ñucanchipac Jatun Curaca Incallami can!
Chaita uyashpa, Pilato Jesusta paicunaman curca chacatashca cancapac. Paicunaea Jesusta japishpa chacatancapac pushanurca.
Jesus, crusta marcashpa, Calvario urcuman rirca (hebreo shimipi Gólgota ninun; nicpi, "aya tullu panpa").
Chaipi paita chacatanurca; ishcai runatapash chacatanurca shuc alli maquiman, shuc lluqui maquiman.
Pilato shuc quillcata quillcachirca crus umapi churancapac; chai quillcapi cashna quillcara tiyarca: "Nazaretmanta Jesus judiocunapac Jatun Curaca".
Achca runacuna chai quillcashcata ricunurca; chai urcu llactamanta mana caru carca; quillcashcaca quimsa shimipi quillcara carca: arameo shimipi, griego shimipi, latin shimipi.
Judio apucuna Pilatota ninurca: —Can quillcashcata "judiocunapac Jatun Curaca" nishpa pichana can; "judiocunapac Jatun Curaca cani nirca" nishpa quillcanqui.
Pilato nirca: —Ñuca quillcashca quillcara saquirin.
Jesusta chacatashca huasha, suldarucuna paipac churanacunata japinurca caranpac shuc; cushmaca mana sirara carca, illacta ahuara carca;

chairaicu ninurca: —Caita ama pitishun; lichayucpac saquirichun. Chashna quillca nishca pactarirca, cashna mari quillcara tiyarca: "Ñuca churanacunata paicunapura cunacurca; ñuca cushmaca lichayucpac saquirirca".
Crus chaquipi Jesuspac mama tiyarca, paipac ñaña Cleofaspac huarmi Mariapash, Maria Magdalenapash.
Jesus paipac mamata ricushpa, yachachishca Juanpash chaillapi tiyacpi ricushpa, mamata nirca: —Huarmi, chaimi canpac churi.
Huasha, yachachishca runata nirca: —Chaimi canpac mama. Chai pachamanta chai yachachishca runa Jesuspac mamata paipac huasiman pusharca.
Chaipac huasha, Jesus pai raranata ña pactachishcata yachashpa, quillca nishca pactarincapac nirca: —Upianayahuan.
Chaipi shuc jayac bino manca tiyarca; suldarucuna shuc esponjata japinurca; jayac binopi jucuchishpa, pintupi huatashpa, Jesusta upiachinurca.
Jesus jayac binota camashca huasha, caparishpa nirca: —Tucui illacta pactarirca. Umata lapushpa huañurca.
Cayantin puncha jatun raimi pascua nishca carca. Ayacuna ama cruspi saquirincapac, judiocuna Pilatopacman nnurca "ayacunata chaimanta anchuchipai" nishpa mañancapac.
Suldarucuna rishpa, Jesushuan pacta chacatashcacunapac chancacunata paquinurca.
Jesuspacman mayanarishpa ña huañushcata ricushpa, paipac chancacunata mana paquinurcachu;
shuc suldaru tucsinahuan paipac tintilluta tucsirca; chai ucullapi yahuar yacupash llucshirca.
Chaita ricushca runa "Chasna tucurca" nin, pai rimashca shuti can; pai yachanmi shutita rimashcata cancuna inincapac.
Chashnarmi quillca nishca pactarirca: "Paipac tullucunata mana shucllatapash paquinquichichu".
Shucpi nin: "Tucsishcaman ricununca".

Chaipac huasha, shuc Arimateamanta runa Jose shutiyuc (paipash Jesusta catic carca, pacalla catic carca judiocunata manchashcamanta) Pilatopacman rirca Jesuspac ayata manancapac. Pilato pai mañashcata cucpi, chai runa Jesuspac ayata apashpa rircai.
Shucpash Nicodemo shutiyuc shamurca; chai runa shuc cuti Jesus-huan rimarincapac tuta rishcarca. Chai runa asnac yacuta apamurca shuc patsac libra tuputa.
Jesuspac ayata japishpa asnac yacuhuan armachishpa, churanahuan pillunurca judiocunapac yachai panpancapac.
Chai manyata shuc chacra tiyarca, chacrapi shuc aya jutcu; manapí chaira chai jutcupi panpai tucushca carca.
Chaipi Jesuspac ayata churanurca; caruman chincachincapac mana ushanurcachu, samana puncha nalla pactanca racurca mari.
Semana ñaupac puncha tutamantashitu, chaira tuta ucupi, Maria Magdalena Jesus ta panpanushca jutcuman rirca. Chaiman pactac, nimita anchuchishcata ricurca.
Callpashpa, Simon Pedropacman, chai shuc yachachishca Jesus yapa llaquishca runapacman rirca. Paicunata tupashpa nirca: —¡Aya jutcumanta Apunchicta surcunurca, maipi churanushcata mana yachanchichu!
Rimacpi uyashpa, Pedrohuan chai shuc yachachishca runahuan aya jutcuman rinurca.
Ishcaintin pacta callpanurca; chai shuc yachachishea runa Pedromanta yalli callpashpa, ñaupae aya jutcuman pactarca.
Ricuncapac cumurishpa, churanacunata allpapi ricurca; mana yaicurcachu.
Unailla Pedro pactarca. Aya jutcuman yaicushpa, churanacunata allpapi ricurca.
Jesuspac umata pillunushca churana mana allpapi tiyarca shuc churanacunahuan, shuccpi patachira tiyarca.
Chai yachachishca runa, ñaupac pactamuc runa, paipash yaicurca; ricushpa inirca.
Quillcapi quillcara tiyashcata "Jesus huañushcacunamanta causarina can" nishpa, chai pachacama mana atipanushcarca.
Chaita ricushpa, chai yachachishcacuna huasiman ticranurca.
Maria aya jutcu mayanpi huacashpa saquirirca. Huacashpa, aya jutcuman ricuncapac cumurishpa,
ishcai angelcunata yuraclla churarishcata ricurca; Jesuspac aicha tiyashcapi tiyanurca, shuc umaman, shuc chaquiman.
Angelcuna huarmita tapunurca: —Huarmi, ¿imaraicu huacaranqui? Pai nirca: —Apunchicta apanurca, maipi churanushcata mana yachanichu.
Chashna nishpa, ticracpi ricushpa, Jesus chaipi shayashcata ricurca; Jesus cashcata mana yacharca.
Jesus paita nirca: —Huarmi, ¿imaraicu huacaranqui? ¿Pitata mashcacunqui? Pai, chacracamami yuyashpa, nirca: —Ayalla, can paita apashca capi, maipi churashcata rimahuai, ñuca paita apancapac.
Chashna rimacpi, Jesus paita nirca: —¡Maria! Paica ticrashpa nirca: —¡Raboni! ("raboni" nishpa "yachachiccama" nin)

Jesus paita nirca: —Cacharihuai, chaira caipi tiyani mari; ñuca huauquicunapacman rishpa, paicunata rimanqui: "Ñuca Yayapacman, huca Diospacman rinca rani; pai cancunapac Yayami, cancunapac Diosmi".
Chashna rimacpi, Maria yachachishcacunapacman rishpa nirca: —Apunchicta ricurcani, caita nihuarca. Jesus rimashcataca huillarca.

Chai punchallapi, ña tutayaracpi, Jesus yachachishcacuna shuc huasipi tiyanurca; judiocunata manchashcamanta huasi puncu huichcara carca. Cuncaimanta Jesus yaicurca; paicuna chaupi shuncupi shayarishpa nirca: —¡Ganas causanata charichic!
Huasha, paipac maquicunata, paipac tintilluta tucsishcata ricuchirca. Apostolcuna, Jesusta ricushpa, yapa cushiyanurca.
Jesus cutillata nirca: —¡Ganas causanata charichic! Ñuca Yaya cachamuhuashca shina, ñucapash cancunata cachani.
Huasha, paicuna jahuapi pucurca nishpa: —Santo Samaita chasquichic.
Cancuna pichashca juchacuna pichara saquirinunca; cancuna mana pichashca juchacuna mana pichara saquirinunca.
Shuc yachachishca runa, Tomas shutiyuc Didimo nishca, Jesus shamushcapi illarca.

Shuccuna paita rimanurca: —Apunchicta ricurcanchic. Pai cutipashpa nirca: —Paipac maquipi clavo jutcuta mana ricushpa, ñuca maqui rucata chai jutcupi tintillu jutcupipash mana satishpa, mana inishachu.

Pusac puncha huasha, yachachiscacuna chai huasillapi tiyanurca; Tomas paicunahuan tiyarca. Puncu huichcara cacpi, Jesus yaicurca; paicuna chaupi shuncupi shayarishpa nirca: —¡Ganas causanata charichic!
Huasha Tomasta nirca: —Tomas, maqui rucata sati caipi, ñuca maquita llancai; canpac maquita ñuca tintillu jutcupi sati; ama inina illac caichu; inishcayuc cana canqui.
Tomas nirca: —¡Ñuca Apulla, ñuca Dioslla!
Jesus shuc achca munanayacta ricuriccunata rurarca yachachishcacuna ñaupacpi, chaicuna cai quillcapi mana quillcashca tiyanun.
Chaicunata quillcarcani Jesus Mesias cashcata cancuna inincapac; cancuna chashna inishpa, paipac causaita charinquichic.
Jesus yachachishcacunaman cutillata ricurirca Tiberiades cucha patapi; cashna tucurca:
Simon Pedro-huan, Tomas-huan, Natanael-huan ishcai Cebedeopac churicunahuan shuc ishcai yachachishcacunahuan pacta tiyanurca.
Simon Pedro nirca: —Llicancapac rirani. Shuccuna ninurca: —Canhuan shamushun. Rishpa canuaman yaicunurca. Tuta pacaricta mana imata japinurca.
Punchayacucpi, Jesus tiyu panpapi ricurimurca; chai runacuna Jesus cashcata mana yachanurca.
Jesus paicunata nirca: —Runacuna, ¿imatapash japircanquichichu? —Mana imata japircanchic -ninurca.
Jesus paicunata nirca: —Llicata alli maquiman shitaichic, tarinquichicmi. Llicata shitashpa, achca yacu aichacunata japinurca, llicata mana aisana ushanurca,
Chai Jesus llaquishca runa Pedrota nirca: —¡Apunchicmi! Simon Pedro "Apunchicmi"nishcata uyashpa, churanata churarishpa —llatan mari carca— yacuman shitarirca.
Shuccuna canuahuan shamunurca llicata aisashpa; yacu patamanta mana caru carca, shuc patsac metro tupulla.
Allpaman pactaccuna ninata japichishcata ricunurca; nina jahuapi shuc challua tiyarca; tantapash tiyarca.
Jesus paicunata nirca: —Cunan japishca aichacunamanta apamuichic.
Simon Pedro, canuaman sicashpa; llicata allpaman aisarca; jatun challua juntarashca shuc patsac picha chunca quimsa; chashna achca cacpipash, llica mana lliquirishcachu.
Jesus paicunata nirca: —Micuc shamuichic. Paicuna "can pitac canqui" nishpa tapunata manchanurca, Jesus cashcata yachashpallata.
Jesus mayanyashpa, tantata japishpa paicunaman curca; yacu aichatapash cararca. l
Chaihuan quimsa cuti Jesus yachachishcacunaman ricurimurca causarishca huasha.

Micushca huasha, Jesus Pedrota nirca: —Juanpac churi Simon, ¿caicunamanta yalli llaquihuanquichu? Pedro cutipashpa nirca: —Ari, Apunchic, ñuca canta llaquishcata yachanqui. Jesus paita nirca: —Ñuca obeja huahuacunata michinqui.
Unailla cutillata tapurca: —Juanpac churi Simon, ¿ñucata llaquihuanquichu? Pedro paita cutiparca: —Ari, Apunchic, ñuca canta llaquishcata yachanqui. Jesus paita nirca: —Ñuca obejacunata michinqui.

Quimsaniqui cuti tapurca: —Juanpac churi Simon, ¿ñucata llaquihuanquichu? Pedro, Jesus quimsa cuti "llanquihuanquichu" nishpa tapushcamanta llaquirishpa, nirca: —Apunchic, can tucuita yachanqui; ñuca canta llaquishcata yachanqui. Jesus paita nirca: —Ñuca obejacunata michinqui.

Shuti pacha canta nini: Can malta cashcapi, canllata churaric carcanqui, can munashcaman ric carcanqui. Can rucuyacpimi, ricracunata chutachinqui, shucca canta churachinca, can mana munashcaman pushai tucunqui.
Chashna rimashpa Jesus imashina Pedro huañunca rashcata Diosta sumacyachincapac ricsichirca. Huasha paita nirca: —¡Catihuai!
Pedro ticrashpa, Jesus yapa llaquishca nina paicunata catimurashcata ricurca; chai runa puchucai tuta micunapi Jesuspac mayanpi tiyashpa, paita tapushcarca "Apulla, pimi canta japichinca ran" nishpa.
Pedro paita ricushpa, Jesusta nirca: —Apunchic, ¿cai runaca imata tucunca?
Jesus paita cutiparca: —Ñuca ticranacama pai caipi saquirichun ñuca munacpica, canta mana imananchu. Can catihuai.

Cashna Jesus nicpi, chai runa mana huañunca rashcata huaquincunapura rimarirca; ranti, Jesus mana nircachu" "mana huañunca ran" nishpa; "cai runa ñuca ticranacama caipi saquirichun ñuca munacpica, canta mana imananchu" nishpa nirca.
Caimi chai tucuita huillac runa, paillata chaicunata quillcashpa saquirca; pai shutita rimashcata yachanchic.
Shuc achcacunatapash Jesus rurarca; chaicunata shuc shuc quillcanucpi, quillcashca pancacuna tucui cai pachapi mana yaicununman yachin.
Teófilo, ñuca ñaupa quillcashca pancacunapi tucui Jesus yachachishcacunamanta, pai callarishcapi rurashcacunata churarcani,
pai jahuapachaman pushai tucushca punchacama. Pai acllashca Apostolcunata Diospa Samaihuan pai rimashcacunata atipachishca huasha.

Paicunahuanmi taririrca pai ñacarishca huasha, achcacunahuan pai causac casncata ricsichishpa, paicunaman chuscu chunca puncha tupu ricurirca, chaipi paicunata Dios Apu cana Pachamanta (Reino de Dios) rimarca.
Shuc cuti paicunahuan micucushpa paicunata cashna rimarca: —Jerusalenmanta ama caruyanquichicchu; chapaichic Yaya rimashca pactarichun; ¿manachu ña chaimanta cancunata rimarcani?
Juan Yacuhuan bautisarca, cancuna ranti manapash unaipi Diospa Samaihuan bautisai tucunca ranquichic.
Chairaicu chaipi tantarishcacuna tapunacurca: —Apunchic, ¿cunachu Israelmanta Apu jinu tucunca ranqui?
Pai cutiparca: —Yaya paipa munaihuan chai pachacunapi ruranca rashcata cancuna imata yachana charinquichic.
Chashnapash shuc ushaita chasquinquichicmi, Diospac Samai cancunapacman uraicumucpi, ñucamanta Jerusalenpi, tucui Judeapi, Samariapi, tucui pachapi ricuyaccuna tucunca ranquichic.
Chaita rimashca huasha, pai sicashcata ricunurca, shuc puyu paicuna ricushcata qillparca.
Paicuna allipacha jahuaman ricushpa shayacushcapi, ishcai runa yuraclla churarishca paicunaman mayanyanurca
cashna rimashpa: —Galileamanta runacuna, ¿imata rashpami jahuamanlla ricushpa shayanquichi? Caimanta cunan jahua pachaman pushai tucuc Jesusllata pai rishca shinallatacmi ticramunca.
Chashnapi, paicuna Olivos nishca urcumanta ticramunusca, chaimanta Jerusalenman mana caru can: samana puncha paicuna puri ushashca tupu.

Llactapi pactashpa paicuna causana huasipi yaicunurca; paicuna canurcami: Pedro, Juan, Santiago, Andres, Felipe, Tomas, Bartolome, Mateo, Alfeopa churi Santiago, Shuncuhuan Curishca (el Fanático) shutiyuc Simon, Santiagopac huauqui Judas.
Tucuipura paicuna Dioshuan rimarinapi huiñai catiranurca, Jesuspac mama Maria paipac aillucunandin.
Chai punchacunapi chaipi shuc patsac ishcai chunca runacuna tantarishca tiyanurca. Pedro cai runa ucupi shayarishpa rimancapac callarirca chai huauquicunata:
—Huauquicuna, Diospac Samai ñaupa quillcapi rimashca pactarina carca; David Judasmanta rimashca: pai millai runacunata Jesusta japichincapac pusharca.
Ñucanchic-huan puric carca, ñucanchic shinallata llancac.
Jesusta catushpa japishca cullquihuan shuc allpata rantirca, huasha huaicuman urmarca, paipa huicsa tucyacpi chunchullicuna chausirinurca.
Pai chashna tucushcata tucui Jerusalenmanta runacuna yachanurca, paicunapac shimipi chai allpata rimanurca Aceldama, aya panpa.

Yachanchic Diosman Taquinacuna (Salmos) pancacunapi quillcashca tiyan: "Pai causashca allpa chushac saquirichun, ama pi runata chaipi causana yuyai tiyachun". Chaillapita rimanpash: "Pai rantimanta shuc llancachun".
Chairaicu, allimi canca shuc runa chai Jesus causarishcata ricuyac ñucanchiman llutarichun, shuc, chai Jesus ñucanchihuan causacushcapi puric,
Juan bautisashpa purishcamanta pai jahua pachaman pushai tucushcacama.
Ishcaita shayachinurca: Jose Barsabata, Cusca shuncuyuc nishca, Matiasta.
Chai huasha cashna rimarinurca: —Apunchic, can tucuicunapac shuncuta ricsinqui; ricsichi cai ishcaicunamanta maicantata acllarcanqui,
pai Apostol tucuchun Judas rantimanta, cai rinaman rishpa saquishcaraicumanta.
Lichayucta yachancapac racpi, Matias lichayuc tucurca, paita chunca shuc Apostolcunaman yapachinurca.
Pentecostes puncha pactashcapi tucuilla shucllapi tantarishca tiyanurca.
Cuncaimanta sinchi huaira shina jahua pachamanta uyarimushpa tucui paicuna tiyacushca huasipi juntarirca.
Chaipi ricunurca shuc nina callu shinacuna caran umapi shayarishcata,
tucuilla. Diospac Samaihuan juntarishca saquirinurca, caran shimipi rimancapac callrinurca, chai Samai paicunata rimachishca shina.
Jerusalenpi canacurca tucui mama-llactamantacuna shamushca Diosta llaquic judiocuna.
Chai tulupushcata uyashpa achcacuna chaima rinacurca, mancharishca saquirinurr ca, caranlla quiquin shimipi rimashcata uyashpa.
Tucuilla mancharicushiyashpa tapurinurca: —¿Manachu Galileamanta canun tuciu chai rimacuccunaca?
¿Shinacpi imaraicuta caranlla ñucanchicpac quiquin shimipi rimashcata uyacunchic?
Caipi tiyanchic Partomanta runa, Mediamanta, Elanmanta; cuti shuccunaca causanchic Mesopotamiapi, Judeapi, Capadociapi, Pontopi,

Asiapi, Frigiapi, Panfiliapi, Egiptopi, Cirene mayapi tiyac Libia suyumanta; maicancunaca Romamanta runa canchic, maicancunaca judio, cuti shuccunaca mana judio cashpapash paicunapac ininata catiranun;
Cretamanta, Arabiamanta shamushcacunapash tiyan, chashnapash Diosmanta sumac rimashcacunata tucuilla quiquinpac shimipi uyacunchic.
Ima tucucushcata mana yachashpa, mancharishpa tapurinurca: —¿Caica imatata ñucanchicman ricsichinayan?
Ranti shuccunaca, asishpa rimanurca: —Machac mari canun.
Chashnapi Pedro chunca shuc Apostolcunahuan shayarishpa, sinchi shimihuan rimarca: —Judio runacuna, Jeresalenpi causaccunapash ñuca shimita uyapaichic; allita atipashpa ricunquichic.
Cancuna rimashca shina mana machacchu canchic; chaira tutamantalla can.
Cunan caipi pactaricunmi profeta Joel shutiyuc rimashca:

"Puchucai punchacunapi tucuncami, riman Dios, ñuca Samaita tucui runapacpi tallichincapac rani; cancunapac churicuna ushushicunapash ñucaraicu huillanunca, maltacuna rucucunapash nuspaicunatami nuspanunca.
Chai punchacunapi ñuca Samaita ñuca chulucunapash jahuapi tallichishami,
Jahuapachapi sumaimanacunatami rasha; cai allpapica: yahuar, nina, cushni jatarishca tiyanca.
Intica yanayancami, quillaca yahuaryancami, Apunchicpac puncha chaira mana pactashcapi, jatun puncha, manaricuipac puncha.
Chashnapash, Apunchicpac shimipi mañashpa quishpichi tucununcami".
Israelmanta runacuna uyahuaichic: Nazaretmanta Jesusta ñucanchic ucupi ushaita Dios cushcarca: Paita rurachirca mana raipaccunata, sumac ricuriccunatapash, cancuna chaita yachanquichic.
Chashnapash, cancunaca millai runacunaman japishpa curcanquichic, paita huañuchircanquichic, cruspi chacatarcanquichic, Dios munashca shina, pai unaimanta rimashca shina.
Ranti Dios paita causachirca huañuimanta quishpichishpa; mana allichu carca huañui paita yallincapac,
paimanta David cashna riman: 'Apunchicta huiñaipac ñucapac uaupacpi charini, paita ñucapac yachac maquipi charishpa mana urmashachu.
Chairaicu ñuca shuncu cushiyahuan, canta cushiyashcahuan chacchani, ñuca aichapash chapashpa samacun.
Mana mari panparallapi jichuhuanquichu, mana saquinquichu canta allipacha catic ismusha tucurichun.
Causai ñanpita ricsichihuashcanqui, can ñucahuan tiyacushpa cushichihuanquimi.'
Huauquicuna, allita atipachishpa rimashcata uyahuaichic: rucu yaya David huañurca, panpai tucurcapash, paipac aya jutcuca ñucanchic ucupi cunancama sirin.
Ranti pai tucunca rashcata huillac cashpa, yacharca Dios quiquinpac shutipi rimashcaraicu shuc paipac aillu jatun apu tucunca rashcata.
Chairaicu ñaupacta ricurca Mesias huañushcacunamanta causarishcata, paimanta mari cashna rimashpa nirca, mana panparashcapi jichui tucurcachu, paipac aichapash mana ismurcachu.
Caimi Jesus, tucui ñucanchic ricushcanchic paita Dios causachishcata.
Tucuita ushac Diospac maquihuan jatunyachishca, Yayamanta cachamuna nishca Diospac Samaita cunan tallichishca, chaitami cancuna uyanquichic, ricucunquichic.
Shutimi can, David mana jahua pachaman sicarcachu, chashnapash, riman: Apunchic, ñucapac Apunchicta rimarcami: Ñucapac yachac maquiman tiyari,
ñucami canta pinaccunata canpa chaqui ucupi churancapac racuni.
Chashna cacpi Israelmanta tucui runacuna allita yachanuchun, Dios chai cancuna cruspi chacatashca Jesusta APUNCHIC, MESIAS rurashcata".
Chai shimicunata uyashpa, yapa llaquirishcahuan Pedrota chai shuc Apostolcunatapash tapunurca: —¿Imata ruracpimi alli tucunca, huauquicuna?

Pedro paicunata cutiparca: —Cancunapac causaita allichichic cancunamanta caranlla Jesucristopac shutipi bautisarishpa, cancunapac juchacunamanta pichashca saquirincapac. Diosca paipa Samaita cancunaman cuncami;
pai cushami rimashcaca cancunapacmi, cancunapac churicunapacpash, tucui chicanmanta Apunchic cayashca runacunapacpash.
Cuti shuc achca shimicunahuan, Pedro paicunata camachirca: —Chicanyaichic cai millai runacunamanta.
Pai rimashca shimita uyaccuna bautisai tucunurca; chai puncha iniccunaman quimsa huaranca tupu yaparinurca.
Apostolcuna rimashcata mana sanpayashpa pactachiccuna carca, tucui charishcacunata cunacushpa, misata ranapi, Dioshuan rimarinapipash.
Tucui runacuna mancharishpa ricunurca mancharicushiyashcacunata Apostolcuna ruracpi ricushpa.
Tucui chai iniccuna shuc yuyaillapi catiranurca, paicuna charishcata tucui chaipuralla charishpa.
Allpa, tucui imacuna charishcata catushpa, caran runa mutsushcata ricushpa raquiccuna carca.
Caran puncha Diospac huasiman cushiyashcahuan riccuna carca; huasicunapi misata rashpa, tucuipura cushiyashcahuan micuccuna carca.
Diosta chacchacuna carca, tucui runacuna paicunata llaquiccuna carca; caran puncha Apunchic mirachicurca chai tantarishcacunaman quishpichicushcacunata.
Pedro Juantin chishi mayanman Dioshuan paipac huasipi rimarinaman "riranurca, chashnapi shuc suchu runa, mamapac huicsa ucumanta chashna pacarishca, apamuranushcata ricunurca.
Chai runata tucui puncha churaccuna carca Diospac huasipi tiyac Sumac Puncu nishcapi, chaipi paita churaccuna carca llaquirishcahuan diosmantata (limosna) chaiman yaicuccunata mañashpa tiyancapac.
Pedro Juantin Diospac huasiman yaicucushcata rictishpa diosmantata paicunata mañarca.
Pedro, Juanta paipac mayanpi charishpa, chai runata ricushpa saquirishpa rimarca: —Ñucanchiman ricui.
Chai suchu runa paicunapac ñahuiman allipacha ricurca, imallapash cuhuanunman yuyashpa.
Chashnapi Pedro paita nirca: —Curi, cullqui mana charinichu, ñuca charishcata canman cuni: Nazaretmanta Jesus Mesiaspac shutipi purincapac callari.
Yachac maquimanta japishpa, jatachirca.

Chaillapita paipa chancacuna chaqui mucucunapash sinchiyanurca, pahuaillahuan shayarirca, purincapac callarishpa paicunahuan Diospac huasiman yaicurca quiquin chaquihuan, pahuashpa, Diosta chacchashpa.
Tucui runacuna pai puricushpa Diosta chacchacushcata ricunacurca; diosmantata
Sumac Puncupi mañashpa tiyacllata cacpi ricushpa yapa mancharinurca, chashna. tucushca ricushpa.
Chai alliyashca runa mana llushpirinayarca Pedropac, Juanpac mayanmanta, chairaicu chashna mancharishca runacuna, callpashpa rinacurca Salomonpac puncu canchaman, chaipi paicuna canacurca,

Pedro, runacuna tantarishcata ricushpa, paicunata cashna nirca: —Israelmanta runacuna, ¿imaraicuta alliyachishcamanta mancharinquichic? Mana ñucanchic ushaihuanchu, mana ñucanchic yapa alli cashcamantachu paita purichircanchic.

Yachaichic Abrahanpac Dios, Isaacpac Dios, Jacobpac Dios, ñucanchic rucucunapac Dios, paipac runa Jesusta jahuayachirca. Paita japishpa apucunaman cancuna curcanquichic; Pilato cacharina munashcapi, chashnallata cancuna mana munarcanquichic.
Mana juchayuc runata cacharichina rantimanta, ashtahuan huañuchisiqui runata cacharichircanquichic;
ranti causaiman pushac Aputa huañuchichircanquichic. Chashnapash Dios paita causachirca; chaita ricushcaraicu ñucanchic rimanchie.
Jesupac shutipi inishcaraicu, cai Shuti alliyachishca cai cancuna ricsishca suchu runata. Shinacpi, Cristopi inishcaraicumi cai runa allipacha alliyashca saquirishca, tucui cancuna ricushca shina.
Yachanimi, huauquicuna, cancuna apucunantin mana yachashpa huañuchishcata.
Ranti Dios chashna rurashcahuan pactachirca tucunca rashcata huillaccuna rimashcata: Paipac Mesias ñacarina cashcata.
Chairaicu, juchacunamanta nanarishpa alli causaiman ticraichic. Chaipi shuti Apunchicca alli causaita apamuncami yachin
shamuna Mesiasta cachamushpa.
Chai Mesias Jesusmi can, jahua pachapi tiana can, cai pacha mushuyachi tucunacama, chaimanta Dios ña rimarca tucunca rashcata huillaccunapac shimihuan.
Moises rimarca: "Apunchic Dios ñuca shina runata cai huauquicuna ucumanta shayachinca. Uyapanquichic tucui pai rimanca rashcata.
Chai runata mana uyac llacta ucumanta callpachishcami canca.
Tucui tucunca rashcata huillaccuna, Samuelmanta callarishpa, pai huasha shamuccunapash, cai punchacuna pactamunamanta rimanushcami.

Cancunami chai runacunapac huahuacuna canquichic, Dioshuan cancunapac rucucunahuan curishca shimita chasquincapac racuccuna, Dios Abrahanta cashna rimashcapi: "Canpac churicunapimi bendisiashca canunca tucui cai allpamanta aillucuna".
Naupacta cancunapacta nishpa huañushcamanta causachishca paipac runata, paita cachamushcami bendisionta cancunaman apamuncapa, cancuna mana allicunamanta anchurina cacpi.
Chaira paicuna chai runacunata rimacushcapi pacri yayacuna pactamunurca, Diospac huasipi ricuccunapac apupash, saduceocunantin.
Yapa piñarishca canurca runacunata yachachishcamanta, rimaranacurcapash ima shina Jesus causarishca tucui runacuna causarina cashcata ricuchicushcata.
Paicunata japishpa chunta curralpi cayanticama churanurca ña tutayacushcaraicu.
Paicuna rimashcata uyashpa achcacuna ininurca, iniccuna mirarishpa caticushca ña pichca huarancaman pactarca.
Cayanti puncha Jerusalenpi tantarinurca apucuna, rucucuna, yachachic quillcata yachaccuna,
Yaya pacricunapac apu Anas, Caifas, Jonatan, Alejandro, tucui chai Yayapacripac aillumanta caccuna chaillapita canurca.
Pedrota Juantapash paicunapac ñaupacman cayashpa tapunurca: —¿Pipac ushaihuata, pipac shutipita chaita rurarcanquichic?
Chashnapi Pedro, Diospac Samaihuan juntarishca cashpa, paicunata cutiparca: —Llacta apucuna, Israelmanta rucucuna,
cunan cutipana canchic shuc uncuc janpi tucushcamanta, pimi janpirca rushpachu tapunquichi. Tucuilla allita uyapaichic

chasnallata cai Israelmanta runacuna tucuilla allita uyanuchun: Janpi tucushcami Nazaretmanta Jesucristopac shutiraicu, paita cancuna cruspi chacatarcanquichic, chashnallata Dios paita huañushcacuna ucumanta causachirca; pairaicumi cai runa cunan cancunapac ñaupacpi alli, paipac quiquin chaquihuan shayacun.
Jesusmi, cancuna, huasi ruraccuna mana alli nishpa jichushca rumi, ranti cunan sapiyachic rumi tucushca.
Chairaicu, cai tucui pachamanta runacunapacpi shuc mana mari tiyan Diospacman pactancapac nicpi.

Chai Pedro Juantin yapa cuscata rimashcata ricushpa mancharishca saquirinurca, yachanurca paicuna mana quillca imatapash yachashcata, mana ricsiracunapash canurca. Yachanurca mari Jesus-huan puriccuna cashcata,
ranti paicunapac mayanpi ricunurca chai alliyashca runa shayacushcata; chashnamanta mana shuc shimi rimanurcachu.
Taripana ucumanta llucshichi tucunurca, chai huasha paicunapura rimarincapac callarinurca:
Imatami rurashun cai runacunata. Cai Jerusalenpi tucuilla yachanun paicuna mana raipacta rurashcata, ñucanchic chaimanta rimanata mana ushanchic.
Ranti ricuna canchic chai ama ashtahuan uyarichun runa ucupi. Shinacpi manchachina canchic ama cuti rimanuchun chai shutita pi runa ñaupacpipash.
Paicunata cayachishpa rimanacurca ama cuti Jesus-manta rimancapac, ama paimantapash yachachincapac.
Chashnapi Pedro Juantin cutipanurca: —Cunan cancunallata allita ricuichic, ¿allichu can Diospac ñaupacpi paita mana uyashpa ashtahuan cancuna rimashcata pactachincapac?
¡Imashnata mana rimashun ñucanchic ñahuihuan ricushcata, ñucanchic rinrihuan uyashcata!
Cuti manchachina shimicunata paicunata rimashpa cacharinacurca, mana ñacachinata ushanurca runacunaraicu.
Tucuillami Diosta chaccharanurca tucushcamanta, chai janpi tucuc runa ña paica chuscu chunca yalli huatata charirca.
Cachari tucushca shina, Pedro Juantin mashicunapacman rishpa rimanurca apucuna, pacriyayacuna, rucucuna paicunaman rimashcata.
Paicuna rimashcata uyashpa, tucuilla shuclla shimihuan Diosta rimanurca: —Apunchic, can rurarcanqui jahua pachata, cai pachata, mama cuchata, tucui paicunapi tiyactapash.
Can yuyaita churarcanqui canpa runa ñucanchipac yaya Davidpi, cai shimicunata: "Mama llactacunapi macanacui tiyan, ruranacunapi yapa yuyarishca tiyan, ¿imapami chaicunata yuyarinquichic?
Cai pachamanta jatun apucuna tantarinun, paipac churicunapash Apunchicta, paipac Mesiasta piñashpa huancurinushca.
Chashnami cai llactapi tucurca: Herodes Poncio Pilatopash Diosta mana ricsiccunahuan Israel runacunahuanpash shuclla yuyaita japinurca Jesus canpa Mesiasta millashpa,
chashna can munashpa yuyarishcata paicuna pactachinurca, can chashnapac canpac ushaihuan, canpac yuyaihuan rurashpa saquishcata.
Cunan Apunchic, riqui ñucanchicta paicuna piñashcata, canpa runacunata sinchicuchi canpac Shimita ama manchashcahuan yachachinuchun.
Chashnallata canpac ushaita ricsichi uncuccunata janpishcahuan, mancharicushiyanacunahuan canpac alu runa Jesuspac shutiraicu".

Paicuna Dioshuan rimarinata tucuchiscapi paicuna tiyacushca ucu chucchurirca, chashnapi tucuilla" Diospac Samaihuan juntarishca saquirinurca, chairaicu Diospac Shinuta mana manchashcahuan rimancapac callarmurca.
Inishpa caticuccuna tucuula shuclla shuncuta, shuclla yuyaita charinurca: paicuna charishca tucuicunapac carca, mana pipash amu tiyarcachu.
Apostolcuna Apunchic Jesus huañushcacunamanta causarishcata ushaihuan ricsichinacurca, tucui paicuna yapa llaquishca canurca.
Paicuna ucupi mana tsuntsu tiyarcachu, tucui paicunamanta allpa, huasi chariccuna catuccuna carca,
cullquitaca Apostolcunapac maquipi churaccuna carca, cuti paicunaca caran runa mutsushca tuputa ricushpa cuccuna carca.
Chashnami rurarca Jose, Apostolcuna Bernabe shutichishca (nicpi: cushiyachishca); pai Levi miraimanta carca, Chipremanta runa,
pai charishca allpata catushca huasha cullquita Apostolcunapac maquipi churac shamurca.
Shuc runa Ananias shutiyuc paipac huarmi Safirantin, paicuna ishcaipura rimarishca huasha, shuc allpata catunurca,
chaupi cullquita paicunapacta saquichinurca huarmipash yachashpallata, chaishuc chaupita Apostolcunapac maquipi churarca.
Pedro rimarca: —Ananias, ¿canpac shuncutachu supaiman curcanqui? ¿Diospac Samaitachu umachisha yuyanqui? ¿mana yachanmichu yuyanqui canpac allpamanta chaupi cullquita huacaichishcata?

¿Piñashcahuanchu catuchinacurca? Chashna catushpa, ¿manachu canlla illacta chai cullquita japina usharcanqui? ¿allitami ruranichu yuyanqui? Mana runacunatachu llullashcanqui, Diostami llullashcanqui.
Rimashcata uyashpa Ananias allpapi urmarca, chailla-pita huañurca; yapa manchari shamurca tucui chaita uyaccunaman.
Maltacuna jatarishpa, chai ayata pillushpa panpaneapac apanacurca.
Quimsa pacha huashapi huarmipash pactamurca, pai mana yacharca cari tucushcata.
Pedro paita tapurca: —¿Chai tupupichu cancunapac allpata caturcanquichic? Pai cutiparca: —Ari, chai tupupimi caturcancmc. Pedro paita rimarca:
—¿Cancuna ishcantipurachu Diospac Samaita camana munarcanquichic? Ricui, caipi ticramuranun canpac carita panpancapac riccuna. Paicunallatami cantapash apanunca.
Chaillapita Safira paipac chaqui mayanpi huañushca urmarca. Chai maltacuna ticramushpa huañushcata tupanurca, paipac cari mayanpi panpancapac apashpa rinurca.
Tucui iniccuna yapa mancharinacurca, chashnallata chaita uyaccunapash mancharinacurca.
Apostolcuna achca mancharicushiyaipacunata runa ucupi ruranurca. Tucui iniccuna Salomonpac puncu canchapi huancurishpa tantariccuna carca;
ranti chaishuccunaca mana paicunaman mayanyaccunachu carca, paicunata yapa llaquicushpapash.
Chashna, huarmi caricunapash achcacuna Apunchicman inishcahuan llutarinacurca.
Cuti chashnallata uncuccunatapash paicuna purina ñanpiman cahuitupi surcuccuna carca, Pedro chaita riracpi paipac llantuuapash japichun nishpa.
Jerusalen llacta mayanmantacunapash pactaccuna carca paicunapacman uncuccunata apashpa, supai japishcacunata pushashpa, tucuilla janpirishca saquiriccuna carca.
Pacriyayacunapac apu tucui paihuan llutarishcacunapash, tucui paicuna saduceos nishcacuna canurca; yapa piñashpa,
Apostolcunata japishpa chunta curralpi churanurca.
Ranti tuta ucupi Apunchipac angel puncucunata pascashpa paicunata canchaman surcurca, rimashpa:
—Richic, Diospac huasipi shayarishpa yachachichic runacunata cashna causashca samita.

Rimashcata uyashpa, pacarina mayanta Diospac huasipi yaicushpa runacunata yachachincapac callarinacurca. Chaicamaca pacri yayacunapac apu paipaccunahuan pactamushpa, tantarinata ruranurca, israelitacunapac jatun tantarina, japi tucushcacunata pushancapac cachanurca.
Huacaichicamacuna rishpa paicunata mana tarinurca. Ticramushpa rimanacurca:
—Paicunata huacaichishpa saquishcataca sumacta quillparatami tarircanchic, huacaichicamacunaca puncu mayanpi shayaranurca; cuti pascashpa ricucpica, mana pitapash ucupi tarircanchic.
Huacaichiccunapac apu pacriyayacunapac apucunapash, chaita uyashpa yapa mancharishca saquirinacurca, paicunapura tapurinacurca imami tucushcanca nishpa.
Chashnapi shuc runa pactamushpa cashna paicunata rimarca: —Cancuna japishpa quillpashca runacuna Diospac huasipimi runacunata yachachiranun.
Chaipi huacaichiccuna apu paipac runacunahuan Apostolcunata japicrinurca, chashnapash mana piñashcahuan, runacunapi rumihuan shitai tucunata manchashcaraicumanta.
Ña japishpa apamushcapi, apucuna ñaupacpi shayachinacurca, chashnapi pacriyayacunapac apu paicunata tapushpa rimarca:

—¿Manachu cancunata rimarcanchic ama yachachinquichichu chai runamanta? Chashna cacllapita, pai yachachishcata cancuna tucui Jerusalenpi rimashpa purishcanquichic, chairapash ñucanchiman jahuachinquichic chai runa huañushcamanta.
Pedro tucui Apostolcunantin cutipanurca: —Diostami ashtahuan runacunamanta ñaupacta uyana canchic.
Ñucanchipac rucu yayacunapac Dios Jesusta huañushcacunamanta causachirca, cancuna paita shuc caspimanta huarcuchishpa huañuchircanquichic.
Dios paipac yachac maquiman jahua pachapi paita churashca, Jatun Apu, Quishpichicta rurashpa, Israelta mushu causaita cuncapac, juchamanta pichai tucuncapac.
Chaimanta ñucanchicmi ricuyac canchic, paita uyaccunaman cushca Diospac Samaipash.
Chashna rimashcata uyashpa yapa piñarishpa paicunata huañuchinata munanurca.
Ranti shuc fariseo Gamaliel shutiyuc, camachic quillcata yachac, tucui runacuna llaquishca, apucuna tantarishca ucupi shayarishpa, canchaman chai japishca runacunata llucshichishpa, rimarca:
—Israelmanta runacuna, allita atipashpa ricuichic cai runacunahuan ranca racushcata.
Mana unai can, Teudas caipi jatun runa shina ricurimushca, paimau llutarinurca chuscu patsac runacuna. Chashnapash paita huañuchinacurca, tucui paita caticcuna chausirishpa chincarinurca.
Runacunata yupacushca pachapi, Galileamanta Judas shayarirca, paita tucui runacuna catinurca; paipash chincarircami paita caticcunapash illacta chausirinurca.
Chairaicumi cai shimicunahuan cancunata cunan camachini: Cuncarichic cai runacunamanta, rinacuchunlla. Paicuha ruracushca runa yuyaimanta shamuc cashpaca, paipac munaimi chincarinca;
ranti Diosmanta shamuc cacpica, mana paita tucuchinata ushanquichichu. Yahcamantami Diosta macancapac shayarinquichic. Pai rimashcata pactachinurca.
Chashnapi Apostolcunata cayashpa, llipachishca huasha, Jesuspac shutipi ama cuti yachachincapac rimashpa, cacharinacurca
Apostolcuna tantarina ucumanta yapa cushi llucshinacurca Jesuspac shutiraicu ñacarishcamanta.
Tucui puncha yachachinurca Diospac huasipi, runa huasicunapipash Mesias Jesuspac Cushi Shimita.

Chai pachapi, Jesusta caticcuna achca mirarishcaraicu, griego shimita rimaccuna hebreo shimita rimaccunahuan piñarinacurca, paicunapac huaccha mamacuna mana allita ricui tucushcaraicu, caran puncha ricunapi.
Apostolcuna tucui yachachishcacunata tantachishpa rimanacurca: —Mana allichu yachin Diospac Cushi Shimita yachachinata chicanman saquishpa, micuna caranamanlla yuyarincapac.
Chairaicu, huauquicuna, acllaichic cancunamanta canchis alli pactachic runacunata, Diospac Samaihuan juntashcacuna, achca yachaita chariccunata, chaita paicunaman mincancapac.
Ranti ñucanchica Dios-huan rimarinapi, paipac shimi yachachinapi catishun.

Tucui chaipi tantarishca runacuna chai yuyailla canacurca; acllanurca Estebanta, yapa inishcapi puric, Diospac Samaihuan juntashca runa cashcaraicu, Felipeta, Procorota, Nicanor, Timon, Parmenas, Nicolastapash, Cristota inishcapi llutarishca Antioquiamanta runa carca;
Apostolcunapac naupacpi shayachinacurca, paicunaca maquicunata uma jahuapi churashpa, Diosta mañanurca.
Diospac shimi tucuicunaman pactacurca, Jerusalenpica achca yachachishcacuna mirariranurca. Rimacpica achca yaya pacricunapash inishcapi yaicunurca.
Esteban, Diospac cuyaihuan ushaihuanpash juntashca cashpa, mancharicushiyanacunata runacuna ñaupacpi rurac carca.
Quishpiracunapac tantarina huasimanta achca runacuna, Cirenemantacuna, Alejandriamantacuna, maicancuna Ciliciamanta, Asiamantacuna pactanurca Estebanhua rimaricunurca.
Ranti mana yallinata ushanurca pai yapa yalli yachashcahuan rimacpi.
Chairaicu maican runacunata umachinacurca cashna rimanuchun nishpa: "Ñucanchic uyarcanchicmi cai runa Moisesta Diostapash piñacushcata".
Chashna shimicunahuan runacunata, apucunata, Camachic quillcata yachaccunatapash piñachinacurca; cuncaimanta pactamushpa, japishpa, judio apucuna tantarishcaman pushanurca.
Chaipi llullac ricuyaccuna cashna rimanacurca: —Cai runa huiñaipac piñacunllami ñucanchipac Diospac huasimanta, Camachic quillcamantapash.
Paimanta uyarcanchicpash cai Diospac huasita ñucanchicman Moises saquishca yachaicunatapash Nazaretmanta Jesus tulachinca rashcata.
Tucui chai judio apucuna tantarinapi tiyacuccuna, Estebanman ricushpa, paipac ñahuita shuc angelpac shina ricurishcata ricunacurca.
Chashnapi pacriyayacunapac apu tapurca: —¿Chaica shutichu?
Esteban cutiparca: —Yayacuna, huauquicuna, uyahuaichic: Jatun Dios Abrahanta Mesopotamiapi ricurirca, chaira pai mana Jarranman shamushcapi.
Chaipi paita rimarea: "Canpac aillucunata, canpac allpata saquishpa ñuca ricuchinca rashca allpapi causacrinqui".
Caldeamanta llucshishpa, Jarranpi causac shamurca. Paipac yaya huañushca huasha, cai cunan causacushca allpaman Dios paita pushamurca.
Mana ima allpata curcachu; ranti chai allpata cushami nishpa shimita curca; paipacta, paipac churicunapactapash, pai mana churiyuc cashpapash, chashna rimai tucurca.
Dios cashna rimarca: "Canpac churicuna chican allpapimi causanunca, huatashca, ñacachishcami chuscu patsac huata causanunca".

Ashtahuan rimarca: "Cancunata huatashpa ñacachic runacunata ñucami taripasha. Chaimanta llucshishpa cai panpapimi ñucata yupaichahuanquichic". Chai shimi curishcata ricuchishpa ullu carata pitirina tucunurca;
chashna, paipac churi Isaac pacaricpi, Abrahan ullu carata, pitirca pusac puncha pactarishcapi; Isaac chashnallata rurarca Jacobta, Jacobpash chashnallata ñucanchic chunca ishcai rucu yayacunata.
Rucu yayacunaca, Joseta piñashpalla, Egiptoman riraccunata catunurca. Chashnapash Dios paihuan tiyacurca,
Tucui llaquicunamanta paita quishpichirca; achca yachaita paiman curca; Egiptomanta jatun apu Faraon paita yapa llaquirca, paita Egiptomanta huainaru shayachirca tucui paipac imacunamantapash.
Egiptopi Canaanpipash yaricai tiyarca, mana ushaipac yaricai pacha tucurca, chashnapi ñucanchipac yayacunaca mana imata micuipa tucunurca.
Jacob micuna Egiptopi tiyashcata yachashpa chaiman ñucanchic yayacunata cacharca.
Ña ishcai cuti rishcapi, huauquicunata Jose pai cashcata rimarca, chashna Faraon ricsirca maican llactamanta Jose cashcata.
Jose paipac yaya Jacobta cayachirca, tucui paipac aillucunatapash, paicuna canurcami canchis chunca pichca runa.
Jacob Egiptoman rirca, chaipi huañurca, ñucanchic yayacunapash.
Siquenman apashcacuna, Abrahan paipac cullquihuan Hamorpac churicunata rantishca aya jutcupi panpai tucunurca.
Dios Abrahanta rimashca shimi pactarincapac mayanyacushcapi, achca mirashpa Egiptopi juntarinurca.
Chashnapi shuc jatun apu Egiptopi shayarirca, pai mana yacharca Josemanta.
Chai apu, mana allicunata ñucanchic aillucunata rurashpa, ñucanchic rucucunata paicunapac mushu pacarishca huahuacunata ama causanuchun nishpa jichuchirca.
Cai pachapi Moises pacarirca, Diospac ñaupacpi alli carca. Quimsa quilla yayapac huasipi causarca,
pai jichui tucushcapi, Faraonpac ushushi japishpa quiquin churita shina huiñachichirca.
Chairaicu Moises egipciocunapac tucui yachaicuanta japirca.
Alli camachic carca, llancanapipash yapa alli. Pai chuscu chunca huata pactachishcapi paipac aillu Israel runacunata ricunayarca.
Shuc runa macai tucucushcata ricushpa, paita quishpichicrirca, chai jahuapi chai egipciota huañuchishpalla yuyaita japirca.
Paica yuyarcami paipac aillucuna atipanuncami Dios paicunapac quishpina paipac maquipi churashcata, ranti paicuna mana atipanacurcachu.
Cayantiman paicunapacman pactashcapi macariranurca, pai macarinata saquichinayashpa rimarca: "Cancunaca huauquipurami canquichic, ¿allichu ishcantipuramanta nanarincapac?".
Chashna rimashcata uyashpa, chai mashita macacuc runa paita piñashpa rimarca:
"¿Canchu ñucanchicta amu shina taripancapac shayaunqui? ¿Egipciota cainan huañuchishca shinallatachu ñucatapash huañuchinayahuanqui?".
Chashna rimashcata uyashpa Moises miticushpa Madian allpaman, chican runa shina causacrirca, chaipi ishcai huahuata charirca.
Chuscu chunca huata huasha, pai Sinai urcu, chunlla allpapi cashcapi, shuc angel casha yura rupacushcapi ricuric shamurca.
Moises mancharicushiyarca ricuricushcata ricushpa. Pai allita ricusha nishpa mayanyashcapi Apunchicpac shimita uyarca:
"Ñucami canpac yayacunapac Dios cani, Abrahanpac Dios, Isaacpac, Jacobpac". Moises yapalla manchaita charishpa ricuncapacllapash mana munarca.
Ranti Apunchica paita rimarca: "Ushutata surcuri, cai panpaca Dios acllashca allpa mari can".
Nucapac runacuna cai Egiptopi ñacarishcata ricushcanimi, paicuna huacashcata uyashcanimi, uraicurcanimi paicunata quishpichincapac. Cunaca caiman shamui, Egiptomanmi canta cachanca rani".

Cai Moisesta, paicuna cashna piñashpa callpachishcata: "¿Canchu ñucanchicta amu shina taripancapac shayarinqui?", Dios cachamurca amuta rurashpa, qiushpichicta shayachishpa, casha yurapi ricurishca angel yanapashcahuan.
Paimi paicunata llucshichirca, Egiptopi mancharicushiyanacunata nirashpa, Puca ñucñu yacupi, chuscu chunca huata chunlla allpapipash.
Cai Moisesllatacmi israelitacunata rimarca: "Diosmi cancuna huauqui ucumanta ñuca shina shuc runata cancunaman cunca".
Paillatacmi, chunlla allpapi tantanacuipi, angel Sunaipi rimashcata ranti, paica ñucanchic yayacunaman rimacurca; paimi causai shimicunata japishpa cancunaman ricsichirca.
Paitami ñucanchicpac yayacuna mana uyanata munanurca; Egiptoman ticranata munanurca,
Aaronta cashna rimashpa: Huacacunata rurashpa shayachi, paicuna ñanpita ricuchinuchun, chai Egiptomanta ñucanchicta llucshichic Moisesmanta mana yachanchicchu ima tucushcata".
Chashnapi shuc malta huacrata ruranurca paipac ñaupacpi camaricunata churashpa raiminurca paicuna rurashca huacra ñaupacllapita.

Dios paicunamanta chicanyarca, sacracunata catinuchunlla nishpa saquirca, Profeta pancacunapi nishca shina: "Israel runacuna, ¿chuscu chunca huata chunlla allpapi causashpa camarita ricuchihuarcanquichichu?
Mana, ashtahuan aparcanquichicmi Molocpac tanputa, cancunapac huaca Refanpac cuillurtapash, cancunalla chacchancapac rurashca huacacuna; chairaicu cancunata Babilonia huashaman callpachishami".
Chunlla allpapi ñucanchicpac rucu yayacuna curishca shimita ricuchic tanputa charinacurca; Dios Moisesta pai ricushca shinata rurachun nishca,

huasha japic ñucanchicpac rucu yayacuna, Josue apu cashcapi Diosta mana ricsiccunapac allpata quichushcapi, chaiman yaicuchinurca, Dios paicunapac ñaupacpi callpachiscapi. Chaita huacaichishpa David tiyashca punchacama charinacurca,
pai Diospac ñaupacpi yapa alli carca, paita mañarca Jacobpac Diospacta shuc huasita rurachihuai nishpa.
Chashnapash, Salomon chai Diospac huasita shayachishpa tucuchirca.
Ranti alli rimacpi, Jatun Diosca mana runa rurashca huasipichu causan, profeta rimashca shina:
"Jahua pacha ñucapac tiyarinami, allpaca ñuca chaquicuna samana. ¿Ima huasitashi ñucapacta ruranquichic? riman Apunchic. ¿Maipishi ñuca samanata ruranquichic?
¿Manachu ñucallatac tucui caicunata rurarcani?".

Ranti cancunaca, sinchi umata charishpa, cancunapac shuncuta rumiyachircanquichic, rinrita quillparcanquichic; huiñaipac cancuna Diospac Samaita chasquinata mana munanquichic, cancunapac yayacuna shinallata.

¿Tiyarcachu ima chari profetacunamanta shucllapash, cancunapac yayacunapacpi mana chicni tucuc? Paicuna huañuchinurca Alli Runa shamunca rashcamanta rimaccunata; paitami cunan cancuna catushpa huañuchishcanquichic;
cancuna Camachic Quillcata angelcunamanta chasquishpapash mana pactachircanquichic.
Chasna rimashcata uyashpa yapa paicunapac ucupi paihuan piñarinacurca, quirupash uyaricta.
Esteban, Diospac Samaihuan juntarishpa ñahuita jahuaman jatachishpa, Dios jatunyashcata ricurca, paipac yachac maquiman Jesus shayacushcatapash ricurca; chaipi rimarca:
—Jahua pacha pascarishcatami ricuni, chaipi chai Runa Diospac yachac maquiman shayan.
