Ranti paicunaca sinchita caparishpa, rinricunata quillparinacurca, chai huasha tucui paimanlla urmanacurca; llacta canchaman tancashpa chaipi rumihuan shitancapac nishpa,
juchachiccuna, shuc malta runa Saulo shutiyucpac chaquipi jahua churanacunata saquishpa, Estebanta rumihuan shitancapac callarinurca.
Paicuna rumihuan shitacushcapi, Esteban cashna Diosman caparirca: —Apunchic Jesus, ñuca causaita chasquipai.
Chai huasha cuncurishpa, sinchi shimihuan rimarca: —Apunchic, cai juchamanta paicunata quishpichi. Chaita rimashca huasha huauurca.

Saulo chashna huañuchishcata ricushpa cushiyashcahuan ricurca. Jerusalenpi tiyac iniccunata mana ushaipac piñashpa chai punchamanta japincapac callarinacurca. Tucuilla Samariaman, Judeaman chausirishpa rinacurca, ranti Apostolcunamana.
Shuc alli shuncuyuc runacuna Estebanta panpanacurca, paimanta huacanacurcapash.
Cuti Saulo iniccunata piñashpa caticurca, huasicunapi yaicushpa caricuna huarmicuna imapash japishpa chunta curralman apacurca.
Miticushpa chausirishcacuna, paicuna pactashcapi Diospac Cushi Shimita ricsichishpa purinurca.
Samaria llactaman Felipe pactashpa Mesiasmanta rimancapac callarirca.
Felipe rimashcata tucui runacuna yapa allihuan chasquinacurca. Paita uyancapac, pai mancharicushiyanacunata rashcata ricuncapac pactaccuna carca;
achca supai, japishca, runacunamantami supaicuna caparishpa llucshiccuna carpa, chashnallata. achca suchu, janca runacuna janpirishca saquirinacurca,
chashnamanta achca cushiyai tiyarca chai llactapi.
Ña unaimanta causacurca chai llactapi shuc runa Simon shutiyuc, pai yachac runa carca. Samariamanta runacuna mancharishca canurca pai rurashcacunata ricushpa, chairaicu jatunmi cani pai yuyac carca.
Tucuilla, huahuacuna rucucunapash, paillapi yuyaita churashca canurca, paimanta rimaccuna carca: "Caitami Diospac jatun ushai rimanun".
Paita uyaccuna carca, unaimanta paipac sacra yachaicunahuan umachishpa causashcaraicu;
ranti Felipe Diospac Pachamanta Cushi Shimita, Jesucristo Mesiasmanta rimacpi inishpa, caricuna huarmicunantin bautisai tucuncapac callarinacurca.
Simonpash inircami, bautisai tucushca huasha mana chicanyarcachu Felipemanta: mancharicushiyashca carca Felipe rurashcacunata ricushpa.
Jerusalenpi tiyac Apostolcuna, Samariamantacunapash Diospac Cushi Shimita chasquishcata yachashpa, Pedrota Juantin chaiman cachanurca.
Paicuna Samariaman pactashpa Dios-huan rimarinacurca chaimanta runacunapash Diospac Samaita chasquinuchun nishpa;
paicunamanta mana pimanpash uraicushca mari carca, chaira Apunchic Jesuspac shutillapimi bautisashca canurca.
Apostolcuna maquita umapi churacpi iniccuna Diospac Samaita chasquinacurca.
Apostolcuna maquita churashpa Diospac Samaita chinpachishcata ricushpa, Simon cullquita ricuchishpa,
paicunata rimarca: —Cai ushaita ñucatapash cuhuaichic, ñucapash maicanpipash maquita churacpi pai Diospac Samaita japichun.
Pedro paita cutiparca: —Anchuri caimanta canpac cullquintin, Dios cuyashcata cullquihuanmi rantina can yuyashcaraicu.
Cai ushaica mana canpacchu can, mana atipanquichu Dios rurashcacunata.
Chairaicu, cai canpac mana allimanta nanari, Apunchicta mañai can pantashcacunamanta quishpichichun,
canpac ucupi jayaclla juntarishcami canqui, mana allicunapipash huatashcami causacunqui.
Simon cutiparca: —Ñucaraicu Apunchicta mañapaichic, cai pinashpa rimashca shimicuna ama japihuanuchun.
Pedro Juantin Apunchicpac Shimita camachishca huasha Jerusalenman ticranurca, Diospac Cushi Shimita Samaria llactacunapi yachachishpa.
Apunchicpac angel Felipeta cashna nishpa rimarca: —Chaupi puncha tucushcapi ri Jerusalenmanta Gazaman, chunlla allpata rina ñanpiman.
Paica rirca, chashnapi tarirca shuc Etiopiamanta runata, Etiopiamanta Ñusta Candacespacpi llancac runa, cullquita huacaichic runa. Jerusalenman shamushcarca Diosta chacchancapac,
cuti ticracushpa paipac carroza nishcapi tiyarishpa ricucurca Profeta Isaias quillcashcata.
Diospac Samai Felipeta rimarca: —Mayanyashpa chaiman llutari.
Felipe callpashpa mayanyarca, chaipi uyarca Profeta Isaias quillcashcata ricushpa caticushcata, paita tapurca: —¿Quillcashcata atipanquichu?
Pai cutiparca: —Mana pipash yachachihuacpi mana atipaipacchu tucuni. Chasna, Felipeta sicachishpa paipac mayanpi tiyachirca.
Cai quillcatami ricushpa caticurca: "Shuc cordero shina huañuchinaman pushai tucurca; shuc oveja shina chunlla paipac acchata piticucpac naupacpi, chashna pai mana shimita pascarcachu.
Paita millanurca, tucuita paita quichunurca; paita caticcunata pillapash yupanata ushancachu. Causaccunapac allpamanta paita ishcunacurca".
Etiopiamanta runa Felipeta tapurca: —Ayalla, ¿Profeta pimanta caipi rimashcata riman? ¿Paimantallatachu, shucmantachu rimacun, imata?
Chashnapi Felipe, chai quillcapi churashcallahuanta, Jesuspac Cushi Shimita ricsichirca.
Ñanpita rirashcapi, yacu tiyashcaman pactanurca, chaipi chai runa rimarca: —Ricui, chaipi yacu tiyan. ¿Allichu canman can bautisahuacpi?
Felipe paita rimarca: —Can tucui shuncuhuan inicpi usharincami. Pai cutiparca: —Jesucristo Diospac Churi cashcata ininimi.
Chaipi paipac carrozata shayachishpa, ishcantin yacuman rinacurca. Felipe chaipipaita bautisarca.
Paicuna yacumanta llucshisheapi, Diospac Samai Felipeta shuc cachai anchuchirca; chaishucca mana cuti ricurcachu, pai rirashcaman yapa cushihuan rirca.
Felipe Azotopi cashcarca, chaimanta Cesareaman pactanacama Diospac Cushi Shimita llactacunapi yachachishpa rirca.
Saulo chaira Apunchicpac yachachishcacunata huañuchina yuyaihuan, pacri yayacunapac apupacman rishpa
Damascomanta tantarina huasipac apucunapacta quillcata mañarca, chai ininata catic cari huarmi imapash japishpa Jerusalenman apamunata ushancapac.
Pai rirashcapi, ña Damascoman pactana mayanpi, cuncaimanta shuc jahua pachamanta achic pai cashcapi llinpiarca.
Allpaman urmarca, chaipi cashna rimashca shimita uyarca: —Saulo, Saulo, ¿imaraicumi piñashpa catihuanqui?
Paica tapurca: —¿Canca pimi canqui, Apunchic? Chai shimi paita cutiparca: —Ñucami can piñashpa japinayashca Jesus cani;
jatari, ri llactaman, chaipimi can rurana cashcata rimarinca.
Paipac mashicuna mancharishca shayarinurca, rimashcata uyashpapash mana ricushcaraicu.
Saulo allpamanta jatarirca, ñahuicunata pascara charishpapash mana imatapash ricuna usharcachu. Maquimanta japishpa Damascoman pushanurca.
Ñausa carca, quimsa puncha mana imatapash micushpa, mana upiashpa causarca.
Damascopi shuc yachachishca Ananias shutiyuc runa causac carca. Apunchic, nuspaipi, paita cayarca: —Ananias. Pai cutiparca: —Caipimi cani, Apunchic.
Apunchicca paita caita rimarca: —Cuscaman ri, Judas huasiman. Chaipi Tarsomanta Saulo shutiyuc runamanta tapui, pai Dios-huan rimaricun.
Cunanshitu cai nuspaita charishca: Shuc runashi Ananias shutiyuc yaicushpa, paipac maquita umapi churan, pai ñausayashcata janpincapac nishpa.
Ananias ranti paita cutiparca: —Apunchic, achca shimimanta uyashcani chai runamanta, pai imashna Dios iniccunata Jerusalenpi yapa ñacachiscata;
caipica yaya pacricunapac apucunamanta ushaita apamushca, tucui canpa shutita rimaccunata japishpa quillpancapac.
Apunchic paita cutiparca: —Rilla, cai runa yapa yanapanca rahuan, ñuca shutita ricsichincami Diosta mana ricsiccunata, Israel runacunatapash.
Ñuca ricsichinca rani tucui pai uacarincapac rashcata, ñuca shutiraicu.

Ananias rirca, huasipi yaicurca, maquicunata paipac jahuapi churashpa paita nirca: —Huauqui Saulo, canman cachamuhuashcami Apunchic Jesus, can shamucushca ñanpipi ricuricllata, can cuti ricuc ushancapac, Diospac Samaihuanpash juntashca saquirincapac.
Chaillapita paipac ñahuimanta challua cara shina tallirinurca; ñahuita chushacchishpa, ricuna usharca. Jatarishpa bautisai tucurca;
huasha, micushpa, sinchicuipash paiman shamurca. Damascomanta yachachishcacunahuan Saulo ansata tiyarca,
manapash unaipi chaimanta tantarina huasicunapi Jesus Diospac Churi cashcata yachachincapac callarirca.

Paita uyaccuna tucuilla mancharicushiyashca saquirinacurca, cashna rimanacushpa: —Cai mari Jerusalenpi chai shutita rimaccunata piñashca japic can, ¿manachu? Caimanpash paicunata japishpa pacri yayacunapac apucunapac ñaupacman pushancapac shamuc mari can, ¿manachu?
Ranti Pablo, sinchi tucushpa, Damascomanta judiocunata pantachichirca, Jesus Dios cachamushca cashcata ricsichishcahuan.
Unaiman, judiocuna huañuchincapac rimanurca.
Pablo yacharca paicuna ruranca rashcata. Paicuna tuta punchantin llacta puncupi huañuchincapac ricucushcaraicu,
shuc tuta pai yachachishcata caticcuna, shuc ashancapi churashpa, huascahuan quincha huashaman uraicuchinurca.
Jerusalenmai pactashcapi, yachachishcacunahuan llutarinata munarca; chashnapash tucuilla manchanurca pai yachachishca jinu cashcata mana yachashpa.

Chashnapi Bernabe japishpa Apostolcunapacman pusharca ricsichincapac. Saulo paicunaman rimarca ima shina pai Apunchicta ñanpipi ricushcata, paita rimashcata, pai Damascopi tucui runacunapac ñaupacpi Jesusmanta yachachishcatapash rimarca.
Saulo paicunahuan pai munashcaman puric carca, Apunchicmata tucuipac ñaupacpi yachachishpa.
Pai rimarirca piñanacurcapash griego shimita rimac judiocunahuan, paicunaca paita huañuchinata yuyarinurca;
paipac huauquicuna chaita yachashpa, Cesareaman pushanurca, chaimanta Tarsoman cachanurca.

Chai pachapi, iniccuna mana pipash quillachishca causaranurca tucui Judeapi, Galileapi, Samariapipash, Apunchicta catinapi sinchiyashpa, jatunyashpa, yaparishpa riranurca Diospac Samai cariyachishcahuan.
Pedro tucui chai suyucunata ricushpa puricurca, chashnapi uraicurcami Lidapi tiyac iniccunata ricuncapac.
Chaipi tarirca shuc Eneas shutiyuc runata; pai suchu cashpa, ña pusac huata sirishcamanta mana jatarinata usharcachu.
Pedro paita rimarca: —Eneas, Mesias Jesus canta alliyachin; jatari, canpac puñunata allichi.
Chaillapita jatarirca. Lidamanta, Saron panpamanta tucui runacuna ricunurca, paicuna Apunchicta ininurca.
Jafapi shuc yachachishca Tabita shutiyuc tiyarca, chai Ushpita rimanayan, pai yapa alli shuncuyuc huarmi carca.
Chai punchacuna uncurirca, huanurca. Maillashca huasha jahuapi tiyac patapi paipac ayata churanurca.
Lidamanta Jafaman mayanlla can; yachachishcacuna Pedro chaipi cashcatayachashpa, ishcai runata cachanurca Jafaman utcalla shamuchun rimashcahuan.
Pedro paicunahuan rirca. Pai pactashcallapi jahua pataman sicachinurca; chaipi huaccha huarmicuna huacashpa ricuchiranurca Tabita causashcapi rurashca churanacunata.
Pedro tucuicunata canchaman llucshichirca; cuncurishpa Dios-huan rimarirca; huasha ayaman ricushpa rimarca: —Jatari Tabita
Pai ñahuita pascarca, Pedrota ricushpa tiyarirca. Pedro maquimanta japishpa jataichirca. Iniccunata huacchacunantin cayashpa, causacta paicunaman ricuchirca.
Jafapi tiyac runacuna tucui yachanurca, achcacuna Apunchicta ininurca.
Pedro unaita Jafapi saquirirca, shuc huihua carata allichic Simon shutiyuc runapac huasipi.
Cesarea llactapi Cornelio shutiyuc runa causac carca, pai chaipi tiyac soldadocunapac capitan carca.
Alli shuncuyuc runa carca, pai tucui paipac ailluhuan Diosta manchashpa causac runa carca. Runacunaman achca diosmantata cuc carca, Dioshuan rimarinata mana saquicchu carca.
Chishi mayanma shuc nuspaita charirca: Allipacha Diospac angelta ricurca paipac quinchara ucupi yaicushpa paita cayacushcata: —Cornelio.

Pai allipacha ricushpa saquirirca, manchashcahuan paita tapurca: —¿Ñucatachu mashcahuanqui, Apunchic? Angel cutiparca: —Can Dios-huan rimarishca, canpac diosmantacuna Diospac naupacpi alli ricurinushca.
Cunan pitapash Jafaman cachai Simon Pedro shutiyuc runata mashcachun,
ñucñu yacu patapi tiyac huacra carata allichic Simonpac huasipimi tiyacun.
Angel chincarishca huasha, ishcai runata shuc alli shuncuyuc soldadota cayarca;
tucuita rimashca huasha Jafaman paicunata cacharca.
Cayantiman, chaupi puncha tucushcapi, paicuna llacta mayanpi rirashcapi, Pedro huasi jahuaman Dios-huan rimarincapac sicarca.
Yarcachicpi micunayarca, paipac micunata yanunacama paica shuc nuspaita charirca:
Jahua pacha pascarishcata ricurca, chaipi shuc imachari, shuc jatun llachapa shina jahua pachamanta uraicucucta ricurca; paipac chuscu chaquishitucunaca allpapi tacariranurca.
Chai ucupi tucui sacha huihuacuna, machacuicuna, pishcucunapash tiyanurca.
Shuc shimi paita rimarca: —Pedro, jatari; huañuchishpa micui.
Pedro rimarca: —Chaitaca yuyarincapacllapash mana allichu, Apunchic, maican punchapash can mana munashca, huacllichicta mana micushcanichu.
Cutipash chai shimi paita rimarca: —Dios "allimi" rimashcata, canca ama huacllichicmi can rimaichu.
Quimsa cutimi chashna rimai tiyarca, chai huasha chai ricuricuc jahua pachaman apai tucurca.
Pedro mana yacharcachu chai nuspai yachachinayashcata. Ranti chai pachallapita, Cornelio cachamushca runacuna, Simonpac huasita mashcashpa puricuccuna, huasi puncupi pactamunacurca.
Cayashpa tapunacurca Simon paicuna Pedro shutichishca, chai huasipichu causan nishpa.
Pedro chaira yuyaricurca pai nuspashcamanta, chashnapi Diospac Samai paita rimarca: —Shuc runacunami canta mashcaranun;
uraicui, paicunahuan rilla, ñucami paicunata cachamurcani.
Pedro paicunapacman uraicushpa rimarca: —Ñucami cancuna mashcacushca runa cani. ¿Imatapash mutsushpami shamunquichic?

Paicuna cutipanurca: —Alli shuncuyuc, Diosta manchashpa causac, tucui judiocuna llaquishca capitan Corneliomi, shuc angelmanta canta paipac huasiman cayachina shimita chasquishca, can rimashcatami pai uyanayan.
Pedro huasiman cayashpa paicunata puñuchirca. Cayanti puncha paicunahuan rirca, paihuan rinurcapash Jafamanta maican huauquicuna.
Cayantiman Cesareaman pactarca. Cornelio paicunata chapacurcami, cayashcarcapash paipac aillucunata, paipac quiquin mashicunatapash.
Pedro yaicushcapi, Cornelio paita tarincapac llucshirca, chaillapita paipac chaqui mayanpi cuncurirca;
ranti Pedro cashna rimashpa jatachirca: —Jatari, ñucapash runallatami cani.
Huasiman paihuan rimarishpa yaicurca, achca runa tantarishcata tarishpa rimarca:

—Cancuna yachanquichic ima shina shuc judiota pai inishcamanta mana ushan chican runacunahuan llutarincapac, paipac huasipi yaicuncapac; chashnapash, ñucata Dios yachachihuashcami ama huacllishca maican runatapash rimancapac.
Chairaicu, can cayancapac cachashcapi, shamurcanillami. Cunan yachanata munanimi imashnamanta cayachihuashcata.
Cornelio cutiparca: —Na chuscu puncha tucun, cashna pachallapita ñucapac huasipi chishi mayanta Dios-huan rimaricurcaru, chaipi shuc sumac churarishca runa ricurihuarca, pai rimahuarcami:
—"Cornelio, can Dios-huan rimarishca, canpac diosmantacuna Diospac ñaupacpi alli ricurinushca.
Pitapash Jafaman cachai Simon Pedro shutiyuc runata cayachun, ñucñu yacu patapi causac huacra carata allichic Simonpac huasipimi tiyacun". Utcalla canman shimita cacharcani, canca shamupashcanqui.
Cunaca, tucuilla caipi Diospac ñaupacpi canchic, can Apunchicraicu nucanchicmanrimashcata uyancapac.
Chashnapi Pedro rimarca: —Cunanmi alli shutipacha ricsini Dios mana pitapash mana chicanyachishpa ricushcata,
paica chasquin paihuan puricta, alli cusca pactachicta, maimanta runa cacpipash.
Pai Israelpac churicunata paipac shimita rimarca, Dios cachamushca ganas causaita Jesusraicu pactamuna cashcata uyachishpa, pai tucuipac Apunchic can.
Cancuna allita yachanquichic judiocunapac llactapi tucushcata, Galileamanta callarishpa, Juan bautismomanta camachishca huasha:

Ima shina Dios Nazaretmanta Jesusta paipac Samaita curca, paipac ushaita ricsichishpa, pai allita rurashpa purirca, supai japishca runacunamanta supaita anchuchishpa, Dios paihuan cashcaraicu chaita rurarca.
Ñucanchic ricuyac canchic tucui pai judiocunapac llactacunapi Jerusalenpipash rurashcamanta. Huasha paita huañuchinacurca shuc caspimanta huarcuchishpa.
Chashnapash quimsa puncha huasha huañushcacunamanta Dios paita causachirca, pai munashcamanta ricui tucurca,
mana tucuicunapacpi, Dios unaimanta acllashca ricuyaccunapacllapi, ñucanchicmi canchic, paihuan micushcanchic, upiashcanchic pai huañushcacunamanta causarimushca huasha.
Paimi ñucanchicta cacharca runacunata camachincapac, pai causaccunapac, huañushcacunapac taripac Diospacpi shayachi tucushcata ricsichincapac.
Tucui Profetacuna paimanta rimanun: tucui paita iniccuna paipac shutiraicu juchacunamanta quishpina cashcata.
Chaira Pedro rimacushcapi, Diospac Samai tucui chaipi uyacuccunapacpi shamurca.
Pedrohuan shamuc Judeamanta inic runacuna mancharinacurca: —¡Ima shina Dios paipac Samaita mana judiocunatapash cuyashcaraicumanta!
Caica allipacha shutimi carca: chican shimipi rimaranurca, Diosta chaccharanurca.
Chashnapi Pedro rimarca: —¿Cristopac bautismota mitsarincachu cai ñucanchic shinallata Diospac Samaita chasquic runacunata?
Jesus Mesiaspac bautismota paicunata chasquichirca. Chai huasha, paicunahuan shuc punchacunallapash saquirincapac rimanurca.
Apostolcuna Judeamanta huauquicunantin yachanacushcarca, ima shina mana judiocunapash Diospac Shimita japishcata.
Pedro Jerusalenman rishcapi, judio yachaita catic iniccuna paita cashna rimancapac callarinacurca:
—Mana iniccunapac huasipi yaicushcanqui, paicunahuanpash micushcanqui.
Chashnapi Pedro tucui pai rurashcacunata paicunaman rimarca:

—Dios-huan rimaricurcani Jafa llactapi; chaipi shuc nuspaita charircani: Shuc imachari uraicucurca, shuc jatun llachapa shina ricuric jahua pachamanta uraicucurca ñuca tiyashcacama; chaipi shayarirca paipac chuscu chaquishi tucunahuan.
Allipacha chaiman ricurcani, chaipi tiyarcami chuscu chaquiyuc sacha huihuacuna, millai huihuacuna, allpata llucarishpa puriccuna, huairata puric pishcucunatapash.
Shuc shimitapash uyarcani: "Pedro, huañuchi, micui".
Ñuca cutiparcani: "Manapacha, yuyarincapallash mana allichu chaica, ñuca shimiman mana maican puncha can mana munashca, huacllichic mana yaicushcachu".
Chai shimi cutillata rimahuarca: "Dios 'allimi' rimashcata, canca ama mana allichu nishpa rimaichu".
Chaica quimsa cuti chashna tucurca, chai huasha jahua pachaman aisashpa sicachinurca.
Chai pachapi ñucanchic tiyashca huasipi Cesareamanta cachamushca quimsa runacuna pactacrinurca ñucata mashcashpa.
Diospac Samai rimahuarca paicunahuan richunlla nishpa. Cai sucta huauquicuna ñucahuan canurca, huasha chai runapac huasiman yaicurcanchic.
Pai ñucanchicman rimarca ima shina pai shuc angelta ricurca paipac huasipi pactacpi, chai angel rimashcarca: "Jafaman shimita cachai Simon Pedrota cayashpa;
pai rimashcamanta canman canpac aillucunantin quishpina pactamunca".
Ñuca paicunaman rimancapac callarishcapi, chaillapi Diospac Samai paicunapac jahuapi uraicurca, ñucanchipac jahuapi ñaupac uraicushca shina.
Chaipi yuyarircani Apunchic rimashca shimicunata pai rimashcapi: "Juan yacuhuan bautisarca, ranti cancunaca Diospac Samaihuanmi bautisai tucun-quichic".
Paicuna Apunchic Jesucristopi inishcaraicu Dios cuyashcata cushca hucanchicman shinallata, ¿ñucaca ushaimanchu carcani pai munashcata 'mana' rimancapac?

Chashna rimashpata uyashpa ña mana imatapash rimanacurca, Diosta chacchanurca cashna rimashpa: —Mana iniccunatapash Dios cuti paipacman shuncuta shayachina yuyaita cushcami causaiman yaicuna ushancapac.
Piñashpa catic tucushcamanta, Esteban huañuchi tucushcapi chausiriccuna pactanurca Feniciacama, Chipre, Antioquiacama, judiocunallata Diospac Shimita camachishpa.
Chashnapash, tiyarcami paicunamanta maicancuna Chipremanta, Cirenemantapash, paicunaca Antioquiaman pactashpa griegocunatapash camachinacurca Apunchic Jesuspac Cushi Shimita rimashpa.
Apunchic paicunahuan cashcaraicu, achcacuna ininacurca Diosman shuncuta shayachishpa.
Chashna tucushcamanta Jerusalenpi tiyac iniccunaman pactarca, chairaicu Bernabeta Antioquiaman cachanurca.
Pactashcapi Dios cuyashcata ricushpa, yapa cushiyarca, paicunata rimarcapash tucuilla huancurishpa Apunchihuan catincapac;
pai alli runa, Diospac Samaihuan juntarishca, inishcapipash sinchi catic cashcaraicu, achca runacuna Apunchicta ricsinacurca.
Chashnapi Bernabe Tarsoman rirca Saulo mashcancapac.

Tarishpa Antioquiaman paita pusharca. Shuc huata chai iniccuna llactapi ishcantin causanurca, achca runacunata yachachishpa; Antioquiapimi yahachishcacuna 'cristianocuna' rimai tucuncapac callarinurca.
Chai punchacuna Jerusalenmanta Profetacuna uraicunacurca.
Paicunamanta shuc, Agabo shutiyuc, Diospac Samai paita ricsichishcaraicu, jatun yaricai tucui pachaman shamunca rashcata huillarca. (Claudio Jatun Apu cashcapi chai yaricai tiyarca).
Yachachishcacuna caran amu ushashca tuputa yanapancapac rimanacurca Judea llactacunapi causac huauquicunata.
Chashna ruranacurca; Pablohuan Bernabehuan tantachishca cullquita cachanacurca.
Jatun Apu Herodes iniccunamanta maican runacunata ñacachincapac yuyarirca.
Mircanuhuan Santiagota huañuchichirca, pai Juanpac huauqui carca;
judiocuna chashna rashcata allihuan ricunucpi Pedrotapash japichirca. Pascua punchacuna carca.

Japichishca huasha, chunta curralpi quillpachirca, paita ricuncapac churarca chunca sucta soldadota, caranpi chuscu chuscu shayachishpa. Pai yuyarcami Pascua huasha Pedrota tucui runacunapac ñaupacpi surcushpa ricuchincapac.
Chashna Pedro chunta curralpi ricui tucunacama, iniccuna sinchita Dios-huan pairaicu rimarinacurca.

Herodes chashna tucui runacunapac ñaupacpi shayachishpa ricuchincapac racurca; chai tuta, Pedro ishcai soldado ucupi puñucurca, ishcai jillai huascahuan huatashca, paita ricuncapac mincashcacuna chunta curral puncupipash tiyanurca.

Cuncaimanta, Apunchicpac angel ricurirca, tucui chunta curral punchaclla tucurca. Maquihuan tintillu panpapi huactashpa Pedrota causachishpa, nirca: —Utcalla jatari. Chashnapi jillai huascacuna maquimanta urmanurca,
cutipash paita angel rimarca: —Chunpita huatari, ushutatapash churari. Chashna rurarca pai; angel cuti paita rimarca: —Jahua churarinata churarishpa catihuai.
Paipac huashalla Pedro llucshirca. Pai mana yacharcachu chai angel ruracushca shuti cashca imapash, shuc nuspai shina paita yachirca.

Paita ricuccamacunata ishcaipi saquishpa rinurca; chashna jillaimanta rurashca puncuman pactanurca; chai puncu cancha llucshina cashpa, paipac munai pascarirca. Llucshinurca; puricushcapi cuncaimanta chai angel paipac mayanmanta chincarirca.

Pedro allipacha yuyaita japishpa rimarca: —Ayalla, shutimi cashca: Apunchicmi paipac angelta cachamushca Herodespac maquimanta llushpichihuancapac, judiocuna ñucata ruranca rashcamanta quishpichihuancapac.
Pai ña allita yuyaita japishcapi, Juan Marcospac mama Mariapac huasiman rirca, chaipi achcacuna tantarinacushcarca Dios-huan rimarincapac.
Puncupi tacacrirca, shuc cuitsa: Rosa shutiyuc, pimi canca nishpa ricucrirca;
Pedropac shimita ricsishpa, yapalla cushiyashpa, pascana rantimanta, ucuman callpashpa, Pedromi puncupi can nishpa rimarca.
Paicuna cutipanurca: —¿Ima, nuspachu canqui? Paica, shuti chaipimi, nishpa rimarca. Chaishuccunaca rimanurca: —¿Paipac angelmi canca?
Pedro chaicama cayacurcami. Paicuna pascashcapi, paita jinu ricunurca, rimai paicunata mana tiyarcachu.

Maquihuan ricuchishpa chunlla tucuncapac rimarca; chaipi paicunata rimarca ima shina Apunchic chunta curralmanta paita surcushcata. Paicunata rimarcapash: —Caita Santiagoman, chaishuc huauquicunamanpash rimaichic. Chai huasha llucshishpa chaimanta shucman rirca,
Punchayashcapi yapa tulupui tiyarca soldado ucupi, Pedro imata tucushcanca nishpa tapuriranurca.
Herodes mashcachirca, chashnapash mana tuparcachu, chairaicu huacaichicamacunata tapuchishca huasha, paicunata huañuchichirca. Chai huasha Pedro Judeamanta Cesareaman rirca; chaipi saquirirca.

Chai pachapi Herodes piñarishca carca Tiro, Sidon, iscantin llactamanta runacunahuan. Paicuna, allita rimarishca huasha, paipac ñaupacman pactanurca; ñaupac Biastohuan alli mashi tucunurca, pai chai Jatun Apupac cullquita huacaichic runa carca; paicuna mañanurca ganas causaita paicunapura charincapac, tucui chai runacuna chai Jatun Apupac allpamanta mari micunata tariranurca.
Paicuna rimashca puncha pactaricpi, Herodes, Jatun Apupac churanata churarishpa, paipac tiyarinapi tiyarishpa, paicunata rimarca.
Pai rimashcata uyashpa runacuna caparinurca: —¡Chashna rimacucca mana runachu, Diosmi can!
Cuti chashnapi cuncaimanta Apunchicpac angel paita huacllichirca, Diospac shutita shuhuashcaraicu; chaipi curu micushca huañurca.
Diospac shimi jatunyashpa, mirarishpa ricurca.
Bernabe Saulontin, paicunaman mincashcata tucuchishpa, Jerusalenmanta ticranurca, paicunahuan Juan Marcosta pushashpa.
Antioquiapi ininacuna ucupi profetacuna, yachachiccuna canurca: Bernabe, paicuna Yana Runa rimacushca Simeon, Cirenemanta Lucio, Jatun Apu Herodeshuan huiñac Manaen Saulopash.
Shuc puncha paicuna sasishpa Dios-huan rimaricushcapi, Diospac Samai paicunata rimarca: —Bernabeta Saulontin chicanyachipaichic, ñuca mincanata ruranuchun.
Cutillata sasishpa Dios-huan rimarinurca; maquicunata umapi churashca huasha paicunata cachanurca.
Diospac Samai mincashcata uyashpa Seleuciaman rinacurca, chaimanta Chipreman yacuta rinurca.
Salaminapi pactashpa judiocunapac tautarina huasicunapi Diospac Shimita uyachinurca; Juanpash chaillapita paicunata yanapacurca.
Chai islata Pafoscama rinurca,. Chaipi shuc yachac judiota tarinurca; pai mana profetachu carca, paipac shuti carcami Jesuspac churi;
pai causacurcami Apu Sergio, Pablohuan, yapa alli yuyayuc rana. Pai Bernabeta Saulontin cayancapac cacharca, pai Diospac Shimita uyanata munarca;
ranti Elimasca, nicpi Yachac, mana munarcachu, Aputa inishcamanta chicanyachinayashpa.
Chashnapi Saulo, Pablopash paita rimanchic, Diospac Samaihuan juntashca cashpa, paiman allipacha ricushpa rimarca:
—Can, supaipac churi, umachinahuan, mana allicunahuan juntarishca, alli cashcata piñac, ¿maican punchallaca Apunchipac cusca ñanpicunata huishtuyachinata saquinquichu?

Cunashitumi Diospac maqui canpac jahuapi urmanca ran, ñausami saquirinqui, unaita punchata mana ricuna ushanquichu Dios munanacama.; Chaillapita paipac ñahui yanayarca. Amuca maquicunahuan mashcacurca pillapash maquimanta japihuachun nishpa.
Chai Apu pai jinu ricurca, chairaicu inirca.
Pablo paipac mashicunantin Pafosmanta Panfiliamanta Pergecama canuapi rinacurca. Juan chaipi paicunamanta chicanyashpa Jerusalenman ticrarca;
ranti paicunaca, Pergemanta llucshishpa, Pisidiamanta Antioquiaman pactanurca. Sabado puncha tantarina huasipi yaicushpa tiyarinurca.
Profetacunata camachic quillcatapash catishca huasha, tantarina huasi apucuna caita rimancapac cachanurca: —Huauquicuna, sinchicuchincapac shimicunata charishpa, rimaichiclla.
Pablo shayarishpa, maquihuan paicunata cayashpa, rimarca: —Israelpac churicuna, tucui cancuna Diosta manchashpa causaccunapash uyaichic:
Cai Israel llactamanta Dios, ñucanchicpac rucucunata acllarca, paicunata mirachirca Egiptopi chican runa shina causacushcapi. Sinchi maquihuan chaimanta paicunata llucshichirca;
chuscu chunca huata chunlla allpapi paicunata carashpa charirca.
Canchis Canaanmanta mama llactacunata chincachishpa,
paicunaman chai allpata curca, chuscu patsac pichca chunca huata huashamanta. Chai huasha Taripaccunata paicunaman curca profeta Samuel shayarinacama.
Chashnapi shuc Jatun Aputa mañanurca, Diosca Quispac, churi Saulta paicunaman curca; pai carcami Benjaminpac aillu; chuscu chunca huatata Jatun Apu causarca.

Chashnapash chai huasha Dios paita anchuchirca, pai rantimanta shayachircami Davidta, paimanta cai chacchashca shimita rimarca: Jesepac churi Davidta; ñuca munashca shina runata tarircani, pai tucui nuca munashcacunata pactachincami.
Cunan ricushun, Davidpac allumanta Israelpac shuc quishpichicta churashca, pai rimashca shina: chai Jesusmi.
Pai chaira mana pactamushcapi, Juan juchacunamanta nanarina bautismota yachachirca;

Juanca paipac causaita cai pachapi tucuchincapac racushcapi, paimantallata rimarca: "Mana cancuna yuyashca runachu cani; ranti yuyarichic ima shina ñucamanta huasha shamucuc ñuca mana paipac chaquimanta ushutallapash llushpichipac runa cani"
Huauquicuna, Abrahanmanta shamuc huahuacuna; cancunapash Diosta manchashpa causaccuna: ñucanchicman cai quishpina shimita cachamushcai
Alli shutipachami Jerusalenmanta runacuna, paipac apucunantiu Jesus cashcata mana ricsinata ushanurca; huañuchichishpaca, tucui sabadopi profetacunamanta uyachishcata pactachinurca.
Huañuchina tupu juchallishcata mana tarishpapash, Pilatota mañanurca huañuchichun nishpa.
Tucui paimanta quillcara tiyashca pactarishcapi caspimanta uraicuchishpa panpanurca
Ranti Dios paita huañushcacunamanta causachirca.
Paihuan Galileamanta Jerusalenman riccunata achca puncha ricurirca, paicunami cunan paipac ricuyaccuna canacun runacuna ñaupacpi.
Nucanchic shamunchicmi cancunata cai Cushi Shimita uyachincapac: Chai Dios ñucanchic rucucunata cushami rimashcata
churicunaman cushpa pactachishca, Jesusta huauñushcamanta causachishpa. Cashna quillcara tiyarca ishcainiqui Salmopi: "Can ñuca huahua canqui, cunan canta huiñachishcani".
Huañushcamanta causachishpa, mana cuti huañuna ushancapac, Dios cashna rimashcata charin: "Davidta cusha rimashcata pactachishami".
Chashnallata pactachirca shucpi quillcashcata: "Canta allipacha catic ismuncapac ama saquinquichu".
Pacta yachanquichic ima shina David, Dips mincashcata pactachishca huasha, huañurca; paipac rucucuna rishcaman rirca, paipac aichaca ismurca.
Ranti, Dios causachishcaca mana ismun, chaica Jesusmi can.

Chashnamanta allita yachapaichic, huauquicuna, pairaicumi juchacunamanta pichai tucunquichic; chairapash, tucui chai Moisespac camachic quillcahuan mana pichai tucuc ushashcacuna, Jesuspi inishpa, tucui chaicunamanta pichashca, quishpichira saquirinun.
Yapa yuyarishpa causaichic, ama profetacuna rimashca shina tucuncapac:
Uyaichic, tucuita millaccuna, mancharichic, callpaichic, cancuna causashca punchacunami jatun ruraicunata ranca racuni; cancuna chaita uyashpa mana ininquichicmanchu".
Paicuna llucshicushcapi mañanurca chaishuc sabadotapash chaimantallata rimai tucuncapac.
Tantarina tucurishcapi achca judiocuna, inincapac callarishcacunapash Pablohuan, Bernabehuan rinaicurca; paicuna chaicunahuan rimarishpa catinurca, Diospac cuyaita mana chincachishpa catincapac.
Sabado pactashcapi ñalla tucui llactamanta runacuna Diospac Shimita uyancapac pactanurca.
Chashna achca runata ricushpa, judiocuna yapa piñarinurca; chairaicu Pablo rimashcamanta chican shimita rimashpa piñashpa caparinacurca.

Chashnapi Pablo Bernabentin sinchi shimihuan rimanurca: —Cancunatami ñaupac Diospac Shimita rimana carcanchic; ranti chasquinata mana munanquichic huiñaipac causaita, cunan ñucanchic rincapac racunchic Diosta mana ricsiccunaman yachachincapac.
Cashna Apunchic rimashca: "Cai pachamanta achictami canta rurasha, quishpinata tucui pachaman pactachi ushancapac"
Diosta mana ricsiccuna chaita uyashpa yapa cushiyanacurca, Apunchicpac chashna rimashca shimicunata chaccharanurca; Diospac huiñaipac causaita chasquinacuna ininurca.
Chaicamaca Diospac Shimi chai suyupi ricsi tucushpa catirca.
Chashnamanta judiocuna cullquiyuc huarmicunata, inishcapi callarishcacunata llactamanta apucunatapash, Pablota Bernabentin piñashpa japincapac callarinurca; chashna chai allpamanta callpachinurca.
Paicuna chaquimanta ushpata chausirinurca, paicuna mana alli rashcaraicu; chaimanta Iconio llactaman rinurca,
yachachishcacunata cushihuan Diospac Samaihuan juntarishcacunata saquishpa.
Iconiopi chashnallata tucurca. Pablo Bernabentin judiocunapac tantarina huasipi yaicunacurca; paicuna yapa allita rimashcaraicu achca judiocuna griegocunapash ininurca.
Ranti mana ininata munac judiocuna, Diosta mana iniccunata mana alli shimicunata rimashcahuan piñachishpa, chai ishcai huauquicunata callpachincapc yuyarinurca.

Chashna paicuna ruracpipash Pablo Bernabentin unaita chaipi causanurca, mana manchashpa shimihuan yachachishpa; Apunchicpac yanapaihuan mancharicushiyanacunata rurashpa, paipac Shimi yachachishcata ricsichinurca.
Chai llactamanta runacuna ishcai yuyaita japinurca: maicancuna judiocunahuan canurca, shuccunaca Apostolcunahuan canurca.
Judiocuna mana iniccunapash paicunapac apucunantin shayarishpa, Apostolcunata rumihuan huactachincapac racushcata yachashpa,
Licaoniapi tiyac llactacunaman miticushpa rinurca: Listra, Derbe, chai mayanpi tiyac llactacunaman rinurca;
chaipipash Diospac Cushi Shimita yachachinurca.
Listriapi causacurca shuc suchu runa, pacarishcamanta janca runa, mana maican puncha purinata ushashcarcachu.
Shuc puncha, pai Pablo rimashcata uyacushcapi, Pablo allipacha paita ricurca, pai inishcata yachashpa;
chaipi caparishpa rimarca: —Shayari. Chai runa pahuashpa, shayarishpa, purincapac callarirca.
Chai runacuna Pablo rurashcata ricushpa, Licaonia runacunapac shimipi caparincapac callarinurca: —Dioscuna runapac aichata japishpa ñucanchicta ricuncapac shamunushca.
Bemabeta Zeusmi rimanurca, Pablotaca, Hermes, pai yachachiccama cashcaraicu.
Zeuspac huasimanta yaya pacri llacta mayanpi shayacuc cari huacracunata, llautucunata chaiman apachirca; tucui runacunahuan rimarishpa camarita paicunaman ricuchinayarca.
Chashnata Bernabe Pablontin yachashpa, churanata lliquicta aisarishpa, runa ucuman rishpa, caparinurca:

—¿Allichu caita rurana? Ñucanchicpash cancuna shinallata runami canchic; Cushi Shimita cancunaman rimanchicmi cai huacacunata jichushpa Causac Diosman cancuna ticrancapac; pai rurarcami jahua pachata, allpata, ñucñu yacuta, tucui paicunapi tiyashcacunatapash.
Callari pachapi pai saquircami caranlla amu munashca ñanpita catichun nishpa;
chashnapash pai rurashcacunahuan ricsichi tucurcami. Jahua pachamanta tamiata cachamun, tarpuna pachacunatapash; chashnamanta micunata charinchic, ñucanchicpac shuncutapash cushihuan juntachin.
Chashna rimashca shimicunahuan runacunata uyachinurca, ama camarita paicunaraicu ricuchincapac,

Yachachincapac chaipi saquirishcapi, Antioquiamanta, Iconiomanta judiocuna shamushpa, runacunata umachinurca; Pablota rumihuan shitashpa, llactamanta canchaman aisashpa shitanurca, huañushcami yuyashpa.
Ranti yachachishcacuna paipac mayanpi tantarishcapi, jatarishpa cuti llactaman ticrarca. Cayantiman Derbeman Bernabehuan ticrarca.
Diospac Cushi Shimita chai llactapi ricsichishca huasha, chaipi achca runacuna paicuna yachachishcata catinurca; chaimanta Listraman ticranurca chai huasha Iconioman, chaimanta Antioquiaman.
Jesusta caticcunata sinchicuchiranurca, inishcapi sinchicuichic rimashca shimicunahuan; paicunata rimaccuna carca: "Achca llaquicunata yalushpami Diospac pachapi yaicushun".
Caran iniccuna. tiyashca ucupi, shuc pushaccamata churanurca, Dios-huan rimanshca, sasishca huasha, paicuna imshca Apunchicman paicunata mincaccuna carca.
Pisidia suyuta chinpacta purishpa Panfiliaman pactanurca;
Perge llactapi Diospac Shimita uyachinurca, chaimanta Ataliaman rinurca.
Chaimanta Antioquiaman yacuta rinurca; chaimanta rinushcarca Diospac maquipi mincashcacuna paicunaman mincashcacunata pactachincapac.
Chaipi pactashpa, iniccunata tantachinurca; rimanurca tucui Dios paicunahuan rurashcata, ima shina Dios paita mana ricsiccunata inishcaman yaicuchishcata.
Chaipi unaita saquirinurca yachachishcacunahuan.
Maican Judeamanta shamuccuna huauquicunata cashna yachachiranurca: "Mana ullu carata pitirishpa Moisespac quillcapi yachachishca shina, mana quishpina ushanquichic".

Chashna rimashcamanta jatun piñanacuna tiyarca Pablo Bernabentin chai judiocunahuan. Antioquiamantacuna rimanurca Pablo Bernabe, paicunamanta maicancunantin Jerusalenman rincapac, chai rimaricushcamanta Apostolcunahuan pushaccamacunahuanpash allichincapac.

Iniccuna yanapanurca paicuna rincapac; Fenicia, Samaria allpacunata rinurca; chashna rirashpa huauquicunata rimashpa rinurca Diosta mana ricsiccuna Diosta inishcata; chashna rimashcata uyashpa chai huauquicuna yapa cushiyanurca.
Jerusalenman pactashcapi, iniccuna Apostolcunantin pushaccamacunantin yapa allita chasquinurca; chaipi paicunata rimanurca tucui Dios paicuna maquihuan rurashcata.
Ranti maican fariseo ucumanta runacuna, ha inishcaman tucushcacuna, rimanurca: —Paicunata ullu carata pitirinuchun, Moisespac camachic quillcata pactachinuchun rimana canchic.
Apostolcuna pushaccamacunantin tantarinurca paicuna rimashcata allita atipashpa ricuncapac.

Paicuna rimaricushpa yapa sinchi tucucucpi, Pedro jatarishpa paicunata rimarca: —Huauquicuna, callarishcamanta cancuna pacta yachanquichic, cancuna ucumanta Dios acllahuarca Diosta mana ricsiccuna ñuca shimimanta Diospac Cushi Shimita uyashpa, paicunapash inincapac.
Diosca, shuncucunata ricsic cashpa, paicunatapash chasquircami, paipac Samaita ñucanchicman cushca shinallata cushpa.
Ñucanchicta paicunatapash chaipuralla ricushca; paicunapac shuncucunata chuyayachishca paicuna inishcaraicu.
¿Allichu canca Diosta camancapac cunan cashna cai yachachishcacunata paicuna jahuapi ñucanchic rucucuna, ñucanchicllata mana aparina ushashca llashaita apachincapac?
Mana; ininchicmi Apunchic Jesuspac cuyaihuan quishpina cashcata; paicunapash chashnallata.
Tucui tantarishcacuna chunlla tucunurca Pablota, Bernabeta uyancapac; paicuna rimanurca Dios paicunapac maquihuan rurashca mancharicushiyanacunata paita mana ricsic runa ucupi.
Paicuna rimanata tucuchishcapi, Santiago callarishpa, rimarca: —Huauquicuna, uyahuaichic:
Simon yuyachishcami ima shina Dios, callarishcamanta pacha yuyarishcata paita mana ricsishca ucumanta shuc runacunata paipacta jinu acllashcata. Profetacuna ña rimanushcarca, cashna rimashcapi:
"Caimanta huasha ticramushami cuti Davidpac urmashca huasita jatachincapac; tularishcata jatachishpa cutillata shayachisha,
tucui runacunapash Apunchicta mashcanuchun, tucui ñucapac shutita ña chariccunantin:
chashna Apunchic riman unaimanta rimashpa charishcata".
Chairaicu, ñuca yuyani mana alli can mushu inincapac callarishcacunata llaquicunahuan quillachincapac.
Allimi canca yachin paicunata quillcacpi ama micunuchun huacacuna ticllayachishcata, mana sahuarishpa causanamanta chicanyanuchun, ama yahuaryuc aichacunata micunuchun yahuartapash ama micunuchun.
Yuyaricpica, unaimanta caran llactapi Moisespac camachic quillcata caran sabado yuyachinun yachachiccamacuna.

Yachachishcacuna pushaccamacunantin tucui tantarishca runacunapash, yuyarinurca paicunamanta maicancunata acllashpa Antioquiaman cachancapac Pablohuan Bernabentin. Judas Barsaba Silapash acllai tucunurca; paicuna pushaccama huauquicuna canurca.

Paicunahuan cai quillcata cachanurca: "Apostol huauquicuna pushaccama huauquicunantin allilla causacuichic rimanun Antioquiamanta, Siriamanta, Ciliciamanta huauquicunata, Diosta mana inishca runa ucumanta shamushcacuna.
Caipi yachashcanchic maican caimantacuna, mana ñucanchic mincashcacuna, cancunata ansata pantachinushca, llaquichinushca paicuna rimashca shimicunahuan.
Ranti cunan, tantarinaman cayashca huasha, tucuilla yuyarishcanchic cancunapacman caimanta maicancunata cachancapac, ñucanchipac llaquishca huauquicuna Pablo, Bernabehuan;
cai runacuna paicunapac causaita Apunchic Jesucristota yanapancapalla charinushca.
Chashnamanta cachanchicmi Judashuan Silasta, paicunapash ñucanchic rimashca shina cancunata shimihuan jinu rimanunca.
Yuyarishcanchicmi Diospac Samai ñucanchicpash, mana ashtahuan cancunapac jahuapi llaquicunata churancapac; ashtahuan caicunata shuti ruraichic nishpa mañanchic:

camarita shina huacacunaman cushca aichacunata ama micuichichu; yahuartapash sipishpa huauuchishca aichacunatapash ama micuichichu, mana sahuarishpa causanamanta chicanyaichic. Tucui chaicunata huacaichishpa allimi canquichic. Samashun",
Cachashcacuna, Antioquiaman rinurca; chaipi tucuicunata tantachispa quillcata cunurca.
Quillcata uyashpa, tucuilla cushiyanurca yapa sumac shimicuna cashcaraicu.
Judas Silapash, paicunapash profetacuna cashpa, achca rimashca shimicunahuan huauquicunata sinchicuchinurca, ñaupacman catina yuyaita cunurca.
Unaimanta, allihuan samashun rimai tucunurca huauquicunapacpi paicuna cachai tucushcamallata ticrancapac.
Pablo Bernabentin Antioquiapi saquirinurca, Apunchicpac Cushi Shimita yachachishpa, uyachishpa; chaillapita shuccunapash paicunahuan canurca.

Achcanaya punchacuna huasha Pablo Bernabeta rimarca: —¿Imaraicu tucui chai ñucanchic Apunchicpac Shimita yachachishca llactacunapi tiyac huauquicunata cutillata mana ricucrinchic allichu tiyaranun imachari?
Bernabe paihuan pushanayarca Juan Marcosta.
Pablo, ranti, yuyarca mana allichu pushancapac paicunamanta Panfiliapi chicanyashpa, mana paicunahuan purinaman ric runata.
Piñanushpa, chicanyanurca. Bernabe Marcosta pushashpa Chipreman rirca;
ranti Pablo, Silashuan mashiyarca; paipac huauquicuna Diosman paicunata mincanurca;
paica rishpa purirca Siria, Cilicia iniccunata sinchicuchishpa.
Derbeman Listramanpash pactarca. Chaipi shuc Tímoteo shutiyuc yachachishcahuan taririrca, pai carcami Diosta inic judio mamamanta, paipac yayaca ranti Greciamanta.
Listramanta Iconiomanta huauquicunapash paimanta alli shimicunata rimashcaraicu,
Pablo paihuan richun munarca. Paita japishpa ullu carata pitirca, chaimanta judiocuna pai Greciamanta yaya charishcata yachashcaraicu.
Liactacunata rirashpa, runacunaman apostolcuna pushaccamacunantin Jerusalenpi rimashcata ricshichishpa rinacurca, paicunapash pactachinuchun nishpa.
Iniccuna inishcapi sinchiyashpa catinurca, ashtahuan caran puncha mirarishpa rinurca.
Diospac Samai Asia allpapi Cushi Shimita yachachincapac mana munashcamanta, rinurcalla Frigiapi, Galacia suyupi mana shayarishpa.
Misiaman pactana mayanpi, Bitiniaman rinata yuyarinurca, ranti Jesuspac Samai mana munarcachu.
Chairaicumanta Misiata rishpalla Troademan uraicunurca.
Chaipi chai tuta Pablo shuc nuspaita charirca: Shuc Macedoniamanta runa, shayarashpa, paita rimacurca: Macedoniaman shamushpa ñucanchicta yanapai.
Chai nuspaita charishca huasha, Macedoniaman utcalla rincapac yuyarircanchic, Dios paipac Shimita chaimanmi yachachincapac cayacun yuyarishpa
Chairaicu Troademanta Samotraciaman cusca rircanchic. Cayantin punchapi Neapolispi shayarircanchic,
chaimanta Filiposman rircanchic, chai llacta Macedoniapi jatun llacta can, chaipi Romamanta Apu ricuccama tiyan. Cai llactapi unainayata saquirucanchic.

Sabado puncha llactamanta canchaman llucshircanchic, yacu pataman, chaimanmi judiocuna Dios-huan rimarincapac tantarinurca, Pablo yuyashcamanta. Chaipi tiyarishpa, tantarishca huarmicunahuan rimarircanchic.
Paicunamanta shuc, Lidia shutiyuc, Tiatiramanta, purpura nishcata catuccama, Diosta inic carca, uyashpa tiyarca; Apunchicca paipac shuncuta pascachirca Pablo rimacushcata allita atipancapac.

Pai aillucunantin bautismota chasquishca huasha, ñucanchicta cayarca: —Ñuca allipacha Diosta caticmi yuyashpa, shamuichic ñucahuan, ñuca huasipi saquirichic. Mana munacpipash chaiman pai pushashpa rirca.

Ñucanchic Dios-huan rimarinaman rirashcapi, shuc malta huarmi ñucanchihuan tuparirca; pai yachac carca, ima tucunca rashcata huillac carca, pai chashna cashcamanta amucuna achca cullquita japiccuna carca.
Pablota, ñucanchictapash cashna caparishpa caticacharca: —Cai runacuna Jatun Diosta catic runacunami canun, paicunaca cancunata ricsichiranunmi quishpina hanpita.
Chai cuitsa caran puncha chashna caparishpa purirca; ña Pablo amishpa, paiman ticrashpa chai supaita rimarca: —Jesucristopac shutipi canta rimani, paimanta llucshi. Chaillapita llucshirca.
Paipac amucuna, chashna tucushcahuan cullqui japina tucuricpi ricushpa, Silasta Pablontin japishpa, llacta pacllaman apucuna ñaupacman aisashpa pushanurca;
chaipi jatun apucunapac ñaupacpi churashpa, cashna rimashpa ricsichinurca: —Cai runacuna ñucanchic llactapi quillachiranun;
paicunaca judio runacunami canun, camachiranunpash ñucanchic mana yachashca, mana pactachipac yachaicunata, ñucanchic romano cashcaraicu.
Runacuna paicunahuan piñaricpi, churanata llatanashpa caspihuan huactachichinurca jatun apucuna.
Caspihuan yuyaita huactashca huasha, quinchara ucupi quillpanacurca; mincanurca chaipi ricuccamata allita paicunata ricuchun.
Pai chashna mincai tucushpa, ashtahuan ucu quinchara ucuman paicunata churashpa, chaquicunata jillai sapipi canichispa churarca.
Chaupi tuta Pablo Silaspash taquishcahuan Dios-huan rimarinacurca. Shuc quillpashcacuna uyaranurcalla.

Cuncaimanta, shinchi allpa cuyurina tiyacpi chunta curral sapicunantin chucchurirca. Chashna tucushcallapita tucui puncucuna pascarinurca, jillai huascacunapash tucui quillpashcacunamanta llushpirinurca.
Ricuccama causarirca, tucui puncucuna pascarata ricushpa mircanuta surcurca huañurincapac, tucuimi llucshinushca yuyashpa.
Chashnapi Pablo caparirca: —Ama susurichu, tucuillami caipi canchic.
Ricuccama achicta mañashpa, shuc pahuaillahuan ucuman yaicushpa, chucchurishpa Pablo Silaspac chaqui mayanpi urmarca.
Paicunata canchaman surcushpa tapurca: —Quishpincapac ¿imatami rurana cani?
Paicuna cutipanurca: —Apunchic Jesuspi inina canqui, chaimi can canpac aillucunantin quishpinqui.
Chaipi paita, tucui paipac huasipi tiyaccunantin Diospac Shimita uyachinurca.
Ricuccamaca chashna tuta ucupipash paicunata japishpa, paicunapac chucrishcacunata maillarca; chaillapita bautismota tucui paipac aillucunantin chasquinurca.
Huasha paipac huasiman paicunata cayarca, micunata cararca, tucui paipac aillucunahuan cushiyarca Diosta inishcamanta.
Cayanti tutamanta jatun apucuna chapacunahuan ricuccamata rimancapac cacharca: —Cachari chai runacunata.
Chai ricuccama Pabloman pai uyashca shimita rimarca: —Jatun apucuna cancunata cacharichun rimancapac cachamunushca. Chairaicu cunanca ama imatapash manchashpa, richiclla.

Ranti Pablo chapacunata cutiparca: —Imanashi. Ñucanchicta tucui runacunapac ñaupacpi llipachinurca; manapash allita yachashpa, ñucanchic romano runacuna cacpipash chunta curralpi quillpanacurca, ¿cunanca pacallachu ñucanchicta surcushun yuyanun? Manapacha chaita uyanayanichu. Paicuna jinu shamushpa surcuc shamunuchun. Chapacuna jatun apucunapacman rimacrinurca paicuna uyashcata; paicuna romano runacuna cashcata yachashpa mancharinurca.
Chai huasha "ñucanchicta quishpichipaichic" nishpa mañancapac paicuna cashcaman rinurca; canchaman surcushca huasha, cai llactamanta richic nishpa rimanacurca.
Pablo Silaspash chunta curralmanta llucshishpa, Lidiapac huasiman rinurca, chaipi huauquicunahuan tuparinurca. Paicunata sinchicuna yuyaicunata rimashca huasha, chaimanta rinurca.
Anfipolista Apoloniatapash rishpa, Tesalonicaman pactanurca, chaipi shuc tantarina huasi tiyarca.
Pablo, paipac yachaita catishpa, chaipi pactashpa quimsa sabado paicunahuan rimarinurca. Quillcashcacunamanta yuyaita surcushpa,

camachicurca, ricsichicurcapash ima shina Mesias ñacarina carca, ima shina huañushcacunamanta causarina carca, cashna shimihuan tucuchic carca: "Chai Mesias Jesusmi can, ñuca cancunaman ricsichicushca".

Maican judiocuna uyashpa Pabloman Suasmanpash llutarinurca; chashnallata achca Greciamanta runacuna, paicunapash judiocuna inishcata japinacushcarca; chai ucupi achcanaya chariyuc huarmicunapash tiyanurca.

Chashnata mana allihuan ricushpa, judiocunaca millai, quilla runacunata tantachinacurca, paicunahuan llactapi quillachishpa puriranurca. Jasonpac huasipi pactacrinurca Pablomanta, Silasmantapash tapushpa, paicunata runacunapacman pushancapac.
Paicunata mana tupashcaraicu, Jasonta maican huauquicunantin apucunapac ñaupacman cashna caparishpa aisashpa rinurca: —Chai runacunata jatachishpa puriccuna caipipash pactamunacushcami,
Jasonca paicunata chasquishca paipac huasipi. Tucui paicuna Cesar rimashcata mana uyanun, shuc Jatun Apu Jesusmi tiyan nishpa.
Chashna rimashca shimicunata uyashpa, apucuna tucui runacunapash mancharinurca.
Chairaicumanta paicunaca cullquita mañanurca paicunata cacharincapac.
Utcalla chai tuta, Bereaman Pablota Silastapash huauquicuna cachanurca. Chaipi pactashpa tantarina huasiman rinacurca.

Bereamanta judiocunaca Tesalonicapi tiyaccunamanta ashtahuan allicuna canurca, chairaicu allihuan chasquinurca Diospac Shimita. Caran puncha Quillcacunata allipacha ricuranurca, Pablo rimashca shinachu can nishpa.
Achcacuna ininurca, Diosta mana ricsiccunapash, chariyuc huarmicuna caricunapash.
Bereapi Diospac Shimita Pablo yachachicushcata Tesalonicamanta judiocuna yachashpa, chaiman runacunata huacllichincapac, macanacuchincapac rinurca.
Chashnapi utcalla huauquicuna Pablota ñucñu yacu pataman cachanurca, ranti Silas Timoteontin chaipi saquirinurca.
Pablota pushaccuna paita Atentas llactacama pushashpa rinurca, chaimanta ticramushpa Silas Timoteontin utcalla Pablohuan tuparicrinuchun shimita apashpa rinurca.
Pablo Atenaspi chaishuccunata chapacushpa, yapa nanarirca tucui llacta huacalla juntaracpi ricushpa.
Pablo tantarina huasipi judiocunahuan, Diosta muchaccunahuanpash rimaric carca, chashnallata llacta pacllapi tuparishcacunahuan.

Maican yapa quillcayuccunapash paihuan rimariccuna carca. Shuccuna tapuccuna carca: —¿Imallapash rimancapac charincachu imachari chai rimaisiqui runa? Shuccunaca Jesus huañushcamanta causarinata rimashcata uyashpa, rimaccuna carca: —Chican Dioscunamanta uyachishpa puric shina yachin.
Japishpa Areopago nishcaman pushaspa, paita tapunurca: —¿Can rimacushca mushu yuyaicunata yachana ushanchicchu?
Alli shutipacha can mana maipi uyashcacunata rimanqui, can imata rimanayashcata yachanayanchicmi.
Yachai tiyan ima shina chaimanta runacuna chicanmanta shamuccunapash rimanun, uyanun imapash paicunaman mushu pactashcallata.
Pablo chaupi Areopagopi shayarishpa, rimarca: —Atenasmanta runacuna, tucui cancuna charishcacunamanta ricushpa atipashpa ricuni cancunapac dioscunaman llutarishpa causashcata.

Llactata puricushpa achca huacacunata shuc altar nishcatapash ricushcani; chai altar cashna quilicayuc: "Mana ricsira Diosraicu". Cunan ricushun, cancuna mana ricsishpa chacchacushcata, ñuca ricsichincapac shamuni:
Cai pachata, tucui caipi tiyaccunata rurac Dios, jahua pachamanta cai pachamanta amu cashpapash, mana runacuna rurashca huasicunapichu causan.
Mana runa maquimanta yanapaita mutsunchu, yanapaita chapacuc shina, pai tucuicunaman causaita, samaita cuyan, tucui imatapash.
Shuc runamantalla tucui llactacunata surcurca cai pachapi causanuchun nishpa, paillata caran llactapac saihuata ima tupu causana cashcata churarca.
Paita mashcanuchun munarca, ñausa shina mashcashpa unaiman tupanunman imachari;
manapi paimanta carupi canchic, paipi causanchic, cuyurinchic, cai pachapi tiyanchic, shuc cuyailla rimac nishca shina: "Diosmanta miraicuna canchic".
Chairaicu, Diospac miraicuna cashpa, mana allichu Diosta curihuan, cullquihuan, sumac ricuric rumicunahuan chinpapurachina, chaicunaca runa rurashcallami canun.
Cunan ricuichic: Diosca, mana yachashpa rurashcacunata cuncarishpa, cunan pai riman tucui runacunata, tucui cai pachapi causaccunata, Diosman shuncuta shayachincapac.
Ña pai shuc puncha rimashcata charin tucui cai pachata sumacta taripancapac pai acllashca runahuan; chashna tucunca racushcamanta tucuicunata ricsichishpa paita huañushcacunamanta causachirca.
Huañushcamanta causarinata uyashpa, maicancuna asinacurca, shuccunaca rimanurca: —Chaimantaca shuc punchapimi uyanata munanchic.
Chaipimi Pablo paicuna ucumanta llucshirca.
Chashna cacpipash, maican runacuna paiman llutarishpa ininacurca. Paicuna canurcami Dionisio Areopagita nishca, chaimanta shuc huarmi Damaris shutiyuc shuccunapash.
Chashna tucushca huasha, Pablo Atenasta saquishpa Corintoman rirca.

Chaipi tuparca Aquila shutiyuc judiota, pai Pontomanta carca, mushulla Italiamanta shamushcacuna paipac huarmi Priciliantin, jatun apu Claudio tucui judiocuna Romamanta llucshinuchun rimashcaraicu. Pablo paicunahuan ailluyarca;
chai llancanallata charishcaraicu paicunahuan llancashpa causancapac saquirirca; paicunaca tsala churana ahuac canurca.
Caran sabado rimaric carca tantarina huasipi, judiocunata griegocunatapash uyachisha nishpa.
Ranti, Silas Timoteontin Macedoniamanta pactashcapi, Pablo Diospac Shimita yachachinamanlla tucurca, judiocunata Jesus Mesias cashcata uyachisha nishpa.

Paicuna mana uyanayashpa piñashcahuan cutipanucpi, Pablo paipac churanamanta ushpata chausirishpa, paicunata rimarca: —Cancunallami imapash tucucpi yachanquichic; ñuca mana juchallinichu. Cunanmanta Diosta mana ricsiccunapacman rini.
Chaimanta llucshishpa shuc Diosta muchac Ticio Justo shutiyuc runapac huasiman rirca, paipac huasi tantarina huasi mayanpi carca.
Tantarina huasi apu, Crispo, tucui paipac aillucunantin Apunchicta inirca; achca Corintomanta uyac runacunapash, inishpa bautismota chasquinurca.
Shuc tuta nuspaipi Apunchic Pablota nirca: —Ama manchaichu, ama chunllayaichu, rimacuilla,
ñucami canhua tiyacuni, mana pipash canta macashpa susurichincachu, cai llactamanta achcacuna ñuca runacuna cashcaraicu.
Pablo chaipi shuc huata chaupi saquirirca paicunata Diospac Shimita yachachishpa,
Ranti Galion Acayamanta apu cashcapi, tucui judiocuna shuclla runa shina Pablota japishpa, taripana huasiman pushanurca, rimashpa:
—Cai runa ñucanchicta camachicun Diosta chacchana, ñucanchic quillcapi mana munashca shina.
Pablo ña cutipanca rashcapi, Galion judiocunata rimarca: —Judio runacuna, huañuchishcamanta, jatun juchallishcamanta ima cacpica, cancunata uyaiman chari;
ranti, Diosmanta yachachishca, cancunapac Camachic Quillcamanta cashcaraicu, ñuca mana munani chaicunamanta taripancapac.
Taripana huasimanta tucuicunata llucshichirca.
Chaillapita tucuilla, tantarina huasi apu Sostenesta japishpa, taripana huasi ñaupacllapita yuyaita macashpa churanurca. Ranti Galion mana imallapash rimarcachu.

Pablo chaira unainayata Corintopi saquirirca, chai huasha chaipi tiyac huauquicunata saquishpa, Siriaman rincapac barcopi yaicurca, Priscilata Aquilantin paihuan pushashpa. Cencreaspi umata llushtichirca, shuc pactachina shimita charishcaraicu.
Efesoman pactashcapi, chaipi paicunamanta chicanyashpa, tantarina huasiman rirca; chaipi judiocunahuan rimarincapac callarirca.
Paicunaca Efesopi unaita saquirichun munanurca, ranti Pablo mana munarcachu,
ashtahuan paica cai shimicunahuan puchucarca: —Dios munacpi, cuti ticramusha chari. Efesomanta ñucñu yacuta rirca.
Cesareapi llucshishpa, iniccunata ricucrirca, chai huasha Antioquiaman rirca.
Chaipi unaita causarca, chai huasha cuti rirca Galacia suyu, Frigia suyuta ricuncapac, yachachishcacunata sinchicuchincapac.
Efesoman Apolo shutiyuc judio pactarca, pai Alejandriamanta carca; alli rimac, Camachic Quillcata yapa yachac.
Apunchicpac ñanpi catinapi paita yachachinushcarca, allipacha shuncuhuan rimashpa Jesuspac causaimanta yachachic carca, shinapash Juanpac bautismollatami paica ricsirca.
Apolo mana manchashpa tantarina huasipi rimancapac callarirca; chashnapi Aquila Priscilantin uyanurca. Paicunahuan pushashpa ashtahuan yallita Diospac ñanpimanta paita yachachinurca.

Apolo Acayata rina yuyaita charishpa, huauquicuna sinchicuchinurca, quillcanurcapash yachachishcacunata, allita chasquinuchun nishpa. Pai pactashcahuan, Dios yanapashcaraicu, achcata sinchicuchirca iniccunata.
Mana pipash cutipana usharcachu, pai tucuipac ñaupacpi judiocuna rimashcamanta chican shimita rimacpi; cashna, allipacha, Camachic Quillcahuan Jesus Mesias cashcata ricsichic carca.
Apolo Corintopi tiyacunacama, Pablo Efesoman pactarca jahua urcucunata chinpashpa; chaipi shuc yachachishcacunata tuparca,
paicunata tapurca: —¿Cancuna inina callarishcapi Diospac Samaita chasquircanquichichu? Paicuna cutipanurca: —Diospac Samaimanta mana shuc shimillapash mana uyashcanchichu.
Pablo paicunata cuti tapurca: —Shina cacpi, ¿ima bautismota chasquircanquichic? Cutipanurca: —Juanmanta bautismota chasquircanchic.
Pablo paicunata rimarca: —Juanmanta chasquishca bautismoca juchamanta nanarinatami ricsichicurca; chashnapash runacunata rimarca paimanta huashalla shamucucta inincapac, chaica Jesusmi can.
Uyashpa bautismota chasquinacurca Apunchic Jesuspac shutipi.
Chai huasha Pablo paicunapac uma jahuapi maquicunata churacpi, Diospac Samai paicunapacman uraicurca; chaillapita chican shimicunata, tucunca rashcacunata rimancapac callarinurca.
Paicuna chunca ishcai runacuna canurca.
Pablo tantarina huasiman rishpa quimsa quilla tucuipac ñaupacpi Diospac pachamanta yachachirca, paicuna allita atipashpa uyahuanuchun nishpa.

Maicancuna mana atipashpa uyanata munanucpi, ashtahuan piñanucpi ñanpimanta chicanyachinucpi ricushpa, Pablo paicunata chicanman saquishpa, yachachishcacunahuan tantaric carca, Tiranopac yachana huasipi caran puncha rimariccuna carca.
Ishcai huata chashna causanurca; chairaicu Asia suyumanta tucui runacuna, judiocuna, griegocunapash Diospac Shimita uyanata ushanurca.
Dios Pablopac maquihuan achca mancharicushiyanacunata rurarca,
paimanta rimacpica Pablo churarashca llachapac pitita uncuccuna jahuapi churashcallahuan janpiriccuna carca, supaicunapash callpaccuna carca.

Judiocunamanta maican, supaita callpachishpa puriccuna, camana munanurca Apunchic Jesuspac shutita japishpa uncuccunamanta callpachincapac, casfana rimashpa: —Pablo yachachishca Jesuspac shutipi, canta llucshi nishpa rimani.
Chaita ruraccuna canurcami judio pacri yayacunapac apu Escevaspac canchis churicuna;
ranti chai supai paicunata cutiparca: —Jesustaca ricsinimi, Pablo pi cashcatapash yachanimi, ranti cancuna pi cashcata mana yachanichu, ¿pimi canquichic?
Chaillapita chai supai japishca runa chai runacunata japishpa yuyaita macarca, chairaicu chai huasha paicunaca llushti, susurishca chai huasimanta callpana tucunurca.

Chashna tucushcamanta shimi Efesopi tiyac tucui runacunaman pactarca, judiocunaman griegocunamanpash. Tucuilla yapa mancharishca saquirinurca, Apunchic Jesuspac shutica ashtahuan jatunyashca saquirirca.
Ininapi callarishcamanta maicancuna paicuna mana alli rashcamanta tucuicunapac ñaupacpi juchata rimacrinacurca;
chashnallata, sacracunapash quillca pancacunata tantachishpa illacta rupachinurca, tucuicunapac ñaupacpi. Chai pancacunata yupashpa camacpi, pichca chunca huaranca cullqui llucshina cashcarca.
Chashna, Apunchicpac ushaihuan, paipac Shimi yapa runacunapi miraricurca.
Tucui chaicunata rurashca huasha, Pablo allipacha Jerusalenman rinata yuyarirca Macedoniata Greciatapash rishpa. Yuyarirca: Jerusalenta ricucrishca huasha, Romatapash ricucrinami cani.
Macedoniaman ishcai paita yanapaccunata cacharca, Timoteo Erastontin, ranti paica ansata chaira Asia marcapi saquirirca.
Chai punchacunapi Apunchicpac mushu ñanpiraicu piñarishpa jatarinurca runacuna.
Shuc runa Demetrio shutiyuc, cullquimanta imatapash rurac, chai cullquimantallata huacacunata ruracurca Artemisapac huasimanta ricushpa, achca cullquita chaihuan japic canurca chaipi llancaccuna;
tucui paicunata tantachishpa rimarca: —Mashicuna, cancuna yachanquichic cai cullqui japishcamanta ñucanchic alli causaita charina cashcata.
Ranti cancunallata ricushcanquichic, yachashcanquichic imapash, mana Efesollapi, tucui cai Asia suyupi, chai Pablo runacunata shuc yuyaita churashcata, pai runa rurashcaca mana dioschu can rimashpa.

Mana ñucanchicpac llancanallachu chincarincapac racun, ashtahuan Jatun Artemisapac huasimi jichui tucushca saquirinca racun; chashna tucushpaca paita muchana tucurincami cai Asiapi tucui pachapipash.
Chai shimicunata uyashpa piñarishpa cashna caparincapac callarinurca: —Efesiocunapac Artemisaca jatunmi can.
Tucui llactapi yapa tulupushca tiyarca, tucuilla teatro nishcaman callpanurca, Gayota Aristarcontin aisashpa, paicunaca Macedoniamanta canurca, Pablohuan puriccuna.
Pablo tucui chai runacunata ñahuichinayarca, ranti yachachishcacuna mana saquinurca.
Chashnallata chai Asia suyumanta maican apucunapash, paipac mashicuna cashpa shimita cachanurca, ama teatroman mayanyachun nishpa.
Caranlla pai munashcata caparicurca. Jatun tantarinapi tucuilla chausirishca canurca, maicancunaca mana yachanurca imaraicu chaipi tantarinushcata.

Chashnapi, runa ucumanta shuc runata Alejandro shutiyucta sumacta camachinurca, paita judiocuna ñaupacpi churanurca. Alejandro munarcami runacunata ricsichincapac imaraicu chashna tucushcata, maquihuan ricuchishpa chunllayachinayarca.
Runacuna judio cashcata yachashpa ñalla ishcai patsac tuputa tucuilla sinchita capariranurca: —Efesiocunapac Artemisaca jatunmi can,

Ña sanpayashcapi, llactamanta shuc apu paicunata chunllayachishpa, rimarca: —Efesomanta runacuna, ¿manachu tucuilla yachanchic cai Efeso llacta paipac ucupi Artemisapac huasita, paipac jahua pachamanta urmashca huacatapash huacaichishpa charishcata?.
Chashna cashcamanta mana pipash rimancachu; chairaicu, allimi yuyani cancuna chunllayancapac, allita yuyarishpa imatapash rurancapac.
Cai cancuna apamushca runacuna mana juchallinushcachu, ñucanchic diostapash mana piñanushcachu.
Demetrio paipac mashicunantin pihuanpash piñanacuita charishpa, chaipacta tantarinacuna apucunapash tiyanun. Chaipi ima juchallishcacunamantapash taripana tiyachun.
Cuti shuc juchachinacuna tiyacpi, Jatun Tantarinapi allichina tucunca.
Aluta yuyaricpi, juchachi tucuna ushanchic cunan piñarishpa rashcamanta, mana impash tiyarca nucanchic chashna piñarishcahuan cushparincapac.
Chashna rimashca huasha, chausichirca tantarinata.
Puñarishpa jatarishcacuna chunllayashca huasha, Pablo yachachishcacunata cayachirca sinchicuchincapac; chai huasha paicunamanta anchurishpa Macedoniaman rirca.
Chai suyuta yachachishcacunata sinchicuchishpa purishca huasha, Greciaman rirca.
Chaipi, quimsa quilla huasha, Siriaman barcopi ticrasha yuyarca; ranti chaipi yacharca judiocuna paita mana alli ranata yuyacushcata, chairaicu Macedoniata ticranata yuyarirca.
Asiamanta pai rinca racushcapi, paihuan rinurca Pirropac churi Sopratos, Berca llactamanta; Aristarco, Segundopash, Tesalonicamantacuna; Derbemanta Gayo Timoteontin; Asiamanta Tiquico, Trofimontin.
Paicuna ñaupashpa ñucanchicta Troadepi chapanurca.
Ranti ñucanchicca, Pascua raimi huasha, Filiposmanta ñucñu yacuta rircanchic; pichca puncha huasha Troadepi paicunata japicrircanchic, chaipi shuc semana unayarcanchic.
Semana callarishca punchapi tantarircanchic misata rancapac; Pablo cayantiman rina cashpa, paicunahuan rimaricurca. Chashna paicuna rimaricushca chaupi tutacama unayarca,
ñucanchic tantarishca ucupi achca chinpusucuna tiyarea.

Shuc malta runa, Euriquio shutiyuc, jahua patapi tiyac quincha jutcupi tiyacurca. Pablo rimashpa caticushcapi ashtahuan puñunai paita japirca; ña puñuihuan mana ushashpa, quimsa (quimsaniqui) niqui pata jahuamanta allpaman urmarca, huañushcata jatachinurca.
Pablo uraicushpa, paipac jahuapi siririrca, paita ucllarishpa, rimarca: —Ama mancharichichu, chaira samaita charinmi.
Cuti jahuaman sicashpa, misata rashpa micurca. Punchayana mayancama rimaricushca huasha, rirca.
Chai malta runamanta rimacpica, tucuipac cushiraian causacta apamunurca.
Ñucanchicca barcoman rircanchic, chaimanta Asoman rircanchic; chaipi Pablohuan tuparina carcanchic, paica allpata rirarca, pai rimashca shina.
Chashna tucurca, Asopi tuparircanchic, ñucanchichuan barcopi sicarca, chaimanta Mitileneman pactarcanchic.
Chaimanta llushpiriccuna, cayantiman Quios mayanman pactarcanchic; chaishuc punchaman Samosta ricurcanchic; chaimanta shuc puncha huasha Miletoman pactarcanchic, Trogillonpi shayarisuca huasha.
Pablo allipacha yuyarishcarca Efesopi mana shayarishpa rincapac, ama yanca Asiapi unayasha nishpa; utcalla rirarca Jerusalenpi Pentecostes puncha pactana yuyaihuan.
Miletomanta Efesoman shimita cacharca, chaimanta pushaccamacunata cayarca.
Pactashcapi paicunata rimarca: —Cancuna yachanquichic Asiapi callarishca punchamanta ñuca ima shina cancunahuan causashcata;
ñuca uchilla cashcata yuyarishpa Apunchicta yanapashcani, chai tucui judiocuna huacaita, llaquita cuhuacpipash.
Cancuna yachanquichic mana mancharishpa cancunaraicu tucuita rurashcata. Cancunata camachircani, yachachircani tucuipac ñaupacpi, caran huasipipash;
judiocunata nicpi, griegocunata nicpi Diosman shuncuhuan ticrarinuchun Apunchic Jesuspi inincapacpash cayashcanimi.
Cunan Jeruslenman Diospac Samai pushashca rirani, mana yachani chaipi ima tucuna cashcatapash.
Diospac Samaica caran llactapi piñashpa japi tucuna, piñashpa quillpai tucunallatami ricsichihuan.
Shinapash, manapacha ñuca causaimanta yapalla yuyarinichu, ñuca ashtahuan munanimi tucuchinata, pactachinatapash Apunchi Jesus mincashcata: Cushi Shimimanta ricuyac cana.

Cunan ricuichic, ñuca yachani cancuna mana cuti ricuhuanata, cancuna ucupi Diospac Pachamanta yachachircani. Chairaicu, cunan cancunata rimanata ushani ñuca mana juchayuc cashcata, cancuna imapash tucunca rashcamanta,
Dios munashcata mana pacashpa tucui cancunata yachachishcaraicu.

Allita caranlla ricurishpa causanquichic, cancunaman Diospac Samai mincashca runacunatapash cancunata ricuc shina churashpa; chashna cancuna inishpa huancurishcacunapac michiccuna canquichic, pai paipac quinquin yahuarhuan chaita tuparca.
Yachani ñuca rishca huasha, cancuna ucupi millai atuc yaicumuna cashcata, paicunamanta mana quishpinquichichu,
cancunamantapash maicancuna tiyancami Diosmanta yachashcata pantashcahuan yachachiccuna, paicunahuanmi yachachishcacunata aisashpa rinunca.
Chairaicu, yuyarishpa chapacuichic: yuyarichic quimsa huatata, tuta punchantin, huacashcahuan caran cancunata camachinata mana saquishcanichu.
Cunan Diospac maquipi, pai cuyashca Diospac Shimipipash cancunata saquini; paillami ushan cancunata jatunyachincapac, acllashcacuna japinata cancunapash japina ushancapac.
Mana pipac cullqui, mana pipac curi, mana pipac churana munashpa ricushcanichu.
Yachanquichic cancuna ñuca quiquin maquihuan llancashcata, ñucapacta, ñuca mashicuna mutsushcata tupancapac.
Tucuipi cancunata ricuchishcani ima shina llancana canchic mana imayuccunata yanapancapac, cai Apunchic Jesuspac shimicunata yuyarishpa: Cuyana chasquinamanta ashtahuan yalli cushita apamun.
Rimanata tucuchishca huasha, tucuicunahuan cuncurishpa Dios-huan rimarirca.
Tucuilla huacaranurca, Pablota ucllarishpa muchanurca;
yapa llaquirishca canurca pai mana cuti ricuhuanquichichu rimashcaraicu. Chai huasha barcocama paihuan rinurca.
Paicunamanta llushpirishca huasha, cutillata yacuta rishpa Cosman cusca rircanchic; cayantiman Rodasman rircanchic, chaimanta Pataraman, Miramanpash pactarcanchic.
Chaipi shuc barcota Feniciaman riracta tarishpa chaipi yaicushpa rircanchic.
Chipre islata ricurcanchic, chaita lluqui maquiman saquishpa, Siriaman ñahuichashpa catircanchic. Tiropi llutarircanchic, chai barco quipicunata chaipi saquina cashcaraicu.
Chaipi yachachishcacunahuan tuparircanchic chairaicu canchis puncha paicunahuan saquirircanchic. Diospac Samai paicunata rimashcaraicu, Pablota Jerusalenman ama richun nishpa camachinurca;

chashna cacpipash, semana tucurishcapi paicunata saquishpa, hucanchic rirashcaman catircanchic. Tucuilla, huarmicuna huahuacunantin llacta canchacama ñucanchihuan rinurca. Tiyupi Dios-huan rimarincapac cuncurishca huasha,
paicunamanta anchurircanchic, barcoman yaicurcanchic, ranti paicunaca huasiman ticranurca.
Tiromanta Tolemaidaman rircanchic, chashha ñucanchic purinata tucuchircanchic. Huauquicunahuan chaipi tuparishpa, shuc puncha paicunahuan saquirircanchic.
Cayantiman llucshishpa Cesareaman pactarcanchic; Diospac Shimita yachachishpa puric Felipepac huasiman rircanchic, paica canchispuramanta acllashca mari carca; chai huasipi saquirircanchic.
Paipac chuscu ushushicuna mana sahuarishca saquirinushcarca, paicunaca profetacuna canurca.
Chaipi ñucanchic ña unainayata tiyacushcapi Agabo shutiyuc profeta Judeamanta shamushca;

ñucanchicta ricuncapac pactamurca. Pablopac chunpita japishpa, maqui chaqui huatarishpa, rimarca: —Caitami Diospac Samai riman: Cai chunpipac amuta cashnami Jerusalenpi judiocuna huatanunca, Diosta mana ricsiccunaman paita cununca.

Chaita uyashpa, ñucanchic chaipi tiyaccunapash Pablota Diosmanta mañarcanchic ama Jerusalenman richun nishpa; ranti Pablo cutipaica: —Yancamanta huacacpi cancunata allichu yachin, shuncuta pantachinayahuanquichichu. Apunchic Jesusraicu mana jillai huascallatachu aparina yuyaita charini, ashtahuan Jerusalenpi huañuchi tucushami.
Mana saquichipac tucushpa, casula ricurcanchic, rimashpa; —Dios munashca shina tucuchun.
Allichina punchacuna tucurishca huasha Jerusalenman rircanchic.
Cesareamanta maican yachachishcacuna ñucanchihuan rinurca Nasonpac huasipi saquicrinacama; paica Chipremanta carca, callarishcamanta yachachishca runa; paipac huasipi saquirircanchic.
Nucanchic Jerusalenman pactashcapi cushihuan huauquicuna chasquinurca.
Cayantiman Pablota Santiagopac huasicama ñucanchihuan pusharcanchic, chaipi tucui pushaccamacuna tantarishca canurca.
Pablo paicunahuan tuparirca, chaipi rimarca tucui paipac maquihuan Dios rurashcata, Diosta mana ricsic ucupi.

Pai rimashcata uyashpa, Diosta chacchanurca, paitaca rimanurca: —Huauqui, canllata ricunqui chai tucui huaranca judiocuna ininaman llutarishcata, shinapash tucuilla Camachic Quillcata cuscata pactachishpa catic canun

Cuti canmantapash ansa rimashcata uyanushca: canshi Diosta mana ricsic ucupi causac judiocunata, Moises yachachishcata jichuncapac camachinqui; churicunapac ullu carata pitincapac mana munashpa, rucucunamanta yachaicunata mana pactachina rimashpa. ¿Imata ruracpimi alu tucunca?.
Shuc tantarinata rurancapac cayacpi alli tucunca yachin, mana unaipichu can shamushcata yachanunca;
chairaicu ñucanchic rimashcata uyana tucunqui: Nucanchicmanta chuscu runa cushca shimita pactachina canun;

paicunata canhuan pushai, paicunahuan sasicrinqui, paicuna accha pitirishcamanta cullquita cui; chashnami yachanunca canmata rimashca mana shuti cashcata, ashtahuan chaipimi ricununca canpash camachic quillca rimashcata pactachicushcata.

Ininapi mushu callarishcacunamanta rimacpi, quillcancami racunchic ñucanchic rimarishcapi yuyarishcata: ama micunuchun huacacunapacta huañuchishca aichacunata, sipishpa huañuchishca aichacunatapash, llutarishpalla causanatapash saquinuchun.
Chashna Pablo cayantiman, chai runacunata paihuan pushashpa, sasicrirca, Diospac huasiman yaicurca sasina puncha tucurishcamanta camarita ricuchina cashcamantapash rimancapac.
Canchis puncha pactanca rashcapi, Asiamanta judiocuna, Diospac huasipi paita ricushpa, runacunata cariyachishca huasha, Pablota japishpa,

caparinurca: —Israelitacuna, ñucanchicta yanapaichic: Cai runami maipipash ñucanchicmanta mana allita rimac, ñucanchic camachic quillcamanta cai allpamantapash mana allita yachachishpa puric can. Chairapash maican Greciamanta runacunatapash cai Diospac huasipi yaicuchishca, pai sumac cashcata huacllichishpa.
Chaita rimanurca llactapi Efesomanta Trofimo Pablohuan puricushcaraicu; chairaicu Diospac huasiman yaicuchishcami yuyanurca.
Llactapi tucuilla piñarinurca, achca runa ricuncapac rinurca, Pablota japishpa Diospac huasi canchaman aisashpa shitanurca, puncucunata utcalla quillpashpa.
Paita huañuchincapac yuyaricushcapi, soldadocunapac apuman tucui Jerusalen llacta runacuna jatarishca shimi pactarca.
Utcalla soldadocunata paipac apucunantin japishpa callpashpa rirca. Soldadocunata paipac apuntin ricushpa, Pablota huactacushcamanta saquinurca.
Soldado apu Pabloman mayanyashpa, paita japirca, ishcai jillai huascahuan huatachirca, chai huasha pi cashcata yachancapac, ima rurashcata tapurca;
ranti runa ucumanta caranlla chican shimita capariranurca. Mana imatapash yachanata ushashpa yapa tulupushcaraicu, soldadocunapac huasiman pushachirca.
Chacana siquipi pactashcapi, soldadocuna marcashpa pushanurca runacuna yapa piñarishcaraicu;
chashna cashpa runacuna huashamanta: Huañuchi nishpa caparishpa shamuranurca.
Ña soldado huasiman yaicuchinca racushcapi soldado aputa Pablo rimarca: —¿Ishcai shimillapash canta rimanata ushanichu? Soldado apu cutiparca: —¿Griego shimita rimanata yachanquichu?
¿Shinacpi manachari chai cunanlla chuscu huaranca runacunata cariyachishpa chunlla allpaman paicunahuan ric Egiptomanta runachu canqui?
Pablo cutiparca: —¿Pi, ñuca? Ñucaca Tarsomanta judio runami cani, Ciliciamanta maipipash uyarishca llacta; Diosmanta rimani, cai runacunata ansata rimana munani.
Chai soldado apu: ari, nirca. Pabloca chacanapi shayaranlla; runacunata maquihuan ricuchirca. Tucuilla chun saquirinurca, chaipi paipac quiquin shimipi paicunata rimarca:
—Ñucapac yayacuna, huauquicuna, uyapaichic ñuca quishpinamanta rimanca rashcata.
Paicunapac quiquin shimipi rimacpi uyashpa, ashtahuan yalli munaihuan uyashpa saquirinurca. Pablo rimashpa catirca:

—Ciliciamanta Tarsopi pacarishca judio runami cani, shinapash cai llactapi huiñashcami cani; Gamaliel yachachishcami cani, ñucanchicpac yayacunapac Camachic Quillca allita pactachinapi yachashpa huiñacmi cani. Diosta ininapi yapa sinchita, cancuna cunan caticushca shinami catic carcani.
Ñucallata cai mushu ininata chincachina yuyaihuan millarcani, cari huarmicunantin japishpa chunta curralpi satichircani.

Ñuca chashna cashcamanta ricuyac canunmi pacri yayacunapac apu, rucucuna tantarishcapash. Paicunami Damascomanta huauquicunapacta quillcata cuhuanurca; chaiman rircani chai runacunata tupashpa, Jerusalenman japishpa apamuncapac, chaipi ñacachi tucuncapac.
Ña Damasco mayanlla cashcapi cuncaimanta, chaupi puncha cashcapi, shuc jatun achic jahua pachamanta shamushpa, ñuca mayanpi llinpiyarca.
Allpapi urmashpa, shuc shimi cashna rimacushcata uyarcani: "Saulo, Saulo, ¿canchu chashna piñashpa catihuanqui?".
Ñuca tapurcani: ¿Canca pita canqui, Apunchic? Pai cutipahuarca: "Nucami can pinashpa japinayashca Nazaretmanta Jesus cani".
Nucahuan riraccuna chai llinpiyashcata ricunurca, ranti mana atipanurca ñucata rimacushcata.
Ñuca rimarcani: Apunchic, ¿imatami rurana cani? Apunchic cutipahuarca: "Jatarishpa Damascoman rilla, chaipimi tucui can rurana cashcata rimanunca".
Achic llinpiyashcamanta ñausa cashcaraicu, ñuca mashicuna Damascoman maquimanta aisashpa pushahuanurca.
Shuc runa Ananias shutiyuc, Camachic Quillca rimashca shina alli shuncuyuc runa, Ilactamanta tucui judiocuna rimashcaraicu, ricuc shamuhuarca;
ñucaman mayanyashpa, rimahuarca: "Huauqui Saulo, canpac ñaihui cutillata alliyachun". Ñuca chaillapita paita ricuna usharcani.
Chashnapi pai rimarca: "Ñucanchic rucucunapac Dios pai munashcata canta ricsichinayashca, Cusca Runata ricuchun munashca, paipac shimitapash uyachishca.
Cunanmanta paipac ricuyacmi canqui tucui runapac ñaupacpi, can uyashcamanta ricushcamantapash.
Ña cunan ama yanca tiyacuichu; jatari, bautismota chasqui, canpac juchacunata maillai, paipac shutipi mañashpa".
Jerusalenman ticrashcapi, Dios-huan paipac huasipi rimaricushcapi, shuc nuspaita charircani.
Chaipi Apunchicta ricurcani, pai ñucata rimahuacurca: "Utcalla Jerusalenmanta ri, mana uyanuncachu can ñucamanta rimashcata".
Ñuca paita cutiparcani: Apunchic, paicuna yachanun mari tantarina huasicunapi, ñuca canta iniccunata japishpa purishcata, paicunata macachincapac;
chairapash, canpac ricuyac Estehanpac yahuarta tallichicushcapi, chaipi ñuca carcani, paicuna rurashcahuan cushiyashpa, paicunapac churanata charicurcani.
Ranti Apunchic rimahuarca: "Ri, ñucami canta caruman cachanca rani, Diosta mana ricsic llactacunaman".
Chai tucuita rimanacama uyanacurca, ña chai huasha caparinurca: —Ñucanchic ñahuimanta chai runata anchuchi, causancapallapash mana allichu.
Jahua churanata lliquirishpa, ushpata jahuaman shitashpa capariranucpi,
soldadocunapac apu huasi ucuman yaicuchirca, paita llipachishpa rimachincapac imaraicuta paimanta chashna caparinacun.
Ña paicuna macancapac sumacta huatashcapi, chaipi shayacuc soldado aputa tapurca: —Shuc romano runata mana taripashpapash, ¿ushanquichicllachu macancapac?
Chaita uyashpa, chai soldado apu aputa rimacrirca: —Allita yachashpami imatapash rurana canqui, chai runa romano mari can.
Jatun apu paipacman rishpa, tapurca: —¿Alli shuti pachachu romano canqui? Pablo cutiparca: —Shutimi.
Cuti jatun apu rimarca: —Yapalla achca cullquitami romano tucuncapac curcani. Pablo paita cutiparca: —Ranti ñucaca pacarishcamanta charini.
Macanca racuccuna utcalla anchurinacurca, chai jatun apullata upata mancharirca shuc romano runata jillai huascahuan huatachishcaraicu.
Cayantiman, imamanta judiocuna chashna juchachiranun nishpa yachanayashpa, cacharirca, pacri yayacunapac apucunatapash tantachichirca, Pablota uraicuchishpa paicunapac ñaupacpi shayachirca,
Pablo Rucucuna tantarishcaman ricushpa, rimarca: —Huauquicuna, cunancama Diospac ñaupacpi cuscata purishcani.
Chashnapi, pacri apu Ananias paita yanapaccunahuan shimipi huactancapac cacharca.

Pablo chaipi rimarca: —¡Yanca yuracyachishcalla aya jutcu, Diosmi canta huactanca! ¿Camachic quillca rimashca shina taripancapac caipi tiyacushca, huactachina allichu, ñucata macashcahuan Camachic Quillcata huacllichicunqui mari?
Chaipi tiyaccuna rimanurca: —¿Canchu Diospac pacri aputa pinanqui?
Pablo cutiparca: —Huauquicuna, mana yacharcanichu pai pacri apu cashcata. Ari, shutimi, Quillca chashna riman: "Ama piñashca shimihuan canpac aputa rimanquichu".

Pablo yacharca chaupi runa saduceocuna, chaishuc chaupi runa fariseocuna cashcata, chairaicu tucui Tantarishca ucupi caparirca: —Fariseocunapac churi cashpa, fariseomi cani, cancuna taripahuacunquichicmi huañushcamanta causarinata chapashcaraicu.
Pai chashna rimashca shinalla piñanacui tiyarca fariseocuna saduceocunahuan; chairaicu tantarishcacuna ishcaipi raquirinurca.
(Saduceocuna rimanun huañushcamanta causarina illanmi nishpa, angelcunapash illanmi, ima samaipash mana tiyanchu nishpa rimanun, ranti fariseocunaca tucui chaicuna tiyanmi nishpa rimanun).

Tucuilla capariranurca, fariseocunamanta maican Quillca yachachiccuna shayarishpa, piñarishcahuan rimanurca: —Mana ima juchatapash cai runapi tupanchic. Shinacpi, ¿alli shuti pachachu shuc angel, shuc aya imapash paita rimashcata yachanquichic?
Paicuna piñarishca ashtahuan yalli sinchi tucurca. Pablo piti piti rai tucunata manchashpa, soldado apu soldadocunata cayachirca, chaimanta surcushpa pucaraman pushancapac.
Cayantin tutapi Apunchic Pablota ricurishpa, rimarca: —Sinchicui. Can Jerusalenpi ñucaraicu rimashca shina, chashnallatami Romapipash rimana canqui.
Ña pacarishcapi, maican judiocuna shuc tantarinata charinurca, chaipi sumacta yuyarishcahuan shimita curinurca ama micuncapac, ama upiancapac Pablota huañuchinacama.
Shimita curiccuna chuscu chunca yalli canurca.
Pacri apucunapacman rishpa rimacrinurca: —Sumacta yuyarishcahuan shimita curishcanchic ama imallapash micuncapac Pablota huañuchinacama.

Cunanca cancuna soldado Aputa mañaichic cancunapacman pushamuchun pai rurashcamanta ashtahuan allimanta ricuncapac nishpa, ñucanchicta caipi chapacushunmi chaira mana pactashcallapita huañuchincapac.
Ranti Pablopac panimanta huahua, paicuna huañuchina munacushcata yacharca; soldado huasiman rirca, paicuna yaicuchicpi, paica Pablota rimacrirca.
Pablo shuc soldado aputa cayashpa nirca: —Cai huanprata canpac jatun apupacman pushashpa ri, paita shuc shimita rimanayan.
Chai soldado apu jatun apupacman pusharca, chaipi rimarca: —Japishca Pablo cayahuarca, canpacman cai huanprata pushamuchun nishpa mañahuarca, cantashi shuc shimita rimanayan.
Chai jatun apu maquimanta japishpa, chicanman pushashpa, tapurca: —¿Shutichu rimanata charinqui? ¿Imata can?
Chai huanpra rimarca: —Judiocuna rimarinushca canta caya puncha mañashpa apu tantanacuiman Pablota pushachincapac, pai rurashcamanta ashtahuan allimanta ricuncapac nishpa.

Chaitaca ama uyanquichu, paicunaca miticushpami chapanca ranun paicunamanta chuscu chunca yalli runa tupu, Pablota huañuchinacama mana micuna, mana upiana sumacta yuyarishpa shimita curishcaraicu. Ñami chaparanun, canpa shimillami pishin.
Jatun apu chai huanprata caita mincashpa cacharca: —Ama pitapash rimanquichu chaimanta ñucaman rimashcata.

Chai huasha ishcai soldado apucunata cayashpa nirca: —Tuta iscun pachapi, ishcai patsac soldadocunata allichishcata charina canquichic Cesareaman rincapac, chaipipash rina canun sucta chunca soldado caballohuan, ishcai patsac tucsinahuan.
Pablo rincapacpash caballota allichina canquichic, chashna huainaru Felixpacman pactachina canquichic.
Shuc quillcatapash cashna shimicunahuan cacharca: "Claudio Lisias huainaru Felixpac ñaupacpi cai quillcahuan pactan,
caita rimancapac:
Judiocuna cai runata japinushcarca, ña huañuchinca ranurca; romano cashcata yachashpa, soldadocunahuan rishpa paicunamanta quishpichircani.
Imamanta juchachicushcata yachanayashpa, paipac apu tantanacuiman pusharcani;
