chaipi yacharcani paicunapac Camachic Quillcamanta juchachiranushcarca, ranti paipac juchaca mana huañuchincapac, japishpa quillpancapac tupu mana jatunchu carca.
Chai huasha yacharcani judiocuna cai runata huañuchincapac chapacushcata, chairaicu canman cachacuni, paita juchachicuccunatapash rimarcani paicuna rimana cashcata canpac ñaupacpi rimanuchun".
Soldadocuna, rimashcata pactachishpa, Pablota japishpa, Antipatrisman tuta pushanurca;
cayantiman pucaraman ticranurca, ranti caballopi puriccuna paihuan rinurca.
Cesareaman pactanurca, quillcata huainaruman cunurca Pablotapash ricsichinurca.
Quillcata ricushca huasha maican suyumanta cashcata tapurca; Ciliciamanta cashcata yachashpa,
paita rimarca: —Canta juchachiccamacuna shamucpi canta uyashami. Herodespac huasipi ricui tucushca tiyancapac cachai tucurca.
Pichca puncha huasha pacri apu Ananias, maican rucucuna, shuc quillca runa, Tertulo shutiyuc, Cesareaman rinurca; chaipi Pablota juchachinurca.
Pablota cayachishca huasha, Tertulo cai shimicunahuan Pablota juchachirca: —Canraicu alli causaita charinchic,
tucui can cai llactamanta alli rashcacunaraicu pacrachunchicmi huiñaipac, jatun huainaru Felix.
Ranti mana yapalla quillachinata munashpa, canta mañanimi ñucanchicta uyancapac, canpac yachai, llaquishca shuncuhuan.
Tupashcanchicmi cai mana alli runa tucui cai pachapi tiyac judiopura macanacuchicushcata, chairapash paica nazareno nishca runacunata pushaccama can;
allita rimacpi, pai Diospac huasita huacllichincapac racushcapi japircanchic.
Canllata tapushpa camai, chaimi nucanchic shuti rimacushcata yachanqui.
Judiocuna chai shimi shutimi nishpa yanapanurca.
Huainaru ricuchishcahuan rimai nishcapi Pablo rimarca: —Unaimanta can allita taripashpa caticushcata yachashpa cai ñucanchic llactapi, ñuca quishpinamanta canta rimanayani.
Canllata shuti cashcata yachana ushanqui ima shina chunca ishcai puncha can ña cai Jerusalenman ñuca shamushca;
mana Diospac huasipi, mai llactapi, mai tantarina huasipi imapash mana ricuhuanacushcachu pihuanpash piñanacushpa shayashcata, runacunata cariyachicushcata imapash;
chairaicu, ñucata juchachicushcamanta canpac ñaupacpi mana ricuyaccuna tucuna ushanun.

Caita shuti canpac ñaupacpi, ari nishpa rimani: ñuca rucucunapac Diosta caticunimi cai ñanpita rishpa, paicuna chican yuyaita catic rimahuanun, camachic quillcapi, profetacuna rimashcata allipacha inishpa.
Paicuna chapacushca shinallata, ñucapash Diosmanta chapacuni, shuc puncha allicuna, manallicuna huañushcamanta causarinata.
Chairaicullata, Diospac ñaupacpi, runacunapc ñaupacpi chuya shuncuyuc causaipi causacuni.
Achca huata huasha diosmantata camaritapash cai ñuca llactaman apamurcani.
Chaita racushcapi Diospac huasipi tupahuanurca, camachic quillcapi rimashca shina chuya shuncuyuc tucushca carcani, chaipi mana ima runa piñarishpa jatarishca tiyarcachu.
Ranti Asiamanta maican judiocunami, cunan caipi canpac ñaupacpi juchachincapac shamuna canurca, imallapash juchachinata charishca cashpa.
Mana cacpi, caicunallata rimanuchun ima juchatami tupanurca ñuca apu tantanacui ñaupacpi taripai tucushcapi;
cai shimicunata shuti rimarcanimi: "Caipi taripahuanquichicmi huañushcamanta causarinaraicu".
Felix, chai mushu ñanpimanta alli yachashca cashpa, cai shimicunata rimashpa cacharca: —Soldado apu Lisias shamucpimi allipacha caimanta ricushun,
Pablota ricuncapac capitanta rimarca, chashnapash ama yapalla huashapi catirayashpa, paipac aillucuna ricuna munacpi ricunuchunlla.
Huasha punchacunaman Felix paipac huarmi Drusilantin shamurca, pai judio huarmi carca; Pablota cayachishpa Jesus Mesiaspi ininamanta rimachirca.
Ranti Pablo cusca causanamanta, aicha manashcacunamanta yallinata, huasha taripai tucunamanta rimashcata uyashpa, Felix mancharishpa rimarca: —Cunanshituca rilla. Shuc cuti cayashcanqui chari.
Felix chasnapash Pablomanta cullquita chaparca, chairaicu caran cuti paihuan rimarincapac cayachinurca.
Ishcai huata huashapi Porcio Festo Felix rantimanta shamurca; paica judiocunahuan alli saquirinata mimashpa, Pablota quillpashpa saquirca.
Cesareaman pactashcamanta quimsa puncha huasha, Festo Jerusalenman rirca.
Chaipi pacriyaya apucuna judio apucunapash Pablota juchachishpa rimancapac callarinurca.
Mana alli yuyaihuan shuc yanapaita shina Festota mañanurca, Pablota Jerusalenman pushancapac; chaicama paicunaca ñanpillapi huañuchishun yuyaranurca.
Ranti Festo Pabloca Cesareapimi quillparan nishpa paicunata cutiparca, paillatami utcalla Jerusalenmanta risha nuca. Chairapash rimarca:
—Cancunamanta apucuna ñucahuan rishun, chai runa imatapash juchallishca cacpi, paita juchachina ushanquichic.
Festo Jerusalenpi pusac punchachu, chunca punchachu saquirirca imachari, chai huasha Cesareaman rirca, Cayantiman taripana tiyarinapi tiyarishpa, Pablota cayachirca.
Pai shamushcata ricushpa, Jerusalenmanta shamushca Judiocuna paipacpi juntarishpa jatun juchallishcacunahuan juchachinurca, shinapash ricuyaccunata mana ricuchina ushanurca.

Pablo tucui paicuna rimashcamanta cashna rimashpa quishpicurca: —Judiocunapac Camachic quillcapi rimashcamanta mana pishiyashcanichu, Diospac huasita mana huacllichishcanichu, Romamanta Incatapash mana piñashcanichu.
Chashnapi Festo, judiocunahuan mashi tucunayashpa, Pablota tapurca: —Jerusalenman rishpa, ¿chaipi ñuca ñaupacpi taripai tucunata munanquichu?
Pablo cutiparca: —Incapac taripana ñaupacpimi cani, caipimi taripai tucuna cani. Mana imapipash judiocunata huacllichishcanichu, canllata pacta yachanqui.

Chairaicu, huañuchi tucuna tuputa juchallishca cashpa, ari, huañushami. Ranti paicuna rimashcamanta mana ricuyaccunata charishpa, mana pipash paicuna maquipi saquinata charihuanchu. Incapacman rina munani.
Festo paihuan taripaccunata tapushca huasha, cutiparca: —¿Incapacman rina mañanqui? Incapacmanmi rinqui.
Ansa puncha huashacunapi Cesareaman apu Agripa nishca paipac pani Berenicentin Festohuan tuparincapac pactanurca,
unainayata chaipi tiyashcaraicu, apu Festoman Pablomanta rimarca cai shimicunahuan: —Caipi shuc runata charinchic, Felix japishpa quillpashcata.
Ñuca Jerusalenman pactashcapi pacri apucuna rucucunantin pai juchallishcacunata ricsichihuanurca, mañahuanurca paita huañuchincapac.

Ñuca paicunata rimarcani ima shina romanocuna mana yancamanta shuc runata juchachiccunapac maquipi saquina yachashcata; ñaupac juchayuc runa juchachiccunahuan ñahuipurarina tiyana can, chashnami juchachishca runa quishpina shimicunata rimana: ushan.
Paicuna ñucahuan shamunurca, chaillapita taripancapac tiyarishpa, chai runata, cayachircani.
Ranti juchachiccuna paita mana ñuca yuyashca shina jatun juchacunahuan juchachinurca;
allita, ricucpi, paicuna ininamanta, shuc ña huañushca Jesusmanta Pablo causanmi riman; chaimantami. chicanyan paicuna yuyai.
Mana imatapash ruraipac tucushpa, paita tapurcani Jerusalenman rinayanman imachari, chaipi tucuncapac.
Ranti Pablo Incapacpi taripai tucunata mañarca. Chairaicu quillpashpa charinuchun mañarcani Incapacman cachanacama.
Agripa Festota rimarca: —Ñucapash uyanayaiman chai runata, Festo rimarca: —Caya paita uyanqui.
Cayantin puncha tucuilla yapa ricuchishcahuan Agripa Berenicentin taripana huasiman pactanurca, paicunahuan soldado apucuna llactamanta apucunapash rinurca. Festo Pablota cayachishpa

rimarca: —Apu Agripa tucui caipi tiyaccunantin, caipi cai runata ricunquichic; pairaicu tucui judio runacuna ñucata ricuncapac shamuhuanushca, caipi nicpi Jerusalenpipash, caparishcahuan maftahuanushca ama ashtahuan shuc puncha causachun.
Ñuca atipashcani, paita huañuchicta mana juchallishcachu; ranti, paillata Incapacman rinata mañashcaraicu, chaiman taripai tucuncapac cachanata yuyarishcani.
Chashna cacpipash, ¿imata nishpa chari Incaman paimanta quillcasha? Chairaicu tucui cancunata ricsichini, canta ashtahuan, apu Agripa, paita tapupaichi; chashnami imallapash quillcanata ushasha.
Ñuca yuyani yapa yuyai illac shinami tucusha, cashna japishca runata mana quillcapi pai juchallishcacunata churashpa cachashpa.
Agripa Pablota rimarca: —Canpac shimihuan canraicu rimai. Chashnapi Pablo, paipac maquita chutachishpa, cashna callarirca:

—Vapa cushiyani cunan canpac ñaupacpi, apu Agripa, ñucaraicullata quishpina shimita rimana ushashpa, chai tucui judiocuna ñucata rimashcamanta; ashtahuan cushiyani cunan canpac naupacpi ñucamahta rimana ushashcaraicu,
can yapa ricsic canqui manachu paipac yachaicunata. Chairaicu canta mañani allita atipashcahuan uyahuai nishpa.
Tucui judiocuna ricsinun ñuca causai ima shina maltamanta cashcata, ima shina ñucapac aillu ucupi cai Jerusalenllapita causarcani.
Paicunallatami rimanunca, munashpaca, huiñaipac ricsihuanacun; quiquin fariseo shina causashcani; chai ñanpita catina sinchi mari can.
Cunan caipi taripai tucucuni Dios ñucanchic rucucunata cushca shimita chapacushcaraicu.
Chai cushca shimita ñucanchic chunca ishcai aillucuna shuncuhuan Diosta tuta punchantin muchashpa pactana munanchic. Caita chapashcaraicumi, apulla, judiocuna juchachihuanun.
Ranti, ¿ima shina chari canquichic huañushcacunata Dios causachina ushashcata mana inina munaccuna?
Cunan ricuichic ñucallata callarishcapi yuyarcanimi tucui ushaicunahuan Nazaretmanta Jesusta yallinami nishpa;
chashna Jerusalenpi rurarcani: Pacu apucuna cachashcahuan, achca iniccunata japishpa quillpachircani, paicunata huañuchicushcapi yapa cushiyashcahuan ricurcani

Achca cuti, tucui tantarina huasicunapi pactashpa, achca ñacarinacunata churashpa, paicuna ininamanta chicanyachinata munarcani; yapalla pinari tiyahuacpi, caru llactacunapipash paicunata piñashpa japincapac rircani
Chashnapi, Damascoman rirashca ñanpipi, pacri apucuna cachashcahuan,
chaupi punchapi, jatun apulla, shuc achic jahua pachamanta shamushcata ricurcani, intimanta yalli llinpic, tucui ñucahuan riraccunantin japi tucurcanchic.
Tucuilla allpaman urmarcanchic; ñucaca hebreo shimipi rimashcata uyarcani: "Saulo, Saulo, ¿piñarishcachu cahuanqui? Yancamanta nanarinqui tucsinapi jaitashpa".
Ñuca cutiparcani: ¿Ricsinichu canta, Apunchic? Apunchicca rimarca: "Can piñashpa japinayashca Jesusmi cani.
Cunan jatarishpa allita atipanqui: Canta ricurimushcani canta acllancapac, ñucapac ricuyac tucuncapac caipi ricushcamanta, huasha canta ricuchinca rashcamantapash.
Canta tucuimanta quishpichishcanquimi, canpac aillucunamanta nicpi, Diosta mana ricsiccunamanta nicpi, paicunapacman canta cachani,

Canmi paicunapac ñahuita pascachinqui, chashnami tutapi causashcamanta achicta ricununca, supai japishcamanta Diosman ticranunca; chaimi, ñucapi inishpa juchacunamanta pichai tucuna Dios paipac churicunapacta huacaichicushcatapash tupanquichic".
Chai punchamanta, apu Agripa, cai jahua pachamanta nuspaita cuscatami catishcani.

Chairaicu, ñaupa Damascomanta runacunata, chai huashalla Jerusalenmantacunata tucui Judea llactamantacunatapash Diosta mana ricsiccunantin, rimashcani nanarishpa Diosman ticranuchun, huasha llaquicuna tiyana cacpipash ñaupacman catina yuyaihuan.
Chairaicumi judiocuna Diospac huasipi japishpa huañuchinata munahuanurca.
Ranti, Diospac yanapaihuanmi chaira causacuni rucucunata huahuacunatapash yachachina ushancapac. Mana imatapash yapachinichu profetacuna Moisespash tucunca rashcamanta rimashcata:
Mesias huañuna cashcata, pai huañushcacunamanta ñaupac causarishpa, achicta ricsichina cashcata paipa llactamanta runacunata Diosta mana ricsiccunatapash.
Pablo chaicama pai quishpina shimita rimashcapi, Festo caparishcahuan rimarca: —¿Nuspachu canqui, Pabio? ¡Can yapa yachashcahuan yuyai illac saquiricunqui!

Pablo cutiparca: —Mana nuspachu cani, apu Festo; ñuca: shimica cusca, shutimi can. Tucui caicunamanta apu allitami yachan, chairaicumi mana manchashcahuan rimacuni. Ñuca pacta yachani pai caicunamanta imacamapash yachashcata, mana chican cuchupi tucushcaraicu.
Apu Agripa, ¿profetacuna rimashcata ininquichu? Ñuca can inic cashcata ricsini.
Agripa paita cutiparca: —Ashtallata rimanquiman carca, cristiano imachari tucuiman.
Pablo paita rimarca: —Ansaraicu, achcaraicu imapash, Dios munanman, mana canlla tucui caipi uyacuccunantin, ñuca shina tucunquichiman...; jillai huascata chicanman saquishun.
Ña chashnapi apu jatarirca, huainaru, Berenice, tucui chaipi tantarishcacunantin;
ña anchuricushpa paicunapura cashna rimarishpa rinurca: —Cai runa huañuchi tucuncapac, quillpara charincapac imapash mana juchallishcachu.
Agripa Festota rimarca: —Mana Incapacman rinata mañashcapi, cacharinalla carca.
Italiaman ña rina rimashcapi, shuc soldado apu maquipi saquinurca Pablota chaishuc japishcacunantin; chai soldado apu Augusta shutiyuc legion nishcamanta carca, paipac shuti carcami Julio.
Adramitiomanta barcopi yaicurcanchic, Asia ñucñu yacu patata purincapac. Ñucanchihuan Aristarco rirarca, Tesalonica llactamanta macedonio runa.
Cayantin puncha Sidonman pactarcanchic; Julio yapa alli shuncuyuc cashpa, Pablota paipac aillucunata ricuncapac, paicunapacpi yanapai tucuncapac nishpa saquircalla.
Chaimanta llucshiccuna Chipre huasha shinalla rircanchic, huaira yapa huashaman tancanaraicu,
chaimanta Ciliciapac, Panfiliapac ñucñu yacucunata chinpashpa, Liciamanta Miraman pactarcanchic.
Chaipi chai soldado apu shuc Alejandriamanta barcota tuparca Italiaman riracta, chaiman sicachi tucurcanchic.
Achca punchacuna allimanta purircanchic, racushcapi Gnido mayanman pactarcanchic. Huaira mana alliman tancacpi Creta huasha shinalla rishpa catucanchic, Salmon allpa mucu uranillata.
Racushcapi, islata muyuchishpa Buenos Puertos nishcaman pactarcanchic, Lasea llacta mayanpi.
Yapalla unayarcanchic, sasina raimipash ña tucurishcarca; chairaicu yacuta purina manchaipac tuncucapac callarirca.

Chashnapi Pablo paicunata rimarca: —Mashicuna, yacuta rishpa catina yapa manchaipac tucunca rashcata ricuni; huacllishpapash mana quipicunalla, barcolla imapash huacllinuncachu, ñucanchic quiquin jinumi huanushun.
Ranti chai soldado apu Pablo rimashcata mana uyashpa, barcota pushaccamata ashtahuan yapa uyarca.

Chairapash, chai puncu tamia pachapi mana alli cacpi, tucuilla chaimanta anchurincapac rimanurca, Fenixman pacta usharincami nishpa, Africahuan, Corohuan ñahuipura saquirin; chaipi tamia pachapi quishpinata munanurca.
Uraimanta huaira jatarishcata ricushpa, paicuna munashcaman pactashunmi yuyanurca; barcota huatashcamanta llushpichishpa, Creta mayan shinalla rinacurca.
Ranti, manapash unaipi urcumanta sinchi huaira jatarirca, paicuna euroaquilon nishca.
Chai barco, huaira tancashca, mana sinchicuna ushacpi, huaira apashcaman shitai tucurcanchic.
Cauda shutiyuc isla huashaman tucushcapi, racushcapi shuc uchilla canuata japina usharcanchic.

Ña jahuaman sicachishca huasha, huascacunahuan canuata huatashpa sinchicuchinurca; Sirte tsatsapi ama chaquirincapac, shuc huanpuric caspita cacharircanchic. Chashna, huaira apashcaman shitai tucurcanchic,
Cayantiman, chaira huaira yapa sinchi cashcaraicu, chaupi quipicunata yacuman jichuna tucunurca.
Ña quimsa niqui punchapi paicuna quiquin maquihuan barcomanta jatun llachapacuna huascacunantin yacuman jichunurca.
Mashna puncha chari ña inti cuillurcunapash mana ricurinurca, chai huairapash mana shayarishcaraicu ña quishpina yuyai mana tiyarcachu.

Unai ña mana micuc causarcanchic. Chashnapi Pablo tucuipac ñaupacpi shayarishpa rimarca: —Mashicuna, ñucata uyashpa Cretamanta mana llucshishcapi, mana cashna llaqui mana imapash chincarina tiyana carca.
Shinapash, cunan cancunata rimani sinchicuichic nishpa; runaca mana huañunquichichu, barcollami chincarinca.
Rimanimi, cai tuta Dios ricurihuashcaraicu, paipacmi cani ñuca, paitapash yanapani,
caita rimahuarca: "Pablo, ama manchaichu, Incapac ñaupacman pactanquimi, ñuca canraicu tucui canhuan riraccunata huanunamanta quishpichinimi".
Chairaicu, sinchicuichic mashicuna; Dios rimashcata yapa uyani, pai rimashca shinami tucunca.
Shinapash shuc islapimi chaquirishun.
Chunca chuscu niqui tuta pactashcapi, Adriatico ñucñu cuchaman aisai tucushpa rirashcapi, chaupi tuta pactashcapi, barcota pushaccamacuna allpa mayanma rirashcata yachanurca.
Paicuna yacupi tupushpa camacpi quimsa chunca canchis metro cucha carca; ashtanipi cuti tupucpi ishcai chunca canchis carca.
Rumihuan imapash tacarinata manchashpa chuscu jillai sillucunata siquimanta yacuman shitanurca, chai huasha utcallapash pacarichun nishpa chapanurca.
Marinerocuna barcomanta miticunayashpa, shuc uchilla canuata huascacunata suniyachincapac nishpa uraicuchincapac callaricushcapi, Pablo barco capitanta soldadocunantin rimarca:
—Chaicuna mana barcopi saquiricpi, cancuna mana quishpinata ushanquichichu.
Chashnapi soidadocuna, chai uchilla canuata japirac huascacunata pitishpa urmachinurca.
Pacarincapac chapacushcapi, Pablo tucuicunata rimarca: —Ña chunca chuscu puncha mana imatapash micushpa, chapashpalla causacunquichic.
Causana munashpa, micuichiclla; mana pimantapash shuc acchallapash yanca urmashpa chincarincachu.
Chaita rimashca huasha, shuc tantata japishpa, tucuipac ñaupacpi Diosta pacrachushpa paquishpa micuncapac callarirca.
Tucuilla cariyashpa, paicunapash micunacurca.
Tucuipura ishcai patsac canchis chunca sucta runa carcanchic chai barcopi tiyaccuna.
Sacsacta micushca huasha, barcota ansata pancallachinurca, trigota ñucñu yacuman jichushpa.
Punchayashcapi, mana ricsinata ushanurca chai allpata; ranti shuc tsatsayuc tuyacata ricunurca, chaillapi imashnapash barcota chaquichincapac tucuilla yuyarinurca.
Jillai sillucunata yacupi cacharinurca; timonmanta huascacunatapash llushpichinurca; siquimanta jatun llachapata jahuapi huarcuchishpa, huaira tancashca allimanta tsatsaman mayanyanurca.
Ranti shuc jahuallapi tacarishpa, chaillapi chaquirinurca; barcopac punta saticta tucushpa, tanlla chaipi chaquirirca, ranti paipac siquica bacu huactashcahuan chausicurca.
Chashna tucucpi, japishcacunata huañuchincapac soldadocuna yuyarinurca ama pipash huaitashpa quishpichun nishpa.
Ranti soldado apu mana munarca, Pablota quishpichinaraicu; ashtahuan huaitana yachaccunata mayanman flaupac paicunata huaitachirca.
Chaishuccunaca caspi pala, imapipash yanaparishpa, allpaman llucshinuchun rimarca. Chashna rurashpa, tucuilla mana imapash tucushca, allicuna allpaman pactarcanchic.
Huañuimanta quishpishca huasha, ña yachai tiyarca chai isla Malta cashcata.
Chaipi tiyac runacuna mana maipipash ricushca alli shuncuhuan ñucanchicta chasquinurca. Achca ninata japishpa, chaiman cayai tucurcanchic, yapa tamia, chiri tiyashcaraicu.
Pablo caspi pallcacunata japishpa ninaman shitacushcapi nina rupaihuan shuc machacui llucshispa, Pablopac maquipi pilluricrirca.
Chaimanta runacuna, maquimanta machacui huarcuracpi ricushpa, paicunapura rimarinurca: —Cai runa huañuchic mari canca; ñucñu yacumanta quishpicpipash, ranti Dios mana munan ashtahuan causancapac.
Pablo maquita chausirishpa machacuita ninaman shitarca, mana imapash tucurcachu.

Chaishuccunaca punquishpa, cuncaimanta huañushca imapash urmancami nishpa chaparanurca; unainayata chapashca huasha, mana imapash tucucpi ricushpa, chaipi ranti shuc diosmi can nishpa rimancapac callarinurca.
Publio shutiyuc runa, chaimanta apu, chai mayanllapi paipac huasita charirca. Paica ñucanchicta chasquishpa quimsa puncha paihuan charirca.
Chai punchacuna jinu paipac yaya jatun uncui quichatapash charishpa, puñunapi siricurca. Pablo ricucrirca; pairaicu Diosta mañashpa, maquicunata paipac jahuapi churacpi alliyarca.
Chashnata ricushcaraicu, islapi tiyac shuc uncuccuna paipacman shamushpa alliyachi tucunurca.
Yapa llaqui tucurcanchic, ña ñucanchic rina pactarishcapi tucui ñucanchic mutsushcata cui tucuicanchic.
Quimsa quilla huashapi, chai isiapi tamia pachata quishpic barcopi yaicushpa rircanchic. Alejandriamanta carca; Castorpac Poluxpac huacacunata puntapi apai cacharca.
Siracusaman pactashpa, chaipi quimsa puncha saquirircanchic;
chaimanta, allpa mayan shinallata rishpa Regioman pactarcanchic. Cayantiman uraimanta huairamurca, chashna Pozuelosman ishcai punchallapi pactarcanchic;
chaipi huauquicunata tuparcanchic. Chaipi shuc semana tuputa saquichi tucurcanchic; chaimanta shuti Romaman pactarcanchic.
Romamanta huauquicuna, ñucanchic pactashcata yachashpa, Apio pacllaman Quimsa Huasi nishca pacllaman ricuc shamunurca. Pablo paicunata ricushpa Diosta pacrachushpa, cuti sinchicurirca.
Romapi pactashcapi, Pablota quiquin huasipi causancapac saquinurca, shuc paita ricuccama soldadohuan.

Quimsa puncha huasha, Pablo judio apucunata cayachirca. Paicuna tantarishcapi rimarca: —Huauquicuna, ñuca mana imata aillucunata rashcallapita, rucucuna yachachishcata mana pantachicucllapita, Jerusalenpi japi tucushpa romanocuna maquipi saquihuanurca.
Pai-cuna tapushca huasha, cacharinata munahuanurca, huañuchina tupu juchata mana juchallishcaraicu.
Ranti judiocuna mana munashcaraicu, Incapacpi taripai tucunata mañarcani, mana ansapash ñuca llactamanta runacunata juchachina yuyaihuan.
Cairaicumi cancunata cayarcani, cancunahuan rimarinata munashpa; allita rimacpica, Israel chapashcata ñucapash chapashcaraicumi cai jillai huascacunata aparani.
Paicuna cutipanurca: —Ñucanchic mana japishcanchichu Judeamanta canmanta rimashpa quillcamushcata, mana ima huauquipash caiman pactamushcachu canmanta mana alli rimashca shimihuan.
Imashna cacpipash, allimi canca canpac shimimanta jinu can yuyashcata uyana; yachanchic mari ima shina can yachachishca tucui pachapi mana allihuan chasqui tucushcata.

Tucui paicuna shuc puncha tantarincapac saquirinurca; pactashcapi ashtahuan achcanaya paipac huasiman ricuc shamunurca. Pai rimashcapi uyachirca Diospac Pachamanta; Jesusmantapash inichinayarca Moisespac camachic quillcata profetacunatapash yuyachishpa. Chashna tutamanta callarishpa tutacama rimarinurca.
Maicancuna pai rimashcata uyanurca, shuccunaca mana.

Pablo chai shimicunata rimacpi, judiocuna ña rinacurca, paicunapura sinchita rimanacushpa; chashnapi Pablo cai puchucai shimihuan paicunata rimashpa cacharca: —Alli shutipachami Diospac Samai ñucanchic yayacunata profeta Isaiaspac shimihuan rimashca:
"Chai runacunaman rishpa rimacri: Mashna uyashpapash mana atipanquichichu, mashna ricushpapash mana ricunquichichu,

paicunapac yuyai quillparishca cashcaraicu. Uyancapac sinchimi canun, ñahuita quillpanushcami ñahuihan ama ricuncapac, rinrihuan ama uyancapac, yuyaihuanpash ama atipancapac, ama Diosman ticrashpa ñucapacpi janpi tucuncapac".
Chairaicu uyapaichic, cai Diospac quishpina Diosta mana ricsiccunacpamanmi cachanca racunchic: paicuna shuti uyanuncami.
Pablo chaipi ishcai huata pai llancashcahuan causarca, tucui paipacman pactaccunata chasquishpa, manapi quillachishca.
Diospac pachamanta yachachic carca, Jesus Mesiasmantapash mana manchashpa yachachicurca.
Pablo, Jesus Mesiaspac runa, Dios cayashcaraicu apostol tucushca, Diospac Cushi Shimita yachachih-capac acllashca.

Cai Cushi Shimi cui ucunca rashcata profetacuna rimanushcarca, Dios quillcashca Shimipi; paipac Churimanta riman, runapi rimashpa yuyacpi, Davidpac aillumanta pacarirca; ranti, huañushcacunamanta causarishcapi Jatun Ushayuc Diospac Churi tucurca, Diospac Samai nurashcaraicu.
Apunchic Cristo Jesusraicu, apostol tucuna cuyaita chasquircani, tucui llactacunapi paipac shutiraicu inina tiyachun nishpa.
Diosta mana ricsiccuna ucuman cachamuhuashca, cancunapash chai ucumantallata canquichic,

Romantacuna; paicuna Jesus cayashca mari canun, Dios llaquishcacuna, cusca shuncuyuc tucuncapac cayashcacuna. Diospac cuyaita ganas causaitapash ñucanchic Yayamanta, Apunchic Cristo Jesuspac Yayamantapash charichic.
Tucuimanta ñaupac ñuca Diosta pacrachuni, Jesus Mesiaspac shutipi, tucui cancaraicu, tucui cai pactiapi cancuna inishcamanta yapa rimai tiyashcaraicu.
Dios-huan rimarishcapi cancunamanta yuyarihi; chaimahta Diosllata yachan, paitami muchani tucui shuncuhuan paipac Churipac Cushi Shimita rimashpa.
Tucui pachapi mañani cachahuachun cancunata ricucrincapac, pai chashna munacpi.
Yapa cancunata ricunayahuan, shuc Diospac Samaipac cuyaillapash cancuna sinchicuncapac chinpachiman.
Allita yuyacpi, cancuna ñucapash cariyanca ranchic tucuilla inishcata chaipuralla charishpa.
Cancunatami rimani, huauquicuna, achca cuti cancunapacman rinata yuyarishcani, ranti cunancama mana ushashcanichu.

Ñuca yuyaipi, Diosta mana ricsicunamanta allicunata pallashca shina, chashnallatami cancunamantapash japinata munarcani. Griegocunata, chican runacunata, quillcayuc "mana quillcayuc runacunatapash yanapana yuyaitami charini.
Chairaicumi cancuna Romamanta runacunaman-pash Diospac Cushi Shimita cusha nishpa yapa yuyarini.
Ñucata mana manchanayahuanchu cai Cushi Shimita rimaricapac; pai canmi paita iniccunata quishpichina Diospac ushai, tucuimanta ñaupac judiocunata, chai huasha griegocunatapash.
Cai Cushi Shimi ricsichicun ima shina Dios runacunata chuya shuncuyuc rurashcata inishcaraiculla, Dios quillcashca Shimipi rimashca shina: Chuya shuncuyuc runa ininamanta causanca.

Chashnallata jahua pachamanta ricsichicun ima shina Dios mana alli ñahuihuan ricucun, mana alli shuncuyuc cashcata tucui mana alli taripashcacunatapash, chai runacuna mana alli rashcahuan shuti shimita callpachishcata.
Tucui Diosmanta ricsishca pasacta ricunalla can: Diosllata ricsichirca.
Diosta mana ricuipac cashca, cai pacha rurai tucushcamanta pai rurashcacunapi yuyaihuan ricsi tucun: paipac ushai, pai Dios cashca; chairaicu mana quishpichi tucuna ushanun.
Diosta ricsishpapash, mana pai munashca shina paita chacchanurca, mana pacrachunurcapash; ranti, paicuna yapalla yuyaricpi paicuna shuncu huishtuyashca, ashtahuan ñausayarca.
Yapa yachacmi canchic rimashpapash, yuyai illaccunapac rimaita charinurca.
Mana huañuc Diosta huañucta ranurca, runa shina, pishcu shina, aichacuna shina, machacui shina ricuric huacacunata rurashpa.
Chairaicu, paicuna munashcapi jichushpa, juchallinapi Dios paicunata saquirca, pincaipaccunata rurashpa quiquin paicunapac aichacunallatatac huacllichinurca.
Paicunapac Dios llullanami; maquihuan rurashcacunata chacchanushca, jatunyachinushcapash, quiquin Huiñachicta chacchana rantimanta: ¡Huiñaipac pai bendisiashca cachun. Amen!
Chairaicu pai saquircalla paicuna aicha mañashcapi huatashca shina causanuchun: paicunapac huarmicuna ña mana carihuan yumarinurca, huaclli tucunurca;
caricunapash chashnallata: huarmihuan causanata saquishpa, caripura munarinurca; chashna paicuna aichallapita ñacarinurca, paicuna pantashcamanta.
Shuti shimita mana ricsinata munashpa, Diosta mana chasquinurca; paipash chashnallata, paicuna huacllishca yuyaipi saquirca, mana alli ruranuchun nishpa:

chairaicu palicunapi mana tiyan cusca taripana, huacllshca yuyaita charinun, cullquiyana yuyai, mana allicuna, chiquicui juntarishcacuna, huañuchina yuyaicuna, macanuna yuyai, umachina yuyai, mana imatapash rurana yuyai; mana alli shimicuna juntarishca canun.
Llulla shimicunata rimanun, Diosta camana munanun, carimi canchic rimanun, umachisiquicuna, mana allicunata rurancapac yapa yachaccuna. Yayacunata mana uyanun,
mana yuyarishicahuan ranacun, shimita mana pactachiccuna, llaquina illaccuna, mana llaquishcahuan imatapash ruraccuna.
Ricsinacun Dios rimashcata: chashna rurashpa causaccunaca huañuchi tucuna cashcata; chashna cacpipash, mana chaicunallatachu ruranun, ashtahuan mana alli rurashcacunata ricushpa, yapa cushiyanun.
Chairaicu mana quishpinata ushanqui, pi cashpapash, shuccunata taripashpa, Shucta taripashpa, canllata cautsayaricunqui, can taripacushcata canpash ruranqui.
Ranti yachanchic, Dios allita yachashpa, cautsayachishcata chashha ruraccunata.
Canca, mashi, ¿chashna ruraccunata taripanqui manachu? ¿canpash chashnallata ruracushpa, canca Dios cautsayachishcamanta quishpishachu yuyanqui?
Ashtahuan Dios alli shuncu, chapac, atipashpa ricucllatachu ricunqui? ¿ranti manachu atipanqui pai yapa alli shuncuhuan canta paiman ticrachun munashcata?
Ranti, canpac shuncuta sinchiyachishpa, mana alliyanata munashpa, canllata ñacarinacunata tantachicunqui, Dios taripana puncha cuscata taripancapac shamuna pachapi.
Paimi caran amu rurashca tuputa cunca.
Mana huañuna, jatunyachic ñanpita mashcashpa caticcunaman huiñaipac causaita cunca;
ranti, piñashpa shuti cashcata mana uyaccunaman, ashtahuan mana cusca taripanata caticcunaman, paicunapac sinchi ñacarinami tiyanca.
Huacai, ñacarinami tiyanca mana allita ruraccunapac, tucuimanta ñaupac judiomi ñacarinca, griegopash ñacarinata charincami;
ranti, jatunyanata ganas causaita allita rurac runamanpash Dios cuncami, tucuimanta ñaupac judioman, chai huasha griegoman,
Dios tucuicunata chaipuralla llaquishcaraicu.

Camachic quillcata mana ricsishpa juchalliccuna, Camachic quillcata mana ricsishpami huañununca; ranti Camachic quilicata ricsishpa juchalliccuna chai Camachic quillca rimashca shinami taripai tucununca.
Camachic quillcata uyashcallahuan mana pactarinchu, Dios-huan ailluyancapac pactachina mari can.
Allita uyahuaichic: Diosta mana ricsiccuna Camachic quillcata mana charinun; mana yachashpallata Camachic quillca rimashcata pactachishpa, paicunallata quiquinpac Camachic quillca tucunun;
chashna paicuna ricsichiranun shuncu ucupi Camachic quillca charishcata. Caran amupi paipac yuyai rimashcatapash ricsinun paicuna rurashcamanta allimi, mana allimi rimashcapi.
Runapura mana ricsishcata, Dios taripashca punchami ricsichinca; ñuca yachachishca Cushi Shimipi rimashca shina, Jesus Mesiaspac maquipi churashpami taripanca.
Ranti can, judiomi cani nishpa rimanqui, shuc Camachic quillcatami catini rimanqui, Diospi jatunyanqui.
Can Dios munashcata ricsinqui, Camachic quillcaca ashtahuan alli cashcata acllancapac canta yachachin.
Chairaicu ñausacunata purichicmi cani allipacha yuyacunqui, tuta ucupi ricuric achic,
mana yachaccunata yachachic, huahuacunata cusca ñanpita ricsichic, chashna yuyarinqui can yachashca shuti shimita Camachic quillcapi charishcaraicu.
Chashna chari, can shuccunata yachachic cashpa, ¿manachu canllata yachachirinata ushanqui? Mana shuhuana rimanqui, ¿canca manachari shuhuanquichu?
Shucpac carihuan shucpac huarmihuan mana causana rimanqui, chashna rimashpallata ¡canca ruranqui! Huacacunata millanimi nishpallata, paipac huasicunamanta shuhuanqui.
Camachic quillcahuan jatunyanqui, ranti mana pactachishpa canpac Diosta camicunqui.
Ari, Dios Quillcashca Shimipi rimashca shina, cancunaraicu Diosta mana ricsiccuna Diospac shutita piñanun.
Ullu carata pitina can Camachic quillcata pactachicpimi imallapipash canta yanapanca; ranti, mana pactachicpi mana imallapash yanapancachu.
Cashna yuyarishun, maicancuna mana pitishca cashpallata, Camachic quillcapi rimashcata pactachishpa, ¿manachu ullu carata pitishca tupullata jahuayachishca tucunca?
Paipac aichapi chai pitinata mana chasquishca runa, Camachic quillca rimashcata pactachic canta taripancami: canta Camachic quillcayuc, ullu carata pitishca cashpallata, mana pactachic.
Judio cana mana jahua cashcallata ricuchinachu, ullu carata piti tucunapash mana chaillapi tucurinchu;

mana, judio cashcata ucumanta llucshishcahuanmi ricsichina can; ullu carata pitichishcapash aicha ucumantami can, Diospac Samai rurashca, mana quillcapi rimashcaraiculla; pipash chashna causashpa Diospacpi yupaichashcami canca; runacunapacpica mana.
Shinacpi, ¿imallapipash yalli cashcata judio charinchu? ¿pai ullu carata pitirishca imapaclla allichu?
Allita ricucpica jatunmi. Tucuimanta yuyaricpi, paicunaman Dios rimashcacunata ricsichishcaraicu.
Maicancuna mana cuscata catishca ¿imananchu? ¿Paicuna mana cuscata catishca, Dios cusca rashcata huacllichicachu?

Chaita mana ansapash yuyarina canchic; Dios mana llullac can, ranti runacunaca tucuilla llullaccuna Dios Quillcashca Shimipi rimashca shina: Can shuti rimashcata ricsinuncami, taripai tucushcapi atinquimi.

Ranti, ñucanchic mana alli cashca Dios cusca cashcata jahuachicpi, ¿imata rimana tucunchic? ¿Dios mana cusca can piñarishcapi?, ¿ñucanchicta ñacachishcapi? Runa yuyaipi churashpami cashna rimani caita.
Mana ansapash chashnachu; chashna cacpi, ¿tucui pachata Dios taripanata ushanmanchu?
Ranti, ñuca llullashcaraicu, Dios cusca cashca ashtahuan jatunyachishca saquiricpi, ¿ñucata juchashpa rimanata ushahuanunchu?
Chashna cacpi mana allicunata rurana tucunqui alli rurashca ricurichun; maican llullaisiquicuna chaitami ñucanchic yachachinchic rimanun, chai shimicunamanta taripai tucunami canun.
Chashna cacpi, ¿yallichu canchic? ¡Mana ansallapash! Cunanshitu ricsichircanchic ima shina tucuilla, judiocuna Diosta mana ricsiccunapash, jucha ucupi causaranun,
chashna Dios Quillcashca Shimipash riman:
Shuc chuya shuncullapash mana tiyan, Diosta mashcancapac shucllapash yuyayuc mana tiyan.
Tucuilla pantashca purinacurca, tucui chincarinurca, shucllapash allita mana ruran, shucllapash.
Paipac tuncuri pascara aya jutcumi, pai rimashca shimicuna umachincapaclla canun.
Machacui janpita shimi ucupi apai cachanun, sinchi piñaicuna shimimanta llucshicun.
Yahuar tallincapac utcalla callpanun;
paicuna purishca ñanpita huacllinun, llushtiyaita saquinun,
alli causanaman rina ñanpita mana ricsinun;
paicunapi mana tiyan Diosta muchana
Ranti yachanchic, ima shina tucui Dios Quillcashca Shimipi, judiocunaraicu quillcan. Caihuan tucuicuna shimi quillpashca saquirinuchun, chashnallata tucuilla juchayuc cashcata ricsirinuchun.
Chairapash, mana pipash jucha illac saquirincachu, Camachic quillcata pactachircanimi nishpalla: chai Camachic quillcaca jucha tiyashcata allipacha ricsichic can.
Ranti cunan ricurcanchic chai Camachic quillca Profetacunapash yachachishcallata: Mana chai Camachic quillcallahuata Dios ñucanchicta cusca shuncuyuc, chuya shuncuyucta ruran.
Dios ñucanchicta cusca shuncuyucta ruran Jesucristopi inishcaraicu, chai inina tucuicunapac alli can, mana pitapash yallichishpa.
Tucuilla juchallishcaraicu, tucuicuna Diosmanta chicanyashca canun.
Ranti pai, cuyashpa, paipac quishpichinata cun, Jesucristo ñucanchipacta tarishcaraicu.
Ari, pai Dios Yaya, munashcarca Jesuspac yahuarhuan, ñucanchic inishcaraicu quishpinata tupachun. Chashna ñucanchicta yachachin Dios cusca cashcata.

Manachu ñaupaca, mashna juchallicpipash saquiclla carca: Chaica Dios chapana punchami carca. Ranti cai pachapi, Dios ricsichin pai cusca cashcata: pai cusca can, chuya shuncuyuc can; chasnallata cusca runata, chuya shuncuyucta ruran tucui Cristo Jesuspi iniccunata.
¿Cunaca, ñucanchic jatunyashca tiyanchu? Tucurishcami. ¿Imaraicu? Mana Camachic quillcata pactachishcaraicu, ranti inishcaraicu.
Ñucanchic rimanchicmi, inishcaraicu runa cuti Diospacpi llaqui tucunchic nishpa, ranti mana Camachic quillcata pactachishcaraicu.
¿Ima? ¿Diosca judiocunapacllachu? Chaishuc llactacunapacpash can.
Shuclla Diosmi tiyan, paimi inishcaraicu quishpichinca ullu cara pitishca judiocunata, mana pitichishcacunatapash.
Chashna cacpi, ¿inishcami Camachic quillcamanta yallichu can? Mana chaichu, ashtahuan Camachic quillcata sinchicuchicmi.
Cunan, ¿imatami rimashun ñucanchic Yaya Abrahanmanta? ¿Tarircachu imatapash?
Abrahan rurashcacunahuan jucha illac tucushca cashpa, jatunyarinata ushanmi; ranti Diospac ñaupacpi mana ushan.
¿Chashnamanta Dios Quillcashca Shimita uyanayanquichu?: "Abrahan Diospi inirca, chairaicu Dios jucha illacta shina paita chasquirca".
Cunan ricushun; shuc runa imatapash ruracpi, cullquita mana cuyashca cui tucun, paiman cuna cashcata cui tucun.
Ranti, shuc runa juchamanta Quishpichic Diosta inicpi, Dios jucha illacta shina paita chasquin, pai mana imatapash rurashcallapita.
Cashnapi yuyarishpami, Davidpash cushiyai riman Dios cuyashcahuan jucha illac tucushca runata, pai mana imatapash rurashcallapita.
Cushiyanuchun mana alli rashcacunamanta Dios cuncarishpa, juchamanta quishpichishcacuna.
Dios mana cuti paipac juchamanta yuyarishca runa cushiyachun.
Cunan ricushun: ¿cai cushiyana ullu cara pitishcacunapacllachu can, mana pitishcacunapacpash cancachu? Ña rimarcanchic ima shina Abrahan ininamanta jucha illac tucushcata.
¿Ranti chaica ullu cara pitirishca huashachu carca? ¿Ñaupactachu carca? Ñaupac, mana huasha.

Paipac aichapi ricurincapac cara pitinata chasquirca; Dios paipac ininaraicu ña jucha illac paita rurashcarca, chaira pai mana cara pitishpa, paita yaya ninun, Dios paicunapac ininatapash ricun jucha illac paicunatapash rurancapac.
Cara pitishcacunapac yayapash can, paicuna cara pitishca cashpapash, yaya Abrahan chaira mana cara pitishcapi charishca ininata catinun.

Abrahanta Dios shuc shimita curca, ashtahuan rimanchicman chari, paipac churicunaman shuc shimita curca, cai pacha paicunapacpi nishpa, caita mana Camachic quillcata pactachishcaraicuchu curca, pai ininahuan Dios-huan ailluyashcaraicumi curca.
Ranti cunan, chai rimashca shimi ñucanchicpi pactarincapac Camachic quillcata pactachina canchic, chaipi ña mana imanan inina.
Chashna cacpi, ¿chai cushca shimi pipacta canca? Camachic quillcapac yachaica cautsayachincapaclla can, ¿manachu? Camachic quillcahuan pantaicunahuan huiñaipac huancu purinun ishcanticuna.

Chairaicu inina ñanpi can, Diospac cuyaiman pushac mari can; chashnami Abrahanman cushca shimi tucui paipac churicunapi pactarin. Mana Camachic quillcapi rimashca churicunapaclla, Abrahanpac ininata caticcunapacpash.

Abrahanca tucui ñucanchipac yaya can, chashna riman Dios Quillcashca Shimipi: "Tucui runacunapac yayatami rurani". Huañushcacunata causaita cuc ñaupacpimi ñucanchic yaya can; pai chaira mana tiyaccunata tiyacpi shina cayan; Abrahanca chai Diospimi inirca.
Mana chapaipacta chapashcaraicumi, chai inina paita tucuicunapac yaya rurarca, quillcapi rimashca shina: "Chashnami canunca canpac miraicuna".
Ininapi catircalla, paipac aicha causaita mana cuna ushacpipash (shuc patsac huatata charirca chaipi), paipac huarmi Sarapash ña huahuata mana charina ushashcapi.
Chashna cashpapash Dios cushca shimimanta mana pantai yuyaita charirca, ashtahuan ininapi sinchi tucurca, Diosta jatunyachirca,
allipacha yuyarishpa pai rimashcata pactachincami, pai ushaita charishcaraicu.
Diosca chai ininata ricushpa jucha illac paita rurarca.
Mana cuncari tucurca. Dios Quillcashca Shimipi quillcara tiyaccuna mana pairaicullachu quillcashca canun;
ñucanchipacpash allimi canun, ñucanchipash ininchic Apunchic Jesusta huañushcacunamanta causachicta.
Pai ñucanchic juchacunaraicu japi tucurca, ñucanchic jucha illac tucuncapac causachi tucurca.
Ininaraicu, cunan jucha illac tucushcanchic, ña Dios-huan mana piñanacushca canchic Apunchic Cristo Jesusraicu.
Pairaicu cai ñucanchic causacushca Dios cuyashcata chasquircanchic, chairapash Diospacpi jatunyachi tucunata chapacunchic.
Chairapash: llaquicunata charishpa jatunyanchic, chai llaquicuna ñucanchicta sinchicuchinun;
sinchicunamanta, cui tucuna shamun; chaimanta ranti chapana shamun;
paica mana yanca chapanchichu, Diospac cuyai ña tallichi tucurca ñucanchic shuncupi, ñucanchicman cushca Diospac Samaihuan.
Cunan ricuichic, ima pachapita Cristo huañushca ñucanchiraicu: Ñucanchic chaira juchasapa, jucharaicu sanpayashca cashcapi.
Alli shuti jinu, shuc runaraicu ñucanchic causaita mana cunallachu can; shinapash, shuc alli runaraicu, pita yachashun quiquinpac causaita cuiman imachari.
Ranti Mesias huañurcami ñucanchiraicu, chaira ñucanchic juchasapa cashcallapita; chashnami ñucanchicta Dios yapa llaquishcata ricsichin.
Cunan, Mesiaspac yahuaraicu jucha illac tucushcanchic, chairaicullatami cunanca astahuan ñacachi tucunamanta pairaicu quishpishun,
Ñucanchic Diosta piñac cashcapi, paipac Churi huañushcahuan Dios-huan allichircanchic; cunanca ashtahuan paihuan allichishcaraicu, paipac causaimanta ñucanchicta quishpichincami.
Mana chaillachu: Apunchic Cristo Jesusraicu Diospi sinchi tucunchic, pairaicu Dios-huan ailluyashcanchic:
Cunan ricushun; shuc runaraiculla jucha cai pachaman pactashcarca, juchahuan huañui pactamurca; chai huasha huañui tucui pachaman pactarca, tucuicuna juchallishcaraicu.
Chaira Camachic quillca mana tiyarca, ranti jucha cai pachapi ña tiyarca. Camachic quillca mana tiyashcaraicu, paita mana uyashcamanta mana imatapash rimaipac tucurca;
ranti chashnallata runacunapi huañui tiyarca Adanmanta Moises-cama, paipac jucha mana Adanpac shiha cacpipash. Ranti, shuc Adanmanta yalli shamuna carca.

Chaita ricushuri, Diospac cuyai, mana runa urmashcata allichincapacllachu carca, ashtahuan yallitami rurarca. Shutimi, shuc runa pantashcamantalla achca runa huañun; ranti, Diospac cuyai ashtahuan yalli yancamanta juntarirca runacunapi, cai shuclla runaraicu; pai Jesucristo can;

Diospac cuyai mana ñaupa pantashcata allichincapacllachu carca, ashtahuan yallita rurarca. Shuc runalla huañuchic juchata apamurca, ranti Diospac cuyai juchamanta quishpinata cai juchasapa pachaman apamun;

Ari, shuc runa pantashcaraicu huañuna tiyarca, ranti quiquin causaipi causaccuna mana tupushca Diospac cuyaita, chuya shuncuyanatapash yancamanta shuc runaraiculla Diosmanta chasquinacurca: pai can Cristo Jesus.
Allita yuyaricpi, shuc runa juchallishpa, huañuita tucuicunapacta apamushca shina, chashnallata shuclla cautsayachi tucushpa ñacarirca; chashna pai tucuicunapacta causaita cuc quishpinata tarirca.
Caitami rimanayanchic: shuc runa mana uyashcamanta tucuilla juchasapa tucurcanchic, chashnallatami shuclla uyashcaraicu jucha illac achcacunata ruran.
Huasha japishca Camachic quillcallata, juchacunata mirachincapaclla alli carca; ranti, jucha achca tiyashcapi, Diospac cuyai ashtahuan juntarirca.
Jucha huañuipi runata charishca shina, Diospac cuyaipash quiquin causaipi causachinca; Dios-huan cuti ailluyachishca huasha, huiñaipac causaita cunca Apunchic Cristo Jesusraicu.
Tucui caimanta ¿ima yachachinallapash surcuipacchu? ¿Diospac cuyai achca shamuncapac ashtahuanchu juchallishpa catishun? Mana chashnachu can.
¿Juchapac huañushcacuna paiman huatashca catincapac allichu canca?
¿Caita cuncarincapac allichu canca? Bautismoraicu Cristo Jesuspi yaicurichishcacuna, paipac huañuipi yaicurishcacuna tucurcanchic.

Chai bautismoraicu Cristohuan panpai tucurcanchic paipac huañuita chasquina ushancapac; chashna Cristo huañushcamanta Yayapac ushaihuan causachi tucushca shina, ñucanchicpash chashnallata shuc mushu causaipi purina tucunchic.
Paiman llutarichishca saquirishcanchic paipac huañui shinallata charishcaraicu; shuti pachami chashnallata causarinatapash paihuan chasquishun.
Caita allita yuyaripaichic: Ñaupa ñucanchic cashca Cristohuan chacatai tucurca, ñucanchic aichamanta chaira juchapi huatarashcata llushpichincapac.
Huañushpaca juchamanta llushpirina mari tucunchic.
Cristohuan huañushca cashpa, paihuan causana cashcatapash ininchicmi.
Yachanchic Cristo, huañushcacunamanta causarishca huasha, mana cuti huañushcata, huañui chai huasha mana imatapash paita ruranata ushan.
Huañui paita yallinata ña mana ushan. Cristopac huañui, juchapac chicapac huañui mari carca; ranti paipac causana Diospacta causanami can.
Chashnallata cancunapash juchapac huañushca caichic, ranti Diospac causac Cristo Jesusraicu.
Chashna cacpi, jucha ña ama cuti amuyachun cancunapac ismuna aichata; ama pai mana alli ruranacunaman aisashcapi urmachichun;
cancuna aichapash juchata rurancapac ama yanapachun. Ranti, Diosman curichic huañush camanta causaiman ticramushcacuna shina; cancunapac aichacunapash Diosta yanapac canuchun.
Juchaca ña mana cuti yallincachu cancunata, mana Camachic quillcapi caticushcaraicu, ranti Diospac cuyaipi caticushcaraicu.
Cuti tapuni: ¿Mana Camachic quillcata caticushcaraicu juchallishunllachu? Mana chashnachu.

Cancuna pimanpash huatashca shina pai rimashcata uyancapac curishpa, cancuna paiman huatashca tucunquichic, pai rimashcatapash pactachina canquichic. Chai amu jucha cacpi, huañunaman rinquichic; ranti inina rimashcata uyashpa, chuya shuncuyuc causanata charinquichic.
Ranti Diospacraicu juchapi huatashca causashpapash, cancuna shucman amuyachi tucurcanquichic; rimacpica, Diosmanta chasquishca inina, paita tucui shuncuhuan caticunquichic.
Chaihuan, juchamanta llushpirishpa, chuya shuncu causanapi huatashca saquirircanquichic.

Runapi yuyarishpami rimacuni, cancuna caicunata mana atipana ushashcaraicu. Ñaupa cancuna aichahuan juchacunata rurashpa, mana alli juchacunapi huatashca saquirircanquichic, chaipi jatunyashpa; ranti cunan, cuscata causaichic chuya shuncuyuc tucunacama.
Cancuna juchapi huatashca causacushpa, allicunata rurancapac mana ansapash yuyarircanquichic.
Ranti, ¿yuyarinquichichu imallapash japishta chai cunan cancuna pincaipacmi rimashcata rurashcamanta? Chaica huañuiman pushacun.
Cunan ranti, juchamanta quishpichishca cashpa, Diosta yanapac canquichic. Cancuna llancashcahuan chuya shuncuyuc tucushpa rinquichic; puchucaipi ranti, huiñai causaita japinquichic.
Juchaca huañuiman ñucanchicta pushashpa pacrachun; ranti Diosca Apunchic Cristo Jesuspi huiñai causaita cuyan.
Cancuna, huauquicuna, Camachic quillcata yachanquichic. ¿Cuncarircanquichichu ima shina shuc runa causaillapi Camachic quillcata pactachina cashcata?
Sahuarishca huarmimanta rimacpi, paipac cariman Camachic quillca rimashca shina llutarichishca can pai causanacama. Ranti cari huañucpi, paica quishpira saquirin sahuarishcamanta.
Ranti, cari causacushcallapita, shuc carihuan llutarishpa, crusta paquin chai huarmi; ranti, cari huañushca huasha, shuc-huan sahuarishpapash mana crusta paquin.

Cancunahuanpash chashnallata tucurca, huauquicuna, Mesiaspac aichapi Camachic quillca cancunapac huañurca; chashnami shucpac maquiman rinata usharcanquichic, pai huañushcacunamanta causachi tucurca ñucanchic Diospacta Ilancancapac.
Ñucanchic causai aichalla cashcapi, juchaman urmachic munanaicunata Camachic quillca cariyachishca, cancuna aichapi huañuita tarpuchiranurca.

Ranti, cunan, ñucanchicta huatacushcapac huañushca cashpa, Camachic quillcamanta llushpirishca saquirinchic; chashnami shuc mushu causaihuan yanapanchic, ranti mana chai callari pacha Camachic quillcahuan.

Chashna cacpi, ¿Camachic quillca juchami nishpachu rimana canchic? Mana chashnachu. Ranti ñuca juchata mana ricsimanchu carcami Camachic quillca illashcapi. Mana Camachic quillca cashcapi, mana ricsiman carcani shuccunapacta munapayana mana alli cashcata, pai caita riman: "Shuccunapacta ama munapayanquichu".
Chai Camachic quillca rimashcata yachashpa, juchaca ñucapi tucui sami munapayanacunata churarca; ranti, Camachic quillca mana tiyacpi, juchaca huañushca carca.
Ñaupac, Camachic quillca illac causarcani; ranti, Rurai-nishca shamushcapi, juchata cuti causaita curca;
ranti ñucaca huañurcani; chaipi yachai tiyarca, causancapac cushca Rurai-nishca huañuita apamuhuarca.
Rurai-nishca tiyashcaraicu jucha ñucata umachihuarca, chai Rurai-nishcallahuata huañuita cuhuarca.
Chashna cashpa, Camachic quillca allimi can, Rurai-nishcapash chashnallata sumac, alli can.

Ranti, alli cashpallata chari, ¿ima paichu ñucata huañuchishcahuanca? Manapacha chashnachu. Juchami allipi yanapaita tarishpa huañuita cuhuarca. Chashnami, Rurai-nishcaraicu jucha maicama pai jucha cashcata ricsircanchic.
Yachanchic Camachic quillca samaimanta cashcata, ranti ñuca aichayuc, tulluyuc cani, huatara shina juchaman catushca.
Ima tucushcatapash mana mari yachanichu, rurana munashca allita mana ruranichu, ashtahuan ñuca millashca mana allita rurani.
Cunan, mana munashcata rurashpa, Camachic quillca alli cashcata yachani;
ranti, chai shuti, mana ñucachu mana allita ruracuni, ñuca ucupi tiyac juchami mana allita ruran.
Alli ruranata munashami, ranti mana rurashachu.
Allita yuyaricpi, rurana munashca allita mana ruranichu, ashtahuan mana munashca mana allita rurani.
Chairaicu; ñuca mana munashcata rurashpa, mana ñucachu mana allita ruracuni, ñuca ucupi tiyac juchami ruran.
Chairaicu caita atipashpa ricuni: alli cashcata ruranca racushcapi, cuti maquipi mana alli rurana shamuhuan.
Diospac Camachic quillcata ricushpa, ucupi shuti cushiyanimi;
ranti, ñuca aicha ucupi shuc camachic quillca tiyashpa macanacucun ñuca yuyashcahuan; chashnami cai ñuca aicha ucupi tiyac camachic quillcapi japi tucushca saquirini.
Achcatami llaquirini. ¿Ñuca ucupi tiyac huañuimanta quishpinata ushashachu?
Achcata Diosta pacrachushun Apunchic Jesucristoraicu. Shina cacpi, ñucallatami yuyaihuan Diospac Camachic quillcapi huatara cani, ranti aichahuan iuchapac camachic quillcapi huatara cani.
Chairaicu, Cristo Jesusman llutarishcacunapac ña mana tiyan cautsayachina.
Samaimanta causaita cuc Camachic quillca Cristo Jesuspi canta quishpichin juchapac huañuipac Camachic quillcamanta.
Caita Camachic quillca mana usharcachu, aicha yapa sanpa cashcaraicu. Dios rurarca: Paipac quiquin Churita cachamurca juchasapa aichata japishpa; chai aichallapitami chicapac juchata cautsayachirca.
Chashna, Camachic quillcapi mañashca ñucanchicpi pactarinata ushan, ña mana aicha mañashca shina ruranchic, ashtahuan Samai mañashcata ruranchic.
Aicha pushashca causaccuna, aichapac cashcata yuyarinun, chaita munanun; ranti Samai pushashca causaccuna, samai pushashcaman rinacun.
Aicha munashcacuna huañui canacun; ranti Samaimanta causai, ganas causai can.
Shuti pachami, aicha rurashca Diosta piñachincapac rurashcami can. Mana cushiyan, cushiyanata mana ushancachu Dios munashcata pactachishcahuan.
Chairaicu, aicha mañashcata rurashpa causaccuna Dios mañashcata mana pactachi ushanun.
Ranti cancuna mana aichapac canquichic, Samaipacmi canquichic, Diospac Samai mari cancuna ucupi causacun. Pipash Cristopac Samaita mana charishpa, mana Cristopacchu can.
Ranti, Cristo cancuna ucupi cashpa, jucharaicu aicha huañuiman ricpipash, samaica causacun Diospac cuyaipi cashcaraicu.

Cristota huañushcamanta causarichicpac Samai cancunapi tiyacpi, Jesusta huañushcacunamanta causarichic, cancunapac huañushca aichatapash causaita cuncami; cancuna ucupi causacuc paipac Samaihuanmi ruranca.
Chashna cacpi, huauquicuna, aichata mana imatapash cunata canchicchu, pai munashcatapash ama catishun;
pai rimashcata catishpa huañuimanmi rinquichicman; ranti cancuna, Samai yanapashcahuan, aicha rurashcata chincachishpa, causaitami charinquichic;
Diospac Samai pushashcata puriccuna, paicunalla Diospac churicuna canun.
Cancunaca mana huatara samaitachu chasquircanquichic manchanaman ticrancapac, churicuna tucuna Samaitami chasquircanquichic, paimi ñucanchicta "Abba, Yaya" rimachin.
Chai Samaillata ñucanchic samaita allipacha ricsichin ñucanchic Diospac churicuna cashcata.
Churicuna cashpa, japina caccunapash canchic, Diosmanta japinata chasquiccuna, Cristohuan japina cashcata chasquishun; cunan paihuan ñacaricushpa, paihuan jatunyachishcatapash chasquishun.
Alli shuti pacha, ñuca yuyarini cunan cai causaipi ñucanchic ñacaricushca manapacha tupuipacchu can ñucanchicpi huasha shamunca racuc jatunyachishcahuan.
Ailita yuyaricpi, tucui Dios rurashcacuna allipacha chaparanun achicman Diospac churicuna lluchshinuchun.
Nicpi, runacuna yancamanta llancana tucushpa, mana pai munashcaraicuchu chashna tucurca, ranti Dios chashna munashcaraicu.
Chashna cashpapash, pai huañuna cashcamanta llushpirinata chapacun, Diospac churicuna quishpina causaiman pactanacama.
Yachanchic tucui Dios rurashcacuna huacanun, ñacarinun, huachacuc shina,

Mana paicunalla, ñucanchicpash, ñucanchic charinata ricsichishpa Samaita cui tucushcacuna cashpapash, ucupi chunlla huacanchic, maican puncha Dios ñucanchic aichata quishpichichun, quiquin churicunata rurachun nishpa.
Cui tucushca quishpinata chapana canchic; ranti ricurashcata chapana, chaica ña mana chapaipacchu can: ¿ricuimanta amishcata chapaipacchu?
Shina cacpi, mana ricushcata chapancapac sinchita shayarishpami chapana tucun.
Chairapash ñucanchic sanpayashcapi Samai yanapac shamun, ñucanchic mana yachanchic imata jinu mañana cashcata. Chashnapi quiquin Samaillata jiquishcahuan mana rimashcahuan ñucanchiraicu mañan.
Ranti chai shuncucunata ricsicca yachan Samai imata mañacushcata, pai chuya shuncuyuccunaraicu Dios munashca shina mañashcamanta.
Ashtahuan rimacpi, Dios tucui imacunata paita llaquiccunapac maquipi, paicunapac allipac churan, paicunata cayashca mari pai quiquin munashcaraicu.
Pai ñaupacta ricsishcacunata, paipac Churi shina tucuna ushaita curca, quiquin pai shinata, achca huauqui ucupi pai tucuimanta ñaupac shayachun nishpa.
Chairaicu, ñaupacta acllashcacunata cayashpa, cusca runacunata ruran, chai huasha jatunyaita cun.
¿Ashtahuan rimaipacchu? Dios ñucanchihuan cacpi, ¿ñucanchicta ushancachu pillaca?.
Chai Dios paipac Churillatata mana quishpichishpa, paita ñucanchiraicu ashtahuan cushpa, ¿manachu pairaicu ñucanchicman imatapash cunca?
¿Pitac juchachinata ushanca Dios acllashcacunata, pai paicunata cusca runacunata rurashcata yachashpa?.

¿Maicanllaca huañuiman cachana ushancachu? ¿Chaitaca Jesus Mesias rurancachu? Mana, paimi huañurca, ashtahuan rimacpi causarirca, paillata Diospac yachac maquiman tiyan, paillata ñucanchiraicu mañacun.

¿Pillaca Cristo llaquishcamanta ñucanchicta llushpichinata ushancachu? ¿Camai tucushcachu ushanca, llaquirishcachu, piñashpa japishcacunachu, yaricai-chu, llushti causanachu, manchaipaccunachu, mircanuchu ushanca?
Cashna riman Dios quillcashca shimi: Canraicu tucui puncha huañunalla causanchic, huañuchincapac huacracunata shina ñucanchicta ranun.
Ranti tucui chaicunata yallishunmi ñucanchicta llaquicraicu.

Yachanimi ñuca, ima huañui, ima causai, ima samai ushaicuna, cunan causai, huasha tucunca rashca, ima cai pachamanta ushaicuna, jahuapachamanta cashpa, huaicu ucumanta cashpa, ima cai pachapi causac ima cashpapash, mana ushancachu Dios llaquishcamanta ñucanchicta llushpichincapac, chai llaquishcata tupanchicmi Apunchic Cristo Jesuspi.
Cristo Jesuspimi alli shutipacha cancunata rimani; ñuca yachaimi chaitaca chashnami nihuan Diospac Samaipi:
Ñuca charinimi shuc jatun llaquirinata shuc catinlla nanaitapash;
munaimanmi Diospacpi millai tucushpa, Cristomanta chicanyachishca canata judiocunapac allipac, ñuca llactamanta huauquicuna.

Paicunami Israel runa canun, paicunata Dios quiquin churicunata shina chasquirca, paicuna ucupipash Paillata samacun. Curishca shimicuna, Camachic quillca, chacchana, cusha nishcacunapash paicunapacmi.
Callari yayacunamanta huahuacuna canun, Cristo paicunamanta pacarishca can; pai, tucuimanta yalli, huiñaipac bendisiashca Dios. Chashna cachun.
Diospac shimi mana pactarishcachu mana rimana ushanchic mari, mana tucui Israelpac churicunachu Israel mirai canun.
Chashnallata, mana tucui Abrahanmanta shamuccuna paipac churicunachu canun, chaimanta pai cashna rimai tucurca: "Isaacpac churicuna canpac churicunami canunca".
Cashnami chaica rimanayan: Abrahanpac churi cashcaraicu mana Diospac churimi rimaipac mari; Abrahanpac churicuna canunmi Dios cusha nishcamanta pacarishcacuna.
Cusha nishca cashna nin: "Cai pacha shinapimi ticramusha, Saraca shuc churitami charinca"
Caipash tiyan: Rebecapash, ñucanchic yaya Isaacpac huarmi huicsayuc tucurca,
chaira chai ishcai huahuacuna mana pacarishcallapita, paicuna manarac allita, manallita, rashcallapita, Dios rimarca: "Rucumi quipapac runa tucunca".
Chashnami acllana Diosmanta" shamun, cayana mana rurashcamantachu can, cayac munashcamantami shamun.
Chaimanta Dios Quillcashca Shimipi cashna rimah: "Esaumanta yalli Jacobta llaquircani".
¿Caipi rimashcata atipanquichicchu? ¿Dios mana cusca Taripacchu can? Mana chaichu.
Allita yachacpi, pai Moisesta cashna rimarca: "Ñuca munashcatami quishpichisha, ñuca munashcamantami llaquirisha",
Chashna cashpa, mana ñucanchic munashcaraicu, rurashcaraicu tucunca imapash; Dios-raicumi, pai ñucanchicta llaquishcaraicu.

Dios Quillcashca Shimipi faraonta riman: "Ñucapac ushaita ricsichincapac, tucui pachapi ñuca Shutita ricsinuchun nishpa, canta faraon shayachucani". Chashna cashpa mari Dios, llaquishcahuan ricun pai munashcata, pai munashcapac shuncuta sinchicuchin.
Cunanca rimahuanquichicmi: Pai munashcata ruracpi mana pipash rimacpi, mana piñarinmanca, ¿manachu?
¡Ayalla runa! ¿Dios rurashcamanta rimancapac pita canqui? ¿Imaraicumi chashna rurahuarcanqui, allpa manca paita ruracta rimancachu?
¿Manca-allpa llancac manachu chai sapiramantallata sumac ricuricta, yancalla mucahuata, imapash rurana ushan?
Ari, Dios pai ima shina piñarishcata, paipac ushaipash maicama pactashcata ricsichincapac, mana ushaipac chapashcahuan chaparca manalii runacunata.
Shuc mucahuacunahuan paipac Jatunyaita ricsichinayarca; alli rimacpi, ñucanchic, ñucanchicta ñaupacta ña allichishca jatunyachincapac.
Chaipacmi cayai tucushca carcarichic, mana judio ucumantalla, Diosta mana ricsiccunamantapash,
cashna profeta Oseashuan rimachirca: "Mana ñuca runata ñucapac rimashami, mana ñuca llaquishcata llaquinimi rimasha.
Mana ñuca ranachu canquichic rimai tucushcallapita, causac Diospac churicuna rimai tucunquichic".
Israelmanta rimashpa, Isaias cashna caparin: "Israel churicuna ñucñu yacumanta tsatsa shina achca cashpapash, ansa puchu quishpinunca;
Apunchicca cai allpapi paipac shimita utcalla pactachinca".
Cashnapash Isaias rimarca: "Tucuita Ushac ñucanchicta mana churicunata saquishca cacpi, Sodoma shina tucunchicman carca, Gomorra shina canchicman carca".
¿Imata rimashun shinacpi? Diosta mana ricsiccuna chuya shuncu tucunata mana mashcashpapash, tarinacushcami.
Ranti Israel, Camachic quillcapi chuya shuncuyanata chapashpa, mana pactarca chai Camachic quillcaman. ¿Imaraicu?
Rurashcamantalla, mana ininamanta chapashcaraicu. Chaipi urmanurca, jarcacuc rumipi nictarishpa, Cristo
paimanta cashna rimashca tiyan: "Ricui, Sionpicmi shuc rumita tacarincapac churani, shuc urmachic caca; pipash paipi inina churashpa mana pantashca saquirincachu''.
¿Huauquicuna, tucui shuncuhuan judiocuna quishpichi tucunuchun munani, paicunaraicupash Diosta mañani.
Paicunaraicu caita rimani: Yapami Diosta yuyarinun shinapash pantarishca atipashcahuan.

Mana atipanun ima shina Dios chuya shuncuyuccunata ñucanchicta ruran, ranti paicuna munashca shina chuya shuncuyuc tucunayanun, Chashna rurasha, Diospac ñanpita quishpilla purinun. Camachic quillca Cristoman purichin, chaihuanmi chuya shuncuyuc tucui iniccuna tucununca.
Camachic quillcamanta shamuc chuya shuncuyuc tucunamanta Moises cashna quillcan: "Maicanpash chaita pactachishpa, pairaicumi causanca".
Ranti, ininamanta pacarishca chuya shuncuyuc tucunamanta cashna riman: "Ama shuncu ucupi rimaichu: ¿pillaca jahua pachaman pactancachu?; rimacpica, Cristota uraicuchina yuyaihuan.
Ama rimaichupash: ¿pillaca huaicuman uraicuncachu?; rimacpica, Cristota huañushcamanta sicachina yuyaihuan".
Shinapica ¿imata nin? "Diospac shimi canpac mayanpi, canpac shimipi, canpac shuncupi tiyacun". Rimacpica, ñucanchic cushi shimita yachachishcamanta riman.
Canpac shimihuan Jesus Apunchicmi rimashcaraicu, canpac shuncupipash paita Dios huañushcacunamanta causachishcata inishcaraicu, quishpichi tucunquimi.
Shuncumanta inicta, Dios chasquinmi; ranti shimihuan rimacca quishpirami tucun
Chairaicu Dios quillcashca shimi nin: "Paita iniccunamanta mana pipash pantarishca tucununcachu".
Judio griegomanta caipi chicanyachishca mana tiyanchu; tucuilla chai Apunchicllata charinun, paita mañaccunata achcata cucmi can paica.
Chashna, Apunchicpac Shutita rimac quishpirami tucun.
Ranti, ¿Apunchicpac shutita rimaipacchu canca chaira paita mana inishpa? ¿Paipi ininata ushashunchu pai rimashcata mana uyashpa? ¿Uyaipacchu canca pipash paimanta mana rimacpica?
¿Imashnata rimanunca mana cachai tucushca cashpaca?. Dios quillcashca shimipi cashna riman: "Cushihuan pactamuichic alli shimita apamuccuna".
Shina cacpipash, mana tucui allihuan uyanurca chai Cushi Shimita. Isaias cashna nin: "Apunchic, pillapash inircachu ñucanchic rimashcata".
Cashna cashpa, ininaca uyashcamanta shamun, uyashcaca Cristopac cushi shimi can.
Ranti ñuca tapuni: ¿Rimashcata manachu uyanurca? Ari uyanushcami. Diospac shimi nin: "Rimaccuna caparishca tucui allpapi uyarishcami, paicunapac shimi cai pachapi mai cuchucamapash pactashcami".

Ranti, chairapash tapucunimi: ¿Israel runacuna mana atishcaraicuchu can? Callarincapac, Moises rimashcata japini: "Ñucami mana llactallapash cashca llactamanta canta tunpachisha, yuyai illac llactahuanmi canta piñachichisha"
Isaiaspash astahuan riman: "Ñucata mana mashcaccuna tupahuanurca, mana ñucamanta tapushpa puriccunata ricurimurcani".
Rani, Israelmanta cashna riman: "Tucui puncha yanapana munarcani mana uyac piñarisiqui llactata".
Chairaicu tapuni: ¿Dios paipac runacunata jichushcachu canca? ¡Manapacha! Ñucallata Israel runa cani, Abrahanpac churicunamanta, Benjaminpac runa ucumanta.

Callarishcamanta Dios israelitacunata paipac runacunata rurashcarca; mana jichushcachu chai acllashca runacunata. ¿Manachu cuncarishcanquichic Eliasmanta Dios Quillcashca Shimipi rimashcata, ima shina pai Diospac ñaupacpi Israelta juchachishcata?
Pai rimacurca: "Apunchic, canpac profetacunata huañuchinacurca, altar nishcacunata huacllichinurca, ñucaca sapalla saquirircani; cunanca ñucatapash huañuchinayahuanun".
Dios paita cutiparca: "Canchis huaranca mana Baalpac ñaupacpi cuncuric runacunatami huacaichishcata charini.
Chashnallata cunanpash ansa Israel runacuna saquirinushca, Dios munashcaraiculla acllashcacuna.
Ranti Dios munashcaraiculla cashpa, mana paicuna rurashcaraicuchu carca. Chashna cashpa Diospac cuyai mana Diospac cuyaichu canman.
¿Imata rimashun chaimanta? ¿Israel mana tarishcachu pai mashcacushcata? Acllashcacunaca tarinurcami,

ranti shuccuna mana atipac tucunurca, Dios Quillcashca Shimipi rimashca shina: "Dios paicunata yuyai illac samaita curca; paicunaman mana ricuc ñahuita curca, mana uyac rinritapash curca, cunan punchacama ama uyancapac".
Davidpash riman: "Paicuna sumac micunacun paicunallata huatachishpa urmachic ticta canuchun, chaipi paicuna ñacarinata tarinuchun.
Paicunapac ñahui puyuyashpa ña ama ricuchun, cumuyashca huiñaipac purinuchun".

Cutipash tapuni: ¿Mana cuti jatarincapacchu urmanurca? ¡Mana chaichu! Ashtahuan paicuna urmashcaraicu mari quishpichi tucuna Diosta mana ricsiccunaman pactamushca, chashna tucushcamanta Israel runacuna tunpanuchun nishpa.

Israel pantashcaraicu cai pacha yapa chariyuc tucurca, pai ansalla pantashcaraicu Diosta mana ricsic runacuna chariyuc tucunushca. Chuya shuncuyuc Israel tucucpi, ¿tucuicuna yalli charina cashcata yuyarinquichicchu?
Cancunata, Diosta mana ricsiccunata rimani: Diosta mana ricsiccunapacman cachashca cani, ñuca ruranapi ñuca ushashca tuputami rurani;
ñuca huaquin aillucuna cancunamanta tunpanuchun nishpami caita rurani, chashna maicanllatapash quishpinaman pushaiman nini.
Paicunata mayanman jichushcaraicu, tucui cai pacha Dios-huan ailluyarca, paicuna chuya shuncuyuc tucucpi, ¿imachari canca? ¡Huañuimanta causaiman chinpana!
Mushu ñaupac muyucunata Diosman cucpi, tucui huasha aparishca Diosman cushca saquirin. Sapi chuya shuncuyachishca cacpi, pallcacunapash chuya shuncuyachishca saquirinun.
Olivomanta maican pallcacuna piti tucunushca, ranti canca, shuc sacha olivo shina, paicuna rantimanta chai yurapi satichi tucushcanqui, chashna chai yura ancucunahuan, huiquihuan causanqui.
Ranti, ama jatunyaichu quiquin pallcacuna mana allichu canun nishpa; mana canchu sapita sinchicuchicunqui, ashtahuan sapimi canta sinchicuchicun.
Rimanqui imapash: "Ñucata satichincapacmi shuc pallcacunata pitinushca".
Allimi can. Mana inishcaraicu piti tucunurca, canca inina charishcaraiculla sinchicucunqui. Ama yapalla jatunyaichu, ashtahuan allita atipashpa causai.
Dios ashtahuan quiquin pallcacunata mana quishpichishca cashpa, cantapash mana quishpichincachu.
Chashna cacpi, Dios alli shuncu, cusca cashcata ricui: urmaccunahuan cusca carca pai, canhuanca alli, can alli causashcaraicu. Mana chashna cashpa, canpash piti tucunquimi.
Ranti judiocuna, inina cashcata mana piñashpa, satichi tucununcami: Diosca ushaita charin cutillata satichincapac.

Ashtahuan canta sacha olivomanta pitishpa, chican yuramanta cacpipash, alli olivopi satichinurca; ashtahuan paicunaca, quiquin olivomantallata cashpa, satichi tucununcallami paipac quiquin yurapi chai layallata yura cashpa.

Ñuca munani, huauquicuna, Dios ñucanchic mana yachashcata ruranca rashcata, ama cancuna judiocunamanta yallicmi canchic yuyarincapac: ansa Israel runa mana atipac tucushpa saquirinca ranun mana Diosta ricsiccuna tucuilla yaicunacama.
Chashnapimi Dios quillcashca shimipi rimashca shina tucui Israel quishpichira tucunca: "Sionmanta shuc quishpichic llucshinca, paimi Jacobpac churicunata tucui juchacunamanta pichanca.
Cashnami canca paicunahuan ñucahuan curishca shimi, paicunata quishpichishcapi.
Cushi Shimimanta rimacpi, paicuna piñarishca canun, cancuna allipac. Ranti, acllai tucunamanta nicpi, paicunata Dios llaquinmi paicunapac yayacunaraicu,
Dios acllashcata pai cuyashcacunantin mana quichunata ushan.
Cancuna Diosta mana uyac cacpipash, paipac llaquina cancunaman pactarca, judiocuna paihuan piñarishcaraicu;
chashnallata paicunapash cunan piñarishca canun cancunapacman paipac llaquina pactashcaraicu, paicunapash cunan tucuicunahuan llaquinata tupana ushancapac.
Dios tucui runata jucha ucupi churarca, tucuicunamanta llaquirincapac.
¡Imapaclla achcata can tucui Dios charishca, paipac yuyai tucui pai yachashcapash!. Pai ruranca rashca mana yachaipac, paipac ñanpicunapash mana ricsipac canun.
Chaimanta rimacpi: "¿Maicanllaca yachashcachu Apunchcpac yuyaita? ¿Paita camachiccama tiyarcachu?
¿Maicanllaca paiman imatapash curca pai cutichina cancapac?"
Alli rimacpi, tucui paimanta shamun, Pai rurashca canun, Paiman ticrana tucun. ¡Pai huiñaipac jatunyashca cachun!. Chashna cachun.
Cancunata mañani, huauquicuna, Diospac llaquirinaraicu paiman curichic causac camari shina: chaimi cancunapac samaimanta chacchana,

Ama cai pacha runacuna rurashcata catichicchu, cancunapac yuyaipi mushuyaichic. Chashnami. yachanquichic maicarimi alli quiquin Dios munashca can, maicanmi alli can, maicanmi allihuan Dios chasquishca can, maicanmi quiquin alli pactachishca can.
Dios cuhuashca cuyai ushaita cuhuan tucui cancunata rimancapac quiquin cancunallatata ama yapalla llaquirichicchu nishpa; paipac tupulla alli can, caranlla Diospacpi churai tucushcata yuyarichun.
Ñucanchic aicha cashcata. ricuichic: Achca uchilla aichacunayuc cashpapash, shuclla can: ranti mana tucuilla; shuclla llancanata charinun.
Ñucanchicpash chasnallata; achca cashpallata, shuclla aicha tucunchic Cristopi, tucuilla yanaparinchic.
Diospac: cuyaita caranlla chican layata charinchic; Dios chashnapac curca caranman. Dios cuyashcaraicu profeta cashpa, rimachun paipac inina yachachishcata.
Yanapanata cui tucushca cashpa, yanapachun; yachachinata cui tucushca cashpa, yachachichun;
camachinata cui tucushca cashpa, camachichun.: Chashnallata, mana mitsashcahuan cuna canqui; pushaccama cashpa, sinchicushpa pushachun; llushticunata yanapac, cushihuan yanapachun.
Ama llullashcahuan cuyai tiyachun. Mana allita millaichic, alli cashcata yapa ricuichic.
Huauquipura cuyanacuipi tucuipura cuyanacushcata ricsichichic. Muchanapi: caran amu chaishucta ashtahuan muchanata yuyaripaichic.
Ruranata pactachinapi: ama sanpayaichicchu. Cancunapac causaipi Diosta yapa yuyarishpa, Apunchicta yanapaichic.
Cushihuan chapanata chapaichic. Llaqui shamushcapi: ama piñarichicchu. Tucui pachapi Dios-huan rimarichic.
Mutsushpa causac iniccunahuan: cancuna charishcata paicunaman cuichic. Puriccunata cancunapac huasipi chasquichic.
Cancunata piñashpa japiccunata bendisiachic; bendi-siaehic, ama paicunata piñashcahuan ricuichicchu.
Cushi runacunahuan cancunapash cushiyaichic; huacaccunahuan cancunapash huacaichic.
Tucui shuclla yuyaihuan purichic. Jatun tucunata ama mashcaichicchu, ashtahuan tucuimanta uchilla tucunata mashcaichic.
Mana allita rai tucushpa, ama chaillahuata cutichicchu; allicunata rurashpa, runacunapacpi llaqui tucunata yuyarichic.
Tucuicunahuan alli causanapi sinchicuichic, macanacuna caricunamanta ama callarichun.
Cancunaca ama taripaichicchu? llaquishca huauquicuna, Diosmi ñacachinataca yachan; Dios, quillcashca shimillapita riman: "Ñucami ñacachisha, ñucami pai ñacarina cashcata cusha, Apunchic riman.
Huasha riman: "Canta piñac yaricai cacpi, carai; upianai cacpi, upiachi; chashna rurashpami paipac uma jahuapi ninata tantachinqui",
Mana alli canta: ama yallichun, ashtahuan allicunallata rurashpa mana allita yalli.
Tucuilla ñucanchicta pushac apucunata uyanuchun; mana tiyan mari paipac munaimanta apu, tucui apu Diosmanta shamun; chairaicu cunan tiyaccuna Dios munashcaraicu tiyanun.
Chairaicu, maicanpash apuhuan piñarishpa, Dios munashcatapash piñacun; mana pactachina munashpa, paicunallata cautsayachi tucunca ranun.

Chashna cashpa, allita ruracushpa, apucunata mana manchanachu can; mana allita ruracushpa, shuti manchana tucun. ¿Apucunata manchanata saquinayanquichu? Allillata rurai, chaipimi paicunaca canmanta cushiyanunca.
Paicuna Diosta yanaparanun canta alliman pushancapac, Ranti, mana allita causashpa, manchai, mana yancachu aiñita charinun, chairapash mana allicunata taripac, ñacachic Diosta yanapac canun.
Chairaicu uyana paicunata canchic: mana manchashpalla, ranti alli cashcaraicu.
Chairaicullata cuna cullquita cuna tucunquichic, chai cullqui tantachiccunapash Diosta yanapaccunallata canun.

Caranman paiman cuna cashcata cuichic: Yanapana cullquita mañac shamucpi, yanapana cullquita cunquichic; cuna cullquita mañac shamucpi, chai cullquita cunquichic; muchaipac runata muchanata cuichic; yupaichana runata yupaichaichic.
Cuna cullquita illacta cuichic pimanpash cuna cacpi; ama pitapash dibichicchu; cuyaillata shuti caranlla dibinacuichic, ¿manachu, pipash shucta llaquishpa tucui Camachic quillcata pactachishca?

Cunan ricui, "ama shucpac huarmihuan, shucpac carihuan causaichu, ama huañuchichu, ama shuhuaichu, ama chiquicuichu", tucui chaishuc rurai nishcacunantin cai shimita pactachishcallahuan pactachi tucunun: "Shuc runata canpac aichata llaquishca shina llaquinqui".
Cuyaihuan mana allita mana pi runatapash ruranchicchu. Chairaicu cuyaillapi tucui Camachic quillca pactachi tucun.
Cancuna yachanquichic ima pachapi ñucanchic causacushcata, ñami puñuimanta causarina pacha pactarishca. Ñucanchic quishpichi tucuna, inina callarishcamanta ashtahuan mayanllapi cunan charinchic:
pacarina ña mayanlla can, puncha ña ricurimun. Shinacpi, tutapi ruranacunata saquishpa, achicpac aiñicunata japishun.
Quiquin punchapi shina cuscata purishun; chairaicu, saquishun jatun micunacunapi machanata, mana alli huarmicunahuan purina, mana alii yachaicunata, piñacunata, chiquicuita, imacunatapash.
Ashtahuan chaicuna rantimanta, Apunchic Cristo Jesusta shuc churanata shina churarichic, aicha mañashcataca ama uyaichicchu.
Ininata mana sinchic charicta allihuan chasquichic, pai yuyarishcamanta mana imatapash rimashpa.
Maican tucuita micunallami nishpa yuyarin, ranti shuccuna, ashtahuan manchaita charishpa, quihuacunallata micunun.
Maican micuc mana micucta ama millachun; chashnallata, mana micuc micucta ama taripachun, Dios paita chasquishca mari.
¿Canca shucpac runata taripanata ushanquichu? Shayaralla saquirichun, urmachun imapash, chaitaca paipac amu ricunca ran. Ranti mana urmancachu, pai shayarancapac Apunchic ushaita charin mari.
Shuc runa riman: Shuc punchacuna shuc punchacunamanta astahuan alli canun; chai shucpacca, tucui puncha chaipuralla canun: chashnapi caran amu allipacha yuyarishcata rurachun.
Punchacunata atishpa causac, Apunchicraicu ruran; tucuita micuc Apunchicraicu ruran, pai pacrachushcapi chaita ricsinchic. Mana micuc Apunchicraicu ruran, paipash Diosta pacrachun.
Shutipacha rimacpi, mana pipash quiquin amupacta causan, mana quiquin amupacta huañun.
Causacushpa, Apunchicpac causanchic; huañushpapash, Apunchicpac huañunchic. Causashcapi huañushcapipash, Apunchicpac canchic.
Chaipac Mesias huañushpa cuti causaiman ticrarca, causaccunapac huañushcacunapacpash Apunchic tucuncapac.
Chashna cacpi, ¿canchu canpac huauquita caminqui? ¿Canpash canpac huauquitachu millanqui? Tucuilla Diospacpi taripai tucushun.
Cashna quillcara tiyan: "Ñucapac causairaicu, Apunchic riman, ñuca ñaupacpi tucuicunami cuncurinunca, ñucatami tucui shimi chacchahuanca".
Chashna cashpa, caran amumi rurashcamanta Diosta rimana tucunchic.
Chairaicu, shucmanta rimanata tucuilla saquishunchic; ashtahuan ñucanchic huauquipac ñaupacpi mana churana canchic jarcanata, urmachina imapash.
Apunchic Jesusraicu ricsini allipacha yachanipash, mana ima paipac munai chuya cashcamanta huacllishcata; mana chuyachu nishpa yuyaricpimi, chashna tucun.
Ranti shuc micunaraicu canpac huauquita llaquichishpa, chaica mana cuyai can. Can micushcaraicu ama huacllichun maican runapash, pairaicumi Cristo huañushca.
Can rurashcata ricushpa ama pipash juchallichun, shuti cacpipash.
Diospac pacha mana micunachu, mana upianachu; ashtahuan canmi cusca taripana, alli causai, cushi causana Diospac Samaipi.
Pipash cashna Cristota yanapashpa, Diosta cushiyachin, runacuna llaquishcapash can.
Mashcashun shinacpi, alli causai ñanpipi purichicta tucuilla ashtahuan allicuna tucuncapac.
Shuc micunaraicu ama huacllichinquichu Dios rurashcata. Tucui micuna chuya can, ranti ñucanchic micushcahuan shucta juchallichina mana alli can.
Ranti allimi maican pachallapipash aichamanta, vinomanta sasina imamantapash, chaicunaraicu canpac huauqui juchallina cacpi.
Chai canpac ucupi sinchi yuyarishcata, canpacpi huacaichi, Diosca ricucun mari. Cushiyachun maican runapash, ucupi sinchita yuyarishca huasha, mana chicanta rurashpa.
Ranti ishcaita yuyashpa micuc, cautsayarin mana pai inishcata rurashcaraicu, imatapash ñaucanchic inishcamanta chicanta rurashpa juchatami ruranchic.
Ñucanchipac inina sinchi can, mana sinchi ininata chariccunapac urmaicunata ñucanchic aparina tucunchic, ñucanchipac cushiyanallata mashcana rantimanta.
Ñucanchicmanta tucui chai shuc runapi cushiyanata cushun, alli ruranapi yanapashpa.
Cristopash mana paipac quiquin cushiyanata mashcarca; Camachic quillca chaimanta riman: "Piñaccuna canta piñashca ñucapi urmarca".

Yachanchicpash tucui callari pachapi quillcashcacuna ñucanchicta yachachincapac quillcai tucunurca, ñucanchic chapashcata sinchicuchispa chapancapac, Camachic quillca cushiyachishpa sinchicuchishcahuan.
Cushiyana, sinchicuna Diosmanta shamun, pai cancunaman cuchun shuclla yuyaihuan purinata, chaimi cristiano purina.
Chashna tucuilla shuclla shimihuan, Apunchic Jesus Mesiaspac Yaya Diosta chacchanquichic.
Chairaicu, tucuipura chasquinacuichic, Cristo Diosta jatunyachincapac cancunata chasquishca shina.
Caita cancunata rimani: Judiocunapac runa Cristo tucurca paicunapac rucucunaman Dios cusha nishcata pactachincapac, Dios pactachic cashcatapash ricsichincapac.

Diosta mana ricsiccunapash Diosta pacrachuna canun, paicunamanta llaquina charishcaraicu. Cashna riman Camachic quillca: Chairaicu canta taquishami, chacchashapashmi canpac Shutita Diosta mana ricsiccuna ucupi.
Shucpi cashna yapachin: Cushiyaichic, mama-llactacuna, canpac runacunantin.
Cutipash riman: Tucui llactacuna Apunchicta chacchaichic, pai jatun cashcamanta tucui mama-llactacuna rimaichic.
Isaiaspash riman: Jese aillu ucumanta shuc shamunca, paimi mama-llactacunata pushancapac shayarinca, Diosta mana ricsiccuna paitami chaparanun.
Chapanata chapachic Dios cancunapac ininata cushihuan, alli causaihuan juntachichun, Diospac Samaipac ushaihuan achca chapanata cancuna charinquichicmi.
Ñuca jinu yachani, huauquicuna, cancunapash alli yuyaicunata charinquichiq, tucuita yachanquichic, ushanquichic cancunapura camachirincapac.
Chashna cacllapita, quillcashcani cancunata cuti yuyachincapac, maicanpi sinchi shimicunahuan. Dios chai cuyaita cuhuasticaraicumi chaita rurani.

Pai, Cristo Jesuspac yaya pacrita rurashpa Diosta mana ricsiccunapacman cachahuarca Diospac Cushi Shimita yachachincapac, Diosta mana ricsiccunapac camari, Diospac Samai sumacyachishca, alli chasqui tucuchun.
Diosta yanapashcaraicu Cristo Jesuspi jatunyani.
Chashna, manapacha imamantapash rimashachu, Cristollata ñuca maquihuan, ñuca shimihuan, ñuca rurashcahuan, Diosta mana ricsiccuna ininapi yaicuncapac rurashcallatami rimasha.
Tucui caicuna mancharicushiyanacunahuan rurai tucunurca, Diospac Samaipac ushaihuan. Chashnami, Cristopac Cushi Shimita tucuiman apashpa rishcani, nicpica Jerusalenmanta Iliriacama.
Ranti yapa yuyarishcahuan, chaimanta cushiyanimi, Cristota mana ricsishcallapi yachachishcani, ama shuccuna ña callarishcata catisha nishpa,
Camachic quillcapi rimashca shina: "Paimanta mana shuc shimillapash rimai tucuccuna paita ricununcami, mana imatapash uyaccuna ricsinuncami".
Cai llancanaraicu mashna cuti chari cancunata mana ricucri usharcani.
Ranti cunan cai suyucunapi mana imatapash rurana charishpa, unai cancunata ricucrinayashpa,
¿Españaman rishpa chari ricucrisha. Chaipi chari cancunata ricusha, cancuña ranti yanapahuanquichic chari ñuca chaiman rincapac, cancunahuan tiyashpa cushiyashca huasha.
Cunan, Jerusalenman rirani chaipi tiyac iniccunata yanapancapac.
Chashna nincapacca, Macedoniamantacuna, Acayamantacunapash shuc yanapaita tantachinushca, Jerusalenpi tiyac inic tsuntsucunapacta.
Rurancapac rimanushca, allita yuyaricpi ruranami canurca. Diosta mana ricsiccuna Diospac pachaman rinata judiocunamanta chasquinurca, chashnallata paicunapash cai pachamantapachuan yanapana tucunun.
Cai mincashcata pactachishpa, tantachishcata paicunaman cushca huasha, cancunapacman risha, chaimantami Españaman risha.
Ñuca yachani, cancunapacman rishpa, Diospac bendisioncunahuanmi pactasha.
Ranti ñuca cancunata mañani, huauquicuna, Apunchic Cristo Jesusraicu, Diospac Samaipac cuyairaicupash, yanapahuachic ñucaraicu Dios-huan rimarishpa,
Judeapi tiyac mana iniccunamanta quishpichihuancapac,
Jerusalenpi tiyac iniccunapash cushihuan chasquinuchun ñuca apacushca yanapaita.
Chashnami cushi cancunapacman pactasha; Dios munacpi, cancunahuan samasha.
Alli causaita charic Dios tucui cancunahuan tiyachun. Cashna cachun.
Ñucanchic pani Febeta cancunata mincani, pai Cencreaspi tiyac iniccuna ucupi diaconisa can.
Allita paita chasquichic, Apunchicpac shutipi, inina catic huauquipura shina; paita tucui pai mutsushcapi yanapaichic; paipash achcatami yanapashca, ñucatapash yanapahuashcami.
Ñucata Cristo Jesuspi yanapac Prisca Aquilastapash yuyarinimi.
Ñucata huañunamanta quishpichinaraicu paicunapac causaita cunayanurca. Mana ñucalla pacrachucuni, chashanallata Diosta mana ricsiccunamanta iniccunapash pacrachununmi.
Cancunapac huasipi tantaric iniccunata yuyarinimi, rimaichic. Epenetotapash yuyarinimi, pai tucuimanta ñaupac Asia allpamanta Cristoman curirca.
Mariatapash yuyarinimi, pai cancunaraicu achcata rurashca.
Yuyarinimi Andronicota Juniastapash; paicuna aillu cahuanun, quillpai tucushcamanta mashi canun; yachachishcacunamanta jatun canun, ñucamanta ñaupac Cristota catic tucunurca.
Ampliatotapash yuyarinimi, pai Apunchicpi mashi cahuan.
Urbanotapash yuyarinimi, Cristopi ñucanchicta yanapac can, ñuca llaquishca mashi Estaquistapash.
Apelestapash yuyarinimi, pai yapa Cristoraicu ñucarirca, Aristobulopac aillucunatapash.
Ñuca aillu Hereodiontapash yuyarinimi, Narcisopac aillucunatapash, Apunchicpi ininun paicuna.
Yuyarinimi Trifenata Trifosatapash, paicuna sinchita Apunchicraicu llancaranun.
Apunchic acllashca Rufotapash yuyarinimi, paipac mamatapash, pai ñuca mama shina can.
Sincritota, Flegonta, Hermesta, Patrobasta, Hermasta, paicunahuan tiyac huauquicunatapash yuyarinimi.
Filologota, Juliata, Nereota panintin, Olimpasta, paicunahuan tiyac Cristopi tucui huauquicunatapash yuyarinimi.
Tucuipura ucllarishcahuan tupanacuichic. Tucui Cristopi iniccuna cancunamanta yuyarinunmi.
Diosmanta huauquicuna, allita atipashpa tiyaichic; tiyancami runa, cancuna yachashcamanta chicanta yachachispa, chausichinata llaquicunatapash jatachiccuna; paicunamanta chicanyaichic.
Chashna runacuna Apunchi Cristota mana yanapanacun mari, paicunapac huicsallatami yanapanun, allimanta sumac shimicunahuan upacunata umachinun.
Tucui yachanun cancuna yapa uyac cashcata, chairaicu cushiyanimi. Ranti munanimi, allita ruranalla cancuna chapacuichiclla, ranti mana allimantaca anchurichic.
Alli causaita charic Dios mana unayancachu supaita nitishpa cancuna chaqui ucupi saquincapac.
