Apunchic Cristo Jesus cancunata bendisiachun. Ñucahuan llancac Timoteo cancunata yuyaricunmi, ñuca aillu Lucio, Jason, Sosipatros, tucui paicunapash.
Nuca, Tercio, cancunata cai pancata quillcarcani, Apunchicpi cancunata yuyarinimi.
Gayopash yuyarinmi; pai huasita mañachihuashca; iniccunatapash huasita mañachishca.
Llactamanta cullquita huacaichiccama Erasto ñucanchic huauqui Quartopash yuyarinunmi.
Dios jatunyashca cachun. Pai charin cancunata sinchicuchina ushaita, ñuca yachachishca Cushi Shimipi rimashca shina, Cristo Jesusta ricsichishpa, huiñai pachamanta pacashca ruranata ricsichishpa,
ranti cunan ña ricsichi tucushca, profeta quillca pancacunapi tucui llactacunaman ricsichincapac aparanun, huiñaimanta Dios munashca shina, inina paicunapi tiyashcahuan.
¡Dios huiñaipac jatunyashca cachun, pai shuclla yucuita yachac can, Cristo Jesusraicu! Chashna cachun.
Ñuca, Pablo, Dios munashcaraicu Jesucristopac yachachishca tucuncapac cayashca cashcani. Sostenes shutiyuc huauquintin,

cai pancata quillcacuni Corinto llactapi tiyac Diosta iniccunaman; cancuna Cristo Jesuspi Diospac chicanyachishca cashcanquichic, paipac runacuna tucuncapac cayashca carcanquichic, Apunchic Jesucristota iniccunahuan pacta, pai ñucanchic Apu can, paicunapacpash can.
Ñucanchicpac Yaya Dios Apunchic Jesucristopash cancunapacpi paipac cuyaita, paipac alli causaita tallichinuchun.
Tucui pachapi cancunaraicu Diosta pacrachuni, Jesucristoraicu cancunapacpi Dios paipac cuyaita tallichishcamanta.
Pairaicu Dios cancunata pai cuyashcahuan juntachirca, alli rimana ushanapi achca yachana ushanapipash.
Chashnapi Cristomanta rimashca Cushi Shimi cancuna alli ricsishcanquichic.

Chashnami tucui Dios cuyashcacunata charinquichic Apunchic Jesucristo shamuna punchata chapacushpa. Dios cancunata sinchicuchincami, Apunchic Jesucristo ticramushcapi ama pipash juchallircami rimana ushancapac.
Dios mana pishiyan pai cusha nishcamanta, paimi cancunata cayarca paipac Churi Jesucristohuan, paihuan llutarishca causancapac.
Huauquicuna, Apunchic Jesucristopac shutipi mañani shuclla yuyaita charipaichic nishpa, ama chicanyashca causaichicchu. Shuclla yuyaihuan purichic, shuclla yuyarishcahuan, shucllata atipashcahuan.
Huauquicuna, caita rimacuni Cloepac aillucunamanta uyashca cashpa, chicanyanashi tiyan cancuna ucupi.
Caita uyarcani: Cancunamanta maican ninun: "Ñuca Pablopac cani"; huaquincuna ninun: "Ñuca Apolopac cani"; shuc nin: "Ñuca Pedropac cani"; cuti shucca riman: "Ñuca Cristopac cani".
¿Cristo raquirishcachu imata? ¿Cancunaraicu Pablochu chacatai tucurca? ¿Pablopac shutipichu bautisai tucurcanquichic ima chari?
Diosta pacrachunimi, cancunata mana bautisarcanichu, Crispo, Gayollata ñuca maquihuan bautisarcani.
Chashna cancunamanta mana pipash rimanata ushan ñucapac shutipi bautisai tucushcata.
Estefanaspac aillucunatapash bautisarcanimi, chaimanta cuti shuc runacunata bautisashcata mana yuyarinichu.
Cristo mana bautisancapacchu cachamuhuarca, Diospac Cushi Shimita ricsichincapacmi cachamuhuarca, mana sumac rimashca shimicunahuan; chashna ruracpi Cristo cruspi huañushca urayachi tucunca mari.
Cristo cruspi huañushca yanca shimi can juchapi caticcuna ricucpi; ranti cai shimillata Diospac ushai can quishpinaman riraccunapac.
Cashna riman Dios quillcashca shimipi: "Yachaccunapac yachaita huacllichishami, atipaccuna atipashcata anchuchishami".
¿Yachaccama, yachachiccama, cai pacha yachaicunamanta yachaccunapash ushanushcachu? Dios cai pachamanta yachaita yancata rurashca, mana imapash alli.

Dios paipac yachaihuan churarca cai pachamanta runa ama runa yachashcahuan paita ricsincapac; ashtahuan munarca paita chapaccunata Cushi Shimihuan quishpichincapae, cai Cushi Shimi yanca rimashca shimi, mana imapash alli cacpipash.
Judio runacuna mancharicushiyanacunata ricunayanun, griego runacuna astahuan yalli yachaita mashcanun;
ranti ñucanchic shuc chacatashca Mesiasmanta yachachinchic. Judio runacunata cai yapa pinachin, mana judio runacunapac yanca rimashca shimi can;
ranti Dios cayashcacunapac, judio mana judio cacpipash, cai Mesias Diospac ushai, Diospac yachai can.
Diospi yanca shina ricuric, runa yachashcamanta ashtahuan yalli mari can; Diospi sanpa shina ricuric, tucui runa ushaimanta yalli sinchi mari can.
Huauquicuna, maicanlla cayai tucushcata ricuichic. Cancunamanta ansashitulla runa yachaipi yachac jinu tiyan, mana tucui apu canquichic, cancunamanta mana achca tiyan ushac ailluyuccuna;
ashtahuan rimacpi, yapa yachaccunata pincachincapac, Dios acllarcami upa runacunata; ushaccunata pincachincapac sanpa runacunata acllashca.
Dios acllashcami cai pachamanta tucui millashca yanca runacunata, rimacpi, mana imatapash yachaccunata acllashca, yachaccunata urayachincapac.
Chashnami Diospac ñaupacpi mana pipash jatunyanata ushanca.

Shina cacpipash Diosllata cancunata Cristo Jesushuan llutachishca, paillata Cristo ñucanchic yachai cancapac munarca, Cristoraicu juchamanta pichashca canchic, Diospac chicanyachishca canchic, quishpichishcapash canchic.
Chaimanta Dios quillcashca shimipipash tiyan: "Maicanpash jatunyanata munashpa, Apunchicpi jatunyachun".
Chashnapash huauquicuna, Diospi pacashca shimicunata cancunata ricshichincapac rishcapi, mana sumac, mana atipaipac shimicunahuanchu rimacrircani.
Cancunahuan causacushpa, mana shuc imamantapash yachanata munarcanichu, Jesucristomantalla, ashtahuan allita rimacpi, chacatashca Jesucristomantalla.
Sanpa shina manchaihuan chucchurishpa cancunapacpi pactarcani;
cancunata Diospac Cushi Shimita yachachishpa, cancunata uyachincapac mana sumac shimicunahuanchu rimarcani, ranti Diospac Samai yanapashcahuan, Diospac ushaihuan,
cancunapac inina Diospac ushaimanta shamuncapac, mana runa yachaimanta.

Ranti, ininapi rucuyashcacunata sumac, sinchi shimicunahuan rimanchic. Shinapash, chai sumac rimashca shimicuna mana cai pachamanta rimashca shimi shina canun, mana apucuna rimashca shina canun, chaicuna utcalla chincarinca ranun.
Chaica Diospi pacashca yachai can, pai chaira cai pachata mana rurashcallapita, ñucanchicta jatunyachincapac yuyarishca.
Chaita manapacha atipanushca cai pachamanta apucuna, chaita atipashpa mana chacatanunman carca Apunchicta.
Chaimanta Diospac quillcapi rimara tiyan: "Dios paita llaquiccunapacta allichishcata mana maican ñahui ricushcachu, maican rinri mana uyashcachu, pillapash chaira mana yuyarishcachu".
Tucui caicunata Dios ñacanchicman ricsichircami paipac Samaihuan, Diospac Samai tucuita taripac can quiquin Dios ucupi tiyashcantin.
¿Shuc runapac shuncupi yuyashcata pita yachana ushan? Quiquin paipac ucupi tiyac samailla yachan. Chashnallata Diospac Samailla quiquin Dios ucupi tiyashcata yachan.
Mana cai pachamanta samaitachu chasquircanchic, Diosmanta shamuc Samaitami chasquircanchic, Dios ñucanchicta llaquishpa cuyashcacunata allita atipancapac.

Diospac Samai ñucanchicta yachachisca shimicunahuan tucui caicunamanta rimanchic, mana quiquin ñucanchic yachaimanta yachashca shimicunahuanchu rimanchic. Chashnami Diospi iniccunata Diosmanta shamuc yuyaicunata yachachinata ushanchic.
Dios cushca samaita mana charic Diospac Samaimanta shamucta mana chasquina ushan, yanca mari can, pai yuyacpi. Mana atipanata ushanpash Dios cushca samaihuan taripana cashcaraicu.
Ranti maicanpash Diospac Samaita charishpa tucuita taripanata ushan, paitaca mana pipash taripancachu.
Chaimanta Camachic quillca riman: "¿Apunchicpac yuyaita pillapash ricsinchu? ¿Maicanllapash paita yachachinata ushanchu?". Chashna cashpapash, Cristopac yuyaita charinchic.
Huauquicuna, ñuca cancunata mana Diospac Samaihuan puriccunata shina rimanata usharcani, runa yuyaipi yuyarishpami cancunata rimarcani, Cristopi yuyaricpi chaira huahuacunata shina.
Mailla yachanahuan cancunata yachachircani, shuc llullu huahuata micuna rantimanta chucuta cushca shina, chaira sinchi micunata cancuna mana micuna ushac cacpi. Cunanpash chaira mana ushanquichic,
runa yuyaillata charishcaraicu. Cancuna chaira chiquicurishpa, macanacushpa caticushpa chaira runa yuyaillapi caticunquichic, shuccuna caticushca shinallata.
"Ñuca Pablopacmi cani"; shucca: "Ñuca Apolopacmi cani", chashna rimashcahua chaira runa yuyaillapi caticunquichic.

Allita rimacpi, ¿Pablo ima cashcata yachanquichicchu? Apolo, ima cashcata yachanquichicchu? Yanapaclla canacun, paicunaraicu Apunchicpi inishcanquichic. Ñucanchicmanta caran runa Apunchic mincashcata rurarcanchic:
Ñuca tarpurcani, Apolo jucuchirca, ranti Diosmi huiñachirca.
Chashnamanta tarpuccama jucuchiccamantin mana imapash canun, Dioslla tucui can, paimi tarpushcata huiñachichin.
Tarpuccama, jucuchiccama chaipuralla canun, shinapash caran runa rurashca tuputa Dios cunca ran.
Tucuilla Dios mincashcapi llancanchic, cancunaca Dios llancacushca allpa canquichic, Dios ruracushca huasi.

Ñuca huasi rurana yachac cacpi, chai huasita rancapac Dios ñucata callarichihuarca, ranti shuc ñuca callarishcapi llancashpa caticun. Chashnapash, caranlla shayachicushcata allita ricushpa huasina tucun,
ña mana pipash shuc sapita cuti churaipac tucun, chai sapi Jesucristo can.
Cai sapi jahuapi shuti huasinalla tucun curihuan, cullquihuan, chiuclla rumicunahuan, caspihuan, huamahuan, pancahuan imapash;
ranti caran runa llancashcata puchucai taripanapimi tucui camai tucunca ran, chai puncha ninahuan shamunca, chai nina camanca caran runa ima shina llancana rurashcata.
Maicanpash mana rupac huasita rurashca cashpa, shuc cuyanata chasquinca;
ranti rupacpica, paillata imapash illac saquirinca ran, amuca quishpinca chari, ranti nina ucumanta quishpishca shina.
¿Manachu yachanquichic Diospac huasi cancuna cashcata? ¿Diospac Samaipash cancuna ucupi causacushcata manachu yachanquichic?
Pipash Diospac huasita huacllichicpi, Dios paitami huacllichinca, Diospac huasi sumaimana can, chai huasi cancunallata mari canquichic.
Ama pipash amullata umarichun: maicanpash cai pacha yachaita yapa yachac cashpa, mana yachac, upa shina tucuchun; chaimi alli quiquin yachac tucunca.
Diospac ñaupacpi cai pachamanta yachai mana imapash can, yanca. Chaimanta Dios quillcashca shimipi riman: "Cai pachamanta yachaccunata quiquin paicunapac yachaillapita Dios urmachin".
Shucpi riman: "Yachaccunapac yuyaicuna yanca cashcata Apunchic yachan".
Chairaicu ama pipash jatunyachun, maican runatapash catisticamanta, tucuillami cancunapac canun.
Pablo, Apolo, Pedro, cai pacha, causai, huañui, cunan causacushca, shamunca racuc: tucui cancunapac can,
cancunaca Cristopac canquichic, Cristoca Diospac can.
Cristopac runa shinalla cancuna ñucanchicta ricuna. canquichic, Diospi pacara yuyaicunata yachachincapac mincashcacuna.
Mincashcacuna cashpa, pactachic cashcata ricuchina can.
Ñucamanta rimacpi, mana imanahuanchu cancuna ñucamanta yuyashca, cai pachamanta apucuna taripashca mana imanahuanchu. Quiquin ñucapash mana tariparinichu.
Chashna cacpipash, ñuca ucupi tiyac Diospac Samai mana imamanta juchachihuacpipash, Diospac ñaupacpi mana jucha illacchu saquirini. Apunchic quiquin ñucata taripac can.

Chairaicu, ama ñaupacta taripaichicchu imatapash; Apunchic shamunacama chapaichic, paimi cunan pacara cashcata pacllapi llucshichinca, shuncupi yuyashcata ricsichinca. Chaipi shuti Diosmanta caranlla pai chacchana tupu cashcata cui tucunca.

Huauquicuna, cancunami cai shimicunata Apolopi, ñucapi yuyarishpa rimachihuanquichic; rimanimi ñucanchicmanta caita yachanuchun nishpa: Quillcarapi rimashcamanta ama ashtahuan rurancapac, ama pipash shucta jatunyachishpa chaishucta urayachincapac.

Ricushun, ¿canta maicanllaca tucuimanta yalli jatunyachishcachu? ¿Diosmanta mana chasquishcata imallatapash charinquichu? Paimanta chasquishca cashpallatachu, canpac munaimanta tupashca shina jatunyanqui.
Allita yuyacpi, cancuna ña tucuita charinquichic, mana imapash pishin, ñucanchic illac jatun apu tucushcanquichic. Shutipacha cancuna apu cacpi alli canman, ñucanchicpash cancunahuan apu cancapac.

¿Ñuca yuyarini, ñucanchicta, Apostolcunata huashaman Dios jichushca shina yachin, huañuncapac saquishcacunata shina. Angelcuna, runacuna, tucui pachapash ñucanchimanlla ñahuita churashpa tiyanun.

Cristoraicu upa runa shina ricui tucunchic, ranti cancunaca Cristoraicullata, yapa yachaccuna shina ricui tuncunquichic. Ñucanchic sanpa canchic, ranti cancuna sinchi. Ñucanchic millai tucunchic, ranti cancuna muchai tucunquichic.
Cunanllata yaricaihuan, llushtiyashpa ñacarinchic; runacuna ñucanchicta ñacachinun, mana quiquin huasita charindic,
ñucanchic maquihuan sanpayacta llancanchic. Piñashca shimihuan rimai tucushpa, bendisiashca shimihuan cutichinchic; piñashpa cati tucushpapash ñahui ricunchic.
Llullashca shimihuan huashachi tucushpapash, alli shuncuhuan cutipanchic. Cai pachamanta jamtsita shina ricunun, runacunapac ismata shina. Chashna canchic cunan punchacama.
Mana pincachincapacchu caita cancunaman quillcani, ashtahuan quiquin churicunata shinami camachini, cancunata llaquini mari.
Chunca huaranca runa Cristomanta yachachicta charishpapash, yayataca mana achcata charinquichicchu. Ñucami Cushi Shimihuan Cristopac causaita cancunata curcani.
Chairaicu ñuca causaita catipaichic cancunata mañani.

Chairaicullata ñuca Cristopi llaquishca, mana umachic churi Timoteota cancunapacman cachacuni. Paimi ima shina ñuca Cristo Jesusta inishpa causacushcata cancunaman yuyachinca, ñuca purishcapi tucui iniccunata yachachishca shina yachachinca.
Cancunamanta maicancuna ñuca "mana rincami yuyashpa", jatunyashpa tiyanun;
ranti, Apunchic munacpi mana unaillachu cancunata ricucrisha. Chaipimi ricusha chai jatunyashpa tiyaccuna imaliatashi rurana ushanun, mana paicuna shimihuan rimac ushashcailata.
Diospac pacha mana rimaillachu can, astahuan ushaimi can.
¿Imata ashtahuan alli can?, ¿cancunapacpi piñashcahuan pactashachu?, ¿ashtahuan alli shuncuhuanchu, llaquishcahuanchu pactasha?
Cancunamanta shuc runa quiquin la-mamata paipac huarmita rurashpa tiyashcata yachashcani. Cai yapa jatun jucha can, Diosta mana ricsic ucupipash mana chashna tucushcachu.
Chashna tucushcamanta chairapash cancuna jatunyanquichic llaquirina rantimanta. Ashtahuan allita ranquichicman carca cancuna ucumanta chai runata callpachishpa.
Ñuca, aichahuan mana cancunahuan tiyashpapash, ñuca samai chaipi can, cancunahuan tiyacushca shina, Apunchic Jesucristopac shutipi chashna causac runata ña cautsayachishcanimi.
Cancuna tantarishcapi, ñuca samai cancunahuanmi tiyanca, Apunchic Jesuspac ushaipash chaillapitami canca.
Chaipimi chai runata supaiman cunquichic, chaipi paipac aicha huacllichi tucuchun, ranti, paipac samai quishpichishca cachun Apunchic Jesus shamushcapi.
Chashna rurashcacunahuan cancuna mana jatunyana canquichic. Uyashcanquichic cai rimaita: "Ansa levadurashitu achca tanta rurana harinata punquichin".

Chairaicu, chai huacllichic rucu levadurata canchaman jichuichic, Pascua raimipi, levadura iliac, mushu tanta shina cancuna cancapac, chashna mari canquichic cancuna. Cristo ñucanchipac pascua camari tucushcaraicu, cancuna levadura illac tanta cana canquichic.
Shina cacpi, Pascua raimita rurashun; rucu levadurata jichushun, chaica mana alli, huacllichic can; levadura illac tantata ashtahuan charishun, chaicuna chuya shuncu, cusca causai canun.
Juchalliccunahuan ama llutarinquichicchu, quillcarcani chaishuc cuti.

Chashna rimashcahuan mana tucui cai pachamanta mana allicunamanta chicanyancapacchu rimarcani, rimacpi mitsaccunamanta, shuhuaccunamanta, huacata chacchaccunamanta. Tucui paicunamanta chicanyanayashpa, cai pachamantami llucsina tucunquichicman.

Quillcashcahuan rimanayarcanimi, huauquimi cani rimashpaliata, mana alli causac, mitsac, huacata chacchac, rimaisiqui, machaisiqui, chashnacunahuan ama llutarincapac. Chashna runahuan, paihuan micuncapacllapash mana allichu.
¿Chicanmantacunata ñucachu taripasha? Cancunami cancunahuan tiyaccunata taripana canquichic yachihuan.
Chicanmantacunata saquichic Dios taripachun, ranti cancunaca, mana alli runata callpachichic cancuna ucumanta.

¿Cancunamanta maicanpash shuc huauquipacpi mana alli rai tucushcamanta rimana charishpa, Diosta mana ricsic apucunapacpi taripai tucuncapac allichu? ¿manachu ashtahuan Diospac runacunapacpi taripai tucuna alli can?
¿Shuc puncha tucui pacha runacunata cancuna taripana cashcata, manachu yachanquichic? Cai pachata taripana cashpallata, ¿cai uchilia juchashitucunatachu mana taripanata ushanquichic?
¿Quiquin angelcunallatatac ñucanchic taripana cashcata manachu yachanquichic? Shina cacpi, cai causaimanta llaquicunata cancunallami taripana canquichic.
Chashnamanta, cai causaipi piñanacuita charishpa, ¿allichu can cancuna iniccuna, mana iniccunapacpi taripai tucuna?
Cancunata pincachincapac caita rimani. ¿Cancunamanta manachu shucllapash tiyan, huauqui ucupi llaqui tiyacpi taripana ushancapac?
¡Mana huaquipura macanacuilla tiyan, ashtahuan Diosta mana ricsic apucunapacman taripai tucuncapac rinquichic!

Cancunapurallata macanacushca cancuna mana alli cashcata ricsichicun. Imatapash rurai tucushpa, ¿chunlla ñacarina manachu astahuan alli canman? Shuhuai tucushpapash chunlla saquirina, ¿manachu ashtahuan alli can?
Ranti cancuna, mana cuscata taripanquichic, quiquin huauquitapash shuhuanquichic.

Diosta chicnishpa causaccuna, Diospac pachapi mana yaicuna cashcata, ¿manachu yachanquichic? Ama umachi tucuichicchu, Diospac pachapi yumashpa juchalliccuna mana yaicu ushanunca mari; huacata chacchaccunapash, shucpac huarmihuan, shucpac carihuan causaccunapash, caripura yumariccunapash,
shuhuaccunapash, yanca llancachiccunapash, machaisiquicunapash, camisiquicunapash, umachishca shuhuaccunapash, mana yaicuna ushanuncachu.

Cancunamanta maicancuna chashna carcanquichic; ranti cuna, Apunchic Jesucristopac shutipi, Diospac Samaipac shutipi, juchamanta pichashca saquirircanquichic, sumacyachishca, Dios-huanpash ailluyachishca saquirircanquichic.

Cai rimai tiyan: "Ñuca munashcata rurana ushanimi". Shuti can chai, ranti mana tucuita ruranachu. Ari, ñuca mana huatara cashpa ñuca munashcata rurashallami, ranti mana imapash huatashca charihuana can.

Cai rimaipash tiyan: "Micuna huicsa juntachincapac can, huicsaca micunata chasquincapac". Chaica shutimi can; chashna cacllapita, chaicunata Dios huacllichinca ran. Ranti, ñucanchic aicha mana maipipash yumarincapac can; ñucanchic aicha Apunchicpac can, Apunchic ñucanchic aichapac can.
Dios Apunchicta huañushcamanta causachishca shina, ñucanchictapash paipac ushaihuan causachincami.
Cancunapac aicha Cristopac aicha cashcata, ¿manachu yachanquichic? Chai Cristopac aichata japishpa shuc nuspa huarmiman llutachincapac, ¿allichu canca? Mana allichu shuti.
Shuc runa, shuc nuspa huarmihuan llutarishpa shuc aichalla tucushcata, ¿manachu yachanquichic? Dios quillcashca shimipi riman: "Ishcantinmi shuclla runa shina tucunquichic".
Chashnaliata, maicanpash Apunchicman llutaricpi, samaipi shuclla paihuan tucun.
Yumashpa juchallinamanta chicapac anchurichic. Maican juchatapash shuc runa ruracpi, chai jucha canchapi saquirin, ranti yumashpa juchallic quiquin paipac aichata juchallichin.
Cancunapac aicha Dios cushca Samaipac huasi cashcata, ¿manachu yachanquichic? Cancuna mana quiquin aichapac amu canquichic,
rantishcami canquichic. Chairaicu Diosta jatunyachina canquichic cancunapac aichahuan.
Cancuna quillcapi tapushcata cutipani. Alli canman runa mana sahuarishpa;
ranti, huarmita munashpa ñacarinamanta, caran runa quiquin huarmita charicpi, alli tucun; caran huarmi quiquin carita charicpi, alli tucun.
Cari, huarmi sahuarishpa, sahuarishcacuna ruranata pactachina canun.
Huarmi mana paipac quiquin aichapac amu can, paipac caripac can; caripash mana paipac quiquin aichapac amu can, paipac huarmipac can.

Chairaicu, ama mitsanacuichicchu cancunapura; cancunapura ama tacarincapac rimarishpa, chaica cancuna ushanacama sasichic cai pachapi Dios-huan rimarincapac. Chai huasha cutillata ishcantin llutarina canquichic; yancamanta yapalla munanayacpi supai urmachinca.
Chaita munashpa ruraichic; shinapash mana rurai nishcachu can.
Ñuca jinuca munaiman cancuna ñuca shina cancapac; ranti Dios caran runaman chican yuyaicunata cushca, nicpi, caita shucta, paitaca shuc layata.
Mana sahuarishcacunata huacchacunatapash rimani, allimi can mana sahuarishpa causana, ñuca shina.
Shinapash sapalla mana causanata ushashpa, sahuarinuchun; sahuarinami ashtahuan alli huarmita munashpa ñacarishpa causana rantimanta.
Ranti sahuarishcacunata, cai rurai nishcata cuni, mana ñuca rimascachu, Apunchic rimashcami can: Huarmi carita ama jichuchun.
Jichushca cashpa, ama cuti sahuarichun, munashpaca paipac carillahuata alliyachun. Caripash chashnallata, huarmita mana jichuna can.

Shuccunataca rimanimi, caica ñuca shimimi can, mana Apunchic rimashca: Maican huauquipash Diosta mana inic huarmita charishpa, chai huarmi, shina cashpallata, paihuan causanata munacpi, ama jichuchun.
Chashnallata, shuc inic huarmi, mana inic carihuan sahuarishca cashpa, cuti chai runa, shina cashpallata paihuan causana munacpi, paita ama jichuchun.

Mana inic cari, paipac huarmi inishcamanta sumacyachishca tucun; mana inic huarmipash, inic carihuan llutarishca cashpa chicanyachishca saquirin. Mana chashna cacpi, cancunapac churicuna ticllayuc canunman; ranti allita rimacpi, paicunapash Diospac chicanyachishca canun.

Cunan ranti, mana inic cari, mana inic huarmi imapash, jichunacunata munashpa, jichunacunuchunlla. Shina tucucpi, huauqui cashpa, pani cashpa imapash quishpira saquirinun, Dios cancunata alli causaipi causancapac cayashcaraicu.
Rimacpica, ¿can huarmi, yachanquichu canpac carita quishpichina ushashcata? ¿Can, caripash, yachanquichu canpac huarmita quishpichina ushashcata?
Imashna cacpipash, caran runa Apunchic cushca cuyaicunapi causachun, ñucanchic Dios cayashca pachapi cashca shina. Tucui iniccunata cai rurai nishcata cuni.
Cara pitishca runata Dios cayacpi, pai cashcata ama pacachun chai runa; cara mana pitishca cayai tucushpa, carata ama pitirichun. Cara pitishca,
cara mana pitishca cana mana imananchu. Dios rimashcata pactachina shuti chaimi yapa imanan.
Dios cayashca pachapi cashca shina caranlla catichun.
Huatara cashcapi cayai tucushca cashpa, chaimanta ama yapa yuyarichun; shinapash, chashna cashcamanta llushpirinata ushashpa, utcapanqui.
Huatara cashcapi Apunchicta inincapac cayai tucushca runa, cunan quishpichishca, Apunchicpac runa can; chashnallata, quishpishca cashcapi cayai tucushca cashpa, cunanca Cristopi huatara can.
Cancuna Dios rahtishcami canquichic, chairaicu shuc runacunapacpi mana huatai tucuna canquichic.
Shina cacpi, huauquicuna, caranlla Diospac ñaupacpi catichun pai cayai tucushca puncha cashca shina.
Mana sahuarinamanta, mana imatapash Apunchic rimahuashcachu, ranti ñuca yuyaita cuni, ñuca shimita cancuna uyanata yachashpa, Apunchic ñucata llaquihuashcaraicu.
Ñuca yuyacpi shuc runa pai cunan cashca shina saquirina can, yapa llaqui pachapi cunan causacushcaraicu.
Huarmiyuc cashpa, paita ama jichuichu; huarmi illac cashpa, ama mashcaichu.
Sahuarishpa, mana juchata ruranqui; shuc malta huarmipash sahuarishpa, paipash mana juchallin. Ranti sahuariccuna cai pacha llaquita charinca ranun, ñuca munaiman chaicunata ama charinuchun.
Huauquicuna, caitami rimanayani: Mana unai caipi causanca ranchic. Chairaicu, sahuarishcacuna mana sahuarishca shina causana canquichic;
llaquirishcacuna, raimipi cashca shina tiyana canquichic; ranti raimicuccuna, llaquirishca shina tiyana canquichic; ranticcuna, impash mana cancunapac cacpi shina causana canquichic;
cai pachapi cushiyashpa causaccuna, mana chashna causacushca shina ricuchina canquichic, cai ñucanchic ricucushca pacha tucurina mari can.
Tucui ima llaquirinacunamanta cancunata quishpichinata munaiman. Huarmi illac runa Apunchicpacta ruranacunapi yuyarin, paita cushiyachinamanta yuyarin;
ranti huarmiyuc runa cai pacha imacunamanta yuyarin, paipac huarmita cushiyachinamanta yuyarin;

chashna cashpa chaupichishca can. Chashnallata, cari illac huarmi mana imura sahuaric huarmipash, Apunchicpac ruranacunapi yuyarin, paipac aicha paipac samaipash Diospac chicanyachishca cashpa; ranti cariyuc huarmi cai pachapi tiyac imacunamanta yuyarishpa causan, paipac carita cushiyachinamantapash.
Caita cancunapac allipac rimani, mana tictata churasha nishpa, cancuna allita causancapac, Apunchicta tucui shuncuhuan yanapashpa.
Maicanpash pai mañashca huarmihuan, sahuarina pacha huata pactarishcaraicu, sahuarinami can yuyashpa, chashnami ashtahuan alli can yuyashpa, sahuarichunlla; chai mana jucha can.
Cuti shuc, mana munashpa, pai quiquinmanta munashcata ruracushpa, paipac shuncupi mana sahuarincapac sinchita yuyarishpa, allita racun.
Shina, pai mañashca huarmihuan sahuarishpa, allita ran; ranti mana sahuarishpa, ashtahuan yapa allita ran.
Sahuarishca huarmi cariman huatashca, can pai causanacama; ranti cari huañucpi, chai, huarmi quishpira ¿saquirin pihuanpash sahuarina ushancapac, shinapash chai cari inic runa cana can.
Ñuca yuyacpi mana cuti sahuarishpami ashtahuan yalli cushi causanca yachihuan. Caimi ñucapac yuyai, Diospac Samaita ñucapash charinimi yachihuan.

Huacacunaman camari shina cushca micunamanta rimanca rani. Chai ña ricsishca can: tucuilla yachaita charinchic; shina cacpipash yachaihuan jatunyashca tucunchic, ranti llaquina Dios cushca samaipi jatunyachin.
Maicanpash pacta yachanimi yuyashpa, chaira mana yachan maipi quiquin yachai cashcata.
Ranti maicanpash Diosta llaquicpi, Dios paita ricsin.
Huacacunaman camari shina cushca aichamanta nicpi, ¿micunallachu? Huacacuna cai pachapi mana imapash alli cashcata yachanchic; shuclla Dios tiyashcatapash yachanchic.
Shuc dioscuna tiyashcamanta cai pachapi jahua pachapipash rimai tiyan chaimanta rimacpi achca dioscuna, achca apunchiccuna mana pishinchu.

Shina cacpipash, shuc Dioslla ñucanchicpac tiyan: pai can Yaya. Tucui cai pachapi tiyashca paimanta shamun, ñucanchicpash paipac causanchic. Shuclla Apunchicpash tiyan, Jesucristo; pairaicu tucui imapash tiyan, ñucanchicpash pairaicullata tiyanchic.

Shina cacpipash mana tucuilla caita yachanun. Maicancuna chaira huacata chacchanapi yacharishcacuna, chai huaicacunaman chicanyachishca aichami yuyashpa micunun; chai aichata micushpa, paipac ininapi mana rucuyashca cashpa huaca ticllayachishcami cani yuyan.
Mana ñucanchic micushcaraicuchu Diospi chasqui tucushun; micushcaraicu mana ashtahuan alli tucushunchu, mana micushcaraicupash mana ashtahuan huacllishunchu.
Shutipacha ñucanchic munashcata rurana ushanchic, ranti yuyapanquichic, chai cancuna "munashcata rurashca" sanpa inina chariccunata ama juchapi urmachichun.
Can chaicunata yachac cashpa, huaca chacchanapi tiyarishpa micucushcapi, shuc sanpa inina charic huauqui ricushpa, yancamanta paipash chai camari shina huacacunaman cushca aichata micunca imapash.
Chashna, can yachashcahuan sanpa inina charic canpac huauquita juchallichinqui, Cristoca pairaicupash huañushca mari.
Mana sinchi inina charic huauquicuna, mana alli rurashcata ricuchishpa, quiquin Cristota ñacachinquichic.
Chairaicu, ñuca micushcamanta ñuca huauquita juchallichishpa, aichata maican punchapash mana micucpi chari alli tucuhuanca, ama ñuca huauquita juchallichincapac.

Ñucapash, ¿ñuca munashcata rurana ushac cashcata manachu ricunquichic? ¿Ñucapash manachu apostol cani?, ¿manachu ñucapash Apunchic Jesusta ricurcani? ¿Manachu cancunallata ñuca Apunchicpacta llancashcaraicu inic canquichic?
Maicancuna mana apostolta shina imachari ricuhuanun; ranti cancuna quiquin apostolta ñucapi ricuna canquichic, cancuna Apunchicpi inishpa caticushca ñuca apostol cashcata ricsichicun.
Caimi piñaccunamah ñuca cutipashca shimi:
Micunata upianata ñucapash japina ushanimi;
shuc inic huarmitapash charina ushanimi, shuc apostolcuna, Apunchicpac huauquicuna Pedropash charishca shina.
¿Bernabehuan ñucallahuanchu iniccunata yanapashpa causana cahchic?

¿Maican soldadollapash paipac munaimanta paipac ushaillahuan macanuncapac rinchu? Tarpushca uva ña pucucpi, ¿mana micuc runa tiyanchu? Huacrata huiñachishpallata, ¿chucu yacuta mana upiac runa tiyanchu?
Chaica runa yuyaillami can ama yuyanquichicchu, Moisespash camachic quillcapi caimanta rimanmi.
Cashna quillcashca tiyan camachic quillcapi: "Muyuta cutac huacrata ama sincata huatanqui". Mana Dios huacracunamanta yuyarishcatachu riman;
ñucanchicmanta yuyarishcatami rimacun. Ñucanchicraicu camachic quillca quillcashca tiyan, allpata yapuccama muyuta cutaccamapash pallai puncha micunca racushcata, ¿mana chari yachanquichicchu?
Chairaicu, ñucanchic cancunapi allicunata tarpushca cashpa, mana yapalla quiilachishca yachin cancunamanta ansa micunashitu mañashca.

Shuccuna cancuna charishcamanta micushpa causaranucpi, ñucanchicta ashtahuan yalli cuyana canquichic. Shinapash mana mañashcanchicchu, tucuitami ñacarishcanchic Cristopac Cushi Shimita yachachishcapi ama llaqui jatarichun nishpa.

Cancuna yachanquichic ima shina Diospac huasipi llancaccuna, Diospac huasiman cushca camarimanta micushcata. Rimacpica, Diosman camarita rupachina altarpi llancaccuna, Diosman chaipi camari shina cushca huacra aichamanta micunun.
Chasnallata Apunchic munarca Cushi Shimita ricsichiccuna, chai Cushi Shimipi llancashcahuan causanuchun.

Ranti ñuca mana shuc cutillapash cui tucuna cashcata mañashcanichu, caitapash mana quillcanichu cancunata imallapash mañanaraicu. Ñaupacta huañuiman, chai jatunyanata mana pipash quichuhuancachu.
Diospac Cushi Shimita yachachishcahuan mana jatunyanichu, mana saquipac pactachinami can yuyani. Mana yuyarinayahuanchu mana yachachishcamanta imashna ñacarina cashcata.
Ñuca munaimanta rurashpa, cui tucunata ña japishcani; ranti, pactachinata piñarishpa rurashpapash, Dios ñucaman mincashcata pactachicuni.
Chairaicu, ñuca cui tucushca canmi Diospac Cushi Shimita cushiyashcahuan yachachina, mana shuc cullqui imatapash chapashpa; nicpi, ñuca Cushi Shimita yachachishcamanta cui tucunata mana japishpa.
Mana pipash huatashca charihuacpipash, shinapash tucuicunata yanapani, ñuca ushashca tupu runata Jesucristopacman pushana yuyaillahuan,
Judiocunata pushanaraicu, runa ucupi judio tucushcani; rimacpi, paicunia Moisespac camachic quillcata pactachic cacpi, ñucapash paicuna shina pactachircani, mana imaraicu pactachina cashpallata.
Moisespac camachic quillcata mana pactachiccunata pushanaraicu, paicuna causashca shinallata causani, allita rimacpi ñucaca Diospac Camachic quillcatami pactachini, Cristota catic cashpa.
Ansalla iniccuna ucupi cashpa, paicuna shina ansalla inic tucuni, paicunatapash pushanaraicu. Maipipash paicuna shina tucushcani, maicanllatapash quishpinaman pushashami yuyashpa.
Tucuitami Cristopac Cushi Shimiraicu rurani, ñucapash paita chasquina ushancapac.
Callpashpa pucllacushcapi tucuilla callpanun, ranti shuc runalla cuyashcata japin. Shina cacpi, cuyashcata japina yuyaihuan callpaichic.

Shuc pucllanapi yaicunca raccuna sasinun. Paicuna chaita ranun, manapash unaipi chaquiric pancamanta llaututa japinaraiculla; ranti ñucanchic shuc mana chaquiric llaututa chasquinaraicu ñacarinchic.
Chairaicu ñuca ricushpa callpani; huairapi mana huactanichu;
chaipac rantimanta, ñuca aichata ñacachinimi, ñuca munashcata pai ruran, ama shuccunata yachachishca huasha ñucallata huashaman jichurishca saquirincapac.
Huauquicuna, tucui ñucanchic rucu yayacuna chai puyu llantupi purishcata paicuna ñucñu yacuta chinpashcatapash, cancuna cuncarincapac mana munanichu.
Chashna tucui paicuna Moiseshuan llutarishca saquirinurca puyupi, ñucñu yacupi bautisai tucushcamanta.
Chashnallata tucui paicuna chai Dios cuyashca micunallatata micunurca,
tucuiila chai Dios cuyashca upianamantallata upianurca. Paicunahuan puricuc rumimanta upianurca, chai rumi Cristo carca.
Chashna cacllapita, paicunamanta achca runa Diospac ñaupacpi mana alli canurca, chairaicu chaicuna chunlla allpapi huañushpa jichurinurca.
Paicuna tucushca ñucanchic ricuncapac tucurca, paicuna mana allita munashca shina ñucanchic ama munancapac.

Chairaicu, ama huacacunata chacchaichicchu, paicunamanta maicancuna rurashca shina; chashna rurashcamanta Dios quillcashca shimipi nin: "Runacuna micuncapac, upiancapac tiyarinurca, chai huasha tushuncapac shayarinurca".
Yumashpa juchallinata saquichic, paicunamanta maicancuna juchallishca shina, chashnamanta shuc punchallapi ishcai chunca quimsa huaranca huañunurca,
Cristota camanata ama yuyashunchic, paicunamanta maicancuna rurashca shina; chashnamanta machacui canishca huañunurca.
Diosta ama camichicchu, paicunamanta maicancuna camishca shina; chashnamanta Diospac angel paicunata huañuchirca.
Tucui caicuna ñucanchic rucucunapi tucurca; ñucanchiraicu Dios quillcashca shimipi quillcara saquirirca, cai puchucai pachapi causaccuna atipashpa causana cashcata yuyachincapac.
Chashnamanta, sinchimi cani yuyac runa, urmanata yuyanqui.

Cancunapac llaquicuna runa ñacari ushana tupulla canushca. Cancuna Diosmanta chapana canquichic, runa ñacari ushana tupulla llaquicunata charincapac. Shina cacpipash, cancuna llaqui charishcapi Diosmi sinchicuchinca ama urmancapac.
Chairaicu, yapa llaquishca huauquicuna, huacacuna chacchanamanta anchurichic.
Yuyayuc runacunatami rimani, chairaicu cancunallata ñuca rimashcata taripana ushanquichic.

Bendisiashca vinota upiashcapi, chaimanta Diosta pacrachunchic; chashnapi Cristohuan shuclla tucunchic paipac yahuarpi; ñucanchic paquishca tantamanta micushpa, Cristohuan shuclla tucunchic paipac aichapi.
Achca cashpapash, shuc tantamantallata tucui micunchic, chairaicumi shuclla aicha canchic.
Israel runacunata ricuichic: camari shina cushca aichamanta micuccuna, paicuna camari shina ricuchishcahuan shuclla tucunun.
Chaihuan mana rimanichu shuc huaca allimi nishpa, camari shina cushca aicha shuc aichacunamanta yalli allimi nishpa.
Caitami ñuca rimani: Diosta mana ricsiccuna shuc camarita ricuchishpa, supaicunaman ricuchiranun, Diosta mana. Supaicunahuan cancuna llutarincapac ñuca mana munani.
Apunchicpac vinomanta, chaillapita supaipacmantapash mana upiaipacchu. Apunchicpac micunamanta, chaillapita supaipamantapash mana micuipacchu.
¿Apunchitacchu tunpachisha yuyanquichic? ¿Paimanta yalli sinchichu canchic imata?
Cai rimai tiyan: "Ñuca munashcata rurana ushanillami". Chai shuti can, ranti mana tucui alli can. Ñucanchic imata rurana ushacpipash, mana tucui Dios cuyashca sinchicuncapac yanapan.
Mana ñucanchipac allillata mashcana canchic, ashtahuan shuccunapac allita mashcana canchic.
Rantichishca aichata micuichiclla ama imatapash tapushpa, shuccuna imatapash yuyarinamanta;
tucui cai pacha paipi tiyashcacunantin Apunchicpac mari can.
Shuc mana inic runa micuncapac canta cayacpi, can chaiman rishpa, paicuna churashcata micuilla mana imatapash tapushpa, paicuna imatapash yuyanamanta.
Cunan cuti, maicanpash: "Cai aicha camari aichami" rimacpi, ama micuichicchu rimashcata uyashcaraicu, pai imatapash yuyarinamanta.

Shuc runa paipac ucupi charishca Diospac yachaimanta rimacuni, cancunapacmantaca mana. Ranti pipash tapunca imapashmi: ¿Ñuca munashcata rurashcamanta, shuc runapac Dios cushca yachaichu taripahuanca?
¿Micushcamanta Diosta pacrachucllapita camihuanuncachu?
Shina cacpi, micushpa, upiashpa, imatapash rurashpa, tucuita Diosta jatunyachincapac ruranquichic.
Ama pitapash yachachichicchu mana alli rurashcacunata: judio cacpi, mana judio cacpi, Diosta iniccuna cacpi imapash.
Ñuca ranti, tucuicunata ñuca rurashcahuan tucuipi paicunata cushiyachini; mana ñucapac allillata mashcashpa, ashtahuan shuccunapactami mashcani, paicunapash quishpinata charinuchun nishpa.
Ñuca shina causaichic, ñuca Cristota catishca shina
Tucui pachapi ñucamanta yuyarishcaraicu, ñuca yachachishca shina cancuna caticushcaraicu, yapa cushiyani.
Ranti munanimi Cristo caran runapac uma cashcata cancuna atipancapac, caripash paipac huarmipac uma cashcata atipancapac, Dios Cristopac uma cashca shina.
Shuc cari runa Dios-huan rimaricushcapi, Diospac Cushi Shimita imapash yachachicushcapi umata quillparishpa, paipac uma cacta pincachin.
Ranti, shuc huarmi Dios-huan rimaricushcapi, Diospac Cushi Shimita imapash yachachicushcapi, umata mana quillparishpa, paipac uma cacta pincachin; acchata illacta pitirishca shina can.
Shuc huarmi umata mana quillparinayashpa, ashtahuan acchata illacta pitirichun. Ranti shuc huarmi accha pitirinata pincashpa, umata quillparichun.
Shuc cari runa umata mana quillparinachu, Diospac ricchai cashcaraicu, Dios jatun cashcata ricsichicun. Ranti huarmica cari jatunyashcata ricsichicun,
carica mana huarmimanta rurai tucurca, huarmi shuti carimanta surcui tucurca.
Cari mana huarmiraicu tiyan, ranti huarmi shuti cariraicu tiyan.
Chairaicullata, angelcunaraicupash, huarmi shucta uyac cashcata ricuchic unanchata paipac umapi charina can.
Chashna cashpapash, cai pacha causaipi, huarmi illacpi cari mana tiyan, huarmipash cari illacpi mana tiyan.
Huarmi carimanta surcui tucushca cacpipash, cari huarmimanta pacarin, chashnallata ishcantincuna Diosmanta shamunun.
Cancunallata taripaichic, ¿shuc huarmi mana umata quillparishpa Dios-huan rimaricpi allichu canca?
Ñucanchic causaillapita ricunchic, ima shina shuc cari runa suni acchata huiñachina yapa pincaipac cashcata;
ranti shuc suni acchayuc huarmi sumac ricurin, paipac uma sumac quillpara saquirin.
Ima shina cacpipash, pipash caimanta rimarinata munashpa, ñucanchic mana shuc yachaita charishcata, iniccuna mana shuc yachaicunata charishcata yachana can.
Cunan caita quillcacushpa, mana cushiyashcahuanchu rurani, cancunapac tantarinacuna alli rurana rantimanta, cancunata huacllichicun.
Caita uyashcani, callarishun: Diosta chacchancapac tantarishcapi, chausirishca cancunapi ricurin; shutimi yuyani ñuca chaica.
¡Cancuna ucupi chicanyashca tiyana can, chaipimi maicanlla quiquin cristiano cashca ricsi tucunca!
Chashna chausirishca cashcaraicu, cancunapac tantarina ña mana Apunchicpac quiquin micuna can.
Ña micuna pacha pactashcapi, caranlla pai apamushca micunata japishpa micunun; maicancuna yaricai tiyacllapita, shuccunaca machanun.

¿Upiana huasi, micuna huasi cancunapacpi manachu tiyan? ¿Iniccunata millashcahuan ricuncapac allichu? ¿Tsuntsucunata pincachincapac allichu? ¿Ñuca rimanca rashcata yachanquichicchu? ¿Cushiyashachu? ¡Manapacha allichu chaica!
Caitami Apunchicmanta yacharcani: Apunchic Jesus pai japi tucunca rashca tutallata, paipac maquipi tantata japirca;
Diosta pacrachushca, huasha, paquishpa rimarca: "Caimi ñuca aicha, cancunapac allipac huañuchincapac cushca. Ñucata yuyarishpa caita niraichic".
Chashnallata, micushca huasha, paipac maquipi calista japishpa, nirca: "Cai calis mushu curishca shimi can ñuca yahuarhuan pactachishca. Caran upiashcapi, ñucata yuyarishpa caita ruraichic".
Chairaicu, Apunchic shamunacama, caran cai tantamanta micushcapi, caran cai calista upiashcapi, Apunchic huañushcata huillanquichic.
Chasnamanta, maicanpash chai tantamanta micushcapi, chai vinomanta upiashcapi, mana chuya shuncuyuc cashpa, Apunchicpac aichapi yahuarpi jatun juchata ruran.
Chairaicumanta, chai tantamanta chaira mana micushcapi, chai vinomanta chaira mana upiashcapi, caranlla ñaupacta ucupi tiyac Dios cushca yachaita ricuna canchic.
Micushpa upiashpa Apunchicpac aicha cashcata mana atipashpa, pai quiquinllata ñacarincapac micun, upian.
Chairaicu cancunamanta achca uncuc, sanpa tiyanun, maicancunaca huañunushca.
Ñucanchicllata allita tariparicpi, Apunchic ñucanchicta mana ñacachinmanchu;
shinapash ñucanchic yachancapac, ama ñucanchic huiñaipac ñacarinaman cai pachamantacunahuan richun nishpami, Apunchic ñucanchicta ñacachin.
Chairaicu huauquicuna, micuncapac tantarishcapi, chapanacuichic.
Maicanpash yaricai cashpa, paipac huasipi micuchun, ama chashna tantarinamanta Diospacpi ñacachi tucuncapac. Shuc imacunamantapash cancunata ricuncapac rishpami allichisha.
Huauquicuna, caita Dios cuyashcacunamanta cancunata yuyachini:
Cancuna chaira Diosta mana inic cashcapi cancunapac mana shimiyuc huacacunata ñausa shina catirayarcanquichic.
Ranti, cunan mana cashnachu Diospac Samaihuan. Diospac Samaihuan puric mana rimancachu: "Jesusta mana munanichu" nishpa, mana Diospac Samai paita rimachicpi.
Shuc runa caran laya Dios cuyashcata charincami, chashnapash shuc Samaillata chaita cuyacun.
Caran laya yanapana tiyan, shinapash tucui shuc Apunchicllata mincashca can.
Caran laya rurana ushaicuna tiyanun, ranti shuc Diosllata tucuita tucuicunapi ruran.
Caran runaman Dios cuyan paipac: Samaipac ushaita, chai runa shuccunata yanapancapac.
Maican runacunata Diospac Samai alli yuyaicunata rimachin; shuccunata, chai Samaillata Diospi pacara yachaicunata ricsichin.
Shuccuna, inina chasquinun chai Samaimantallata, ranti shuccunaca uncuccunata janpina ushaita chasquinun.

Shuccuna mancharicushiyanacunata rurana ushaita chasquinun, shuccunaca Diosmanta shamuc shimicunata yachachina ushaita chasquinun. Maicancuna, alli Samai, mana aili samai cashcata ricsina ushaita chasquinun; shuccunaca caran laya shimi rimana ushaita chasquinun; cuti shuccunaca chasquinun chai shimicunapi rimashcata atipachina ushaita.
Tucui chaicuna shuc Samaimantallata shamun, paimi caran runaman pai munashcata cuyan.
Shuc runa, paipac aichapi achca uchilla aichacunata charishpallata, shuclla aicha can. Chashnallata Cristo.

Tucui ñucanchic judio cashpa, griego cashpa, huatara cashpa, quishpira cashpa, shuc Samaillapita bautisai tucurcanchic shuc aichalla tucuncapac; chairapash tucuilla chai Samaimantallata upiachi tucurcanchic.
Runa mana shuc aichalla can, achca uchilla aichacunata charin.
Chairaicu, chaqui mashnapash mana maquichu cani, mana aichamantachu cani nishpa rimacpipash, aichamanta mana chican can.
Rinripash, mashna mana ñahuichu cani, chairaicu; mana aichamantachu cani nishpa rimacpipash, aichamanta mana chican can.
Tucui aicha ñahuilla cacpi, mana uyana ushanchicman. Tucui aicha rinrilla cacpi, mana mutquina ushanchicman.
Ranti Dios caran uchilla aichata pai allimi yuyashcapi churarca.
Shuc uchilla aichalla cacpi, runa mana tiyanman.
Allita yuyaricpi, achca uchilla aichacunata charishpallata, shuclla aicha canchic.
Ñahui, maquita "canta mana mutsunichu" mana rimana ushan; umapash, chaquicunata "cancunata mana mutsunichu" mana rimana ushan.
Rimacpi, ashtahuan yanca aichashitucuna ricuric, yalli mutsushca canun;
mana yapa mutsushca aichacunata, yapa sumacta churachinchic. Ranti pincaipac ricuric aichacunataca allita quillpanchic,
alli ricuriccunata mana quillpanchic. Ñucanchic aichamanta ashtahuan mana alli ricuriccunata, Dios jatunyachishca cancapac munashca;
chashna rurarca ñucanchic aicha ucupi ama chausirina tiyancapac, ashtahuan tucui uchilla aichapura ricurinuchun munarca.
Shuc uchilla aicha ñacaricpi, tucui shuccunapash ñacarinun; chashnallata, shuc uchilla aicha cuyai tucucpi, tucuilla cushiyanun.
Shina cacpi, cancuna Cristopac aicha canquichic, caran runa chai aichamanta uchilla aichami canquichic.

Dios munarca iniccuna ucupi apostolcuna ñaupac tiyancapac; chai huasha profetacuna; chai huasha yachachiccuna; chai huasha mancharicushiyanacunata ruraccuna, uncuccunata janpiccuna, yanapaccuna, pushaccamacunapash, chican shimicunata rimaccunapash tiyachun munarca.
Mana tucui apostol canun; mana tucui profeta canun. Mana tucuilla yachachic canun, mana tucuilla mancharicushiyanacunata rurac canun,
mana tucui uncuccunata janpina ushaita charinun. Mana tucuilla caran laya shimita rimac canun, mana tucui chai shimicunapi rimashcata atipachina ushaita charinun.
Chashna cacpi, tucuimanta ashtahuan alli Dios cuyashcacunata chasquina yuyaita cancuna charina canquichic. Ñucami cancunata ashtahuan alli ñanpita ricsichincapac racuni.
Tucui cai pachapi tiyac shimicunata rimashami, angelcunapac shimitapash rimashami, ranti mana llaquinata charishpa, antamanta campana tacacpi uyarishca shinallami casha.

Dios rimashcata runacunaman ricsichishami, paipac ucupi pacashca tiyashcacunatapash ricsishami, tucui imacunatapash yachashami, achca inina charishpa urcucunata cuyuchishami, ranti llaquinata mana charishpa, yancami casha.
Tsuntsucunaman tucui ñuca charishcata cuyashami, ñuca aichatapash rupachi tucuncapac cushami, chashnapash mana llaquinata charishpa, yanca rurashcallami canca.

Llaquinata charishca can llaqui tiyashcapi cushi canami; yapa alli shuncuyuc canami can; chiquicuita mana charinami can; mana yapa ushayucmi cani yuyanami can, mana jatunyanami can, mana pincai illac canami can, mana amupacllata yuyaric canami can; mana piñarinami can, chai piñarita mana huiñaipac huacaichinami can;
alli ruranamanta cushiyanami can; mana alli ruranamanta, mana.
Caimi llaquinata charishca can: Tucuimanta ñacarina, ima llaquipash tiyashcapi cushi cana, tucuita inina, tucuita chapana,
Llaquina maican punchapash mana chincarincachu. Profeta cana shuc puncha saquinuncami, cai pachapi tiyac shimicunapi ña mana rimanuncachu, pacashca yachaicunata ña mana mutsushunchicchu.
Pacashca yachaicuna, inina punchayachic shimicuna mana pactachishca mari canun,
pactachishca shamucpi, paicuna chincarinuncami.
Huahua cashpa, huahua shina yuyarircani, rimarcani, tariparcani; ranti rucuyashcapi, huashaman jichurihuarca tucui huahua shina cana.

Cunan, shuc rirpupi shina mana pasacta ricunchic; ranti shuc puncha ima shina cashcata pasacta ricushun. Cunan ñuca ricsishca mana pactachishca can, ranti shuc puncha ricsishami Dios ñucata ricsihuashca shina.
Cunan charinchic inina, chapana, llaquina; quimsa canun; shinapash cai quimsacunamanta "llaquina" ashtahuan yalli alli can.
Cancunapura llaquinacunata yuyarichic, chashnallata Dios cuyashcacunata tarinata yapa yuyarina canquichic, Dios ricsichishcacunata yachachina cuyaita ashtahuan yapa mashcaichic.
Chican shimita rimac runa, mana runacunata rimacun paita mana pipash atipashcaraicu, Diosta rimacun. Pai rimashca Diospac Samaimanta shamun, chaita mana pipash yachan.
Ranti, Dios rimachishcata yachachic, ininapi runacunata huiñachichicun, sinchicuchishcahuan, camachishcahuan.
Chican shimipi rimac runa, paillata ininapi huiñacun; ranti Dios rimachishcata yachachic runa, iniccunata huiñachicun.

Ñuca munaiman tucui cancuna chican shimipi rimana ushac cancapac; ranti ashtahuan yalli allimi canman tucui cancuna Dios rimachishcata shuccunata yachachiha; chaimi chican shimipi rimanamanta ashtahuan alli can; pai chican shimipi rimashcata atipaipac shimiman chinpachicpi alli can, iniccunata ininapi huiñashpa catincapac.

Chairaicu huauquicuna, ñuca cancunata ricucrishpa chican shimipi rimacpi, yanca ricucrishcalla saquirin; Dios ñucanchicmanta munashcata mana rimacpi, mana ima yachachinata cancunapi saquicpi, mana Dios rimachishcata yachachicpi, ima shina catina cashcata mana yachachicpi, yanca can.
Chashnallata, shuc pincullu, shuc huancar, mana caranlla chican uyarinata charic cashpa, mana yachai canman maican uyaricushcata.
Shuc macanacuipi, trompeta nishca pai rimanayashcata mana pasacta uyachicpi, mana pipash macarincapac shayarinmanchu.
Chashnallata cancunapipash tucun: cancuna mana atipaipac shimicunata rimacpi, mana pipash yachancachu imata rimanayashcata. ¡Chashnapi huairatami rimacunquichic!
Cai pachapi achca rimaicuna tiyanun, caran runa paipac quiquin rimaipi uyan.
Ranti shuc runa ñuca mana yachashca shimipi rimahuacpi, chai runapac chican cani ñuca, paipash chashnallata chican ñucapac.
Chairaicu cancuna, Dios cuyashcacunata yapa munacunquichic, achcata tupaichic ninimi, shinapash tarinami canquichic Diosta iniccunata ininapi sinchicuchiccunata.
Chairaicullata, chican shimipi rimac runa Diosta mañachun, pai rimashcata tucuicunata atipachina ushancapac.
Chican shimipi ñuca Dios-huan rimaricushcapi, ñuca samaihuan Dios-huan rimaricuni, ranti ñuca yuyai chican saquirin.
¿Chashnapi imatami rurasha? Dios-huan rimaricushcapi, Dios cushca samaihuan rimarina cani, shinallata ñuca yuyaihuanpash. Ñuca samaihuan taquina tucuni, shinallata ñuca yuyaihuanpash.
Canpac samaillahuan can Diosta chacchacushcapi, shuc mana alli atipac runa uyacushpa, Diosta mana canhuan pacrachunata ushan, can rimashcata mana atipashcaraicu.
Can Diosta pacrachucushca yapa allimi canca, ranti chaishucta ininapi huiñachichincapac mana yanapancachu.

Diosta pacrachunimi chican rimaicunata tucui cancunamanta yalli rimac cashcaraicu; ranti Diospac huasipi atipaipac shimicuna pichcallatami rimasha, chashnami runacunata yachachina ushasha chunca huaranca chican shimihuan rimashcamanta yalli.
Huauquicuna, huahua shina yuyanata jichuichic. Mana alli ruranapi shuti huahua shina caichic; ranti cancuna yuyarinapi rucu caichic.
Dios quillcashca shimipi quillcara tiyan: "Cai runacunata chican shimicunapimi rimasha, shinapash mana uyahuanuncachu, Apunchic riman".
Shina cacpi, chican shimipi rimana mana inina munaccunapac cari; iniccuriapac, mana. Ranti Dios rimachishcata ricsichina iniccunapac can; mana iniccunapac, mana

Iniccuna tantarishcapi tucuicuna chican shimipi rimacucpi, shuc mana alli atipac, mana inic runa imapash yaicushpa, tucuillami nuspa tucushpa juntaranquichic yuyanca. Ranti, tucuilla Dios rimachishcamanta rimaricushcapi, shuc mana inina munac runa, mana alli atipac runa imapash yaicushpai, pai juchayuc cashcata ricsirincami; chaipimi paillata tariparinca tucuicuna rimacushcata uyashpa.
Chashnami paipac shuncu ucupi pacashcacuna tucuipac ñaupacpi ricurinca, paica cuncurishpa Diosta chacchahca; chaipi shuti pai allipacha yachanca Dios jinu cancuriahuan tiyacushcata.

Tucui ñaupa rimashcamanta cai tiyan: Cancuna tantarishcapi, maicancuna Diosman taquina ushan; shuccuna yachachinuchun Dios caranman rimashcata ricsichishpa; mana cacpi chican shimipi rimashpa imapash, mana cacpi chai chican shimipi rimashcata atipachishpa imapash; shinapash tucui chai tucuicunapac allipac cachun:
Chican shimipi rimana tiyacpi, ishcai, quimsa runalla rimanuchun shuc shuc; chairapash, shuc runa chai chican shimipi rimashcata yachashca shimiman chinpachina can.
Iniccunamanta mana pipash chican shimipi rimashcata chinpachina ushac tiyacpi, chican shimipi rimanata saquinuchun, chaipac rantimanta caran runa ucupi yuyarichun, Dios-huanpash rimarichun.
Chashnallata Dios rimachishcata huillaccunapash ishcai, quimsalla rimanuchuri shuc shuc shuccunaca yuyarinuchun rimashcamanta.
Ranti shuc chaillapita tiyacuc runata Dios rimachicpi, rimacuc runa upallayachun.
Chashnami tucuilla shuc shuc; Dios paiman rimashcata ricsichinata ushan, tucuilla yachashpa ñaupacman catina ushancapac.
Dios ricsichishcata yachachiccuna paicunallata allita ricsichishpa catinuchun,
Dios alli causaipac Dios cashcaraicu, mana pantachinayac. Diospac ranacunapac yachaita catishpa,
tantarinacunapi huarmicuna chunlla tiyana canun, paicuna mana shuc shimi rimana nishcaraicu. Dios quillcashca shimipi rimashca shina, cari rimashcallata pactachina canun.
Imtapash yachana munashpa, carita huasipi tapuna canquichic, shuc huarmi tantarinapi rimana mana aili cashcaraicu.
Diospac Cushi Shimi mana cancunapacpi callarishcata. mana cuncarina canquichic, mana cancunallachu chaita chasquircanquichic.
Maicanpash profeta cani yuyashpa imapash, mana cacpi, Diospac Samaimanta yachaita chasquishcata yuyashpa imapash, cai ñuca quillcacushca Apunchic rurainishca cashcata yachanca.
Pai mana yachana munacpi, paimi yachan!
Shina cacpi, huauquicuna, Dios rimachishcata huillana yuyaita yapa charichic, chican shimipi rimanata ama jarcaichicchu;
ima shina cacpipash, tucuita chuya shuncuhuan, cuscata ruraichic.
Huauquicuna, cunan cancunata yuyachini Diospac Cushi Shimita cancunaman ñuca yachachishcamanta. Paita chasquishca huashami, cunan cancuna sinchicushpa chaipi caticunquichic.
Chai Cushi Shimiraicu cancuna quishpichishca canquichic, cancuna sinchicushpa chaita catishpa; mana sinchicushpa, yancamanta inishcanquichic.
Ñaupac ñuca chasquishcata cancunaman yachachircani. Ñucanchic jucharaicu Cristo huañushcata yachachircani, Dios quillcashca shimipi rimashca shina;
paita panpanurca; quimsa puncha huasha Dios quillcashca shimipi rimashca shina causarirca;
causarimushpa Pedroman ricurirca, chai huasha chunca ishcai apostolcunaman.
Huasha; pichca pacha yalli runacuna tantarishcapi tucuicunaman ricurirca, achca paicunamanta chaira causaranun, ranti maicancunaca huañunuscha.
Huasha manapash unaipi Santiagoman ricurirca, chai huasha tucui yachachishcacunaman,
Puchucaipi, ñucatapash ricurihuarca, ñuca chaira huachana mana pactarishcapi pacarishca huahua cani.
Tucui apostolcunamanta quipami cani, mana ailichu ñuca apostol rimai tucuncapac, iniccunata piñashpa japic mari carcani.

Ranti Dios ñucahuan alli cashcaraicu cunan ñuca cashca cani; Dios ñucata mana yancalla llaquihuashcachu. Rimacpi, tucui paicunamanta yalli rurashcani; mana ñucachu rurashcani, Diosmi, pai ñucata llaquishpa yanapahuasticai.
Allita rimacpi, ñuca paicunapash chai Cushi Shimillatata rimanchic, cancunaca ñucanchic rimashcata inishcanquichic.
Cunan ricushun, Cristo huañushcamanta causarimushcata ñucanchic yachachinchic; shina cacllapita, cancunamanta maicancuna huañushcacuna mana causarinunchu rimanquichic.
Huañushcacuna causarina mana tiyacpi Cristopash mana causarishcachu;
Cristo mana causarishca cacpi, ñucanchic yachachicushca yanca can, cancuna inishcapash mana imapac alli can.

Chashna cashpa, ñucanchic Diosmanta llulla ricuyac canchicman, rimarcanchic mari Dios Cristota huañushcamanta causachishcata; yachacpica mana causachishca, huañushcacuna mana causarina shuti cacpi.
Huañushcacuna mana causarina cashcacpi, Cristopash mana causarishcachu;
Cristo huañushcamanta mana causarishcapi, cancuna inishca yanca can: chaira juchapi causacunquichic.
Chashna cacpi, Cristota inishpa huañushcacunapash chicapacmi chincarinushca.
Cai causaillapi. Cristota chapashpa, tucuicunamanta yalli llaquipac runami canchic.
Ranti shuti pachami Cristo huañushcamanta causarimushca. Paimi ñaupac pucucpi pallashca muyu shina can: huañushcamanta causarinapi tucuicunata ñauparca.
Shuc runaraicu cai pachaman huañui pactamushca shina, chashnallata shuc runaraicu huañushcamanta causarina pactamurca.
Adanpi tucui huañushca shina, chashnallata Cristopi tucuicuna causaita charinunca.
Shinapash caranlla paipac pacha pactashcapi: Cristo tucuimanta ñaupac; huasha, Cristo ticramucpi; paita caticcuna.
Tucurina chaipi shamunca, Cristo apucunata ushaicunatapash yallishpa, Dios Yayaman cai pachata cuna puncha.
Cristo amu causana can tucui paita chicniccuna paipac chaqui ucupi urmanacama;
puchacaipi paita chicnic huañuimi yalli tucuncami.

Dios tucui imacunata paipac chaqui ucupi churashcaraicu. Shinapash chaqui ucupi churashca saquirishcami rimashcapi, Diosllata mana chaqui ucupi saquirircachu, ashtahuan paimi tucui imacunata Cristopac chaqui ucupi churashca.
Ña tucui Cristopac chaqui ucupi churashca cacpi, chaipi Cristollata, pai Churi cashpa, Diosman curinca. Chashnami Dios tucuicunapi tucui canca.
Mana chashna cacpi, huañushcacunaraicu bautisariccuna yancamantami ruranunman. Huañushcacuna mana causaricpi, ¿allichu canca paicunaraicu bautisarina?
¿Allichu ñucanchic caran pachapi huañunalla mayanpi causana?
Ari, huauquicuna, caran puncha ñucapash huañuñalla causani. Cai shutimi can, Apunchic Jesucristopi cancuna inishcaraicu ñuca cushiyashca shina.
Efesopi pumacunahuan macarishcanimi, ¿chaimanta imallapash japishcanichu? Huañushcacuna mana causarina tiyacpi, ¿imanata maicancuna rimanun: "Micushunlla, upiashunlla, cayaman huañunami canchic"?
Ama umachi tucuichichu. Caita maicancuna rimanun: "Mana alli mashicuna alli yachaicunata huacllichinun"
Alli yuyaihuan causanaman ticrashpa, ña ama juchallichicchu, cancunamanta maicancuna Diosta mana ricsinquichic mari. Caita rimanimi cancunata pincachinaraicu.
Maicanpash tapunquichicmi: ¿Ima shina huañushcacuna causarinunca? ¿Ima shina aichahuan jatarinunca?
Yuyai illac canqui chashna tapuncapac. Can tarpucpi, muyu huañuna can yurashitu causaita charina ushancapac.
Tarpushcapi, mana huiñana yurata satinchic, muyutami tarpunchic, trigo muyu cacpi, ima muyutapash.
Chai huasha Dios pai munashca stiina ricuricta ran, caran muyunanta quiquin yurata surcun.
Mana tucui aicha chaipuralla canun; runapac aicha shuc can, huacracunapac shuc, pishcucunapac shuc, yacu aichacunapac shuc.

Chashnallata, jahua pachapi cuillurcuna tiyanun, chai pactiapi aichacuna tiyanun; ranti cuillurcuna paicunapac quiquin sumac ricurishcata charinun, caimanta aichacunapash quiquin paicunapac sumac ricurishcata charinun.
Inti llinpiyashca, quilla llinpiyashcamanta cuillurcuna llinpiyashcamantapash chican can; paicuna cuillurpura llinpiyashcapash caranpac chican can.
Huañushcacuna causarinapi chashnallata tucun. Ismunata panpahchic; ranti mana ismuna causarimun.
Panpashcapi millaipac can; causarimushcapi jatunyachishca can. Panpashcapi sanpa can; causarimushcapi sinchi can.
Huañuc aicha panpai tucun; huañushcamanta causarishcapi huiñaipac samaiyuc can. Shuc aichayuclla aicha tiyacpipash, shuc samaiyuc aichapash tiyan.
Dios quillcashca shimipi cashna riman: "Tucuimanta ñaupac runa, Adan stiutiyuc, causaiyuc aicha carca"; ranti puchucai Adan, causachie samai can.
Shinapash, samai mana ñaupacchu can, aichami ñaupac can, chai huashami samai can.
Ñaupac runa, allpamanta rurashca cashpa, cai pachamanta can; ranti quipa runa jahua pachamanta can.
Tucui cai pachamanta runa, chai allpamanta rurashca runa shina canun; ranti jahua pachamantacuna, chai jahua pachamanta runa shina canun.
Cunan allpamanta rurashca runa shina ricuric canchic, chashnallatami huasha jahua pachamanta runaman ricurishun
Caita rimani, huauquicuna, jahua pachapi mana yaicuna ushancachu aichamanta tullumanta cashca; chashnallata ismunaca mana ismuc mana tucuncachu.
Cai pacara shimita yachanuchun munani: Mana tucui huañushunchu, ranti ña pacha pactarishcapi, tucuillami

shuc laya tucushunchic, ñahui pin rashcapi, huama puru puchucai uyarishcapi. Huama puru uyarincami, huañushcacunaca mana cuti huañuncapac causachishcami canunca. Ñucanchicca shuc laya tucushcami saquirishun.
Ñucanchicpac ismuc aicha ña mana ismuc tucunca; ñucanchicpac huañuc aicha ña mana huañuc tucunca.
Ñucanchic ismuc aicha ña mana ismuc tucushcapi, ñucanchic huañuc aicha ña mana huañuc tucushcapi, chaipimi Dios quillcashca shimipi rimashca pactarinca:
"Chicapac huañui yallishca saquirinca". "¿Huañui, can yallishca tiyanchu? ¿Huañui, canpac tucsina maipita can?".
Huañuipac tucsina juchami can, camachic quillcami juchaman ushaita curca.
Chairaicu Diosta pacrachushun, paimi Apunchic Jesucristopi ñucanchicman yallinata cun.
Chashnamanta, huauquicuna, ama sanpayashpa sinchicuichic, tucui pachapi Diospac ruranapi llancaichic; cancuna yachanquichic Apunchic-huan pacta rurashca mana yanca llancashca tucun.
Inic huauquicunata yanapancapac cullquita pallanamanta nicpi, Galaciamanta iniccunaman ñuca rimashcata cancunapash pactachichic.
Domingo punchacunapi, cancuna huacaichina ushashcata caranlla chicanman churaichic, ama ñuca pactashcapi cullquita pallacuncapac.
Ñuca pactashpa, cancuna acllashca runacunatami Jerusalenman quillcahuan cachasha, chaipi tiyac huauquicunapacman cancuna pallashca cullquita apashpa rinuchun.
Ñucapash rina tucucpi, ñucahuanmi paicuna rinunca.
Ñuca ricpica Macedoniata rina cani; Macedoniata rishca huasha, Corintopimi pactasha.
Unainayata imapash cancunahuan saquirishami, mana cacpi tucui tamia pacha imapash quiparishami; chaimanta maimapash rina cacpi, cancuna yanapana ushahuanquichic.
Mana ricushpalla rinayanichu, Apunchic munacpi, ashtahuan cancunahuan unainayata saquirishami yuyani;
ranti Pentecostes punchacama Efesopimi saquirisha,
chaipimi Apunchicpacta alli llancana tiyanca rahuan, achcata rurasha yuyani, ñucata chicniccuna achca juntaracpipash.
Timoteo cancunaman pactacpi, ama chicanlla ricunquichichu, paipash ñuca shinallata Apunchicpac ruranapi llancacushcata yuyarichic.
Shina cacpi, ama pipash cancunamanta piñashcahuan paita ricuchun; ashtahuan pai puricushcapi yanapaichic ñucata ricuc shamuhuachun, ñuca chaishuc huauquicunantin paita chapacunchic mari.
Ranti huauqui Apolota yapa rimashcanimi, huauquicunahuan rishpa cancunata ricucrichun; chai ucu rincapac mana munarca. Huashami pai rinca racun.
Ñahuita allita pashcashpa causaichic, inina sinchi cachun cancunapi. Cari caichic, sinchi tucushpa.
Tucui imatapash rurashcapi, llaquishcahuan ruraichic.

Huauquicuna, cancuna yachanquichic ima shina Acayapi, Estefanas paipac aillucunantin, tucuicunata ñaupashpa Diospac Cushi Shimita uyarca, chai huasha shuc huauquicunata yanapanurca paicunapash inina charinuchun nishpa.
Paicunata uyapaichic rimani, tucui cai ruranapi llancaccunatapash uyaichic.
Estefanas, Fortunato, Acaico shamushcaraicu yapa cushiyani, cancuna illashcapi
ñuca causaipi cushichihuanushca, cancunatapash cushichinushca. Chashna runacunata llaquina canquichic.
Asiamanta iniccuna cancunata yapa yuyarinun. Aquila, Prisca tucui paipac huasipi tantariccunantin Apunchicpi cancunata yuyarinacun.
Tucui huauquicuna cancunamanta yuyarishcata chasquichic. Cancuna yachai muchanacushcahuan yuyarinacuichic.
Ñuca, Pablo, cancunaman yuyarishcata quiquin ñuca maquihuanmi quillcani.
Maican runapash, Apunchicta mana llaquishpa, maldisiashca cachun. ¡Apunchic, shamui!
Apunchic Jesuscristo paipac cuyaita cancunapi tallichichun.
Ñuca cancunata Cristo Jesuspi llaquishca cancunahuan cachun.
Ñuca, Pablo, Dios munashcaraicu Jesucristopac apostol cani. Ñuca huauqui Timoteontin cai pancata quillcacuni, Corinto llactapi tiyac iniccunaman Acayapi tiyac tucui Diospac runacunamanpash.
Ñucanchicpac Yaya Dios Apunchic Jesuscristontin, paicunapac cuyaita alli causaitapash cancunapi tallichinuchun.
Apunchic Cristo Jesuspac Yaya Dios bendisiashca cachun, paimi ñucanchicmanta llaquiric Yaya can, llaquirishcapi cushiyachic can.
Tucui llaquicunapi ñucanchicta cushichin, ñucanchicpash shuccuna llaqui charishcapi cushichina ushancapac, pai ñucanchicman cushca cushillahuata.
Cristopac ñacarina ñucanchicpi sinchi pactamucpi, ñucanchic paihuan ñacarinchic, chashnallata Cristoraicu cushiyana ñucanchicman juntarimun.

Ñucanchic ñacarinchicmi cancuna cushichinata quishpinata charichun nishpa; Dios ñucanchicta cushichicpi, cancunapash cushita charincapac can, ñucanchic shina sinchi llaquicuna charishcapi, sinchicushpa ñacarina ushancapac.
Cancunamanta achcatami chapanchic, ricushcanchic mari ima shina ñucanchichuan ñacarinquichic, chairaicullata Diosmanta shamuc cushichinata chasquina canquichic.
Huauquicuna, Asiapi chai tucui ñacarinata charishcamanta cancunata yuyachini. Mana ushaipac sinchi llaquicuna tiyanurca, ñalla causana yuyaipash tucurircami.
Huañuncapac saquishca shinami yachirca. Chashna tucushcapi yacharcanchic, ima shina sapalla mana ushanchic ima ruranapipash, ranti huañushcacunamanta causachic Dios yanapashcahuan ushanchic.
Diosca chashna ña huañunamanta quishpichirca, huashamanpash ñucanchicta quishpichishpa catincami.
cancuna Diosta mañashcahuan yanapacpi. Ñucanchicraicu achcacuna Diosta mañanucpi, chashnallatami achcacuna Diosta pacrachununca ñucanchicta yanapashcaraicu.

Caimi cushichihuan: cai pachapi tiyacushpa chuya shuncuhuan, cusca rurashcahuan causashcanchic, cancunahuanca ashtahuan alli. Mana ñucanchic shuncumantachu chashna causashcanchic, Dios llaquishpa yanapacpimi chashna causashcanchic.
Ñucanchic quillcashcacunapi cancuna uyashca, cancuna atipashca tiyan. Allita cancuna atipancapacmi munani,
cunancama atipashca shina, Apunchic Jesus ticramushcapi achcatami cushiyanquichic ñucanchicmanta, ñucanchicpash cancunamanta cushiyashca shinallata.
Chashna tucuncami yuyashpa, ñaupa cancunata ricucrisha yuyarcani, chashna cancunata ishcai cuti ricucriman carcani;
Macedoniaman rirashcapi cancunata ricusha yuyarcani; ticracushcapi, cutillata cancunata ricusha yuyarcani. Chaipi cancuna yanapahuanquichicman carca Judeaman ticramuncapac.
¿Mana allita yuyarishpachu chashna rinata munarcani? Ama ishcai shimiyucmi yuyahuanquichicchu, "ari" "mana" chaillapita nishpa.
Diosllata yachan, ñuca cancunata mana ishcai shimihuan rimashcata.
Ñuca, Silvano Timoteontin cancunata ricsichishca Diospac Churi Cristo Jesus shuc shimillami can mana ishcai. Cristo Diospac "Ari" can,
paipi (Cristopi) tucui Dios cusha nishcacuna pactarinun. Chairaicu, Diosta chacchashcapi, "Chashna cachun" rimanchic, Cristo Jesusraicu.
Diosllatami ñucanchicta cancunantin Cristoman llutachishpa sinchiyachin, paillata ñucanchictapash acllarca,
Pai ñucanchicta jahuirca quiquin paipac unanchahuan, Diospac Samaita ñucanchic shuncu ucupi churarca; ñucanchic japinca rashcata ricuchincapac.
Ñaupa yuyarishca shina chaira Corintoman mana rishcanichu; Diospash yachanmi cancunata yapa yuyarishcaraicu mana rishcata.
Huashalla cancunapac inina imana caticushcata ricushpa mana purinayanchicchu, cancunapac inina ña pacta sinchi can; ashtahuan cancuna cushi causancapacmi yanapanayani.
Chairaicu, cancunata cuti ricucrishcahuan llaquichina cashpa, mana rircanichu,
Caricunata ñuca llaquichicpi, ¿cancunamanta chicancuna cushiyachihuanuncachu? Cancuna, ñuca llaquishcacunallami cushiyachihuanquichic.
Chairaicu quillcarcanilla cancunaman, cancunaraicu llaquirina cashpa mana rircani, ashtahuan cancuna cushiyachihuariami cariquichic, Ñuca yacharcanimi cancunapash ñucahuan cushiyanata,

ranti chai pancata cancunaman quillcacushcapi, achcata yuyarishcahuan llaquirishpa huacarcani. Shinapash, mana cancunata llaquichincapacchu quillcarcani, ashtahuan cancuna ñuca yapa llaquishcata ricsinuchun nishpami quillcarcani,
Ñucata llaquichic runa mana ñucallatachu llaquichihuashca, ama yapalla paita juchachincapac, cancunatapash ansata llaquichishcami
Cancuna piñashpa camachishcahuan ña chai runata alli tuputami ñacachishcanchic rimani.
Cunan, chai juchamanta quishpichishpa, yanapana canquichic, yanca, rashpa yapalla llaquirishpa chicapac chincarinca imapash.
Chairaicu cancunata mañani cuti llaquishca ñahuihuan paita ricuichic.
Ñaupallata cai layamanta cancunata quillcarcani, ¿ushanquichicchu, manachu ushanquichic imata, ñucanchic camachishcata pactachincapac?
Shina cacpi, imamantapash shuc runata cancuna quishpichicpi, ñucapash paita quishpichinimi. Quishpichishami paita imamantapash quishpichina tiyacpi, cancunapi yuyarishpa Cristopac ñaupacpi.
Chashnami supai ñucanchic ucupi mana imatapash rurana ushanca, yachanchic pai ima shina ñucanchic pantancapac chapacushcata.
Cristopac Cushi Shimita ricsichincapac Troas llactaman pactashcapi, Apunchicraicu llancana pailla tiyahuarca.
Ranti, ñucanchic huauqui Titota mana tarishcaraicu mana cushi carcani. Chairaicu, paicunamanta llucshishpa Macedoniaman rircani.
Diosta pacrachuni Cristo Jesus atinapi ñucanchicta llutachishcaraicu, ñucanchicraicu paipac Cushi Shimita runacunaman ricsichin, sumac ashnaita tucuicunapi tallichishca shina.
Ñucanchic, Cristomanta Diosman sumac sicac ashnai shina canchic; chai ashnai, quishpiccunapi, chicapac chincariccunapi, tucuicunaman pactacun.
Chicapac chincariccunapac, chai ashnai huañui can, ranti quishpiccunapac, causaita cun chai sumac ashnai. ¿Yachanquichicchu picunami caita rurana ushanun?
Diospac Shimita, maicancuna rurashca shina, mana catunchicchu; cusca shimita Diospac ñaupacpi rimanchic, pai mincashcacuna mari canchic, Cristohuanpash ilutarishca mari canchic.

Cancunaman caita rimashpa, ¿cuti ñucanchillata jatunyashpami rimaranchicchu yuyanquichic? ¿Nucan-chicmanta alli rimac quillcatachu ricunata munanquichic?, ¿cancunatachu mañashun, maicancuna rurashca shina?
Cancunallatami ñucanchicmanta alli rimac quillca canquichic: ñucanchic shuncupi quillcashca quillca, paita tucui ricsinun, tucui ricuna ushanun.

Mana pantai can cancuna Cristollata quillcashca quillca cashca, ñucanchic maquihuan cushca; cai quillca mana jahuinahuan quillcashcachu, causac Diospac Samaihuan quillcashcami; chai quillca mana rumi palapi quillcashcachu can, runacunapac; shuncupi quillcashcami.
Diospac ñaupacpi, Jesucristo yanapashcahuan, chai chashna cashcata yachanchic.
Mana ñucanchicpac quiquin ushaihuanchu ñucanchic rashcata ruranchic, tucui ñucanchic rurana ushashca Diosmanta shamun,
paimi ushaita ñucanchicman cushca, mushu cunacushca shimita yanapana ushancapac, mana quillcapi cushca, Samaimantami shamuc. Camachic Quillca huañuchic mari can, ranti Diospac Samai causaita cun.

Cai rumi palacunapi quillcashca Camachic Quillca mana ushaipac llinpic-huan shamurca, Israel runacuna Moisespac ñahuita mana ricuc ushacta carca, yapa chiuclla cashcaraicu. Shinapash chai llinpic uchpayashpa tucurina carca. Cuti chai Camachia Quillca huañuchic cashpallata achca jatunyachishca shamurca;
cunan, ¡ima shina jatunyachishca chari canca Diospac Samaimanta shamuc mushu cunacushca shimita ricsichina!.
Rimacpi, ñucanchicta huañuchincapac Camachic Quillca cashpallata jatunyachishca shamurca, ¡mai jatunyachishca chari canca Dios ñucanchicta juchacunamanta pichashcata ricsichishca!
Camachic Quillca jatunyashca uchillami saquirin cai shuc-huan yuyaricpi, cai yapa jatonyachishca mari can.
Tucurina cashpallata jatunyachishca carca, ashtahuan yalli jatunyachishca mari canca chicapac causana.
Caita chapaccuna cashpa mari, mana manchashcahuan rimanchiclla.
Mana Moises shina ñahuita llachapahuan quillparinchicchu, llinpic huañurashcaca Israel runacuna ama ricuncapac.

Ranti paicuna mana atipanurca, chaira cunanpash, Camachic Quillcata ricushcapi, chai quillparacllata paicunata mana atipachiti, paicuna mana anchuchi tucunushca quillpacucta, chaica Cristoraicullami anchuchi tucurica.
Cunan punchacama; paicuna Moisespac quillcata ricushcapi, paicunapac yuyaita shuc llachapa quillpacun.
Ranti shuc runa Apunchicman shuncuhuan ticracpi, chai quillpacuc llushpirin.
Apunchicca Samai cashcaraicu, Apunchicpac Samai tiyashcapi, chaipi tiyan quishpira causana.

Chairaicu tucui ñucanchic, ñahuipi quillpacucta ña anchuchishcacuna, shuc rirpupi shina Apunchic jatunyashcata ricuchic canchic, quiquin paipac ricchai canchic, pai jatunyashcata ñucanchicpash ashtahuan charinchic, Apunchic munashcaraicu, pai Samai can.
¿Chairaicu mana sanpayanchic, Dios ñucanchicmanta llaquinata charishpa, cai llancanata ñucanchicman miricashcaraicu.

Ñucanchicmanta jichushcanchic pacallapi pincaipac ruranacunata; Diospac shimi yachachishcapi, mana umachinchic, mana llullanchic. Ashtahuan shuti shimillata rimanchic, chashnami Diospac ñaupacpi maican runapash ñucanchic alli cashcata yachanunca.
Ñucanchic yachachishca Cushi; Shimi, ¿shuti pacha mana atipaipac cari chicapac chincariccunapaclla.

Paicuna ininata mana charishcaraicu, cai pachamanta dios paicunapac yuyaita mana atipacta rurashca, ama paicuna ricunuchun jatunyachishca Cristopac Custi Shimipac llinpic achicta, pai Diospac ricchai mari can.
Mana ñucanchicmantachu yachachinchic, Jesucristo Apunchic cashcatami yachachinchic, ñucanchicca Jesusta muchashcaraicu cancunata yanapacllami canchic.
Yana ucumanta achicta surcuc Diosllatami, ñucanchic shuncupi achicta churashca, Dios jatunyashcata chai achic-huan ricuna ushanchic, Jesucristopi rirpupi shina ricuricucta.
Cai Diosta ricsina ushaita ñucanchic aichapi charinchic, cai aicha allpa manca shina can chai jatun ushai Diosmanta shamushcata ricsichincapac, mana ñucanchicmanta.
Chashna, achca llaquicunayuc cashpapash, ñaupacman riranchiclla; achca yuyaricuna tiyacpipash, shinapash mana sanpayanchicchu.
Piñashpa japinucpipash, mana jichushcachu canchic; urmachishpapash, mana huacllichinunchu.
Maimanpash rishcapi, Jesuspac huanuita ñucanchic aichapi apai cachanchic, paipac causaipash ñucanchicpi ricurincapae.
Causacushpa, ñucanchic Jesusraicu huañunalla causanchic, paipac causai ñucanchic huañuna aichapipash ricurincapac.
Chashnami, ñucanchicman huañui shamucpi, ranti cancunaman causai pactan.
Dios quillcashca shimipi riman: "Inina tiyahuacpi, chairaicu rimarcani". Chairaicu ñucanchicpash, chai shinallata inina charishpa, ininchic rimanchicpash.
Ñucanchic yachanchic, Apunchic Jesusta huañushcamanta causachic Diosllata, ñucanchictapash paihuan causachina cashcata; chai huasha tucui cancunahuan pacta, paipac ñaupacman pushanca.
Tucui caicuna cancunapac allipac tucushca, Dios cuyashcacunata achcata chasquishcamanta, chashnallata achcacuna Diosta pacrachunuchun, Diosta jatunyachishpa.
Chairaicu mana sanpayana canchic. Ñucanchic jahua ricuric aicha rucuyaracpipash, ranti ñucanchic ucupi caran puncha ashtahuan maltayaranchic.
Cai causaipi ñucanchic ansa ñacarishca mana unai tucurin; ranti chaimanta huiñaipac jatunyanata chasquinchic, yalli jatun achcapash can chai.
Ricuipac cashcapi ña ñucanchic ñahuita mana churanchic, mana ricuricpi ashtahuan churanchic, tucui ricuric imacuna tucuric cashcaraicu; ranti mana ricuriccunaca huiñaipac tiyana canun.

Cai pachamanta huasi shina canchic, shuc mana unaita causancapac rurashca tanpu shina; ranti ñucanchic yachanchic, cai tanpu tularicpi, jahua pachapi Dios ñucanchicpata mana ismuc huasita allichishpa charishcata; chai huasi mana runa maqui rurashcachu can,
Chairaicu cai cunan causacushca huasipi; tiyacushpa llaquirinchic; ña rina munanchicman jahua pacha huasiman,
paita ñucanchic shuc churanata shinami, churarishun; ama llatan ñucanchic saquirincapac.

Cai tanpupi cashpa llaquirishpa causanchic, llatanai tucunata mana munanchicman, ashtahuan churarashca jahuapi churachi tucunata munanchicman, cai huañuc aicha mushu causaipi yaicurishca saquirichiin.
Dios ñucanchicta chaipac ailichirca, ñucanchic japina cashcata ricuchishpa paipac Samaita ñucanchicman curca.
Chairaicu mana manchashcahuan imatapash ruranchic. Yachanchic cai aichapi causacunacama caru llactapi shina causacushcata, Apunchicmanta caruyashca.
Cunan paita mana ricuna ushanchic, inina sinchicuchishcahuan causanchic;
shinapash mana manchashpa causanchic, ranti alli canman cai aichamanta llucshishpa, ña Apunchicpac ñaupacman rina.
Chairaicu tucui pachapi Apunchicta cushiyachinata munanchic, cai aichapi causacushcapi, paimanta llucshishcapi imapash.
Tucuicuna Cristopi taripai tucuna canchic, caranlla pai causacushpa rurashcamanta chasquincapac.
Chashna, Diosta yupaichana cashcata yachashcaraicu, runacunatapash chaita ricsichinata munanchic. Dios ñucanchicta yapa allita ricsin, cancunapash ñucanchicta ricsincapac munani.

Mana cuti ñucanchicraicu rimancapacchu callarishcanchic; ashtahuan ñucanchicraicu cancuna cai cutillapash cushiyanuchun nishpami can, cancuna jahua ricuchishcallahuan mana shuncu ucupi tiyashcallahuan jatunyaccunata cutipana ushancapac.
Ñucanchic nuspa cacpi, Dios ñucanchicta uyachun, ranti alli yuyaihuan rimacpi, chaica cancunapacmi can.
Cristopac cuyai ñucanchic causaita pushacun, shuc runa tucuicunaraicu huañushcata chashnamanta tucuicuna huañushcata yachashpa.
Cristo tucuicunamanta huañurca, cunan causaccuna ama quiquinpacllata causanuchun; paipac canuchun; paicunaraicu pai huañushca huasha causarirca.
Chairaicu, ñucanchic mana pitapash cai pachamanta yuyaihuan taripanchic; ñaupa ima chari Cristomanta panta yuyaita charircanchic, cunan ña paimanta mana chai yuyaita charinchic.
Chairaicumanta, Jesucristohuan llutarishca runa mushu runa can: chai runapac causai tucurirca; cunan tiyac mushu can.
Tucui caita Dios rurarca; Diosllata Cristoraicu ñucanchicta paihuan allichirca; paillata tucui runacunata paihuan allichincapac ñucanchicta mincarca.
Rimacpi, Cristopi Dios cai shimita runacunaman ricsichincapac mincarca.
Chashnamanta, Jesucristopac cachashcacuna canchic, Diosllata ñucanchic shimihuan cancunata rimacun. Chairaicu, Cristopac shutipi "Dios-huan alliyaichic" rimanchic.
Cristo mana imapi juchallircachu; ranti ñucanchicraicu tucui ñucanchicpac juchacunata paita apachirca; chashna, Cristoraicu, ñucanchicta juchacunamanta quishpichirca.
Diosta yanapaccuna cashpa, Diospac cuyaita ama yanca jichuichichu cancunata rimanchic.
Dios quillcashca shimipi nin: "Can mutsushcapi, canta uyarcani; quishpina punchapi canta yanaparcani". Cunanmi mutsushca pacha can. ¡Cunanmi quishpina puncha can!
Mana maipipash mana pitapash mana alli rashcata ricuchinchicchu, ama ñucanchic rurashca mana alli saquirincapac.
Ranti, tucui rashcapi Diosta yanapac cashcata ricuchinchic: llaqui tiyashcapi, mana piñarishpa ñacarishcapi, mutsuna tiyashcapi, mana alli pactachina ushashcapi,
macai tucushcapi, piñashpa japi tucushcapi, piñarishpa jatarishcacunapi, sinchi llancanapi, tutacuna mana puñushcapi, yaricashcapi.

Diosta yanapac cashcata ricuchinchic ñucanchic cusca causashcahuanpash, ñucanchic shuti shimita ricsishcahuan, mana piñarishcahuan, alli shuncuyuc cashcahuanpash, Diospac Samaita ñucanchipi charishcahuan, ñucanchic shutipacha llaquinata charishcahuan,
ñucanchic yachachishca shuti cashcahuan, Diospac ushai ñucanchicpi cashcahuan. Cusca yuyaicunahuan macanacunchic, huactanapi cashpa, quishpinami imapash.

Maicanpi jatunyachishca canchic, cuti shucpica piñai tucunchic; maicanpi alli rimai tucunchic, cuti shucpica mana alli rimai tucunchic. Shuti shimita rimaccuna cashpallata, llulla runacuna shina ricui tucunchic.
Alli ricsira cashpallata, mana ricsishcacuna shina ricui tucunchic. Ña huañunalla cashpapash, chaira causacunchicmi; ñacachinunmi, shinapash mana huañuchinunchu.

Llaquirishca shina cashpallata, tucui pachapi cushi causanchic; imapash illac shina ricurinchic; ranti achca runacunami ñucanchiraicu tucuita charic tucunushca; llushticuna shina ricurinchic, ranti mana imapash ñucanchicta pishin.
Corintomanta huauquicuna, mana imatapash pacashpa cancunaman rimashcanchic; ñucanchic shuncuta pascashpa cancuna ñaupacpi churashcanchic.
Cancunapac ñaupacpi mana imatapash pacana charinchic; ashtahuan cancunami ñucanchicman pacashcanquichic.
Chairaicu, shuc yaya churicunata mañashca shina, ñucata ama imatapash pacahuaichichu nini, ñuca cancunata mana imatapash pacashca shina.
Mana iniccunahuan ama shucllayaichichu. Ñuca tapuni: ¿cusca taripanahuan, mana cusca taripanahuan chaipurallachu canun? ¿Achic tiyashcapi, chaillapita tuta tiyana ushanchu?
Cristohuan Supaihuan mana chai yuyaillata charina ushanun.

Diospac huasihuan huacacunapac huasihuan mana chaipuralla canun. Ñucanchic causac Diospac huasi canchic, paillata rimashca shina: "Paicuna ucupimi causasha, paicunahuanmi purisha; ñuca paicunapac Dios cacpi, paicuna ñuca runacuna canunca".
Chairaicu cashnapash Apunchic riman: "Chashna runa ucumanta llucshishpa, chicanyaichic; ticllayucta ansapash ama llancaichichu. Chaipimi cancunata ñuca chasquisha,
cancunapac Yaya casha; caocunaca churicuna, ushushicuna cahuanquichic, tucuita ushac Apunchic chashna riman".

Shina cacpi, llaquishca huauquicuna, caicunami cusha nishcacuna canacun. Cairaicu, aichapi, samaipi mapayachiccunamanta picharishca cana canchic; Diosta yupaichanapi, ñucanchic paipac chicanyachishcacuna catina canchic.
¡Cancuna shuncu ucupi shuc cuchushituta cuhuaichi! Taripanapi, tucuicunahuan cuscata taripashcanchic; mana pitapash huacllichishcanchicchu; mana pitapash umachishcanchicchu.
Caita mana cancunata camishcaraicuchu rimani; ña cancunata rimarcani, cancuna ñuca shuncu ucupimi canquichic, ñucahuan causancapac, ñucahuan huañuncapac.
Mana jarcashcahuan cancunata rimani, achcatapash cushiyani cancunaraicu. Chai tucui ñacarishcapi, ñaupacman catina yuyai shamuhuan, cushihuanpash juntarishcami cani.
Macedoniaman pactashcamanta mana ansapash samashcanchicchu; ashtahuan tucuipimi llaquicunallata tarishcanchic: ñucanchic mayanpi macanacui tiyashca, ñucanchic ucupi manchanai tiyashca.
Ranti Dios sanpayashcacunata sinchicuchic can; chairaicu Tito pactamushcahuan ñucanchicta sinchicuchirca;

mana pactamushcaraiculla, ashtahuan pai jinu cancunaraicu yapa cushiyashca carca. Pai, cancuna yapa ñucanchicta ricunayashcamanta rimarca; cancuna ñucamanta yapa llaquirishcata, yapa yuyarashcata ñucanchicman rimarca; tucui caicunata uyashcaraicu ashtahuan yapa cushiyarcani.

Ñuca cancunata ñaupac quillcashca yapa llaquichishca cacpipash, cunan chaimanta mana llaquirinichu. Ñaupac shuti llaquirircani, cancuna chai quillcaraicu llaquirishcamanta, shinapash mana unaita llaquirircanquichic;
