cunan cushiyanimi, mana cancuna llaquirishcaraicu, ranti cancuna chai llaquirishcahuan Diosman ticrashcaraicu. Cancuna ñacarishca Diospac ñaupacpi alli ricurirca; rimacpi, cancunata mana imapipash huacllichishcanchicchu;

llaquirishcapi Dios munashca shina ñacarishpa, Diosman shuncupi ticrarina tucun quishpinaman pactana ushancapac; chashnapica mana imamanta llaquirina tiyan. Ranti cai pachamantacuna llaquirishca huañuiman pushacun.

Cancunapi llaquirina tiyashcapi, Dios munashca shina ñacarircanquichic, chashna ñacarishcamanta canan pai cushcata ricuichic. Tucushcata allita ricurcanquichic, chai huasha ñucata quishpichincapac shayarircanquichic; cancunata piñachichirca, manchaitapash curca. Chai huasha ñucata ricuna munaita charircanquichic, chaipi juchayuc runata ñacachina yuyaita japircanquichic. Chashnami chai tucushcapi cancuna mana ima rurashcata ricsichircanquichic.
Shina cacpi, ñuca quillcashcapi, mana piñac runata, piñai tucuc runata yuyarishpachu quillcarcani; astahuan Diospac ñaupacpi cancuna ñucanchimanta yuyarishcata ricsichincapacmi quillcarcani.

Cashnamanta ñucanchic cushiyashcanchic. Cai cushiyaita chasquishcamanta, ashtahuan yallimi cushiyanchic Tito cushi cashcata ricushpa; tucui cancuna paita cuti cariyachishcanquichic ñaupacman catishpa rincapac.

Ñuca ña Titota cancunamanta cushi cashcata rimarcani, shinapash mana llullashcanichu. Ashtahuan, tucui cancunaman ñucanchic rimashca shuti cashca shina, Titota ñucanchi rimashcapash shutini can: cancunamanta cushimi canchic rimarcanchic.
Pai cancanata ashtahuan yapa llaquin, cancuna pai rimashcapi uyashcata yuyarishpa, paita yapa yupaichashca-huan chasquishcata yuyarishpa.
Imapash tiyacpi cancuna ñucahuan cana cashcata yachashpami yapa cushiyani.
Cunan, huauquicuna, cancunata ricsichina munanchic Maccdoniapi tiyac iniccunaman ima shina Dios paipac cuyaita ricuchishcamanta.
Achca llaquicunata charishca cashpapash, paicuna yapa cushi canun; yapalla tsuntsucuna cashpapash, achcata chariccuna shina camarita cushcapi ricuchinushca.
Ñuca jinu ricuyac cani, tucui alli shuncuhuan paicuna, caranlla ushashca tuputa camarita cushcata.
Mana ushaipac ñucanchicta mañanurca, paicunapash iniccunata yanapana ushancapac.
Ñucanchic yuyashcamantapash yallicta ranurca, quiquin paicunallata camari shina curinurca, Apunchicta ñaupac, chai huasha ñucanchicta, Dios munashca shina.
Chairaicu Titota rimashcanchic, cancunamantapash japichun chai pallashca cullquita, unai pai cancuna ucupi pallancapac callarishca shina.

Cancuna yallishcanquichic tucuipi; inina cacpi, sumac shimi rimanapi, cancuna yachashcapi, yanapanapi mana quillashpa rurashcapi, ñucanchicmanta yachashca llaquinapipash, chashnallata cunan cai yanapanapi yallishcata ricsichina canquichic.
Mana cancunata rurai nishpa rimanichu chaita; cancuna shuccunaraicu yanapashcata ricsinuchun nishpami rimani, cancunapash quiquin llaquina charishcata ricsichina ushancapac.
Cancuna yachanquichic ima shina Apunchic Jesucristo alli shuncu cashpa, tacuita charishpallata, cancunaraicu tsuntu tucurca, pai tsuntsuyashcaraicu cancunata ama imapash pishichun nishpa.
Chaimanta cancunapac allipac ñuca yuyashcata rimam. Chaita rurashcallahuan cushiyana rantimanta, chaishuc huata-manta ashtahuan cushi pactachishcahuan callarircanquichic.
Shinacpi, cancuna ushashca tupu cushpa catishcapi, cancuna cushihuan callarishcapi rurashca shina cancuna munaimanta, chashnallata cunanpash tucuchinapi rurana canquichic.
Maicanpash alli shuti pacha cuyanayashpa cucpi, Dios pai cushca camarita chasquin, pai cushca tuputa. Illashcamanta Dios mana mañanchu.
Mana shuccunata yanapanaraicu, cancuna llushtiyanca- pacChu rimanchic;

ashtahuan tucui chaipuralla nishpami munanchic. Paicuna mana charishcata cunan cancuna charinquichic; shuc puncha, ranti, cancuna mana charishcata paicuna charinunca; chaipi shuti tucui chaipuralla canchic.
Dios quillcashca shimipi riman: "Achcata pallac runata mana puchurcachu, ansalla pallac runatapash mana pishircachu".
Diosta pacrachunimi shuncupi ñuca cancunamanta yuyarishca shinallata paipash yuyarishcaraicu.
Ñuca mincashcata japirca, paillata cancunamanta yapa yuyarishcaraicu, cunan paipac quiquin munaimanta cancunata ricuncapac riran.
Titohuan shuc huauquita cancunaman cachacuni, paimanta tucui iniccuna ucupi alli rimai tiyan, quishpina shimi yachachishcapi yapa alli yanapashcaraicu.

Chai-rapash, iniccuna ñucanchic-huan purincapac paita acllanurca, ñucanchicta yanapancapaC cai Apunchicta jatunyachinaraicu llancacushcapi, ñucanchic alli yanapana yuyai charishcatapash ricsichincapac.
Chashna, cai cullqui pallanata japicushcamanta, camishpa rimashca shimicunata quishpina munanchic;
chairaicu allicunallata ruranchic, mana; Apunchicpac ñaupacllapi, runacunapac ñaupacpipash.
Paicunahuanllata shuc huauquitapash cancunaman cachacuni, achca rurashcapi yanapana yuyai charishcata ñucanchicman pai ricuchishca, cunan ashtahuan, cancuna paipi chapaShcaraicu.

Pipash TitOmanta tapucpi, ñucapac mashimi nishpa rimaichic, cancunata yanapancapac ñucahuan llancashpa causac. Chaishuc huauquicunamanta tapunucpi, iniccuna paicunata cachashcata, paicuna Cristota jatunyachic cashcata rimana canquichic.
Iniccuna yachancapac, paicunata allipacha llaquishcahuan ricsichichic, ñucanchic cancunaraicu cushiyashca shuti cashcatapash ricuchichic.
Inic huauquicunapacta pallashca cullquimanta nicpi, yancami quillcana tucusha,

ña cancuna yanapana yuyai charishcata allipacha ricsini. Macedoniamanta huauquicunata cushiyashcahuan rimashcani, cancuna Acayamantacuna, chai-shuc huatamanta yanapana yuyailla chapacushcata; Maccdoniamanta achcacuna cancuna chashna yanapana yuyaita charishcata ricushpa, paicunapash chai yuyaillata charinushca.

Chashnamanta cancunaraicu ñuca alli rimashca ama llullashca shimi shina saquirincapac, cai huauquicunata cancunaman cachani. Alli rimacpi, cancuna ama cuncaimanta japi tucuncapac, yanca rashpa Macedoniamanta pipash ñucahuan rishcapi, cancuna cuncaimanta japi tucunquichicman. Cancuna chashna tucucpi pincaipac tucushun, cancunata yapa jatunyachishpa causashcaraicu; ¡manapacha rimanayanichu cancunallata ima shina pincaipac tucuna cashcamanta!

Chairaicullata, alli yachihuan cai huauquicuna cancunata ñaupacta ricucrishpa, cancuna rimashca pallana cullquita pactachincapac yanapanuchun. Chashnami cancuna pallashca cullqui cancuna quiquin shuncuhuan cuyashca ricurinca, mana mitsashpa cushca shina.
Caita yuyaripaichic: Ansalla tarpuc runa, ansalla pallan; achcata tarpuc runa, achcata pallan.
Caran amu shuncupi yuyarishcata cuna canchic, mana piñarishpa, mana mitsahcahuan imapash, Diosca cushiyashcahuan cuyacta mari llaquin.
Dios ushanmi, tucui cancuna mutsushcata cuncapac, ama imapash cancunata pishichun; cancunata puchushcahuan shuccunata yanapana ushanquichicman.
Dios quillcashca shimipi riman: "Mana mitsashcahuan tsuntsucunaman cushca, pai alli rurashcacuna amana chincarinunchu".
Dios tarpuc runaman muyuta cun, micunatapash cun; shina cacpi tucui cancuna tarpuncapac mutsushcatami pai cunca, paimi huiñachinca, paimi cancuna cuyashcamanta achcata aparichinca.
Chashna, tucuita charic tucushpa, shuncumanta jinu cuyana ushanquichic. Cancuna cachashca pallashca cullquimanta shuc huauquicuna ñucanchircaraicu Diosta pacrachununcami.
Chai yanapaita huauquicunaman apashpa, mana paicuna mutsushcallatachu apanchic, ashtahuan chairaicumantami paicuna Diosta achcata pacrachunca ranun.
Paicunaca Diosta chacchanuncami, cai yanapashca paicunata ricsichicun cancuna Cristopac Cushi Shimita pactachishcata. Paicunata, tucuicunatapash yanapashcaraicu Diostapash chac-chanuncami.
Cancunata yapa yuyarishpami Dios-huan rimarinunca, pai cancunapi yapa llaquishcata ricuchishcaraicu.
¡Diosta pacrachushun, shuc jatun cuyanata ñucanchicman cushcaraicu, shimi mana pactanchu paita pacrachuncapac!
Ñuca, Pablollatami, cancunata mañani, alli shuncuyuc Cristoraicu. Cancuna ucupi cashpa manchaisiquishi cani, rimai tiyan, ranti carumantaca carishi cani.

Rimanimi, cancunata ricuncapac rishcapi, ama piñachihuanquichicchu quiquin cari runa shina shayarishcata mana ricunayashpa; tucui ñucanchic rurashcamanta mana allita rimaccunahuan, shuti paicunahuan piñarishcata ricuhuanquichicmi.
Shutipacha runami canchic, ranti mana cai pachamanta runacuna shina macarinchic.
Ñucanchicpac aiñicuna mana cai pachamanta-chu canun, Diospac ushaimi can, chaihuan pucuracuna imapash chausi tucunllami. Chashnami, Diosta alli ricsincapac mana alli rimashcacunahuan,
piñashcacunahuan quillachic-cunata chausichinchic. Tucui runapac yuyaita Cristopac maquipi churanchic, paita uyac tucunuchun;
cancuna alli uyac tucushcallata, huasha mana uyac tucunucpi cancunata ñacachinatami munanchic.
Cancuna jahua ricurishcallata yapa ricunquichic. Maicanpash allipacha Cristoman curishca cashpa, yuyarichun ñucanchicpash Cristopac cashcata.
Yapalla sinchinayata cancunaman rimashpapash, mana pincarinichu; Apunchicca cancunapac inina huiñachincapacmi ushaita ñucanchicman curca, mana cancunata huacllichincapac.
Cai quillcacuna mana cancunata manchachincapac quillcashca shina ricurichun- mi munani.
Maicancuna rimanushca ñuca cachashca quillcacuna yapa sinchi rimaccunami nishpa; ranti quiquin ñuca jinuca mana manchaipac pitapash ricurini, mana sumacta rimani.
Chashna rimaccunata nini: Yuyahuanquichic ñuca cai carumanta quillcapi rimashcata, cancuna ucupi pactashpa rurashcahuanmi ricuchisha.
Paicunallata jatunyarishpa tiyaccunahuan, alli shutipacha mana pactarinata ushanchicchu. Ranti paicuna yuyarishca shina, paicunapura tupurishpa, yapa pantaranun.
Ñucanchic cashca tupullata chaccharinata ushanchic, Diosmi ñucanchic llancanapi maicama pactana cashcata churashca, paimi Corintopi cancunapacman pactancapac munarca.

Chairaicu, ñucanchicta mincashcamanta mana yallicunchicchu, cancunapacman mana pactashca cashpa, shuti yallicunchicman. Ñucanchic tucuimanta ñaupac Cristopac Cushi Shimihuan cancunapacman pactarcanchic.

Mana shuccuna rurashcahuanchu jatunyanchic, mincashcata-pash mana yallishcanchicchu. Ashtahuan cancunahuan yalli llancanayashpami chapacunchic, inina cancunapi huiñashpa ricpi, shinapash mana yallishpa.
Cancuna tiyashcamanta ashtahuan caruman Cristopac Cushi Shimita pactachincapac munanchic, shinapash mana shuccuna llancacushcapi satirishpa, ama shuccuna llancashcahuan jatunyarincapac.
Pipash jatunyanata munashpa, Apunchicpi jatunya-chun.
Shuc runa mana paillata jatunyashcaraicuchu chacchai tucun, Apunchic jatunyachishcami chacchai tucun.
¡Ushahuanquichicmanshi ñuca nuspashpa rurashcata casilla ricushpa! Imana cashpapash ñuca rurashcata ñahui ricuhuaichic
Ñuca cancunaraicu charishca tunpana Diosmantami shamuhuan. Shuc carillahuan cancunata sahuarichishcani; pai can Cristo, ñuca paiman cancunata cunayani shipas shina chuyata.
Ranti ñuca yuyani, machacui Evata umachishca shina, cancunapash umachi tucunquichic; chashna cancuna yuyai Cristollata allipacha yurarina rantimanta, chicanyashca tucunquichic.

Cancuna uyanqui-chiclla pipash ñucanchic ricsichishca Jcsusmanta shuc layata ricsichicpipash; chashnallata tucui shuncuhuan chasquinquichic cancuna ña chasquishca Samaimanta cuti shuc chican samaita; chashnallata, cancuna ña chasquishca Cushi Shimimanta cuti chican layatapash chasquinquichiclla.
Ima shina cashcapash, cancuna catishca "chai yalli apostolcunamanta" mana imapipash urayanichu.
Ñuca chari shimihuan mana sumacta rimana ushani, ranti yachashcahuan, ñucami cani; caita cancunata ricsichishcanchic achca cuti tucui ñucanchic rurashcacunapi.
¿Cancunaman Cushi Shimita yachachishcapi mana imata mañashpachu juchallircani ima chari? ¿cancunata jatachinaraicu ñuca jinu yalli uchilla tucushpachu juchallircani ima chari?
Shucmanta iniccunapac cullquita quichurcani, paicuna cullquita cuhuanucpi japircani cancunata yanapanarai-cu.

Cancunahuan tiyashpa imatapash mutsushcapi, mana pitapash quillachucanichu; Maccdoniamanta pactamuc huauqui-cunami ñuca mutsushcata cuhuanurca. Cancunata mañashpa mana quillachircanichu, chashnami catisha yuyani.
Ñuca alli shutipacha Cristota caticmi cani, ¿cashnallata tucui Acayapi ñuca chashna catinamanta quichuhuancachu?
¿Ñuca imaraicu chashna rimashcata yachanayanquichicchu? ¿Can-cunata mana llaquishcamantachu chashna rimani? ¡Dios yachanmi cancanata ñuca llaquishcata!
Ranti ñuca racushca shinallata rurashpa catinca rani, paicunamanta umachina yuyaita anchuchincapac, paicunaca umachina yuyaita mashcanun ñuca shina jatunyarincapac;
pantata yachachiccuna canun, umachiccuna, "Cristopac yachachishcacunami canchic" rimashcahuan quillparishpa puriccuna.
Caica maipipash tucun, ashtahuan quiquin supai jinumi tucun;
chairaicu paita yanapaccuna allipi yanapac runacuna shina tucushpa purinun. Shinapash tucurinuncami paicana rurashcaraicullata.
Cutillata cancunaman rimani, ñucata ama nuspami yuyahuanquichicchu; chashna cancuna yuyashpa, saquichiclla chai nuspa cancunata rimachunlla, ñucapash ansata jatun-yarisha ñucamantallata rimashpa.
Cai jatunyarinamanta mana Apunchic rimahuashcaraicuchu rimacuni, shuc nuspa runa shinami rimacuni.
¡Achcacuna paicunallata jatunya-rishpa uyarmun paicuna mrashcamanta! ¿ñucapash imata cani? ¡Jatunyarisha!
Cancuna tucuita yachac canquichic, ranti nuspacunata uyanquichiclla;

cancunata atishcahuan yanapan-capac mañaccunatapash yanapanquichiclla; paicunapacta sinchi llancanquichiclla, umachi tucunquichiclla, millashcahuan ricui tucunquichiclla, ñahui palapipash huactai tucunquichiclla.

Ñucata pincanayahuan caita rimancapac, ñucanchic yapa api tucurcanchic chashnallata cancanata rurancapac. Chashna rurashcamanta shuccuna jatunyaricpi, ñucapash jatunyarishami; shinapash caita shuc nuspa runa rimashca shinami rimani.
Hebreo runa mari canun paicuna. Ñucapash. Israel runa mari canun paicuna. Ñucapash canimi. Abrahanpac, churicuna canun paicuna. Ñucapash.

Cristota yanapac mari canun paicuna. Caipi shuc nuspa runa shina rimancapac callarini: ñuca paicunamanta yallimi cani. Ñuca paicunamanta yalli llancashcani, paicunamanta yalli japi tucushpa tucushcani, achca cuti huañunalla causarcani.
Pichca cuti judiocuna quimsa chunca iscun llutashcahuan ñacachihuanurca.
Quimsa cuti caspihuan macahuanurca, shuc cuti rumihuan shitahuanurca. Quimsa cuti ñuca rirashca barco yacupi panparirca; ña huañunalla, shuc pancha shuc tuta ñucñu yacupi huaitarcani.

Achcata purishpa, yacumanta quishpircani, shuhuacunamanta quishpircani, mashicunamanta-pash quishpircani, chican runacunamantapash quishpircani. Llacta ucupipash quishpircani, runa mana tiyashcapipash quispircani, mama-cuchamantapash quishpircani, umachishpa huauquimi canchic rimaccunamanta quishpircani.
Achca llancana, sanpayana tiyahuashcami; achca cuti mana puñus-cani; yaricaihuan, upianaihuan ñacarishcani; achca cuti mana micushcanichu; chirihuan ñacarishcani, churana pishihuacpi.
Tucui caicunamanta, ñuca jahuapi caran puncha iniccunamanta yurarina llashai tiyahuan.
Pipash uncucpi, ñucapash uncuni; shuc runata juchallichinucpi, mana ushaipac piñarini.
Jatunyarina munashpa, ñucanchicpi sanpa tiyashcata ricsichishpami jatunyarina canchic.
Apunchic Jesuscristopac Dios Yayallata huiñaipac chacchana tucunchic, paimi yachan ñuca shuti rimashcata.
Ñuca Damascopi cashcapi, Jatun Curaca Aretasta yanapac Huainaru, tucui llacta puncupi (ricuccamacunata) churarca, ñuca japi tucuchun yuyaihuan;
shuc runacuna, ñucata ashancapi churashpa, llacta quincha jutcumanta uraicuchihuanurca; chashnami paipac maquimanta quishpircani.
Amullata jatunyarina mana imapacpash alli can. Shina cacpipash Apunchicmanta nuspaipi ñuca chashquishca-manta, pai ñucata ricsichihuashcamanta rimana tucuni.
Shuc cristiano runata ricsini, ña chunca chuscu huata tucan pai jahua pachaman pushai tucushca. Mana yachani paipac aichachu pushai tucurca, samaichu pushai tacurca ima chari; chai Dios yachan.
Ranti yachani cai runa (aichantinchu, samaillachu ima chari, pita yachashun, Dios chaita yachan),
sumac pachaman pushai tucurca; chaipi mana yachashca shimicunata uyarca; chai shimicunata runa mana rimana ushan.
Chai ranata shuti jatanyachimanmi, ranti ñuca quiquin jmuca mana, ñucapi sanpa tiyashcamantaca imana ima chari.
Ñuca jatunyarincapac, mana nuspa runa shinachu racushca, shuti cashcallata rimacusha; ranti mana chashna ruram, ama maican runapash ñuca rimashcamanta, ñuca cashcamanta yallicta yuyancapac.
Chairaicu ama ñuca jatunyarincapac, shuc ñacarinata cui tucurcam, shuc casha shina aichapi satirahuan, supai cachamuhuashca uncui shina ñucata ñacachihuan.
Quimsa cuti Apunchicta mañashcani char nanaita anchuchihuachun;
ranti Apunchic rimahuarca: "Ñucapac ushaillahuan pacta charinqui, ñucapac ushai sanpacunapi ashtahuan yapa alli ricurin". Shina, sanpa cashpa yapa cushiyani, Cristopac ushai ñucapi ricurincapac.

Chash-nallata ñucapi sanpa tiyahuashcaraicu yapa cushiyani, piñai tucushpa, mana imatapash charishpa, Cristoraicu piñashpa japi tucushpa; ñucata ashtahuan yalli sanpa cashcapi, chaipi yalli sinchicani.

Shuc nuspa rana shina tucurcani, cancunaraicu chashna tucushcani. Cancunami ñucamanta alli rimana carcanquichic, mana imapi quipachu cani cancuna caticushca "yalli yachachiscacunamanta". ¡Ñuca yanca cashpallata!
Tucui cancuna ricushca mancharicushiyanacunata mana sanpayashpa cancuna ucupi rurarcani, tucui chashna rurashcacunahuan ricsishca saquirirca, ñuca quiquin yachachishca cashca.
Ñucanchictami piñan yuyashpa quishpichihuaichic, caillapi shuc iniccanamanta pishi cashcanquichic, cancanata ñuca mana imatapash mañashpa quillachishcallapi.

Caihuan cancunata quimsa cuti ricucrincapac ña allichirishcami cani, cunanpash mana imatapash mañashpa cancunata quillachishachu. Mana cancuna charishcatachu mashcani, cancunata jinumi mashcani; yayacunami churicuna-pacta cullquita tantachina canun yachihuan, churicuna yayacunapacta, mana.
Tucui shuncuhuan ñuca charishcata cushami, ñuca jinupash cancunapac allipac curishami; shina cacpipash ñuca ashtahuan cancunata llaquicpi, cancuna ashtahuan pishi llaquihuanquichic yachihuan.
Alli shutipacha, mañashpa cancunata mana quilla-chishcanichu. Chashna cacpipash, shuc tictapishi cancunata umachishpa urmachishcani, maicancuna ninun.
¿Ñuca cancunaman cachashca runacunahuanchu umachircani ima chari?

Titota cancunata ricucrichun rimarcani, paihuan shuc huauquita cacharcani. ¿Titochu cancunata umachirca? Cancuna ricushcanquichic yachin ima shina ñucanchic ishcai, shuclla yuyaihuan, shuclla ruraihuan rurashpa purishcata.

Cancunapac ñaupacpi ñucanchic rurashcamanta quishpinata mañashca shinami ricurin yachichuan, mana chaichu. Ashtahuan, Cristopac runacuna cashpami Diospac ñaupacpi rimacunchic. Shinapash tucui chai, llaquishca huauquicuna, cancunapac inina huiñashpa catincapacmi can.

Yuyarishcanimi, ñuca cancunata ricuncapac rishcapi, ¿ñuca munashca shinachu tupahuanquichic ima chari?, ¿ñucatapash cancuna munashca shinachu tupahuanquichic ima chari? Tiyancami yachihuan piñanacui, chiquichui, cancunapura piñanacuna, quiquinpacraiculla yuyana, camina, shucmanta rimana, jatunyarina, mana alli yachaicuna.

Ñuca quimsa cuti cancunata ricuncapac rishcapi, ñuca Dios pincachihuanca yachin cancunaraicu, achca cancanamantapash huacachihuanca yachihuan, huaquincuna unaimanta juchallishpa catiranun mari, chaira mana saquinushca yumashpa juchallinata, mana alli causaita, paicunapac aicha mañashcata chaira rurashpa catiranun.
Caihuanmi quimsa cuti cancunata ricucrmca rani. Imapash tiyacpi, ishcai quimsa ricuyaccunapac shimita uyashca huashami allichina tucunca.

Ñaupac juchallishpa causaccunata rimarcani, tucuicunatapash rimani, cunan carupi cashpapash cutillata rimani chaishuc cuti ricucrishcapi cancunata jinu rimashcata; cuti cancunata ricuncapac rishcapi, mana llaquishcahuan cuscatami taripasha,
cancuna mashcacunquichic mari Cristo alli shuti pachachu ñuca shimihuan riman imata. Cristoca cancunapac ñaupacpi mana sanpachu ricurishca, ashtahuan paipac ushaitami cancuna ucupi ricuchishca.

Shutimi can pai sanpa shina chacatai tucushca, ranti Diospac ushairaicu causacun. Chashnallata ñucanchicpash pai sanpa cashcata charinchic, ranti paihuan llutarishpa Diospac ushairaicu causashanmi cancanata yanapancapac.

Cancunallata tariparichic, inina cancunapi sinchichu can imata; cancuna quiquinllata camanacuichic cunan. ¿Manachu atipanquichic cancunapi .lcsucristo tiyacushcata? ¡Cancuna quiquinllata camanacushpa yalli tucushcapi chaipi shuti illancami!
Cancuna yachanquichicmi ñucanchic camana charishcapi mana alli tucushcata.

Chairaicu ñucanchic Dios-huan rimarishcapi, cancuna mana allicunata ama rurancapac paita mañanchic; mana ñucanchic taripai tucushcata ricsichincapac, ashtahuan cancuna allicunata rurancapac, ñucanchic camai tucushcapi yalli tucushca shina ricuricpipash.
Shuti cashcata huacllichincapac mana ushanchic, paita catinalla tucunchic.
Chairaicu yapa cushiyanchic ñucanchic sanpa cashcamanta, shinapash cancuna sinchi tucunata chapashpa; Dios-huan rimarishpa catishunmi cancuna pacta runa tucunacama.

Chaira cancunata mana ricucrishcallapita cai quillcata cancunaman cachani, ama yapa millai apu shina pactasha nini; shuti apumi cani Apunchic munashcaraicu, mana cancunata huacllichincapac, ashtahuan cancunapac inina huiñashpa catincapacmi.

Tucuchincapac, huauquicuna, cancuna causana cushi cancapac munani, cancunapac causana pactachishca tucunacama mashcaichic. Tucuipura sinchicurishpa, shuclla yuyaihuan, alli causaihuan; cashnami cuyanata, alli causanata cuc Dios cancunahuan causanca.
Chuya muchashcahuan muchana-cuichic.
Tucui iniccuna cancunata yuyarinun.
Apunchic Jcsucristopac ushai, Diospac llaquina, Diospac Samaipash tucui cancanahuan tiyanuchun.
Ñuca, Pablo, Apostol cani, mana runacuna cachashca, mana runacuna shayachishcaraicuchu cani; Jesucristo jinu, paita causachic Yaya Dios-huan shayachishcami cani.
Ñuca, tucui caipi ñucahuan tiyacuc huauquicunantin, Galaciapi tiyac Diosta iniccunaman cai quillcata cachacunchic.
Ñucanchicpac Yaya Dios, Apunchic Jesucristontin Diospac cuyaita, ganas causaitapash cancunapi tallichinuchun.
Jesu-cristo huañuiman curirca ñucanchic juchacunaraicu, cunan causacushca huacllishca pachamanta ñucanchicta quishpichinca-pac, Dios Yaya munashcata pactachishpa.
Diosta huiñaipac jatunyachishun. Chashna cachun.
Cancuna utcalla Diosmanta chicanyarishcaraicu yapa mancharishcami cani; pai Cristopac llaquinapi paiman cancunata cayarca, cancunaca chican quishpina shimita yachachiccunahuan rishcanquichic.
Alli nicpi mana tiyanchu shuc quishpina shimi. Rimacpica shuc runacuna mari cancunata pantachic tiyanun, Cristopac quishpina shimita pantata yachachishpa.
Chashnamanta, maicanpash ñucanchic ña yachachishca quishpina shimimanta chicanta yachachishpa huañuchun; ñucallata imapash, jahua pachamanta angel imapash cancami, mana imanancachu.
Ñaupa cancunaman rimashcata cutillata nini: Maicanpash ña cancuna chasquishca quishpina shimimanta chicanta yachachishpa, chai runa huañuchun.
Mana runacunata cushiyachinatachu mashcani, Diostami cushiyachinata munani. Runacunapacpi alli ricui tucuc cashpa, mana Cristota yanapacchu caiman.
Caita yachapaichic, huauquicuna: Ñuca yachichicushca quishpina shimi mana runa yuyaimantachu llucshishca.
Manapi runamanta yacharcanichu, manapi runamanta chasquircanichu, Jesucristo jinullatami ricsichihuarca.
Cancuna uyashcanquichicmi ima shina callari pachapi ñuca, judio yachaita caticushpa, tucui ñuca ushaihuan, Diosta miccunata piñashpa japircani, paicunata tucuchinatapash munarcani.
Ñuca judic yachaita caticushcapi, ñucanchic llactamanta shuc maltacunamanta ashtahuan yalli sinchi llutarishcami carcani ñucanchic inishcaman, rucunapac yachaicunata cuscata caticmi carcani.
Shinapash, Dios ñuca chaira mana pacarishcallapita acllahuarca, pai ñucata yapa llaquishcaraicu cayahuarca. Pai rimashca pacha pactashcapi,
paipac Churita ricsichihuarca, paipac quishpina shimita Diosta mana ricsiccunaman ricsichincapac. Chashna tucushcapi manapi runahuan rimarircanichu;
Jerusalenmanpash mana rircanichu, ñucamanta ñaupac apostol caccunata ricuncapac. Ashtahuan, utcalla Arabia allpaman rircani, chai huasha Damascoman ticramurcam.
Quimsa huata huasha Jerusalenman ticrarcani, Pedrota ricsina yuyaihuan; paihuan chunca pichca puncha tiyarcani.
Chashnapash mana shuc apostolcunata ricurcanichu, Apunchicpac huauqui Santiagollatami ricurcani.
Cai ñuca cancunaman quillcacushca mana llullachu, Diospac ñaupacpimi shuti cashcata rimani.
Siria, Cilicia allpacunaman chai huasha rircani.
Ran-ti Judeapi tiyac inic huauquicuna ñuca ricushpa jinu mana ric-sihuanurcachu.
Cai rimaillata ñucamanta uyanushcarca:"Ca-llari pacha ñucanchicta piñashpa japic runa, cunaca pai ñaupac chincachina munashca quishpichic shimita yachachic cachan".
Chashnamanta ñucaraicu Diosta chacchaccuna carca.
Chunca chuscu huata huasha cutillata Jerusalenman Bernabehuan rircanchic, Titotapash ñucahuan pusharcani.

Rircanimi Dios rimahuashcaraicu. Ña Jerusalenpi cashcapi, pushaccamacunahuan shuc tantarinata charircanchic, chaipi ricsichircani, ñuca quishpichic shimita Diosta mana ricsiccanaman ricsichicushcata. Chashna rurarcanimi, ama ñuca ñaupac rurashca, cunan ruracushcapash ama yanca rurashcalla saquirichun nishpa.
Chashnapi, Titollatapash pai griego cashcamanta pincai carata pitirincapac mana rimanurcachu.

Maicancuna yanca huauqui shina tucushpa pacalla miticushpa ñucanchic ucupi satirinushcarca; ñucanchic Cristo Jesuspi mana huatara shina sumac causashcata ricushpa huasha, cutillata camachic quillcapi huatachishpa urmachinarai-cu.
Shinapash mana ansallapash umachi tucurcanchicchu, quishpichic shimi shuti cashca cancunapi saquirincapac munashcaraicu.
Ranti pushaccamacuna huasha ima rurana cashcata mana rimanahuanurcachu (chai pushaccamacuna paicuna ñaupac cashcata mana yachanayanichu, Diosca mana runa jahua ricurishcaraicuchu taripan).

Ima ruranacunata rimana rantimanta, chaipi allipacha yachanacurca Dios paita mana ricsiccunaman quishpichic shimita yachachincapac ñucaman mincashcata, judiocunata yachachincapac Pedrota mincashca shina.
Pedrota judiocunapacman apostol shayachishca huasha cachac Diosllatami, ñucatapash Diosta mana ricsiccunaman apostol cachahuarca.

Chairaicu, Santiago, Pedro, Juanpash, paicuna iniccunamanta sapi canurca, paicuna allipacha ricsinurca cai mincanata Dios ñucaman cushcata. Ñucanchicta allipacha mashita rurashpa, ñucata Bernabetapash paicuna maquita cunurca, ñucanchic Diosta mana ricsiccana ucupi llancacushca-pash allimi ninurca, ranti paicunaca judio ucupi llancashpa catinunca.
Tsuntsucunamanta ama cuncarincapaclla rimai tucurcanchic, chaita shuti mana pishiyashpa pactachishcanhni.
Ranti Pedro Antioquia llactaman rishcapi, quiquin ñahuipi paita piñarcani, pai rurashca manapacha alli cashcaraicu.

Cashna carca; ñaupacmanta mana judio runacunahuan micucurca, Santiago cachamushca runacuna pactamunacama; chaipi chicanyancapac callarirca, ña paicunahuan micunata saquirca, pincai cara pitirinamanta rimaccunata manchashcamanta.
Inic judiocunapash Pedro umachishcahuan racushcata alli ricunurca, imata ña Bernabepash paicuna shinallata rurana tucurca.

Chairaicu, quishpichic shimi yachachishcata paicuna mana pactachicucpi ricushpa, tucui tantarishcacunapac ñanpacpi Pedrota rimarcani: "Can judio cashpallata, mana judio shina causacushcanqui; shina cacpi, ¿mana judio runacunata, judio shina causana canquichic nishpa rimana allichu?".
Pacarishcamanta ñucanchic judio canchic, mana Diosta mana ricsic juchasapachu canchic.

Chashnapash yachanchic ima shina manapi runapash juchamanta quishpira saquirinchic Moisespac camachic quillcata pactachishcamanta, ranti Jesucristollata inishcamanta. Chairaicu ñucanchicpash Jesucris-topi inishcanchic, cai ininaraicu juchamanta quishpichi tucuncapac, ranti mana camachic quillcata pactachishcaraicu.
Cunan ricushun, Cristoraicu juchamanta quishpinata mashcacushpallata, cuti ñucanchicllata juchasapa cashpa, ¿chashnapica Cristomi ñucanchicta juchasapa ruranchu rimashun? ¡Manapacha chashnachu!
Imatapash huacllichishca huasha cutillata allichishpa, amullata juchayuc cashcata ricsichicuni.
Ñucamanta nicpi, camachic quillcapi cashpa, paipac ña huañurcani, Diospaclla causancapac Cristohuan chacatai tucushcami cani,
ña mana ñucachu causani, Cristomi ñucapi causan. Cunan ñuca aichapi causacushca causaita, Diospac Churipi inina charishcaraicumi causacuni, pai ñucata llaquishcamanta ñucaraicu huañuiman curirca.
Dios yapa alli shuncuyuc cashcata mana chicanman jichunayanichu; camachic quillcata pactachishcamanta ñuca juchamanta quishpira saquirina cacpi, Cristo yancamanta chari huañushca canman.
¡Upa Galacia runacuna! ¿Pitac cancunata sacrarca? Ñucanchic yachachishcapi quiquin cancunapac ñahuipi mari ricuchircanchic chacatashca Jesucristota.

Cai ta-pushcallata cutipahuaichic ninimi: ¿Moisespac camachic quillcata pactachishcaraicuchu Diospac Samaita chasquircan-quichic?, ¿astahuan ñucanchicmanta uyashca shimipi inishca-raicuchu chasquircanquichic?
Yapalla upachu canquichic, chashna Diospac Samaihuan callarishpallata, cunan cuti runa yachaillapi catina manancapac.
¡Chai tucui alli yachashcacu-na yanca canushca! Manapacha, mana yanca canushcancachu ninimi.

Dios cancunata paipac Samaita jinu cushpa, cancuna ucupi mancharicushiyanacunata rurashpa, ¿yancachu ruran? Mana cancuna camachic quillcata pactachishcaraicuchu ruran, ranti cancuna uyashca shimita inishcaraicumi ruran.
Abrahan Diosta inirca, chairaicu Dios paita jucha illac shina chasquirca.
Chashnamanta, cancana yachana canquichic inina chariccunalla Abrahanpac quiquin churicuna cashcata.

Dios mana judio runacunatapash juchamanta paicuna inina charishcaraicu quishpichina ñaupacta yachashpa, camachic quillcapi Abrahanta cai sumac shimita ricsichirca: "Canraicumi tucui llactacuna bendisiashca canunca".
Chashnamanta tucui iniccuna, Abrahanhuan bendisiai tucunun, paipash mish-caraicu.
Moisespac camachic quillcapi ynyaita churaccuna maldisiashca canun, cashna camachic quillcata rimashcaraicu: "Maldisiashca cachun maicanpash tucui camachic quillcapi rimashcata mana pactachic runa".

Chashnamanta, ricunalla oan ima shina mana pipash juchamanta quishpichi tucushcata camachic quillca rimashcata pactachishcaraicu, cashna camachic quillca riman: "Inina charishcaraicumi chuya shuncuyuc runa causanca".
Ranti Moisespac camachic quillcaca mana ininamanta rimanchu, paica cashnami riman: "Camachic quillcata pactachic runa, pairaicumi causanca".

Camachic quillcapi maldisiai tucushcamanta Cristo ñucanchicta quishpichirca, pai jinu maldisiai ñucanchicraicu tucushpa, cashna camachic quillca riman: "Pipash caspipi huarcuchishpa huañushpa maldisiashca cachun".

Cai chashna tucurcami, mana judio runacunamanpash Abrahanta Dios cusha nishca bendision Cristo Jesuraicu pactana ushancapac; chashnami inina charishcamanta, Dios cusha nishca Samaita tucuicuna chasquina ushashun.
Hauquiccuna, runa atipaipac shimipimi rimani: Pactachina shimita shuc runa cushpa, cuti chai jahuapi paipac shutita quillcacpi, mana pipash shuc quillcata yapachina, anchuchina imapash ushan.
Chashnallata Dios Abrahanman paipac churimanpash cusha nishcacunata curca. Camachic quillcapi mana "churicunaman" rimanchu, shucllamantami riman; rimanmi: "canpac churimanpash", chaica Cristo can.

Caitami rimacuni: Dios Abrahanhuan shimita cunacunurca, paica chaita pactachirca. Chairaicu, Moisespac camachic quillca, pai chuscu patsac quimsa chunca huata huasha shamushca cashpa, mana ushanchu cunacushca shimita anChuchishpa, Dios cusha nishcata mayanman jichuncapac.
Dios ñucanchicman cunca rashca Moisespac quillcaraicu pactarina cashpa, ña mana cusha nishcachu canman; ranti Dios ña rimashca carca: Ñuca cusha nishcata Abrahanman cuyashami.

Shina cacpi, ¿Moisespac camachic quillca imallapash allichu can? Paica huashami cui tucurca runacuna mana uyashcata ricsichincapac; chai "churi" pactamunacama, paita cusha nishcami tiyarca. Angelcunahuan camachic quillcacui tucurCa, Moisesca Dios-huan runacunahuan rimarishcata chinpachic carca.
Ranti shuclla runa tiyashcapi chinpachiccama mana mutsurin, Diosca shucllami can.

¿Moisespac camachic quillca Dios cusha nishcata piñanmi rimanchicchu? Mana chaichu can. Camachic quillca causaita cuna ushac cacpi, ñuca jucha illac tucuiman cai camachic quillca rimashcata pactachishpa.
Ranti camachic quillca rimashcapi, tucuilla juchapi huatai tucushca canun, Jesuscristota iniccunalla Dios cusha nishcata chasqui ushancapac.
Inina chaira mana tiyashcapi, ñucanchicta huatashcata camachic quillca charirca, inina ricsi tucunacama.
Huatashca runa huahuacunata pushashca shina, camachic quillca ñucanchicta Cristoman pusharca, paita inishcahuan juchamanta pichara saquirincapac.
Cunan inina ña pactamurca, chairaicu huatara charic camachic quillcamanta chicanyashca canchic.
Cunan cancuna Cristo Jesuspi inina charishcaraicu tucuilla Diospac churi canquichic;
bautismoraicuca Cristohuan llutarishca tucushcanquichic, paita jinu churarishcapash canquichic.
Cunan ña mana imananchu judio cana, griego cana, huatara cana, quishpira cana, huarmi cana, cari cana imapash, Cristohuan llutarishca cashpa tucui cancuna shuclla cashcaraicu.
Cristopac cashpa, chaipi shuti Abrahanpac churicuna, Dios paita cusha nishcata chasquinacuna canquichic.
Caitami rimanayani: japinata chasquina chaira huahua cashcapi, shuc aillu ucupi huatara runa tiyashcamanta mana imapi chican ricurin, tucuipac amu cashpapash.
Shuc runacuna paita ricuccama tiyanan, pai rurana cashcata rurashpa cunun, paipac yaya rimashca pacha pactanacama.
Ñucan-chicpi chashnallata tucun: ñucanchic huahua cashcapi, cai pachamanta pacashca amucuna ñucanchicta huatara charinurca.
Ranti ña rimashca pacha pactarishcapi, Dios paipac Churita cachamurca, pai shuc huarmimanta pacarirca, Moisespac camachic quillcapi rimashcata pactachina tucurca;
chai camachic quillcahuan huatashcacunata quishpichishpa, Dios-pacpi ñucanchic churicuna shina chasqui tucuna ushancapac.
Ña paipac churicuna cashcata ricsichincapac, Dios paipac Churipac Samaita ñucanchic shuncucunaman cachamurca; chai Samaica caparin: "Ñuca yaya".
Shina cacpi, can ña mana huatara runa canqui, Diospac churimi canqui; paipac churi cashpa, japina cashcata chasquina canqui, pai chashna munashcaraicu.
Ñaupa, cancuna Diosta mana ricsic cashcapi, dioscunapi huatara carcanquichrc, alli rimacpi paicuna mana dioschu canun.

Ranti cunan ña Diosta ricsiccuna cashpa, ashtahuan allita rimacpi, cancuna Dios ricsishcacuna cashpallata, ¿alllichu canca cutillata chai sanpa tsuntsu ushaicunaman urmashpa, paipac huataracuna tucuncapac?
Cancuna raiminquichic maican punchacuna, quillacunapi, yuyarishca panchapi, huatapi imapash...
Yancamantami cancuna ucupi llancashcani yachihuan.
Huauquicuna, ñucata catihuaichic cancunata rimani, ñucapash cancuna shina tucushcaraicu. Mana imapipash piñachihuashcanquichiccu.
Cancuna ña yachanquichic, ñuca callarishcapi Cushi Shimimanta yachachincapac, shuc uncuita ñacaricushpami chaitaca rurarcani.

Chai uncui cancunata camancapac carca, cancuna ñuca chai uncuita charicpipash mana piñahuarcanquichic, mana callpachihuarcanquichic; chaipac rantimanta, shuc Diospac angelta shina chasquihuar-canquichic, quiquin Jesucristo cacpi shina.
¿Cancuna chai pacha cushiyashca tucurircachu? Cancunamanta allita yuyarish-pa rimanimi, cancuna ushashpa, ñahuitapash surcurinquichic-manmi carca ñucata cuncapac.
Cunanca, ¿cancunata chicnicchu cani, shuti cashcata rimashcaraiculla?

Chai runacuna cancunapi ñahuita churanushcami, shinapash paicuna ruranca racushca mana allichu can. Paicuna cancunata ñucanchicmanta chicanyachincapac munanun, chai huasha cancuna paicunamanlla yuyarinuchun nishpa.
Shuc-cunamanta yapa yuyarina yapa allimi can, shinapash alli yuyaihuan; huiñaipac cachun, mana cancunahuan ñuca tiyacushcallapi.
Ñuca huahuacunalla, cutillatami cancuna-raicu nanaicunata ñacarini, shuc huachanca racuc mama charishca nanaicunata shina; ñacaricushallami cancanapi Cristo allipacha pactamunacama.
Cancunahuanshi cunanshitullata chaipi tiyacuiman cancuna atipaipac shimipi rimancapac, pita yachashun, cancunata imana rimacpi chari alli tucunman.
Caita cutipahuichic, cancuna Moisespac camachic quillcata pactachina munaccuna: ¿manachu uyashcanquichic chai camachic quillca rimashcata?
Abrahan ishcai churitami charirca riman: shuc churi huatara huarmimanta, shucca quiquin huarmimanta; chai huarmica mana huatara carca.
Huatara huarmipac churi tucui runa shina pacarirca; ranti quishpira huarmipac churica Dios cusha nishca pactarincapac pacarirca.
Chashna tucushca yapa ricsichin; caran huarmi shuc cunacushca shimita ricSichin; shucca Sinai urcupi cunacushca shimita ricsichin; Agar can chai, cai cunacushca shimipi pacariccuna huatara pacarinun.
Allita rimacpi, Agar, Arabiapi tiyac Sinai urcu can; yuyaricpi cunan tiyac Jesuralen can; cai llacta huatara can tucui paipac churicunantin.
Ranti jahua pachamanta Jerusalen quishpira can, ñucanchicca paipac churicuna canchic.

Camachic quillca cashna rimashcaraicu: Mana huahuayuc huarmi, cushiyai, can mana huahuayuc canqui; can mana huahua pacarina nanaita ricsic, cushiyashpa capari. Jichui tucushca nuarmi cariyuc huarmimanta yalli achca huahuayuc tucuna cashcaraicu.
Huauquicuna, cancuna Isaac shinami canquichic; Dios cusha nishca huahuacunami canquichic.
Chai pachapi tucui runa shina pacaric churi, Samaimanta pacaric churita piñashpa japishca shina, chashnallatami cunanpash tucun.

¿Chashna-manta camachic quillca rimashcata yachanquichicchu? Caita rimau: "Huatara huarmita huahuantin callpachi, quishipira huarmipac churi japina cashcata huatara huarmipac churihuan mana chaupichirincachu.
Shina cacpi, huauquicuna, mana huatara nuarmipac churicunachu canchic, quishpira huarmipac churicunami canchic.
Cristo ñucanchicta quishpinata curca ñucanchic quishpira cancapac. Chairaicu chai quishpina charishcapi sinchicushpa causaichic, ama cuti huatara causanaman ticrashpa.
Uyahuaichic. Ñuca, Pablo, cancunata runanimi cancuna pincai carata pitichicpi, Cristo cancunapac mana imapash allichu canca.
Maican cara pitiric runatapash cutillata rimanayani, Moisespac camachic quillcapi rimashcata tucuita pactachinami can.
Camachic quillcata pactachishpa jucha-manta quishpinata cancuna mashcanquichic, chashna rurashpa Cristomanta chicanyashcanquichic; Diospac llaquinamantapash chicanyashcanquichicmi.
Ranti ñucanchicca Samairaicu ñu-canchic ininaraicupash juchamanta quishpichi tucunata chapan-chic.
Cristo Jesusman llutarishca cashpa, pmcai cara pitira, mana cara pitira cana yancami can. Jnina shuti allimi can, cai ininapash llaquinacushpa causanata ñucanchicman cuchun.
Cancuna alli caticurcanquichic. Shuti cashcata cancuna uyanata saquincapac, ¿pipash camachircachu?
Cancunata cayac Dios mana cashcancachu.
"Ansashitu levadura achca harinata punquichinmi", rimai tiyan;
Apunchicpi ñuca chapani cancana mana shuc yuyaita japina cashcamanta; ranti cancunata pantachic ranata Dios ñacachincami, pi cacpipash.

Huauquicuna, ranti, ñuca iniccunata pincai cara pitirinami chaira rimashpa puricpi, judiocuna mana piñashpa japihuanunmanchu; chashna cacpi Cristopac crusmanta yachachishca paicunata mana piñachinmanchu.
Ñuca yuyanimi chai cancunata quillachishpa puriccuna, shuc railla paicunallata curuta muyuta surcuricpi alli canman.
Huauquicuna, quishpira cancapac cancuna cayai tucurcanquichic. Shinapash cai quishpirapi ama ruranquichic-chu cancana aicha mañashcata. Ashtahuan llaquinacushcaraicu tucuipura yanaparina canquichic.
Camachic quillcapi rimashca cai pactachina shimipi pactacta tiyan; "shuc runata canpac quiquin aichata shina llaquina canqui".
Yuyashpa causaichic, cancanapura caninacushpa, micunacushpa causash-pa, cancunapurallatami huacllirinquichic.
Chashnamanta rimani: Samai munashca shina causaichic, ama cancana mana alli munashcacunata ruraichic-chu.
Mana alli munaicunahuan Samaihuan chicnicpura canun. Shuc shuccanahuan chicnicpura cashcaraicu, cancuna mana ushanquichic cancuna munashcata rurancapac.
Ranti cancunata Samai pushacpi, chaipi shuti camachic quillcamanta chican canquichic.
Mana alli munaicunata caticcuna rurashcata ricsinalla can: yumashpa juchallinun, ticllayuc, mana allicunata rurashpa juchallinun,
huacacunata chacchanun, sacrachinun. Huiñaipac piñarishca causanun, chicanyashpa, tunpashpa. Piñarisiqui canun, piñanacuchinun, chausichinun, chicanyachi-nun.
Chiquicuisiqui canun, machaisiqui, micuisiqui, tucui mana allita ruranunllami. Cancunata rimani ñaupac rimashca shina: chashna causaccuna Diospac pachaman mana yaicanun-cachu.
Ranti Samaica caita cun: Llaquina, cushiyana, ganas causai, mana piñarishpa chapana, llaquic cana, alli shuncuyuc cana, rimashcata pactachic,
mana amu munashcallata rurac, samaita catic. Tucui chaicunata mana maican camachic quillca cautsayachina ushanchu.
Jesucristopac caccuna juchasapa canata tucui manaalli munaicunantin illactami chacatanushca.
Samairaicu cunan causacushpa saquishun Samaillata ñucanchicta purichichun.
Jatunyana ñucanchicpi ama tiyachun, ama piñanacuita, chiquicuitapash ñucanchic ucupi churashun.

Huauquicuna, pitapash juchapi urmashcata ricushpa, cancuna samaihuan puriccuna cashpa, pai alliman ticrancapac yanapana canquichic. Ranti yapa llaquishcahuan rurana canquichic; shinapash caran runa yuyarishpalla rurachun, yancamanta cancunapash juchanayaipi urmanquichicman.
Ima llaquipash tiyashcapi tucuilla yanaparichic, chashnami Cristo rimashcata pactachinquichic.
Pi runapash mana ima cashpallata jatunyarishpa, paillata umarishca tucun.
Caran amu paipac quiquin causaita taripachun; paimantallata cushiyanata charishpa cushiyachun, shuccunamantaca mana.
Caran amumi quiquin paipac llaqui llashaita apari cachana tucun.
Cushi Shimimanta yachacuc, yachachic-huan tucui pai charishcata chaupichinacan.
Ama cancunallata umarichichu: Diosta mana pipash asinchu. Quiquin tarpushcatami pallana tucunchic.
Mana alli munaicunata tarpuc, chai mana alli munaicunamanta pallanca. Ranti Samai munashcata tarpucca, Samaimantami huiñaipac causanata pallanca.
Chairaicu mana sanpayashpa alli rnranacanata rurana canchic; mana sanpayashpa catishpaca, paipac pacha pactashcapi pallashunmi.
Chairaicu, caran ushashcapi tucuicunata alli rurashcahuan yanapana canchic, inic huauquicanata ashtahuan yalli yanapana canchic.
¡Cancuna ricuichic ima shina jatun quillcacunahuan quiquin ñuca maquihuan cunan cancunata quillcacuni!
Cancunata pincai cara pitirincapac rimaccuna, runacunapac ñaupacpi alli saquirincapacllami can, Cristopac crusraicu ama piñashpa japi tucushun nishpallami chashna ruranun.

Shinapash, chashnu cara pitirishca cashpallata, mana tucui camachic quillcapi rimashcata pactachinunchu. Chashna cancunata pincai cara pitirincapac rimanun, chashna cancuna aichapi chai ricuric mircata rurachishca huasha, paicuna jatunyarishun nishpami can chaita.
Ranti ñucaca, Apunchic Jesucristopac crusmantallami jatanyarina munani, mana shuc imamantapash.
Pincai cara pitirishca, mana pitirishca cana mana imapash allichu can; mushu causaita charina, chaimi alli can.
Tucui cashna causaccuna ganas causaita Diospac llaquinata chasquichic Diospac quiquin runacunantin.
Caimanta huashaman mana munanichu pipash llaquicanata apamuhuancapac; ñuca aichapi charishca mircacuna Jesuspac yanapac cashcata ricsichiranun.
Huauquicuna, Apunchic Jesucrsito paipac cuyaita cancunapi tallichichun. Chashna cachun.
Ñuca, Pablo, Dios munashcaraicu Jesucristopac apostol cani, Efeso llactapi tiyac Diospac runacunaman, Cristo Jesusta iniccunaman cai quillcata cachani.
Ñucan-chicpac Yaya Dios Apanchic Jesucristontin paicunapac cuyaita ganas causaitapash cancanapi tallichinuchun.
Dios Yayata chacchashunchic, pai Jesucristopi tucui laya allicunata jahua pachamanta ñucanchicman curca.
Cai pachata chaira mana rurashcallapita, ñucanchicta Jesuscristopi acllarca paipac ñaupacpi tiyancapac, paipacta chicanyachishca, jucha illaccuna. Pai ñucanchicta llaquishcamanta,
Jesucristo-raicu pai huiñachishca huahuacuna cancapac japishca carcanchic, pai chashna munashcaraicu.
Chairaicunamanta huiñaipac Diosta chacchanchic pai cuyashcacunamanta, chaicunahuanmi ñucanchicta bendisiarca paipac llaquishca Churipi.
Dios achca llaquishcapi, paipac Churi tallichishca yahuar-raicu ñucanchicta huatara cashcamanta llushpichishca juchacunamantapash ñucanchicta pichashcami.
Dios ñucanchicpac yuyaita punchayachishpa, tucui atipanata cushpa, pai achca llaquishcata ricsichishca,
pai pacara charishca yuyaitapash ñucanchicman ricsichishca, rimacpi pai unaimanta rurana yuyarishcata.
Pai rimashca pactarishcapi, Dios tucuita Cristopac maquipi churanca ran, jahua pachamanta, cai pachamanta tucui imacunata.
Dios unaimanta ñucanchicta acllashcarca, ñucanchic Cristohuan llutarishca cashcaraicu japina cashcata japina ushancapac, Diosllata munashca shina; paimi tucui paipac ñahuipi alli ricurishcata ruran.
Ñucanchic Cristopi tucuicunamanta ñaupac yuyaita churaccuna cacpi, Dios jatun cashcaraicu chacchashpa causancapacmi chashna rurashca.

Cancunapash shuti shimita uyashcapi, quishpichic shimimanta rimai tucushcapi, Cristota inishpa, paiman llutachishca tucurcanquichic, Diospac sellashcapash saquirir-canquichic pai cusha nishca Samairaicu.
Dios tucui paipaccunata quishpichishca huasha, ñucanchicjapina cashcata Diospac Samai ricuchicun, pai jatun ushaita charishcaraicu chacchai tucuncapac.
Chairaicu, Apanchic Jesuspi cancuna inina charishcata yachashpa, tucui Diospac runacunatapash llaquishcata yachashpa,
cancunaraicu Diosta pacrachunata manapacha saquinichu, Dios-huan rimarishcapi cancunamanta yuyarishpa.
Apunchic Jesucristopac Diosta, jatunyachishca Yayata mañani alli yachana yuyaita cancunaman cuyachun, pai yachachishcata alli atipashpa, ashtahuan allita ricsincapac.

Imata cancuna chapancapac cayai tucushcata yachancapac, ima shina jatan japina cashcata Dios paipac runacunaman cunca rashcata yachanuchun yuyaihuanmi, cancunapac yuyaitapash Dios punchayachichun nishpa mañani;
chash-nallata, mai jatun paipac ushai cashcatapash yachancapac mañanami, chai ñucanchicpi iniccuna cashcamanta rurarin. Chai ushai Dios tucui ushaihuan ricuchishcallatami,
pai huañushcamanta Cristota causachishpa, jahua pachapi paipac yachac maquiman tiyachishcapi,
tucui ushaicanamanta yalli ushaiyucta rurashpa, apucunamanta, amucunamanta, apunchic-cunamanta yalli, tucui cunan pachapi tiyac, huasha tiyanca racuc pachapi tiyashcamanta jahuapi churashpa.
Tucui imacunata Cristopac chaqui ucupi churarca, inuccunaman quiquin Cristo jinu curirca, paipac uma cancapac.
Jniccuna Cristopac aicha canun, Cristo paihuan pacta tucun; ranti Cristoca tucuicunapi pacta tucun.
Mana alli rurashcacunaraicu, juchacunaraicu, ñaupac cancuna huañushcami carcanquichic,
chashna causa-cushpa, cai pacha ruranata caticurcanquichic, huairapi puric chai samai amu munashcata rurarcanquichic; pai sinchicuchin Diosta mana uyana munaccunata.

Chashnallata callari pachapi tucui ñucanchicpash causacurcanchic, ñucanchic aicha munashcata, ñucanchic juchasapa cashcata, yuyai rimashcata catishpa. Chashna cashcamanta, Diospac manchaipac ñaca-chinata charina carcanchic, shuccuna shinallata.
Ranti Dios yapa llaquinata charishpa, ñucanchicta yapa llaquishpa,
Cristopi ñucanchicmanta causaita curca ñucanchic chaira juchacunaraicu huañushca cashcallapita. Dios alli shuncuyuc cashcaraicu quishpmata cancuna chasquircanquichic.
Cristo Jesus-huan pacta Dios huañushcamanta ñucanchicta causa-chirca, paihuanpash jahua pachapi ñucanchicta tiyachirca.
Huasha pachacunapi yapa ñucanchicta llaquishcata ricuchin-capac caita rurarca, Cristo Jesuspi pai yapa ñucanchicta lla-quishcata ricuchincapac.
Dios alli shuncuyuc cashcaraicu quishpinata cancuna chasquishcanquichic, cancuna inic cashca-raicu. Caica mana cancuna munaimanta tarishcachu can, Diosmi cancanaman curca.
Mana cancuna rurashcamantachu caita tupashcanquichic, chairaicu cancunamanta manapi runa imamantapash mana jatunyarina ushanchu;
Diosmi ñucan-chicta rurashca; paimi allicunata rurancapac Cristo Jesuspi ñucanchicta surcurca, pai chashnapac huiñaimanta munashca cashpa.
Shina cacpi, cancuna, mana judio caccuna, "mana pincai cara pitirishca"judiocuna cancanata rimanan (carata runa aichapi pitinun, "cara pitirishca canchic" paicunallata rimarinun),
yuyarichic cancuna ñaupac Cristo illac, israel llactamanta chican, Dios cusha nishcata mana japina cashcata yuyarichic. Dios illac, mana imata chapashpa cai pachapi causacurcanquichic.
Ranti cunan, Cristo Jesus yahuarta tallichishcaraicu paiman llutarishca canquichic; ñaupac caruyachishca tiyaccuna cunan mayanyachi tucushcanquichic.
Cristo ñucanchipac ganas causai can. Judio runacunamanta, mana judio runacunamanta pai shuclla llactata rurarca, cancunapura piñacushpa causashcata allichishpa. Quiquin paipac aichapi
camachic quillcata anchuchishpa, tucui chai quillca rimashcata anchuchishpa, ishcai chican llactamanta shuclla mushu llactata, paiman llutarishcata rurarca.
Pai cruspi huañushpa, ishcantin llactacuna macanacushpa causashcata tucuchichirca, paicunata Dios-huan alliyachirca, ishcantinmanta shuclla aichata rurashpa.
Tucuicunaman ganas causai shimicanata rimancapac Cristo shamurca, cancuna carupi tiyaccunaman paipac mayanpi tiyaccunamanpash.
Cristoraicu, shuc Samaillapi Yayapac-man pactana ushanchic tucuilla.
Chairaicu, cancuna ña mana chican runa canquichic, ña mana chican allpapi tiyanquichic; cunanca ashtahuan Diospac runacuna japina cashcata japina ushanquichic Diospac aillucunapash canquichic.
Shuc huasi shinami cancuna canquichic, yachachishcacuna; profetacuna chai huasipac sapi canun, ranti quiquin sinchicuchic rumica Jesucristollata can.
Cristoman llutarishpami, tucui huasi alli sinchicurishpa jahuaman jatarinca, Apunchicpi shuc sumac Diospac chicanyachishca huasi tucunacama.
Chashnallata cancunapash, Cristoman llutarishca cashpa, tucui cancanapura llutarinquichic Diospac huasi tucunacama; chaipimi Dios paipac Samaihuan causanca.
Chairaicumanta ñuca, Pablo, cancuna mana judio-cunapac allipac chunta curralpi quillcara cani Cristo Jesusraicu.
Cancuna ña yachanquichic ima chari Dios yapa alli shuncuyuc cashpa, cai llancanata mincahuashca cancunapac allipac.
Dios pai pacashca yuyaita pacllapi churashpa, ñucata ricsichihuarca; ñaupallata caimanta cancunata ansashituta quillcarcani.
Quillcata ricushpa, Cristopac pacara yuyaita ñuca ricsishcata cancuna atipanata ushanquichic;
callari pachapi manapi runata ricsichishca carca chai pacara yuyaita, ranti .cunan Dios paipac Samaihuan apostolcunaman, profeta-cunaman ricsichishca.

Caimi chai pacara shimi: mana judio runacuna, judio runacuna shinallata, japina cashcata Diospac shimita uyashpa chashquinunca; shuc aichamantallata cashpa, Cristo Jesuspi Dios cusha nishcata paicunapash japina canan.
Ñuca yanca cashpallata, Dios munashcaraicu cai quishpichic shimita yachachincapac mincai tucushcani.
Tucui Diosta iniccunamanta ñuca yalli uchillami cani; shina cacllipita, Cristo mana judio runacunata tucui cushi shimita ricsichincapac acllahuarca.
Tucuita rurac Dios unaimanta pacara charishca yuyaita tucui cancunaman ricsichincapac mincai tucurcam.
Chashna tucurca tucui jahua pachamanta ushaicuna Dios chai tucui yachai charishcata ricsincapac cunan iniccunaraicu.
Dios pai huiñaimanta yuyarishcata Apunchic Jesucristopi pactachirca.
Diosman Cristopi mayanyancapac ushanchic, ñucanchic paipi inishcaraicu.
Chairaicu ama sanpayaichicchu rimani ñuca cancunaraicu ñacarishcamanta, cancuna chaicanamanta ashtahuan jatanyaranami canquichic.
Chairaicumanta Yayapac ñaupacpi cuncarinimi,
paimantami tucui aillu cai pachapi jahua pachapipash shutita japinun.
Yayata mañanimi Diospac Samairaicu pai sumac achca charishcamanta cancunapac ucupi shinchicuita ushaitapash cuchun,
Cristopash cancuna inishcaraicu cancunapac shuncu ucupi causachun. Chashnami cancuna, sinchi tucushpa, llaquinapi sapiyashpa,
tucui iniccunahuan atipana ushanquichic Cristopac llaquina mai jatun cashcata.
Chairaicu, ricsichic rimani chai llaquinata; pai ñucanchic tucui ricsi ushashcamanta yalli jatunmi; chashnami can cancana Diospi pacta juntarishca cancapac.
Cunanca Dios jatunyachishca cachun; paimi ñucanchic mañashcamanta, ñucanchic yuyashcamanta yalli rurana ushan ñucanchicpi tiyac paipac ushaihuan.
Iniccuna ucupi Cristo Jesuspi huiñai huiñai jatanyachishca cachun. Chashna cachun.
Chashnamanta ñuca, Apunchicraicu chunta curralpi quilpara, cancunata mañani: Allita causaichic, Dios chaipac cancunata cayarca, allita causancapac.
Uchillayashca, alli shuncuyuc caichic; mana piñarishpa chapaichic, llaquishcahuan cancunapura llaqui tiyashcapi quishpichirichic.
Diospac Samai yanapashcahuan, tucuilla huancurishpa causaichic cancunata ña huancuchishca ganas causairaicu.
Shuclla aicha, shuclla Samai tiyan, Dios cancunata shuclla chapanata charincapac cayashca shina.
Shuclla Apunchic, shuclla inina, shuclla bautismo tiyan;
shuclla Dios tiyan, pai tucuicunapac yaya can, tucuicunamanta yalli can, tucuicunahuan ruracan, tucuicunapi tiyan.
Ranti ñucanchic caranlla Cristo cuyaicunailata japishcanchic.
Chairaicu camachic quillca riman: "Jahua pachaman sicarca piñashpa japishcacunata paihuan pushashpa, runacunataca paipac cuyaita curca".
"Sicarcami" nishcapi, ¿ima rimanayashcata yachanquichicchu? Ñaupactami cai allpaman uraicurca nishpami rimanayan.
Uraicuc runallatami jahua pacha jahuaman sicarca, pai pactashcahuan tucuita juntachincapac.
Paillata munarca maicancuna apostol cancapac, shuccunaca profeta cancapac, shuccunaca quishpichic shimita huillac cancapac, cuti shuccunaca michic cancapac, yachachic cancapac.
Chashnami paipac runacunata yanapac cancapac yachachirca, Cristopac aichata huiñachichincapac,
tucuilla ininapi Diospac Churita ricsinapi shucllapi huancurishca canacama. Chashnami ñucanchic yuyaita rucuyachishpa, Cristopi pactarishca tucushun.
Ña mana huahuacuna shinachu, shuc yuyaita charishcamanta chicanta yuyarishun; shuc mushu yuyaita mana japishunchu, pantashca ñanpita puric runacuna umachishcahuan yachachishcata.
Chaipac rantimanta, shuncumanta cusca shimihuan rimashpa, Cristoman huiñashpa rina canchic, paimi aicha uma can.
Cristoraicu tucui aicha mana huacllirishpa caticun; caran uchilla aichacuna alli caticucpi, tucuilla llaquinapi huiñashpa jatanyashpa catiranun.
Caitami Apunchicpac shutipi rimashpa mincani. ama Diosta mana ricsiccuna shina causaichicchu; paicunaca yanca yuyaicunata pactachinun,
paicunapac yuyaipash yana tuta shina can. Diosmanta shamuc causairaicu mana cushiyanun-chu, paicunapac shuncu upayashpa cashpa mana atipanun.
Sinchiyanurca, mana alli ruraicunapi urmanushca, mana allicunata mana sanpayashpa rurashpa catinunlla.
cancunaca mana chashna causancapacchu Cristota ricsircanquichic,
alli shutipacha paimanta jinu uyashca cashpa, paimanta jinu ima shina causana cashcata yachashca cashpa.
Cancunapac ñaupac causaita saquina canquichic; paica huacllishcami can, mana alli munaicunapi umai tucushcaraicu.
Caucunapac yuyaita causaitapash mushuya-china canquichic,
mushu runa tucuna canquichic, Dios munashca shina; chaica cusca causaihuan chuya shuncuyuc cansascahuan ricsichirin.
Chashnamama, amacuti llullanquichicchu, ashtahuan shuccunata shuti cashcallata rimaichic, tucuicuna shuc aichamantallatacashpa.
Piñarishpa ama juchallichicchu, cancanapac pinari ama chishiachun.
Supai cancuna rurashcapi ama satirichun.
Shuhuashpa causac saquichan shuhuanata, ashtahuan llancapac shayarichun; shuc alli llancanata paipac maquihuan rurashpa imallapash charichun tsuntsucuna mañashcapi cancapac.
Mana alli shimicunata ama rimaichicchu, ashtahuan alli shimicunata rimaichic, huiñancapac yanapaccunata, uyaccunata alliman pushancapac.
Diospac Samaita ama llaquichichicchu, paihua jahuisca mari carcanquichic, Diospac cashcata allipacha quishpichishca pancha ricsi tucancapac.
Cancunamanta jichuichic tucui piñanacunata, piñarinacunata, caparinacunata, piñanata, tucui laya mana allicunata.
Alli shuncuyuc caichic caranlla shuc-huan, quishpichinacuichic cancunapura, Dios Cristopi cancunata quishpichishca shina.
Cancuna, Dios llaquishca churicuna cashpa, pai shina cana canquichic.
Cancunapura llaquinacushpa purma canquichic, Cristo ñucanchicta llaquishca shina, llaquishcaman-ta ñucanchicraicu huañuiman curirca, sumac ashnac camari shina Diospac ñaupacpi curishpa.
Cancuna Diospac runacuna cashpa, cancana ucupi mana ansallapash rimana canquichic yumashpa juchallinamanta, shuc ticllayachic juchacunamanta cullqui mitsanamantapash.
Chashnallata ama rimaichicchu mana alli shimicunata, yanca rimaicunata, yanca runa rimashca shimicunatapash, chashna rimana mana alli cashcaraicu; chaipac rantimanta Diosta chacchaichic.

Caita yachaichic: maicanpash yumash-cahuan juchallishpa, ticllayachicta rurashpa juchallishpa, cullqui mitsac cashpa (chaita rurashpa huacata chacchashca shinallata can), mana yaicuna ushancachu Cristopac pachapi Diospac pachapipash.
Ama pipash cancunata yanca shimicunahuan umachichun, caicunaraicu mari manchaipac ñacarina Diosmanta shamun paita mana uyaccunapacman.
Chashna runacunahuan ama imatapash charichicchu.
Ñaupac cancuna tutapi causacurcanquichic, ranti cunan, Apunchicman llutarishca cashpa, achicpi causanquichic. Achicpaccuna shina causaichic,
achicca caita mari cun: yapa alli shuncuyuc cana, cusca rurana, shutita rimana.
Diospac ñahuipi alli ricuricllata ruraichic.
Tuta ucupi causaccuna shina, mana imapacpash allicunata cancunaca ama ruraichic-chu; ashatahuan, chasna mana allicuna pacllaman surcushpa, mana alli cashcata ricsichichic.
Pacallapi paicuna rurashcata rimancapacllapash pincanayanmi;
ranti achic-huan pacllapi tucui rurashcacunata surcushpa ricuchicpi, tucui pasacta ricurin,
tucuita mari achic pacllapi surcushpa ricuchin. Chairaicu caita ninun: "Can puñucuc, causari; huañushca-cunamanta jatari, Cristo canta achic-huan ricuchincami".
Chairaicu, cancunapac causana layata alli ricuna canquichic.
Causaicama allicunata ruraichic, cai punchacuna mana allicuna mari canun.
Rurashcapi, ama jahuata yuyaihuan ruraichicchu, Apunchic munashcata mashcaichic.
Ama machaichicchu, machai ashtahuan juchallinamanmi aisan; chaipac rantimanta, Diospac Samaihuan juntarichic.
Tantarishcapi Dios-huan rimarichic, taquichic shuncumanta yuyarishcahuan. Taquishcahuan cancunapac shuncupi Apun-chicmanta cushiyaichic,
Dios Yayata, Apunchic Jesucristo-pac shutipi, tucui imacunamanta pacrachuichic.
Cristoraicu cancunapura yanaparishpa causaichic.
Cariyuc huarmicuna, cancunapac carita uyaichic Apunchicta shina.
Carica huarmipac uma mari can, Cristo iniccunapac uma casha shina. Cristoca iniccunata Quishpichic can, iniccana aicha canun;
iniccuna Cristota uyashca shina, cariyuc huarmicanapash tucuipi carita uyana canun.
Caricuna, cancunapac huarmita yapa llaquina canquichic, Cristo iniccunata llaquishca shina, llaquishcamanta mari pairaicu causaita curca.
Chashnami Diospacta chicanyachirca iniccunata pai rimashcahuan sumacyachishpa bautismo yacuhuanpsh maillashpa,
iniccunata shuti munarcami paipac ñaupallapita ricuchincapac, jatunyachishca-ta, mana ticllayuc, mana sipuyashcata, mana imapi huacllishcayuc, ranti chicanyachishcata, alli pacta tucushcata.
Huarmiyuc cari paipac quiquin aichata llaquishca shina, paipac huarmita llaquina can. Huarmita llaquic cari quiquin amupac aichallata llaquicun.
Manapi runa quiquinpac aichata chicninchu, ashtahuanpash paita caran, allita ricun, Cristo iniccunahuan rurashca shina,
paipac aicha cashcaraicu. Ñucanchicca chai aichamanta uchilla aichacuna canchic.
"Chairaicu cari runa paipac yayata mamata saquinca paipac huarmihuan llutarincapac, chashna ishcantincu-na shuclla runa shina canunca".
Cai jatun pacara shimimi can; ranti ñucaca Cristomanta iniccunamanta yuyarishpami rimacuni.
Chashna cashcaraicu cancunamanta caranlla quiquinta shina huarmitapash llaquina canquichic, ranti huarmica paipac carita yupaichachun.
Churicuna, Apunchicta llaquishcaraicu yaya mamata uyaichic, chai mari alli can.
Cai rurai nishca shuc cusha nishcata charin: "Yayata mamata yupaichanqui, chashna cushi causashpa, cai pachapi anaita causanqui".
Yayacuna, churicunata ama piñachichicchu, ashtahuan cuscata yachachishpa huiñachichic Apunchicta llaquinatapash yachachishpa.
IIuatara runacuna, cai pachapi tiyac cancunapac amucunata uyaichic. Cristota yanapacushca shina, yupaichash-cahuan, manchaihuan, uchillayashcahuan ruraichic.
Mana paicuna ricucushcallapi yanapana canquichic, paicunapacpi alli ricui tucushun nishpa; Cristota yanapac shinami rurana canquichic, tucui shuncuhuan Dios manashcata pactachishpa.
Apunchicta yanapacushca shina cancuna llancashcata ruraichic, mana runacunapacta ruracuc shina.
Ña cancana yachanquichic ima shina caran runa, huatashca cashpa, quishpira cashpa imapash, alli rurashcacunamantallami Apanchicmanta chasquinata charishun.

Cancuna amucuna, cancunata yanapaccunata ama piñashcahuan rimaichicchu. Yuyarina canquichic cancuna paicunantin jahua pachapi tiyac Apunchicpac cashcata, paica runacunata mana chicanyachishpachu ricun.
Cunan, huauquicuna, Apunchicpi sinchi tucuichic, paipac sinchi ushaihuan.
Supaita yallincapac Dios cushca jillaimanta churarinata churarichic.
Mana aichayuc runahuanchu macanacucunquichic, jahua pachamanta mana ricuric ushaicanahuanmi macanacucanquichic; paicuna cai yana tuta pachapi tucui ushaita charinun.

Chairaicu, cancunata, japichic, limani Dios cushca jillaimanta churarinata, mana alli pancha pactashcapi sinchicuna ushancapac, macanacui tiyash-capi mana shuc chaqui huashaman jaitarishpa yallincapac.
Sinchicushpa causaichic, shuti shimita churarishpa, cusca causai quishpichishca.
Ganas causana shimita shuccunaman ricsichicrincapac rinalla chapacuichic.
Can-cuna charishca inina supai janpihuan cachamushca biruticunamanta quishpichichun.
Cancunapac quishpina cancunapac umata quillpashpa quishpichic cachun, Diospac Samai cushca shimica cancunapac mircanu cachun.
Dios-huan rimarinata ama saquichicchu; Dios-huan rimarishcapi paipac Samai cancunahuan tiyachun. Ricuralla causaichic, mana sanpayashpa, Diosta mañaichic tucui paipac runacunaraicu.
Ñucaraicupash Diosta mañaichic runacuna-man ñuca rimashcapi, alli shimicuna tiyahuanuchun mana manchashpa quishpina shimita, mana atipaipac cashcata ricsichincapac.
Cai shimipac cachashca runata shina Dios cachahuarca, pairaicu piñashpa japi tucushpa cunan quillpara cani. Diosta mañaichic ama manchashpa chai shimita ñuca rimana ushancapac.
Ñucanchic llaquishca Apunchicpac llancanapipash mana sanpayashpa yanapac huauqui Tiquicomi, ñucamanta tucui ñuca racushcamantapash shimita cancunata rimacrinca.
Chairaicumi paita cancunapacman cachacuni, caipi ñucanchic imana tiyacushcamanta ricsichishpa, chashna cancanata cariyachichun.
Yaya Dios Apunchic Jesucristontin ganas causaita llaquinantin ininantin huauquicunaman cunuchun;
Apun-chic Jesucristota llaquiccunatapash paipac cuyaita mana pishiyashpa tallichichun.

Pablo Timoteontm Jesucristota yanapaccana, Pilipos llactapi tiyac Diospac runacuna cashpa, Cristo Jesusman llutarishcacunaman, rimacpi, tucui miccanaman obispocunan-tin yanapaccunantin cai pancata quillcacunchic.
Ñucan-chicpac Yaya Dios Apunchic Jesucristontin, paicunapac cuyaita ganas causaitapash cancunapi tallichinuchun.
Caran cancunamanta yuyarishcapi ñuca Diosta pacrachuni;
Dios-huan rimarishcapi cushiyashcahuan huiñai tucui cancunaraicu mañani;
callarishcamanta cunancama Diospac Cushi Shimita ricsichincapac yanapashcamanta mana cuncarinichu.
Ñuca yuyani, Dios cancunapi alli rurancapac callarishcata alli pactachinacama mana saquincachu Jesucristo ticramuna panchacama.

Ñuca cancanata yapa llaquiscamanta chashna yuyarishca allimi yachihuan; ñucaman tucui Dios cuyashcallatata cancanapash chasquicunquichic chunta curralpi ñuca quillpara tiyacushcapi, apucanapac naupacpi quishpichic shimimanta alli rimascapi, pai shuti cashcata ricsichicushcapi imapash.
Diosllami yachan ima shina cancunata ricunayash-cata, Cristopi yapa llaquishcaraicu.
Cancuna ashtahuan llaquinata charinuchun nishpami mañani ñuca Dios-huan rimarishcapi, tucui ashtahuan yuyayuc, yalli atipac tucanuchan;
chashna cancuna ashtahuan alli cashcata huiñai acllana ushanquichic. Chashanami cancuna chuya causaita causana ushanquichic, Cristo shamushcapi mana imamanta cautsayachi tucuncapac.
Jesucristo yanapashcahuan achca alli rurashcacunata ricuchinquichic Diosta jatunyachincapac.
Huauquicuna, tucui ñacapi tucushcacuna, shuti rimacpi, ashtahuan quishpichic shimita yachachincapacmi yanapanushca.
Apucuna tucui runacunapash Cristota catishcamanta ñuca quillpara tiyacushcata yachanun.
Ñuca quillpara tiyacushcata ricushpa, achca huauquicuna mana manchashpa, ashtahuan Apunchicpi yuyaita churashpa cushi shimita ricsichincapac callarinushca.
Shutimi maicancuna, ñucata chiquicushpa, piñashpa Cristomanta rimanun, shuccuna ranti alli yuyaihuanmi ruranun.
Maicancuna Cristota llaquishcaraicu paimanta rimanun, Dios ñucata caipi quishpichic shimiraicu alli rimancapac cachamushcata yachashpa;
rati shuccunaca paicunapac allita mashcashpa ruranan, chaicuna mana cusca shimiyuc canun, cunan ashtahuan ñuca quillpara tiyashcapi yalli ñucata llaquichinata munanun.
Chaica mana imananchu. Ima shina cashpapash, shutita rimashpa, umachishpa rimashpa, Cristomanta rimaranun; chai yapa cushiyachihuan. Chairapash ashtahuan cushiyashami
tucui caicuna ñuca quishpincapac cashcata yachashpa, cancana ñucamanta Diosta mañashcaraicu Jesucristopac Samaipash yanapashcaraicu.

Diosmanta allipachami chapani pai mana pincaipac saquihuancachu; ashtahuan mana ansapash manchashcahuanmi tucuicunapac ñaupacpi rimana ushasha, chaipi huiñai shina, Cristo jatun cashca ashtahuan ñucapi ricurinca, ñuca causacushcapi, ñuca huañushcapi imapash.
Cristo ñucapac causai can, huañushpaca achcata yapachini.
Ranti cai aichapi causanacama Apunchicta yanapacushpa, maicanta chari acllasha.
Cai ishcai acllanacunamanta shuccllata acllancapac sinchimi cahuan; huañunata munaiman Cristohuan causacrincapac, chaimi ñucapac yapa alli cahuanman;
cancunaraicu causac catina ashtahuan yapa alli can.
Chai ashtahuan alli cashcata yachashpa, chaira cancunahuan saquirishami, cancunata ñaupacman catmapi yanapancapac, cancanata cancunapac ininapi ashtahuan yalli cushi charincapac.
Chashnami ñuca cuti cancuna ucuman ticracpi, Cristo Jesuspi cushiyanata charinquichic.

Caillata rimani: Cancunapac causaipi Cristopac cushi shimita catishpa causaichic. Ñuca cancunata ricuncapac ricpi, mana ricpipash, cancana smchicushpa, huancurishpa, tucuipura quishpichic shimimanta shamuc mmaraicu llancashpa caticush-cata uyanayani,
cancunata piñaccunapacpi mana ansallapash manchachic tucushpa. Cai mana pantaipac ricuchicun paicuna huañuiman rirashcata, chaillapita cancuna quishpinatapash ricuchicun. Caica Diosmantami shamun.
Cristoraicu mana paipi inincapacllachu acllai tucushcanquichic, paimanta ñacarincapacpash acllai tucushcanquichicmi.
Cancuna ñucapash chai macanacuillapita canchic. Ñaupallata ña ricurcanquichic ñuca ima shina macanacushcata, cunanpash ñuca ima shina macanacushpa caticushcata yachanquichic.
Shina, Cristo cancunata sinchicuchicpi, paipac llaquina cancunata cushichicpi, Samai cancunahuan tiyacucpi, cuyaita, shucmanta llaquirinata cancuna ricsishpa,
cushihuan juntachihuaichic shuc shuncullahuan causashpa, shuc llaquinallapi tantarishpa, shuclla yuyaita charishpa, tucui shuclla ruranata yuyashpa.
Ama imatapash shucta piñashcaraicu yalli canayanaraicu ruraichicchu, ashtahuan uchillayashpa ruraichic, shuc runa yalli alli cashcata caran amu ricushun.
Ama pipash cancunamanta paipac allillata mashcachan, shuccunapac allita mashcana canquichic.
Cristo Jesus charishca yuyaicunallata charichic;
pai Dios cashpallata, mana atircachu Dios-huan pactarincapac,
ashtahuan pai cashcata mayanman saquishpa, rana shina pacarirca. Yanca runa shina ricurimushpa,
quiquin paillata uchillayarca, Diosta uyashpa huañuiman rirca, pincaipac cruspi huañanaman.
Chairaicu Dios tucuimanta yallita paita jatunyachirca, tucuicunamanta yalli sumac shutita cushpa,
"Jesus" rimashcata uyashpa, tucui jahuapachapi tiyaccuna, cai pachapi tiyaccuna huañuscacunapash cuncurincapac,
tucuicunapash ricsincapac Jesucristo Apunchic cashcata, Dios Yayata jatanyachincapac.
Chairaicu, llaquishca huauquicuna, ñuca cancana ucupi cashpa rimacpi uyahuashca shina, cunan ñuca carupi cashcaraicu ashtahuan uyana canquichic. Cancana quishpina-manta allipacha yuyarichic;
Diosmi cancunapi alli munaicunata tarpun, paillata chaicunata pactachincapac yanapan, pai chashna manashcaraicu.
Ama camishpa, ama piñanacushpa tucuita ruraichic,

cancunapi ama pipash juchallishcata, panta rurashcata tarichun. Mana ticllayuc Diospac churicuna shina causaichic cai mana alli, huacllishca runa ucupi. Paicuna ucupi cancuna cuillurcuna yana tuta ucupi llinpiyashca shinami canquichic,
causaita cuc shimita pactachishcaraicu. Chashna, Cristo shamucpi, cancunaraicu cushiyasha, mana yanca sanpayashca-manta, mana yanca llancashcamanta.
Diosman cancuna ininaraicu camarita ricuchishcapi, cai camari pacta tucuncapac ñuca causaita cana cashpapash, ñuca tucui cancunahuanmi cushiyani.
Cancunapash ñuca cushiyashcahuan cushi-yaichic.
Apunchic Jesus yanapashcahuan Timoteota utcalla cancunaman cachasha yuyani; ñuca cancanamanta shimita uyashpa cushiyasha nini.
Shuc runa mana tiyahuanchu ñuca shina yuyaric, cancunamantapash alli shutipacha yuyaric runa; chairaicu paita cachani;
tucui runa paicunapac allillata mashcanun, Jesucristo munashcata, mana.
Ranti cancuna ña yachanquichic Timoteo alli cashcata, pai Diospac shimita ricsichinapi ñucata yanapashcata, quiquin churi shina ñucata yanapashcahuan.
Shina ñuca ruranacunamanta alli yachashca huashami cachashca yuyani;
Apanchic yanapash-cahuan ñucallatami cancunapacman utca risha yuyani.

Epafroditopash cutillata cancanapacman ticracpi allimi canca yachihuan, pai ñucahuan llancashca, ñucahuan pacta macanacushcapash, paita cancana ñucaman cachamuhuarcan-quichic ñuca mutsuyashcapi yanapahuancapac.
Pai tucui cancunata ricunayan; yapa yuyarican cancuna pai uncuc cashcamanta yachascaraicu.
Shuti uncucmi carca ñallapash huañurca; ranti Dios paimanta yuyarirca, mana paimantalla, ñucamantapash, ñucamanta nicpi, ama chai tucur llaqui charishcamanta ashtahuan charincapac.
Chairaicu utcalla cancanapacman cachacuni, cancuna paita ricushpa cushiyanca-pac, ñucapash ama yapalla llaquirishpa tiyancapac.
Achca cushiyashcahuan paita chasquichic, Apunchicpi huauquita shina, pai shina caccunatapash achca llaquina canquichic,
pai huañui mayanpi carca Cristota yanapanaraicu. Paipac causaita ñalla chincachirca cancuna jinu mana yanapana ushashcata pai yanapacushpa.
Cunanca, huauquicuna, Apunchicpi cushiyaichic. Ñaupa rimashpa quillcashcata cutillata quillcancapac ñucata mana imanahuanchu, ranti cancanapacca yapa alli canca.
Millaipac runacunata, mana alli ruraccunata aichata culluccunatapash yuyanquichic;
quiquin pincai cara pituacuna ñucanchicmi canchic, Diosta chacchaccuna paipac Samai pushacpi; Cristo Jesuspaccuua cashpami cushiyanchic, mana ñucanchicllapi yuyaita churashpa.
Imashna cacpipash, chaicunapi ñucaca yuyaita churanimi. ¿Ñuca shina chaicunapi yuyaita churancapac maicanpash ushancachu ima chari?:

pacarishcamanta pusac panchayucta pincai carata pitihuanur-ca, israelita runa cani, Benjaminpac aillumanta cani, hebreo runa cani hebreo runacunapac churi cashpa. Camachic quillcamanta rimacpica, fariseo carcani;
chashna iniccanata piñashpa japishcahuan shuncuhuan curishca cashcara ricsichircani, camachic quillca pactachinapi mana pipash yallihuarcachu.
Tucui caicuna ñucapac yapa alli cahuanurca ñaupa, cunan ranti Cristoraicu tucuilla y anca cahuanun.
Ashtahuan rimacpi, tucui chaicuna mana imapacpash allichu canun Apunchic Cristo Jesusta ricsishcahuan yuyaricpi. Cristoraicu tucuita jichushcani, tucur ismami nini, paita jinu tarmata yuyaricpi,

paiman jinu llutarishca canata yuyaricpi. Camachic quillcata pactachsicamanta jucha illac saquirmata mana mashcanichu, ashtahuan Cristopi inina charishcaraicumi jucha illac saquirisha; rimacpi, juchamanta Dios quishpichihuachun ñuca inina charishcaraicu.
Cristota ricsina munani, pai huañushpa causarishcamanta ushaita charinata manani, pai ñacarishcata ñucapash ñacarinayani, pai shina paipac huañuipi cancapac,
huañushcamanta causarina-man pactanata chapashpa.
Ña tucuitami tarircani, ña tucuipimi pacta cani mana rimanichu; ranti ñaupacman caticunillami tarinacama, Cristo Jesus pai ñucapactañaupa tarishcaraicu.
Huauquicuna, mana ñucallami tarircani rimanichu; cunanca huashaman jichurishcamanta cancarinimi ñaupacman cashcata tarincapac,
pactanaman pactashpa Dios Cristoraicu ñucanchicman cancapac cuyaita japmcapac.
Tucui ña smchi inina chariccuna, cai yuyaillata charina canchic. Shuc imapipush chican yuyaita charicpi, Diosllatami cusca cashcata cancunaman ricuchinca.
Ranti, ñucanchic ña pactashcahuan causana canchic.
Huauquicuna, ñuca shina causaichic ricuichic ñucanchic cancunaman yachachishca shina causaccunata.
Ñuca cancunata achca cuti rimashcani, cunanpash cutillata cancunata huacashcahuan rimani: achcacunami Cristopac crusta piñac shina causaranacun,

tucuricpica chincarinca ranun paicuna. Paicunapac Dios paicunapac aicha mañashca can, chaicunamanta pincarma rantimanta paicuna ashtahuan jatunya-rinun. Cai pachallapi paicunapac yuyaita churashpa causanun.
Ranti ñucanchic jahua pachamanta runacuna canchic, Quishpichic Jesucristo shamunata chapacunchic;
paimi ñu-canchic ismuc aicha cashcamanta paipacta shina sumacyachin-ca. Pai chashna rurana ushanmi, tucuipac amu cashcaraicu.
Chairaicu, ñuca llaquishca huauquicuna, cancunatami ñuca llaquishcacuna, yapa ricunayani; cancunapi cushiyani, cancuna ñucapac cuyai canquichic; chashna, Apanchicpi sinchi tucushpa catichic.
Evodiata Sintiquetapash rimani, shuclla yuyaita japinuchun Apunchicpi ñañapura shina.

Cantaca, llancanapi mana sanpayashpa yanapahuac, cai panicanata yanapai rimam, paicuna ñucahuan mari quishpichic shimita ricsichinapi llancanushca Clementehuan, shuccuna ñucahuan llancaccuna-huanpash,paicunapac shuti quillcara mari tiyan causaccanapac quillca pancacanapi.
Apunchicpi huiñai cushiyana canquichic. Cutillata rimani: CushiyaiChiC.
Cancuna alli shuncuyuc cashcata tucuicuna ricsinuchun, Apunchic mayanllami tiyacun.
Ima tiyacpipash ama llaquirichicchu, ashtahuan Dios-huan rimarishcapi paiman tucuita cuichic; paipac cuyairaicu pacrachuichic, paita ashtahuanpash mañaichic.

Chashnami Dios paipac alli ganas causaita cunca, pai runa atipana ushashcamanta yalli jatunmi; cai ganas causai cancunapac shuncuta, cancanapac yuyaita ricunca ran, cancuna Cristoman llutarishca cashcaraicu.

Puchucaipi caicunata yuyarichic rimani. yuyarichic tucui shuti cashcapi, tucui yupaichana cashcapi, tucui cusca cashcapi, tucui chuya cashcapi, tucui manaipac cashcapi; tucui alli cashcata japina canquichic. Tucui alli cashcata yuyarichic.
Ñuca yachachishcata pactachichic; ñuca rimashcamanta uyashcata, ñuca rurashcamanta yachashcata pactachichic; chash-na ruracpimi ganas causaita cuc Dios cancunahuan tiyanca.
Apunchicpi yapa cushiyani cancuna cuti ñucamanta yuyarincapac callarishcaraicu. Mana cancarihuarcanquichicmi rimanichu, ñucata mana imana yanapaipac tucurcanquichic rimani.
Mana yanapaita chapashcaraicuchu rimani, chaimanta nicpica yachashcanimi ansashitu charishcallahuan cushiyanata.

Tsuntsu shina, achcayuc shina causanata ricsinimi. Ima shina causaipash pactamuhuacpi ushanillami, imapash illashcapi, achca charishcapi, yallicta charishcapi, mana imapash tiyahuashcapipash. Ima shina causaipash pactamuhuacpi ushanillami, Cristomi ñucata sinchicuchihuan.
Chashna cacpipash, alli carca cancana ñucahuan ñacarishca.

Ñuca Macedoniamanta rishcapi, quishpichic shimita ricsichincapac callarishcapi, cancuna, Filiposmanta iniccuna, cancanalla pacrachushcamanta camaricunata cachahuarcanqui-chic cancunapac causaipi yanapai tucushcamanta.
Ñuca Tesalonicapipash tiyacushcapi, cancunamanta mana shuc cutilla cachamushca camarita chasquircani.
Mana cuyai tucanallata chapashcaraicuchu rimani caita; cancuna cuyashca Diospac ñaupacpi ashtahuan yalli sumac ricurichun nishpami munani.

Ñuca ña tucuita chasquishcanimi, yallictapash charim. Cancuna Epafroditohuan cachamushcata chasquishca-manta yapactapash tiyahuanmi. Cancuna cachamushca camari shuc sumac ashnac shumiriu shinami carca, Diospac ñaupacpi sumac ricuric camari.
Chairaicu ñuca Dios tucui cancuna mana charishcatami cunca, pai munashca shina Cristo Jesuspi,
Yaya Dios huiñai jatunyachishca cachun. Chashna cachun.
Jesucristoraicu Diospc runacunata, tucui paicunata yuyarinimi. Ñucahuan tiyacuc huauquicunapash paicunata yuyarinunmi.
Tucui Diospac runacunapash cancunata yuyarinunmi, Romamanta jatun Aputa yanapaccunami cancunata ashtahuan yapa yuyarinun.
Apunchic Jesucristo paipac cuyaita tucui cancunapi tallichichun.
Ñuca, Pablo, Jesucristopac apostol Dios munash- caraicu, huauqui Timoteontm
cai pancata quillcani Colosaspi tiyac Cristopi ñucanchicpac huauquicuna cashpa Diospac runacunaman. Dios ñucachic Yaya paipac cuyaita ganas causaitapash cancanapi tallichichan.
Dios-huan rimarishcapi Apunchic Jesucristopac Yaya Diosta cancunaraicu huiñai pacrachanchic.
Yachashcan-chicmi cancuna Cristo Jesuspi imna charishcata cancuna tucui Diospac runacunata yapa llaquishcatapash,

jahua pachapi Dios cancunapacta huacaichishcata japinata chapashpami, cancuna cai llaquinata charmquichic. Cancuna cai chapanata ricsircanqmchic cancanaman cushi shimi pactashcapi, quiquin shimita uyashcapi.

Cai cancunaman yachachishca cushi shimi huiñashpa caticun, achca alli rurashcacunahuan tucui cai pachapi ricuchicun; Diospac llaquinamanta cancuna ucupi uyashpa tacushca shina, cancuna cai llaquina shuti cashcata yachashcaraicu.
Ñucanchic Cristota mana sanpayashpa yanapac runata paipi ricuna canquichic.
pai cancunamanta shimita apamnshpa ñucanchicman ricsichirca, Samai yanapashcahuan cancana llaquinapi caticushcatapash.

Chairaicu ñucanchic, chaita yachashca punchamanta Diosta cancunaraicu mañanata paita pacrachunata mana saquishcanchic, Dios pai munashcata allipacha cancunaman ricsichichun, tucui yachanata tucui atipanata cancunaman cuchun.
Chai shuti quiquin Apunchicpac shina causana mcununca paipac caccuna, pai munashcata huinai rurashpa, alli rurashcacunata ricuchishpa, Diostapash ashtahuan alli ricsishpa.
Paipac jatun ushaihuan cancunata sinchiyachichun nishpami mañanchic; chashnami cancuna siuchicush-pa, mana piñarishcahuan tucui llaquicunata yallinquichic;
Yayatapash cushiyashcahuanmi pacrachunquichic, achicpi pai cancunapac allichishca cancunapash japina ushancapac paipac runacunaman cuna cashcata.
Dios ñucachicra yana tuta ucumanta quishpichishpa, pai llaquishca Churipac pachaman pusharca,
pairaicu ñucauchicta quishpichishpa juchacunamanta picharca.
Cristomi mana ricuric Diospac ricuric ricchai can; tucui churimanta ñaupa, tucui rurashcamanta ñaupa tiyac.
Pairaicu, Dios cai pachapi jahua pachapi tiyaccunata rurarca: ricuriccunata mana ricuriccunatapash, chashnallata tucui ushai charic samaicunatapash rurarca. Tucuicunata pairaicu, paipacta rurarca.
Tucui imacunamanta ñaupa Cristo tiyan, tucui imapash pairaicu cuscata catiranun.
Chairapash, Cristo aichapac uma can, aichaca iniccuna canun. Pai tucuimanta ñaupa cashpa, pai huañushcamanta ñaupa causarirca, pai tucuipi ñaupa cancapac.
Dios Cristopi pacta causanata munashcaraicu,
Cristopi tucui pachata paihuan allichirca: cai pachapi tiyacta, jahua pachapi tiyactapash, Cristo cruspirallichishca yahuar-raicu.
Cancuna ñaupa chican runa carcanquichic, mana allicunata rurashcamanta shuncupi Diosta piñaccuna,

ranti cunan Dios paihuan cancunahuan allichishca, Cristo runa cashcamanta paipac aichapi huañuita uacarishcaraicu. Chashna rurarcami cancunata paipac ñaupacpi charincapac, paipacta chicanyachishcacanata, mana ticllayuccanata, mana juchayuc-cunata.

Rauti chaipac sinchi tucushpa causana canquichic ininapi, cancuna uyashca quishpichic shimimanta charishca chapanamanta mana chicanyashpa. Cai shimitami tucui pachapi huillarcanchic; ñuca, Pablopash rimashpa yanapani.
Cunan cancunaraicu ñacaricushpa cushiyanimi, chashna iniccanapacta Cristo ñacarina pishishcata ñuca aichapi pactachicuni; iniccuna paipac aicha canun.
Dios iniccunata yanapacrurahuarca,pai chaita mincahuarca cancanapac allipac, tucui pai rimashca shimita cancunaman pacta ricsichincapac;
