allita rimacpi, huiñaimanta Dios pacashpa charishca yuyaita, cunan paipac runacunata ricsichishca.
Mana judio runacunapac chai pacashca shimi sumac cashcata ricsichinayar-ca. Chai pacashca yuyai Cristo can, pai cancunapi tiyan, pai cancuna jatunyachi tucuncapac chapashca can.
Ñucanchic Cristota huillanchic, tucui yachanapi tucuicunata camachishpa, yachachishpa, Cristopi cancuna pacta cashcata ricsichincapac.
Chaipacmi llancami, macanacuni tucui Cristo ñucaman cushca ushaihuan.
Cancunata yachaichic rimani ima shina cancunaraicu, Laodiceamantacunaraicu, tucui ñucata mana ricushca-manta mana ricsihuaccunaraicu llancashcata.
Paicunapac shuncupi sinchicurinuchun nishpami chashna llancani, llaquinapi huancurishpa tucuipura alli causashpa, atipanuchun Diospi pacara tiyashCata; chai pacara Cristomi can;
paipac ucupi tucui yachai, tucui atipana tiyan.
Cancunata caita rimanimi ama pipash cancunata umachichun nishpa sumac rimashca shimicunahuan.
Mana quiquin ñuca jinu Cancuna ucupi tiyacucpipash, ñuca samaica cancunahuanmi, cancuna alli caticushcata ricushpa cushiyanimi, cancuna Cristota ininapi sinchi catinquichic.
Chairaicu, cancuna Apunchic Jesucristota chasquishca shina, chashnallata paihuan llutarishca causana canquichic,
paipi sinchi sapiyashpa, paipi sinchita yuyarishpa inina charishcaraicu cancunata yachachishca shina, Diostapash huiñai pacrachushpa.
Yuyanquichic: ama umachi tucunquichicchu panta shimicanata rimai tucushpa, paicuna mana Cristota caticcuna mari canun; runacunapac yachaicunata, cai pachamanta ushaicunata catiranan.
Tucui Dios cashca Cristopi pactacta tiyan;
cancunaca Dios-huan juntarishca canquichic Cristohuan llutarishcacuna cashpa; pai tucui ushaita charic samaicunapac uma can.

Cancuna Cristohuan llutarishcacuna cashpa pincai cara pitishca canquichic, mana aichapi rurashca pincai cara pitina shinahuan, ranti juchasapa runacuna cashcamanta quishpichi tucushcacuna cashpa. Chaimi Cristomanta shamuc pincai cara pitirina can.
Bautisai tucushpa, cancuna Cristohuan panpai tucurcanquichic, paillahuata huañush-camanta causachi tucurcanquichic, cancuna Diospac ushaipi inishcaraicu; chai ushai paita huañushcamanta causachirca.

Ñaupa cancunapac juchacunaraicu mana pincai cara pitishcacuna cashpa, cancunapac samaipi huañushca carcan-quichic; ranti cunan Dios Cristopi cancunata causaita cushca, pairaicu tucui ñucanchic juchacunamanta quishpichirca.
Dios ñucanchicpac dibita tucuchirca, camachic quillcaraicu ñucanchic cautsayashcata. Cruspi llutashpa chai dibita tucuchirca.
Cristopi, Dios yallirca tucui ushaita charic samaicunata; tucuicunapac ñaupacpi paicanata uchillayachirca, pai yallishcapi piñashpa japishpa paicunata purichishpa.

Chashnamanta, ama pipash camichun cancuna micushcaraicu, cancuna upiashcaraicu, cancuna raimi punchacanata charishcaraicu, cancanapac mushu quilla puncha tiyashcaraicu, samana punchata charishcaraicu.
Tucui chai llantushca shiuallami can huasha shamunca racushcamanta yuyacpi, ranti quiquin jinuca Cristomi can.
Uchillayac shina ricuriccuna, angeicunata chacchaccuna, nuspaipi ricuccuna, rana yuyailtata charishcamanta jatunyariccuna cancunata ama cautsayachinuchuu.
Paicunaca umaman mana llutarishcachu canun, uma tucui aichata carashpa huiñachichin, tucui uchilla aichacanatapash Dios manashca shina llutarichin.
Cristohuan cancuna huañurcanquichic, ña cai pacha-manta ushaicunaman mana llutarishcachu canquichic. Shina cacpi, ¿allichu canca cai pachamantacuna shina, chaicunata pactachishpa causacucpi:
chaita ama llancaichu, chaishucta ama micuichu, ama canpac maquihuan japichu?
Tucui chai pactachinacuna, runacana cai pachapi charishcamantallami can, huasha chaicana tucurinunmi.

Alli shutipachami, chaicuna yapa alli yuyaihuan rimashca shinami ricurinun, amu munaimanta pactachinacuna cashcaraicu, uchillayachic, aichatapash ñacachic cashcaraicu; chashna cashpapash aicha mañashcata saquichincapac mana imapash allichu canun.
Chairaicu, cancuna Cristohuan huañushcamanta causa-chi tucuccuna cashpa, jahua pachamanta imacunata mashcana canquichic, Cristo Diospac yachac maquiman tiyacushcamanta.
Jahua pachamanta imacunapi yuyarichic, mana cai pachamantacunapi.
Cancunaca ña mari huañurcanquichic, cunanca cancunapac causai Cristohuan Diospi pacara can.
Quiquin Cristollata cancunapac causai can, pai shamucpi cancunapash paihuanmi shamunquichic; pai jatunyachi tucushcapi, cancanapash jatunyachi tucunquichicmi.

Cancuna aichapi tacui cai pachamanta ruraicunata huañuchichic: ama pipash yumashpa juchallichun, ticllayachiccanatapash ama ruraichichu, aicha munashcata, mana alli munaicunata ama catichicchu, ama mitsa caichu (chaica huacacunata chacchashca shinami can).
Tucui cai ruraicunaraicu Diospa ñacachinapactan paita mana uyaccuna-man;
cancunapash ñaupa causaipi chaita rurarcanquichic.
Cunan ranti tucui chaicunata jichuichic: piñarinata, aicha mañashcata, mana alli canata, piñanata mana alli shimicunata.
Cancunapura ama llullanacuichicchu, ña cancunapac ñaupa causaimanta, ñaupa rurashcacunamantapash llushpirishca mari canquichic,
mushu causaihuan churarishcaraicu: mushu runapac mushuyashpa caticun paita Rurac Diospac ricchai Cashpa, paita allipacha ricsinacama.

Griego cana, judio cana, pincai cara pitira cana, mana pitira cana, chicanmanta runa cana, aucacana, huatara cana, quishpishca cana mana ansapash imananchu; Cristo tucui cashpa tucuicunapi tiyashca chai shuti imananmi.

Dios cancunata llaquin, chairaicu cancunata acllashca paipac runacuna cancapac. Shina cashpa, shuccunata llaquishcahuan, alli shuncu cashcahuan, uchillayashcahuan, mana millai shuncuhuan, mana piñarishpa chapashcahuan churarishca causaichic.
Cancunapura alli causaichic; cancunapura llaqui tiyacpi quishpichinacuichic. Cancunata Apunchic quishpichishca shina, cancunapash shuccunata quishpichichic.
Llaquinahuan ashtahuan churarichic, paimi tucuipura allipacha huancuchic can.
Cristopac ganas causai cancunapac shuncuta pushachun, chaipacmi Dios cancunata cayarca shuclla aichata rurancapac. Chaimanta pacrachushpa causanacanquichic.
Cristopac shimi huiñai cancunapac shuncupi tiyachun. Tucui yachaihuan cancunapura camachinacuichic, yanapanchic. Diosman taquinacunahuan achca pacrachuichic;
tucui imatapash rurashpa, rimashpa imapash, Apunchic Jesuspac shutipi ruraichic, pairaicu Yaya Diosta pacrachushpa.
Huarmicuna, cancunapac caricunata uyaichic, chashna rurana canquichic Apunchicta iniccuna cashpa.
Yaricuna, huarmita llaquina canquichic, ama piñashcallahuan paicunata ricuichicchu.
Churicuna, tucuipi cancunapac yayata uyaichic, Apunchic chaita yapa alli ñahuihuan ricun.
Yayacuna, churicanata ama pmachichicchu, chashnami mana amirinunca.

Huataracuna, cai pahcapi cancuna charishca amucunata tucuipi uyaichic, mana paicunapac ñahuipilla, paicunahuan alli saquirinaraicu; ashtahuan shuncumanta llaquishpa uyana canquichic, Apanchicta manchashcaraicu.
Imatapash rurash-pa, alli yuyaihuan ruraichic, Apunchic jinuta yanapacushca shina, mana runacunata.
Caucuna ña yachanquichic pactachishcamanta japina cashcata cui tucunata. Cancuna, Apanchicta yanapacmi canquichic, pai cancanapac quiquin Apanchic cashcaraicu.
Ranti mana allita ruracca pai mana alli rurashcamanta chasquinca racun, Diosca runacunata mana chican chican ricunchu.
Cancuna, amucuna, cancunapac huatara runacunahuan cusca caichic. Cancunapash yuyarichic jahua pachapi tiyac Apunchicpacpi taripai tucuna cashcata.
Dios-huan rimarinata ama sanpayaichicchu; ricuralla causaichic, Diosta pacrachushpa.
Ñucanchiraicupash Diosta mañaichic Apunchic ñucanchicta ricsichichuu Cristomanta pacara yuyaita, chai pacara yuyairaicu ñuca quillpara tiyacuni.
Atipana shimihuan ñuca chaita ricsichina ushancapac mañaichic.
Diosta mana iniccanahuan yuyashpalla causaichic; ama yanca causaichichu.
Cancunapac rimai huiñai sumac cachan, ima cutipana tiyacpi sumacta cutipaichic.
Ñucachicpac llaquishca huauqui Tiquico, pai ñucata mana sanpayashpa yanapahuashca, ñucahuan pacta Apunchicta-pash yanapashca, paimi ñucamanta cancunaman rimanca.
Chairaicu cancunapacman cachani, cancunata ñucanchic imashna cashcamanta ricsichishpa sinchicuchichan.
Ñucan-chic llaquishca huauqui Onesimopash paihuan riran, pai cancunamanta can. Paicunami caipi imapash tiyashcamanta cancanata rimananca.
Ñucahuan quillpashca tiyacuc Aristarco cancanamanta yuyarin, Bernabepac huanqui Marcospash. Cancana ña yachan-quichic Marcos cancanata ricancapac ricpi, alli chasquina cash-cata.
Justo nishca Jesus shutiyuc runapash cancunamanta yuyarinmi. Cai judio runacunallami Diospac pacharaicu ñucahuan llancanacushca, paicunaraicu achcatami cushiyashca-ni.
Epafras cancunamanta yuyarinmi, pai Cristo Jesusta ya-napac can; pai cancanamanta can, Dios-huan rimarishcapi huiñai cancanamanta mañacun, cancuna sinchicushpa Dios munashcatarurashpa catincapac.
Epafras cancunaraicu, Lao-diceamantacanaraicu, Hierapolismantacanaraicu yapa yuyarish-camanta quiquin ñucami ricuyac cani.
Llaquishca yachac Lucas cancanamanta yuyarinmi, Demaspash yuyarinmi.
Laodiceamanta huauquicuna ñucanchic yuyarishcata chasquinuchan. Ninfapash tucui paipac huasipi tantariccunan-tin ñucanchic yuyarishcata chasquinuchun.
Cancuna cai quillcata ricushca huasha, Laodiceamanta iniccunaman ca-chaichic, chaipipash cai quillcata catishpa uyachinuchan; cancunapash paicunamanta chasquishca quillcata catishpa uyaichic.
Arquipota caita rimaichic: Apunchic mincashcata allita pactachi nishpa.
Ñuca, Pablo, cai puchucai pancata quiquin ñuca maquihuan quillcani. Ñuca quillpara tiyacushcata yuyaripai-chic. Dios cancanapi paipac cuyaita tallichichun.

Ñuca, Pablo, Silvanohuan Timoteontin, Tesalonicapi tiyac huauquicunaman cai pancata quillcani, paicuna Dios Yayaman Apunchic Jesucristoman llutarishca canun. Dios cancunapi paipac cuyaita paipac alli causaitapash tallichichun.
Huiñai cancunaraicu Diosta pacrachunchic ñucanchic Dios-huan rimarishcapipash cancunata yuyarinchic.

Caran cuti Dios Yayapac ñaupacpi cancuna chai tucui inina charishcahuan llancashcata yuyarmchic, chai tucui liaquinahuan cancuna yanapashcata, caucuna chai tucui ñacarinapi sinchicushpa, Apunchic Jesucristota chapashcaraicu ñacarish-canquichic.
Huauquicuna, Dios cancanata llaquiu, pai cancunata acllashcatapash yachanchic.

Cancunaman quish-pichic shimita ñucanchic yachachishcapi, mana shimillahuan-chu rurarcanchic, Diospac Samaihuanmi rurarcanchic, cai quishpichic shimi shuti cashcata yachashcaraicu. Cancuna yachanquichic ima shina, cancunapac allita mashcashpa, ñucanchic cancuna ucupi causashcata.
Cancanaca, ñucanchic rurashcata Apanchic rurashcata-pash catircanquichic, chashnamanta cushi shimita Diospac Samai cushca cushihuan chasquircanquichic, ñacarina achca tiyacpipash.
Chashnami Macedoniamanta, Acayamanta iniccunata alli rurashcahuan ricuchircanquichic.

Cancuna-manta callarishpa Apunchicpac shimi, mana Macedomallapi, mana Acayallapi mirarishca, ashtahuan tucui suyucunapipash yachai tucushcami; chairapash cancuna inina charishcamanta yachai tiyan mari; chashnamantañucanchic ña mana shuc shimillapash rimana tucunchic.

Chaipac rantimanta, ashtahuan paicunailata ñucanchic cancunata ricucrishcamanta rimanun, cancana ñucanchicta alli chasquishcamanta, cancuna causac quiquin Diosta catinaraicu huacacunata paita yanapancapac jichushcamanta.

Paicuna ñucanchicta rimana- cun cancuna ima shina Jesus, Diospac Churi, jahua pachamanta ticramunata chapacushcata, huañushcamanta Dios causachishcata Jesusmi jatun shamuncaracuc ñacarinamanta quishpichic can.
Cancunallata huauquicuna, yachanquichic, ñucanchic cancunata ricucrisha mana yanca ricucrishcalla saquirirca.

Ashtahuan rimacpi, cancuna ña yachanquichic, ima shina Filipospi piñai tucushpa macai tucurcanchic; shinapash Dios ñucanchicta yanaparca paipac quishpichic shimita cancunaman ricsichincapac, sinchi shayarishpa, achca macanacui tiyacpipash.
Ñucanchic yachachishca mana pantashca yacha-chishca carca, mana pantachina yuyaihuan, mana pitapash umachinaraicu rimarcanchic.

Chaipac rantimanra, Dios ñucanchicta allihuan ricushpa quishpichic shimita ñucan- chicman mincarca, chashnami ñucanchic rimana cashcata rimanchic. Diostami cushiyachinata munanchic, runacunata cushiyachincapac mana munanchicchu; paimi ñucanchipac shuncucunata raripac can.
Yachanquichic ima shina ñucanchic mana maipipash sumac shimicunahuan cancunata rimarcanchic, umachishcahuanpash cancunamanta cullquita mana japishcanchicchu; Dios chaita yachan.
Jatunyachi tacunata mana pimantapash mashcarcanchicchu.

Ñucanchic Cristopac apostol cashcamanta cancuna ñucanchicta uyana cashcata rimanchicman carca; chashna cacllapita cancunata cuyailla ricushcanchic, shuc mama paipac huahuata cuyailla huiñachishca shina.
Cancunata llaquishcaraicu, cancunaman tucui shuncuhuan cunchicman carca mana Diospac cushi shimillata, quiquin ñucanchic causaitapash cunchicmanmi carca. ¡Yapallami cancunata llaquishcanchic!

Huauquicuna, cancuna yuyarinquichicmi ima shina ñucanchic llaquipac llancashcata ñucanchic mutsushcata tarincapac. Tutantin puchantin ama pitapash quillachishun nishpa llancarcanchic, cancunata Diospac cushi shimita ricsichinacama.
Cancunallata Diospash ricuyac canquichic, cancuna iniccunahuan, chuya shuncuhuan, cusca, mana pipash shuc shimi rimaipac ñucanchic cashcata.
Pacta yachanquichic quiquin cancunata jinu, shuc yaya paipac churita shina
sumaclla, maicanpi sinchi camachishcahuan, Dios munashca shina causancapac mincashcanchic; paimi cancunata paipac pachaman pai jatanyarishcaman cancanata cayarca.

Chairaicu huiñai Diosta pacrachunchic, cancunata Diospac cushi shimita ñucanchic ricsichishcapi, quiquin Diospac shimi cashcata ricsircanquichic, mana runacuna rimashca shimi shinallata japircanquichicchu. Shuti Diospac shimimi can, chai cancunapi alli rurashcata ricsichicun.

Cancuna huauquicana, cancunapac aillucunapi piñashpa japi tucushpa ñacarishcapi, Judeapi tiyac iniccuna shina tucurcan-quichic; paicunapash Cristo Jesuspac canun, paicunapac aillu judiocunapi piñashpa japi tucunurca mari.

Cai judiocuna Apunchic Jesusta huañuchinurca, proletacunata ñaupa huañu-chishca shina, ñucanchitapash callpachinurca. Paicuna mana Dios munashcata pactachinun, tucui runacunahuanpash piña-rishca canan;

Diosta mana ricsiccunaman paicunapash quish-pinuchan nishpa ñucanchic rimancapac callaricpi, ñucanchic ri-mancapac mana saquinun. Chashna rurashpa juchahuan junta-rishpa paicana catiranun. Ranti cunan, chapaimanta amishcapi, paicunapac jahuapi Diospac jatan ñacarina urmashca.
Huauquicuna, cancunamanta unainayata anchurishpapash, cancunata mana ricushpapash, huiñai cancunata ñucanchic shuncupi charircanchic; mashnapash cancunata ricucrina yuyaita charircanchic.
Ña allipacha rishun yuyarircanchic; ñuca, Pablo, achca cuti rina munarcani, ranti supai saquichihuarca.
Alli yuyaricpi, ¿ñucanchic chapana, ñucanchic cushiyana, ñucanchic pacta cushiyarina tiyanchu? ¡Cancunallatami canquichic Apunchic Jesucristo ticramushca-pi!
Ari, shutipacha, cancunami ñucanchic jatunyana, ñucanchic cushiyana canquichic.
Ña rina munaimanta mana ushashpa, ñuca sapalla Atenaspi quiparincapac yuyarircani;

ñucanchic huauqui Timoteota cacharcani, pai Diosta yanapac can Cristomanta cushi shimita ricsichinapi. Cancunata ricucrishpa, cancuna inina charishcapi sinchicuchishpa, ñaupacman cancunata pushancapac paita cacharcani,
ama pipash chai llaquicuna tiyashcaraicu amirishpa chincarincapac. Cancunallata yachan-quichic cai ñacarinacunamanta ñacarina cashcata.
Ñucanchic chaira cancanahuan tiyacushcapi llaquicana charinca racushca-manta cancunata rimarcanchic; cancana ña yachanquichic, chashna tucurca.

Chairaicu, allipacha cancunamanta yachanayai tiyahuacpi, tapuchircani cancunapac inina allichu, manachu alli can imata; manchaimi shamuhuarca supai imapash mana alliman urmachishcanca yuyarircani; chaipi shuti ñucanchic cancunaraicu llancashca yancamanta rurashca saquirinman carca.

Ranti cunan Timoteo Tesalonicamanta ticramurca, cancunapac inina, cancuna llaquina charishcamanta sumac cushichic shimicunata apamushpa. Cuyashcahuanshi huiñai ñucanchicmanta yuyarinquichic rimarca, ñucanchic cancunata ricunayashca shinallatashi cancunapash ñucanchicta ricunayanquichic rimarca.
Chairaicu, huauquicuna, chai tucui ñucanchic huacai, ñacarina charishcapipash, cushiyash-canchicmi cancuna ininapi sinchi caticushcata yachashpa.
Cancuna Apunchicpi sinchi caticushcata yachashpa, ñucanchicpash cariyanchicmi.
¡Imashnata cancunaraicu Diosta pactacta pacrachuiman, chai tucui cushiyanata cancunaraicu paipac ñaupacpi charishcamanta!
Tutantin punchantin Diosta mañanchic cancunata jinu ricunayashpa, cancanapi pishishca ininata pactachincapac.
Cancunata ricucrina ushancapac ñucanchic Yaya Diosllata Apunchic Jesuspash yanapachun rimanchic.
Apunchic cancunata huiñachichun ashtahuan cancunapura llaquinacancapac tucuicunata llaquincapac, ñucanchic caucanata llaquishca shina.
Cancunapac shuncucunata sinchicuchi-chun; chuya mana juchayuc ñucanchicta Dios Yaya ñaupacpi rurachun Apunchic Jesus tucui paipaccunahuan ticramucpi. Chashna cachun.

Cunan huauquicuna, caita cancunaman mincanchic, caita mañanchic Apunchic Jesuspac shutipi: cancuna ñucanchicmanta ima shina Diospac ñaupacpi paita cushiyachincapac causana cashcata yachashcaraicu, ña chashna causacushpa, ashtahuan ñaupacman catichic.
Apunchic Jesuspac shutipi ñucanchic cancunaman rimashcata ña pacta alli ricsinquichic.
Caucuna Diosman chicanyachishca causancapacmi pai munan, ama pipash yumashpa juchallincapac,
caran cari paipac huarmihuan cusca causachun, chuya shuncuhuan, yupaichashcahuan,
mana aicha mañashcata rurashpa, mana alli yuyaihuan, Diosta mana ricsic runacuna shina.
Chashnapi ama pipash yallicta quillachichun, ama paipac huaquita umachichun; ñaupallata ña cancunata rimarcanchic, ima shina Apunchic sinchita caimanta ñacachinata.
Mana juchallishpa causancapacchu Dios ñucanchicta cayarca, ashtahuan paiman chicanyachishca causancapacmi cayarca.
Chashnamanta, cai shimicunata mana uyanayac manapi runata mana uyanchu, Diostami mana uyan; paimi paipac Samaita cancunaman curca.
Huauquipura llaquinacunamanta, mana quillcanichu, Diosllata cancunapura llaquinacunata ña yachachishcaraicu.
Cancuna ña chashna ruracunquichic Macedoniapi causac tucui huauquicunahuan. Shina cacpipash, huauquicuna, cancunata mañanchic, cancunapac llaquina ashtahuan yalli tucuchun.
Ganaslla causaichic, cancuna runallapi yuyarishpa, ñucanchic mincashca shina cancunapac maquihuan llancashpa;
chashnami chicanmanta runacuna cancunata yupaichananca, mana imapash cancunata pishincachu.
Huauquicuna, huañushcacuna ima tucushcamanta cancunapash yachancapac mananchicmi, ama mana chapanata chariccuna shina cancunapash llaquirincapac.
Jesus huañushca huasha causarimushcata ñucanchic inishca shina, chashnallata ininchic Dios ñucanchicta huañushcamanta Jesus-huan causachinata, paita inishpa huañuccunata.
Chairaicu, Apunchic yachachishcata cancunata rimanchic; Apunchic shamunacama causac saquiriccuna mana ñaupashunchu unai huañushcacunata.
Shimi uyarishcapi, Arcangelpac shimi, Diospac trompeta uyarishcapi, Apunchilla-tami jahua pachamanta uraicunca. Cristota inishpa hua-ñuccunami ñaupac causarinunca;
chai huasha, causaccuna paicunahuan puyupi pushai tucushun, Apanchic-huan huairapi tuparincapac; chashnami huiñai Apunchic-huan tiyashun.
Cai shimicunahuan cancunapura cariyanacuichic.
Pactamuna pachamanta shuti mana rimashpa quillcaipacchu can, huauquicuna.
Cancuna pacta allita yachanquichic, shuhua runa tuta shamushca shina Apunchic ticramunata.
Ruuacuna, "ganas, sumacmi causacunchic" mshcapimi, chaipi cuncaimauta paicuna nuacllichic tucuna pactamanca, huicsayuc nuarmita huahuayana nanai pactamush-ca shina; quishpinata mana ushanuncachu.
Ranti cancuna huauquicuna, mana tutapichu canquichic Apunchic ticramuna puncha shuhua runapi shina cuncaimanta japi tucuncapac.
Tucui cancuna achicmanta, punchamanta canquichic. Mana tutapac, mana yanaucumantachucanquichic;
chairaicu mana shuccuna shina pununa canquichic, ashtahuan ricuralla, alli yuyayuc causana canquichic.
Puñucuccuna tuta puñunun, machaccana tuta machanun;
ranti ñucanchic, punchapaccuna cashpa, huiñai tucui yuyaihuan causana canchic. Iuina llaquinapash ñucanchic quishpina cana can; quishpinata chapashcahuan shuc cascohuan shina quillparma canchic.
Mana ñacarinata chasquincapacchu Dios ñucanchicta caipi churashca, ashtahuan Apunchic Jesucristoraicu quishpinata tarincapacmi caipi canchic.
Jesucristo uucanchicraicu huañurca; causac cacpi, huañushca cacpi imapash ñucanchicu paihuan causancapac.
Chairaicu cancunapura cariyanacui-chic, sinchicunacuichic, cancuna rurashpa caticushca shina.
Huauquicuna, cancuna ucupi llancaccunata, Apunchic-pi cancunata camachiccunata, cancanata pushaccamacunata yupaichaichic nishpa mañanchic.
Paicunata yapa llaquina canquichic, paicuna llancashcaraicu. Cancunapura ama macanacuichicchu.

Huauquicuna, caitapash cancunata mincani. mana llancana munaccunata sinchi shimihuan rimaichic, sanpayash-cacunata sinchicuchichic, mana ushaccunata yanapaichic, imatapash shuccunapi ricushpa ama piñarichicchu.
Ricuichic ama pipash shuc runapacpi mana allita rurai tucushpa chaillahuata cutichichun. Chaipac rantimanta, allillata huiñai ruraichic cancunapura tucui shuccunatapash.
Huiñai cushi causaichic.
Tucui pachapi Dios-huan rimarichic.
Tucuimanta Diosta pacrachuichic, chaitami pai cancunamanta chapan cancuna Cristo Jesusta iniccuna cashcaraicu.
Samaipac ninata ama huañuchichicchu.
Dios ricsichishca shimimanta rimaccunata ama upa rinri ruraichicchu.
Tucuita taripaichic, alli cashcallata japichic.
Tucui mana allicanamanta chicanyaichic.
Diosllata, ganas causaita cuc Dios, chuya shuncuyucta cancunata rurachun, tucui cancuna cashcata: samai, aicha, causai ama ansallapash huacllishcahuan charichun, Apanchic Jesucristo pactamunacama.
Cancunata cayashca pactachic cashpa mana pishiyancachu.
Ñucanchicraicupash Diosta mañaichic, huauquicuna.
Ucllarishpa muchanacuichic.
Apunchicpac shutipi rimani. tucui huauquicunata cai pancata catishpa uyachipaichic.
Apunchic Jesucristo paipac cuyaita cancunapi tallichi-chun.
Ñuca, Pablo,Silvanohuan Timotcontin Tesaloni-camanta iniccunaman cai pancata quillcani, ñucanchic Yaya Diosman Apunchic Jesucristomanpash llutarishca mari canun paicunapash.
Dios ñuCanchic Yaya Apunchic Jesucristontin paicunapac cuyaita, ganas causaitapash cancanapi tallichinuchun.
Huauquicuna, cancunaraicu huiñai Diosta pacrachuna tucanchic, cancunapac inina ashtahuan huiñashpa caticushca-manta, cancunapura llaquinacunapash caran puncha yalli cashcamanta.
Cancunamanta ñucanchicllata shuc iniccunata cushiyashcahuan rimanchic, chai tucui piñashpa japi tucushca-pi, chai tucm ñacarina charishcapi sinchi caticunquichic mari, smchi inin charinquichic.
Caihuan Dios ricsichicun pai cusca taripashcata, pai cancunatapaipac pachaman yaicuchinca-pac chapacushcata, chairaicumi ñacaricunquichic.
Allimi can Dios cancanata ñacachiccunata ñacachishca,
cancuna ñacariccunaman ñucanchicman samanata cushca shinallata cuchan. Chashna tucuncami Apunchic Jesus Paipac tucui ushaiyuc angelcunahuan ricurimuna punchapi, nina ucupi jahua pachamanta shamucpi.
Diosta mana ricsinayaccunata, Apunchic Jesuspac quishpichic shimita mana uyanayaccunata ñacachincapacmi shamunca.
Huiñai ñacarinahuanmi paicuna ñacachi tucununca, Apunchicmanta, pai jatunyashcamanta paipac ushaimantapash caruyachishcami canunca,
Apunchic paipac runacanapi jatunyachi tucuncapac,paita iniccunapi cushiyachi tucancapac shamuna pancha; shinapash cancunaca mishcanqmchic mari ñucanchic rimashca shimita

Chairaicu ñncanchic cancunaraicu huiñai Dios-huan rimarinchic, ñucanchic Diosta mañanchic cancunata pai jinu cayashcacunata charichun, paica tucui cancuna alli munashca-cunata paipac ushaihuan pactachichun, inishcahuan cancuna rurashcatapash.
Chashnami, Apanchic Jesuspac shuti can-cunaraicu jatunyachishca canca, ranti paica cancunata jatunya-chinca, ñucanchic Dios, Apanchic Jesus cuyashca tuputa.
Cunan huauquicuna, Apunchic Jesucristo shamuna-manta, ñucanchic paihuan tantarinamanta, caita mañanchic:
ama chican yuyaita japichicchu, ama manchachi tucuichicchu quillca pancata japishcapi, camachishcata uyashcapi, Apunchic ticramuna puncha ña pactarcami, ñucanchic rimashcami nishca pactamucpipash.
Imata ruranucpipash ama umachi tucuichicchu. Chai puncha mana pactashcallapita, Diosta chicnishcata ricunca ranchic, supai rana pactamuna pachapi, chai runa chincachi tucuna can.
Cai piñac runami Diosmanta yalli, chacchaipac cashcamanta yalli jahuata jatarinca, Diospac huasita amuyanacama, paillata Diosmi cani rimashpa.
Cancunahuan tiyacushcallapita caimanta rimarcani, ¿yuyarinquichicchu?
Cunan ña yachanquichic imata paita jarcacan, amapai shamuna punchamanta ñaupacta ricurimanca- pac.
Pacashca rurana mana alli yuyai ña ruraricun mari; paita jarcacucta anchuchinalla pishin.
Chaipi shuti chai supai runa ricurincami, Apunchic Jesus pucuillahuanmi paita huañu-chinca, paita huacllichincami pai tucui llinpiyashcahuan ticramucpi.
Ranti chai supai runa, Satanas yanapashcahuan-mi shamanca; achca ushaihuanmi shamunca, mancharicushiya-nacunata umachinaraicu rurashpa.
Chincarina ranacunata tucui mana allicunata rurashpami umachinca, paicunapash quishpina ushancapac shuti cashcata mana uyana munashcarai-cu, mana llaquina munashcaraicu.
Chairaicu Dios saquinlla panta ruraicuna paicunata umachichunlla, llullapi ininuchunlla,
shuti cashcata mana inina munaccuna tucuilla chincarinu-chan, paicanaca mana alli rurashcahuan cushiyac canun.

Ranti ñucanchic Diosta huiñai pacrachuna tucunchic cancunaraicu, Apunchic llaquishca huauquicuna, chicanyachic Samairaicu, cancuna mishca shuti shimiraicupash tucuicuna-manta ñaupac quishpmata tarincapacmi cancunata Dios acllarca.
Chaipacmi Dios ñucanchic ricsichishca quishpina shimihuan cancunata cayarca: Apunchic Jesucristo jatunyachi tacushcapi cancanapash jatanyachi tucancapac.
Chashnamanta huauquicuna, sinchicushpa catichic, ama cancarinquichicchu ñucanchic jinu rishpa cancanata yacha-chishcata quillcapi rimashcatapash.
Apunchic Jesucristollata Dios ñucanchic Yayapash, pai alli shuncuyuc cashcaraicu ñucanchicta llaquishpa, huiñai cushiyanata cushca, alli chapa-natapash pai ñucanchicman cushca;
pai ñucanchic shuncu-cunata cushiyachichun, smchiyachishpa cancunata charichun, cancana rurashca, cancuna rimashca tucui alli cancapac.
Puchucaipi, huauquicuna, ñucanchicraicu Diosta mañaichic, utcalla Apunchicpac shimi tucuicunaman pactachun, alli chasqui tucuchun cancunapi chasqui tucushca shina.
Diostapash mañaichic mana alli, huacllishca runacunamanta ñucanchic quishpichishca cancapac, mana mari tucuilla inina charinun.
Ranti Apanchicca cusca can, paimi cancunata sinchicuchispa mana allimanta quishpichinca.
Apunchicpi chapashcaraicu cancuna cunan rurashca, cancuna huasha ruranca rashca ñucanchic rimashcallatami ruranquichic yuyanchic.
Apunchic cancunata yanapachun Dios llaquishca shina cancunapash llaquincapac,llaqui charishcapipash Cristo shina sinchicuncapac.
IIuauquicuna, Apunchic Jesucristopac shutipi cancunata rimanchic: chicanyaichic maican mana llancanayac huauqui-manta, ñucanchic yachachishca chapanapi mana causac huauquimantapash.
Cancuna yachanquichic ima shina causanami can ñucanchic yachachishcata catincapac: cancuna-huan causacushpa mana yanca, quillashpa tiyashcanchicchu;
pipac tantatapash maquipura rantishpami micushcanchic. Chaimanta rimacpi tutantin punchantinmi llancashcanchic, ñacarishcanchic cancunamanta ama pitapash quillachishun nishpa.
Allipacha rimacpica cancunamanta yanapaita mañana carcanchic, ranti cancunata yachachina munashcaraicu llancashcanchic, cancunapash chaita catincapac
Caita cancunahuan causacushcapi yachachircanchic: Maicanpash mana llancana munashpa ama pacha micuchun.
Shina cacllapita cancunamanta maicaucuna mana llancashpa causacushcata yachashcanchic, mana imatapash ruranallapi yapa yuyarishpa.
Chai runacunata rimanchic, mincanchic Apunchic Jesucristopac shutipi, llancaichiclla cai causaipi mutsuscata charina ushancapac.
Huauquicuna, ama sanpayashpa alli ruranata ruraichiclla.
Cai pancapi rimashcata maicanpash mana uyacpi, paita allita ricuichic maicanta can chai runa, paihuan ama llutarichicchu, ansallapash pincarinman ima chari.
Shinapash chai runata ama piñac runata shina ricuichicchu, ashtahuan shuc huauquita shina camachichic.
Alli causaita cuc Apunchicllata tucui pachapi tucui laya alli causaita cancunaman cuchun. Tucui cancunahuan Apunchic tiyachun.
Ñuca, Pablo, ñuca quiquin maquihuan cai pancata cancunaman quillcani.
Apunchic Jesucristo paipac cuyaita tucui cancanapi tallichichun.
Ñuca, Pablo, Jesucristopac apostol, ñuncanchicta Quishpichic Dios, ñucanchic chapana Apunchic Jesucris-tontin, paicuna munacpi cachamushca,

Timoteoman, ininapi quiquin ñucapac churi, cai pancata quillcani; Dios ñucanchicpac Yaya Apunchic Cristontin paicunapac cuyaita, paicunapac llaquinata, paicunapac ganas causaita canpac jahuapi tallichinuchun.
Efsopi saquiri canta rimarcani ñuca Macedonia suyu-man rirashpa, pantarishca yuyaicunata yachachiccunata ama yachachichicchu rimancapac,
ñucanchic rucunamanta mana tucurina rimaicunatapash ama uyaichicchu. Cai shimicuna piñanacuncapaclla alli canum, Dios munashcata inishcahuan chasquincapac mana yanapanacanchu.
Chuya shuncumanta llucshishca, cusca samaihuan, allipacha inishcahuan cancunapura llaquinacunuchun nishpami cai pactachinata rimarcani.
Maicancuna caimanta chicanya-nushca, yanca rimarinacunapi chincarinushca.
Diospac camachic quillcamanta yachachiccuna tucanayanun, paicanalla-ta rimashcata paicunallata yachachishcatapash mana atipanum.
Camachic quillca, pai rimashcata jinu pactachicpi, alli cashcata yachanchic.

Yuyarina tucunchic ima shina alli ru-nacunaman shuc pactachina quillcata mana cuipac can. Mana uyaccunata ñacachincapacmi pactachina quillcata cuna tucun, mana allicunata, juchasapacanata, Diosta mana chacchaccunata, inina mana chariccunata, yaya mamata huañuchiccunata, runa huañuchiccanata,

yumashpa juchalliccunata, caripura yuma-riccunata, huatara runacunata, llullaccunata, Diospac shutita yancamanta rimaccanata; rimacpi, pactachina quillca alli yachachishcamanta mana alli yachaicunata yachachiccunata ñaca-chincapac can.
Chai alli yachachishca quishpina shimipimi tiyan, chaita bendisiashca Dios ñucaman mmcahuarca.
Apunchic Jesucristota pacrachuni, pai ushaita cuhuashca, pactachicta ñucata ricuhuashpa, paita yanapancapac churahuashca,

ñaupa ñuca paita piñashpa rimac cacpipash, paita piñashpa japic cacpipash, paita piñashpa caparic cacpipash. Ranti Dios ñucamanta llaquirihuarca, ñuca chaira mana inina charishcaraicu ñuca mana alli ruracushcata mana yacharcani.
Chashnami Apunchic paipac cuyaita achcata tallichirca ñuca jahuapi; inina, llaquina cuhuarca, chaicunata charmchic Cristohuan llutarishcacuna cashcaraicu.
Cai allipacha shutimi, tucuicuna caita inina canun: Cristo Jesus cai pachaman shamurcami juchasapacunata quishpichincapac, paicunamanta ñucami ñaupac cani.

Chairaicu Dios ñucamanta llaquirirca: Jesucristo yapa llaquishca ñucapi ricurincapac. Huasha ininacuna, ñucapi tucushcata yuyarishpa, yachanunca ima shina inina cashcata huiñai causanata chasquina ushancapac.
Huiñai tiyac Incata, mana huañuc, mana ricuric shuclla Diosta huiñai jatunyachi-shun. Chashna cachun.
Ñuca churi, Timoteo, alli llancanapi llancai canta rimani, canmanta profetacuna rimashca shimicunata pactachishpa.
Ininata, alli causaita cati, mana maicancuna shina chaicunata mayanman jichushpa; chashna rurashpa paicunapac ininata chincachinurca.
Chashna tucuccuna canunmi Himeneo Alejandrontm, paicunata supaipac amuman curcani ama Diosta piñac shimicunata rimana yachancapac.
Tucuimanta ñaupac caita mmcam: Tucui runacunaraicu Dios-huan rimarishcapi mañaichic, paita pacrachuichic.
Jatun apucunaraicu Diosta mañana can tucui uchilla apucunamantapash, ganas causaita charina ushancapac, Diosta chacchashpa, tucuita alli yuyaihuan rurashpa.
Chai alli can, ñucanchicta quishpichic Dios chaita cushiyashcahuan ricun,
pai tucuicuna quishpincapac, tucuicuna shuti cashcata ricsincapac munan mari.
Shuclla Dios mari tiyan; chashnallata, shuc runalla tucui runacunata Dios-huan llutachincapac pushana ushan: chai runa Jesucristo can.
Jesucristo tucuicunata quishpichinaraicu, paimanta pacha pactashcapi rimashca shina, huañuiman curirca.

Chairaicu, pai acllahuashca shimita apashpa rincapac, apostol tucancapac, mincai tucushcanipash inina shuti cashcamanta mana judio runacunata yachachincapac. Ñuca rimashca shutimi can, manapacha llullanichu.
Chashnamanta, tucui ranacuna tucui pachapi Dios-huan rimarincapac munani, mana piñarishpa, mana piñanacushpa, chuya shuncuhuan Diosman maquicunata jatachinuchun nini.

Huarmicunapash alli churarishca, mana yapalla sumacyashca-huan, yancashituta churarincapac munani; ari, sumacyanuchun, mana yapalla sumac ñaccharishcahuan, mana curi, mana sumac ricuric rumicunata aparishpa, mana yapalla cullquita jichuchic churanacunahuan, mana;
ashtahuan alli rurashcacunata ricuchishpa, Diosman chicanyachishca huarmicuna ruranata pactachispa.
IIuarmica yachachishcata upalla uyana can, allipacha uyashcahuan;
mana munanichu huarmi runa ucupi yachachishpa shayancapac, carita yallishpa: Upalla causancapac munani.
¿Dios Adanta manachu ñaupac rurarca, Evataca huasha?
Mana Adanchu umachi tucurca, huarmimi umachi tucurca; paimi umachi tucushca, juchapi urmarca.
Ranti huarmica quishpincami mamacuna ruranata pactachishpa; alli yuyaita japishpa, ininapi, llaquinapi, chuya shuncuhuan causashpa.
Cai yapa shuti can. pipash iniccunata pushaccama tucuna munashpa, alli llancanata mashcacun.

Chairaicu, pushaccamapac causai alli, cusca cana can. Shuclla huarmiyuc, yuyayuc, cusca, tucuipi yupaichaipac cana can. Paipac huasiman runa pactacpi, chasquina yuyaita charina can; sumacta yachachic cana can;
mana machaisiqui, mana macanacuisiqui, ashtahuan alli shuncuyuc, mana piñarishpa causac, imatapash mana cullquiraiculla rurac cana can.
Paipac huasita alli ricuc cana can, huahuacunata uyac cancapac, yupaichac cancapac yachachic;
maicancapash quiquinpac huasita mana alli ricuc cashpa, ¿iniccunata ricana ushancachu?
Chairaicu, shuc pushaccamata mana mushulla inincapac callaricta shayachinachu, yancamanta yapalla jatunyarishpa, supai cautsayachi tucushcallapita imapash urmancami.
Mana inic runacunapacpi yupaichashca cachun, ama pincachi tucushpa supaipac ticllapi urmachun.
Diaconocunapash chashnallata yupaichaipac cana canun, paicuna cushca shimita huiñai pactachinuchun; ama machaisiqui, cullquitapash ama umachishcahuan japinuchun.
Ñucanchic inishca shuti cashcata ricsichishcaman liutarishca cana canuu, Dios cushca samaitapash chuyata charina canun.
Ñaupacta camai tucushca canuchun; mana juchayuc canucpi, yanapancapac callarinuchun.
Huarmicunapash chashnallata, yupaichaipac cana canun, mana rimaisiqui, ashtahuan cusca, tucuita pactachic canami canun.
Shuc diacono shuclla huarmiyuc cachun, huahuacanata alli ricuc, paipac huasitapash alli ricuc.
Llancanata alli pactachic diaconocuna jatunyachishca canun, chasnami paicuna Cristo Jesuspi inishcata mana pincarishpa rimana ushanun.
Mana unaichu canta ricucrisha yuyani; ranti canta caita quillcani
ñuca imapash huashayacpi, Diospac aillumanta cashpa ima shina causana cashcata can yachancapac, causacuc Diospi miccuna chai aillu canun, paimi shuti cashcata riman, ricsichin.

Mana pipash rimana ushanchu ñucanchic inishca alli shutipacha jatan pacara cashcata: Cristo runa tucushca ricurimurca; pai samai cashcaraicu yallishcapi, angelcanapacpi ricui tucurca. Tucui llactacunapi ricsichi tucurca, cai pachapi paita ininurca, jahuapachapi jatunyachi tucurca.
Samai pasacta rimacun puchucai pachacunapi maican-cuna inina charishcamanta chicanyanuncami nishpa, umachic samaicanata supaicuna yachachishcatapash catishcarai-cu.
Ishcai shimiyuc, llullaisiqui runacunatami uyanunca, paicuna ucupi tiyac Dios cushca samai paicuna juchallishca jillai ninallahuata mircashca canun.
Cai runacana sahuarmca nicpi mana munanun; tucui iniccana, shuti cashcata ricsiccuna micuncapac Dios churashca micunacunata paita pacrachushpa micuncapac, mana micunachu rimanun.
Tucui Dios rurashca alli can; Diosta pacrachushpa chasquicpi mana imapash millai tucushcachu cana can.
Diospac shimiraicu ñucanchic Dios-huan rimarishcaraicupash micunacuna chicanyachishca tucunun.
Chaicunata huauquicanaman yachachishpa, inina shimicunahuan juntarishpa, alli yachaicunata catishpa, chai shuti Jesucristopac alli runami canqui.
Ranti, uparunacunapac rimaicunata ama uyaichu. Diosta llaquinapi yapa yuyanshpa Causai;
purina aichata ansa yanapanmi, ranti Diosta llaquinapi yuyarishpa causashca tucuipac yapa yanapan: cai causaipi alli causancapac, shamunca racuc causaipi causaita tarmcapac.
Chai shutimi can, tucuilla chaita inina canquichic.
Chairaicumi ñacarinchic, llancanchic, causacuc Diospi ñucanchic yuyaita churashcaraicu, pai tucuicunata quishpichic can, iniccunata ashtahuan yalli quishpichic can.
Chaicunatami pactachichina, yachachina canqui.
Maltacashcaraicu asi tucunata ama saquinquichu; ashtahuan can causashcahuan, can rimashcahuan iniccunata ricuchina canqui; canpac llaquinata, canpac ininata, canpac chuya causaita ricuchina canqui.
Ñuca pactanacama, tucuicunapac ñaupacpi Dios quillcashca shimita catishpa uyachi, huauquicunata cariyachi, paicunata yachachi.
Ama cuncarinquichu Dios canman cushca cuyaicunamanta, pai ricsichishcaraicu, iniccunamanta rucucuna canpac jahuapi maquicunata canta acllashpa churanurca.
Tucui chaicunapi yapa yuyarina canqui, tucuicunata can ñaupacman caticushcata ricuchincapac.

Quiquin canmanta yapa yuyarina canqui, can shuccunata yachachishca-mantapash yapa yuyarina canqui, tucuipi sinchicushpa cati. Chashna rurashpa, canllatami quishpinqui canta uyaccunata- pash quishpichinquimi.
Rucu runacunata ama piñaichu; chaipac rantimanta, canpac yayata shina camachi; maltacunata canpac huauquicuna cacpi shina ricui.
Rucu mamacunata canpac quiquin mamata shina ricui; malta huarmicunata, canpac panicuna cacpi shina ricui chuya shancuhuan.
Mana maimanta yanapaita charic huaccha huarmicunata yanapai.

Ranti shuc huaccha huarmi churiyuc, churipac huahuacanayuc cacpi, paicanami ñaupac aillucanata yanapanca-pac yachana canun; yaya mama llaquishcata cutichincapac yachana, chai yapa alli can, Dios cushiyashcahuan ricun.
Alli quiquin huaccha huarmi, sapalla saquiric, Diospi yuyaita churan, tutantin punchantin Dios-huan rimarishpa paita mañacan.
Ranti mana alli causac huaccha huarmica causaillapita huañushca can.
Chaicunatapash pactachichina canqui, ama pipash cancunamanta shuc shimi rimachun.
pi runa cashpapash quiquin paipac huasipi tiyaccunamanta mana yuyaricpi, inina iliacmi can, jichushca mari, mana iniccunamanta astahuan mana allichu can.
Sucta chunca huata yalli huacchallata huacchacana shuti japina quillcapi tiyana can, pai shuclla cariyuc.

Allita ru-rashcamanta ricsi tucuna can: huahuacunata allitachu huiñachirca, paipac huasipi pactaccanahuan allichu carca, inic-canata chaquita maillacchu carca, ñacariccanata yanapacchu car-ca; rimacpi, pai ushashcapi alli yanapaicanata rurashca cacpi.
Pishilla huatayuc huacchacunata quillcapi ama japin-quichu; paicanapac aicha nuspayacpi Cristomanta chicanyash-pa, cuti sahuarinata munanun;
chashnamanta cautsayashca tucunun paicuna ruranata mana pactachishpa.
Chairapash, huasi huasi purinun, quilla tucunun, mana quillaisiquillachu canun, ashtahuan rimaisiqui tucunun, tucuipi paicuna satiranun, mana rimanacunata rimashpa.
Chairaicu malta huacchacuna sahuarinuchunlla nini, huahuayanuchunlla; huasipi llancac huarmi cachun, chaimi piñaccuna paita mana camina ushanunca.
Maican huacchacunaca ña mari chicanyanushca, supai amuta cunan catiranan.

Inic huarmicunamanta maicanpash aillu ucupi huacchacunata charishpa, yanapana tucun, ama iniccunamanta yanapaita mañacuncapac; chashnami iniccuna mana maimanta yanapaita charic huacchacunata yanapana ushananca.
Iniccunata alli pushaccama rucucuna achca llaquishca cana canun, ashtahuan Diospac Shimita huillaccuna yachachic-cunantin yapa llaquishca cana canun.
Caita riman camachic quillca: "Trigota cutacuc huacrata ama shimita huataichu". Caitapash riman: "Shuc rana cullquita japina tucun pai llancashcamanta".
Shuc rucu runata cautsayachinucpi ama uyaichu ishcai, quimsa ricuyaccana mana tiyacpi.
Juchallishpa caticcunata tucuicunapac ñaupacpi sinchi shimihuan rimana canqui uyaccana mancharinuchun.
Diospac ñaupacpi, Jesucristopac ñaupacpi, acllashca angelcunapac ñaupacpi canta mincani: cai pactachinacunata catilla, mana pitapash yallicta, pishilla pactachichishpa.
Chaira mana allita yuyarishca cashpa, ama pitapash canpac maquicunata paipac jahuapi churanquichu; chashnami mana shuccuna juchallishcahuan canpash juchallinqui. Tucui mana allicunata ama ruraichu.
Huicsa nanaihuan uncushpa causani ninqui; yacuta ama upiaichu, ansa vinota upiai.
Maicancunapac juchacuna chaira mana taripanaman apashcallapita ña ricsi tucunun, ranti shuccunaca taripai tucushca huashalla yachai tucunun.
Chashnallata alli rurashcacunapash ricunalla canun; mana ricuriccunaca mana huiñai pacashca saquirinuncachu.
Huatara runacana, yapa yupaichashcahuan ricuna canun amucunata, ama Diospac shutimanta ñucanchic yachachishcamantapash mana alli rimashca shimicuna uyarincapac.

Inic amuta chariccuna ashtahuan yapa yupaichana canun ininapi huauquipura cashcaraicu. Chaipac rantimanta, ashtahuan yapa allita yanapana canquichic, cancuna amucuna inic, llaquishca huauquicuna cashcaraicu. Caita yachachi, canpash pactachina canqui:
Pipash chican yuyaicunata yachachishpa, Apunchic Jesucristo sumac yachachishcamanta chican yuyaita charishpa, ñucanchic inina-mantapash chican yuyaita charishpa,

yaca jatunyarishpa mana imatapash yachac runami can. Yanca shimicunamanta rimarina uncuitami charm chai rana; chaimantami tiyan chiqui-cui, piñanacuna, piñashpa caparina, shuccunapi yuyai churana illana,
yuyai illac runapura huiñai macanacuna, paicuna shuti cashcata mana ricsinun, ininata paicunaca catunami mari yu-yanacun.
Ininamanta shuti pachami achcata chasquinchic, shinapash amu charishcallahuan cushiyac runalla.
Cai pacha-man mana imahuan shamushcaraicu, mana imatapash caimanta apana ushanchic;
micuucapac charishpa, churarinata charish-pa, chaihuanmi pacta cushi tiyana canchic.
Ranti, achca cha-rina munaccuna camai tucushcapi mana ushanun, tucui laya munana tictapi urmanan; mana alli, huacllichic manaicanapi, chaicuna runata ilushtiyanapi, chicapac huañunapi urmanun.
Tucui mana allicuna cullquita yapa munashcamanta tiyan; maican ranacuna, cullquiraiculla, inina charishcamanta chican-yanushca, paicana quiquin causaitapash ñaca-rinallahuan junta-chishpa causaranan.
Ranti can Diospac runa canqui, tucui chaicunamanta anchuri. Cusca causaita causai, Diosta yapa yuyarishpa, inish-pa, llaquishpa, mana sanpayashcahuan catishpa, shuncumanta uchillayashpa.

Ininapi alli llancana canpac llancana cachun; huiñai causana chasquinamanta ama quishpmquichu, chaipacmi Dios canta cayarca; chairaicullata can inina charishcamanta achca ricuyac ñaupacpi ricsichircanqui.
Cunan, Diospac ñaupacpi —pai tucui imatapash causaita cun, Jesucristopac ñaupacpipash, paipash ricsichirca, Poncio Pilatopac ñaupacpi uyachirca— canta rimani:
cai ñuca rimashcata uyahuai, mana shuc layata rurashpa, ama canta imamantapash piñana tucancapac. Chashna rurai Apunchic Jesucristo shamunacama.
Rimashca pacha pactarishcapi, Dios caita ricsichincami, paillami shuclla, bendisiashca, Jatun Apu, incacunapac Inca.

Pai shucllami mana huañuc can, pai mana pipash mayanya-na ushaipac achicpi causan. Pi runapash paita mana ricushca-chu, pi runapash paita mana ricununcachu. Pailla jatunyachish-ca cachan, pailla ushaita charichun. Chashna cachun.

Cai pachapi achca chariccunata rimai ama chai achca charishcapi jatanyarishpa causanuchan, ama chai achca charish-capi paicunapac yuyaita churanuchun, tucui paicuna achca charishca chincarinalla cashcaraicu. Chaipac rantimanta, yuyaita Diospi churanuchun, paimi ñucanchicman tucui imatapash achcata cun, ñucanchic alli causancapac.
Rimai allicunallata ranuchun, paicuna alli rurashca achca charishca cachun, paicana charishcata shuccanamanpash canata munanu-chun.
Chaimi achca charishcahuan juntarinunca huasha causaipac, chai shuti quiquin causaita mari chasquinanca.
Timoteo, canman mincashcata allita ricui. Yanca shimicunata ama uyaichu, yanca rimashca shimicunatapash ama uyaichu;
maicancuna, chai "yapa yachashpa rimashca shimicunata" caticcuna, inina charishcamanta chicanyanushca mari. Apanchic paipac cuyaita cancunapi tallichichun.
Ñuca, Pablo, Jesucristopac apostol Dios chashna munashcaraicu, pai ñucanchicman Cristo Jesuspi huiñai causaita cushami nirca.
Ñuca llaquishca churi Timoteoman cai pancata quillcani: Dios Yaya, Apunchic Jesucristontin paicunapac cuyaita, paicunapac llaquinata, ganas causaitapash canpac jahuapi tallichinuchun yuyashcahuan.
Canmanta huiñai Dios-huan rimarishcapi yuyarishpa, tutantin punchantin Diosta pacrachuni, ñuca paita chuya shuncuhuan mari yanapani, ñuca rucucuna yanapashca shinallata.
Can huacashcata yuyarishpa, canta ricunayai shamuhuan ñuca cushihuan juntarincapac.
Can alli pacha shuti inina charishcata yuyarinimi. Canmanta ñaupac-canpac aula Loida canpac mama Eunicepash charinurca; ñuca yachanimi canan canpash charishcata.
Chairaicu, ñuca canpac jahuapi ñuca maquicunata canta acllashpa churacpi can chasquishca Dios cuyashca ninata cariyachi.
Mana manchai samaitachu Dios ñucanchicman curca, ushai samaitami curca, llaquina samai, alli yuyarishpa causana samai.

Chashnamanta ama pincarichu Apunchicraicu rimanata; ñucamantapash ama pincarichu, ñuca pairaicu mari chunta curralpi quillpara tiyani. Chaipac rantimanta, Dios cushca ushaihuan canpash ñacari, quishpichic shimiraicu ñacarinacuna tiyacpi.

Dios ñucanchicta quishpichirca, paiman ñucanchic causaita chicanyachincapac cayarca, mana ñucanchic imapipash paita yanapashcaraicu, paimi chashnapac munarca, Cristo Jesuspi ñucanchicta llaquishcaraicu. Dios, ñucanchicta cai pacha chaira mana tiyashcamanta llaquishcata,
cunan pai llaquishcata ñucanchicman ricsichin, ñucanchicta Quishpichic Jesucristo shamushcahuan; pai yallirca huañuipac ushaita; mana tucuric causaitapash cushi shimita rimashpa ricsichirca.
Chai shimita ricsichincapac Dios ñucata mincahuash-ca, pai shuc apostol shina, shuc yachachicshina shayachishpa cachahuashca.

Chairaicullata tucui chaicunata ñacaricuni. Shinapash chaimanta mana pincarinichu, ñuca yuyaita piman churashcata allipacha yachashcaraicu; ñuca yachani pai ushai charishcaraicu puchucai punchacama ñucaman mincashcata huacaichishpacharinca.
Ñucamanta yachashca cusca causanata catilla; ñucanchic Cristo Jesusman llutarishcaraicu inina, llaquina charishcapi causailla.
Ñucanchicpi causacuc Diospac Samai yanapashcahuan, canman mincashca Diosta ininata allita ricui.
Can ña yachanqui, ima shina Asiamantacuna tucuilla jichuhuanushcata; chaicunamanta Pigelo, Hermogenes canun.
Onesiforopac aillucunamanta Apunchic llaquirichun; pai achca cuti cushichihuarca; ñuca chunta curralpi tiyacpipash pai mana pincarircachu.
Chaipac rantimanta, Romaman pactashca shina, mana sanpayashpa ñucata mashcancapac callarirca tupanacama.
Puchucai punchapi Apunchic tupachichun paimanta llaquirishcata. Can pacta yachanqui ima shina pai Efesopi achca yanapashcata.
Canca, ñuca huahualla, sinchicui Cristo Jesusmanta chasquishca cuyaicunahuan.
Can ñuca achca ricuyaccu-napac ñaupacpi rimacpi uyashcata, alli ricsishca runacunaman mincai, shuccunaman yachachina ushaccanaman.
Ñacarinacunapi Mesias Jesuspac alli soldado shina ñacari.
Manamaican soldadopash yanca runapac causaipi sati-rinchu, paipac aputa cushiyachinallatami yuyarin.
Chash-uallata, shuc pucllac runa cuyashcata mana chasquincachu, pucllaccuna pactachinata mana allita pactachishpa.
Chacrapi llancac runa tucuimanta ñaupac pai tarpushcamanta micuna can.
Cai ñuca rimashcata yuyari, chaimi Apunchicca tucuita atipachinca.
Huañushcamanta causarishca Jesucristopi yuyari, pai Jatun Curaca Davidpac aillu carca. chaimi quishpmamanta ñuca yachachishca shimi can.
Chai shimiraicu ñacarinacuna tiyacpipash mana imanahuanchu, runata huañuchic shina huatara causanapash mana imanahuanchu; ranti Diospac shimi mana huatashcachu can.
Chairaicumi tucui Dios acllashca-cunapac allipac ñacarini, paicunapash huiñai quishpmata Cristo Jesuspi chasquinuchan.
Cai yapa shutimi can: Paihuan huañushca cashpa, paihuanmi causashan;
sinchicushcahuan ñacarishpa, paipac pachapi yaicuna ushashanmi; ñucanchic paita piñacpi, paipash ñucanchicta piñancami;
ñucanchic cushca shimita mana pactachicpipash, paica pactachincallami, paillata llullarmcapac mana ushashcaraicu.
Chaita paicunata yuyachi, ama yanca shimicunamanta piñanacuncapac Diospac ñaupacpi mincai. Chashna pmanacuna yancami can, mana imapash alli; paita uyaccunata huacllichin-capacllami alli canun.
Alli yanapac runa shina, Diosta yanapanalla huiñai chapacui, mana imamanta pmcarmata charic llancac runa shina, shuti shimita mana pantashcanuan yachachishpa.
Yanca mana yuyarishpa rimashca shimicuna-ta ama rimaichu; chashna rimac runacunaca caran cuti ashta-huan mana allipi urmashpa catiranun;
chai yachachishcacu-na ismuchic uncui shina mirarishpa riranun. Himeneo Piletontin chashna tucuranun,
shuti shimimanta paicuna chicanyanushca mari huañushcamanta causarina ñucanchipi ña pactarishcami rimashcahuan; chashna, ininata maican runacu-napi huacllichishpa puriranun.
Ranti Dios mana cuyuric sapita shayachishca, chaipi cashna quillcara tiyan: "Apunchic paipac runacunata ricsin mari". Cuti shuc: "Tucui Diospac shutita ricsiccuna mana allicunamanta chicanyanuchun".

Shuc jatun huasipi mana curimantalla, mana cullqui-mantalla imacunachu tiyan; manca allpamanta caspimantapash tiyan mari; shuccanata raimi punchacunapi llucshichinun, shuccunaca caran puncha surcui tucunun.
Sumac ricurinca-pac —Raimi punchalla surcui tucuncapac— Apunchicman chicanyachishca cancapac, tucui mana allimanta pichashca cana canchic; chaimi shuti tucui imapacpash alli cashun.
Maltacuna manalli munanamanta chicanyai; canpac causai cusca cachun inina charishcahuan, llaquishcahuan, ganas causaihuan, tucui Apanchicta ricsic chuya shuncuyuccunahuan pacta.
Yancamanta rimarinacunata ama uyaichu, can pacta yachanqui ima shina chaicuna yancamanta canman piñarinata apamunca racushcata.
Apunchicta yanapac runa mana ma-canacushpa causanachu can; chaipac rantimanta, tucuicanahuan alli shuncu cana can. Yachachincapac yapa yachac; mana piña-risiqui;
piñarisiquicunatapash uchilla shuncuyashpa atipa-chic runa, Dios paicunata cuti paiman yuyaita ticrachichinca-mi, shuti cashcata ricsichincami chapashpa,
paicunapash yu-yaita japishpa supaipac tictamanta, huatara charishcamanta pai munashcata rurachincapac, chaimanta quishpinuchun nishpa.
Puchucai pachapi llaqui punchacuna tiyana cashcata yachana canqui.

Runacuna quiquinpacllatami yuyari-nunca, cullquillatami llaquinunca, paicunalla jatunyariccuna, yancashitucunahuanpash jatunyariccuna. Diosta piñaccuna, yaya mamata mana uyaccuna, pacrachunata mana yachaccuna, ininata mana caticcuna.
Llaquina illaccuna, shuccunamanta llaquirina illaccuna, rimaisiquicunami canunca, paicuna aicha mañashcata mana yallina ushaccuna, upata millaicuna, tucui allita piñaccuna.
Ishcai shimiyuccuna, pincai illaccuna, yalli canayaccuna, Diosta mashcana rantimanta ashtahuan paicunapac alli causaillatami mashcaccuna.
Jahua ricuriclla yapa alli shuncumi canunca, ranti paicuna rurashcapica ininapac quiquin ushai llullami can rimanunca. Canca chashna runacunamanta chicanyai.
Paicuna, huasicunapi yaicushpa, juchalla aparishca tiyac huarmicunata umachiccuna canan; chai huarmicana tucui laya aicha munash-cahuan ñacarishpa causanun;
huiñai yacharanlla causanun, ranti shuti cashcata mana maican puncha allipacha ricsinun.

Janes, Jambres sacracuna, Moises rimashcata mana munash-ca shinallata, cunanpash cai runacuna shuti cashcata mana pactachinata munanan. Cai runacuna paicanapac yuyaita huac-llishcata charinun, inina catinapi mana ushanushca.
Ranti mana ushanuncachu ashtahuan ñaupacman catincapac, paicana upa cashcata tucui runacuna ricsishcaraicu, chai ishcaicuna Moisesta mana uyashpa tucushca shinami tucunanca.
Canca, ranti, ñuca yachachishcata alli catishcanqui, ñuca causaita, ñuca munashcata, ñuca ininata, ñuca mana piñarishpa chapanata, ñuca llaquinata, ñuca sinchicana ushaita,

piñashpa japi tucunata ñacarinacunatapash. Tucui ñuca Antioquiapi, Iconiopi, Listrapi tucushcata can yachanqui, piñashpa japi tucushcapi ñuca ñacarishcacunatapash can yachanqui; ranti, Apunchicca tucui chaicunamanta quishpichi-huarcami.
Cristo Jesusman chicanyachishca causana munaccuna piñashpa japi tucushpa ñacarina cashca, shutimi can;
ranti mana alli runacana, umachisiquicuna astahuanmi huacllishpa catinunca, shuccunata umachishpa, paicunallata umachi tucushpa catinanca.
Canca tucui can yachashcapi sinchicushpa cati, can yachashcata allipacha ricsishcaraicu.
Dios quillcashca shimita can huahuamanta ricsishcata yuyari, chai quillca canta yachachina ushan, quishpichina ushan, can Cristo Jesuspi inicpi.
Tucui quillca Diosmanta shamun, yachachincapac, camachincapac alli can; huacllicucta cuscayachincapac cushca causanata yachachincapacpash alli can;
Diospac runa alli yachachishca cancapac, tucuipac allichishca, tucui allicanallata rurancapac, alli can.
Diospac ñaupacpi, huañushcacunata causaccunantin apu shina taripancapac shamuna Cristo Jesuspac ñaupacpi, mincani achcata
cushi shimita yachachi nishpa; chai shimita rimailla alli chasqui tucushcapi, mana alli chasqui tucushcapipash. Canta uyanuchun sinchi shimihuan camachi, sinchicuchi mana piñarishpa yachachishcahuan.
Alli yachachishcata runacuna mana uyanayashca pacha tiyancami ran; ashtahuan, paicuna quiquin munaimanta, paicuna uyana munashcallata rimac yachachiccunatami mashcanunca.
Sbuti shimita ñahuimi ricununca, ashtahuan yanca shimicunatami uyanunca.
Ranti canca huiñai alli yuyaihuan causai, ñacari-nacunata allihuan chasqui, quishpichic shimita shuccunaman yachachinallata yuyari, canpac llancanata allita pactachi.
Camari shina ñuca curina ña pactarishcami; ñuca huañuna pacha ña pactariranmi.
Alli ruranapi llancashcani, ñuca pactanaman pactashcanimi, ininallapi purishcani.
Cu-nan, Apunchic, cuscata taripac Apu, puchucai puncha ñucaman cuyana llaututami chapani. Mana ñucallatachu cuhuanca, pai ticramunata cushihuan chapaccunatapash cuncami.
Utcalla ricuc shamuhuai;
Demas, cai pachamanta tucui imacunata yapa llaquishcaraicu, ñucata jichushpa Tesalonicaman rishca. Crescenteca Galacia suyuman rishca, Titoca Dalmaciaman rishca.
Lucaslla ñucahuan tiyacun. Marcosta mashcashpa pushamui, llancanapi ñucata caipi yanapahuancami.
Tiquicotaca Efesoman cacharcani.
Can shamucushpa, Troaspi, Carpopac huasipi ñuca saquimushca jahua churanata apamupai; quillca pancacanatapash apamupan-qui, quillca caracunatapash.
Jillaita llancac Alejandro ñucahuan manapacha allichu cashca; Apunchic paita pai rurashca tuputa cunca chari.
Canca yuyanqui paita pai ñucanchic yachachishca cushi shimita yapa piñac cashcaraicu.
Ñucaraicullata apucunapac ñaupacpi rimancapac rishcapi, mana pipash yanapahuarcachu, tucuimi ñucamanta anchurinurca. Dios paicuna chashna rurashcamanta quishpi-chinca chari yuyani.

Ranti Apunchicca yanapahuarcami, ushaitapash cuhuarcami, chairaicu quishpichic shimita ricsichina usharcani; Diosta mana ricsiccunatapash tucui paicunaman uyachircani. Apunchic chashna puma shimimanta quishpichihuarca,
tucui mana allimantapash quishpichihuan-cami; chashnami paipac pachapac huacaichihuanca. ¡Huiñai pai jatunyachishca cachan! Chasna cachan.
Ñucamanta rimapaichic Priscata Aquilantin, paicunata yuyarinimi, Onesiforopac aillucunatapash.
Erastoca Corin-topimi saquirirca, Trofimotaca Miletopimi uncucta saquimur-cani.
Tamia pacha chaira mana pactashcallapita shamui. Eubulo, Pudente, Lino, Claudia tucui huauquicunapash canmanta yuyarinunmi.
Apunchic Jesucristo canhua tiyachun; Dios tucui cancunapi paipac cuyaita tallichichun.
Ñuca, Pablo, Diospac runa, Jesucristopac apostol cani, Dios acllashcacunata ininaman pushancapac pai cacha-mushca, ñucanchic inina shuti cashcatapash paicuna ricsincapac;
chai inina huiñai causanapi chapashcamanta tiyan. Chaira cai pacha mana tiyashcallapita, mana llulla Dios cushami nirca chai causaita;
cunanca, pacha pactarishcapi, paipac cushi shimita ricsichishca ñucanchicta quishpichic Dios yachachincapac ñucaman mincashcaraicu.

Cai pancata canta quillcani, Tito, can ñucapac quiquin churi cahuanqui ñucanchic charishca ininapi, Dios ñucanchic Yaya ñucanchicta quishpichic Jesucristontm paicunapac cuyaita ganas causaita-pash canpac jahuapi tallichinuchun yuyarishcahuan.
Ñuca canta Creta islapi saquishpa, callarishcata tucu-chincapacmi saquircani, caran llactapi pushaccamacanata shaya-chincapac, ñuca mincashca shina catishpa.
Shuc pushaccama mana imamantapash rimaipacmi causana tucun. Shuc huarmi-llata charina can, paipac churicanaca inic canuchun, mana piñai tucushcacuna, mana piñarisiquicuna.

Iniccanata pushaccama-ca tucui Diospac imacunamanta mincai tucushca can; chairai-cumi cusca causaita charina tucun. Mana pai yuyashcallata catic cana can, mana piñarisiqui, mana machaisiqui, mana macanacuisiqui, mana cullqui shuhua cana can.
Chaipac rantimanta, paipac huasipi runata chasquinalla chapacuna can, yanapac runa; alli yuyayuc, cusca runa, Diospac chicanyashca, ruranata pactachic.
Diosmanta yachachishcata catina can, chashnami alli shimita yachachina ushanca, yachachishcamanta chican shimita rimaccanatapash uyachina ushancami.
Upata piñarisiquicuna achca mari tiyanun, pincai carata pitirmami rimaccunami ashtahuan yapa tiyan, paicuna mana atipaipac shimita ninun, chashnami runacunata umachinun.
Chai runacunata shimita quillpacpi alli canca, maicanpi paicuna shuc aillu tantarishcata illacta mari huacllichinun, mana yachachina cashcata yachachishpa paicunamanta cullquita surcunaraiculla.
Creta allpamantallata shuc profeta paipac aillucuna-manta cashna nirca: "Cretamanta runacuna huiñai llullaisiqui, aucacuna, micuisiqui, quillaisiquicuna".
Shutita pai rimarca; chairaicu, sinchi shimihuan paicunata camachi, paicuna inina cusca cachun;
Judiocuna yanca rimashcata ama uyanuchun, shuti shimita mana uyana manaccana rimashcatapash ama uyanuchun.

Chuya yuyayuc runacuna tucui imacunatapash chuya ñahuihuan ricunun; ranti mana iniccuna, mana chuya yuyayuccuna, mana imatapash chuya ñahuihuan ricunun; paicunapac yuyai paicuna ucupi tiyac samaipash mapayashca cashcaraicu.
Diosta ricsinchicmi rimanun, ranti paicuna rurashcapica mana ricsishcatachu ricuchinun; chicnipaccuna, piñarisiqui canun, mana imatapash allita rurana ushaccana.
Can rimashcapi Diosmanta cusca yachachishcallata huiñai rimana canqui.
Rucucunata rimai ama pucllaisi-qui canuchun; yupachaipac, alli yuyayuc canuchun; paicunapac inina, llaquina cusca cachun ñacarina charishcapi paicuna sinchi canuchun.
Chashnallata, rucu mamacunapash Diosta yapa yuyarishpa causanuchan; ama rimaisiqui canuchun ama machanuchun. Alli rurashcata ricuchina canun;
malta huar-micunaman carita huahuacanata llaquincapac yachachinuchun,
yuyayuc cancapac, chuya shuncuyuc cancapac; huasita alli ricuc, alli shuncuyuccuna, carita uyaccuna; ama pi runapash Diospac cushi shimimanta mana allita rimana ushancapac.
Chashnallata huanpracunatapash yuyayuc cancapac camachi;
canllata tucuipi alli rurashcahuan paicunata ricuchina canqui. Paicunata yachachicushcapi, chuya shuncuhuan ama pucllashcahuan ruraichu,
cusca shimihuan rimashpa, ama pipash can rimashcamanta piñana ushachun. Chashnami maican mana alli rimacpash pincarinca, ñucanchic pantashcata mana ansapash tupana ushashpa.
Huatara runacunata amucunata tucuipi uyanuchun nish-pa camachi; alli shuncu canuchun, mana piñarisiquicuna.
Ama shuhuanuchun, chaipac rantimanta amupacta alli hua-caichinuchun; tucuicuna paicana causaipi ricanuchun yapa su-mac cashcata ñucanchic Quishpichic Diosmanta yacha-chishca.
Dios ñucachicman ricuchishca mari pai alli shuncu cashcata, chairaicu tucui runacunaman quishpina pactamushca.
Dios alli shuncu cashca ñucanchicta yachachin, mana alli ruraicunata, cai pachamanta munaicunata saquishpa, cai pachapi yuyayuc, cusca, Diosman yuyaralla causaita charincapac,
pai cusha nishca pactarinata chapashpa: ñucanchic jatun Quishpichic Dios Jesucristo ticramunata chapashpa.

Pai ñucanchicraicu huanuiman curirca, tucui mana allicunamanta quishpichincapac, tucui mana allimanta allipacha maillashca saquincapac, ñucanchic paipac cancapac, alli rurana munaillata ñucanchic charincapac.
Caitami yachachina canqui camachishpa piñashpa tucui can charishca ushaihuan. Ama pipash canta millachun.
Jatun aputa, uchilla apucunata uyana cashcata paicunata yuyachi, allicunata ruranalla chapacunuchunlla.
Ama pimantapash mana allita rimanuchun, shuccunamanta-pash yuyarmuchun, tucuicunapac ñaupacpi paicuna yapa alli shuncuyuc cashcata ricuchinuchun.

Ñucanchicpash ñaupa yuyai illac, Diosta mana uyac carcanchic; pantashpa puricurcanchic, tucui laya ñucanchic aicha munaicunapi, tucui laya ñucanchic aicha cushiyanacunapi huatai tucushca carcanchic. Juchapi, chiquicuipi causacurcan-chic, shuccunata miliashca, ñucanchicpurapash millanacushpa.
Ranti ñucanchicta Quishpichic Dios runacunahuan alli shuncu cashcata, pai llaquishcata ricuchiscapi,

ñucanchicta quishpichirca, mana ñucanchic shuc ima allitapash rurashcarai-cu, ashtahuan ñucanchicmanta llaquirishcaraicumi carca. Bautismo yacuraicu cutillata ñucanchicta pacarichishca; Diospac Samairaicu mushu causaita ñucanchicman cushca;
ñucanchicta Quishpichic Jesucristoraicuca Diospac Samaita ñucanchicman achcata cushca,
pai alli shuncuyucraicu juchamanta ñucanchicta quishpichishpa, ñucanchic chapacushca huiñai causaita chasquina ushancapac.
Chaica shutimi can, chaita can achca cuti rimancapac munani, Diosta iniccuna yanapanata yuyarinuchun. Tucui chaicuna alli canun, tucuicunata yanapac canun.

Ranti yancamanta rimanacunamanta chicanyai, callari rucucunapac rimaicunamantapash, Moisespac camachic quillcaraicu piña-nacunamanta macanacunamantapash. Chaicunaca yancami canan, mana yuyaihuan ruranacana.
Iniccuna ucupi chausichic runa tiyacpi, ishcai cuticama paita cayashpa rimai; chashnapash mana uyacpi, iniccuna ucumanta paita callpachi;
chai runa huacllishca mari can ña, paipac juchallata paita ña cautsayachicun.
Ñuca canpacman Artemasta, Tiquicota imapash cachac-pi, mana ushacushpapash Nicopolisman ricucrihuai, tamia pacha chaipi saquirincapac yuyarishcani.
Tucui can ushash-cahuan Zenasta Apolotapash yanapai, paicuna mutsushcata cui, ama imapash paicuna rirashcapi pishichun.
Ñucanchicpac-cunapash yanapancapac yachanuchun, yanapana tiyashcapi maquita cuncapac yachanuchun, ama causaimi tiyan nishpalla causancapac.
Tucui ñucahuan tiyaccuna canmanta yuyarinunmi. Inina charishcapi huauquicanata caimanta yuyarinchicmi rimai. Dios tucui cancunapi paipac cuyaita tallichichun.
Ñuca, Pablo, Cristo Jesusraicu quillpashca, ñucan-chicpac huauqui Timoteontin, can Filemonta, llancanapi ñucanchicpac mashita, cai pancata quillcani,
canpac huasipi tiyac iniccunata, ñucanchicpac pani Apiata, ñucanchic llancanapi huauqui Arquipotapash.
Ñucanchicpac Yaya Dios Apunchic Jesucristontm paicunapac ganas causaita cuyaitapash cancunapi tallichinuchun.
Huiñai ñuca Diosta pacrachuni canmanta yuyarishcapi,
Apunchic Jesucristota tucui Diospac runacunatapash can llaquishcata, can inina charishcata ñuca yachashcaraicu.
Diosta mañanimi can, ñucanchic-huan pacta inic cashcamanta, tucui ñucanchic alli charishcacuna Cristo Jesuspac cashcata allita atipana ushancapac.
Can imna charishcaraicu yapa cushi, yapa cariyashcami cani; canraicu, huauqui, iniccuna paicunapac shuncupi cushi saquirinushca.
Chashnamanta, Cristopac apostol cashcaraicu ñuca can pactachina cashcata rimanalla cashpallata,
llaquina charishcaraicu cuyailla canta mañani. Ñuca, Pablo, ña rucu apaya, cunan Cristo Jesusraicu quillpashca,
Onesimoraicu cuyailla canta mañani, pai shuc churi shina cahuashca caipi quillpara tiyacushcapi.
Callari pachapi, Onesimo yanca huatashca runalla canpacpi carca, ranti cunan ishcantin ñucanchicpac yapa yanapac tucushca.
Canpacman cuti cachani: quiquin ñuca cacpi shinallata paita ricui.
Caipi ñucahuan saquirincapac manaiman, ñuca caipi cushi shimiraicu quillpara tiyacushcapi canpac rantimanta ricuhuancapac.
Shina cacllapita, can munashcallata ruranayani, ama can ñucaraicu rurashca pactachinata rurashca tucuchun, ashtahuan canpac munai rurashcata cachun ninimi.
Ñaupa Onesimo canmanta ansa anainayata chicanyarca ima chari, ranti cunan chicapac canhuan tiyancaran,

ña mana huatara runa shina, huatara runamanta ashtahuan alli: shuc llaquishca huauqui shina. Ñuca paita yapa llaquini, canca yalli paita llaquina canqui, mana runa shinalla, ashtaunpash Apunchicpi huauqui shina.
Shina, inina charishcapi ñucahuan huauqui cashpa, ñucata shinallata paita chasquipai.
Pai canta manallita rurashcapi, pai canta dibicpi imapash, ñucata mañahuai, pairaicu ñuca cutichishami.
Ñuca, Pablo, ñuca quiquin maquihuanmi caita quillcani: Ñucami cutichisha. Dibimanta rimacpica, ashtahuan canca canpac quiquin causaita mari ñucata dibihuanqui.
Ari huauqui, caita canta mañanimi can Apunchicta inic cashcaraicu, Cristopi huauqui shina ñuca shancuta cushiyachipai.
Can uyahuanata yachashpami caita quillcani, ñuca mañashcamanta ashtahuan yallicta ruranca rashcata yachanimi.
Ñuca pactancapac huasita mashcapai; cancuna Diosta mañashcaraicu, pai ñucata cancunata ricuncapac cachahuancami nishpami rimani.
Cristo Jesusraicu quillpashcapi ñucapac mashi Epafras cancunata yuyarinmi;
Marcos, Aristarco, Demas, Lucas tucui paicuna cancunamanta yuyarinunmi, llancanapi yanapahuanan.
Apunchic Jesucristo paipac cuyaita cancunapi tallichichun.
Dios callari pachapi profetacunapac shimihuan achca cuti caran layahuan rimarca.
Cunan cai puchucai pachacunapi, paipac Churipac shimihuan ñucanchicta rimashca, pairaicu pachacunata rurarca, tucui imacunata paita japina cac rurashca.

Paimi Dios llinpiyashcata ricuchin, Dios cashca ricchai jinumi can, paimi paipac ushaiyuc shimihuan tucui imacunatapash sinchicuchin. Pai ñucanchic juchacuna-manta quishpichishca huasha, Diospac tiyarina yachac maquiman jahua pachapi tiyarishca.
Diospac Churica angelcunamanta yalli tucushca, pai chasquishca shuti yalli jatun cashcaraicu.

Dios mana maican punchapash shuc angelmanta caita rimashcachu: "Can ñuca Churi canqui; cunan canta causaita cushcani". Mana maican angelmantapash caita rimashcachu: "Ñucaca paipac yayami casha, paica ñuca churimi canca".
Paipac tucuimanta ñaupa Churita runacunaman ricsichishpa, shucpi cashna riman: "Diospac angelcuna tucuilla paita chacchanuchun".
Angelcunamantaca Dios caita riman: "Huaira shina cancapac angelcunata rurashca, japirac nina shina cancapac paita yanapaccanaca".
Ranti paipac Churimanta cashna riman: "Dioslla, can huiñai Jatun Apu canqui, cuscatapash taripanqui canpac pachapi.
Alli cashcata llaquinqui, ranti mana allita chicninqui; chairaicu Dios, canpac Dios canta acllashca, canpac mashicunamanta yalli cushihuanpash canta juntachishca".
Caitapash nin: "Can, Apunchiclla, callarimanta allpata sapiyachircanqui; jahua pachapash canllata rurashca can.
Tucui chaicana tucurinuncami, ranti canca huiñai causanqui. Tucui chaicuna churana ismushca shinami tucurinunca;
shuc churanata patachishca shinami can chaita patachinqui, shuc churanata churarishca shinami ruranqui. Ranti canca Paillata canqui; canpac causaica mana tucurincachu".
Mana maican angeltapash Dios shuc cutillapash caita rimarcachu: "Ñuca yachac maquiman tiyari, canta chicniccunata ñuca canpac chaqui ucupi churanacama".
Tucui angelcuna Diosta yanapac samaicunami canun, quishpinata japinca racuccunata yanapancapac cachamushcacu-nami canun.
Chairaicu, cushi shimimanta uyashcata ashtahuan yapa yuyarina canchic, alli caticushcamanta yanca rashpa chicanyanchicman.
Unai pachapi Dios angelcunahuan cachamushca rurai nishcacana camachic shimi tucunurca, paita mana uyashpa juchalliccuna paipac tuputa ñacachi tucunurca.

¿Ñucanchicca quishpinata ushashunchu, cai jatun quishpinata mana uyashcamanta? Apunchicllatami tucuimanta ñaupa cai quishpinata ricsichirca, paita jinu uyaccuna huasha ñucan-chicman allipacha ricsichinurca.
Chai jahuapi, Dios, achca mancharicushiyanacanahuan, paipac Samaipac cuyaicunata pai munashca shina cushpa, chai quishpinata sinchicuchirca.
Cai ñucanchic rimacushca huasha shamunca racuc pachata mana angelcunapac maquipichu churarca.
Chaipac rantimanta, cai Dios quillcashca shimipi quillcashca tiyan: "¿Runa ima cashcata yachanquichu? ¿Ima cacpi shinachu paimanta yuyarinqui?, ¿paimantachu yapalla yuyarinqui?
Angelcunamanta ansashitu uranaya paita rurarcanqui, ranti paitaca jatunyachircanqui,

tucuicunata paipac maquipi churarcanqui". Chashna, tucui imacunata paipac maquipi churashpa, Dios mana imatapash paimanta chicanyashcata saquircachu, tucui paipac maquipi saquirca. Shina cacllapita, tucui paipac maquipi cashcata chaira mana ricunchicchu.

Ranti Jesusta ricunchic, paita Dios angelcunamanta uralla rurarca uchilla pachashitupac. Dios, pai llaquina charishcaman-ta, tucuicunaraicu pai huañuncapac munarca; cunan ranti pai, huañuita ñacarishcamicu, jatunyachishca, jahuayachishca tiyan.

Tucui imacunapash Diospacca causaranun, tucui pairaicu tiyan; Dios munan tucui paipac churicunapash pai jatunyashcapi, paicunapash jatunyachi tucuncapac. Chairaicu, Diosca Jesucristota ñacarinahuan pacta runata rurarca, pai paicunata Quishpichic can.
Tucuicuna chai Yayamantallata cashcaraicu: chicanyachishcacuna, chicanyachintin. Chashna-manta, Dicspac Churi mana pincarin paicunata huauquicuna rimanata,
cashna camachic quillcapi rimashpa: "Canmanta rimashami ñuca huauquicunata, canpac Shutitami runa ucupi chacchasha".
Caitapash nin: "Paipimi ñuca yuyaita churasha". Shuctapash nin: "Dios ñucaman cushca churicanahuanmi caipi cani".

Shuc aillupuramanta huahuacuna chai aichallata, chai yahuarllata charishca shina, chashnallata Jesuspash runa aichamanta, runa yahuarmanta carca; pai huañushcahuan huañuchina ushai charicta yallina ushancapac, cashna nishpaca supaitami ninchic.
Chashnami, huañuita manchashpa, tucui paicunapac causaita huatashca shina chariccanata quishpichirca.
Alli shutipacha rimacpica, mana angelcunata yana-pancapacchu shamurca, Abrahanpac miraimantacunata yanapan-capacmi shamurca.
Chaita rurancapac, tucuipi huauquicuna shinallata cana tucurca, Diospac ñaupacpi inic, llaquic Jatun Pacri Yaya cancapac, runacunata juchacunamanta quishpichincapac, camari shina curishcapi.
Paillata ñacarishcahuan camai tucushca cashpa, cunan pai ranti yanapanata ushan camai tucuc ranacanata.

Chairaicu, huauquicuna, cancuna Diospac runacuna cashpa, Diospacpi cayai tucushcanquichic paipac runacu-na tucuncapac; Cristo Jesusta allita ricuichic; apostol, jatun yayapacri pai can, inina pairaicu ñucanchicpi tiyan.
Diosta Jesus cusca catishca; pai chaita paiman mincarca, Moisespash Diosta yanapanapi tucuicunamanta yalli cusca cashca shinalla-ta.
Ranti Jesus Moisesmanta yalli jahuayachishcami cana can, huasita rurac runa rurashca huasimanta jinu yalli jahuaya-chishca shina.
Tucui huasi mana sapalla rurarinchu, runa ru-ran; ranti Dios tucui imacunatapash rurarca.
Chashnamanta, Moises, yanapac cashpa, paiman mincashcata cusca pactachir-ca, Dios rimanca racushcamanta ricuyac canami paipac llancana carca.
Ranti Cristo, Churi cashcaraicu, huasi amu can; ñucanchicca chai huasimanta runacuna canchic, cushiyashca-huan, shinchicush-cahuan ñucanchic chapacushcapi catishpa.
Uyashun Diospac Samai rimashcata: "Cunan Dios rimashca shimita uyashpa,
ama cancunapac shuncuta sinchiyachichicchu Dios-huan piña-rishpa, chunlla allpapi paita camaccuna shina.
Chaipi cancunapac rucucuna ñucata camahuanurca, ñuca rurashcacunata chuscu chunca huata tuputa ricushcae cashpapash.
Chairaicu, chai mirai runacunahuan piñarishpa, caita rimarcani: 'Paicuna shuncupi huiñai pantashpa purinun, ñuca ñanpicanata mana ricsina munanushcachu'.
Chairaicu ñuca piñarishcapi, samana allpapi mana yaicununcachu, sinchi shimihuan rimarcani".
Huauquicana, yuyaichic, ama pipash mana alli shuncuyuc-raicu causac Diosmanta chicanyachun, paita mana inishcaraicu.

Chaipac rantimanta, caran puncha cancuna-pura sinchicunacuichic, Dios quillcashca shimipi rimashca "cunan" tiyashcacama, cancunamanta ama pipash juchapi umachi tucushpa, paipac shuncupash ama mana uyac tucuncapac.
Ñucanchic callarishcapi chapashca shinallata sinchi catishpami Cristohuan japinata chaupichishun.
Chashnamanta caita nin: "Cunan Dios rimashca shimita uyashpa, ama cancunapac shancuta sinchiyachichicchu chai piñaric runacuna shina".
Diospac shimita uyashca huashalla, ¿maicancuna piñarishcata yachanquichicchu? Egipto llactamanta tucui Moises surcushcacunami canurca.
¿Picunahuan Dios chuscu chunca huata piñarishca cashcata yachanquichicchu? Juchalhccunahuanmi piñarirca, paicunaca tucuimi chunlla allpapi huañunurca.
Pai samancapac cushca allpapi mana yaicunquichicchu, ¿maicancunata Dios chashna rimashcata yachanquichicchu? Paita mana uyaccunatami rimarca.
Shuti, chashnami, paicuna mana inishcaraicu mana yaicuna ushanurca.
Chairaicu, Dios cushca samanapi chaira yaicuna ushana shimita charishcamanta, yuyashpalla causana canchic, yanca rashpa cancunamanta maicanpash mana pactanman.

Ñucanchictapash quishpichic shimita ricsichi-nushca mari, paicunata ricsichishca shinallata; ranti paicunapacca chai shimi uyashca, mana uyashca shinachu carca, ininapi chai shimita uyaccunahuan mana shuclla tucushcaraicu.

Ranti ñucanchicca inishcaraicu chai samanapi yaicushunmi, chaimanta Dios cashna rimashca; "Chairaicu ñuca piñarishcapi, samana allpapi mana yaicununcachu, sinchi shimihuan rimarcani". Shina cacllapita, cai pacha rurashcapi, Dios ña tucuchishcarcami paipac llancanata;
Dios quillcashca shimipi canchis niqui puncha rimashca tiyan mari: "Canchis niqui punchapi, Dios tucui pai llancanamanta samarca".
Cutipash Dios quillcashca shimipi nin: "Ñuca cushca samanapi mana yaicununcachu".
Ranti chaira pishin maicancuna chai samanapi yaicuncapac, ñaupa cushi shimita chasquiccuna, paicuna mana uyashcamanta mana yaicuna ushanurca.

Chairaicu, Dios cutillata shuc punchata churarca, shuc mushu "cunan", huasha Davidpac shimihuan ña camachic quillcapi rimashcata: "Cunan Dios rimashcata uyashpa, ama cancunapac shuncuta sinchiyachichicchu".
Josue na Israel runacunata chai samanata cushcapi, Dios shuc punchamanta mana rimanmanchu carca.
Chashnamanta, Diospac runacunapac chaira shuc chicanyachishca samana tiyan;
maicanpash chai Dios cushca samanapi yaicushpa, paipac llancanamanta saman, Dios pai llancacushcamanta samashca shina.
Cariyana canchic chai samanapi yaicana ushancapac, ama pipash chai mana iniccuna rurashcata catincapac.

Diospac shimi causaita, ushaita charin. Ishcai manñayuc mircanumanta yalli piticmi can; samaihuan, causaihuan llutarashca sapicama yaicucmi can; shuc runapi mai ucupipash paita yaicuncami; paica taripanmi yuyaita shuncu munashcatapash.
Tucui Dios rurashcacuna paipac ñaupacpi ricuriranun; ñucanchic rurashcamanta taripac ñaupacpi mcuimi pasacta ricurin.
Jesus, Diospac Churi, jahua pachapi yaicushca ñucanchicpac Jatun Pacri Apu can. Chairaicu ñucanchic charishca ininapi sinchi catina canchic.
Ñucanchic Jatun Pacri Apu, ñucanchic sanpa cashcaraicu llaquirinata ushan, paipash ñucanchic camai tucushcallapita camai tucushcaraicu; shina cashpallata paica mana ansapash juchallircachu.

Chairaicu, ñucanchic alli shuncu Diospac tiyarinaman, tucui chapashcahuan mayanyashun, pai ñucanchicmanta llaquirichun; ñucanchic llaqui charishcapi pai alli shuncuyuc cashcaraicu ñucanchicta yanapachun.
Tucui Jatun Pacri Apu runa ucumanta acllashca can, paicunaraicu Diospac ñaupacpi shayarincapac.
Pacri-yayapash tucui runa shina juchasapa cashpa, pantashpa puriccanamanta mana yachaccunamantapash llaquirinata ushan;
paipash juchallic cashcaraicullata, paipac juchacunamanta runacunapac juchacunamantapash camarita ricuchina tucun.
Mana pipash amu munaimanta Pacriyaya tucushpa jahuayarina ushanchu, Diosmi cayashpa paita jahuayachin, Aaronta shina.
Chashnallata, Cristopash mana paipac munaichu Jatun Pacri Apu shayarirca, Diosmi paita jahuayachirca, paimi cashna rimarca: "Can ñuca churi canqui; cunan causaita ñuca cushcani".
Caitapash shucpi nin: "Canca huiñai Pacriyaya causanami canqui, Melquisedec cashca shina".
Cristo cai pachapi causacushpa, sinchi shimihuan huacashcahuanpash Diosta mañarca; pai huañuimanta quishpichinata ushaita charirca; pai uyashcaraicu paita Dios uyarca.
Shinacpi Cristoca, Churi cashpapash, ñacarishpami uyanata yacharca;
chashna pactachishca tucushpa, tucui paita uyaccuna paimanta huiñai quishpinata chasquina tucunurca;
Melquisedecta shina Diosca Jatun Pacri Apu paita rurarca.
Caimanta achca rimana tiyan, ranti atipachina sinchimi can, cancuna mana utca atipaccuna cashcaraicu.

Cancunata unai rimashpa catishcaraicu, ña yachachicmi cana canquichic-man; chaipac rantimanta, cancunata cuti Diosmanta callarishcapi yachachishcata rimana tucun. Cutillata yapa sanpa tucushcanquichic, sinchi micunata micuna rantimanta, chucu yacuta upiac tucushcanquichic.
Chucu yacuhuan causaccuna-ca llullu huahua shinami canun, mana yuyayuccuna.
Sinchi micuna rucucuna micancapac can, taripanata yachaccunapac; alli cashcata mana alli cashcata atipashpa ricuncapac yacharishca canun.

Shina cacpi, rucu tucunacama catishun, callaricushcapi Cristomanta yachachishcacunata manyanman saquishpa. Ama callaricushcapi yachachishcacunaman cutillata ticrashun, nicpi: shuncupi cuti Diosman ticracrina, huañuiman pushac mana allicuna ruranacunata saquina, Diospi inina,
bautismomanta yachachishcacuna, iniccuna uma jahuapi maquicuna churana, huañushcacuna causarinata, huiñai taripana imapash.
Chaitami rurashun Dios munacpi.
Achicta ña chasquishca huasha, Diospac Samaipi causashpa camaccuna,
Diospac cushi shimita camaccuna, shamunca racuc pachapac ushaita camaccuna,
cuti paicuna urmacpi, ña mana Diosman ticrachipaccunachu canun, paicunallata cuti Diospac Churita chacatacushcaraicu, tucuicunapac ñaupacpi asichincapac churacushcaraicu.
Tamia yacuta tsuncac allpa shina canun: llancaccunata chai allpa alli muyuta cucpi, Diospac bendisionta chasquin;
ranti chai allpa cashallata cucpi, mana imapash alli can; Dios maldisiashca saquirin, huasha rupachi tucuncapac.
Llaquishca huauquicuna, chashna rimashpapash, cancunaca quishpina ñanpimi caticunquichic yuyanchic.
Dios cuscata taripac cashcaraicu, cancuna rurashcata mana cuncarincachu, cancuna paita llaquishcaraicu huauquicunata ininapi yanapashcata, cunancama cancuna chashnallata ruracushcatapash.
Ranti chashnallata cushihuan tucurinaca-ma rurashpa catincapac munanchic, chashna cancuna chapashca allipacha pactarichun.
Ama cancuna quillaisiqui tucuncapac-mi munanchic; ashtahuan ininapi purishcamanta, mana sanpayashpa catishpa, Dios cusha nishcata chasquicuccunapac causaita cancana catincapacmi munanchic.
Dios Abrahanta cusha nishcapi, paipac quiquin causairaicullata sinchi shimita nirca, mana shuc paimanta yalli jatun tiyacpi;
cashna rimarca: "Ari, ñuca canta achcatami bendisiashca, canpac aillucunata achcatami mirachisha".
Abrahan mana piñarishpa chaparca, chairaicu Dios cusha niscata pai chasquirca.
Runacuna sinchi shimita nishpa, paicunamanta yalli ushaiyuc-raicu sinchi shimita ninun; imamantapash sinchi shimita nishpa, chaipi ña mana imamantapash astahuan rimaipac tucun.
Chairaicu Diospash, pai cusha nishcata sinchi shimihuan nirca; chashna, pai cunca rashcata chasquinca raccunata ricsichinayarca, pai rimashcamanta ña mana shucta ruranca rashcata.

Shina cacpi ishcai pactachinacuna tiyanun, caicunapi Dios ñucanchicta mana llullana ushan: Cusha nishca, sinchi shimita mshca. Yapa achcami chaica ñucanchic chapashcata tarincapac, tucui imacunata saquiccunata sinchicuchincapac.

Chai chapana ñucanchic almata sinchi mana cuyuchipac japicun, shuc jillai sillu shuc barcota ama rincapac japicushca shina. Chai chapana, Diospac jahua pachapi tiyac huasipi, mana pi yaicuipac huashamanmi yaicushca,
chaiman Jesus ñucanchicta ñanta ricuchincapac ñaupac pactarca; chashna pai huiñai causana Jatun Pacri Apu tucushca, Melquisedec cashca shinallata.
