Cai Melquisedec Salemmanta rey, jatun Diospac pacriyaya carca. Abrahan reicunahuan macanacushpa, paicunata yallishca huasha ticramucushcapi, Melquisedec paihuan tuparicrishpa paita bendisiarca;

chaipi Abrahan pai macanacushcapi tucui japishcamanta ansata paiman curca (diezmo nishcata). Melquisedec shuti "cusca taripac rey" rimanayan; pai Salemmanta rey carca, Salemca "ganas causai" rimanayan, chairaicu "ganas causaita cuc rey" rimanayan.
Paipac yayamanta, mamamanta, aillucunamanta mana yachai tiyanchu; pai pacarishcamanta pai huañushcamantapash mana rimai tiyanchu; pai Diospac Churipac ricchai can, huiñai pacriyaya cashcapi.
Cunan yuyarichic ima shina jatunta Melquisedec carca, ñucanchic aulu Abrahan jinu pai reicunahuan macanacushcapi tucui pai quichushcamanta ansata paiman cuncapac.

Moisespac camachic quillcapi rimashca shina Levipac aillumanta pacriyayacunaman runacuna tucui imacunamanta chuncapi raquishcamanta shuc raquishcata cuna canurca (chai can diezmo), paicunapac aillucana cacllapita, paicuna shinallata Abrahanmanta huahuacuna cacllapita.
Ranti Melquisedec, mana Levipac aillumanta cashpapash diezmo nishcata Abrahanta mañarca, pai Dios cusha nishca shimita chasquishca cacpipash. Chashna Melquisedec Abrahanta bendisiarca;
bendisiac runa bendisiai tucucmanta yalli jatun cashcata ricunalla can.

Cai causaipi, diezmo nishcata mañaccuna huañuna runacuna canun; ranti Dios quillcashca shimipi Melquisedecmanta rimashpa, chaira causacucpi shina riman. Rimacpi, Levipac aillumanta pacriyayacuna, cunan paicuna diezmo nishcata mañac canun; ña paicunapash diezmo nishcata cunushca mari, Abrahan Melquisedecman diezmo nishcata cushcapi;
rimacpi, Melquisedec Abrahanhuan tupacrishcapi, ña paica aicha ucupi chaira mana pacarishca aillucunata aparayarca mari.

Levipac aillumanta pacriyayacunapac maquipi IsraeI runacuna camachic quillcata japinurca, paicunaca Aaronpac aillucuna canurca. Chai pacriyayacuna, camachic quillcata caticcunata, pacta runacuna rurana ushashcapi, mana shamuna tucunman carca shuc pacriyaya, ña mana Aaron shina, Melquisedec shina ashtahuan.
Shuc laya pacriyayacunata churashpa, camachic quillcatapash shuc laya rurana tucun;
Jesus, tucui chaipi paimanta rimacun, Israel shuc aillumantami can, chai aillumanta mana shuc pacriyaya tiyashcachu.
Ñucanchic pacta yachanchic Apunchic Juda aillumanta cashcata; chai aillumanta Moisesca mana imatapash rimarcachu, pacriyaya canamanta rimacushcapi.
Chai ashtahuan yapa pasacta ricuchicun, chai mushu ricurimuc pacriyaya, Melquisedec shina pai cacpi;
paica mana chai aillumanta yayapacri tucuna quillca rimashcaraicu-chu pacriyaya carca, mana huacllichipac causai ushairaicumi pacriyaya carca.
Caitami Dios paimanta riman: "Can huiñai pacriyaya causanami canqui, Melquisedec cashca sina".
Chashnamanta ñaupa rimashca tucurirca, sanpa, mana alli cashcaraicu,
Moisespac camachic quillca mana imatapash pacta rurarcachu; chai rantimanta shuc alli chapanata charinchic, pairaicu Diosman mayanyanchic.
Dios sinchi shimi nishcahuan caita curca. Shuc pacriyayacunaca mana sinchi shimi nishcahuanchu shayachish-ca canurca;
ranti Apunchicmanta rimacpica, shuc sinchi shimi nishcami tiyarca, cai Dios quillcashca shimipi tiyan: "Apunchic shuc sinchi shimita nirca, huashaman mana ticrancachu: Can huiñai pacriyaya canqui".
Chashnami Jesus, cai cunacushca shimi chaishucmanta ashtahuan alli cashcata ricuyac can.
Chaishuc pacriyayacuna achca canurca huañuiraicu mana chicapac causana ushashcamanta;
ranti Jesus mana huañuc cashcaraicu, pai pacriyaya cashcata manapi rana japina ushan pai rantimanta.
Chashnamanta pairaicu Diosman mayanyaccunata chicapac quishpichinata ushan, paicunaraicu Diosta mañancapac huiñaipac causac.
Shina, Jesus ñucanchic mutsushca jinu pacriyaya can. Pai chuya shuncuyuc, jucha illac, mana ticllayuc can, juchasapacunamanta chicanyachishca, jahua pachamanta ashtahuan yallipi churashca can.

Mana chaishuc jatun pacriyayacuna shina can; paicuna huacracunata huañuchina tucan, caran puncha camarita ricuchincapac, paipac juchacuna-raicu, chai huasha tucuicunapac juchacunaraicu. Chaipac rantimanta, shuc cutilla huiñai camarita ricuchirca, paillata camari tucushpa.

Moisespac camachic quillca mana pactachishca runacanata jatan pacriyayata shayachin; ranti Dios sinchi shimita nishca camachic quillca huasha rurashca cashpa, paipac Churita jatun pacriyayata shayachin, paita huiñai pactachishca cancapacmi rai tucushca.
Tucui rimacushcamanta ashtahuan jatunmi ñucanchic jatun pacriyaya jahua pachapi Diospac tiyarinamanta yachac maquiman pai tiyarishca;
chaipi pacriyaya ruranata Diospac quiquin huasipi ruracun, chai huasi Apunchic rurashca can, mana ruracuna rurashca.
Tucui jatun pacriyaya camarita ricuchincapac shaya-chishca can, chairaicu Jesucristopash charina tucun imallapash ricuchina ushancapac.
Cai allpapi pai causacushpa, mana pacriyayallapash canmanchu, caipi ña pacriyayacuna tiyanun, Moisespac camachic quillcapi rimashca camanta ricuchincapac.

Ranti chai pacriyayacana jahua pachapi tiyashca imacunata catichishca shina, llantushca shinallahuan Diosta chacchanun. Yachanchic catichishpa rurashca cashcata, Moises Diospac huasita runanca rashcapi, Dios paita cashna rimashcaraicu: "Allita yuyarishpa ñuca canta urcupi ricuchishcata shina catishpa rurai".
Ranti ñucanchic jatun pacriyaya, yalli alli Diosta chacchanapi llancashpa, Dios-huan runacunahuan ashtahuan alli cunacushca shimihuan llutachirca, yapa alli cushami nishcacunahuan.
Ñaupac cunacushca shimi alli cashcapi, mana cuti shuc cunacushca shimi tiyanmanchu carca.
Ranti Dios chai runacunata mana pactachishcacunata tarishcaraicu, nirca: "Apunchic riman: Israelhuan Judahuan mushu shimi curina punchacunapi pactamununca.

Cai cunacushca shimi mana paipac rucucunahuan rurashca shinachu canca, paicunata maquimanta japishpa Egipto allpamanta llucshichincapac racushcapi shina; cunacushca shimita paicuna mana pactachishcaraicu, ñuca paicanamanta chicanyarcani, Apanchic riman.

Chai punchacuna huasha Israelhuan cunacushca shimi caimi canca, Apanchic riman: Ñuca quillcacanata paipac umapimi churasha, paipac shuncupimi quillcasha. Ñucami paicunapac Dios casha, paicunaca ñuca runacunami canunca.
Apunchicta ricsincapac cancunapura, shuc llactamantapura, aillupura yachachinacancapac mana mutsurincachu, tucuicuna-mi ricsihuanunca, uchillashitumanta ashtahuan yalli jatanca-ma.
Paicuna mana alli rurashcamanta cuncarishami, mana cuti paicanapac juchacanata yuyarishachu".
Dios mushu shimi curinamanta rimashpa, ñaupa cunacushca shimi mauca cacpimi chashna riman; ña maucayashpa mana alli cac ansalla pishin chincarincapac.
Ñaupa cunacushca shimipi ima shimi Diospac huasipi paita chacchana cashcata yachachincapac tiyarca.
Huasica cashna shayachishcami carca: ñaupacman taber-naculo nishca, chaipi candelabro nishca, shuc mesa Diosman camari shina cushca tantacunantin tiyanurca.
Huashanipi huarcuchishca llachapa huashapi, chaipi Santisimo nishca carca;

chaipi shuc curimanta altar sumiriu rupachincapac tiyarca, cunacushca shimita ricuchic arca nishcapash chaillapita carca, tucui pai curilla armachishca. Chai arca ucupi, shuc curimanta uchilla puru tiyarca, chaipi "mana" huacaichishca tiyarca; chaillapita Aaronpac huiñarishca taana cunacushca shimita ricuchic rumi palacunapash canurca.

Arca jahuapi querubincuna chaipi churashca canurca, Dios chaipi cashcata ricuchincapac, chaicuna paicunapac ricracunahuan arcata quillpaccunata llanturanurca. Ranti tucui chaicunamanta canan ashtahuan rimancapac mana allichu.
Chashna tucui allichishcapi, tucui pachapi pacriyayacu-na yaicuranun huasi ñaupac panpaman, Diosta chacchanata rurancapac.
Ranti huashanipi jatun pacriyayalla yaicun, caran huatapi shuc cutilla; pai yaicushcapi huacra yahuarta apana tacun, pairaicullata ranacanapac juchacunaraicupash ricuchinca-pac.
Chaihuan ñucanchicta Diospac Samai caita atipachin: tanpu ñaupacpi tiyac panpapi Diosta chacchachincapac ruranata pactachicucpi Diospac quiquin huasiman rina ñan chaira mana pascara carca.
Tucui chaicuna cunan yachachincapac canun; chaipi Diosman ricuchishca camaricuna, Dios cushca ñucanchic ucupitiyac yuyaita mana pactata rurana ushan chashna chacchacunata.

Upianamanta, micunamanta, shuncu chuyacyachincapac rurashcacunallami canun; chaicunaca ima shina rurana cashcata yachachincapacllami canun; chaicunata pactachina tucun Dios shuc laya ruranacunata rurachinacama.

Ranti Cristo ña shamurca, cunanca paimi chicapac Dios cuyashcacunamanta jatun pacriyaya can. Pacriyaya shina pai tiyashca Diospac huasica yalli alli, yalli pactami can, chaica mana runacuna rurashcachu can; nicpica, mana cai pachamantachu.

Ña Cristo Diospac huasipi yaicushca mari, huacra yahuarta ña mana ricuchincachu, chaipica ashtahuan quiquin paipac yahuarta jinumi ricuchinca; shuc cutilla yaicushpapash chicapac yaicushca; chashna, huiñai quishpinata ñucanchipacta tarishca.

Shutimi cari huacra yahuar, chivo yahuar huarmi huacrata altarpi rupachishca ushpantin, jahuallata chicanyachincapac alli canurca, ticllayuccana jahuapi tallichicpi ushaita charirca paicunata pichancapac.

Chai chashna cacpi, ¡ima shina ushaita chari Cristopac yahuar charmca! Cristo, huiñai Samairaicu paillata Diosman curirca mana ticllayuc camari shina, paipac yahuarca ñucanchic ucupi tiyac Diospac yuyaita pichan mana alli rurashcaraicu huañuiman rirashcamanta, causac Diosta ñucanchic yanapana ushancapac.

Chairaicu, Jesucristo paipac huañuihuan, runacuna Dios—huan shuc mushu shimi cushcahuan llutachina usharca, ñaupa cunacushca shimipi juchallishcacuna pichai tucuna ushancapac, Dios cayashcacunapash huiñai paicuna japina cashcata pai rimashca shina chasquina ushancapac.
Cushca shimi pactachipac tucuncapac, ñaupacta allipacha yachana tucun chai shimita cuc runa huañurcachu imata.
Cushca shimi mana pactachipacchu tucun, chai shimi cuc runa chaira causacucpi; huañucpi, chai shuti.
Chairaicu, yahuarta tallichishpa ñaupa cunacushca shimi tiyarca.

Tucui rurai nishcacunata tucui runacunaman Moises ricsichirca; chai huasha puca huacra millmata, hisopo nishca pallcatapash japishpa, huacra yahuarhuan yacuhuan masachishcapi jucuchishpa, camachic quillca panca jahuapi, tucui runacuna jahuapipash chausichirca.
Chaipi paicunata nirca: "Cai yahuarmi Dios cancunahuan cunacushca shimita sinchicuchin".
Chai huasha Moises Dios rurachishca huasi jahuapi tucui imacuna jahuapi Diosta chacchanapi liancacushcacuna jahuapipash yahuarta chausichirca.
Camachic quillcapi, ñalla tucui imacunata yahuarhuan maillachincapac riman; yahuarta mana tallichicpi, juchamanta quishpma mana tiyan.
Jahua pachamanta catichishpa rurashcalla imacunata chuyayachincapac chai tucui camaricunata ricuchina tucurca; ranti jahua pachamanta imacunaca chaicunamanta ashtahuan alli camaricunata mutsunun.

Cristoca mana runacuna rurashca Diospac huasipichu yaicurca, chaica Diospac quiquin huasi cashcata ricuchicllami can; paica quiquin jahua pachapi jinumi yaicurca, chaipi cunan Diospac ñaupacpi tiyan ñucanchicraicu mañancapac.
Mana achca cuti camari shina curincapacchu yaicurca, jatun pacriyaya rurashca shina, paica Dios rurachishca huasipi yaicushpa chican yahuarta camaripi ricuchin.

Chashna cashcapi, Cai pacha callarishcamanta achca Cristo huañuna tucunman carca. Ranti cunan pacha tucuricushcapi, Cristo shuc cutilla huiñaipac ricurishca, juchata auchuchincapac paillata camari shina curishpa.
Tucuicuna shuc cutilla huañununca, chai huasha taripai tucununca;

chashnallata Cristopash shuc cutilla camari shina ricuchi tucurca achcacunapac juchata pichancapac. Chai huasha, cuti ricurimushpa, ña mana juchacunaraicuchu shamanca, paita chapacuccanata quishpichincapacmi canca.

Moisespac camachic quillca tucui alli shamunca rashcamanta llantushca shinallami carca, mana shamunca racuc jinu. Chairaicu camachic quillca imata rashpapash mana pactata rurana usharcachu chai camarillata caran huata Diosta ricuchincapac mayanyaccunata.
Camachic quillca alli shutipacha juchamanta quishpichic cacpi, ña jucha paicunapi mana tiyanmanchu, camari ricuchinata ña saquishcami canunman.
Ranti cai camaricunaca paicunapac juchamanta caran huata yuyachincapac alli canan;
huacra yahuar, chivo yahuar, juchacunamanta paicunata mana quishpichinata usharcachu.
Chairaicu Cristo cai pachaman pactashcapi Diosta rimarca: "Camarita mana munanqui, chaipac rantimanta shuc aichata, cuhuashcanqui.
Juchata pichancapac rupachishca aichata runa cuyashcacunata mana allihuan ricunqui.
Chashnapi rimarcani: Caipimi cam, quillcapi ñucamanta rimashca shinallata, can munashcata rurancapac, Dioslla".
Ñaupa riman: Dios mana munanchu, mana allihuanchu ricun camarita, huañushca huacrata, rupachishca aichatapash juchacanata pichancapac, camachic quillcapi ricuchina rimacpipash.
Chai huasha yapachin: "Caipi shamuni can munashcata pactachincapac". Nicpi cai can, callarr camaricunata anchuchishpami, chaipac rantimanta shuc mushuta churan.
Dios ñucanchicta chicanyachishca, Jesucristo paipac quiquin aichata camari shina shuc cutilla Dios munashca shina ricuchishcaraicu.
Judio pacriyayacuna tucui puncha paicana ruranata pactachin, achca cuti chai laya camarillata ricuchishpa catinan, chaicuna juchamanta mana llushpichina cacpipash.
Ranti Jesucristo shuc cuti juchacunaraicu shuclla camarita ricuchirca, chai huasha Diospac yachac maquiman tiyarirca.
Chaipi chapacun Dios paita chinicunata paipac chaqui samana ruranacama,
shuc camariraiculla huiñai pactata rurarca Diosman chicanyachishcacunata.
Diospac Samai cai shimita ashtahuan sinchicuchin, caita rimashpa:
"Chai punchacuna huasha ñuca paicunahuan cunacushca shimi, caimi canca, Apunchic riman: Paipac shuncupimi ñuca quillcacunata churashpa, paipac umapica quillcashami.
Paicunapac juchamanta, paicuna mana alli rurashcamanta mana cuti yuyarishachu".
Shina, juchacunamanta quishpichishca cashcaraicu, ña camari ricuchina mana tiyana can.
Chashnamanta, huauquicuna, Jesucristopac yahuar-raicu mana manchashpa cunan Diospac huasiman yaicuna ushanchic,
mushu ñanta catishpa, paillata jarcata rishpa pascashca causaita cuc ñanta, nicpi, paipac quiquin aichata rishpa.
Jesusmi ñucanchic jatan pacriyaya, Diospac huasipi ricuccama can;
chairaicu cusca shuncuhuan, inina sinchi charishccahuan Diosman mayanyana canchic, ñucanchic ucupi tiyac Diospac yuyai sumac chuya ñucanchic aichapash chuya yacuhuan sumacta maillarishca.

Inina chapana charishcapi, sinchi tucushpa, mana ishcai yuyariscahuan catishun, Dios pai chapana charishcapi, sinchi tucushpa, mana ishcai yuyarishcahuan catishun, Dios pai cusha nishcata pactachina cashcaraicu.
Llaquinata ashtahuan charincapac, allicunata rurancapac tucuipura yanaparishun.
Ñucanchic tantarinacunaman ama pishiyashun, maicancuna pishiyashca shina, ashtahuan tucuipura cariyashanchic; tucuipura ashtahuan cariyashca tiyachun Apunchipac puncha mayanyashcata ricushcaraicu.
Shuti cashcata ricsishca huasha, munashpa jucha Cashcata ruracpi, ashtahuan camari mana tiyanchu ña;
manchaipac taripanallata, Diosta piñaccunata ñacachishpa rupachic ninallatami chapana tucushun.
Maicanpash Moisespac camachic quillcata mana uyashpa juchallishcapi, ishcai quimsa ricuyac paita cautsayachincapac tiyacpi, mana ansallapash llaquishcahuan huañuchi tucun.

¿Diospac Chu-rita jaitashcaraicu, paipac yahuarta chicnishcaraicu, paicunata llaquic Diospac Samaita piñashcaraicu, ashtahuan pishilla ñacachinatami charinuncamichu yuyanquichic? Chai yahuarmi cunacushca shimita sinchicuchic can, chai yahuarhuan chican-yachishca paicuna tucunushca.
Apunchic caita rimashcata yachanchic: "Ñucami taripasha, ñucami canata cusha". Caita-pash rimashca: "Apunchicmi paipac runacunata taripanca".
¡Causac Diospac maquipi urmana manchaipacmi can!.
Ranti yuyarichic cancuna callari pachapi, cancuna achicta mushu chasquishcapi ñacarinacunata sinchi tucushpa yallircanquichic.
Cancunamanta maicancuna, runacuna ñahuipi piñai tucushpa macai tucurcanquichicpash; cuti shuc-cunaca, chashna rurai tucuccunahuan ñacarinapi llutarinurca.

Chunta curralpi quillparaccunamanta cancuna llaquirircan-quichic, cancuna charishcacunata cushiyashcahuanpash quichui tucurcanquichic, jahua pachapi tiyashca ashtahuan alli, mana tucuric cashcata yachashpa.
Cancuna chapashcata ama jichuichichu, paica alli cuyanatami cancunaman apamunca.
Smchicuna canquichic cancuna ñacarina tiyashcapi, Dios munashcata rurashpa, chashna pai cushami nishcata chasquincapac.
Camachic quillca caita mari nin: "Utca, cunanshitumi shamunca racuc pactamunca ran. Mana anayancachu.
Ñuca jucha illac runa ininaraicu causanca; ranti huashaman ticracpi, ña mana llaquishcahuan paita ricushachu".
Ñucanchicta, mana huashaman rishpa chinca-ricchu canchic, inina charishcaraicu quishpinaman pactaccuna-mi canchic.
Inina charina canmi, chapashcata allipacha japmca rashcata yachana; ñucanchic mana ricushca imacunata, alli shutipacha ricushca cacpi shinami charina.
Inina charishcaraicu Dios alli llaquirca ñucanchic aulucunata.
Yachanchic inina charishcaraicu Dios cai pachata paipac shimihuan rurashcata, tucui cunan ñucanchic ricucushca, mana ricurishcamanta rurai tucurca.

Inina charishcaraicu, Cainmanta ashtahuan alli camarita Abel Diosman ricuchirca, chairaicu Dios paita jucha illac shinata chasquirca, paipac camaricunatapash chasquirca. Shina, Abel huañushca cashpapash, pai inina charishcahuan cananpash ñucanchicta chaira yachachicun.

Inina charishcaraicu, Enoc causacushcallapita ama huañuncapac pushai tucurca; ña paita mana tarinurcachu, Dios pushashcaraicu. Dios quillcashca shimipi nin, chaira mana pushai tucushcapi, Enoc Diospac ñaupacpi alli cashcarca.
Ranti, inina mana charishpa Diosta mana cushiyachipacchu can, Diosman mayanyancapac pai causashcata paita mashcaccunata cuyac cashcatapash inina can.

Inina charishcaraicu Noe, Dios paita chaira mana ricuipaccuna shamunca rashcata rimacpi uyashpa, tucui paipac aillucunata quishpichincapac jatun canoata rurarca. Chai inina charishcaraicullata, cai pachamanta ranacanata cautsayachishpa, paica inina charishcamanta quishpinata tarirca.
Inina charishcaraicu, Abrahan Dios cayacpi uyashpa Dios paiman cunca rashca allpaman rirca. Paipac allpamanta llucshishpa maiman rirashcata mana yachashpapash rirca;
inina charishcaraicu Dios paita cushami nishca allpapi chican runa shina causarca. Chai cusha nishcata cui tucuc Isaac, Jacob shina, paipash tanpucunapi causarca,
Abrahan sinchi sapicunahuan shayachishca llactata chapashcaraicu; chai llactamanta amu, quiquin shayachic Diosllata can.

Inina charishcaraicullata, Sara huahuata mana charina ushashpapash, Abrahanpash yapa rucu cacpi, paica ushaita chasquirca yaya tucana ushancapac, Dios mana pishiyashpa pai cusha nishcata pactachinapi inishcaraicu.
Shina Abrahan, ña paipac punchacuna tucurina mayanlla cacpipash mana yupaipac achca aillucunata charirca, jahua pachapi ricuric cuillurcuna shina, ñucñu yacu patapi tiyac tiyu shina.

Tucui cai runacuna Dios cusha nishcata mana chasquishpa huañanurca; ranti inina charishcamanta, carumanta ricunurca, paicunata yapa yuyarinurca. Chaipi paicunallata atipanurca cai pachapi chican puricuc shinalla paicuna cashcata.
Chaita chashna rimaccunaca quiquin mama—allpata mashcashcata ricuchinun.
Paicuna llucshishca allpamanta chaira yuyaricushca cashpa, maillapash chaiman ticrana ushanunman carca;
ranti paicuna ashtahuan alli mama-allpata munanurca, nicpi, jahua pachata. Chairaicu Dios mana pincarin paicunapac Dios rimai tucuna, paica shuc llactata allichishcata mari paicunapacta charin.

Inina charishcaraicu, Abrahan, Dios paita camashcapi, Isaacta camaripi paita ricuchincapac japirca. Paipac shuclla churita Diosman camaripi mana mitsashpa ricuchina yuyaita charirca, Dios paita rimashca cacpipash:
"Isaac-raicumi canpac shutihuan catic aillucunata charinqui".
Abrahan alli pacha mari yacharca Dios huañushcacunatapash causachina ushai charishcata; chairaicu Abrahan churita causac cutichi tucurca; chashna pai shuc unancha shina tucurca.
Inina charishcaraicu, Isaac huasha pachapi bendisioncu-na tiyancami Jacobta Esauntin rimarca.
Inina charishcaraicu, Jacob, pai ña huañunca rashcapi, caran Josepac churicunata bendision tiyancami nishpa shimita curca, Diostapash chaccharca paipac taunahuan sinchicurishpa.
Imna charishcaraicu, Jose pai huañucushcapi, Israel runacuna Egipto allpamanta huasha llucshinuncami rimarca, paipac tullucunata ima rurana cashcata chaipi rimarca.

Inina charishcaraicu, Moises pacarishcapi, yaya mama paita quimsa quilla tuputa pacanurca; sumac huahua cashcata ricushcaraicu, mana manchanurcapash jatun curaca cari huahuacanata huañuchina rimashca tiyacpipash.
Inina charishcaraicu, Moises ña rucu cashcapi, Egipto-manta jatun curacapac ushushipac churi rimai tucuncapac mana munarca;
ashtahuan Diospac runacunahuan pacta macai tucushpa causanata munarca, mana unayana cushiyaita juchata rurashpa charina rantimanta.
Dios acllashca cashpa, ñacarina ashtahuan yapa alli cashcata ricurca Egiptomanta cullquihuan sumac causana rantimanta; Dios cuyaita paiman cuna cashcapi ñahuita churashpa causashcaraicu.
Inina charishcaraicu, Moises Egipto allpamanta llucshirca, rey piñarina cacpipash mana ansa manchashpa; pai yuyarishcallata rurashpa causarca, mana ricuric Diosta ricucuc shina.
Inina charishcaraicu, Moises Pascua raimita rurarca, chaipi huasi puncucunata yahuarhuan jahuichirca, huañuchic angel Israelmanta ñaupac pacaric huahuacunata ama shucllapash llancancapac.
Inina charishcaraicu, Israel runacuna Puca Ñucñu Yacuta chaquishca allpa cacpi shina chaquihuan catinurca; huasha, egipciocuna chashnallata rina munashpa, yacupi huañanurca.
Inina charishcaraicu Jerico llactamanta rumi quinchacuna tularinurca, Israel runacuna quincha mayanta canchis puncha purishcapi.
Inina charishcaraicullata, nuspa huarmi Rahab, mana uyaccunahuan mana huañurca, Israelmanta pacalla ricuccamacunata alli chasquishcaraicu.
¿Chaira rimana tiyanchu? Gedeonmanta, Baracmanta, Sansonmanta, Jeftemanta, Davidmanta, Samuelmanta, profetacunamanta rimancapac yapa achcami yachihuan.
lnina charishcaraicu llactacunata amuyanurca, cusca taripaita charinurca, Dios cushami nishcata chasquinurca, pumacunapac shimita quillpanurca;

sinchi ninacunata huañuchinurca, mircanuhuan cuchui tucushpa huañunamanta quishpinurca, sanpayashcamanta ushaita surcushpa macanacuipi sinchi tucunurca, paicunata piñaccunata achca cacpipash yallinurca.

Maican huarmicuna paicunapac huañushca aillucunata cuti causarimushcata tarinurca. Shuccunaca ñacachi tucushcamanta quishpichinca ninucpi, mana munashpa, ashtahuan chaipi huañunurca, ashtahuan alli causanaman causarinata munashpa.
Shuccunaca asi tucunata, llipachishcata, jillai huascahuan huatai tucushpa, quillpai tucushpa ñacarinurca.

Shuccunaca rumihuan huactachishca huañunurca, chaupica serruchuhuan aichata piti tucushpa, mircanuhuan cuchui tucushca imapash huañunurca; caiman chaiman purishcapi oveja carallahuan, chivo carallahuan churarishcacuna puric cachanurca; llushticuna, llaquirishca, tucuicuna macashca.
Cai runacuna, shuti pacha rimacpi, mana cai pachapi causanachu canurca, paicuna maiman rirashcata mana yachac purinurca chunlla allpata, urcucunata, allpa jutcucanata, mai allpa huasicanata.
Shina cacllapita, paicunamanta manapi Dios cusha nishcata chasquircachu, paicuna inina charishcaraicu alli llaquishcacuna cashpapash;
Dios ñucanchicta yuyarishca-raicu, ashtahuan allita ruranca rarca, ñucanchic-huan llutarishpalla pacta runacuna tucanuchan.

Chairaicu ñucanchic, chai tucui inina chariccuna ucupi tiyashpa, tucui ñucanchicta quillachicucmanta, ñucanchicpi llutarisiqui juchamantapash chausirishun, mana Sanpayashpa callpashun ñucanchicta chapacuc camai tucunapi.

Ñucanchic ñahuita Jesuspi churashan, paimantami ñucanchic inina shamun, paimi chai ininata pacta ruran. Jesus cruspi ñacarirca, chashna huañuna pincaipac cacpipash mana pincarishpa; pai yaCharca, ñacarishca huasha sumacyachina, cushiyana charina cashcata; chai huashaDiospac tiyarinamanta yachac maquiman tiyacun.
Chashnamanta, Jesus ricuchishcapi yuyarichic, jucha-sapacunamanta chai tucuita ñacarirca; chairaicu cancuna ama sanpayaichicchu.
Cancuna juchahuan macanacushcapi chaira huañunaman mana pactashcanquichicchu,
Dios cancuna paipac churicuna cacpi camachishcata cuncarishcanquichic mari. Dios quillcashca shimipi nin: "Huahua, Apunchic yachachishpa rimacpi, paita uyai, pai canta piñacpipash ama sanpayaichu.
Apunchic pai llaquishcatami yachachishpa camachin, churita shina chasquishpami ñacachin".
Ña-cachishcata cancuna allihuan chasquicpimi, Dios cancanata churita shina ricunca. ¿Maican churillaca yayapacpi mana piñai tucuc tiyanchu?
Ranti Dios cancanata mana tucui paipac churicanata shina piñashpa camachicpi, cancuna mana quiquin paipac churicunachu canquichic, huaira huahuacunami canquichic.

Chairapash rimacpi, ñucanchic chaira huahua cashcapi, cai allpapi ñucanchic alliyancapac yayacuna piñanurca, ñucanchicca paicunata uyarcanchic. Cunan, ñucanchic jahua pachamanta Yayata causaita charmcapac uyana ashtahuan yapa alli mari can.

Ñucanchic yayacuna cai pachapi mana unayana causaita causacushcapi alliyancapac camachinurca, paicana munashca tuputa; ranti Dios ñucanchic quiquin allipac camachin, pai shina chuya shuncuyuc tucuchun nishpa.
Alli shuti pacha rimacpi, tucui ñacarina mana pacha allichu ñacaricushcapi jinu, nanac can; ranti allita yuyarishcapi, ñacachi tucushcaraicu ganas causaita tupashpa, pai jinu cuscayan.
Chashnamanta, cancuna sanpayashca maquicunata, chucchuricuc cuncuricunata sinchicuchichic,
cusca ñanta mashcaichic, jancayashca chaquita janpichun ama ashtahuan quihuirincapac.
Tucuicunahuan alli causaichic, chuya causaita charichic; mana chuya shuncuta charishpa, mana pipash Apunchicta ricuna ushancachu.
Allita ricuichic ama pitapash Diospac cuyai pishichun, ama pipash jayac sapiyuc yura shina, runata huacllichic, janpihuan huañuchic cancapac.
Cancunamanta ama pipash yumashpa juchallichun, Diosman chicanyachishcata ama chicnichun; chaita Esau rurarca, shuc micunaraiculla pai ñaupac pacaric churi cashcaraicu japinata caturca.
Cancuna yachanquichic huasha, yayamanta bendisionta pai chasquina munashcapi, millai tucurca; pai mashna huacacpipash, ña chashna tucushcamanta mana imatapash ruraipac tucurca.
Cancuna mana mayanyarcanquichic, israelitacuna shina, chai urcuman; llancaipac cashpallata, nina japirarca, chaipi tuta, yana tuta, sinchi huaira tiyarca;
trompeta uyarishcata, Diospac shimitapash cancuna mana uyarcanquichic. Chai shimita uyaccuna ama rimashpa catichun nishpa mañanurca,
cai pactachinata mana ashtahuan uyashpa catina ushashcaraicu: "Pipash urcupi chaquita churacpi, rumihuan huactachishpa, tucsinahuan imapash huañuchinami can, huacra cacpi imapash".
Ricuricuc yapa manchaipac cashcamanta, Moisesllata cashna nirca: "Mancharishpami chucchucuni".
Cancuna chaipac rantimanta, Sion urcuman mayanyashcanquichic, causac Diospac llactaman, jahua pachamanta Jerusalenman, Diosta chacchancapac huaranca huaranca angelcuna tantarishcaman,

jahua pachapi shuticanata quillcachishca chari Diosmanta ñaupac pacaric churicuna tantarishcaman. Cancuna Diosman mayanyashcan-quichic, tucuicunata Taripacman, alli runacunapac Dios pactachishcata rurashca samaicunapacman,
mushu shimi cunacushcata rurac Jesuspacman, pai jichushca yahuarman, chai yahuar Abelpac yahuarmanta ashtahuan allita ñucan-chicman yachachin.

Chairaicu Dios ñucanchicman rimacpi, ama pacha chicninata yuyarinquichicchu. Cai pachapi tiyashcapi Dios paicunata cayacpi mana uyashcamanta, mana pacha quishpi-nurcachu. Ashtahuan ñucanchic mana quishpina ushashunchu, pai jahua pachamanta cayacpi mana uyashpa.
Chai unai pachapi, Diospac shimi allpata chucchuchirca, ranti cunan nin: "Cutillata mana allpallatachu chucchuchisha, jahua pachata-pash chucchuchishami".
'Cutillata' rimashpa, caipi atipana canchic pai rurashca cuyuchipaccunata anchuchinca ran, mana cuyuchipacmi saquirinca.
Dios ñucanchicman cushca pacha mana cuyuchipac can. Pacrachushun chairaicu, Diosta chacchashun allipacha paita yuyarishcahuan, pai manashca shina.
Ñucanchic Dios tucuita rupachic nina shina cashcaraicu.
Huauquipura shina llaquinacunata ama saquinqui-chicchu.
Cancuna huasiman pactaccunata llaquishca-huan chasquichic; chashna rurashpa, mana yachashpallata maicanpi angelcunata maicancuna chasquinurca.
Chunta curralpi tiyaccunamanta yuyarichic, chunta curralpi cancunapash paicunahuan tiyacushca shina. Macai tucushpa ñacariccanamanta yuyarichic, cancanapash chashnallatami rurai tucana ushanquichic.
Sahuarinata tucuicunata yupaichaichic, sahuarishcapi cuscata causaichic; yumashpa juchalliccunata Dios taripanca, shucpac carihuan shucpac huarmihuan causaccunatapash.
Cullquita ama yapalla munaichichu; charishcallahuan cushi causaichic, Dios cashna rimashcaraicu: "Maican punchapash canta mana saquishachu, canta mana jichushachu"
Chairaicu cariyashcahuan caita rimana ushanchic: "Apunchic ñucata yanapac can; mana manchashachu. ¿Runa imallapash rurana ushahuancachu?"
Pushaccunamanta cancunata Diospac shimita yachachic-cunamantapash yuyarichic; causaipi paicuna cashcata yuyarichic, paicuna ima shina inina charinurca chaita cancunapash catichic.
Caina, cunan, huiñai Jesucristo chaillata can.

Ama chican, mana ricsishca yachaicunata catinquichicchu. Ñucanchic shuncucuna Diospac llaquinapi sinchicurishcami ashtahuan alli can micunacunata imana micuna cashcata yachashpa catina rantimanta; chai imana micuna cashcata catina manapi ranata yanaparcachu.
Chican laya camarita ñucanchic charinchic, chai camarunanta callaripi tiyac Diospac huasimanta pacriyayacuna mana micuna ushanun.
Jatun pacriyaya huacra yahuarta Diospac huasiman, juchacunata pichancapac camari shina apan, ranti chai huacracuna aichaca canchamau rupachi tucun.
Chashnallata, Jesuspash llactamanta canchaman huañuchi tucurca, runacunata paipac quiquiu yahuarhuan chicanyachinca-pac.
Shinacpi, Jesus-huan llactamanta canchaman llucshishun, chaipi pai shinallata pincachishca ñacarishun.
Cai pachapica huiñai causana llactata mana charmchicchu, ashtahuan huasha tiyanca racuc llactatami mashcacunchic.
Chairaicu Jesucristoraicu Diosta huiñai chacchana canchic. Cai chacchashca ñucanchic ricuchina camarimi can. Shinacpi, paita chacchashunchic ñucanchic shimicunahuan.
Yanapanata ama cuncarinquichicchu, tucui cancuna charishcata shuccunahuan chaupichinata ama cuncarinquichic-chu; chashna ricuchishca camaricunatami Dios alli ñahuihuan rican.

Pushaccamacunata uyaichic, paicanata catina canquich-ic, cancanata paicuna mana samashpa ricurashcaraicu, paicuna cancunaraicu Diospacpi taripai tucuna mari canun. Paicuna ru-ranata cushihuan pactachinuchun, mana llaquirishcahuan; pai-canata llaquichicpi, cancunapac mana imapapash allichu canca.
Ñucanchicraicu Diosta mañaichic, ucupi tiyac Diospac yuyaita cushitami charinchic, tucuipi alli cana munashcaraicu.
Cancuna Dios-huan rimarishcapi paita yapa mañancapac munanimi, ñuca cuti cancunahuan tiyacrincapac Dios utcalla manachun.
Ganas causaita cuc Dios Apunchic Jesusta huañushcamanta causachirca; ovejacunapac Jatun Michic can Jesus, huiñai cunacushca shimita yahuarhuan sinchicuchishca-manta

cancunata tucuipi pactachishca, allicunata rurachun, pai munashcata cancuna pactachincapac; Apunchic Jesucristo-raicu, pai munashcata ñucanchicmanta rurachun. Cristo huiñai jatanyachishca cachan. Chashna cachun.
Huauquicuna, cai cariyachic ñuca cancunaman quill-cashca shimicanata casilla shuncuhuan chasquipaichic rimani.
Uyaichic: ñucanchic huauqui Timoteo chunta curralmanta ña llushpirishcami; utcalla shamucpi, pushamushami cancuna-ta ricunca riscapi.
Cancunapac pushaccamacunata yuyarinimi rimapaich-ic, tucui Diospac runacunatapash. Italiamantacuna cancuna-manta yuyarinunmi.
Tucui cancuna jahuapi paipac cuyaita Dios tallichi-chun.
Ñuca, Santiago, Diospac Apunchic Jesucristopacpash runa, Israelmanta chunca ishcai miraicunata, tucui pachapi chausuishca causacuccanata yuyarini.
Ñuca huauquicuna, cancana yapa cushiyana canquichic tucui llaquicunahuan camai tucushcapi.
Cancuna ña pacta yachanquichic, ima shina inina charishcapi camai tucushpa, llaqui tiyashcapi sinchicushpa ñacarincapac yachacunquichic.
Shina cashpapash, chai sinchicushca cancunata pactachishca tucunacama pushachun, allipacha rucuyanaman, mana imapash cancuna pishishca.
Cancunamanta pitapash yachai pishicpi, Diosta mañachun, paica cuncami; Diosca tucuicunamanmi mana mitsashpa, mana ansapash piñashpa cun.
Ranti inina charishcahuan mañana tucan cui tucunata allipacha chapashcahuan; ishcaita yuyaric runa ñucñu yacumanta bacu shinami can, huairapi caiman chaiman tancai tucun.
Chai laya runa, Apunchicmanta japishami ama yuyachun;
cunan caita, caya chaishucta yuyarishcaraicu paipac causaipipash mana shucllata catin.
Tsuntsu huauqui Dios paita jahuayachicpi jatun yarichun;
tucuita charicpash jatunyarichun Dios paita uchillayachicpi. Tucuita charic runa quihua sisa shina mana unai huañuc cashcaraicu.
Inti llucshishpa sinchita rupachicpi, quihua chaquirin; paipac sisa urmacpi, pai sumac ricuriscushca tucurin. Chashnallatami tucuita charic runa pai charishcacana ucupi chincarinca.
Camai tucushcapi sinchicuc runa cushiyachan, camai tucunamanta yallishpa causaitami cuyai tucunca, chaimi Dios paita Ilaquiccunata cusha nishca llautu can.

Pipash mana allita rurancapac aisai tucushpa, ama Diosmi mana allita ruran-capac aisahuan yuyachun, Diosca mana ansallapash mana alli ruranata yuyarishcaraicu, mana pitapash mana allita rurancapac manapacha aisancachu.
Chaipac rantimanta, amupac mana alli munaicunata mana allita rurancapac aisanun, paicunami munachiranun, paicunami rurachinun.
Chai mana alli mu-naicunamanta juchatiyan; ranti jinu juchamanta huañui tiyan.
Ñuca llaquishca huauquicuna, ama umarinquichicchu:

tucui alli, tucui pacta cac ñucanchicman cushca, jahuamanta shamun, jahua pachapi ricuric tucui cuillurcunata rurac Diosmanta shamun. Dios huiñai paillata can: pai shuc laya tucucpi llantushca mana tiyanchu.
Pai, chashna munashcaraicu, shuti shimiraicu ñucanchicman causaita curca, tucui pai rurashcacanamanta ñucanchic ñaupaccana cancapac.
Caita yuyaripaichic, llaquishca huauquicuna: tucui cancana uyanalla chapacana canquichic, ranti allimanta rimana, allimanta piñarina canquichic.
Piñarishca runa mana mari Dios munashcatachu ruran.

Chashnamanta, tucui ticllayucta maitapash juntarac mana alli ruranata saquishpa, cancuna shuncupi tarpushca cushi shimita uchilla shuncuyashcahuan chasquichic; chai cushi shimi cancunata quishpichincapac ushaita charinmi.
Ranti chai cushi shimita uyanalla mana pactachu can; pactachinami can, mana chashna rurashpa cancunallatami umachiricunquichic.
Pipash cushi shimillata uyashpa mana pactachicpi, rirpupi ñahuita ricuric runa shinami can:
amullata ricurin, ranti huashaman tucushpa pai imana cashcata cuncarin.
Ranti uyashcata mana cuncarishpa, pacta cac camachic quillcata allita ricuc, chai camachic quillca rimashcata pactachishcamanta sinchicushpa causashpa, pai rurashcahuan cushimi causanca.
Pipash inina caticmi cani amullata yuyarishpa, ranti paipac calluta mana jarcana ushashpa, amullata umaricun, paipac inina yanca can, mana imapash alli.
Chuya inina, mana ticllayuc inina Dios Yayapac ñaupacpi caimi can: Huaccha huahuacunata, huaccha huarmicunata paicuna llaquirishcapi yanapana, cai pachamanta ticllahuan mana ticllayana.
Cancuna, ñuca huauquicuna, jatunyachishca Apunchic Jesucristopi iniccuna cashpa, runacunata mana chican chican ricana canquichic.
Cancuna tantarishcapishi shuc rana maquipi curimanta shihuiyuc yaicunman, sumac churanayuc, cuti shuc tsuntsu runapash mapayashca churanahuanshi yaicunman.
Cancunaca sumac churarishcata ricushpa rimanquichic: "Cai ñaupacpi tiyari". Ranti tsuntsutaca: "Canca chaiman shayari, mana cacpi, chai allpapi tiyari", rimanquichic;
ña chashna rurashpa cancunapurallata chicanyachicanquichic, mana alli yuyaihuan taripacanquichic.

Ñuca llaquishca huauquicuna, caita uyapaichic: cai pachamanta tsuntsucunatami Dios acllashca, ininapi tucuita chariccuna cancapac, paita llaquiccunata pai cusha nishca pachata shuc japina cashcata shina chasquincapac;
ranti cancuna paicunata millanquichic. ¿Manachu cullquisapacuna cancuna charishcata quichuccuna canun?, ¿paicunallata apucunapac ñaupacman manachu cancanata aisashpa pushanun?
Cancuna jahuapi rimashca Cristopac sumac shutita, ¿manachu paicuna piñac canun?
Dios quillcashca shimipi rimashca shina, tucuicuna-manta yalli camachic quillcata pactachishpa, allita ranquichic: "Shuccunata can quiquinta llaquishca shinallata llaquinqui".
Ranti runacunata chican chican ricushpa, juchata ruranquichic, cautsayashca saquirinquichic Dios rurai nishca ñaupacpi.
Shuc runa tucui camachic quillcata uyashpallata, ranti shuclla pactachinata mana pactachishpa, cautsayashca tucun camachic quillcamanta tucui chaishuc pactachina ñaupacpi.

"Shucpac carihuan shucpac huarmihuan ama causanquichu" rimac Diosllata "Ama huañuchinquichu" rimarca. Shina, shucpac carihuan shucpac huarmihuan mana causashpallta, ranti huañuchishpaca, ña mana uyan camachic quillcata.
Quishpichina apamuc camachic quillcapi taripai tucunca racuccuna shina rimana canquichic, chashna causanapash canquichic.
Shuccunamanta llaquirinata mana chariccuna, paicunapash mana llaquirishcahuanchu taripai tucununca; ranti shuccunamanta llaquiricunaca taripai tucushcapi atishpami llucshinunca.
Huauquicunalla, ñucanchic rurashca mana alli cacpi, ¿inina charinimi rimaipacchu tucushun? ¿Chashna inina paita quishpichinata ushancachu?
Shuc huauquita shuc panita imapash chai puncha churarincapac, chai puncha micuncapac pishicpi

cancunamanta pipash: "Alli richic, rupaclla churarishpa rinquichic, tucui cancuna manashcata micunquich-ic" rimashpallata, tucui paicunapac aicha mutsushcata mana cucpi, ¿chashna rimana imapallash allichu canca?
Inina charishcapi chashnallata tucun: Pai sapalla, nicpi, rurashcahuan mana ricuchicpi, huañushca can.
Pipash rimanca imapash: "Can inina charinqui, ñucaca rurashcacanata charini". Mana rurashcacunahuan can inina charishcata ricuchihuai, ranti ñuca, rurashcacunahuan ñuca inina charishcata ricuchisha.
Can shuclla Dios tiyashcata ininqui, allita ruranqui; chashnallata supaicunapash ininunmi, manchaimantalla chucchunun.
Ama upa caichu, yuyarina canqui inina rurashcacuna illac yanca inina can.
Dios, ñucanchic aulu Abrahanta jucha illac shinata chasquirca, pai paipac churi Isaacta camaripi ricuchishcaraicu.
Abrahan tucushcapi ricuna ushanqui, pai inina charishcata rurashcacuna-huan ricuchirca, rurashcacunahuan ricuchishcaraicu paipac inina pactachishca tucurca.
Chashnami Dios quillcashca shimipi rimashca pactarirca: "Abrahan Diosta inirca, chairaicu Dios jucha illac shinata paita chasquirca" Abrahan chashna Diospac mashi rimai tucurca.
Ña cancuna ricunquichic, Dios runata chasquin pai rurashcacunaraicu, mana pai inina charishcaraiculla.

Nuspa huarmi Rahabhuanpash chashnallata tucurca; pai rurashcacuna-raicu Dios jucha illac shinata paita chasquirca, shimita ricsichishpa puriccunata paipac huasipi chasquishcaraicu, shuc ñanta rmcapac yanapashcamanta.
Rimacpi: Aicha samai illac huañushca cashca shinallata, inina huañushca can rurashcacuna illacpi.
Huauquicunalla, cancuna ucupi ama yapalla achca yachachiccuna tiyanuchun, cancuna pacta yachanquichic ima shina yachachiccamacuna yalli sinchita taripai tucuna cashcata.
Tucuicuna achcapi pantanchic, maicanpash pai rimashcapi mana pantashpa, pactachishca runami can, paipac aichatapash cuscata charina ushac.
Caballo huacracunata ñucanchicta uyancapac paipac shimipi freno nishcata churashcapi, tucui paipac aicha ñucanchicta uyancapac chashna ruranchic.
Barcocunapipash ricuichic: Jatun cacllapita, paita tancac huairacanapash sinchicuna cacllapita, cuscachaccamacu-na, shuc uchilla timón nishcahuan, paicuna munashcata pushanan.
Calluhuanpash chashnallata tucun; tucui aicha-manta shuc uchilla aichashitu can, ranti chashna cashpallata achcata ushan pai. Ansalla ninashituhuan jatun sachata rupachipac mari.

Calluca shuc nina can. Ñucanchic aichapi churashca mana alli jinumi can, tucui ñucanchic aichata ticllayachin. Ucu pachamanta ninallahuanta japichishca can, pai ñucanchic causaitapash chai ninallahuanta rupachicun.
Runaca ima pumacunatapash, pishcucanata, machacuicunata, ñucñu yacumanta aichacunata, imacunatapash yallina ushashca-mi;
ranti pipash calluta yallincapac mana ushashcachu. Mana yallipac uncuimi can, huañuchic janpihuanpash juntachishcami can.
Calluhuan cunanshitu ñucanchic Yaya Diosta bendisian-chic, chashnallata cunanshitu maldisianchic Diospac ricchai shina paillata rurashca runata.
Chai shimimantallata bendisioncuna, maldisioncunapash llucshinun. Huauquicanalla, caica mana chashna canachu can.
Shuc yacu llucshirashca-mantallata mishqui yacu, jayac yacu llucshinata mana ushanchu.

Shuc higuerayura aceituna muyuta mana aparina ushashca shina, shuc uva sapi higo muyuta aparina mana ushashca shina, chashnallata huauquicunalla, cachi yacu llucshicushcamanta mishqui yacu mana llucshincachu.
Cancuna ucupi shuc yapa yachac, alli atipac tiyashpa, pai causashcahuan ricuchichun yapa yachashca cushca uchilla tucunahuan.

Ranti chiquicui cancuna shuncuta jayacyachin-capac saquicpi, imatapash shuccanata piñashcaraiculla rurash-pa, chaipi mana imamantapash jatunyarmata ushanquichicchu, chairapash cancunaca llullacunquichicmi.
Chai yachai mana Diosmanta shamuc mari can, cai pachamanta yachaimi can, runapac yuyaimanta, supaimanta jinu.
Chiquicuicuna tiyashcapi, piñanacuna tiyashcapi, tucui mana allicunapash tiyanun;

ranti Diosmanta shamuc yachaita chariccuna, chuya causaita charinun; casi shuncuyuc canun, alli shun-cuyuccuna, alli uyaccuna canun. Shuccunamanta llaquiriccuna canun, cuscata taripac, shutita rimac, allicunata ruraccuna.
Alli causaita mashcaccuna alli causaihuan tarpunun cusca taripanata pallancapac.
Cancunapura yapa piñanacana, macanacuna ¿imamanta tiyashcata yachanquichicchu? Aicha ucupi cancuna mana alli munaicunata charishcamantami canun.

Cancuna imatapash munashcapi, mana tarina ushashpa huañuchin-quichic, imamantapash chiquicuita charinquichic, mana tarina ushashcamanta macanacunquichic, cancanapura yapa piñanacui tiyan. Diosta mana mañashcaraicu cancuna munashcata mana tupana ushanquichic;
paita mañashpapash, mana cui tucunquichic mana allita mañashcaraicu, cancunaca munanqui-chicmi cancuna aicha munashcapi tucuchincapac.
¡Auca ranacuna! ¿Cai pachahuan mashiyashpa Dios-huan piñarishca tucunata manachu yachanquichic? Pipash cai pachahuan mashi tucushpa, Diosta piñac tucun.
Mana yancachu Dios quillcashca shimipi caita nin: "Dios ñucanchic ucupi churashca samaita tunpashcahuanmi llaquin".
Yanapanapi Diosta mana pipash yallinchu, Dios quillcashca shimipi caitapash yapachin: "Dios jatunyariccunata piñan, ranti uchillayaccunata paipac cuyaita cun".
Shinacpi Diosta uyaichic. Supaita ama uyai-chicchu, chaimi paica cancunamanta anchurinca.
Diosman mayanyaichic, chaimi paipash cancunaman mayanyanca. ¡Juchallishca cashpa cancuna maquita maillarichic. ¡Cancunapac shuncuta chuyayachichic, Diosta cai pachatapash llaquina munac canquichic!
¡Llaquirina canquichic, huacana canquichic! ¡Cancuna asishca huacai tucuchun! ¡Cancuna cushiyashca llaquirina tucuchun!
Apunchipac ñaupacpi uchilla tucucpimi, paica cancunata jatunyachinca.

Huauquicuna, cancunapuramanta mana alli shimita ama rimaichicchu. Paipac huauquimanta mana allita rimashpa, taripashpa imapash, camachic quillcamanta mana allita rimacun, paita taripacun. Camachic quillcata taripashpa, paita uyana rantimanta paita taripac tucunqui.
Camachic quillcata cuc shucllami tiyan, paillata Taripac can, quishpichinata ushan huañuchinatapash ushan; ranti canca, ¿shucta taripancapac imallapash canquichu?
Cunan caita uyaichic, cancuna caita rimaccana: "Cunan cashpa, caya cashpa imapash chai llactaman, chaishucman imapash rishun, chaipi achca cullquita catushpa japishun shuc huata chaipi unayashun",
¡caya paicuna causai ima tucunca rashcata ansallapash mana yachanun! Cancuna shuc puyu cunanshitu ricuri ashtanipi chincaric shina canquichic.
Cashna rimana mari: "Apunchic munacpi, causacushpa caita chaishuctapash rurashunmi".
Ranti jatunyarishpa rimashca-pi cancuna atinquichic, tucui chashna jatunyarina mana alli can.
Pi-pash allicunata rurana yachashpallata mana rurashpa, juchallin.
¡Cancuna cullquisapacuna, caita uyaichic! ¡Achca llaquicunata ñacarinca racushcaraicu huacaichic, capari-chic!
Cancuna achca charishca ishmushcami can; cancuna churana susu micushcallami can.

Cancunapac cullqui, cancunapac curi huacarishcami, chai huacarishcaca cancuna cashcata ricsichic canca, nina shina rupachishpami cancunata tucuchinca. Cai punchacunapi achca cullquita tantachinushca, caicuna puchucai punchacunami canun.
Cancunapac muyuta pallac runacunaman mana cushca cullqui, caparishpa cancunata cautsayachicun; tucui ushac Dios chai muyuta pallac runacuna caparishcata uyashcami.
Cai pachapi cancuna sumac cancuna aicha mañashcata rurashpa causashcanquichic, huacra shina huirayashpa; ¡ñami pactacun huañuchina puncha!
Mana juchayuccanata cautsayachishpa huañuchishcanquichic, quish-pmcapac paicuna mana imallapash ruracpipash.

Ranti cancuna, huauquicuna, casi shuncuhuan chapai-chic Apunchic shamunacama. Ricuichic ima shina allpata llan-caccana paicuna yapa chapashca muyuta, mana piñarishpa cha-pana tucunun tamia pacha tucushcapi.
Cancuna ama piñarichicchu, sinchicuichic, utcalla Apunchic ticramuna cashcaraicu.
Huauquicuna, cancanapura mana alli rurashcacunata ama rimaichicchu, ama taripai tucuncapac; Taripac Dios ñami pancupi can.
Ñuca huauquicana, Apanchicpac shutipi rimac profetacana ñacarishcata, paicuna mana piñarishcata catina canquichic.

Smchicushcahuan llaqui tiyacpi ñacariccunata cushimi canun ninchic. Cancuna uyashcanquichic ima shina Job llaqui tiyashcapi sinchicurca, cancuna yachanquichic ima shina Apunchic paita huasha ricurca, Apunchic yapa llaquinayuc, yapa llaquiric cashcaraicu.

Ama pacha sinchi shimita rimaichicchu, huauquicuna-lla: jahua pacharaicu, cai pacharaicu ama imaraicupash. Cancu-na "Ari" rimashcapi, ari cachun. Cancuna "Mana" rimashcapi, mana cachun, Dios cancunata ama cautsayachincapac.
Cancunamanta maicanpash llaqui charishpa, Dios-huan rimarichun. Pipash cancunamanta cushi cashpa, Diosta jatunyachincapac taquichun.
Maicanpash uncuc cashpa, inic rucucunata cayachan, pairaicu Diosta mañanuchun, Apunchic-pac shutipi huirata jahuinuchun.
Inina Dios-huan rimarish-capi tiyacpi, uncuc alliyancami, Apunchicca paita jatachinca; pai juchata charicpi, quishpichishcami saquirinca.
Chai-raicu, cancuna juchallishcata shucman rimaichic, cancunapura-manta Diosta mañaichic alliyachi tucancapac. Sinchi inishpa chuya shancuyuc runa Diosta mañashca yapa ushaita charin.
Profeta Elias ñucanchic shina runa carca, pai ama tamiachun nishpa sinchi inishpa Dios-huan rimaricpi, quimsa huata chaupi cai allpapi mana tamiarca.
Huasha, cuti Dios-huan rimarishcapi, cutillata tamiarca, allpaca muyuta curca.
Ñuca huauquicuna, pipash cancunamanta shuti cashcamanta chicanyacpi, shuc runa chaimanllata cuti ticrachicpi,
cancuna yachana canquichic, maicanpash juchasapa runata pai mana alli puricushcamanta alliman ticrachicpi, huañuimanta quishpichin, paica achca juchacuna-manta quishpichi tacun.
Ñuca, Pedro, Jesucristopac apostol, mama-llactamanta llucshishpa Pontopi, Galaciapi, Capadociapi, Asiapi, Bitiniapi chausirishca causaccunaman cai pancata quillcani,

Yaya Dios pai munashca shina paicunata acllashcarca. Diospac Samaraicu, paita uyancapac, Jesucristopac yahuarhuan maillashca cancapac cancunata chicanyachishca. Diospac cuyaita ganas causaita achcata chasquipaichic.

Apunchic Jesucristopac Dios Yayata chacchashun, pai ñucanchicmanta achca llaquirishpa Jesucristo huañushcamanta causarishcaraicu, ñucanchicta cuti pacarichishca. Chai ñucanchicta ashtahuan chapanapi sinchicuchiu.
Chairaicu-llatami Dios jahua pachapi japina cashcata huacaichishpa charishcata chasquinquichic; chai mana huacllina ushanchu, mana ticllayancachu, mana huañurincachu.
Cancuna Diospi inina charishcaraicu, paipac ushaihuan cancunata pai ricun pai allichishca quishpinata tupana ushancapac, chaitaca puchucai pachacunapimi ricsichinca.
Chairaicu cancuna cushihuan juntarishca tiyanquichic, shinapash allimi canca yachihuan cancana ansa camai tucanata charicpi.

Cancunapac inina curi shina cashcaraicu, pai alli cashcata ninahuan camai tucuna can. Camai tucushcapi sinchicuc inina curimanta ashtahuan yapa alli can, curica huacllichipac can. Chashna camai tucushca cancunapac inina, alli ricui tucushcami canca, jatunyachishca canca, jahuayachishca canca, Jesucristo shamucpi.

Jesucristota cancuna mana ricushca cashpapash, paita llaquinquichic; cunanpash, paita mana ricushpallata paipi inishpa, manarimaipac cushiyaita charinquichic cancana jatun, jahuayachishca cushiyaihuan cushiyanquichic, chaitaca shimihuan mana rimana ushanquichicchu,
cancunapac causaita quishpichishcaraicu; cancunapac inina chaiman pactancapacmi can.
Ña callari pachallapita profetacuna cai quishpinamanta mashcanurca, tapunurca, Dios pai yapa alli shuncuyucmanta cancunaman cunca rashcamantapash rimanurca.

Cristopac Samai profetacunata Cristo ñacarina cashcata ricsichic carca, chai huasha jatunyarina tiyana cashcatapash; paicunaca mashcaranurca chai runa maicanta can, ima pachapi pactarinatata paicanapi tiyac Samaica rimacurca.

Ranti Dios ima shina paicuna runacunaman yachachicushca mana paicunapaclla, ashtahuan cancunapac allipac cashcata ricsichirca. Cunan, quishpina shimita cancunaman apamuccuna jahua pachamanta cachamushca Samaipac ushairaicu cancana-man caicunata ricsichinushca. ¡Chaicunata angelcunallata ricana munanunman!
Chairaicu, allichishca cana canchic, tucui yuyaihuan causashpa. Jesucristo ricurimushcapi Dios yapa alli shuncumanta canca rashcata tucui cancuna chapaita churaichic.
Uyac churicuna cashpa, chaira Diosta mana ricsishcapi cancuna munashcata rurashpa causashca shina ama causaichicchu.
Chaipac rantimanta, allipacha chuya shuncyac tucusbpa causaichic, cancunata cayac Dios sumaimana cashcaraicu;
caita Dios quillcashca shimipi nin: "Ñuca sumaimana cashcaraicu, cancunapash sumaimana caichic".
Caran runata pai rurashcamanta, mana chican chican ricushpa taripac Diosta "Yaya" rimashpa, cancana cai pachapi causacunacama paita yupaichashcata ricuchina canquichic.

Cancuna aulucunamanta chasquishca yanca causanamanta Dios quishpichishca mari; cancuna pacta allita yachanquichic ima shina mana curitachu, mana cullquitachu cai quishpina-manta cuna tucurca, tucui chaicuna huacllic canun;
Cristopac sumac yahuartami cuna tucurca, pai mana huacllishca, mana ticllayuc cordero shina camaripi ricuchishca carca.
Cai pacha chaira mana rurai tucushcallapita Cristo chashna tucuncapac rimashca carca, ranti cai puchucai pachacunapi cancunapac allipac ricurimushca.
Cancuna Cristoraicu Diospi ininquichic, pai paita huañushcamanta causachirca, jatunyachirca; chashnamanta cancuna ininata, cancana chapanata Diospi churashcanquichic.

Cunan cancuna, shuti shimi rimashcata pactachishpa, cancunapac causaita chuyayachishcanquichic alli shuti pacha huauquicanata llaquincapac. Chashnamanta chuya shancuhuan, tucui ushaihuan cancunapura llaquinacuna canquichic.
Cuti mari cancuna pacarishcanquichic, cai cuti ña mana huañuc yayamanta, mana runa yayamanta, ashtahuan Diospac shimimanta, pai mana chincarishpa huiñai causan.
Cashna Dios quillcashca shimipi nin: "Tucui runa quihua shina can, pai jatun cashpapash quihua sisa shina can. Quihua chaquirin, sisaca urman.
Ranti Apunchicpac shimica chicapac causan". Cai shimi quishpichic shimimi cancanaman ricsichi tucushca.
Chashnamanta, tucui mana allicunata jichuichic, tucui laya umachinata, jahualla ricurishcata, chiquicuita tucui laya caminatapash.
Llullu huahua shina, mana masachishca Diosmanta shamuc chucu yacuta mashcaichic, cancuna pairaicu huiñana ushancapac, quishpmata charincapac,
alli shuti pacha Apunchic alli cashcata atipashca cashpa.
Shina, Apunchicman mayanyaichic, paica runacuna mana allichu nishca causac rumimi can; Diospacca ranti acllashca, yapa alli rumi can.
Cancunapash causac rumi shina Diospac nuasi shayachinapi canquiChic, pacriyayacuna tucushpa, Jesucristopi sumac camaricunata ricuchic, Diospac ñaupacpi alli caccuna.
Chairaicu Dios quillcashca shimipipash nin: "Sionpi ñuca shuc rumita churani, tucuimanta ashtahuan alli rumi, acllashca, sumac; paipi yuyaita churac mana umachishca saquirincachu".
Cancuna iniccunapac chai rumi alli can; ranti mana iniccunapacca, Dios quillcashca shimipi rimashca pactarin: "Huasita shayachiccana jichushca rumi huasita sapiyachic rumi tucushca".
Caitapash shucpi nin: "Shuc rumi paicuna nictancapac". Cushi shimita mana uyashcamanta paicuna nictanun: chashnapac urmancapac rashca canurca.

Ranti cancunaca acllashca aillu canquichic, Diosta yanapac pacriyayacuna, chicanyachishca runacuna, Dios rantishca runacuna. Cai chashna can Dios sumac rurashcacunata cancuna ricsichincapac, pai tuta ucumanta paipac sumac achicman cancunata llucshichirca.
Cancuna ñaupa mana paipac runacuna carcanquichic, ranti cunan Diospac ranacuna canquichic; ñaupa Dios cancunamanta mana ansapash llaquirircachu, ranti cunan shuti llaquirinmi cancanamanta
Llaquishca huauquicuna, mana cai pachamanta cashpa riracllacuna cacpimi, cancunata mañani, samaihuan macanacuc mana alli munaicunata ama cancunapi chasquichicchu.

Diosta mana ricsiccunapac ñaupacpi cusca purichic. Chashnami paicuna, cunan millai runata shina piña-cushpapash, cancuna alli rurashcata ricushcamanta Diosta chacchanunca pai tucuicunata taripana pancha.
Apunchicraicu, tucui cai pachamanta apucunata uyaichic: incata tucuimanta yalli jatun apu cashcaraicu;
huainarucunataca, mana alli ruraccunata ñacachincapac, alli ruraccunata jahuayachincapac, Jatun Apu cachamushcacuna cashcaraicu.
Dios cancuna allicunata rurancapac munan upa runacuna yuyai illaccunantin cancunata imamantapash ama cautsayachincapac.
Quishpira runacuna shina causaichic, mana shuc runacuna shina quishpirami canchic rimashpapash juchata pacancapaclla quishpiramanta rimanun. Chaipac rantimanta Diospac runacana shina causaichic.
Tucuicunata paicana yupachai tucuna tuputa yupachaichic, huauquicunata llaquichic, Diosta manchaichic, mcata yupachaichic.
Huataracuna, tucui yupaichashcahuan cancuna amucu-nata uyaichic alli shancucunata, cancunata sumac chariccunata; chashnallata mana alli, millaicanatapash.
Mana juchallishca cashpapash ñacarina alli can Diosta llaquishcaraiculla.

Cancuna mana alli rurashcamanta ñacachi tucushcapi, casi shuncuhuan ñacarishpa, ¿imallapash cui tucuna tiyanchu? Ranti alli rurashcamanta ñacarina charishcapi, mana piñarishpa ñacarina, chai shuti alli can Diospac ñaupacpi.
Chaipac mari Dios cancunata cayarca, Cristopash cancunaraicu ñaca-rirca, pai rurashcata catishpa pai purishcata rincapac.
Cristo mana shuc cutillapash juchallircachu, maipipash mana pita umachircachu.
Piñai tucushcapi, mana piñashpa paipash cutiparcachu; pai ñacachi tucushcapi "huashami yachahuanquichic" mana rimacchu carca, ashtahuan quiquinraicu Diosta mañac carca, pai cusca taripac cacpi.

Cristollata crusman sicashpa ñucanchic juchacunata paipac aichapi aparirca; juchapac ñucanchic huañushpa, cusca causaita causancapac. Paipac chucrishcacunaraicu cancana alliyachishca saquirircanquichic.
Chincarishca ovejacuna shina ñaupa cancuna puricurcanquichic, ranti cunan Cristoman ticrashcanquichic; pai shuc michic shina cancunata ricun cancanapac causaitapash.
Cancana, cariyuc huarmicuna, caricunata uyaichic, mana miccuna cushi shimita uyac tucunuchun, mana rimashcata uyashcaraicu, ashtahuan cancunapac causaita ricushcamanta,
cancunapac chuya, sumac causaita paicuna ricushcamanta.
Cancuna sumacyashca ama jahua ricuriclla cachun, yapalla sumac ñaccharishca, curimanta huallcarinacu-nata huallcarishpa, sumac churanacunata churarishpa imapash.
Ashtahuan shuncu ucumanta llinpiyamuchun mana chincaric sumacyashca, nicpi, sumaclla, casi shancuhuan causaimanta. Cai sumacyashca Diospac ñaupacpi yapa alli can.
Cai sumacyashcallahuanmi callari pachapi chuyac shuncuyuc huarmicuna sumacyanurca; paicuna Diospi chapashcamanta paicunapac carita uyanurca.
Sara chashna carca, Abrahanta uyarca pai, paita "ñuca apu" rimarca. Cancunaca paipac ushushicunami canquichic, alli ruraicunata rurashpa, mana imatapash manchac cashpa.

Cancunamanta nicpi, huarmiyuc caricuna, huarmicunapac causaita atipashpa causana canquichic. Chashnallata paicunata llaquina canquichic, mana cuyailla paicunata charina cashcaraiculla, ashtahuanpash alli shuncuyuc Dios paicunamanpash cushami nishca cancunaman cuna causaillatata. Chashna ruraichic, chaimi cancuna mañacpi Dios mana unayashpa canca.
Tucuicuna shuclla yuyaihuan causaichic, shuc yuyaillapi huancurishpa, huauquipura shina llaquinacushpa. Alli shuncuyuc, uchilla tucushpa causaichic.

Mana alli rurai tucushcapi, canpash ama chaillahuata cutichinquichu; piñai tucushcapi ama piñashcahuan cutichinquichu. Chaipac rantimanta bendisionta cutichinqui, Dios cancunata bendisionta chasquincapac cayashcaraicu.
"Pipash alli shutipacha causaita llaquishpa, cushi causanayashpa, paipac calluta mana allicunata ama rimachichun, paipac shimita ama llulla shimita rimachichun;
mana allimanta anchurishpa allicunata rurachun, alli causaita mashcashpa paita catichun.
Apunchic chuya shuncuyuccunata ricun mari, pai mañashcacunatapash uyanmi; ranti millai runacunata piñacmi can".
¿Pipash cancunata huacllichina ushancachu cancuna allipacha munashpa jinu allillata ruracpi?
Ranti cuscata rurashca jahuallapita ñacarinata charishpa, achcata cancuna cushiyaichic. Ama mancharinquichicchu, ama pitapash manchaichicchu,

ashtahuan Cristota jatunyachichic Apunchicta shina cancuna shuncupi. Cancuna charishca chapanamanta maicanpash tapucpi, atipachina shimihuan cutipana ushancapac huiñai allichishca chapacuna canquichic,

shinapash uchillayashpa, yupaichashpa ruraichic. Alli causaichic, cancunapac ucupi tiyac Dios cushca yuyai chuya cachun, Cristota inishcaraicu cancuna alli causashcamanta piñaccuna, paicuna rimashcamantallata pincarinuchun.
Dios chashna munacpi, alli rurashcamanta ñacarishca ashtahuan alli can mana alli rurashcaraicu ñacarina rantimanta.

Shuc cutilla, huiñaipac, quiquin Cristollata ñucanchic jucharaicu huañuita ñacarirca. Pai allimi carca, ranti mana allicunaraicu ñacarirca Diospacman cancunata pushancapac. Runa cashpa, huañurca; ranti samaimanta cashcaraicu, causaiman cuti ticrarca.
Samaimanta cashcaraicullata, quillpashca tiyac samaicunapacman rishpa quishpinata huillarca.

Paicuna mana uyac runacuna canushcarca Noe causashca pachapi, Dios casi shuncuhuan barco tucuhinacama chapacushcapi; chaipi maican runacuna quishpinurca, tucuimanta nicpi pusac runa yacuraicu quishpichic tucunurca.

Chai yacu bautismo yacu ricchai carca, cunan pairaicu quishpirchishca canchic. Bautismoca mana aichata maillancapacchu, ucupi tiyac Diospac yuyai chuya tucuchun mshpa mañancapacmi can; pai ñucanchicta quishpichinmi Jesucristo huañushcamanta causarishcaraicu;
pai jahua pachaman sicashpa Diospac yachac maquiman tiyan, paipac maquipi angelcuna, tucui ushaita charic samaicunapash, uyancapac saquirinushca.
Chairaicu Jesucristo paipac aichapi ñacarishca shina, cancanapash ñacarinalla chapacuna canquichic. Pipash paipac quiquin aichapi ñacarishca cashpa pai ña juchamanta chicanyashca mari,
puchucai punchacuna Dios munashca shina causancapac, mana runa munashca shina.

Unaita cancunapash Diosta mana ricsiccuna rurashca shinallata rurarcanquichic, mana alli yachashcacunapi, mana alli munaicunapi, machanapi, cuinacta micushpa, yallicta upiashpa, jirus huacacunata chacchashpa causarcanquichic.
Canan, cancunapash ña mana paicunahuan mana alli ruranapi satiracpimi, chai paicunata mana alli yachicpimi, cancunata piñanun.
Shinapash Diospacpi paicuna taripai tucuna canun, pai yapa allichirishca chapacun causac runacunata huañushcacunantin taripancapac.
Ña huañushcacana cushi shimita ricsichi tucanurca mari, samaipi causaita charincapac Dios munashca shina, runacuna yachaipi cai pachapi paipac aicha taripai tucushca cashpapash.
Tucui imacuna tucurina ña mayanlla can. Chairaicu cancuna tucui yuyarishcahuan causana canquichic, alli shuti pacha Dios-huan rimarinapi catishpa.
Cancunapura llaquinacushca yapa tiyachun, llaquinacushca achca juchacunamanta quishpichic cashcaraicu.
Cancunapura huasipi chasquinacuichic, mana pimantapash camishpa.
Dios chai tucui cushca cuyaicunata alli ricuccuna cashpa, caranlla amu chasquishca cuyaihuan shuccunata yanapachun.

Pipash rimashcapi, paipac shimi Diospac shimi shina cachun. Pipash shuc yanapaita rurashcapi, Dios cushca ushaihuan yanapachun. Tucui imatapash rurashcapi, Dios Jesucristoraicu chacchai tucuncapac ruraichic, huiñai paipac cachan jatunyarishca, ushai. Chashna cachun.
Llaquishca huauquicuna, ama mancharinquichicchu yapalla manchaipac cacpi shina, camana ninapi camai tucushpa.
Chaipac rantimanta, cushiyaichic Cristohuan ñacaricushcaraicu, pai jatunyashca ñucanchicman ricurishcapi ñucanchicpash cushihuan juntarincapac.
Cushiyaichic pipash Cristoraicu cancunata piñacpi, jatunyachishca Diospac Samai huiñai cancunahuan cashcaraicu.
Cancunamanta maicanpash ñacaricushcapi, ama runata huañuchishcaraicu, ama shuhuashcaraicu, ama shuccunapac llaquipi satirishcaraicu cachun.
Ranti Cristota catishcaraicu ñacarishpa, mana pmcarmachu, chairaicu ashtahuan Diosta chacchachan.
Diospac aillumanta jinu taripai callarina pacha ña pactashcami. Ñucanchicmanta chashna taripana callaricpica, ¿ima chari rucunca ranun Diospac cushi shimita uyanata mana munaccuna?
Racuimanta chuya shuncuyuc runa quishpinata charicpi, ¿millai runa, juchasapa runa, paicuna chari ima tucununca?
Chairaicu, Dios munashca shina ñacariccuna allicunata rurashpa catina canun, paicunapac samaira paicanata huiñachic Diospac maquipi churana canun; paica shimita pactachicmi can.
Canan, cancunapac pushaccamacunata camachinayani, ñucapash pushaccama cani; Cristo ñacarishcamanta ricuyac cani paicuna shinallata; ñucapash chasquinca rani jatunyana ñucanchicman ricurimucpi.
Cancunaman mincash-ca Diospac ovejacunata ricuichic; munashpa jinu ruraichic Dios munashca shina; mana pactachina cashcaraicu, mana cullquiraicu. Tucui shuncuhuan cancuna llancanata ruraichic,
mana cancunaman mincashcacunapac amu shina, ashtahuan cancunapac causaihuan yachachina yuyaihuan.
Chashna shuti, michiccunapac Amu shamucpi, jatunyachic llaututa chasquinquichic, mana huañuric llautu.

Chashnallata, cancuna huanpracuna, rucucunata uyaichic. Tucuilla uchillayashpa shuccanata uyana canquichic, cairaicu: "Jatunyashcacunata mana allihuan Dios ricun, ranti uchillayaccunata Dios pai alli shuncu cashpa yanapan".
Tucuita ushac Diospac maquipi uchillayaichic, paipac jahuayachina pactashcapi cancuna jahuayachi tucuncapac.
Tucui llaquicunata Diospac maquipi churaichic, pai cancanata ricucun mari.
Yuyayuc caichic, ricuralla causaichic cancunata piñac supai, yaricaihuan puricuc puma shinami, tuparishcata micuncapac mashcashpa puricun.
Sinchi inina charishpa, sinchicuichic, tucui pachapi shuc huauquicuna chashnallata ñacarishcata yuyarishpa.

Shinapash unainayata cancuna ñacarishca huasha, cancunata pactata Dios ruranca, mana cuyuric, sinchi, ña quishpishcacuna canquichic. Yapa llaquishcamanta cancunatapash Crisropi pai huiñai jatunyashcata chasquincapac cayac Diosllatami can.
Ushai huiñai paipacmi can. Cashna cachun.

Silvanohuan, ñuca paita allita ricsishcaraicu, cai pancata cancunaman quillcani, cancunata camachincapac, cancuna chasquishca bendisioncuna Dios allipacha llaquishca-raicumi rimancapac. Chai llaquinapi ama sanpayashpa causaichic.
Babiloniapi tiyac miccunata Dios acllashca cancunata acllashca shina; paicuna cancunata yuyarinunmi, ñuca churi Marcospash yuyarinmi.
Huauquipura muchanacuichic. Cancuna Cristopac cashcaraicu, ganas causaita charichic.

Ñuca, Simon Pedro shutiyuc, Jesucristopac runa, paipac apostol, cancunaman cai pancata quillcani, cancunapash ñucanchicpac Dios Quishpichic Jesucristo cusca taripac cashcaraicu, ñucanchic sumac inina charishca shinallata charishcanquichic.
Achca Diospac cuyaita, achca alli causai-tapash chasquichic Apanchic Dios Jesustapash ricsishcamanta.

Dios paipac ushaihuan ñucanchic causancapac, paita yuyarishpa causancapac tucui mutsushcata ñucanchicman cushca; tucuimanta ñaupa ñucanchicta ricsichirca paipac quiquin ushaihuan, paipac jatunyaihuan cayac Cristota.

Caicunaraicu pai cusha ñishcacunata ñucanchicman curca, chaicuna yapa jatun, yapa alli canun; chaicunaraicu cancuna Diospac causaita ansata charina ushancapac, cai pachaman mana alli munaicuna apamushca huacllinamanta quishpinca-pac.
Chashnamanta cariyana canquichic ininata alli causaihuan yapachincapac; alli causaita, atipanahuan;
ati-panata, amu munashca shina quiquin aichata purichinahuan; amu munashca shina quiquin aichata purichinata, casi shuncu canahuan; casi shuncu canata, Diosta yuyarishpa causanahuan;
Diosta yuyarishpa causanata, huauquipura llaquinacunahuan; huauquipura llaquinacunata, llaquinahuan.
Caicunata cancuna charishpa ashtahuan huiñachicpi, cancuna causai Apunchic Jesucristota cancuna ricsishcapash mana yancachu canca.
Ranti caicunata mana charicca mana ricuc ñausa shinami can; paipac ñaupa juchacunamanta pichai tucushcata cuncarishca mari.
Chairaicu huauquicuna, Dios cancunata cayashpa acllashcaraicu, tucui caicunata cancunapi sapiyachichic; chashna rurashpami mana maican punchapash urmanquichic.
Chaipi shuti Apunchic Quishpichic Jesucristopac huiñai pachamanta puncucuna pascashca cancunapac saquirinunca.
Chairaicumi cancunata huiñai chaita yuyachishpa catina cani, cancuna alli yachashpa, shuti cashcata ñuca yachachishcapi cancuna sinchicushpa causacucpipash.
Ñuca causacushpa, cai camachinacunahuan cancunata yuyachishpa quillachicunami cani yachihuan.
Mana unai cai causaita ñuca saquina cashcata Apunchic Jesucristo ricsichihuashcami;
shinapash sinchi yuyaitami churasha yuyani cancuna ñuca huañushca huashapash caicunamanta yuyarincapac.

Chashnamanta, cancunaman ricsichishcanchic Apun-chic Jesucristopac ushaita pai ticramuna cashcatapash, mana umachincapac surcushca shimicunahuan, ñucanchic quiquin ñahuillahuanmi Apunchic jatunyashcata ricurcanchic.
Dios paipac Yaya paita jatunyachina, jahuayachina cushcapimi ricur-canchic, Diospac shimi chashna jatunyashcahuan paita rimash-capimi ricurcanchic: "Caimi ñuca llaquishca churi, paitami acllashcani".
Ñucanchicllata chai jahua pachamanta shamuc shimita uyarcanchic, Apunchic-huan mari urcupi carcanchic.

Chairaicu, profetacuna rimashcapi yalli sinchita inin-chic, alli cashcaraicu cancuna paicanata yuyarinquichic. Chai cushi shimi shuc chinpusu tutapi punchayachishca shinami can; punchayashcapi tutamanta cuillur llucshishpa cancuna shuncuta ricuchincapac shamunacama.
Tucui imamantapash yalli caita yuyarishpa causaichic: Dios quillcashca shimipi rimashca mana pipash quiquin amu munashca shina chaipi rimashcata atipana ushanchu,
profetacuna maipipash mana paicuna munai rimashcaraicu; ashtahuan paicunaca Diospa-raicumi rimanurca, Diospac Samai ricsichicpi.

Israel llactapi llulla profetacunapash tiyanurca; chashnallatami llulla yachachiccunapash cancana ucupi tiyanca. Yanca rac shinami paicunapac huacllichic yuyaicunata yachachinunca, chashna rurashpa paicunata quishpichic Apunchicta "mana" rimaranan; chashna rurashcahuan chicapac huañuita utcalla paicunaman cayaranun.
Achca runami paicuna mana alli yachaipi caticushcata catinunca, paicunarai-cullatami shuti ñanmanta mana alli rimai tiyanca.

Paicuna yapalla cullqui manashcamanta, llulla yachachishcacunahuan-mi cancuna cullquita quichananca; shinapash mana quishpipac chicapac huañuna paicanata chapacun, unaimantami paicunaca ña cautsayachishca canan.
Juchallic angelcunata Dios mana quishpichircachu, ashtahuan ucu pachaman paicunata cacharca, tutapi paicunata saquirca, taripana pactanacama jillai huascahuan huatashpa huacaichiracuna.

Ñaupa runacunatapash Dios mana quishpi-chircachu, ashtanuan huanuna yacutami chai mana alli ranacana jahuapi cachamurca; Noe shuclla quishpichi tucurca, cusca causanamanta pai yachachirca, canchis runapash quishpircami.
Sodoma, Gomorra llactacunata Dios huacllichishpa chincachirca, ushpa tucunacama rupachishpa, huasha shamunca rac mana alli runacunata ricuchinaraicu.
Ranti Lotta quishpichirca, pai chuya shancuyuc runa carca; chairaicu llaquirishpa causacurca chai millai runacuna mana lli yachashcahuan causacpi.
Chuya shuncuyuc paicuna ucupi causacuc runa, paipac shuncupi ñacarirca tucui puncha mana alli rurashcacunata ricushpa, mana allicunata uyashpa.
Paiman curishpa causaccunata Apanchic quishpichinata yachanmi, taripana pancha pactanacama mana allicunatapash ñacachishpa charina yachanmi pai.
Ticllayachic munaicunata caticcunata, Apunchicta mana uyaccunata, Dios ashtahuan yapami ñacachinca. Jatunyarisiqui canun; yupaichana illac runacuna, ima aputapash piñanunlla;
ranti angelcanaca, yalli ushaita charishpapash, Apunchicpac ñaupacpi mana ansallapash piñaita yuyananchu.

Huihuacuna shina canun chai runacuna: yuyai illac canun, causai tiyashcaraiculla causanacun, maipi tupai tucushpa huañuchi tucuncapaclla pacarinun. Imamantapash mana atipashpa, mana alli shimita rimanun; shinapash huihuacuna shinallatami huañununca,

shuccunata ñacachish-camanta ñacarishpa. Mana unai tucuric cushiyaicunahuan cushiyashpa, cushimi causanchic yuyanun. Pincaipac, piñaripac canun, raimipi cancunahuan cashpa, paicuna yachai cushiyashpa.
Shuc huarmita huañupashpa ricushpallami paicuna cananca; jucha ruranapi mana sanpayanun. Mana sinchicushca runacunata juchallichinun; cullquiman yapa llutarishca canun; maldisiashca runacuna canun.
Cusca ñanmanta anchurishca-raicu, pantashpa puriranun. Beorpac churi profeta Balaampac causaita catinun, mana alli rurashcahuan cullquita pai japinayarca,
pai juchallishcamanta piñai tucurcami: paipac huihua runacuna shina rimancapac callarishpa, paipac nuspa yuyaipi mana ñaupacman catichirca.
Yacu illac allpapi allashca pucru shina canun chai yachachiccuna; huaira tancacushca puyu shina canun; yana ucupi huiñai causancapac cautsayachishca canun.
Yapa sumac uyaric, yuyai illac shimicunata rimanun, mana alli yachashcacunahuan, aicha mañashcacunahuan juchallichinun panta panta puricushcamanta llushpiricuccunata, chaimanllata cuti urmachinun.
Paicunallata huacllishcapi huatara causacushpallata, quishpina tiyancami rimanun; imapipash runa yallic tucushca cashpa, chai paita huatashcatami charin.

Apunchic quishpichic Jesucristota ricsishcaraicu, cai pacha ticllamanta quishpichishcacuna, cutillata chai mana alli yachashcacunaman ticrashpa, yalli tucushpa, ñaupa cashcamanta ashtahuan huacllishca saquirinun.
Paicunaman rurai nishcamanta ricsishca huasha chicanyana rantimanta, paicunapac ashtahuan alli canman carca shuc rai chai cusca ñanta mana ricsina.
Ranti paicunapi pactarinmi cai runa rimanaipi nishca: "Pai cuinashcallata allcu micucrin, cuchi mama cunanshitu armachi tucushpallata cuti turuyacrin".
Llaquishca huauquicuna, caihuan ña ishcai pancata cancanaman quillcani. Ishcantinpi ñuca camachishcacu-nahuan cuscata yuyachina munashcani.
Shuc pachacunapi profetacuna rimashcata yuyarichic; apostolcana cancunaman ricsichishca, Apunchic quishpichic rurai nishcata yuyarichic.
Caita ashtahuan yapa yuyarichic; puchucai punchacuna-pi, paicunapac quiquin mana alli munaicunapi causac runacunami shamununca, cancunata asishcahuanpash
ta-pununcami: "¿Cristo cuti shamuna nishca ña pactarishcachu? Ñucanchic yayacuna ña huañunurca, shinapash cai pacha callarishcamanta tucui chashnallata caticun".
Chai runacuna mana atipanata munanun mari callari pachallapita jahua pacha tiyashcata, allpapash Dios rimashcamanta yacuraicu yacumanta llucshishcata.
Callaripi tiyac pachapash huañuna yacuhuan chincachi tucurca.
Ranti cunan tiyac allpa jahua pachantm Dios rimashcaraicullata ninapac huacaichishca canun. Taripana punchapimi paicunata rupachinca, chaipimi millaicuna cautsayachishca cananca.
Chairapash, llaquishca huauquicuna, mana cuncarina canquichic Apunchicpac shuc puncha huaranca huata shina cashcata, chashnallata huaranca huata shuc puncha shina cashcata.

Apunchicca mana unayacunchu, maicancuna yuyana shina, pai cusha nishcata pactachincapac; ashtahuan cancunata chapacun, mana mari pipash huañuncapac munanchu, ashtahuan tucuicana paiman ticrancapacmi munan.

Ranti Apunchicpac punchaca shuc shuhua shinami shamunca. Chaipimi jahua pachacuna manchaipac uyarishpa pascarinanca; tucui imacunapash ninahuanmi nuyurinunca; allpaca tucui pai charishcantin taripai tucuncapac Diospac maquipimi churashca canca.
Tucui chashna huacllichishca tucurina cashcaraicu, yapa chuya causaita, Diosta yapa yuyarishpa causana canquichic.
Diospac puncha pactamana-ta chapaichic, utca shamuchun nishpa cancuna ushashcata ruraichic. Chai punchami jahua pacha ninahuan rupachishca tucurinca, tucui imacunapash nina ucupimi nuyurinunca;
ñucanchicca, shinapash, Dios cusha nishca mushu jahua pachata, mushu allpata chapanchic; chaipimi cusca taripana, tucui alli tiyanca.
Chairaicu llaquishca huauquicuna, tucui chaicunata chapacunacama, alli causaichic Diospacpi alli tupai tucunayashpa, mana ticllayuc, mana juchayuc.

Apunchic casi shuncuhuan ricushca ñucanchic quishpinata charincapac cashcata yuyarichic. Chaimanta nicpi ñucanchic llaquishca huauqui Pablo ña cancunaman quillcashcami, paita Dios yuyai cushca tuputa cancunaman rimashpa.

Caran pai quillcashcapi chaimanta cancanata rimashca, shutimi, maican shimicana atipancapac sinchi canan, chaita yuyai illaccuna, inina mana sinchi chariccuna huishtuyachinun, Dios quillcashca shuc shimicunata huishtuyachishca shina; chashna rurashca quiquinllata cautsayachi tucancapacllata can.

Chairaicu, llaquishca huauquicuna, chaicuna mana tucushcallapita yachashcaraicu, yuyapanquichic, ama millai runacuna umachishcapi urmanquichicman, ama cancuna sinchiyashpa causacushcamanta urmanquichicman.
Ranti Apunchic quishpichic Jesucristota allita ricsina canquichic paipac llaquinapipash huiñaichic. ¡Cunan huiñaipash jatunyana paipac cachun! Chashna cachun.

Callari pachapi ña tiyashcamanta cancunata quill-canchic, ñucanchic uyashcamanta, quiquin ñucanchic ñahuihuan ricushcamanta. Ñucanchic ricushcaraicu, maqui-huanpash llancashcaraicu. Causaita cuc Shimimanta rimanchic.
Cai causai ricurimurca, ñucanchic paita ricurcanchic, ñucanchic paimanta ricuyac cashcanchic; cai huiñai causaita cancunaman ricsichinchic, pai Yayahuan tiyacushcamanta ñucanchicman ricurimushca.

Shina, ñucanchic ricushcata ñucanchic uyashcatami cancanaman ricsichinchic, cancuna ñucanchicman llutarishca cancapac, ñucanchicpash Yaya Dios—huan paipac Churi Jesucristohuanpash llutarishca cashca shina.
Ñucanchic cushiyai pacta cachun nishpami tucui caicanata cancunaman quillcanchic.
Caimi Jesucristo ñucanchicman yachachishca shimi, ranti ñucanchicca cancunaman ricsichinchic: Dios achicmi, paipi mana ansapash tuta tiyanchu.
Paiman llutarishcami canchic rimashpallata tutapi causacushpa, shimihuan rurashcahuanpash llullacunchicmi.
Ranti achicpi causacushpa Dios achicpi causacushca shina, chaipi shuti ñucanchicpura llutarishca tiyan, paipac Churi Jesucristopac yahuarpash tucui juchamanta ñucanchicta pichan.
Jucha illacmi canchic rimashpa, ñucanchicllatami umaricunchic, shuti shimi ñucanchicpi mana tiyan;
ranti, ari, juchayucmi canchic amullata rimacpi, Dios mana llullac, alli taripac cashcaraicu ñucanchic juchacunamanta quishpichin-cami, tucui mana allimantapash pichancami.
Mana shuc cutillapash juchata rurashcanichu rimashcahuan Dios llullacmi can rimanchic, chairapash, paipac shimita mana ñucanchicpi charinchic.

Ñuca huahuashitucuna, tucui caicunata ama jucha-llichicchu nishpami cancunaman quillcani. Maican juchallicpi imapash, ñucanchicraicu Diospac ñaupacpi mañacta charinchic; pai Jesucristo can, cusca taripac can.
Ñucanchic juchacuna quishpichishca cancapac Jesucristo camaripi curirca, mana ñucanchic jucharaiculla, tucui pachamanta juchacanarai-cupash.
Dios rurai nishcacunata pactachishpa, chaipi shuti allipachami paita ricsishcanchic.
Ranti maicanpash: "Ñuca paita ricsinimi" nishpallata, pai rurai nishcacunata mana pactachishpa, llullaisiquimi can, mana shuti shimi rimac can.
Ranti, paipac shimita uyac, sumacta pacha paita llaquicun, chashna shuti paihuan ñucanchic llutarishca cashcata yachanchic.
Pipash Dios-huan llutarishcami cani rimashpa, Jesucristo causashca shina causana can.
Huauquicuna, mana mushuchu can cai cancunaman quillcashca rurai nishca: callarishcamanta cancana chasquishca-llatami can. Chai unai pachamanta rurai nishca cancuna uyashca shimi can ña.
Shina cacpipash, cai cancunaman quillcacushca mushu rurai nishcami can, pai Cristopi cancunapipash shuti can, tuta chincaricucpi quiquin achic llinpiyamucushcaraicu.
Maicanpash achicpimi cani rimashpallata, paipac huauquita chaira chicnishpa, chairami tutapi can.
Paipac huauquita llaquic runa achicpi causan, mana imapash paita juchapi urmachincachu.
Ranti paipac huauquita chicnic runa tutapi causan, tutapi puricun, maiman rirashcatapash mana yachan tuta paita ñausayachishcaraicu.
Churi huahuashitucuna, Dios paipac shutiraicu, cancunapac juchamanta quishpichishcaraicumi cancunaman quillcani.
Yayacuna, callarimanta tiyacta cancuna ricsishca-raicumi, canCunaman quillcani. Maltacuna, manaalli rurachicta cancana yallishcaraicumi, cancunaman quillcani.

Cancunaman quillcashcanimi, huahuashitucuna, Yaya-ta cancuna ricsishcaraicu. Cancunaman quillcashcanimi, yayacuna, ña callarimanta tiyacta cancuna ricsishcaraicu. Cancunamanpash maltacuna, quillcashcanimi, cancuna sinchi cashcaraicu, Diospac shimitapash cancuna shuncupi chas-quishcaraicu, mana alli rurachicta yallishcaraicupash.
Cai pachata tucui pai charishcacunantin ama llaquinquichicchu. Maicanpash cai pachata llaquishpa, Yayata mana llaquinchu;

tucui cai pacha ñucanchicman cuyashca mana Yayamanta shamun, pachamantallatami shamun. Caicunatami cai pacha ñucanchicman cuyan: runa juchata munashcacuna, mashnapash sumaccunata ricuna munai, cullquita charishcaraicu jatunyana.
Shinapash cai pacha ña tucuricun tucui paipac mana alli munaicunantin; ranti Dios manashcata pactachic huiñai causaita charin.
Huahuashitucuna, caimi puchucai pacha can. Shuc runa Cristota piñac shamuncami rimai tucurcanquichic; ranti achca Cristota piñaccuna ña shamunushcami. Chairaicu puchucai pacha cashcata yachanchic.

Paicuna ñucanchic ucumanta llucshinurca, ranti mana ñucanchicpacmantacanachu canurca; ñucanchipaccuna cashpa, ñucanchichuan saquirinun-man carca. Shiuapash cashna tucurca mana tucuicuna ñucanchicmanta cashca pasacta ricurincapac.
Cristo Diospac Samaita cancunaman cushca, ña tucui-lla yaChaita charinquichic.
Shuti cashcata cancuna ricsishca-raicumi quillcani, mana chaira ricsina pishishcaraicu; cancuna allita yachanquichic shuc llulla shimi mana shuti shimimanta shamushcata.
¿Pi Ilulla cashcata yachanquichicchu? Jesus mana Mesiaschu rimacmi llulla can. Chaimi Cristota piñac can, pai Yayata Churitapash mana chasquin.
Maicanpash Churita mana chasquishpa, Yayatapahs mana chasquin; ranti pi runapash Churita chasquishpa, Yayatapash chasquin.

Chairaicu, callarishcamanta uyashca shimita cancuna shuncupi huacaichina canquichic; callarishcamanta uyashca cancuna shuncupi saquiricpi shuti, cancunapash Yayahuan Churihuan llutarishcami canquichic.
Caita jinumi Jesucristo ñucanchicman cusha nishca: Huiñai causaita.
Cancunata umachina munaccunata yuyarishpami quillcashcani.

Shinapash, Jesucristo cancunaman cushca Diospac Samaita charinquichic; ¿imapacta shuc yachachic ashtahuan tiyanca? Samaillata tucui imacunata cancunaman pacta yachachin; pai yachachishcacuna shutimi canun, llullai mana tiyanchu. Samai yachachishca shina Cristoman llutarishca causaichic.
Cunan, huahuashitucuna, Cristoman llutarishca cau-saichic, pai ricurimushcapi paipi yuyaita churancapac, pai shamushcapi paipac ñaupacpi ama pincarincapac.
Jesucristo cusca taripac cashcata yachashcamanta, cancuna yachanapash canquichic, tucui cuscata ruraccana Diospac churicana cashcata.
