Ñucanchicta Yaya Dios ima shina llaquishcata ricuichic, chairaicu Diospac churicuna rimai tucunchic; chashnami canchic, shuti. Chairaicu cai pachamantacuna ñucanchicta mana ricsinun, paicuna Diosta mana ricsinushca mari.
Llaquishca huauquicuna, ñami Diospac churicuna canchic. Huasha ima tucanca rashcata mana yachashpapash Jesucristo ricurimucpi pai shina cana cashcata yachanchic, paita jinu ricuna cashcaraicu.
Maicanpash cai chapanata charic, paillata chuyayan, Jesucristo chuya cashca shina.
Ranti maicanpash juchata rurashpa, mana allita ruran; juchallinaca mana alli rurashca mari can.
Cancuna ña yachanquichic Jesucristo cai pachaman juchacunata anchuchin-capac shamushcata; pai mana shuc juchallapash charishcata yachanquichic.
Shina, maicanpash paiman llutarishca causac, mana juchallin; ranti, tucui juchalliccuna paita mana ricunushcachu, mana ricsinushcachu.
Ñuca huahuashitucana, cancunata ama pipash umachichun: cuscata rurac runa cusca shuncuyuc can, pai cusca shuncuyuc cashca shina;
ranti juchata ruracca supaipac can, supai callarishcamanta juchallisiqui cashcaraicu. Caipac jinumi Diospac Churica shamushca: supai rurashcata huacllichincapac.
Diospac chiricuna mana maicanpash juchallinun, Dios cushca causaita charishcaraicu; Diospac churi cashcaraicu juchallina mana ushanchu.
Yachanalla can maican Diospac churi, maican supaipac churi cashca: maicanpash mana allita rurashpa, paipac huauquita mana llaquishpa, chai mana Diospac can.
Callarishcamanta cancuna uyashca shimi caimi: Ñucanchicpura llaquinacuna canchic.
Ama Cain shina tucushun, supaipac cashpa paipac huauquita huañuchirca. ¿Imaraicu huañuchishcata yachanquichicchu? Cain rurashcacana mana alli cashcaraicu, ranti paipac huauquipaccuna, alli.
Ñuca huauquicuna, ama mancharinquichicchu cai pachamanta caccuna cancunata chicnicpi.
Huañuimanta causaimanmi ñucanchic chinpashcanchic; ñucanchic huauquicu-nata llaquishcaraicu chaita yachanchic. Maicanpash mana llaquic cashpa, chaira huañushcami can.
Maicanpash paipac huauquita chicnic cashpa, runata huañuchicmi can; cancana ña yachanquichic ima shina runata huañuchiccunamanta mana maicanpash huiñai causanata quiquinpac ucupi charishcata.
Jesucristo ñucanchiraicu paipac causaita cushcamanta llaquinata ricsinchic; chashnallata ñucanchicpash ñucanchic huauquicunaraicu causaita cuna canchic.
Ñucanchic cullquiyuc cashpa, shuc huauquita imapash illac ricushpallata mana imatapash cushpa, ¿Diospac llaquinata shuncupi charishanchu?
Ñuca huahuashitucuna, ama shimillahuan llaquishun, rurashcahuan llaquishun.
Chaipimi allipacha yachashun ñucanchic shutimanta cashcata, Diospac ñaupacpipash cushimi cashun;
ñucanchic shuncu imamantapash cautsayachina charicpi, Dios ñucanchic shancumanta ashtahuan yalli jatun cashpa, tucuita pai yachan.
Llaquishca huauquicuna, ñucanchic shancu mana cautsaya-chicpi, Diospi yuyaita churashpa paiman mayanyashanchic;
pai tucui ñucanchic mañashcata cancami, ñucanchic pai ru-rai nishcacunata pactachishcaraicu, ñucanchic pai munashca-tapash rurashcaraicu.
Caimi pai rurai nishca: paipac Churi Jesucristopi inina canchic, pai rimashca shina ñucanchicpura llaquinacuna canchic.
Pai rurai nishcacunata uyaccuna paipi causanun, paica paicunapi causan. Pai ñucanchicpi causa-cushcata cairaicumi yachanchic: pai ñucanchicman cushca Sa-mairaicu.

Llaquishca huauquicana, ama tucui Dios ricsichishca-tami rimanchic niccanata uyanquichicchu; paicunapi tiyac samai Diospacchu can, yancachu can ricancapac, ñaupacta camana canquichic paicunata, Diospacraicumi rimanchic nic llullaccanalla cai pachapi juntarashcaraicu.
Cashna rurashpa-mi cancuna yachana ushanquichic maicancunallata Diospac Samaita charinacan: Jesucristo quiquin rana shina shamushcata inicmi Diospac Samaita charin.

Jesusmanta mana chashna inic Diospac Samaita mana charinchu; chaipac rantimanta, Cristota chicnicpac samaitami charin. Chai samai shamuna-manta cancuna uyashcanchic mari; cunan uyaichic, ñami cai pachapi can.
Churishitucuna, cancuna Diospac canquichic, llullaisi-quicanatapash yallishcanquichic, cancanapi tiyac cai pachaman-tacuna ucupi tiyacmanta yalli ushaita charishcaraicu.
Paicuna cai pachapac canun; chairaicu cai pacha imacanamanta rima-nun, pachamantacuna paicunata uyanun.

Ranti ñucanchic Diospac canchic. Diosta ricsic runa ñucanchicta uyan, ranti mana Diospac rana ñucanchicta mana uyan. Chaipi ricsina ushanchic, maican shuti shimi samaita charin, maican umachic samaita charin.
Llaquishca huauquicuna, ñucanchicpura llaquinacuna canchic, llaquina Diosmanta shamushcaraicu. Llaquic runa Diospac churi cashpa Diosta ricsin.
Mana llaquic runa Diosta mana ricsishcachu Dios llaquina cashcaraicu.
Ñucanchicman llaquina charishcata Dios ricsichirca paipac shuclla Churita cai pachaman cachamushcapi, ñucanchic pairaicu causaita charincapac.
Llaquina caimi can: mana ñucanchic Diosta llaquishcaraicu, ashtahuan pai ñucanchicta llaquishpami paipac Churita cachamurca, camaripi curishpa ñucanchic juchacunata pichancapac.
Llaquishca huauquicuna, ñucanchicta Dios chashna llaquishcaraicu, ñucanchicpurapash llaquinacuna canchic.
Diosta mana pipash ricushcachu, ranti ñucanchicpura llaquinacucpi, Dios ñucanchicpi causan, paipac llaquinapash ñucanchic ucupi sapiyan.
Paipac Samaita ñucanchicman cushcaraicumi, ñucanchic Diospi causacushcata paipash ñu-canchicpi cashcata yachanchic.
Ñucanchicllata ricushcan-chic, chairaicu Yayami Churita cai pachata quishpichincapac cachamurca rimanchic.
Maicanpash Jesus Diospac Churi cashcata inishpa, Diospi causan Diospash paipi causan.
Chashua yachashcanchic, iuinchicpash ñucanchicta Dios llaquishcata. Dios llaquina can; llaquinapi causac runa Diospi causan, Diosca paipi causan.
Chashnami llaquina ñucanchicpi shuti jinu tiyan, taripana puncha ñucanchic yuyaita Diospi churancapac; ñucanchic cai pachapi Jesucristo cashca shinallata mari canchic.

Llaquina tiyashcapi manchai mana tiyan mari. Ashtahuanpash, pacta llaquina manchaita callpachin, manchaica ñacarina samimi can. Chairaicu pipash manchaita charishpa, chaira mana allipacha llaquinata charin.
Pai ñaupac llaquishcaraicu ñucanchicpash llaquinchic.
Maicanpash: "Ñuca Diosta llaquinimi" nishpallara, huauquita chicnishpa, llullaisiqui can. Pipash ricuric huauquita mana llaquishpa, mana ricuric Diosta ashtahuan mana llaquina ushancachu.
Jesucristo cai rurai nishcata ñucanchicman cushca: Diosta llaquic runa paipac huauquitapash llaquichan.
Pipash Jesus Mesiaspi inina charic Diospac churi can; Yayata llaquic rana tucui chai Yayapac churicunatapash llaquin.
Diosta llaquishpa, pai rimashcata pactachishpa, yachanchic ñucanchic Diospac churicunatapash llaquishcata.
Pai rurai nishcacunata uyanami Diosta llaquina can; pai rurai nishcacuna mana llashacchu canun,
Diospac churicuna tucuilla cai pachata yalliccuna cashcaraicu. Ñucanchic inina charishcamanta cai pachata yallina ushashcanchic.
Jesus Diospac Churi cashcata inic pachata yallin.
Jesucristo shamushca, yacuhuan, yahuarhuan ricuchish-ca saquirirca; mana yacullahuan, ranti yacuhuan yahuarhuan. Samaillata chai chashna cashcamanta ricuyac can, chai Samaica shuti can.
Quimsa ricuyaccunami tiyanun:
Samai, Yacu, Yahuar; quimsantin chai yuyaillata charinun.
Runacuna ricuyashcata uyanchic, ranti Dios ricuyashca tucuimanta ashta-huan yalli can, Dios paipac Churimanta ricuyac cashcaraicu.
Maicanpash Diospac Churipi inic quiquin paipac shuncupi chai ricuyashcata apaicachan; Diosta mana inic Dios llullami can rimacun, Dios paipac Churimanta ricuyashcata mana inish-caraicu.
Dios ñucanchicman huiñai causaita cushcamanta ri-cuyacmi can, chai causai paipac Churipi tiyan.
Diospac Churita charic runa chai causaitapash charin; ranti Diospac Churita mana charic chai causaita mana charinchu.
Diospac Churipi inic cashcamantami cancunata caita quillcani, cancana huiñai causaita charishcata yachancapac.
Diospi ñucanchic yuyaita churashcanchic, imatapash pai manashca shina ñucanchic mañacpi, pai uyana cashcaraicu.
Yachanchic Dios paihuan rimarishcapi ñucanchicta uyashca-ta, paiman mañashcata ña cui tucushcatapash yachanchic.

Pipash shuc huauquita mana huañuiman pushac juchata ruracucta ricushpa, Dios-huan pairaicu rimarina can, huauquiman causaita Dios cuncami, mana huañuiman pushac jucha cacpi. Huañuiman pushac jucha tiyanmi, chai jucharaicu Dios—huan rimarinami chaita shuti mana rimanichu.
Tucui mana alli rurashca jucha can; shinapash, mana huañuiman pushac jucha tiyan.
Diosta Yayachishpa causac mana juchallm, Diospac Churi paita ricushcaraicu, supaica paita mana urmachina ushan.
Ñucanchic Diospac cashcata yachanchic, tucui pacha supaipac maquipi cashcatapash.

Diospac Churi shamush-catapash yachanchic, pai quiquin Diosta ricsincapac yuyaita ñucanchicman cushca. Quiquinman llutarishca causanchic, nic-pi, paipac Churi Jesucristoman. Caimi quiquin Dios huiñai causaipash can.
Huahuashitucuna, llulla dioscunamanta yuyapanquichic.
Ñuca, Rucu, cai quillcata Dios acllashca iniccunaman quillcani; paicunata shutipachami llaquini; mana ñucalla tucui shuti cashcata ricsiccanapash paicunata llaquinun.
Cancunata llaquini shuti cashcata ñucanchic shuncupi charishcaraicu, pai ñucanchicpi huiñaimi tiyanca.
Dios Yaya Yayapac Churi Jesucristopash, paicunapac cuyaita tallichinuchun llaquina charinatapash, ganas causaita, shuti cashcapi, llaquinapipash cancunaman cunuchun.
Achcatami cushiyahscani canpac churicunamanta mai-cancuna, Dios munashca shina shuti cashcapi causacushcarai-cu.
Cunan, llaquishca huauquicuna, ñucanchicpura llaquinacushun, cancunata nmi. Cai cancunaman quillcashca mana mushu rurai nishcachu can, callarishcapi cancuna chasquishcallatami can.
Dios rurai nishcata rurashpa causanami llaquinacana uyarin; cancuna callarishcamanta uyashca, Dios rurai nishcaca caimi: ñucanchicpura llaquina-cushpa causana canchic.
Cai pachapi achca umachiccuna tiyanun, paicuna Jesucristo cai pachaman quiquin rana shina shamushcata mana imnun. Chai laya runa umachisiqui runa can, Cristota chicnic can.
Yuyanquichic, cancuna ñaupac rurashca ama yanca tucucun, cancuna cuyai tucunata illacta japina munashpa.
Maicanpash Cristo yachachishcamanta ashtahuan yallinayashpa, chai runa Diosta mana charinchu; ranti yachachishcallapi catic runa, Yayata Churitapash charin.
Pipash cancunata ricunca rishcapi, cai yachachinata mana apacpi, cancuna huasipi ama chasquinquichicchu, paita ama saluranquichicchu;
maicanpash paita salurac runa, mana alli ruranapi paita yanapacun.
Cancunata achca rimanata charini, shinapash mana quillcapi rimanayanichu. Cancunata ricucrisha yuyani cancunahuan jinu rimarincapac, ñucanchic cushiyai pactarishca cancapac.
Canpac acllashca ñañapac churicuna cancunata yuyarinumi.
Ñuca, Rucu, alli shutipacha ñuca llaquishca mashi Gayota cai pancata quillcani.
Llaquishca huauqui, Diosta mañani, can Diosta catinapi alli rirashca shina, chashnallata tucuipi alli catichun nishpa, ama ansapash uncushpa.
Yapa cushiyarcani shuc huauquicuna shamushpa, can shuti cashcapi mana pantashpa caticushcata rimahuanucpi uyashpa.
Ñuca churicuna shuti cashcapi caticushcata yachashpa, tucui imamantapash yalli cushiyachihuan.
Llaquishca huauqui, can imatapash huauquicanaraicu rurashcapi mana pantashcahuan rurashpa caticunqui; paicuna chicanmanta runacuna cacpipash.
Can yanapashcamanta tucui iniccuna ñaupacpi rimai tiyashca. Diosmanta yanapai mañani; paicuna rirashcapi catina ushancapac paicuna mutsushcata cuilla, Dios munashca shina.
Jesucristota yanapanaraicu purincapac callarinushca, Diosta mana ricsiccunamanta mana shuc yanapaita chasquina munanushcachu.
Chairaicu ñucanchic paicunata ricuna tucunchic, shuti shimi yachachinapi paicanata yanapancapac.
Shuc pancata miccunaman quillcarcani, ranti Diótrefes ñucanchicta mana uyana munan, pailla amu causasha yuyashcaraicu.

Chairaicu, rishpa imaca, pai rurashcamanta rimanami cani, ñucanchicmanta llullashpa, camishpa purin. Chaihuan mana cushiyashpa, chaiman pactac huauquicunata mana chasquinchu, pipash paicunata chasquina manacpi, mana chasquichin, iniccuna ucumantapash paicanata callpachin.
Llaquishca huauqui, mana alli rurashcacunata ama catinquichu, ashtahuan alli rurashcacunata catinqui. Alli cashcata rurac Diospac runa can, ranti mana alli cashcata rurac Diosta mana ricushcachu.
Tucuicuna Demetriomanta alli rimanun; chai shuti can; ñucanchicpash pai allimi can ninchic, can ñucanchic shuti rimashcata yachanqui.
Canta achca rimana charircani, ranti quillcapi mana rimanayanichu;
utcallami canta ricusha yuyani canhuan jinu rimarincapac.
Ganas causai canpi tiyachun. Mashicuna canta yuyarinunmi. Caita mañani, ñucanchic yuyarishcata caran mashiman rimapai.
Ñuca, Judas, Jesucristopac runa, Santiagopac huauqui, Dios Yaya llaquishpa cayashcacunamanmi cai pancata quillcani, paicuna Jesucristo ricucushcacuna canun.
Achca Dios cancunamanta llaquirishcata, ganas causaita llaquinata-pash chasquichic.

Llaquishca huauquicuna, cancuna ñucapash charishca quishpinamantami achcata munashcani cancunata quillcanca-pac; ranti cunanca, Diospac runacanata shuc cutilla huiñaipac cushca ininapi sinchicuichic rimancapac quillcana tucuni.

Umachishcahuan maican runacuna cancuna ucupi yaicunushca, chai runacuna Dios quillcashca shimipi unaimanta huañuncapaC cautsayachishca canurca. Millai runacuna canan, chairaicu ñucanchic Diosmanta chasquishca cuyaihuan millaipac causanun, chairapash, shuclla Amu Apunchic Jesucristota mana chasquinun.
Cancuna ña yachacllapita, cancunata yuyachinayani Apunchic, Israel runacunata Egiptomanta llucshichishca huasha, ima shina mana iniccunata chincachirca.
Chash-nallata angelcunatapash, paicuna tiyanata jichushpa chican-yashcaraicu, puchucai pancha taripanapac huacaichishca charin yana, mana tucuric chunta curralpi.

Chai angelcuna shinallata Sodoma, Gomorra, mayanta tiyac llactacunantin, yumashpa yapa juchallinurca, manchaipac juchacunata rurashpa causanurca. Chairaicu mana tucuric ninahuan ñacachi tucunurca Tucuicana ricuncapac.
Chairapash, chai ranacuna nuspa causaipi catishpa, paicuna aichata ticllayachinun, Apunchicta mana uyana munanun, angelcunata millaipac shimicunahuan piñanan.
Arcangel Miguel jinu, Moisespac aichata mitsanacushpa supaihuan macanacushcapi, mana piñashcahuan paita cautsayachircachu, cashnalla paita nirca: "Apunchic canta rimachun".
Ranti chai runacuna mana alli ricsishca imacunamantapash mana alli shimita rimanun; ranti paicana huihuacuna shina yuyai illac ricsishcata, paicunallata huacllichincapac charinun.
¡Supaicuna! Cain rurashcata catinun. Balaan shina, cullquiraicu pantanushca; Coré shina, piñarishcamanta huañumm.

Cancuna huauquipura llaquinacushpa raimishca-pi, pincaipac canun, paicuna chaipi cushiyashcahuan micunun, upianan, mana ansa yupaichanata charishpa. Quiquinllata ricuc michic canan. Huaira maimanpash tancacushca yacu illac puyu canun. Pai aparinapi mana muyuyuc yura canun, ishcai cuti huañushca, sapintin surcushcacuna.
Sinchi jatarishca ñucñu yacu bacu canun, paicuna pincaipac rurashcata puscuta shina shitanun. Ñanmanta anchurishca cuillur canun, quiquin yana tutapi huiñai causancapac churashca canun.
Adan huasha canchis niqui Rucu yaya Enocpash cai shimicunata chai runacunamanta rimarca: "Apunchicta ricurcani, huaranca huaranca angelcanahuan shamucpi

tucui runata taripancapac, tucui millai runacunatapash cautsayachincapac, paicuna millaimanta mana allita rurashcaraicu, paicuna millai juchasapa ranacuna cashpa paita mana alli shimicunahuan piñashcaraicu".
Paicana causaihuan mana cushi canun, tucuimanta caminan, paicuna aicha munashcallata rurashpa cushiyaita charinun. Sumac shimita rimac canun, runacunata umachishpa paicanaraicu cullquiyancapac.
Ranti cancuna, llaquishca huauquicuna, yuyarichic Apunchic Jesucristopac apostolcuna
caita cancunaman rimashcata: "Puchucai pachacunapi asisiqui runacunami tiyanunca, mana alli munaicunallata rurashpami paicuna causanunca".
Chaicunami runacunata chausichic canun; paicuna aicha mañashcatallata catinan, mana charinan Diospac Samaita.
Ranti cancuna, llaquishca huauquicuna, sumac inina charishcapi sinchicushpa causaichic.
Diospac llaquinapi causaichic, Apanchic Jesucristo pai ñucanchiraicu llaquirishpa, huiñai causaita ñucanchicman cuna punchata chapashpa.
Mana shuclla yuyaipi sinchicushpa causaccunamanta llaquirina canquichic.

Ninamanta surcushpa shuccanata quishpichichic, chaishuccunamanta llaquirichic; ranti paicuna-manta yuyanquichic, paicana churanantin millaichic, mana alli causashcamanta ticllayachishca charishcaraicu.
Ñucanchita Quishpichic, shuclla Dios pailla ushaita charin ñucanchicta juchallinamanta quishpichincapac, pai quiquin jatunyashca ñaupacpi ñucanchicta cushi, mana ticllayuc ricuchinata ushan.
Shuclla Diosta, Cristo Jesus Apunchicraicu quishpichicta, jatunyana, jahuayana, ushai, apu cana paipac cachun, tucui pachamanta ñaupac cunan, huiñaipash. Chashna cachun.
i Caimi Dios Jesucrisrota ricsichishca, pai paita yanapaccunata tucunca rashcata ricsichincapac. Jesucristo paipac angelta cachamushpa paita yanapac Juanta ricsichishca,
pai tucui pai ricushcamanta shutita riman, ricuyacpash pai can Diospac shimimanta, Jesucristo sinchicuchishca shimimanta.
Cai quillcata ricuc cai Diosmanta chasquishca shimita Catishpa uyachishcata uyaccuna cushiyanuchan, caipi quillcash-cata uyaccanapash, ña paipac pacha pactacushcaraicu.

Ñuca Juan, Asia suyupi canchis iglesiacanaman quillcani. Cacmanta, cashcamanta, shamunca racmanta cuyaita, alli causaita chasquichic, pai tiyashca ñaupacpi tiyac canchis samaicunamantapash chasquichic,

Jesucristomantapash, pai shuti rimac ricuyac can, pai tucuicunamanta ñaupac huañushcamanta causarirca, cai pachamanta yallipash can. Cristo ñucanchicta llaquin, paipac yahuarta tallichishpa ñucanchic juchacunamanta quishpichishca;
chashna ñucan-chic paipac runacuna tucushcanchic; paipac Dios Yayata yanapac pacriyayacunata ñucanchicta rurashca. ¡Jatunyana, ushai huiñai paipac canuchun! Chashan cachan.
¡Cristo puyu ucupi shaman!, ¡ricuichic! Tucuicunami ricununca, paita tucsiccunapash, cai pachamanta tucui runacunami llaquirishpa pairaicu huacanunca. Ari. Chashnami canca.
"Ñucami Alfa Omegapash cam", Apanchic riman, pai tucuita ushac Dios, canan cac, ñaupa cac, shamanca racuc.

Ñuca, Juan, cancunapac huauqui cani, ñuca Jesus—huan llutarishca cashcaraicu cancunahuan Diospac pachapi causani, llaquicunapi, llaqui tiyashcapi sinchicuna ushaita charini. Patmos shutiyuc islapi carcani Jesus sinchicuchishca Diospac shimita huillashcaraicu.
Shuc domingo samai ñucamanta amuyarca; chashnapi shuc sinchi shimita ñuca huashaman uyarcani, trompeta uyarishca shina sinchi shimi,

pai rimahuacurca: "Can ricushcata shuc pancapi quillcai, Asia suyupi tiyac canchis iglesiacunaman chaicunata cachai: Efesoman, Esmimaman, Pergamoman, Tiatiraman, Sardisman, Filadelfiaman, Laodiceaman.
Chai uyaricuc shimi pipacta can nishpa ricuncapac huashaman ticrashpa ricurcani; ticrashpa ricushcapi canchis curimanta candelabro nishcacunata ricurcani,
chaupi candelabrocuna ucupi shuc runa shinata ricurcani, chaquicama churanahuan churarishca, pechopi shuc curimanta chunpihuan huatarishca.
Paipac accha millma shina yurac carca, alli nicpi, rasu shina yurac; paipac ñahuicanaca japirac nina shina canurca.
Paipac chaquicuna chiuclla llanpushca anta shina sinchi ninapi apiyachishca shina carca, pai rimashca shuc paccha shina sinchi uyaric carca.
Paipac yachac maquipi canchis cuillurcunata charirca; paipac shimimanta shuc ñañu ishcai manñayuc mircanu llucshicurca. Paipac ñahui inti sinchi rupachicushcapi ricurishca shina carca.
Paita ricushpa, paipac chaquipi huañushca shina urmarcani. Ranti pai, paipac yachac maquita ñucapi churashpa, rimahuarca: "Ama manchaichu; ñucami tucuimanta ñaupa, tucuimanta huasha cani,
cunan causacucmi cani. Huañushca carcani, ranti cunanca huiñaipac causani. Ñucami huañui pachamanta llavecanata charini.
Can ricushcata quillcai: cunan tiyashcata huasha tiyanca racushcatapash.

Caimi ñuca yachac maquipi can ricushca canchis cuillurcanapi pacashca tiyac can, curimanta canchis candelabrocunapipash: canchis cuillurcuna canchis iglesiacunapi tiyac angelcunata ricuchiranun, canchis candelabrocunaca canchis iglesiacunata ricuchiranun.
"Efesopi tiyac iglesiamanta angelta quillcai: 'Paipac yachac maquipi canchis cuillurcanata charic, curimanta canchis candelabro ucupi puric caitami riman:

Tucui can rashcata yachanimi; canpac sinchi llancanata, can sinchicushpa catishcata yachanimi; yachani can millai runacunata mana ricuna ushashcata. Yachanimi can, mana apostol cashpallata apostolmi canchic rimaccunata camashpa, paicunata llullaipi tupashcata.
Sinchicushpa catishcanqui, ñucaraicu achcata ñacarishcanqui, mana sanpayashpa.
Ranti caipi pantacunqui; callaripi charishca llaquinata ña mana charinqui.
Chairaicu, ricui imapi pantacushcata, Diosman ticrai, can callaripi rurashcata cutillata rurai. Mana cacpi, mana can alliman ticracpi, canpac candelabrota pai shayashcamanta anchuchisha-mi.
Chashna cacllapita, canpac allipac nicolaitacunapac causaita chicninqui ñuca chicnishca shinallata.
Rinriyuc uyachun iglesiacunaman Diospac Samai rimashcata: Ñucami atic ranacunata Diospac jahua pachapi shayac causaita cuc yuramanta carasha'.
"Esmirnapi tiyac iglesiamanta angeltapash quillcai: 'Tu-cuimanta ñaupa, tacuimanta huasha, huanushca cac, cutillata causarishca, Caitami riman:

Ricsiuimi can ñacarishcata, can llushti cashcatapash; alli nicpi, tucuitami can charinqui. Judio-mi canchic rimaccuna canmanta mana alli rimashcata yachanimi, paicunaca mana imapash canunchu, supai tantachishcami canun.

Can ñacarmca racushcamanta ama manchaichu, can-canamanta maicancanata chunta curralpi churanca ranan, tucui cancuna camai tucushca cancapac; ansa punchacuna cancana ñacarina tucunca ranquichic. Huañunacama sinchicui, ranti ñuca shuc cuyaita shina canman causaita cusha.
¡Rinriyuc Samai iglesiacunaman rimashcata uyachun! AtiCcuna mana an-sapash ñacarinuncachu cuti huañui pactamushcapi'.
"Pergamomanta iglesiamanta angeltapash quillcai: 'Caitami ñañu ishcai manñayuc mircanuta charic riman:

Ñuca yachani can supai amu paipac tiyarinata charishcapi causacushcata; shina cacllapita ñucahuan caticunqui. Ñucapi ininata mana saquishcanquichu, ñucapac cusca ricuyac Antipasta, Supai causana llactapi huañuchishcapipash, ininata mana saquircanquichu.

Ranti caicunapi can pantacunqui: Balaam yachachishcata catic maicancuna canpac ucupi tiyanun; pai Balacta israelitacunata juchallichincapac, huacacunaman camaripi ricuchishca aichata micushpa, camachirca, yumashpa juchallishcahuanpash.
Chashnallata, maicancanata nicolaita-cuna yachachishcamanta mana chincayana munaccunata charinqui.
Chairaicu, Diosman ticrai; mana cacpi, ñallami canpacman risha; chaipi ñuca shimimanta llucshic mircanu-huanmi paicunahuan macanacusha.

Rmriyuc uyachun Samai iglesiacunaman rimashcata:Aticcanata pacashca tiyac "mana" nishcamanta paicunata carashca; shuc yurac rumitapash paicunata cushami, chaipi shuc mushu shuti quillcashca tiyan; chasquicllami ricsin, shuccunaca mana'.
"Tiatirapi tiyac iglesiamanta angeltapash quillcai: 'Caitami Diospac Churi riman, ñahuita japirac nina shina charic, chaquicunata llanpushca anta shina charic:
Tucui can rurashcata yachani; can llaquishcata, canpac inina, canpac yanapai, can mana sanpayashpa caticushcata yachanimi; callarishcapi rurashcamanta canan ashtahuan yalli ruracushcata yachanimi.

Ranti caimanta canta rimana munani: canpacpi chasquinqui chai Jezabel shutiyuc huarmita, pai Diospacraicu-mi rimani rimashpallata, pai yachachishcahuanca ñucata yanapaccunata umachin, yumashpa juchallinapi urmachispa, huacacunaman camaripi ricuchishca micunacanata micuchish-pa.
Diosman ticrana tuputa chapani; ranti pai mana munashcachu, mana saquishcachu yumashpa juchallinata.
Chairaicu cunan paita sinchi uncuchinca rani, paihuan crusta paquiccunata sinchi ñacachinahuanmi camanca rani, paicuna mana alli rurashcamanta mana nanaricpi chaipash.
Pai charishca churicunata huañuchishami; chashnami tucui iglesiacuna mai shuncu cuchuta, mai yuyai cuchucunata ñuca ricsishcata yachanunca; cancunatapash caran amu rurashca tuputami cusha.
Rami cancunata, Tiatirapi causac cashpalla-ta mana chai yachaita caticcunata, mana ricsinushcapash paicuna Supaipac pacara jatun yachaicuna nishcatapash, paicunaman mana ima ñacarina tiyancachu;
ranti cancana charishcata mana chincachina canquichic ñuca shamunacama.
Aticcunaman, causaicama ñuca munashcata ruraccunaman, llactacunapac apu tucuna ushaitami cusha,

sinchi maquihuanmi paicunata pushananca, mancallpamanta rurashca mucahuata shinami paicunata paquinunca, ñuca rurashca shina, ñuca Yayamanta ushaita chasquishcaraicu. Tutamanta ricuric cuillurtapash paiman cushami.
Rmriyuc cai Samai iglesiacunaman cushca shimita uyachan'.

"Sardispi tiyac iglesiamanta angeltapash quillcai: 'Diospac canchis samaicunata, canchis cuillurcunata charicmi caita riman: Tucui can rascata yachanimi, ricurincapacca causac canqui, shina cashpallata huañushca canqui.
Ricchari, canpi chaira mana huañushcata causachi; ricushcanimi can rurashcacuna ñuca Diospac ñaupacpi chaira mana pacta cashcata.
Chashnamanta, canta yachachishcamanta yuyarish-pa, paita catishpa Diosman ticrai. Can mana ñahuita pascashpa causacpica, can cuncailla tiyashcapi, shuc shuhuac runa shinami canpacman pactasha.
Shinapash, Sardispi churana mana mapayachic runacuna ansashitu tiyan; paicuna ñucahuan yuraclla churarishca purinca ranun, chashna cuyai tucuna cashcaraicu.

Aticcana chashna yurac churanahuan churachish-cami canunca, paicunapac shutitapash mana anchuchishachu causaita cuc quillcamanta; ashtahuan ñuca Yayapac ñaupacpi paipac angelcunapac ñaupacpipash paipac shutita rimashami.
¡Rinrita charic Samai iglesiacunaman rimashcata uyachun!'.

"Piladelfiapi tiyac iglesiamanta angeltapash quillcai: 'Santo, shuti cac, Jatun Curaca Davidpac llaveta charic, pai pascacpi mana pipash huichcana ushacushca, pai huichcacpi mana pipash pascana ushacushca, caita riman:
Tucui can rashcata yachanimi; ricui, canpac ñaupacpi pascara pancuta churashcam; chaita mana pipash huichcana ushan; mana sinchi cashpapash, ñuca shimita uyashcanqui, ñucamanta mana chicanyashcanqui.
Ñucami, Supaipac ranacuna, llullaisiqui, judiomi canchic nishpallata mana caccuna, canpac chaquipi cuncurichisha, ñuca canta llaquishcata paicuna yachancapac.
Mana sanpayashpa can ñuca shimita huacaichishcaraicu, canta ñuca quishpichishami tucui cai pacha camai tucuna pactashcapi.
Ñami shamuni. Can charishcata huacaichi, can charishca cuyaita ama pipash quichancapac.

Aticcanata ñuca Diospac huasipi columna nishcata rurashpa shayachisha, huiñaimi chaipi causanunca; paicunapimi ñuca Diospac shutita, ñuca Diospac llactapac shutitapash quillcasha, ñuca Diospac jahua pachamanta shamuc mushu Jerusalen; ñuca mushu shutitapash paicunapi quincashami.
¡Rinrita charic Samai iglesiacanaman rimashcata uyachan!'.
"Laodiceapi tiyac iglesiamanta angeltapash quillcai: 'Caitami shuti cac riman, mana llullashpa rimac ricuyac, tucui Dios rurashcapac amu.
Tucui can rurashcata yachani. Mana rupac canqui mana chiri canqui. ¡Chiri, rupac cashpa chari ashtahuan alli canquiman!
Ranti ansa cunuclla, mana chiri mana rupac cashcaraicu, ñuca shimimanta cuinashcanquimi.

Can tucuita charicmi cani rimanqui, huacaichishca achcami tiyahuan, mana imapash pishihuanchu ninqui; mana atipanqui canllata llaquipac cashcata, pipash canta ricushpa llaquiripac, tsuntsu, ñausa, llushti canqui.

Cai ñuca shimita uyai: ninapi chuyayachishca curita rantihuai, alli shuti pacha canta ama imapash pishincapac; shuc yurac churanatapash churarishpa can pincaipac llushtiyashcata quillpancapac, ñahui janpitapash, ñahuipi jahuirishpa ricuna ushancapac.
Ñucaca piñanimi, camachinimi ñuca llaquishcacunata. Chairaicu sinchicushpa cuti Diosman ticrai.
Ricui, puncupi cayacuni; maicanpash ñuca shimita uyashpa pascapi, paipac huasipi yaicushpa ishcantinpurami micushun.
Aticcunata ñuca tiyarinapimi paicunatapash tiyachisha, ñuca tiyarishca shina, ñuca yallishcapi, ñucapash ñuca Yayapac tiyarinapi tiyarircani, paipac mayanpi.
¡Rinrita charic, Samai iglesiacunaman rimashcata uyachun.!".
Chai huasha, chaipi jahua pachapi shuc puncu pascara ricurirca; ñaupa trompeta shina uyaric shimi cuti rimahuarca: —Caiman sicamui, ricuchishcanqui huasha tucunca rashcata—.
Chaillapita Samai amuyahuarca, jahua pachapi shuc tiyarina churashcata ricurcani, chai tiyarinapi shuc runa tiyacurca.
Tiyarinapi tiyacuc jaspemanta shina, granatemanta shina ricuric carca; chai tiyarina luyucta shuc cuichi esmeralda shina llinpiyac tiyarca;
chai tiyarina luyuctapash ishcai chunca chuscu tiyarinacunata ricurcani, chaicunapi ishcai chunca chuscu rucucuna tiyaranurca: yurac churarishca canurca, umapica curimanta llaututa charinurca.
Tiyarinamanta llinpiyashca, sinchi uyarishcacuna, tulupushcacuna llucshira-nurca; tiyarina ñaupacpi canchis achiccuna japirayanun, paicuna Diospac canchis samaicuna canun.
Chai tiyarina ñaupacpi tiyarca shuc ñucñu yacu shina ricuric, cristal shina chuya. Chaupi panpapi, tiyarina cashcapi, paipac mayanta, chuscu huihuacuna ñaupacman huashaman ñahuiyuccuna tiyanurca.
Ñaupacpi ricuric huihua puma shina ricuric carca; shucca cari huacra shina ricuric carca; chaishucca rana ñahuita charirca, puchucaica huanpurac huamani shina ricuric carca.

Paicanamanta caranlla sucta ricrata charinurca, jahuamanta ucumanta ñahuiyuccuna. Tutantin punchantin caita rimanata mana saquinunchu: '¡Santo, santo, santomi tucuita ushac Apunchic can, cac, cashca, shamanca rac!".
Chai chuscu huihuacuna caran caparishcapi "jatunyana, jahuanyana, cuyai tiyarinapi tiyacucpac, huiñai causacpac cachun" nishpa,
ishcai chunca chuscu rucucuna tiyarinapi tiyacucpac ñaupacpi paita chacchashpa cuncurinun. Paicunpac llaututa tiyarina ñaupacpi shitashpa rimanun:
"Apunchic Dios. Canlla cuyai, jatunyachish, jahuayachish tucana canqui, ushaitapash charinqui; can tucui tiyashcacunata rurashcaraicu can munashcaricu tiyanun, can paicanata rurashcanqui".
Tiyarinapi tiyacucpac yachac maquipi shuc pillu-chishca pancapi ucumanta canchamantapash quillcarayuc- ta ricurcani, cnachis sellocunahuan quillpashca carca.
Shuc ushayuc angel sinchi shimihuan tapucucta ricurcani: —¿Maicanmi sellocunata lliquishpa pilluchishca pancata pascana ushac tiyancachu?—
Ranti jahua pachapi, cai allpapi allpa ucupipash mana pipash tiyarcachu pilluchishca pancata pascashpa ricuna ushac.
Ñucaca yapa huacacurcani, pilluchishca pancata pascashpa, ricuna ushac mana tiyascaraicu.

Ranti rucucunamanta shuc rimahuarca: —Ama ashtahuan huacaichu, Judapac aillumanta puma, Jatun Curaca Davidpc churi, atishcami, pai pilluchishca pancata pascana ushan, sellocunatapash lliquina ushanmi.

Chashnapi, tiyarinahuan huihuacuna chaupipi, rucucuna chaupipi, shuc Corderota ricurcani. Shayacurca, huañuchishca shina ricurishpallata. Canchis cachuyuc, canchis ñahuiyuc carca, paicuna tucui pachaman Dios cachashca canchis samaicuna canun.
Chai Cordero rishpa tiyarinapi tiyacucpac yachac maquimanta pilluchishca quillcata japirca;

pai chai pilluchishca quillcata japishca shina, chuscu huihuacuna, ishcai chunca rucucanantin Corderopac ñaupacpi cuncurmurca. Tucui paicuna arpata charinurca; charinurcapash curimanta mucahuacuna sumiriuhuan juntachishca; chaicuna Diospac runacana Dios—huan rimarishca canun.

Cai mushu taquinata taquirananca: "Canllami pilluchishca quillcata japina ushanqui, paipac sellocanatapash lliquina ushanqui, camaripi huañuchishca cashpa; canpac yahuarta tallichishpa Diospacta rantircanqui tucui laya rana, tucui laya shimiyuc maipi causac, tucui laya llactacunata.
Paicunata Diospac mnacunata rurarcanqui, ñucanchic Diospac pacriyayacanata rurarcanqui paicanaca cai pachapac amumi canunca".
Huasha ricucpi, achca angelcanapac shimita tiyarina mayanpi, huihuacunapac, mayanpi caccunata uyarcani. Junu junu paicana jantaranurca,
cashna sinchi rimaranurca: "Camaripi huañuchishca Cordero pailla chasquina ushan ushaita, tucui charinata yachai, jahuayachina, jatunyachina, chacchana".

Jahua pachapi tiyac, allpapi tiyac, allpa ucupi tiyac, ñucñu yacupi tiyac Dios rurashca tucui imacuna cashna rimaranurca: "Tiyarmapi tiyacucta Corderotapash, huiñai huiñai chacchana, jatanyana, jahuayana, ushai cushca cachan".
Chuscantin huihuacuna "Chashna cachun" cutipara-nurca. Chuscu chunca chuscu rucucunaca cuncurishpa chacchanurca.
Chai huasha ricurcani ima shina Cordero canchismanta sellocanata shucta lliquirca; chaipi uyarcani chai chuscu huihuacunamanta shuc caita rimarca tulupushca shina shimihuan: —Shamui.
Ricushpa ricurcani shuc yurac caballota, paipac jahuapi tiyacuc shuc ballestata maquipi charirca. Paita shuc llaututa cunurca, atishpa atincapac llucshirca.
Cordero ishcai niqui sellota lliquishcapi, ishcai niqui huihua rimashcata uyarcani: —ShamuL

Chaipi shuc caballo llucshirca. Chaica puca carca, paipac jahuapi cac cai pachamanta alli causaita anchuchincapac ushaita chasquirca, runacuna paicunapura huañuchinacuncapac; paita shuc shuc jatun mircanuta cunurca.

Cordero quimsa niqui sellota lliquishcapi, quimsa niqui huihua caita rimashcata uyarcani: —Shamui. Ricushcapi, shuc yana caballota ricurcani, paipac jahuapi tiyacuc shuc llashai camanata maquipi charirca.

Chuscu huihua ucumanta cai shimi rimashca uyarcani: "Shuc kilo trigolla shuc pancha llancashcamanta, chashnallata quimsa kilo cebadalla shuc pancha llancashcamanta; ranti yancamanta ama jichanquichicchu huirata vinotapash".
Cordero chuscu niqui sellota lliquishcapi, chuscu niqui huihua caita rimashcata uyarcani: —Shamui.

Ricushcapi ricurcani shuc quilluric caballota, paipac jahuapi tiyacucca Huañui shutiyuc carca. Paipac huashalla huañui pachamanta shamucta ricurcani, paicuna chaupi pachamanta chaupi pachapi ushaita cui tucunurca, macanacu-chishpa huañuchincapac, yaricaicunahuan, uncuicanahuan, cai allpapi tiyac pumacunahuan huañuchincapac.
Cordero pichca niqui sellota lliquishcapi, Diospac shimita yachachishcamanta huañushcacunata altar ucupi ricurcani.
Caparishparimaranurca: —Tucuimanta yalli santo, cusca, allpamanta runacanata taripana punchata chapaimanta aminchicmi; ñucanchicta hua-ñuchishcamanta ñacachinatapash chapaimantami aminchic.
Chaipi yurac churanacunata paicunaman cunurca, chai-ra ansata samaichic rimai tucunurca, Cristota yanapashcamanta huañuchi tucuccanapac huauquicunapac tuputa pactachinacama.
Cordero sucta niqui sellota lliquishcapi, ricurcani, shuc jatun allpa cuyurina tiyarca. Inti yana tucurca, llaquirishbcapi churarishca churana shina; quilla, puca yahuar shina tucurca,
cuillurcunaca jahua pachamanta allpaman urmanurca, llullu higo muyucunapaipac yuramanta sinchi huairahuan urmashca shina.
Quillca panca pilluchishca shina jahua pacha chincarirca, tucui urcucuna islacunapash paicuna shayashca-manta chicanman cuyuchi tucunurca.
Cai pachamanta apucuna allpa jutcucunapi, rumi ucucanapi miticanurca, jatun apucunantin soldado apucanantm achcata chariccunantin, ushai chariccunantin, tucui huataracunantin quishpiracunantinpash;
paicuna rimanurca rumicunata urcucanatapash: —Ñucanchic jahuapi urmashpa pacaichic ñucanchicta tiyarinapi tiyacucpac ñahuimanta, Cordcropac piñarimantapash.
Ñacarina puncha pactarishcaraicu, ¿maicanllaca ñacarinata aparina ushancachu?.

Chaita ricushca huasha, chuscu cuscacunapi chuscu shayac angelcunata ricurcani, paicuna chuscu huairacanata jarcaranurca ama allpapi huairancapac, ama ñucñu yacupi huairancapac, ama maican yurapipash huairancapac.

Ricurcanipash shuc angel inti llucshinamanta shamucta, causac Diospac sellota pai charirca. Chai angel sinchi shimihuan caparirca chaishuc chuscu cai allpata ñucñu yacantin huacllichina ushaita chasquiccanata:
—Allpata, ñucñu yacuta yuracunatapash ama huacllichichicchu, ñucanchic Diospac runacunata paicunapac Irentepi chaira mana churashca cashpa.
Mashna jahuishcacuna cashcata yacharcani: shuc patsac chuscu chunca chuscu huaranca tucui IsraeI aillucunamanta.
Judapac aillucunamanta chunca ishcai huaranca jahui tucunurca, chunca ishcai huaranca Rubenpac aillumanta, chunca ishcai huaranca Gadpac aillumanta,
chunca ishcai huaranca Aserpac aillumanta, chanca ishcai huaranca Neftalipac aillumanta, chunca ishcai huaranca Manasespac aillumanta,
chunca ishcai huaranca Simeonpac aillumanta, chuncaishcai huaranca Levipac aillumanta, chunca ishcai huaranca Isacarpac aillumanta,
chunca ishcai huaranca Zabulonpac aillumanta, chunca ishcai huaranca Josepac aillumanta, chunca ishcai huaranca Benjammpac aillumanta.

Chai huasha ricurcani, achca runa tucui mama-llactacunamanta, tucui laya runacuna, tucui laya shimi, tucui laya llactacunamanta. Tiyarina ñaupacpi, Cordero ñaupacpi shayaranurca, manapi yupaipac achca canurca. Yurac churarish-ca canurca, maquipi chanta pancata aparanurca.
Tucui sinchi shimihuan capariranurca: —Atina tiyarinapi tiyacuc ñucanchic Diospacmi Corderopacpashmi can.
Tucui angelcuna tiyarina luyucta, rucucuna, chuscu huihuacana luyucta shayaranurca; tiyarina ñaupacpi frentehuan allpapi tacarinacama patarinurca, Diosta chacchanurca
rimashpa: —¡Chashna cachun! Chacchana, jatunyana, yachai, pacrachuna, jahuayachina, ushai, sinchi cana ñucanchic Diosman cushca cachun huiñai huiñai. ¡Chashna cachun!.
Chashnapi rucucunamanta shuc tapuhuarca: —¿Cai yurac churanahuan churarishcacuna picunami canun?, ¿paicuna maicanta shamushcata yachanquichu?.
—Canca yachanquimi apulla, paita cutiparcani. Paica rimahuarca: —Caicunami jatun ñacarinamanta shamuccuna canun, paicunami churanata maillashpa Corderopac yahuarpi yuracyachiccuna canun.
—Chairaicumi Diospac tiyarina ñaupacpi canun, tutantin punchantinmi paipac huasipi paita yanapanun. Tiyarinapi tiyacuc paicunata ricunca.
Yaricai, upianai ña mana ñacarmuncachu, intipash paicunata mana rupachincachu, rupaipash paicanata mana quillachincachu;
tiyarina chaupipi cac Cordero, ovejacunata shina ricucushcaraicu paimi causaita cuc pacchacunaman purichinca, Diosca tucui ñahui yacumanta paicanata pichanca.
Cordero pilluchishca quillcamanta canchis niqui sellota lliquishcapi, jahua pachapi ansata chunlla saquirirca.
Chai huasha Diospac ñaupacpi canchis angelcuna shayacucta ricurcani, canchis trompetacunata paicunaman cunurca.

Chai huasha shuc angel shamurca, shuc curi sumiriu rupachinahuan altar ñaupacpi shayarirca; paiman achca sumiriuta cunurca tiyarma ñaupacpi tiyac curimanta altarpi rupachincapac, tucui Diospac runacuna paiman mañashcacunata ricuchincapac.
Angelpac maquimanta llucshic sumiriu cushni Diospac ñaupacman sicarca, Diospac runacuna mañashcacunahuan pacta.

Chashnapi sumiriu rupachinata angel japirca, altarmanta nina puchucunata japirca; chaipi juntachishpa, tucui allpapi shitarca; chaipi tulupuna, llinpiyana, uyarishcacuna, shuc allpa cuyurina tiyanurca.
Canchis trompetayuc angelcuna uyachincapac allichiri-nurca.

Shuc angel paipac trompetata uyachirca, chashnapi rasu muyucana ninahuan yahuarhuan chapuchishca allpaman shitai tucunurca. Quimsapi raquishcamanta shuc raquishca allpa ruparca, paipi tiyac yuracunantin, tucui huailla quihuacunan-tin.

Ishcai niqui angel paipac trompetata uyachishcapi jatun urcu shina ricuric ninalla japichishca ñucñu yacupi shitai tucurca; chashnapiquimsapi raquishcamanta shuc raquishca ñucñu yacu yahuarlla tucurca.
Chashnapi ñucñu yacu quimsapi raquishcamanta shuc raquishcapi tucui ima causacpash huañunurca; chashnallata barcocunapash shuc raquishca huacllichishca saquirmurca.
Quimsa niqui angel paipac trompetata uyachishcapi, shuc jatun cuillur shuc nina shina japichishca; yacucuna, pacchacuna, quimsapi raquishcamanta, shuc raquishcapi urmarca.
Chai cuillur Ajenjo shutiyuc carca; yacucuna quimsapi raquishcamanta shuc raquishca jayac tucurca, chashna yacucuna jayac tucushcamanta achca ranacuna huañanurca.

Chuscu niqui angel paipac trompetata uyachishcapi, mti quimsapi raquishcamanta shuc raquishca huacllichi tucurca; chashnallata quilla quimsapi raquishcamanta, cuillurcunapash quimsapi raquishcamanta shuc raquishca huacllichi rucunurca. Chashna paicanapash quimsapi raquishcamanta shuc raquishca yana saquirirca, puncha tuta quimsapi raquishcamanta paicunamanta shuc raquishca mana ricuchinurca.

Chai huasha ricurcani, chaipi shuc huamani chaupi jahua pachapi huanpurashpasinchi shimihuan rimacurca: —Ai, ai, ai allpamanta runacuna, chai shuc quimsa angelcana trompetata uyachicpi, ima chari tucanunca.
Pichca niqui angeI paipac trompetata uyachirca, chashnapi shuc cuillur jahua pachamanta allpaman urmashcata ricurcani; paita huaicupi tiyac jitapac llaveta cunurca.
Huaicupi tiyac jitata pascashcapi, chaimanta shuc jatan ninamanta shina cushni llucshirca; chai jitamanta cushni intita huairatapash puyuyachirca.
Chai cushnimanta jiquicuna llucshishpa tacui allpapi chausirinurca; uputinticuna shina cana ushaita cui tucunurca.
Paicuna rimai tucunurca ama shuc quihuata, ama huailla ricuricta, ama shuc yurata huacllichincapac, frentepi Diospac sellota mana chariccunallata huacllichincapac rimai tucanurca.
Ranti runa huañuchincapac mana rimai tucunurca; paicuna nanachishca uputinti tucsishca shina nanaimi carca.
Chai punchacunapi runacuna huañuita mashcashpapash mana tarmuncachu; paicuna huañuita mashcacpipash, huañuica paicanamantachicauyancami.
Chai jiquicuna macanacuncapac allichishca shina canurca; paicanapac umapi shuc curi llautu shinata charinurca, paicunapac ñahuica runa shina ricuric canurca.
Huarmi acchata shina charinurca, paicunapac quiruca puma quiru shina.
Paicunapac aichaca jillaimanta rurashca churanahuan shinata chararishca, paicunapac ricra uyarishca achca carrocuna caballocuna aisashca macanacuipi yaicushca shina uyariccuna canurca.
Paicunapac chupacuna tucsina apariclla, uputinti chupa shina ricuric canurca, chai chupacunapi ushaita charinurca pichca quilla tuputa runacunata ñacachincapac.
Jiquicanata pushaccama, pai huaicumantaangel can, hebreo shimipi Abadón shutiyuc can, ranti griego shimipica Apolión can.
Ñaupa ñacari ña tucurirca; ranti chaira ishcai pishin.
Sucta niqui angel paipac trompetata uyachishcapi, Diospac ñaupacpi tiyac curimanta rurashca altarpi tiyac chuscu cachucunamanta shuc shimita uyarcani.
Chai shimi suCta niqui trompetata charic angelta rimarca: —Jatun Eufrates yacu mayanpi huatashca tiyac chuscu angelcunata cachari.

Chashnapi chai chuscu angelcuna cachari tucunurca, runacuna quimsapi raquishcamanta shuc raquishcata huañuchincapac; paicunaca chaipac chaparanurca, chai pachata, chai punchata, chai quillata, chai huatata.
Uyarcani caballopi cac soldadocuna ima tupu cashcata: ishcai patsacjanu canurca.

Chai nuspaipi chai caballocunata paicunapac jahuapi tiyaccunantin cashnami ricurcani: paicunapac jillaimanta churana mna shina ricuric, jacinto shina ancas, azufre shina quillu carca. Caballocanapac umaca puma uma shina canurca; shimimantaca nina, cushni, azufre shitaranurca.
Runacuna quimsapi raquishcamanta shuc raquishca cai quimsacanaraicu huañunurca, rimacpica, ninaraicu, cushniraicu, azufreraicu.
Caballocunaca huañuchina ushaita paicunapac shimipi charinan paicunapac chupapipash; paicanapac chupa machacui shinami canurca, umacanahuan huacllichic canurca.

Ranti puchuc runacuna, chai huañuicanahuan mana huañuccuna, paicana ñaupac mana alli rurashcata cunanpash ruranata mana saquinurcachu; curimanta, cullquimanta, antamanta, rumimanta, caspimanta, mana uyana ushac, mana ricuna ushac, mana purina ushac supaicunata huacacanatapash chacchanata mana saquinurcachu.
Huañuchinatapash mana saquinurcachu, sacracunatapash, yumashpa juchallinatapash, shuhuanatapash mana saquinurcachu.

Cuti shuc ushayuc angel jahua pachamanta puyupi uraicumucta ricurcani; umapi shuc cuichita charirca; paipac ñahui inti shina chiuclla carca; paipac chancacunaca nina jahuapi japirashca shina ricuric canurca.
Paipac maquipi shuc pascara quillcata charicurca; paipac yachac chaquita ñucñu yacu jahuapi churarca, lluquitaca allpa jahuapi.
Shuc puma piñarishpa caparishca shina caparirca; pai caparishcapi, canchis tuluncuna paicunapac quiquin shimita uyachinurca.
Canchis tuluncuna rimashca huasha, ñuca quillcanca rarcani; ranti chashnapi shuc jahua pachamanta shimi ñucaman rimashcata uyarcani: —Canchis tuluncuna rimashcata canlla huacaichi, ama quillcaichu.
Chashnapi ñuca ricushca ñucñu yacupi, allpapi shayacu angel, paipac yachac maquita jahua pachaman jatachishpa,
sinchi shimita rimarca huiñai causacraicu, jahua pacha, allpa, ñucñu yacu, tucui paicunapi tiyaccunata ruracraicu. Rimarca: —Ña chapana ashtahuan mana tiyancachu;
canchis niqui angel paipac trompetata uyachincapac callarishcapi, Dios pacashpa charishca yuyai ña pactarishcami canca, pai paita yanapac profetacanata rimashca shina.

Ñuca ñaupa uyashca shimi, jahua pachamanta uyaric shimi, cuti rimashpa, caita rimahuarca: —Rishpa japi pascara quillca pancashituta chai ñucñu yacupi, allpapi shayacuc angel paipac maquipi charicushcata.
Angelpacman rishpa chai quillca pancashituta cuhuai mshpa mañarcani, paica cutipahuarca: —Caica, micui. Canpac shimipica mishqui shina mishquimi canca, ranti canpac huicsapica jayacmi tucanca.
Quillca pancashituta angelpac maquimanta japishpa, micurcani; ñuca shimipica mishqui shina mishqui carca, ranti micushca huasha ñuca huicsapi jayac tucuhuarca.
Chashnapi rimahuanurca: —Cutillata Dios achca llactacunamanta, mama— llactacunamanta, shimicunamanta, reicunamanta tucunca rashcata rimashcata rimana canqui.
Shuc pintu shina ricuri tupuna caspita cuhuanurca, cashna rimashpa: —Jatarishpa tupui Diospac huasita altartapash, chaipi chacchaccunatapash yupai.
Ranti ama tupuichu Diospac huasi ñaupacpi tiyac chushac panpata, Diosta mana ricsiccunaman cushca cashcaraicu; paicuna santo llactata chuscu chunca ishcai quilla tupu jaitashpa shitanca ranun.
Ñucaca ishcai ricuyaccuna tsaca churana churarishcacunata cachanca rani, shuc huaranca ishcai patsac sucta chanca puncha ñucaraicu rimancapac.
Cai ishcai ricuyaccuna allpa amupac ñaupacpi shayac ishcai olivocuna, ishcai candelabrocuna canun.
Maicanpash paicanata huacllichinata manacpi, ninata shimimanta paicana shitanun, chai nina paita piñaccunata illacta rupachic can; chashnami maicanpash paicunata huacllichinata munac huañunca.

Cai ricuyaccana jahua pachata quillpana ushaita charinan, caicuna Diospac—raicu rimacushcapi tucui pacha ama tamiachan, paicuna ushaitapash charinan yacuta yahuarta rurancapac, tucui Jaya uncuicunahuan aIlpata ñacachin-capacpash, paicana manashcacama.
Ranti paicuna ruranata tucuchishcapi, manchaipac huaicumanta sicamuc huihua paicunahuan macanacushpa, atishpa, paicunata huañuchincami.
Paicunapac ayacuna shitashcami saquirinunca Apanchic chacatai tucushca jatun llacta callecunapi, chai llactata iniccuna Sodoma, mana cacpi Egipto ninun.
Quimsa punchya chaupi caran laya llactamanta runa, tucui laya yahuaryuc, ima shimiyuc, mai mama—llactamantacuna paicunapac ayacunata ricununca, panpancapac mana saquinancachu.
Cai allpapi causaccuna paicuna huañushcamanta cushiyanuncami. Cushiyaimantami tucuipura cuyaicunata curinacunca, chai ishcai profetacana causacushpa paicanata ñacachiccana cashcaraicu.
Ranti quimsa puncha chaupi tucurishcapi, Dios paicunata causachicpi cutillata jatarinurca, tucui paicunata ricuccuna mana ushaipac mancharinurca.

Chashnapi chai ishcai ricuyaccuna jahua pachamanta shuc sinchi shimi paicunaman cashna rimashcata uyanurca: "Caiman sica-muichic". Paicunaca shuc puyupi jahua pachaman sicanurca, paicunata chicniccunapipash ricui tucunurca.

Chaillapita shuc jatun allpa chausirina tiyarca, chai allpa chausirinaraicu llacta chuncapi raquishcamanta shuc raquishca tularirca, chaipi canchis huaranca runacuna huañunurca. Chaira causac quipariccuna mancharimantalla jahua pachapi Diosta chacchanurca.
Ishcai niqui huañui tucurirca, shinapash mana unaichu quimsa mqui huañuica pactamunca ran.

Canchis niqui angel paipac trompetata uyachishcapi, sinchi shimihuan cashna rimashcacana uyarinurca: —Cunanca cai pacha ñucanchi Diospac, paipac Cristopac pachami tucushca, paica huiñai huiñaimi amu canca.
Diospac ñaupacpi paicunapac tiyarinapi tiyacuc ishcai chunca chuscu rucucuna, allpaman cumurishpa, Diosta cashna nishpa chacchanurca:
—Tucuita ushac Apunchic Dios, canta pacrachanchic, can canqui, can carcanqui, can canpac ushaita japishpa, apu tucuncapac callarishcaraicu.

Mama-llactacuna piñarinushca; ranti canpac piñarina pacha, huañushcacanata taripana pacha ña pactashca mari; paicunaman cunata canta yanapac profetacanaman cunquimi, canpac runacunaman canpac shutita yupaichaccuna- manpash, jatun cacpi uchilla cacpi imapash; allpata huacllichiccunata huacllichinquimi.

Chaipi jahua pachapi tiyac Diospac huasi pascarirca; chai huasi ucupi Dios—huan runacanahuan cunacushca shimita ricuchic Arca chaipi ricuricurca. Chaipi llinpiyashca, uyarish-cacuna, tuluncuna, allpa chausirishca, rasu muyu tallirishca tiyanurca.
Shuc jatun ricuna jahua pachapi ricurirca: shuc huarmi intihuan churanapi pillurishca shina, quillata paipac chaquipi charishpa, umapica chunca ishcai cuillurhuan rurashca llaututa charirca.
Chai huarmi chichu carca; huahua nanashcaraicu, huahuayana ñacarma tiyashcaraicu capancurca.
Chai huashalla cuti shuc jatun ricuna jahua pachapi ricurirca: shuc jatun puca, canchis umayuc, caran umapi llautuyuc dragón nishca ricurirca.
Paipac chupahuan cuillurcuna quimsapi raquishca-manta shuc raquita aisashpa, allpaman shitarca. Chai dragón huachacuc huarmipac ñaupacpi shayarirca, pai huachashca shina paipac churita micancapac.
Chai huarmica shuc cari huahuata huahuayarca, paimi tucui mama—llactacunata sinchi maquihuan pushanca. Ranti paipac churita quichushpa Diospac ñaupacman, paipac tiyarinaman apai tucurca;
chai huarmica chunlla allpaman miticushpa rirca, chaipi Dios paita pacancapac shuc huasita allichishcarca; chaipimi paita shuc huaranca ishcai patsac sucta chunca punchata carashpa charinanca.
Chai huasha jahua pachapi shuc macanacui tiyarca: Miguel paipac angelcunantin dragonhuan macanacunurca. Dragón paipac angelcunantin macarinurca,
ranti paicuna mana atinata ushanurca; chashnamanta jahua pachapi mana causana ushanurca.
Chashna callpachi tucurca chai jatan dragón, chai callarimanta machacui, pai Supai, Satanas shutiyuc can, pai tucuicanata umachic can. Pai, paipac tucui angelcunantin allpaman shitai tucanurca.

Chashnapi shuc sinchi shimi cashna rimacta uyarcani: —Diospac quishpina, paipac ushai, paipac pacha ña pactashcami, paipac Mesiasca apumi can; ñucanchic huauquicunata cautsayachicuc callpachic tucushcami, paimi tutantin punchantin Diospac ñaupacpi paicunata cautsayachi-curca.
Ñucanchic huauquicuna Cordero tallichishca yahuarhuan, paicuna ricsichishca shimihuan paita atmushcami; huañunata mana manchanurcachu, ashtahuan huañuna yuyaitami charinurca.

Shina cacpi, jahua pachacuna cancanapash chaipi causaccuna, cushiyaichic. Ranti allpapi, ñucñu yacupi causaccanamanta mana yachanicbu, supaimi piñarimanta chucchushpa cancunapacman uraicushca, pai yachan mari mana unai causanca rashcata.
Chai dragón allpaman jichui tucushcata ricushpa, chai cari huahuata charic huarmita japisha nishpa catirca.

Chai huarmita ishcai jatun huamani ricrata churanurca, pai causancapac chunlla allpapi huacaichishcaman huanpurishpa rma ushancapac, machacuimanta camman, paita quimsa huata chaupi paita carashpa charinca racushcapi.
Machacui yacuta shimimanta shitarca, huarmita jarcancapac;
ranti allpa chai huarmita yanaparca, paipac shimita pascashpa machacui paipac shimimanta shitashca yacuta illacta millpurca.

Chashna tucucpi, chai dragón huarmihuan piñarishpa, paipac aillucana-huan macanacucrirca, Dios rurai mshcacunata caticcunahuan, Jesucristo shuti cashcata yachachiscamanta mana chicanyashpa pmiccunahuan.

Chai dragón ñucñu yacu patapi shayarirca. Shuc manchaipac huihua canchis umayuc, chunca cachuyuc ñucñu yacumanta shamucta ricurcanL Caran cacnupi shuc llaututa charirca, umacunapica Diosta piñac shuticunata charirca.

Chai ñuca ricushca manchaipac huihua puma shina ricuric carca; paipac chaquicuna oso chaqui canurca, shimica león shimita charirca. Dragón paiman paipac ushai, paipac tiyarinata curca, yapa ushaita curca.
Chai mauchaipac huihuamanta shuc uma huañuncapac cuchushcata charirca; ranti chai cuchushcamanta janpi tucurca, tucui pacha mancharishpa chai manchaipac huihuata catinurca.

Dragonta chacchanurca chai manchaipac huihuaman ushaita cushcaraicu, chai manchaipac huihuatapashcashna nishpa chacchanurca: —¿Cai manchaipac huihua shina maicanlla tiyanchu, pillapash paihuan macanacuna ushancachu?.
Diosta millashpa, piñashpa chai manchaipac huihua rimancapac saquinurcalla, chuscu chunca quilla pai amu causancapac saquinurcalla.
Chashna pai causarca, Diosmanta mana alli rimarca, Diosta piñachic shimicunata paipac huasitapash piñaica; jahua pachapi tiyaccanamantapash mana alli rimarca.
Diospac runacunahuan macanacuncapacpash saquinurcalla atircapash; tucui runa, tucui llacta, tucui shimi, tucui mama—llacta paipac canurca.
Cai manchaipac huihuata cai allpamantarunacuna, cai pacha rurashcapi, camaripi huañuchishca Corderopac causaccunapac pancapi mana paicunapac shutita quillcachishpa chanccanami paita chaccha-nurca.
Maicanpashrinriyuc cashpa, uyachun:
—Chunta curralman rina cac, chaiman richan; mircanuhuan huañana cac mircanuhuanmi huañuchic tucanca. Chairaicu Diospac runamanta caccuna sinchicunata, ininata charina Canan.
Chai huasha shuc manchaipac huihua allpamanta shamucta ricurcani. Cordero cachu shina ricuriccanata charirca, ranti shuc dragón shina rimac carca.

Ñaupac ricuric manchaipac huihua shinallata ushaita charirca, paipac ñaupacpi, allpata tucui paipi causaccunantin, ñaupac ricuric manchaipac huihuata chacchachirca, chai huañuncapac cuchui tucushcamanchaipac huihuata.
Jatun mancharicushiyanacu-natapash rurashpa ricuchirca. Jahua pachamanta ninata allpamanpash urmachichirca, runacuna ricushcapi.

Ñaupac ricuric manchaipac huihuapac ñaupacpi paita rurachishcahuan, allpamanta runacunata umachirca; rimarca chai mircanuhuan cuchui tucushpapash chaira causacuc manchaipac huihuapac huacata rurancapac.
Huasha ricuric manchaipac huihuata, chaishuc manchaipac huihuapachuacata causaita cuna ushaita cunurca, chai huaca rimancapac callarishpa tucui paita mana chacchaccunata huañuchichincapac.
Tucuicanata, huahuacu-na, rucucuna, tucuita chariccuna, llushticuna, huataracuna, quishpiracunata yachac maquipi, lrentepi cashpa imapash, shuc mircata churachirca.
Chashna mana pipash rantincapac, catuncapac mana ushanurcachu, chai manchaipac huihuapac mircata, paipac shutita, paipac quillcata imapash mana charishpa.
Caipimi yuyayuc caccana yachanunca; maican atipac, Dragonpac pacashca cashca yupaita pacllapi churachan. Shuc runami can, paipac yupai canmi sucta patsac sucta chunca sucta.
Corderota Sion urcupi shayacucta ricurcani. Paihuan shuc patsac chuscu chunca chuscu huaranca runacuna frentepi Corderopac shutita paipac Yayapac shutita quillcara charinurca.

Chai huasha jahua pachamanta uyarishcata uyar-cani; shucpaccha uyarishca shina carca, sinchi tulun uyarishca allpaman taanacta tucushca shina; achca arpata uyachiccuna as-pishpa uyachicushca shina uyaric.

Shuc mushu taquinata tiyarina ñaupacpi, chuscu huihuacuna ñaupacpi, rucucuna ñaupacpi taquiranurca. Mana pipash chai taquinata yachana usharca, chai shuc patsac chuscu chanca chuscu huaranca allpa-pi causac runa ucumanta quishpichishcacunalla.
Caicuna huarmihuan mana tacarinurca, paicana huarmi mana camac ca-nun; Cordero maita ricpipash paita catinan. Tucui runa ucu-manta Diospac Corderopacpash ñaupac camari shina quishpichi tucanurca.
Mana shuc llulla rimashcahuan paicuna shimipi tupai tucunurca, mana juchayuc canan paicuna.

Shuc angel chaupi jahua pachapi huanpuracta ricurcani; mana tucuric shimita allpapi causaccunaman, tucui mama—llactacunaman, runacanaman, tucui shimicunama, tucui llactacunaman shuc mana tucuric huillashcata ricsichincapac apacurca.
Smchi shimihuan rimacurca: —Diosta manchaichic, paita chacchaichic, pai taripana pacha ñami pactashca. Jahua pachata, allpata, ñucñu yacuta, pacchacanata ruracta chacchaichic.
Ishcai niqui angel catishpa, caita rimacurca: —Urmarca, jatun Babilonia urmarcami, pai tucui runacunata paipac mana alli causai vinota upiachirca.

Chai huasha, quimsa niqui angel catirca, paica cashna sinchi shimihuan rimacurca: —Maicanpash manchaipac huihuata chacchashpa, paipac huacatapash paipac mircata frentepi maquipi imapash churachicpi, l

Diosmanta shamuc manchaipac ñacarinata vinotami upiana tucunca, Diosllata allichishca paipac piñari mucahuapi; nina ñacarina, azufre ñacarinami angelcunapac ñaupacpi, Corderopac ñaupacpi ñacachi tucunca.
Pai ñacarishca cushni huiñai huiñai sicacan; tuta puncha samana mana tiyanchu manchaipac huihuata, paipac ricchaintin chacchaccanapac, paipac shutipac mircata chasquiccanapac.
Chashnamanta, Diospac runa caccuna, pai rurai nishcacanata caticcuna, Jesustapash mana pantashpa caticcuna, achca sinchicanata charina canan.

Chashnapi jahua pachamanta shuc shimita uyarcani, cashna rimahuarca: —Caita quillcai: Cunanmanta Apunchic—huan llutarishca huañuccuna cushiyanuchun. —Ari —Diospac Samai riman—, samanuncami paicunapac llancanamanta, paicuna rurashca paicanahuan canun.
Nuspaipi shuc yurac puyu ricurirca, chai puyu jahuapica shuc runa shina ricuric tiyacurca. Curi llaututa umapi charirca, maquipica sumacta manñayachishca hozta charirca.
Diospac huasimanta cuti shuc angel llucshirca, puyupi tiyacucta sinchi shimihuan caparishpa: —Canpac hozta cuyuchishpa muyuta pallai; ña pacha pactashcaraicu, allpamanta muyupucushca can.
Puyupi tiyacuc paipac hozta allpapi pitishpa, muyuta pallarca.
Chai huasha cuti slmc angel jahua pachapi tiyac Diospac huasimanta llucshirca, paipash sumacta manñayachishca hozta charirca.

Altarmanta shuc angel lluchsirca, pai ninamanta mincai tucushca can. Paica sumacta manñayachishca hozta charicta caparirca: —Canpac manñayachishca hozta cuyuchishpa, allpapi tiyac uva sapicanamanta huancucunata piti, ña pucura cashcaraicu.
Chai angel paipac hozta allpapi picashpa, allpapi tiyac uva huancucunata pitirca; chai huasha jatun purupi shitarca chaipi chahuai tucuncapac. Chaimi Diosmanta manchaipac shamuc ñacarina.
Chai uyacuna chahuai tucanurca llacta canchaman; chai purumantaca yahuar liucshirca, chai yahuar caballocuna freuo nishcacamami juntarirca, quimsa pacha kilometro panpapi.
Cuti shuc jatun manchaipacta ricurcani: canchis angelcuna canchis puchucai huañuicanata charinacurca, chaicunahuan Diospac piñarina tucurirca.

Ricurcanipash shuc mama—cuchashina cristalhuan ninahuan chapuchishcata; Chai cristalmanta mama-cucha patapi shayaranurca, Dios paicanaman cushca arpacunahuan, manchai- pac huihuata, paipac ricchai, paipac shutipac quillcaintin atish- ca runacuna.

Diospac rana Moisespac taquinata taquiranurca, Cordeiopac taquinatapash. Cashna rimaranurca: —Tucui can rurashca jatun sumacmi can, Apunchic, tucuita ushac Dios; canpac ñancuna cusca, shuticunami canan, mama—llactacunapac Apulla.

¿Canta mana manchac tiyancachu, Apunchiclla? ¿Canta mana chacchac tiyancachu maicanllaca? Canllami santo canqui; tucui mama—llactacuna shamanancami, canta chacchanancami, can cusca taripashcacuna ricurishcaraicu.
Chai huasha, nuspaipi ricurcani jahua pachapi Diospac huasi pascarishcata, Dios—huan runacanahuan shimi cunacush-camanta tanpu.
Chai Diospac huasimanta chai canchis huañuicunata charic canchis angelcana llucshinurca. Chuya, chiuclla lino churarishca canurca, pechopi curi chanpicunahuan huatarishca canurca.
Chuscu huihuacunamanta shuc, chai canchis angelcunaman caranma shuc curi mucahuata curca, Diosmanta shamuc manchaipac ñacarmahuan jantachishcacuna; chai huiñai mana tucurin.
Chai Diospac huasi Diospac ushai jatan cashcamanta cushnihuan juntarirca; mana pipash yaicuna usharca chai ucuman canchis angelcuna charishca canchis huañuicana tucurinacama.
Shuc sinchi shimi Diospac huasimanta llucshishpa canchis angelcunata rimarca: —Rishpa allpapi tallicrichic chai Diosmanta shamuc manchaipac ñacarmata charic canchis mucahuacunata.
Shuc niqui angel rishpa allpapi tallicrirca paipac mucahua charishcata; manchaipac huihuapac mircata chariccunaman, paipac ricchaita chacchaccunaman millai nanachic caracha llucshirca.
Ishcai niqui angel ñucñu yacupi paipac mucahuapi charishcata tallichirca; tucui ñucñu yacu yahuar tucurca, huañuchishca runapac shina, tucui ñucñu yacupi tiyac huihuacuna huañunurca.
Quimsa niqui angel yacucunapi, pacchacunapi paipac mucahuapi charishcata tallichirca, tucuilla yahuar tucunurca.
Chai huasha yacumanta angel rimashcata uyarcani: —Can cusca canqui chashna taripashcaraicu, santo Dioslla; can canqui, carcanqui,
paicuna yahuarta tallichishcaraicu canpac runacunamanta profetacunamantapash cunanca can paicunaman yahuarta upiachircanqui. ¡Chaita paicuna mananmca!.
Altarmanta caita rimashcatapash uyarcani: —Ari, Apunchic, tucuita ushac Dioslla, canmi shuti cuscata tariparcanqui.
Chuscu mqui angel paipac mucahuapi charishcata intipi tallichirca; intitaca runacunata ninahuan rupachina ushaita canacurca.
Tucuilla manchaipac rupashca saquirinurca; ranti Diosman mana ticranurcachu, paita mana chacchanurcachu, ashtahuan paita, cai huañuicunapi ushaita charicta, piñac shimicanata rimanurca.
Pichca niqui angel manchaipac huihuapac tiyarinapi paipac mucahuapi charishcata tallichirca, chairaicu paipac apu cana pacha yana tuta saquirirca. Runacuna nanaimantalla calluta canirinurca;
chashnapash mana alli ruranata mana saquinurcachu; chaipac rantimanta nanaraicu, millai carachacunaraicu jahua pachamanta Diosta piñac shimicunata rimanurca.
Sucta niqui angel paipac mucahuapi charishcata Eufrates yacupi tallichirca, chai yacu chaquirirca inti llucshinamanta shamuc apucuna chinpana ushancapac.
Dragonpac shimimanta, manchaipac huihuapac shimimanta, umachic profetapac shimimanta, quimsa ticllayuc samaicuna, janpatu shina ricuriccana llucshishcata ricurcani.
Mancharicushiyanacunata rurac supaicunapac samai canurca, tucuita ushac Diospac jatun punchapi macanacuncapac tucui cai pachamanta apucanata tantachincapac llucshinurca.
"Yuyapanquichic, shuhua shina cuncaimantami shamuni. Mana puñushpa churanantin tiyac cushiyachun; chashnami mana llushti cara purina tucunca, paipac pincaicana mana ricui tucununcachu".
Hebreo shimipi Armagedón mshca panpapi apucunata tantachinurca.
Canchis niqui angel paipac mucahuapi charishcata huairapi tallichirca, jahua pachapi tiyac Diospac huasimanta shuc sinchi shimi tiyarinamanta llucshishpa, caita rimarca: —Ña rurashcami can.
Chashnapi llinpiyashca, uyarishca, tuluncuna tiyarca, allpapash chucchurirca, cai pachapi runacuna causanca callarishcamanta tucui allpa chucchuimanta yalli allpa chucchui tiyashcaraicu.
Jatun llacta quimsapi raquirirca, cai pachamanta llactacunapash tularinurca; Diosca jatun llacta Babiloniamanta yuyarirca, pai piñarishpa cachamushca ñacachic vinota upiachincapac.
Tucui islacana urcucanapash chincarinurca;
jahua pachamanta jatun rasu paquicuna, shuc quintal tupu llashaccuna, runa jahuapi urmanurca, runacanaca rasu huañuiraicu Diosta piñanurca; jatanmi carca chai ñacarina.
Canchis mucahuata chariccunamanta shuc angel, ñucaman shamushpa rimahuarca: —Ricuc shamui, yacu jahuapi tiyacuc nuspa huarmi ñacarinca rashcata.
Cai pachamanta apucuna yumashpa paihuan juchallinushca, cai allpamanta runacuna paita huañupashpa ricushpa paipac vinota upiashpa machanacurca.

Chai huasha, chunlla allpaman pushahuarca: chaica shuc mushu nuspai carca. Chaipi shuc huarmi shuc manchaipac puca huihua jahuapi tiyacurca, chai Diosta piñac shuticunallahuan quillpashca carca; canchis umayuc, chunca cachuyuc carca.

Chai huarmi puca ansa pucari churanahuan churarishca carca; curihuan, sumac ricuric rumicunahuan, perlacunahuan huallcarishca carca. Curi mucahuata maquipi charirca; millaipaccunahuan, ticllacunahuan, pai yumashpa juchallishcacanahuan juntachishca carca;
chairapash shuc mana yachaipac shutita paipac Irentepi quillcashcatacharirca: "Jatan Babilonia, nuspacunapac mama, tucui cai allpapi mana alli tiyashcamanta mama".
Chai huasha atiparcani chai huarmi machac cashcata Diospac runacunapac yahuarhuan, Jesuspac ricuyac cashcamanta huañuchi tucuccunapac yahuarhuan. Paitaricushpa yapa mancharircani.
Chashnapi chai angel ranahuarca: —¿Canpacca manCharipacchu? Chai huarmipac, paita apacuc manchaipac canchis umayuc, chunca cachuyuc huihuapac pacara yachaitami canta ricsichinca rani.

Chai can ricushca manchaipac huihua ñaupacausarcami, cunan ña mana causanchu; chashnapash, huaicumanta sicanca ran pai chaira mana allipacha huacllichi tucushcallapita. Allpamanta runacu-na, cai pacha rurai tucushcamanta causacanapac quillcapi paicunapac shuti mana quillcashca chariccuna, mancharinunca-mi chai manchaipac huihua ñaupa causac, cunan mana tiyac cuti ticramucpi.
"Caipi ansa tiyan atipaccunata yuyachincapac: Canchis umacuna, canchis urcucana canun, chai huarmi tiyacushcacuna; chashnallata chai canchis umacuna, canchis apucuna canun.
Chaicunamanta pichcacana ña chincarmushca; shucca chaipi can; shucca chaira mana shamushca; pai pactamushpa mana unaichu causanca.
Chai ñaupa causac, canan ña mana tiyac manchaipac huihua, pusac niqui apu cau; chashna cashpallata canchiscunamanta can, paica chicapac chincarinaman mayanyacun.
"Can ricushca chunca cachucuna chunca apucuna canun, paicuna chaira mana apu tucunacushca; shinapash ansashitu apu tucununcami, manchaipac huihuahuan pacta.
Cai chunca apucuna chai yuyaillata charinun, paicuna ushaita, paicuna apu cashcata manchaipaca huihuaman cununca.
Corderohuanmi macarinunca, ranti Corderoca paicunata atmcami, Dios cayashcacunata acllashcacanatapash paihuan charishpa; Corderoca apucanapac Apu, curacacunapac Curacami can".
Chai angel caitapash rimahuarca: —Can ricushca nuspa huarmi tiyacushca yacucuna, llactacuna, runacuna, shimicuna, mama—llactacunami canun.
Can manchaipac huihuapi ricushca chunca cachucuna nuspa huarmita chicnmuncami, jichushpa llushtitami saquinunca; paipac aichata micununca, ninahuanpashmi rupachinunca.
Dios paicunapac shuncupi pai manashcata rurana yuyaita churashca; shuclla yuyaita japishpa, manchaipac huihuaman paicuna apu cashcata cununca Dios rimashca pactarinacama.
Can ricushca huarmi cai pachamanta apucunata paipac maquipi charic jatan llactami can.
Chai huasha, shuc angel jahua pachamanta uraicunata ricurcani; yapa ushaita charirca, allpapash paipac llinpic—huan punchaclla saquirirca.
Smchi shimihuan caparirca: —Jatun Babilonia urmarca, urmarca. Supaicunapac huasi tucushca; tucui laya ticllayuc samaicunapac huasi; millaipac, ticllayuc pumacunapac huasi.

Tucui pai juchallichishca mama—llactacana vinota upiashpa machanurca; cai pachamanta apucana paihuan yumashpa juchallmurca, cai pachapi catushpa cullquiyuccuna pai yapalla cullqui jichushcahuan cullquisapa tucunurca.
Jahua pachamanta cuti shuc shimita, cashna uyarcani: —Cancuna ñuca runacuna, chai llactamanta llucshichi cama paicunahuan juchallincapac, paicunapac huañuicuna cancunatapash ama pactancapac;
paicunapacjuchacuna jahua pachacamami tantarishca; Diosca paicana mana alli rashcata mana cuncarishcachu.
Pai shuccunaman cushca shinallata cuichic; paicushcamanta ishcai cuti tupu yapachishpa ticra-cnicnic; ishcaicuti ashtanuan yalli sinchita pai shuccunapacta chapuchishcata paipacta chapuchichic;

paita nanaita cuichic, ñacachichic pai jatanyarishca tuputa, pai cullquita jichushca tu-puta. Paica paipac shuncupi rimanmi: 'Caipimi shuc apu shina tiyacuni. Mana huacchachu cani. mana ñacarishachu'.
Chairaicu shuc punchallapi paipac huañuicuna paiman pacta-nuncami: huanuna, llaquirina, yaricai; ninapi rupachishcami canca; paitacautsayachic Dios tucuita ushac cashcaraicu.
Paihuan yumashpa juchallic cai pachamanta apucuna, paihuan cullquita tucuchiccuna, pai mpashca cushnita ricushpa huacanuncami, llaquirinuncami pairaicu.
Carulla saquirinun-ca nacacnic tucunata machashpa; cashnami rimanunca: —¡Ai, ai jatun llacta, Babilonia, ushayuc llacta! Ñahui pin
Cai pachamanta catuccunapash huacanuncami, liaquirinuncami chai liactaraicu, paicana catunata mana piman catuna ushashcaraicu:

paicuna apamushca curi, cullqui, sumac ricuric rumicuna, perlacuna, linomanta sumac churanacuna, sedamanta churana, quiquin puca, ansa pucari churanacuna; sumac ashnac caspicuna; marfilmanta rurashca imacunapash, munaipac caspimanta rurashca imacunapash, antamanta, jillaimanta, marmol nishcamanta;

paicuna apamushca ishpincu, sumac ashnac muyucuna; sumirta, mirra nishca, ashnac yacucuna; vino, huira, harina, trigo; jatun huacracuna, uclulla huacracuna, caballocana, canocuna, huatara mnacuna, yanapac runacuna.
Paicuna rimanuncami: —Ña mana tiyanchu can yapa munashca mishqui muyucuna; ña chicapac can sumac tiyanata, can achca charishcata chincachircanquimi.
Tucui chaicunata catuccana, llactaraicu cullquiyuccuna, pai ñacachi tucushcata manchashpa carulla saquirinunca, huacashpa, llaquirishpa,
cashnapashmirimananca: —¡Ai, ai jatun llacta! Sumac linohuan churarishca shina ricurirca, puca, pucari churanahuan churarishca, curihuan, perlacanahuan, sumac ricuric rumicunahuan sumacyaChishca.

¡Ñahui pin rashcapi chai tacui achca tiyashca illacta tucurishca! BarcoCunamanta tucui apucuna, tucur allpa mayan shina yacuta puriccuna, marinero nishcacuna, tucui ñucñu yacupi purishpa cullquiyaccuna, caruyashca saquirinurca;
chashna, llacta rupashcamanta cushnita ricushpa, caparinurca: —¿Maican llactapash cai llacta shina tiyarcachu?.

Chashna rimashpa, umapi ushpata churarishpa, huacashpa llaquirishpa, cashnacaparinurca: —¡Ai, ai jatun llacta! Pai tucui charishcahuan ñucñu yacupi barcota chariccuna cullquiyanurca. ¡Ñahui pin rashcapi iIlacta huacllichi tucushcal.
Chai llactaraicu, can jahua paChalla, cushiyai; cancunapash cushiyaichic, Diospac runacuna caccuna, apostolcunapash, profetacanapash, Dios paita cautsayachishpa, cancunaraicumi taripashca.

Chaipi shuc ushayuc angel shuc rumita jatachirca; chai rumi jatun cutana rumi shina carca, paita ñucñu yacuman shitashpa rimarca: —Cashnami can tulachi tucunqui, Babilonia, can jatan llacta, mana cuti canta ricununcachu.
Mana cuti arpa aspishca, pincullucuna uyachishca, trompetacuna uyachishca musica mana uyarincachu, manapi llancac canpi tiyancachu, cutana rumi uyarishcapash canpi mana uyarincachu.

Mana cuti canpi shuc chinpusullapash linpiyancachu, sahuariccuna raimishpa tulupushcapash ña mana uyarincachu, canpi catuccuna cai pachamanta ushayuccuna, can sacrashcacunahuan tucui mama—llactacunata umachishca cacpipash.
Chai llactapimi profetacunapac, Diospac runacunapac, tucui cai pachapi huañuchishcacanapac yahuar tuparishca.
Chai huasha, jahua pachapi achca runa cashna rimashcata uyarcani: —Apancluc chacchashca cachun. Quishpichina, jatanyana, ushai ñucanchic Diospacmi can,

paica cusca, shutita taripac mari can; mana ushaipac nuspa huarmita cautsayachishca mari, paimi paipac mana alli causaihuan pachata huacllichirca; Diosmi paipac runacana huañushcamicu chai huarmita ñacachirca".
Chai huasha cuti rimanacurca: —¡Apunchic chacchashca cachun! Nuspa huarmita rupachishcamanta cushni huiñai huiñai sicarancallami.
Ishcai chuscu rucucuna, chuscu causac huihuacunantin, allpacama cummishpa Diosta chacchanurca, paipac tiyarinapi tiyacucta. Cashna rimanurca: —¡Chashna cachan! ¡Apunchic chacchashca cachun!.
Chashnapi tiyarinamanta cashna rimashca uyarirca: —¡Tucui cancuna ñucanchic Diosta chacchaichic, uchillacuna jatancanantm, tucui cancuna paita yanapaccuna, paita yupaichaccana!".

Achca runapac shimita shinapash uyarcani, shuc paccha uyarishca shina, sinchi tuluncana shina. Caita rimaranurca: —¡Apanchic chacchashca cachan! Pai apu tucunca callarishcaraicu, ñucanchic tucuita ushac Dios.
Cushiyashun, cushiyashcahuan juntarishpa paita jatunyachishun, Cordero sahuarina pacha pactashcaraicu. Paipac huarmi alhchirishcami:
paita cuyanushca sumac lmomanta churarmata, chuya, llinpicta; chai linoca Diospac ranacana cusca causashca ricuchicmi can.
Angel rimahuarca: —Quillcai: 'Cordero sahuarina raimiman cayashcacuna cushiyanuchun'. Caitapash rimarca: —Chaicunami Dios alli shutipacha rimashca shimicuna canun.

Angelpac chaquipi cancurircani, paita chacchancapac, ranti pai rimahuarca: —Chaita ama rurarchu, ñucaca can shina, canpac huauquicuna shina Diosta yanapacmi cani, paicuna Jesus ricsichishcata cuscata catiranun. Diosta chacchai. Profetacunami Jesus yachachishcata huacaichinan.
Jahua pacha pascarishcapi ricurcani; chaipi shuc yurac caballo ricurirca, paipac jahuapi tiyacucpac shuti Cusca, Shuti carca, pai cuscata apacushcaraicu cuscatapash macanacushcarai-cu.
Paipac ñahuicuna nina shina llinpiyac canurca, umapi achca llautucunata charirca, pailla ricsishca shutitapash quillcashcata charirca.
Paipac churana yahuarpi jucuchishca carca, paipac shutica "Diospac Shimi" carca.
Jahua pachamanta soldadocuna, sumac lino churarishcacuna, yurac, chuya, yurac caballo jahuapi canurca.

Paicuna shimimanta shuc alli manñayachishca mircanu llucshirarca, mama— llactacunata chaihuan cuchuncapac. Paicunata sinchi maquihuanmi pushanca. Uvata chahuashca shina, jaitashca shinami paicunata taripanca, tucuita ushac Diosmanta manchaipac shamuc ñacarina vinotami paicunata upiachinca.
Paipac maquipi chancapipash cashna quillcarata charirca: "Curacanapac Curaca, apucunapac Apu".
Shuc angel, intipi shayarishpa jahua pachata huanpurac ancacanata sinchi shimihuan caparirca: —Shamuichic, tantarichic Diospac jatun micunapi micuncapac,

reicunapac, soldado apucunapac, sinchi mnacunapac aichata, caballocanapac aichata, paicunapac jahua-pi puriccunapac aichantm, tacuicunapac aicha; quishpiracuna- pac aicha, jatuncanapac, uchillacunapacaichata micancapac.
Manchaipac huihuata ricurcani, pachamanta apucunan-tin paicanapac soldadounantin, paicuna tantarmushcarca yurac caballopi tiyacuc—huan, paipac soldadccanahuan macarincapac.

Chai manchaipac huihua japi tucurca, paipac ñaupacpi mancharicushiyanata rurac umachic profetantin. Chai umachic profeta pai rurashcacunahuan chai manchaipac huihuapac mir-cata churachi tucuc runacanata paipac ricchaita chacchacunata-pash umachishcarCa. Chaipi chai manchaipac huihua umachi profetantin azufre rupacushca cuchapi causaccuna shitai tucu-nurca.
Chai shuccunaca caballo jahuapi tiyacucpac shimi-manta llucshic mircanuhuan huañuchi tucunurca; chaipi tucui ancacuna paicuna aichahuan mana ushaipac sacsanurca.
Jahua pachamanta shuc angel uraicumucta ricurcani, huaicumanta llaveta apamucurca, shuc jatun jillai huascata maquipi charirca.
Chai angel dragonta huatarca, chai calIarimanta machacui, pai supai can Satanas nishca, shuc huaranca huatapac jillai huascahuan huatarca.

Huaicuman shitashpa, chaipi paita huichcarca, puncupi shuc sellota churarca ama mama-llactacunata umachincapac shuc huaranca huata pactarinacama; chai huatacuna pactarishcapi mana anaipac cachari tucuncami.

Tiyarinacunata ricurcani, taripanca raccuna chaicunapi tiyaranurca. Chai huasha, Jesuspac ricuyaccuna cashcaraicu, Diospac shimita yachachishcaraicu umata piti tucuccanapac almacunata ricurcani. Paicanaca manchaipac huihuata mana chacchanushcarcachu; paipac ricchaitapash, paipac mircatapash frentepi, maquipi imapash mana churachinushcarcachu. Ricurcani paicuna cuti causanca callarishcata, shuc huaranca huata apu tucunurca Cristohuan.
Ranti shuc huañushcacuna huaranca huata pactarishcacama mana causarmurcachu. Chai ñaupac huañushcamanta cansarina can.

Ñaupac causarmata chariccuna cushiyanuchun, paicuna Diospac ranacana mari canun. Ishcai niqui huañui paicunapi ushaita mana charinchu, paicuna ashtahuan Diospac Cristopac pacriyayacunami cananca, paihuanmi shuc huaranca huata causanunca.
Shuc huaranca huata pactarishcapi, huatara cashcamanta Satanas cachari tucuncami,

Tucui pachapi tiyac mama-llactacunamanta runacuanta umachincapacmi llucshinca; Gogta, Magogtapash umachincapacmi llucshinca, paipac soldadocanata, ñucñu yacu patapi tiyac tiyu shina achcacunata-mi macanacancapac tantachinca.
Allpa ricurishcata sicanuica, Diospac runacana causana huasicunata muyuchinurca, pai llaquishca llactatapash. Ranti jahua pachamanta nina urmamushpa illacta paicunata rupachirca.
Paicunata umachic supaica nina azufreyuc cuchaman shitai tucurca, manchaipac huihua, umachic profeta shitai tucushcamanllata. Chaipimi huiñai huiñai tutantin punchantm ñacachi tucanunca.
Shuc jatun yurac tiyarinata ricurcani chaipi tiya cuctapash ricurcani. Paipac ñaupacpi cai pacha jahua pachantm alli pacha chincarinurca, ña maipipash mana ricurinurcachu.

Huañushcacanata ricurcani, jatuncuna uchillacunapash tiyarina ñapacpi shayaranurca; pancacuna pascai tucunurca, shuc pancapash pascai tucurca, chaica causaccunapac panca can. Huañushcacuna taripai tucunurca paicuna rurashcata ricushpa, chai pancacunapi quillcara tiyashcata ricushpa.
Ñucñu yacu paipi huañuccanata cutichirca, huañui pachapash paipi tiyac huañushcacunata cutichirca; caranlla taripai tucunurca caran amu rurashcata ricushpa.
Chai huasha huañui pacha nina cuchaman shitai tucurca. Cai nina cucha ishcai niqui huañui can;
causaccunapac pancapi mana paicunapac shutita quillcashcata chariccana chaiman shitai tucunurca.
Chai huasha mushu jahua pachata, mushu allpata ricurcani; ñaupa tiyac jahua pacha allpapash chincari-nushcarca, ñucñu yacupash.
Santo llactata ricurcani, mushu Jerusalenta, jahua pachamanta, Diospac ñaupacmanta uraicu-curca. Sahuarinca racuc huarmi cusapac allichirishca shina carca.

Shuc sinchi shimita tiyarinamanta cashna rimacta uyarcani: —Cunan Dios runacunahuan causan. Paicunahuanmi cau-sanca, paicuna paipac runacunami canunca, Diosllatami paicu-nahuan paicunapac Dios shina tiyanca.
Tucui paicuna hua-cashcata paimi chaquichinca, huañui ña mana tiyanchu, huacai, llaquirina nanaipash; tucui ñaupa tiyac cunan tucurishcaraicu.
Tiyarinapi tiyacuc rimarca: —Ñucami tucui imacanata mushuyachini. Caitapash nirca: —Quillcai, cai shimicuna uyana canan, shutimi canun".
Chai huasha rimahuarca: —Ña rurashcami can. Ñucami alfa omegapash cani, callarina, tucurinapash. Pipash upianayacpi causac paccha yacumantami, yanca upiachisha.
Atic runa tucui chaicunata-mi japinca ran; ñucaca paipac Dios casha, paica ñuca churi.

Ranti sanpacuna, mana iniccuna, millaipaccuna, runa huañuchiccana, yumashpa juchalliccuna, sacrachishpa puriccu-na, huacacanata chacchaccuna, tucui llullaisiquicanapash rupac azufreyuc cuchamanmi rina tucununca; chaimi ishcai niqui huañui can.

Canchis angelcunamanta shuc, chai canchis mucahuata canchis huañuicunahuan juntachishcata charic ñucaman mayanyashpa rimahuarca: —Shamui, sahuarmca racuc huarmita ricuchishcanqui, Corderopac huarmita.
Samai ricuchishca nuspaipi, chai angel shuc jatun jahua urcuman pushahuarca; jatun santo Jerusalen llactata ricuchihuarca, jahua pachamanta Diospac ñaupacmanta uraicucurca.
Dios llinpiyashcahuan llacta achicyacurca; pai achicyashca shuc sumac rumi achicyashca shina carca, jaspemanta rumi shina, cristal shina chuyac.

Llacta luyucta shuc jatan, jahua quincha tiyarca, shunca ishcai puncucunata charirca, caran puncupi shuc angel tiyarca; chai puncucanapi chunca ishcai Israelmanta huancurishca aillucunapac shuticana quillcashca tiyarca.
Quimsa puncu inti llucshinaman ñahuichashca canurca, quimsa uraiman, quimsa huichaiman, quimsa inti chincarinaman.
Chai llacta quincha chunca ishcai rumimanta sapicunata charirca, chaicunapi Corderopac chunca ishcai apostolcanapac shuticuna quillcara tiyanurca.
Ñucahuan rimaricuc angel curi caspita charirca llactata tupuncapac, puncucunata quinchatapash.
Chai llactapac chuscu mayancana chaipuralla canurca. Angel paipac caspihuan llactata tupurca: ishcai huaranca ishcai patsac kilometrocuna charirca; paipac chuscu mayancuna jahuamanpash chashnallata.
Chai huasha quinchata tupurca: sucta chunca pichca metrocuna charirca, runa yachai tupunami yuyarishpa chai angeltupucpi.
Jaspe rumimanta rurashca carca chai quincha, llactaca curimantalla carca, chuya cristal shina ricuric

Quinchamanta rumi sapicuna, tucui laya sumac ricuric rumicunahuan sumacyachishca carca; shuc niqui sapi, jaspehuan; ishcai niquica, zafirohuan; quimsa niquica, agatahuan; chuscu niquica, esmeraldahuan;

pichca niquica, onicehuan; sucta niquica, cornalinahuan; canchis niquica, crisolitohuan; pusac niquica, berilohuan; iscun niquica, topaciohuan; chunca niquica, crisoprasahuan; chunca shuc niquica, jacintohuan; chunca ishcai niquica, amatistahuan.
Chunca ishcai puncucuna chunca ishcai perla canurca; caran puncu shuc perlamantalla rurashca carca. Llactamanta jatun ñan curimanta carca, cristal shina chuya curimanta.
Llactapi mana maipi Diospac huasita ricurcanichu, tucuita ushac Apunchic Dios Corderontin paipac huasi cashcaraicu.
Llacta intita quillatapash mana mutsanchu paita ricuchincapac, Dios llinpiyashca paita ricuchishcaraicu, paipac achic Cordero cashcaraicu.
Mama—llactacuna llacta ricuchishcahuanmi purinunca, pachamanta apucunaca tucui paicuna charishcata paimanmi cununca.
Paipac puncucuna tucui puncha mana huichcai tucununcachu, chai llactapi tuta mana tiyancachu.
Paicuna jatun cashcata, tucui paicuna charishcata paiman cununca;
shinapash, mana maican punchapash ticllayuc paiman yaicuncachu, millaipaccunata ruracpash umachicpash. Corderopac causai pancapi shutita chariccanallami chaiman yaicananca.
Angel chai huasha Causai Yacuta ricuchihuarca. Cristal shina chuya carca, chai yacu Diospac Corderopac tiyarinamanta llucshicurca.

Chaupi llactacunamanta jatun ñanpipi, chai yacu ishcantin patapi, causai yura shayan, caran quilla aparin, rimacpica, chunca ishcai cuti caran huata; paipac pancacunaca mama—llactacunata janpincapac alli canun.
Chaipi mana imapash maldisiashca tiyancachu. Diospac tiyarina Corderopantin llactapimi canca, paipac runacuna paita chacchanuncami.
Quiquin ñahuipurami paitaricanunca, paipac shutitapash Irentapimi apai cachanunca.
Tuta chaipi mana tiyancachu; chaipi causaccunapash chinpusu achicta inti achictapash mana mutsununcachu, Apunchic Dios paipac achicta paicunaman cushcaraicu; paicunami huiñai chaipi cansanunca.

Angel rimahuarca: —Cai shimicuna uyai tucunami canun, shutimi canun. Apanchic Dios, profetacunaman yuyaita cuc, paipac angel cachashca paipac runacunaman manapash unaipi tucunca rashcata ricsichincapac.
—Mana unayashachu. Tucunca rashcamanta cai pancapi rimashcata uyac cushiyachun.
Ñuca, Juan, ricurcani, uyarcani tucui chaicanata. Tucui ricushpa uyashca huasha, ricuchihuac angelpac chaquipi cuncurircani, paita chacchancapac.
Ranti pai cashna nihuarca: —Chaitaca ama ruraichu, ñucaca Diosta yanapac cani can shina, canpac huauquicuna, profetacuna, cai pancapi quillcashcata tucui pactachiccuna shina. Diosta chacchai.
Caitapash nihuarca: —Tucunca rashcamanta cai pancapi rimashcata ama canlla pacaichu, ña mayanllami chai pactarina.
Saquilla millai runa paipac ruraihuan catichun, ticllayuc runa paipac ticllapi catichun; ranti alli runa allicanata rurashpa catichun, Diosta catic runa ama pantashpa paita caticuchunll.
—Ari, utcallami pactamusha, cuyaitami apamusha caranman amu rurashca tuputa cuncapac.
Ñucami alfa omegapash cani, tucuimanta ñaupac, tucuimanta huasha, callarina, tucurma.
Churanata tacshaccuna cushiyanuchun; causai yura paicunapacmi canca, llactamanta pancucunapash paicunapacca pascarami canca.
Allcucuna, sacracuna, ticllayuccuna, runa huañuchiccuna, huacata chacchaccuna, tucui llullahuan causac ranacuna canchaman saquirinanca.
—Ñuca, Jesus, ñuca angelta cachashcanimi iniccunata chaimanta rimancapac. Ñucami cunan huiñaric Davidpac aillumanta cani. Ñucami tutamanta llinpic cuillur cani.
Diospac Samai, Corderopac huarmintin caita rimanun: —Shamui. Uyacpash rimachun: —Shamui. Upianaita charic mayanyachun, maicanpash munashpa. Causai yacuta cuyashcata chasquichun.
Tucunca rashcamanta cai pancapi quillcashcata uyaccunata caitami rimani: Pipash caipi quillcashcata yapachicpi, Diosmi caipi quillcashca huañuicunata paiman cachanca.
Pipash cai pancapi tucunca rashcamanta quillcashca shimita anchuchicpi, Diosmi pai causai yurata charina cashcamanta, santo llactamanta chicanyachinca; cai pancapi chaicana quillcashca tiyanun.
Chai shimicunamanta ricuyac tucuc rimanmi: —Ari, utcallami pactanca rani. Chashna cachun. ¡Apunchic Jesus shamui!
Apunchic Jesus tucui cancunapi paipac cuyaita tallichichun.
